Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: ravi p
Detailed Review: Entire hotel staff was very courteous and helpful, including the restaurant staff. Very accommodating on guest requests. It was great to see that each and every staff member of the hotel were trying to satisfy the guests. Lots of instances where we felt we were receiving top service.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Deepak G
Detailed Review: Hardik made our night…..he is an excellent server and helped us choose from the menu. He was really nice to my family especially my kids. Since the restaurant was busy and took some time for the food to arrive, he offered some complimentary soft beverages and also cookies for my kids. Thanks Hardik, you are the best. Deepak and Fly

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Amit Ohri
Detailed Review: Specially Kunal Kachhatiya Marriot Mumbai Manager wonderful personality I love the way he treat people very polite and great and they attend their guest in a very good manner and all staff members are very polite and great I would recommend you to go

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Amanpreet Saini
Detailed Review: The staff and attention to details as well as the service was amazing. Sachin Bhosale sir was the one managing the room service and was available at the service whenever required. Thanks for the amazing amazing experience!!

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Jeffrey Frederick
Detailed Review: The Courtyard Marriott Mumbai International Airport one of the best Marriott's I have ever visited. Beautiful new property with great amenities and exceptional customer service - in particular from the food and beverage service team.  A special thank you to Shubham at the Momo Cafe, Gyanba and Saurabh Manikpuri-Housekeeping and Karan - room service - all of whom go above and beyond in all that they do.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rodney
Detailed Review: Great visit overall. Good rooms and facilities, Great Service. Highly Recommended. . Special thanks to: Concierge : Santosh , Asif, Sachin, Devraj Chauffers : Sonu, Uday  Front desk: Moin, Sayali Ays : Prathamesh

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Narottam S
Detailed Review: We kept our daughter’s wedding at Courtyard Marriott and it was a grand success. Everyone from the staff was very courteous, helpful and the hospitality was great. The food was delicious. All the events went on very smoothly and we are very happy overall. Special thanks to Girish, Shreyas, Kunal, Chef Rajiv Das, Gaurav, Kaushal, Rohit and Mayur!

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Saima N
Detailed Review: I brought my family here for Eid Sunday brunch and the food was fantastic so kudos to Chef Akshay for paying attention to vegetarians.  Gorgeous salad spread, as that is all I had! My mum had good words about the non veg spread especially the shepherds pie. Great service especially by Omkar who was assisting our table. Such a helpful, polite and a wonderful person to talk to. Shout out to Tejas the sous chef for the personal tough. My kid had a great time playing by the entertainment area.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Meghnath J
Detailed Review: Recently met with one of the staff Mr Raviraj , this person called me and assisted me with all the help and support to get back my laptop. He is really helpful and kind . Thank you so much Raviraj for your immense support . you are really doing a great job , also to mention one of the staff Mr prashant who help to communicate about the lost item . Overall my experience was really good at Courtyard marriott , amazing staff , amazing service all together .

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rohan Desale
Detailed Review: I am extremely happy with entire staff of Courtyard by Marriott @ Andheri 👌 i was here for breakfast its so overwhelming from chef Akshay. Complementary dessert which serves so beautifully.i am so happy with food and service,thanks a lot.  Special thanks to Chef Akshay  & Shubham tremendous courteous & helpful ! We were impressed by hospitality given by everyone ( excuse for not mentioning all names )

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Anand
Detailed Review: Very Good Food . Hospitality is excellent. personal attention by chef himself. Great food guidances by Chef Tejas , Service by Sahil and Olin . Highly recommend. Really thankful to made us taste all the cuisine. Also thanking guidance by Mr. Abhijeet. Very humble person

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Atharva
Detailed Review: Chef Tejas/ Kunal / Olen helped us elating the experience and made us feel at utmost comfort.  It is worth the long drive and ambience is also enlightening.   They have specially taken care by doing extra efforts so that we are very comfortable   Great team and systems Appreciate that .

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Shailendra P.
Detailed Review: I had visited the courtyard by marriot hotel property international airport and  I couldn't have been happier with the experience. The momo Cafe has great ambiance and an extravagant buffet spread.  A special mention to Kunal, Tejas and sowra (with her contagious smile  who were the sweetest, making sure i have no problem with my meal. Along with the chefs at the live who made scrumptious meals.  All over a great experience and I will surely visit again.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Chetan M
Detailed Review: We were extremely happy with entire staff of Courtyard by Marriott @ Andheri 👌 Especially Akshay ( Chef ) , Abhijit , Ashwini , Shreya & Venu in Dining  Riiddhesh & Asif were tremendous courteous & helpful ! Special thanks to Yogendra for taking all over care . We were impressed by hospitality given by everyone ( excuse for not mentioning all names )  Chetan & Ragini

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Foodchronicles
Review: Ark 2.0 Courtyard By Marriott - Classic lounge with amazing cocktails
Detailed Review: This is a very classy & lively place inside The Courtyard Marriot known as Ark2.0  Its a  fine dine as well as club where you get great cocktails & Mocktails.  They have very limited options for food but serve delicious Nibblers .  The hospitality here is top noch and ambience is a vibe with some live screening and great music. The USP is presentation of cocktails .  Highly recommendable for group of friends to hangout .  Loved everything about Ark2.0  Jane   Price -375/-  A mocktail with a punch of Litchi & grape juice with a dash of lime is one of its kind . The tinge of these natural extracts is super refreshing & a must have .  Taste - 4/5   Tropical Bust  Price - 375/- Blend of Tangy Pineapple & Yuzu is a perfect combination to relieve your thurst & refresh your mood. …

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Raveen Kumar
Review: Business conference - Doosan Bobcat India Pvt Ltd
Detailed Review: Hotel management was very Co-operative and friendly.  Special appraisal to Mr. Viraj Jadhav , Mr. Rishabh Singh and Mr. Riddhesh for being very supportive and excellent hospitality.  Food was good and preferred timings were maintained.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sheetal Chettiar - India Medtronic P L
Review: I had a business  meeting on 3rd july
Detailed Review: Excellent service by Viraj, Devraj, Pradeep & Gaurav. food was awesome. there was some miscommunication but yes Devraj from Concierge handled smoothly. My next meeting will keep here only.   thanks Team

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Mike
Detailed Review: I am pleased  to say that my stay at court yard Marriott Mumbay has been excellent and good. Very special mention to Devaraj from concierge Very helpful with his good service and helpful in all matters

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Raj Shah
Detailed Review: I am a regular customer of this hotel, they never fail to give good service.  All staff is well trained and Asif is really good at his work, very polite and hospitable  Location is also near the airport so easy for a business traveller to commute everywhere

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Harshad Sawant
Detailed Review: We had banquet function at the hotel. It was really awesome arrangements. Food quality is really good. Rooms size is also good with proper cleanliness. We must thanks to Banquet team members Shehban , Dickson, Pradeep,Darius , and vinit . Keep it up team Courtyard Marriott Andheri. We will definitely plan our upcoming events with you.   Thanks from Turtlemint Team.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Titli
Detailed Review: We had been to holiday inn for dinner on a sunday evening and had great experience. The food and ambience was great. Staff were too polite. Special mention to Hitesh who was taking care of our food...

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Yashoda
Detailed Review: The crew made me feel very special esp Hitesh , Shankar and Ravi ..every single detail was noted and helped with.The stay was heavenly and the hospitality ..omg the staff are very professional and also friendly always greeting with smile and sorting any kind of queries at the earliest.I would definitely visit again 🙂

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: ANIRBAN CHAKRABARTY
Detailed Review: I had a great stay at Holiday inn mumbai international Airport services were top notch. Specially Business centre where Pooja took care very well. All team members are very supportive and always there to help you.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ram
Detailed Review: Mr Hitesh shetty is good person. Verry good behaviour  food was excellent  Interior is beautiful  Many varieties of food starter deserts. Really enjoy the holiday in with Mr hitesh Shetty.  All the best..

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Kishor soni
Detailed Review: Hitesh shetty, he is very cool guy, friendly nature, and good hospitality provider . Great kitchen, with live making of dishes, fresh n refreshing item, fruit , cake loved it and on table , good experience with all.  Thank you...

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Shamitha C
Detailed Review: We had a very pleasant stay and the ambience was really good. The food at saptami restaurant was excellent and the staff help you with everything. We were attended by Mr. Hitesh Shetty and I have to say, his service and attitude was really nice. We even got to pack a few donuts after breakfast!!! I'd definitely recommend Holiday Inn to my friends and relatives:))

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Julia C
Detailed Review: Food was great. Hitesh Hati was a great server. Rooms were amazing as well. 10/10 would stay again. Breakfast is worth eating, fruits are great. Eat well sleep well bottle water is complementary. Staff are very friendly

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Yashvee
Detailed Review: Dakshata gave an amazing serving at Boulevard at the Orchid hotel. She was really helpful. The suggestions and services were very good. Very polite behaviour and sweet nature that made it easy to converse with her.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sameer G
Review: Weeding reception of Varun and kirti
Detailed Review: Nice Ambience. Good hospitality. Cleanliness at its best. Staff's behaviour is also too good. Food quality is amazing. Spacious lobby as well as cafe are so good. Room service at your fingers. Overall 10 out of 9.  Happy to visit next time.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Kiirii
Detailed Review: I would like to appreciate Mr. Sumit for his quick and excellent service provided during the buffet time. He was very down to earth that he even initiated and bought the soup for for my colleague. People like him are hard to come across these days. I am extremely happy for the service and I would recommend this to everyone. Thank you Orchid.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Parth
Detailed Review: I visited the hotel for a wedding function and  I dont have words to express how good the service has been of the hotel premises. The staff is very co-operative especially Mr Vikas, Mr Kohli and Romeo. The food is really amazing and tasty and would surely like to recommend everyone.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Pravin
Detailed Review: We booked Room including food. Today we are seated on table for dinner and one waiter came and get off Mineral Water bottle from table not even bothering to tell us this is chargeable. We are also paying amount for food. This is really pathetic. Table No 10 for your reference.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rebecca P
Detailed Review: We had a wonderful experience. Especially Dakshata was really nice and pleasant at hosting us.  We ordered samosa - they were specially delicious. We also liked the coffee.  We will surely visit next time and ask for Dakshata.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Harsimran Khroud
Detailed Review: Amazing service by Shubham, he catered very well to the guests requirements. Food was delicious specially dahi puri. Clean rooms and very positive ambience. Humble and courteous staff.  Quick checkin and services delivered on time.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Younoussa M
Detailed Review: Excellent service and employed. Thank you Dakshata who help us to choice a good meal its good Fish curry 🍛 its yummy And shi is  very nice helpful de all time and the chef its not andestand my word but the girl dakshata is is andestand  Thank you for nice service dakshata and mahesh

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: raosaheb
Detailed Review: Excellent food, excellent hosputality on the part  of the staff, in particular Chef Paramjeet, Chef Lad & Kanchan Ma'am.   For me this was precious ( & first visit outside home after a gap of four months due to my hospitalisation).  Thanx a tonful to The Orchid Family

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ramesh Bhutani
Detailed Review: Food was really good! Really liked the cheesecake , pani puri and opera cake. .Really Helpful staff , especially Nilesh and chef Mihir, ready to help before we asked. The ambience is also really good.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Leena mehta
Detailed Review: Good service  by MS Dakshata and proactive.willing to help and courteous.good work and keep it up. Good service and good customer service. Polite humble and good work. Confident and good nature.served on time and good nature

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Dudekula
Detailed Review: The lunch and dessert was quite good. And the staff member dakshata was really helpful n kind. Felt quite good and comfortable.The ambiance was also very good and peaceful. Keep up the work,hope to stay here again.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Navjot Kaur
Detailed Review: Beautiful place ! We had been for lunch at Boulevard restaurant for lunch. We had opted for buffet lunch. The food was really delicious. Sumptuous meals and lots and lots of variety. The staff was really helpful and loving. The ambience is just elegant and beautiful. The food is bit expensive and is good  Overall a great experience and the service was great by miss dakshata and Snehal

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ritesh
Detailed Review: The food was very nice I'll order for the mutton dum biryani is very yummy and the dakshata and snehal is very nice and helpful for me and thay give me chaat dhahi puri it's so tasty and the very nice place

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rajeev
Detailed Review: Great service given by banquet staff and good food and good taste in food great hospitality great adventure chef Mahesh has cook good food and taste is awesome I like the paneer dish which is good I really happy with the menu Mr Roshan Koli and staff huzefa and shrinivas great   hospitality

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Naadia Anjum
Detailed Review: The staff was really friendly enjoyed my stay here. Had  a  wonderful  time. Came here for  a week and had a really comfortable stay . Specially the food was exotic. Thank you Sanjana and team for making a comfortable stay at the hotel.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Khushboo R
Detailed Review: I met chef Mihir here , he was so kind and helpful and he helped me with the choices in buffet and food was delicious,i liked the kheer they had in the options, loved it !!! highly recommend this place to visit .

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Kunal
Detailed Review: The restaurant was very nice and the good place airport view is very nice and the food is good and staff was very nice and specially miss.dakshata is very helpful and shubham also very good  Thank you for nice service

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Santosh
Detailed Review: The food was very good and the live counter dabeli and chaat very nice and the very good service and the spic very nice service by miss .dakshata and Mahesh very good 😊 the very nice manager salman and kanchan Thy very helpful Thank you for serving

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sachinshah
Detailed Review: Amazing Ambience  Amazing Food Amazing Music. Singers were really amazing Service with all heart, making us feel like home. Staff really courteous.  Should try atleast once.  Would Recommend to everyone.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Shyam
Detailed Review: Stayed at the st Regis for my sons marriage  Had a great experience g Excellent service at the seven kitchen  Breakfast layout vast  Hospitality by Chef Abid, Namrata, Chef Samita, Bhagyashree, Chef Sabanna, Chef Ilumalai and Chef Stephan and Farhat was splendid they took care of our requirements and were very helpful   General service and ambience of the hotel was very good   Definitely recommended

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: AshishSehgal
Detailed Review: Have been staying at this hotel for ten years now  It is a beautiful hotel and perfectly suits my needs  Pre covid or post covid I have always been consistently coming here  Otherwise the extra care you get everywhere is commendable. Restaurant team is very attentive they know all my preferences. Aditi Rampal, Chef Paul, Chef Abid, Rovi and Namrata have been great !

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: MrsChhabria
Detailed Review: Good ambience  Good breakfast  Excellent service and hospitality by Chef Abid, Namrata, Farhat Chef Athar  Kevin at the Sahib room   Our thanks and appreciation to all of them for making our stay very comfortable  We felt at home

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: John G
Detailed Review: Not visited since Covid. Hoping great service and food would be the same. It was not……it was BETTER. Breakfast had more options and staff was passing out new goodies on an almost daily basis.  Kipling Bar had more cocktail selections and Omkar provided fabulous service. Spa  was also wondrous.  New faces but same great massages. Thanks Abby. Shout out to Front Desk and Concierge Staff as well.  See you soon!

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Gooriah 808
Review: CLASSY SERVICE IS SOMETHING YOU CAN EXPECT FROM THIS PROPERTY
Detailed Review: Excellent service, friendly and attentive staff, from driver to reception as well as restaurant, outstanding . I'm looking forward to staying at St. Regis for the coming trips. Special thanks to Mrs Devina who is hands on and knows the value of her profession

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Global439198
Review: Big shout to Sous Chef Printo
Detailed Review: Had a great experience with the stay! Big shout to Sous Chef Printo Pauly for making the dinning experience extra special:) would highly recommend saying hello to him if you visit!  Apart from that the pool on the property is great for a nice swim

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sid
Detailed Review: The St. Regis property in Mumbai is perfect example of business excellence at the intersection of fun. The hotel has lot of variety of food/cuisine and is filled with rich traditions - such as afternoon tea, champagne sabering, etc.   The most valuable aspect of the property is the staff. Each and every staff member of the property really cares about the experience that you are having. For example, the service was so excellent that I can recall, even today, the name of folks who made my stay memorable such as Prathmesh, Aditya, Adnan, Vidit, Inzaman, Vinod, Neha P and Julem  The food was incredible thanks to kitchen pros such as Chef. Attar & Ahmed.   I hope you have similar fun and are able to enjoy your stay at St. Regis!!  - Sid

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Mahesa W
Review: 5 Star Experience at St. Regis Mumbai
Detailed Review: We checked in to The St. Regis Mumbai on June 30th. Even on the first day the service was excellent, the check-in process was smooth and efficient. The staff at the lobby were always on standby and very friendly! The one thing I love about The St. Regis Mumbai is their hospitality and service. Our room was a Suite Room that included: Breakfast, Cocktail Hour, and the Butler Service.   Our butler Sr. Pratham was very friendly and helped us out alot during our stay. Always there to help us out and provided us with anything we needed. Provided us with an extra bed and even gave Chocolates as a welcome gift. Also surprised us with a Chocolate Cake and Champagne Bottle as a thanks for being guests. Sr. Pratham was very hospitable during our whole stay and made us feel at home. Hats…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: RMM
Detailed Review: Our time at the St. Regis Mumbai was absolutely wonderful. It was the best hospitality I've experienced to date. I was celebrating a good friend's birthday and the staff above and beyond, totally complimentary--roses, cake, chocolate, rose bubble bath, singing at breakfast, etc. From check-in with Julem who was warm, accommodating, and welcoming, to our butler Dinesh who made every ask come to life (for example, I had asked for a bathrobe for a rushed trip to the pool and when it didn't come in time, he hand-delivered the robe to the poolside, he also stayed after his shift hours to wish my friend happy birthday at midnight with St. Regis chocolates), to the crew of employees at Seven Kitchens who were extremely attentive at breakfast and sang happy birthday to my friend…

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Archana
Detailed Review: Hotel is nice but mini bqr not there in the room.. food was good breakfast has variety staff .is courteous. Spacious rooms and staff are always ready for service. Ambiece at lobby is so good and eye apealing. Poolside restaurant

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Stanley
Detailed Review: Visited  after ages and the Services  which  are provided  by the Kamat group was excellent. Food is so tasty ....All the team of Hotel is so Helpful . Visited  here after 5 years. Still I remember  my previous  stay and now it's  really  good to stay back here. Definitely  will come  back.  Thank you team for your excellent service  and Hospitality.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Arfa
Detailed Review: Decent hotel, although amazing management and staff!   They maintained the cleanliness  Upgraded the room for us  Helped with extra requirements  Specially Dharmendra Singh   They are so great and helpful. Wonderful ‘! Greatly recommended

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Dhanesh P
Detailed Review: Stayed for 6 days at VITS nice hotel along with the good staff. Food was tasty and rooms are well maintained and cleaned. Staff were very courteous and helpful. Thanks to them for making my stay memorable..

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sunil Lamkhade
Review: Excellent Hotel And Restaurant Staff And Food
Detailed Review: Thank you Mr Ojha and Rohit for giving brilliant service at restaurant and poolside view is awesome highly recommend.....Also the room was very neat and clean.. Overall experience at Hotel VITS Mumbai Is Fully Satisfied...

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Anant
Detailed Review: Had a fantastic experience!!!....................... recommendation for couples......... Candlelight theme......... Day spent well.... More than expectations...................... Well taken care............................. Would come back......

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ameya Dixit
Detailed Review: Recently visited VITS Mumbai for my cousin's wedding. Was pleasantly surprised by the accommodation and food services provided. The ambience of the swimming pool floor leaves nothing to be desired, however, the same cannot be said for each floor. The rooms are spacious, if a bit too closed off, the staff is courteous (most of the time), and the halls are perfectly bite-sized for small gatherings. All in all, a pleasant experience, albeit one not without its drawbacks.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Vijay
Detailed Review: Stay was comfortable and room was really kept nice and tidy all the times,Housekeeping staff was very cooperative and humble special thanks to supervisor Mr.Manish Solanki and Attender Mr.Nilesh who was very supportive and caring. It was a great experience to stay here .

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Shivani
Review: Quick and prompt addressing of issues !
Detailed Review: I was staying with my family for a over night transit here. The hotel staff was quick the assess that when we arrive late at night and made good arrangements for stay.  Morning we were facing some issues with lounge access and Mr Moin Shaikh was ver prompt to resolve the breakfast issue.   Over a great experience as expected from a Marriott hotel.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sourabh S
Detailed Review: stayed there for 2 nights. Hotel was really clean and tidy. View from the room was not much (rubble of a building next to it) but room was spacious. Internet was good enough for my office work. Prathmesh from the front desk was helpful and polite. Could not use the pool due to work but pool was big and nice. Vijeya from housekeeping was courteous.  front desk gave me a good deal for buffet dinner. it was a bit out of my budget but would recommend this to all who can afford it, the hotel was a bit noisy and i am i light sleeper - missed out on some sleep but overall it was good

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Nilesh Prabhu
Detailed Review: Very happy with our stay at this Marriott hotel in Mumbai.  Great location, very close the airport.  Professional car pick up and drop off services from airport or anywhere in the city.  Additionally, awesome breakfast and lunch!!!   I specifically would like to call out two gentlemen from this hotel.  1) Devraj Anthony Shetty and 2) Ramesh M. Gonamanda.   Devraj helped with planning any local and airport trips that we needed on a short notice and was wonderful to work with.  He also offered us the best competitive rates for the car services.    Ramesh was our chauffer on multiple times, and he was very professional, courteous and went above and beyond helping me and my family with our luggage.  I noticed, he was proactive in every trip and added some buffer time to deal with…

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Mohamed E
Review: Very nice hotel and very cozy
Detailed Review: Very nice hotel. Nice location near to every thing.  Very friendly staff specially asif sheikh  He is very helpful and nice guy.  Sure will come back again and recommend to friends because of the friendly staff . And fantastic service.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Subburaja A
Review: Excellent Stay at Courtyard Marriot Mumbai
Detailed Review: It was nice experience and enjoyed the stay at Courtyard Marriot Mumbai International Airport. The infrastructure and the ambience are very good. The staff were very much helpful and courteous. To name among the staff I remember Mr.Shreejit Pillai in the front desk. He was very much helpful and very friendly. They have even offered free pass to the executive lounge during happy hours. The room was maintained well with all toiletries and other items. The food was excellent at the restaurant. I had even ordered room service for food and it was delivered on time. I could use my mobile app for unlocking the room and as access key at the lifts. Totally it was an excellent stay.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sheetal R Palkar
Review: Amazing customer service by Food & Beverage staff
Detailed Review: The most we enjoyed was food. Chef Santosh, Chef Tejas and their teams ensured that our special food requirements are catered to the satisfaction. They displayed their utmost “customer delight” attitude. The serving staff, the kitchen stag and the chefs themselves personally attended us and made sure to take best care of us.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: SteadyVG
Review: Excellent - great location and comfortable stay
Detailed Review: really nice property, I stayed there twice now in last 2 months.  Great location, very close to airport. Rooms are clean and well managed. Lot of amenities in hotel Staff is really friendly and professional.  'Yogendra Indulkar' helped with the booking and room selection, he ensured everything is taken care of including airport pick up. There is lot of variety in breakfast buffet and its complimentary. I was impressed with staff serving at breakfast tables, especially Isteyaq, Ashok and AKshay (chef). They really went above and beyond to serve me and other guests. This was such a different experience I had at this hotel. I would highly recommend this hotel.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Godwin
Review: Excellent and a fabulous Time in Courtyard Mumbai
Detailed Review: It's indeed boring to fill up feedback forms but when we are taken really good care by the  Courtyard Marriott front Office and F&B staff. It's really makes me feel happy to appreciate some of your Excellent team members especially Devraj and Santosh at the concierge for a kind warm welcome and help to make us feel comfortable and welcoming during our stay. I am pleased to say that my stay at Courtyard Marriott Mumbai has been excellent and has surpassed all the expectations. The staffs were wonderfull and catered all my need.  A very special mention to prathamesh in AYS Moin at the front desk and Santosh & Devraj at the concierge. You 4 are fab and beyond.  Thank you for your excellent hospitality and hope to stay at your hotel soon.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Oscar
Detailed Review: Enjoyed our stay in hotel  Special thanks to Santosh and devraj. Very friendly and professional   Smooth check in process .   Amazing staff, great team players.  I am looking forward for our next stay soon.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Vijay
Detailed Review: Team banquet was very helpful especially gaurav dhiraj rakshak and vinnet helps a lot whatever the need they fulfill hall was also good thanks to the team . Courtyard service is also good and the hall was also nice

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rashmi
Detailed Review: I came for just a coffee and was stuck due to heavy rain. On top of it I lost my luggage at the airport due to which I was struggling with the airport staff. DEVRAJ overheard my conversation and approach to help me out. Within 2hours he solved my problem and my luggage was with me. I am amazed experiencing something like this. I was not staying in hotel still Devraj was courteous enough to help me out. This shows the great service quality Marriott has in their employee. I will definitely recommend COURTYARD MARRIOTT to all my friends and family to experience the unexpected service. ONCE AGAIN A BIG SHOUT OUT TO DEVRAJ FOR HELPING ME OUT.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Pramod Patil
Review: Great Service, humble people and excellent Breakfast
Detailed Review: We always stop over here in this Hotel when coming from the USA and returning to the USA. This is a gem hotel sitting by the International airport and very convenient to go around the places.  Our family with 2 kids always enjoys staying and food here. Chef Akshay and the staff from the mo-mo restaurant were very generous and friendly during our stay. Getting warm food at 4 AM in the morning to delayed check-in lounge for quick bites, the staff exceeded our expectations in food taste and service.   Lastly, I would like to thank the front desk, concierge, and entire hotel staff of the courtyard for making us feel back home.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sandeep
Detailed Review: Room was good. Thanks to House Keeping team for the great hospitality. Thanks to Mr. Riddhesh from the House keeping team for the hospitality and checking personally that the room is comfortable and I don't require any further amenities/support. Thanks to the drivers (Mr. Navraj and another driver name i forgot), for picking and dropping to the airport.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sahil
Detailed Review: Its was best stay so far In all Marriott's.check in was really quick cheers to moin.morning brkfst spread was also good and staff shabhan from fnb was really helpful to us.... overall had a great stay

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: gaikwad
Detailed Review: Stayed in courtyard by Marriott international airport mumbai. Really enjoyed staying here thier hospitality was great specially thanks for Mr. Vinod and shivaji he his during stay extra care of me. highly recommended this hotel family and friends visit again and again.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Archit Singh
Detailed Review: I recently visited Mumbai for office purpose and had my 15days stay at Courtyard by Marriott, Chakala road. It was my first visit to Mumbai but the staff is so friendly I felt so relaxed. They value their guests and their request. Special thanks to Riddhesh Tamhane Housekeeping Executive he took care of each thing which is required to make my stay perfect. And their service is super amazing. Thanks to whole staff.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Alicia
Review: Great hospitality by the banquet team.
Detailed Review: We always conducted events but the banquet team who handled the event this time were excellent! Thank you to Viraj Adhate, Raj , Gaurav and Jagdish.. kudos to their coordination.   All the best guys! Keep it up

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ida Sofia Scader
Detailed Review: I Stayed at Courtyard by Marriott, Mumbai and i had the two Kindest,friendliest hotel representatives, Devraj and Santosh who were there for me to guide me through my entire stay,Both Devraj and Santosh are efficient and personable.They made sure that all my needs and Room were above standards...When i stay at any hotel in Mumbai it will be only Courtyard by Marriott, Thanks for all the Good service and taken care well.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rowhan Gopal
Detailed Review: I had an amazing experience during my stay at courtyard Marriott hotel Mumbai due to the excellent service and assistance provided by Devraj from conceige department. I would recommend him to all visitors to this hotel, any assistance just contact him and he will sort it out whilst you relax

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Jiten Chavda
Detailed Review: My wife and I stayed for couple of days at Courtyard Marriott in Mumbai and were delighted with the level of service and attention from the overall staff and management. From the front desk to the pool and concierge to dropping us at the international airport the people were exceptionally professional and courteous. Ashwini, Devraj Shetty, Umesh, Ridesh and chef Akshay and Arshi attended to us during our stay and we felt like home. The hotel was very clean, well maintained and a  beautiful property, The services were prompt and efficient. The variety of food catered to all tastes, regional and international. I would highly recommend staying at this property to all. Great Value for money.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Mini Gourisaria
Detailed Review: Loved the staff here. So friendly. The service and hospitality is great. The food is delicious. The floor manager Riddhesh Tamhane is really polite and quick in his services. He understands the needs of the guests and cater to it in a great way.  Will definitely come again.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: nessie p
Detailed Review: I am very delighted to share my feedback on the overall experience I had while i was here for the 2 day bootcamp that we had organised for our Managers at Mariott. Right from the staff - Pradeep , Aaksh, Ashwini, Darius , Smith Falco and the Manager Jagdish all were very supportive and well groomed .  Thankyou for makingg our event a smooth flow. The food not to forget was authentic and justified our taste buds.  Last but not the least Best Wishes to The entire Team of Mariott and looking forward to see you soon.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Jewel
Review: Housekeeping very honest especially Mr. Samadhan and Ridhesh.
Detailed Review: I had behind some photographs after check out, this was promtly preserved and returned to me after 4 days by Mr. Samadhan and Ridhesh.  Good friendly staff and good food. Rooms are spacious and very good.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rohan S
Detailed Review: This property has been the favourite for every Mumbai visit, spacious rooms with great breakfast.  Well maintained Pool and state of the art fitness Center also doing justice for the property catering to your needs.   Staff has been very friendly, polite and always happy to help. Special mention to Asif for being a very pleasant gentleman helping you feel comfortable.  No doubts they are a great property with staff making sure you have a pleasant stay.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sally B
Detailed Review: Ribhikesh constantly provided excellent service each time we visit the restaurant. He incorporated personal touches and treated us as family. He has given us an amazing experience, hence we will come back soon.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Robin Almeida
Detailed Review: My first stay at the Courtyard Marriot and the staff here has created a marvellous warm atmosphere here. Devraj’s service is absolutely commendable. The way he treats his guest is next level. Thanks a lot

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: shaleela2017
Detailed Review: Stayed in Courtyard by Marriot International Airport Mumbai. Really enjoyed staying there. Breakfast buffet spread was really good. Their hospitality was excellent. Duty Manager Amreen was really nice, very polite and helpful. I will visit again and recommend to friends and family.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Shubert Dsouza
Review: Nice stay, Excellent and friendly staff!!Best dosas for breakfast there
Detailed Review: Pretty much the most wonderful breakfast meal we had.the service is perfect,friendly,relaxed, informative,fun.The food is phenomenal,lots of little extras.superb staff, professional service and well treated, special thanks to Mr.Mayur chef.Akshay and Ms. Ashwini who always kept eye on our table and checked every once in a while if we are happy -and it was pleasure chatting with them. Our experience was was just perfect and most definitely we are looking forward to return soon in this fabulous hotel.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Travel618852
Detailed Review: I stayed in this property for about 20 days. My stay was very comfortable. The staff was courteous, prompt . They accommodated additional requests, provided me with complimentary lounge access. The floor manager, Mr. Ridhesh Tamhane checked on me very regularly, the room service by Mr. Nilesh was also very good. Ill come back to this hotel for the staff and very good service.  I had a beautiful  pool view room, so that was also easy on the eyes :)

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rangcharri V
Detailed Review: I had a very beautiful stay with you all very happy overall special thanks you ms mamta for the executive lounge happy hours she manage all thinks so beautiful and nice thank you so much and I'll also like to mention Mr tejas who is very fast in his services make me special thank you tejas thakur really. Thankyou everyone for the wonderful stay. See you again soon

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Santiago0307
Detailed Review: I am pleased to say that my stay at Courtyard Marriott Mumbai has been excellent and has surpassed all the expectations. The staffs were wonderfull and catered all my need.  A very special mention to the manager, Moin at the front desk and Santosh & Devraj at the concierge. You 4 are fab and beyond.  Thank you for your excellent hospitality and hope to stay at your hotel soon.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sam2803014
Detailed Review: This is our first visit to courtyard the atmosphere of the hotel and ambience was too good and especially  our guide Mr.Devaraj shetty gave us the good comfort and guide  and also helped us exploring the hotel.Thank u sir for your guidelines.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: U J
Detailed Review: I stay at courtyard regularly and the service is always great. Some glitches in the stay this time round but Saurabh in charge of housekeeping ensured the issues were fixed and addressed It's the personal touches like these that make courtyard a great place to stay

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Yo S
Detailed Review: Staying here and returning back here to the pleasant welcoming front desk staff, the attentive and kind dining room staff and the great room service and cleaning staff. The staff in general are very hospitable and do their utmost to make one feel comfortable. Special thanks to Mr Umesh  Chanigala who was kind enough to sort out a small issue that I had.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Neer luthra
Detailed Review: I had an amazing stay! The employees were super friendly and nice and if you need a place to visit, I highly recommend this place.5 stars for sure. Asif,Akshay,and other managers including Mayur  and Vishal

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: shahab j
Review: The excellent service provided by asif
Detailed Review: Would like to mention one of your staff works for concierge desk he is been very helpful and one of the gems of your hotel every time when we stay he recognize us very quickly excellent service given by him great local area knowledge

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Alokananda Dasgupta
Review: Had a very good experience at the courtyard by mariott airport Mumbai
Detailed Review: The staff was great. Mr. Devraj was remarkably helpful. Also Mr. Aniket and the Chef who gave us a complimentary farewell cake. Over all because of these people our stay was very very good. Thank you Mr Devraj, Aniket , the chef and the rest.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Vedant Asawa
Detailed Review: The staff was really helpful especially Mr Asif who was always prompt in helping me out with my stuff. Awesome breakfast too ! Housekeeping was also always on time. Spacious rooms. Excellent pool and gym facility.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ravindranaath
Detailed Review: Devaraj from Courtyard conceirge has provided excellent services from the time I know him. He is anytime and everytime reliable and prompt. Continue good service and wishing him best of luck. Thank you

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Pooja S
Detailed Review: Lovely stay…… wonderful service…….would definitely recommend this property to all………the concierge service is excellent!!!!!! Special mention Mr Devraj!!!!!!! Wonderful cooperation!!! The breakfast was grand and would satisfy all taste buds!!!!!!! Overalll the complete experience was great!!!!! Good ambiance and cooperative staff makes it a 100% recommendable property!!!👍👍👍👍

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rahul
Review: 3day stay made extremely comfortable and memorable
Detailed Review: This was an excellent stay at Courtyard Marriot.  Special thanks to Moin Shaikh for taking care of all the requirements and making my experience amazing. Right from airport pick up to room allotment through to checkout, he made sure that everything was seamless.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: RoopamBohra
Detailed Review: I stayed in Marriott for 3 days in June and was impressed by their customer service. Whether it was the smooth check in or the airport shuttle or the overall comfort of staying. The food particularly stood out and interacting with chef Akshay was an absolute delight - the food, the service and him walking to every table to check in with the customer spoke volumes of his dedication.  Looking forward to my next visit!

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: RINKU RITU DUDANI
Detailed Review: We had an amazing event at courtyard by Marriott Would personally like to recommend - Jason, sheban & Vinit patil their team-  they are always at your service- made sure each of the crew and staff was at their best comfort   Thanks Rinku Ritu D

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sunny
Detailed Review: In general all staff were polite but one of the front office executive named Ashank Patil was very unprofessional with our team and came across as very stubborn and unpleasant.  Courtyard Marriot should do a deep dive in their recruitment process and be very specific whom they are recruiting for customer facing roles. Staff like Ashank Patil should be trained properly and a detailed evaluation from management should be done.  I have already submitted my feedback to the Duty Manager but in my case I will never prefer Courtyard Marriott for my stay in Mumbai ever.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: v8estate
Detailed Review: As Holiday inn's go, this is a good one. It's a very well specd hotel, but most impressive are the staff. Firstly there seems to be hundreds of them, so you are always being well attended. Secondly I have never seen so many happy and helpful people, it really was quite remarkable.  The location is very handy to the airport, although in typical Indian fashion, it's a bit chaotic on the street, however the hotel is very chilled and I have very much enjoyed my few days here.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rishineel
Detailed Review: Exquisite staying at Holiday Inn for a long week. Neat and clean rooms. Awesome services. Saptami, the restaurant is fabulous. Anyone visiting mumbai or wishing to stay near by airport is recommended to stay here, trust me it's worth it.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rishav Panja
Detailed Review: I really liked the ambience here. Great care provided and so cleannn!!!!! Starting from morning buffet to having soft drinks in the minbar at night. It was a great time here and check out the infinity pool at the terrace!!! Mind blown!

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Thefoodie
Detailed Review: I visited holiday inn recently, The hotel gave me a wonderful positive vibe. Also had attended the seminar at ballroom and I must say got wonderful hospitality service from Mr.Hitesh & Mr.Sahil. It’s definitely a highly recommended place to visit if your looking for a budget friendly hotel with great service

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Prashant N
Review: Fantastic hospitality and very polite staff
Detailed Review: I had recently gone to Mumbai for a business trip and got a chance to stay at Holiday Inn, International airport. I must say the hotel is very good. One of the classical challenges of having a very soft bed which gives backache in most hotels, this was not a concern here at all. A firm bed with 2 types of pillows. That was fantastic. The staff also i must say are very polite and helpful at any odd hours. Dinner buffet and morning breakfast were fantastic with a big spread to indulge in as well as loads of healthy options to keep a tab on your health.  All in all a truly recommend hotel to stay if you want to be close to the airport and have access across the city as well.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Jay mishra
Detailed Review: Overwhelmed with the support and gesture from the entire staff especially Nilesh Mishra , Kiran . Start from the help desk to banquets they have been very cooperative in terms of service as well as help.  Looking forward to continue the stay in holiday inn while I plan my vacation trip.  Regards, Jayprakash Mishra.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Pramod shukla
Detailed Review: Food was excellent .Staff are very polite and very helpful.management is superb. I will recommend to all my friend and relative...Must visit for food...Thank you holiday hotel staff and management... wonderfull experience

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Dr Christiana Ubaka
Detailed Review: Lovely, hospitable, very polite and generous with their time. The food is something else, delicious.  I enjoyed very bit of time I stayed. I will come again. Concierge team is perfect and house keeper very neat

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: SES
Detailed Review: Everything was perfect, the room very clean and the waitress from Saptami restaurant are very friendly. The girl from reception, Kiran, is very kind and she solves any issues you have very quickly. I really recommend this hotel in Mumbai.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: krish
Detailed Review: Excellent service by staff and a pleasant stay. Food was awesome and the room was clean and upto perfection Friendly and helpful staff and the restuarent is amazing Highly recommended place for a pleasant stay

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Maithili
Detailed Review: Lovely services and yummy breakfast varieties all South Indian delicacies served with love... Enjoyed a lot and loved the dishes and variety! Will recommend this breakfast to all staying at Orchid! Thank you

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ronak
Review: Stay is so wonderfull with The orchild staff
Detailed Review: This stay was so good with supported orchild staff .house keeping service is so good  Wonderful breakfast and server are so supported when you taking  breakfast . Specially thank you Sachin Bhai and admin staff. I would like to stay again  in THE ORCHILD HOTEL. THANK YOU EVERYBODY FOR SUPPORTED US

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Kenny T
Detailed Review: I just visiting ecotel hotel  property in vile parle .in this chef Mahesh was excellent because the food really good and the taste was awesome the banquet team really a fantastic work really appreciate it MrRoshan,Romeo,Rahul,sushant,saharsh.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ekta K
Detailed Review: The hotel staff is so warm and friendly. They are always on the tips of their toe to make the experience for the guests good. Snehal and Rasika were very helpful. The food was also really good in the buffet.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Yatin
Review: Comfortable stay at orchid with family
Detailed Review: The stay was so good like to go again and services are good too the staff was so friendly chef manasi and the server snehal and salman helped us thank you for the beautiful stay😀❤️and glad to see the interior of hotel

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Keren G
Detailed Review: Excellent service and very excellent food I loved the Dosa track!  We will be given the service of a lovely woman named Pranjal We were served a fresh and refreshing fruit drink And excellent desserts!

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Pratima
Detailed Review: Good hotel , overview of  the runway is an added perk. Buffet is amazing, Jitendra from in-room is nice. Although the pool and gym is not so good , however the proximity to the airport is what makes this hotel a great choice.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Chirag patel
Detailed Review: Sun Pharma laboratories QTR MEET AZURA DIVISION GOOD service and good food thanks to service and they are excellent with customer satisfaction and provide on time service never ever get this type of services Mr Abhishek ,Sachin,ROMIo and Srinivas sir

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: anita n
Detailed Review: Excellent food! Thoroughly enjoyed, especially thali was v good!! Rasam, appam, and veg stew were delicious. As was the payasam and the date halwa. Very efficient friendly and attentive staff. Ambience was quiet and peaceful.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Dipti C
Detailed Review: It was my first time here in vindhya and they serve amazing south indian food. Great hospitality by sneha. She was very polite and cheerful.They have a variety of options, more than one can imagine and with a great taste.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ankita
Detailed Review: I had a great experience at the restaurant. The staff was so good, humble and , courteous. And I would like to specifically appreciate the efforts of sneha, pranali, haresh, vinayak. They were superb. I wolf love to come again here. ❤️

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rajnish R
Review: The Orchid, Mumbai is the Most Downgrade and Horrible Hotel.
Detailed Review: (1) I am Platinum Member (12002836) of  "The Orchid Gold" for many many years, now. During the COVID - 19 and thereafter, the hotel has become the 3rd Class OR I would prefer to call it 4th Class hotel in Mumbai. (2) I had made a booking for my guest: Check-in Date: Saturday, June 18, 2022 and Check-out: Monday, 2022 on Double Occupancy. This was clearly stated to front-desk representative - Mr. Roshan on Saturday, June 18, 2022, when I. visited in the evening at around 1830 hrs. (3) However, this Joker recorded it as additional guest, which entails Additional Guest Charges of INR 1,500/- plus taxes, as per policy. (4) Thereafter, the resident guest (2 nos.) moved out of the Orchid Hotel on Sunday, June 19, 2022. During the day, I received over four (4) calls asking me to pay…

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Govind Ram Singh
Detailed Review: Visited this gem hotel recently to attend a dinner party at the South Indian restaurant. Its a beautiful place with live classical music, we watch sitar player performance. I had south indian veg thali which was delicious and quantity was more than enough for 1 person. service very good and staff was super nice. we all had great time and amazing meals. You could also ordere your drinks here and enjoy it with classical music played live. must try highly recommended.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sucheta ( Yummyalldays)
Review: Best airport view rooftop bar and restaurant
Detailed Review: Visited this beautiful Place, Mostly Grills in Vile Parle Near Domestic Airport.  The rooftop ambience had a Mexican style decorated theme.  It was just breath taking . What a view from the top.   The staff was amazing and the service was good. They suggested good dishes for us.   We tried  Apple cucumber Cooler- Apple , cucumber & Ginger This was refreshing as well.   Cinderella- Freshly squeezed orange juice, pineapple juice, grenadine dash of angostura bitters, top with ginger ale.. ‌ Murg Tangri Kebab - Char grilled ..The pieces were fresh & juicy. Had a lovely charcoal flavour,Loved combination and taste.  ‌ Bhatti Da Murg- Tandoori half chicken this was amazing in taste. Must try starter I can suggest to you all.  ‌ Murgh Methi - Murg methi is my all time favourite, it was…

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Chahat gulati
Detailed Review: Amazing foooddd  amazing stafff specialy  By rahul n snehal n rashika attended us in the loveable manner  Lovavle desserts by sir paramjeet …thanx orchid for the best services you provided to us  Kindly maintain the decor-am throughout the life thankx

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Dr Parikh
Detailed Review: I visited boulevard for buffet lunch on Sunday afternoon with my family . Simply loved the experience . The food was delicious, staff was courteous , service was immediate and area was very clean and organised . Special mention of Mr Amit and chef Mahesh who made sure our exper ice was memorable . Highly recommended

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Artem_kor_86
Detailed Review: Not bad, but nothing special.  The location is really good next to the airport and several other good hotels.  Room was ok, breakfast was ok, staff was ok. Overall hotel is old and more expensive than it deserves.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Oindrila P
Detailed Review: Love the ambience and the authenticity of the cuisine, was quite impressed with the presentation and theme work that the orchid is running their restaurant on and also the staff are quite warm, prompt and welcoming and last but not the least, the food is the best in terms of flavours and authenticity

Detailed Review: Fantastic food, service and ambience. The live music was wonderful. It is a very authentic experience of food from south India combined with the hospitality that India was always known for. I would recommend this for families and friends out to have a good time

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv

Detailed Review: After lockdown we had a first conference of iod in churchill -3 ,everything was excellent like before,thanks to the team ,special.care was taken of us ,the hall.was also setup good,thanks to Roshan Lobo,Huzefa,sachin,keep up the good work team

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv

Detailed Review: I Would love to appreciate Dakshata, Amit and Snehal for her service she was Very Quick and Lovely..She carried a smile on her Face and attended us Whenever we needed her . She was very active and Polite.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Nithya
Detailed Review: From service department Ms.Dakshata  And chef Ms poonam . I would like to appreciate there efforts and amazing hospitality.   All the staff's are really approachable. Well garnished buffet.   Overall great experience

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rudrarishi
Detailed Review: Today i had my breakfast with South of vindhyas amazing food prepared by chef boss and manoj awsome service by kranti haresh and madhu........ That assorted platter was soo good...... Thank u so much for the breakfast

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: alFresco
Detailed Review: Enjoyed Gin Special Cocktails by Rahul At rooftop !!! Wonderful Runway & city View With DJ  food was amazing ... Try restaurant Specialty Catch of the day fish which recommended by Chef Shyam , Excellent food and  Service

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sanket S
Detailed Review: Excellent place to relax in mumbai. Lovely place to dine with different restaurant & lounge bar n buffet.  Room service is pretty good. Loved the rooftop pool. Excellent variety of cuisine to try for. Overall, it's a great place to enjoy stay in mumbai n nearby airport

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Saniya More
Detailed Review: This is really best restaurant...me and my friends visited it for the very first time and our experience was fascinating and exciting!! Food was delicious and we loved the ambience...The view of domestic airport from the restaurant was lovely...And we enjoyed the view the most..they even had pool side table and a live dj which we will surely cherish... The facities and staffs here were too good..Our time was well spend...We will surely visit soon and we hope you keep up your good work .. Thank you so much for having us!!

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Mosle
Detailed Review: Very good/nice service from Rasika.snehal the service of the reastrunt is very good.the buffet spread is huge and good.the staff is very coprative and helpful.the overall experience is very nice.we enjoyed a lot thank u for the service.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv

Detailed Review: The place  is amazing and has a good staff! The roof top restaurant is just amazing. The hotel is located near by the airport that's very convenient for any traveler to visit and stay there! Must visit.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv

Detailed Review: Rasika and Rahul gave us an excellent service today ,they are really hardworking and very quick at their work .Would love to come here again.Keep up the good work.They both show us service from the heart.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv

Detailed Review: Very nice food at the restaurant and wounderful staff. The service from Kranti was amazing. We definitely recommend passing by during your stay at Orchid hotel mumbai. It was in June 2022, for 2 nights.

Detailed Review: The spread of breakfast is very amazing. Food is testy and good. Like to thnks the service and chefs team for good food and helpful service by chef pranjal  chef poonam and snehl knchan from service thank you.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv

Detailed Review: The service of the restaurant is very nice. Ambiance is also very nice. The buffet spread is good. There are many more live counter in buffet. I like the overall experience. Thanks to Snehal, Rushabh. And chef pranjal. Thank u.....

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Dr Bhakti, Ranjit & Avanish
Detailed Review: Superb Experience it was with a touch of South! Simply Delicious!  21 South Indian dishes to taste and to relish the delicacy of food! Long back I had read a book Idli, Orchid and me by Vittal Kamat and today enjoy the bliss of south at TheSouth of Vindhyas in the Orchid Hotel, Mumbai.  Real feel of ecotel…from south to mouth…! Thank you 🙏

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Pankaj
Detailed Review: Food is very nice fresh preparations immediate service on table selective and exclusive items customized kitchen cleanliness is upto the mark kranti , madhu and harish all are well coordinating on foot

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Narendra
Detailed Review: The service of the restaurant is very good. Ambience is also very nice.the breakfast buffet spread is very nice. There are many more varieties in live counter.i like the overall experience. And special thanks to ms snehal and kanchan.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Hrishi M
Detailed Review: Service : Positive attitude, Excellent service.  Good nature(Dakshata mam and Salman sir)   Food: Best quality food. Very tasty and enticing. Food variety can be improved, Currently less choice but excellent taste.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Priya
Detailed Review: I visited this restraunt 2 days ago pleasent atmosphere great ambience and decor was there in the hotel the staff was friendly, generous and helpful great managing and great food and room services had a great time here

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Andy
Review: Great place for authentic South Indian cuisine
Detailed Review: We ordered the non-veg thali. We were surprised at the spread. There was fish, chicken and mutton, all excellent. Highly recommend the mutton stew. A unique palette cleanser was the chicken rasam. The staff was courteous and responsive. We loved the live music, ambience and decor. Given the entire experience, it was an absolute value for money. Cheers!

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Pratham
Detailed Review: The hotel staff was really generous and were really helpful the food was great and the services were on point the Ambience was pretty and beautiful and  the management was good and we had a really good time here

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Voracious Blogger
Detailed Review: Located on the top floor of the orchid hotel, this place is an open rooftop outlet with a beautiful view of the airport on one side and a pool on the other side. The quality of the food here is high quality and the pricing is high as well. This rooftop place has a different section for each group/table so giving personal space to everyone was a plus point there.  Every evening, candlelight dinners with a wonderful view of the airport, as well as some light rains, make it a perfect place to take your date!  We tried: Murgh Tangdi Kebab: Tender chicken legs marinated in the chef's unique spices and cooked to perfection. The fluids from the chicken remained intact and were wonderfully soft.  Soft boneless chicken chunks were marinated in cheese, yogurt, and spices for the Murgh…

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Jack123
Detailed Review: Mostly grilled Orchid is a lovely addition to fine dinning list of the restaurants in Mumbai. It is located at the top floor of orchid hotel with a astonishing view of Mumbai airport. The rooftop bar is so well we tried various drinks over there too. 1.pineapple elderflower fizz  2.orange mint and coconut water  All the drinks were as good as we expected and refreshing too The food i ordered was so tasty and yummy and also loved the staffs corporation with their customers We ordered 1. Murgh Malai kebab 2. Murgh Tangdi kebab  All the food was so good.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Pici
Detailed Review: The bulevard resturent is very nice place the food was very good and the service was excellent by miss .dakshata and shubham and the chaat was very nice by miss poonam and the dessart is yummy  thanks for the foom and nice place

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Pema L
Detailed Review: Mr Subham was really nice with his work and the way he interact with us was really professional  .. and I can see how much he was roaming  here and there just to make the guest satisfied with there service..  dakshata Thankyou for lovely pani puri 😊  And last lovely food and mutton was really nice …

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Kajal
Detailed Review: Food was really very nice. Specially chaat was very tasty. Thanks to poonam. Must try👍 Even the staff was very courteous. Overall had nice experience in the hotel Special thanks to dakshata and shubham

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Vinita
Detailed Review: Mr Shubham and Ms Dakshata were amazing and treated me and my colleagues with great care. Thanks for an excellent customer service. The Chaat was amazing. We had it twice and thankyou for treating us so good. I wish to see you both again.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv

Detailed Review: Yummy fish and would love to come again and again , thanks for the best hospitality @Rahul,Amith and Shubham . Param Jeet the great chef . Thank you for making my stay amazing all days around here . Cya all soon .

Detailed Review: Amazing food and hospitality bh the staff of the orchid especially SHUBHAM he’s the manager for the same he is been serving us so well we enjoyed and really loved it! Would suggest you’ll to have a breakfast at the boulevard!

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Shruzaa
Detailed Review: Visited orchid a couple of days back for their rooftop restaurant. The entire place has an amazing vibe with its fountain and glass lift as main attraction.  It also has other amazing options for everyone like south india food and a cute cafe.  Further, we loved that all the protocols were followed when we entered the hotel along with a warm welcome indian style (namaste)  Loved how they have maintained the property and trained their staff well.  Next time we are definitely opting to stay here

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Shwetank D
Detailed Review: Visited this beautiful restaurant the orchid in Vile Parle! The place was really nice and well maintained. I had some amazing time here for dinner! I would definitely recommend you trying the amazing Indian cuisine they have!. It's really good.  Definitely go out for the non veg dishes as well! Like butter chicken and roti, chicken biryani apart from the food they also have the great ambience which attracts a lot of people.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Mumbaifoodblog
Review: Best Rooftop Restaurant in mumbai with stay
Detailed Review: The place is super and  we had dinner on the rooftop restaurant mostly Grills. Had paneer tikka grill and dal makhni with rice. The restaurant has a pool view with the airport view which looks fab.. highly recommend. Def coming back again

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Lavisha
Detailed Review: Excellent service by south of vindhyas. I had a very nice breakfast there, the food was delicious. staff was very good. SOUTH INDIAN platter they served was so tasty . Ms. Kranti was so sweet with me. Very good experience.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Munawar Karbelkar
Review: Highly recommended place to enjoy with friends and friends.
Detailed Review: Mostly Grills -The Orchid is a lovely addition to the fine dining list of the restaurants of Mumbai. It is located on the top floor of The Orchid Hotel- Mumbai near the airport.It has an over view of the Mumbai airport. It has a beautiful open ambience with Maxican village theme. It has got comfortable seating arrangements ensuring privacy also. On one side it has a swimming pool, a well stocked bar, open kitchen and the airport view. You can enjoy the landing of the aircrafts along with Mumbai rains and scrumptious food.✈️  We tried: ♦️Pineapple Elderflower Fizz & Orange Mint & Coconut water: Both the drinks were unique and highly refreshing.  ♦️Murgh Tangdi Kebab: Fresh tender chicken legs were marinated in chefs special spices and grilled to perfection.The chicken juices were…

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv

Detailed Review: Service at boulevard is very good and helpful like to thanks Amit from service and Rasika for ther services food is also very tesy and good allover everything is alright we enjoyed are lunch Love the atmosphere of restaurants

Detailed Review: Excellent setup. Feel like a typical Kerala dinning. Authentic dishes. Especially Rawa Dosa. Very good staff and quick service. Very clean. Typical south indian music background. Filter coffee is just toooo good..........

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv

Detailed Review: It was a very pleasant stay here in this hotel, service was so nice the staff was so helpful and courteous and specially the food it was more than satisfactory. Special thanks to chef paramjeet, chef mihir and chef lard for being so helpful and interactive.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sarswati
Detailed Review: Omg the food was so nice and well kept ..the staff are very friendly. the Ambience is top notch! Should visit on Sunday especially to get the best food menu💯💯 the chef's namely paramjeet , lad, mihir did a great job. Thank you 😊

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv

Detailed Review: The place great and the food and service is too good 👍 Shubham,Kanchan And Snehal Thanks To Them.Bufet Was The Best. The Best 5-Star Hotel I've ever been to.The Iterior is soo good . Amazing Teamwork

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: footprintsonthemoon
Detailed Review: This was my fourth visit to this beautiful restaurant. I always love the food, ambiance and the very friendly and courteous staff. Fabulous food, live music and decor! I’ve never tried their a la carte because their thali is an experience in itself - thali always! Look forward to my next visit.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: HARESH V
Detailed Review: We never imagined that our family lunch could have been a trip to south of India sotting here in Mumbai, South of Vindhya at Orchid brought an unbelievably  awesome experience not only for the taste but all five sneses. A MOST RECOMMENDED PLACE IN MUMBAI. The staff is extremely humble and helpful, Live music was sone pe Suhaga and made our lunch meet memorable.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv

Detailed Review: Dakshata was extremely friendly and served us well. It was an incredible breakfast experience and we felt very welcomed and at home. Experiences like these make you want to come back and visit Orchid hotel Mumbai again.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv

Detailed Review: The boulevard  restaurant was very nice place and the food was very good the live counter fresh le made the eggs and Dosa and the service was excellent by miss.Dakshata .Shubham and manger Ashish and Amit was very good person and thay Are very friendly  for guest  Thank you 😊

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv

Detailed Review: It was an amazing experience here at boule varde restaurant in orchid mumbai ..the food quality was absolutely great and the hospitality of the staf was definitely cherry on the cake. Chef mihir, chef sureshlal and manager  sumit made sure that their guests are being provided with the best service .. strongly recommend 😀
