Detailed Review: The morning breakfast was very good and the food was very good and the khaman and samosa was very testy and fresh ley Puri bhaji was very good and the staff was very nicely serving the food and miss dakshata was very nice and very friendly for me shi was very good in her work  And maneger Ashish  was very nice person  Thank you 😍

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sunera
Detailed Review: Food was amazing , ambiance is good, staff was very friendly .  Had a great time here with the family as the food made the mood even better . Nice amount of varieties and variations in food . And the were good service by miss Dakshata and Amit thay both a very excellent service for everyone and the very friendly  for me and my family  Thank you 😇

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Harsha Sharma
Detailed Review: The food is extremely delicious and well presented buffet laid by CHEF MIHIR and CHEF SURESH LAL , Specific highlights of buffet #StirFryChicken and #MethiChicken , so anyone looking very sumptuous breakfast lunch and dinner , this is place for to go for 🤩🤩🤩🤩

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Gargi
Detailed Review: Yesterday I visited MostyGrills which is located in The Orchid, Vile Parle. The view of the Airport is breathtaking and mesmerising. While you eat some lip-smacking grilled food on the rooftop, you'll see aeroplanes on the runway. They also have a live DJ which makes this place quite lively.  Talking about the food they serve cuisines like American, continental, north Indian.  We tried:- 1. Orange Basil Martini  2. Mumbai Cooler  3. Murgh Malai Kebab 4. Bhatti Da Murg 5. Murgh Biryani  6. Gur ki Rasmalai  Overall the food and vibe of this place were top notch. If you're in Mumbai and haven't visited it yet, you're missing out on something truly incredible.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: anjali k
Detailed Review: Super food....super service as usual at the orchid... Abhijeet and sneha were fantastic.  Sneha took amazing care of each choice of food and beverage...attention to detail and a personal touch us her Forte...thank you.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: G. Balaji Venkitesh
Detailed Review: Today (07th June 2022) I experienced the unparalleled honesty of the employees of The Orchid Hotel.    I had inadvertently lost my wedding ring in the dining area of the hotel. Apparently I had wiped it down while trying to clean my hands after lunch.   I didn't knew it until I was half way into the journey back to Kochi.  As soon as I landed I called up my friends in Mumbai who in turn got in touch with the Hotel.  The employees searched the area thoroughly and retrieved my wedding ring.    There has been negative experiences in hotels of lesser stature.  But this was a very positive experience which will give a comfort to those travelers who may be in a hurry.  REST ASSURED...YOU ALL ARE SAFE AT THE ORCHID HOTEL..  G. Balaji Venkitesh

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Foodii
Detailed Review: Very pleased with the service and hospitality . Harshada Kanchan and snehal have given us such an amazing service  very polite and proactive .love the food here and specially the desserts. And room service staff Mr Joel thanks to him as well

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Hatneichong Kuki
Detailed Review: A big thank you to Poonam, Harshada, Kanchan and Shehal from  F&B team for the excellent hospitality. Very polit and proactive .love the ambiance and hotel hospitality .would recommend friends and family to visit orchid hotel

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: ebrahim j
Review: They claimed it is five star hotel but...
Detailed Review: The room was clean, staff were polite but despite  of booking.com reservation they required my credit card,  but for safety issues I remain it at home! I was ok to pay the cash but they only accept rupees, not dollars! There was not exchange office available any may exchanging shops are not reliable. I must change the dollars as a lower rate  and pay deposit much more than amount of necessary.  Although they refund the excess amount of money at the checkout time.  There was not an international breakfast.  Cheese was not on the table and nuts, bread and some other things were not on the table.  Coffee and tea machines were not available.  It was on order  It look like 3 stars or less

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Pooja kharat
Detailed Review: Hotel is too good. And food is too delicious. Mainly the staff people is more attentive and very co- operative. Servicing of people snehal, vrushab is also polite and co operative. Chat is also nice. Appreciated. Well done

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rahul Shinde
Detailed Review: Food and service was excellent. Whole hotel staff are coporative and polliate.  Snehal, Rahul, rushabh, dakshta and captain. Location is also good.  We will recomment  this place to other friends. Thanks

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Foodie Columbus
Review: Amazing stay with amazing food experience
Detailed Review: Amazing experience, and great hospitality, one can easily prefer this hotel for a stay without worrying about visiting some restaurants to have good food, the food is really nice, and they have Mumbai's own most famous restaurant overlooking the Mumbai runway, the restaurant's names are mostly grills.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Dhruvin shah
Detailed Review: One of the best place to visit in with family we took a stay in orchid mumbai staff was amazing and helpful amazing food was made available  Orchid mumbai is situated near vile Parle near domestic airport mostly grill restaurant in orchid hotel is the best restaurant i have visited

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Kashif Khan
Review: The staff is exceptionally sweet and friendly
Detailed Review: The staff is exceptionally sweet and friendly. The rooms are spacious. Mr Rohit at the reception was very kind and generous enough to give me an upgrade. The food was good and services were fast. A must visit!

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sarabjeet
Detailed Review: The stay, the food, the hospitality and the experience was so good.  Chef Mihir and Manager Sumit were so professional and with a warmth personality. Dates Halwas was so tasty and the buffet was so pleasent

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Aishu
Detailed Review: It’s always fun to stay at orchid hotel , the ambience, the service is awesome . Service provided by chef mihir and manager sumit is excellent and outstanding. They are always available with good hospitality. They’ve given extra service to me and my colleagues. Thankyou for the service 🙌🙌

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Thecamouflagedfoodie
Detailed Review: The orchid is right off the western express highway near the airport.   The entrance and the ambience of this place is done very elegantly, feels lavish.   The got amazing restaurants like boulevard and mostly grills.   If you're looking for an open air resturant with the view of the airport, y'll can try mostly grills.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Vishal Shirke
Review: Best place in The Orchid mumbai mostly Grills do visit here 😋😋😍😍
Detailed Review: One of the best rooftop place in vileparle mostly Grills.. Rooftop with runway view near airport.. The ambience is amazing with tropical vibe .. Food was so delicious  The mocktails were so refreshing and presentation was on point.. Service is super super quick here .. The staff is so nice polite and helpful.. I have ordered  Bhatti ka murg Murgh malai kebab  Methi murgh  In dessert  Warm melting chocolate cake on flames..  Overall place worth a visit with family friends for an amazing party we enjoyed alot here visiting soon   FOOD 5/5 SERVICE 5/5 AMBIENCE 5/5

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: nhyj
Detailed Review: I m staying in this hotel reqularly. The hotel food, ambeince,staff and service is very good. Especially Salmaan and Rahul at bolevard and Karan at the reception takes care of the customer very well.keep it up orchid.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Spoon.of.taste
Detailed Review: Mostly grill restaurant located in andheri near domestic airport. The roof top restaurant has nice airport view with couple friendly environment. The restaurant has pool also with live counter bar. It's a beautiful place with spacious place. For starter we had roast chicken and spicy chicken with trio paper. The starter was very yummy and mouthwatering in taste. The chicken roast was madhe very amazing. Highly recommended the roast chicken. In mains we order butter chicken with garlic Nan. The food was delicious. The staff was very supportive and approachable. In mocktail they serve blue lagoon and virgin mojito. We tried rasmalai I'm desert trust me you don't wanna miss it.  Food -5/5 Taste- 5/5 Ambience - 5/5

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Navneet K
Detailed Review: Extremely tasty food  & hospitality. We tried from soups to main course & deserts superb food!! Snacks are amazing too tried dahi puri & pani poori.. it was mouth relishing. After a hectic day delicious food made our life beautiful.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Xxxxxxx
Detailed Review: Chef Mihir is an amazing chef, I had asked for the Chinese and he immediately prepared, He is master in Italian, Chinese and Continental !! A must visit to this restaurant, I really love the Hospitality !! Special Shout out to Chef Mihir !!

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Swapnil
Detailed Review: The staff here is very hardworking and polite. The staff  was very humble.they  were very quick with their services and were always smiling. Had a great time here. Nice ambience.thanks to orchid mumbi..

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Jadhav
Detailed Review: The service of the restaurant is very nice.ambiance is also very good.the buffet spread is very nice.the staff is very helpful and polite.we like the overall service and food in restaurant.and my family also enjoyed a lot thank u.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Vihan
Detailed Review: Good hotel to stay . service of the hotel is also very good and cooperative .staff is very humble and helpful. Buffet breakfast at boulevard was amazing testy food and good service thank you for good services.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Mikel Almandoz
Detailed Review: Very incredible Byriani Rice. Thanks to Kalpak incredible waiter inside incredible India. The place is unique, with a DJ that really prepare an atmosphere to feel you like on the heaven. For sure my next time in Mumbai i will visit again

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv

Detailed Review: The service of the restaurant is very excellent.we like the food and ambiance of the restaurant.the buffet spread is very nice and huge.my family also enjoyed a lot.there are many more varieties in chat counter over all experience is very nice.thank u

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: jacky
Detailed Review: The service of the restaurant is very good.ambiance is also very nice.the buffet spread is excellent.the staff is very helpful and polite.we like the overall service and food.in restaurant.and my family also enjoyed a lot thank u orchid see u soon.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Feeling_foood
Detailed Review: Visited mostlygrills which is located in The Orchid Hotel, Vile Parle. It's a beautiful place with spacious seating. For mocktails we got Orange Basic Mojito and Grapple loved both of them. For starters we tried nonveg platter and spicy chicken with trio pepper. Methi chicken with Tandoori Roti and Alfredo Pasta for maincourse. The food was deliciousss. We had Tiramisu for dessert and trust me you don't wanna miss it. The staff is very friendly and approachable. Had a great time here.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Megha M
Detailed Review: The room is dingy, with worn out and dark furniture. The bathroom is the same. The wood is cheap and the furnishings tacky. The AC barely works, and this is the first 4 star hotel room I’ve seen that encourages using a fan instead. Perhaps they were going for a homey look, and ended up looking like a cheap motel even after paying $150 a night. But the worst is the closet which seems to have black mold growing inside it!!

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Radhika R
Review: Special thanks to Neha at check in!!
Detailed Review: St Regis was a truly mind-blowing experience, I want to begin by thanking Neha for her warm welcome at check-in from where we were catapulted to one of our most memorable hotel stays. We are Ambassador Bonvoy members and were kindly given an upgrade to an One bedroom apartment overlooking the race course on the 30 th floor overlooking the race course and the sea. The room was state of the art in its luxurious decor and beautiful bath with all modern amenities. Prashant and Manisha from housekeeping checked on us if we needed anything and were very thorough with their maintenance of the rooms and surroundings. The highlight of our evening was the cocktail hour at By the Mekong. A special shout out to the entire staff especially our server Vedant.Compliments to the chef for his delicious appetizers and the bartender for his unique cocktails. The breakfast was almost like a brunch and truly a large spread. For our family, it was an overall experience par excellence, Keep it up!!…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: DRSRG
Review: Good business hotel with a mall downstairs at your disposal
Detailed Review: Stayed here for a medical conference, It's okay in terms of being a business hotel.  Issues do exist with room architecture as washroom overflows and water enters the room and soiling the carpet, it's because of their poor drainage system I suppose.  Otherwise okay and conference area was neat with decent food.  Can be your choice on a business trip

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Itishree Garg
Detailed Review: A big shout out to Mr Prathmesh, Our Buttler. He was amazing and made our day very special. He absolutely went above and beyond to make my husband's birthday special and memorable. Thank you for all the superb arrangements you made for us. Everything was perfect and amazing. The whole staff was superb. Amazing dinner and breakfast. Must visit 5 star "St. Regis, Mumbai". Thanks a ton!

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Celine N
Detailed Review: Had arranged a business dinner at The Sahib Room & Kipling Bar, and the staff had done an excellent arrangement for service to my guests. Especially the coordinator Namrata and Sahib Room manager: Anshul & executive: Anirudh who looked after meticulously the entire arrangement.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: surendra1963
Detailed Review: Great location, Great hospitality.. Smooth check in and check out..Sumptuous Breakfast spread…  It’s of options. . Well equipped Gym and Jacuzzi . Just loved the property.. The only issue is waiting time for Elevator, changing two times. Shall love to come back.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: PraveenP
Review: Nice Hotel - building and restaurants, but butler service needs improvement
Detailed Review: I have stayed at the property a couple of times. My recent stay was on the 25th of June.   The good part - Very nice hotel building in south mumbai, good views of the racecourse, arabian sea etc. Nice restaurants. Relished some good food by Raymond Wong at the Mekong....  But where this hotel needs serious improvement is on their butler service which st regis and ritz and the waldorfs.... are known for. A taj westend and an itc sonar provide far more impeccable butler service than this hotel.  I am not a very demanding person, I don't expect butlers to fold my clothes, pack my bags....that is the level of service provided by butlers in ITC sonar, Taj Westend etc. But i don't think you can expect that in the St Regis Mumbai. They just provide lip service to butler service. When a…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Vikas Sehgal
Detailed Review: Fantastic stay, Hospitality n care Lovely experience , absolute convenience for the shopaholics, Foodies, movie buffs, etc.. Great location, luxury intensified, Great Facilities, beautiful Sea facing room with all the amenities

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Swapnil P
Detailed Review: We had visited st. Regis ans it was a wonderful experience overall. Staff was very courteous. Special mention to Pratham, who went beyond a mile to make us feel special for our anniversary with champagne toast, special cake n customized photo frame for us.   Thanks Stm regis and team for such an overwhelming experience!!

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Deven Padhya
Review: A royal food with touch of Sahb service
Detailed Review: A indian royal food treat with excellent service. It can be called one  of the  best Indian restaurant in Mumbai  .The specially the Chef Taj is not only involved in kitchen but leads from front and ensure the guest minute requirement are taken care .The service Namrata and Kevin ensure that hot sizzling food and each guest requirements are meet .

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: B Sial
Detailed Review: Went with three generations and all were delighted with the comfort, friendliness and the effort put in by all to make it a truly memorable trip. Special thanks to our butler Akansha Mattoo who made certain that we lacked for nothing to experience the hotel. Even though the reservation was in my husband’s and daughter’s names, she found out it was my birthday and surprised me with balloons, Roses and a personalized cake with a note. Now that truly made my day special and the trip worth it.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Edward P
Review: Staying in Mumbai, look no further
Detailed Review: What a sanctuary. I visited a number of luxury hotels while in Mumbai and this was by far the best. The service, the space, the rooms and obviously the views. Just a truly wonderful place. Special mentions must go out to Kupoi and Namrata for looking after me impeccably.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ashish C
Detailed Review: Taken stay at @stregishotels Mumbai,worst service ever,manager Devina is not ready to listen & resolve any problem & I will not ever come back or suggest it to anyone ever.. Worst experience ever!! Pls avoid!! We had booked 2 rooms & were given only 1 room on time, the other room was given to us  1 hour late inspite of knowing that we are with kids!! Families please avoid!! We has asked for baby food & complementary refreshments were offered when we arrived, but the staff  embarrassed us by asking us to make the payment for both, also they took it back when we refused to make the payment  Heights is manager Devina asked us the name of the staff which had done this instead of investigating on her own & offered us a simple ‘Sorry’ for all this.. Everybody pls avoid if you are with…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Nibras Albalushi
Detailed Review: The hotel overall is a good experience and the staff were helpful and smiling always and the connection to the mall made it even better. The location was in the middle of Mumbai so that it was not that far from the airport

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Akidude1993
Review: The best way to bring in your birthday, at truly what is The Best Address!
Detailed Review: I was bringing in my 29th bday and thought of giving St Regis a go. Little did I know, that this one night two day stay at the regis on the 18th of June, would change the way I celebrated birthdays this one and all other birthdays in the near future.   It all started out with the lovely Aaron, regis’s most esteemed butler, and Akshay greeting me at the entrance itself and directing me right up to the room I booked. Except, this wasn’t the room I booked. St regis found out it was my birthday and arranged what can only be described as the best experience I’ve had in a luxury hotel ever! And I’ve been to some pretty good ones in my 29 year old life ;).  I was taken up to and upgraded to the famous St Regis Caroline Suite, by the good folks at regis and Aaron my butler, whose name…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Akshat Punjabi
Detailed Review: Staff was very nice. The best stay had in mumbai. I met aaron sir there his behaviour towards guest was very nicee. Food taste was also good The swimming area and jacuzzi was manitaned very nicely……..

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Drishti Chouhan
Review: Wonderful Ambience, Nice Place, Yummy cuisine
Detailed Review: I am writing this review because I like this property in this city. I had visited last week to attend the meeting, the service was excellent, food was very delicious in Seven Kitchens but little bit crowded. I had spend a lot time at lobby area because of refreshing aroma i felt there. I want to know the aroma name for my office.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv

They arranged a special pizza baking session for my 4yr old, which was a very thoughtful gesture and he thoroughly enjoyed the whole activity.  I really look forward to a good breakfast and the morning breakfast spread at St. Regis  was exceptional, which my family truely enjoyed.  The hotel itself has great variety of restaurants and bars, out of which we had amazing experiences at By the Mekong and Asilo. Highly recommend them.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv

Detailed Review: Kinoto was really great! super polite, always avaliable for any kind of task or question… highly recommand! his assistant made my stat really easy and comfortable… overall the hotel is great.. and the japanese restaurant on top is great

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv

Detailed Review: We stayed for 3 days at st Regis and it was wonderful and really amazing. Good food and very courteous staff .. especially mr Prashant at the reception. Thanks for making our stay wonderful. Looking forward to visiting again.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rose0608
Detailed Review: Thank you team Regis for the wonderful stay, exactly how I requested for to make it a memorable day for the birthday boy. Above all 5***** for PETER for making it all happen as I wanted. Thank you for beautiful surprise  Appreciate it .

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Handaki
Detailed Review: One of the best hotel I’ve been in Mumbai and in India as well and the reason behind this is the service they gave us was perfect, the staffs were kind, respectful and everything we asked for was given/served to us on time be it in the rooms or anywhere in the hotel. Hoping to visit st Regis Mumbai again soon

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Nikhil S
Review: Definitely the “best address” to stay at in Mumbai!!
Detailed Review: We stayed for 4 nights at the St. Regis, and couldn’t have asked for a better stay.   + The people are amazing, starting with Ahad, our butler par excellence, and all the way to the chefs manning the various kitchen counters at breakfast. Ahad was simply the best throughout, despite being out a couple of days. He was courteous, thoughtful, proactive, and on more than one occasion worked miracles for us - truly a level of service to be experienced. + Chefs Abid and Priya and serving staff Awez - they made breakfast much more than just a meal; totally an experience worth savoring over multiple days. + The rooms are amazing, with great views and a bathtub that puts most 5-star hotels to shame. + The on-site restaurants are incredible, particularly ‘By the Mekong’. + The fact that…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: CK Kho
Review: St Regis definitely the gem in Mumbai a stay you will never forget
Detailed Review: First time ever in India and Mumbai, we decided to stay in St Regis. Oh boy, it turned out to be a great sweet ending to our trip. We were greeted by Dhanraj, our butler, instead of waiting at the reception to start the check in process, Dhanraj was kind enough to proceed with the check in process in our room. As an Elite Ambassador member, I was recognized right away and was upgraded to a beautiful suite. He explained and jotted down all the critical amenities, restaurants and events such as Champagne Sabering and Cocktail sessions. We were able to communicate through Whatsapps, which is much better than using the Marriott Apps, which a lot of times lagged or unattended, but we know the message goes through in Whatapps and follow up in timely manner. After he put us in the…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Bhavesh Shah
Detailed Review: It was a wonderful experience at St. Regis. Right from the time you enter till the time you check out, they go out of their way to ensure you enjoy a truly luxurious stay. Their rooms were really great and special thanks to the front desk staff and butler services, specially Shawn Baswant for ensuring it was a special birthday indeed!

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Shyam
Review: Great staycation to celebrate our 10th wedding anniversary
Detailed Review: We booked a two night staycation for our 10 year anniversary at the St. Regis since it was close to a Phoenix and had access to a lot of things close by.  The GOOD: - We got upgraded to a skyline view room (one above what we booked). - We were assigned a butler Khushi Jain who went above and beyond to make our stay memorable. She arranged a small celebration in the room with cake and flowers. She escorted us to other events within the hotel and left a nice gift and photo of our stay at the end. She was courteous, kept us informed about everything at the hotel, was easily accessible via WhatsApp, and made our stay memorable. - The spa was great and the pool area is really nice. The place is clean and the dressing rooms are well made and maintained. The pool was closed on the…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ranjeet Goswami
Detailed Review: Staff behaviour is too god ...hotel is really well maintained...the guy SUMAN KUNDU is really very gentle guy his way of talking and handling of situation is too gud .... cleanliness of hotel is well maintained....

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ayesha R
Detailed Review: What an amazing stay at the hotel!! As usual I would add as this was our third stay and we have not been disappointed to date!  The service was seamless! Very good airport transfer service. Great and prompt in room check in experience - which is really what you want after a long flight!! The staff try their best to attend to your requests! Prathmesh our assigned butler was easily reachable and took such excellent care of us. St Regis Mumbai feels like home! We can’t wait to go back again!

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv

Detailed Review: Had a great experience, especially the butler service with Pratham offering a great experience and always being there when we needed. He also provided us details about things we could do during our free time !

Detailed Review: VITS is one the top hotels that one can stay at for business and travel purpose. It's very close to mumbai airport and staff is also very helpful and friendly. .........................................

Detailed Review: Vits Mumbai never fails to surprise their guest. Our recent stay was no different from our previous stay in term of being memorable and this was only possible because of the hospitality and warmth extended by each and every staff at hotel. All of them were amazing. Reception team upgraded my room to the next category without asking considering we were very regular at the hotel. They also arrange ld a surprise birthday cake for my daughter. We were also provide with complimentary fruit basket and cookies on arrival in our rooms. Aa always will definitely come back and recommend this to everyone

Detailed Review: I visited  from Ahmedabad just got room here which is near to Mumbai  Airport so easy to travel from airport, easy checkin and comfortable  stay , food is so tasty and Service is so good best part is the ambience of hotel is so beautiful and eye catching.

Name: Ravi Shende
Detailed Review: Overall stay was very satisfying.. The entire staff right from the concierge to Service team to house keeping team are very attentive towards guests comfort. The breakfast spread was delightful.   Unfortunately the location of the hotel is not conducive for tourists. The area is super crowded. Very disappointed that guests are not allowed to bring any snacks from outside or invite visitors to meet them.. Have stayed at some of the top properties across the globe, but no hotel puts this kind of dictatorship.. Not good from the service industry perspective

Detailed Review: It was a very comfortable stay at vits the staff are so friendly specially the receptions one. They even gave us a early c/in it was very kind of them they food is great and the rooms are spacious and clean

Detailed Review: Visited for short time but the wow experience we had was so amazing, mouthwatering food and Great service, Thanks Brijesh for your Service and team also very polite keep it up. Definitely will come with Family and Stay.

Detailed Review: Very courteous and helpful staff. Sameer and Harshal were especially helpful and sweet. Definitely visit again. 100% recommend. The breakfast is fresh and everyone is very attentive. A pleasure coming here and experiencing this.

Detailed Review: Hi,amazing hotel. Ambiance is very peaceful.room service was up to date. Staff was pretty helpful and always come up with pleasant smile. Food was awesome and hasty tasty. Thank you so much Eklavya Vikas for ur help.
