Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rehan
Detailed Review: Came only breakfast at VITS. The breakfast option is so many can't decide what all to eat. The taste so good and the staff are also so helpful. The poolside area is so beautiful to sit and eat. Very good hotel. Next time will come to stay

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Naresh
Detailed Review: Came with my wife for her birthday. She loved the hotel. Was so happy with the rooms and the food. The view of poolside is amazing and had a room upgrade by the reception staff that was very kind of them. Good job housekeeping team.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Inara
Detailed Review: The hotel ambience is very beautiful. As soon as you enter the hotel the lobby area is breathtaking. The reception staff are very polite and kind. The bell desk is always ready to help. The food taste is amazing. Had a very good time.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sunita
Detailed Review: Had a workshop at vits. It went amazing. The people are amazing and very helpful. The food is very tasty and the event also went all well. The banquet and the lobby area is beautiful. The rooms are neat and clean. Thank you vits

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Purva Agrawal
Detailed Review: thank to vits hotel for very good luch in poolside the food is very good and ..................and fast service thank to karan and hema for nice service and hospital and the pools is very clean and thank to all staf and vits

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Saurav
Detailed Review: Excellent food, Very co-operative staff, very good accommodation. Specially pool side dinner is amazing. ....Manager Mr. Sandip chatterjee and his team Mr Karan Pathania, Mr Manish,Gavin,  Hema, Sameer and Pranali and thank to all VITS members for take care

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Hari Gowri
Review: Good service but system needs updation
Detailed Review: Overall the stay was good. It’s a good option for 2-3 day stay. There are some inefficiencies in the system when it comes to like the locking system and lifts however they mentioned that it was being taken care off. The service is good especially the staff responds Almost immediately to the query but the hotel needs slight updation in systems.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ratnakar giri
Detailed Review: I had lunch at vits poolside restaurant and was very delicious and service provided from steward Gavin and Sameer was very quick and excellent n also I liked the atmosphere of restaurant which is very suitable for party n lunch

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Shubham
Detailed Review: Thank to all staff for take my care nice food and nice ...............  Service thank  to all the poolside food is very good and the staff is very good and smile face thank to Sakshi and karan and hema and pranali aand Sameer

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rohit
Detailed Review: We had conference lunch at vits poolside restaurant and the food was tasty and service staff was very polite too and stewards gavin n soniya was giving quick n excellent service to guest also restaurant ambience was good

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sandip
Detailed Review: The vits poolside restaurants has good ambience to enjoy the lunch and dinners also their food served is delicious and service staff is good too n especially steward Gavin and karan gave us good service

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sandeep
Detailed Review: The overall experience was very good, buffet setup was very nice and Hema, Pranali and Karan , pankaj,  manish were very helpfull while serving to us, The food was tasty and hot...........  Banquet hall is very good and clean

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Saurabh Jadhav
Detailed Review: Our conference lunch was arranged at poolside restaurant n the food was great n the quick service provide by Steward  Gavin and whole lunch was well managed my manager Manish also the restaurant ambience was good

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Kalyan Chakravarthy
Detailed Review: Good food good restaurants and nice poolside and all the room are very clean and good thank to all staff in poolside and in vits hotel thank to Karan and hema very nice smile fase thank to all the staff pranali..I would like to stay in this hotel in my next visit also.. Fantabulous experience

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Lakra
Detailed Review: Breakfast was really. I enjoyed the stay . The rooms were nice and cleaned. This hotel is very near to Airport and lots of food options are available near by. Swimming pool is also available which makes you feel when you dine near it . Sameer Karan and Manish

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Brahmannd
Detailed Review: Thank vits to make my good morning and the breakfast is very very good thank to all the staff to make my day thank to Karna and hema and all the room is good and the hotel is also good all the staff in nice and smile face thank to pranali

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Pawan
Detailed Review: Food, services & hospitality seem to be good. Rooms are also good. Location is also proximal to Terminal 2, Mumbai Airport. Karan Pathan seems to be good and served well for breakfast. Sameer also is good.,............

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Roy Z
Detailed Review: I had a good time staying In this property. Kudos to the management Mr Manish the HK supervisor for making sure our room is clean always. Kailas and Mangal everyday comes to our room to make sure it's tidy and warm experience. 5 stars ...,...,....

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Pratip singh
Detailed Review: The overall stay was very nice,. The breakfast has many items to choose from ..... It was very healthy and  the food was very good...... We all enjoy the breakfast and stay.. Pranali and Hema and Karan was very helping....

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Surinder S
Detailed Review: Excellent stay. Very hospitable staff. Vishal was Superman. He helped us lot. Room was very comfortable. Food very delicious. Looking forward to come again. Good value of money. Reception , check in and check out very polite

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Madan
Detailed Review: It was a last minute travel to Mumbai and had absolutely no time to research on the hotels. Based on the ratings opted for the Courtyard Marriott International Airport.  And it turned out to be an 'Excellent Choice!!.', Amazing Breakfast and Absolutely Great Service.   Many Many thanks to Chef Akshay, Chef Tejas, Hostess Ashwini for being so caring and offering highest level of hospitality.  If you are planning to visit Mumbai, the 'Courtyard Marriott International Airport' is probably the best choice one could find with well connected to the city and for Excellent Service and Hospitality.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Vikram Shah
Detailed Review: Over the past decade I've travelled in every continent wordwide. Cortyard by Marriott Mumbai International Airport is an excellent choice for anybody considering their travel to Mumbai. Everything exceeds ones wildest dream of a hotel.   The hotel is absolutely marvelous! We liked absolutely everything, starting from the breakfast through to the perfect room service including the cleanliness and extra services such as dry cleaning and laundry.  On top they have the most wonderful staff, extremly kind and helpful in every wish. Particularly, Yogendra Indulkar (Director of Rooms) was excellent in his role. This is indeed a place you do not want to leave, and when you do it is with one hope - to come back,

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Mansi mehta
Detailed Review: Excellent hospitality and amazing hotel. I travel a lot for business purpose  . The staff at this hotel make you feel so comfortable  . Great services. Prompt services and great hospitality  . Always a smile on your face. They give a lot of personal attention and take a lot of care to make you feel comfortable. It felt like home away from home. K would like to thank Asif  , chef Akshay, chef Tejas and the entire staff for the warmth and hospitality  extended. Food too is very good

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sandeep V
Detailed Review: The overall experience at the property was fine, as it is in all Marriot properties. What made us uncomfortable was the rude behavior of a front office Ashank Patil (Front Office Executive) - who doesn't know how to deal & talk with customers. Instead his colleagues Ankit and Sreejith understood our issues and sorted our problems out in very minimal time.  We had done our booking through Booking.com and despite being provided with a local assurer, Mr. Ashank Patil was insisting that we should pay upfront for every service being utilized during our stay. He didn't even bother to check the system to verify if there was an assurer based on which services could be utilized and the payment could be done during the checkout. We do understand the processes to be followed, but there is…

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Unmakshankar.
Detailed Review: It was very nice stay I was staying here from last 5 days. For my business meetings. Thank you Mamta for taking care of me in the lounge and Arbaaz thank you for making such an a nice cocktail drinks. Thank you Mr tejas who where there yesterday and helping everyone in the lounge I had  very beautiful stay and thank you 3 of you for taking care of me speailly Mamta.  And also front office team thanking you for my entire stay and making my check in and check out so smooth.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Krithika Dubey
Detailed Review: This is from an event that we hosted at the Ballroom of Courtyard Marriott Mumbai! Great extended support provided by Viraj Bagga & Rohit Panchal . Right from venue booking to on ground execution. The venue was made available before time and the over all service too was flawless under the supervision of Vinit & Gaurav Parab. Not forgetting Aziz from Front Desk for his cooperation during the billing. Looking forward to many more such events with this team.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Jhoe
Detailed Review: Very good stay in the hotel. I came for the business meeting.  I was there in the lounge alot of times thankyou mamta from lounge for taking care  and helping us during the meeting  Had a very good experience   See you again in my next trip.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Nandkishor
Detailed Review: It was the best decision to choose this hotel over others. Hotel staff is courteous and provide best class service. Food is delicious but bit expensive. Rooms are adequately spacious. I recommend this hotel for staying with family.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Carlos Sallaberry
Detailed Review: I cannot say enough about this hotel.   The attention to detail, the smiles, the laughs, the greetings, all the staff, the food.   It was an incredible experience.  One I hope to have again in the future.  I highly recommend this hotel!

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Andrew b
Detailed Review: Everyone is always so willing to help and so nice. Shivaji brought us drinks to our room as a service free of charge!        Courtyard Marriott has the best service and are also extremely clean with their entire facility.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Jason M.
Detailed Review: I recently stayed for a week at the Courtyard Marriott in Mumbai. The hotel staff was extremely helpful and went out of their way accommodate my wife and I. I would definitely stay here again. Special thanks to Ashok, Akshay, Venugopal, Ashwini, and Shubham for making the stay so enjoyable.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sara T
Detailed Review: Having returned nearly 10 years later this hotel is still my favourite! We had my brothers wedding there in 2012 and this is my first time back!  Having stayed there this time I felt very welcomed and remembered 3 specific names. Asif at the concierge, Ashok at breakfast and dinner & yogendra always making sure I got what I needed no matter what time it was!   This was my 3rd time at this hotel! Hopefully be back soon!

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Mohamed T
Detailed Review: The staff members at courtyard Marriott are absolutely fantastic! It is what makes this hotel! They are always going the extra mile. Specific mentions to the following: Asif in concierge - exceptionally polite, exceptionally helpful and demonstrates the epitome of service. Truly provides a royal treatment.  Ashok in dining - always around to make us feel comfortable and always going the extra mile to make sure we have everything we need.  Yogendra - extremely pleasant to speak to and always ready to sort any problem out.   With staff like the above I will definitely return.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sam L
Review: Fantastic hotel. Friendly staff. Great food
Detailed Review: Would thoroughly recommend this hotel to anyone. The food was great. Very clean rooms. Friendly staff and helpful service. Looking forward to coming back another time.  Thanks very much to all staff xxx

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Urvi
Detailed Review: Awesome food, breakfast spread is amazing. Hotel staff is courteous , everyone is helpful. Had a great experience.  Specials shout out for Ashwini and Chef Akshay , along with Hritik. You all made our stay quite memorable

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: robroyrob
Detailed Review: This has always been home away from home. the team is amazing especially Hemant, Umesh, Aniket and the wonderful staff at Momo restaurant and concierge. The team is extremely hardworking and totally focused on customer satisfaction. They always take extra step to ensure that the guests remain happy during the stay and leave with wonderful memories. It is always such a pleasure staying here and I always look forward to my next stays....

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Celestina
Detailed Review: What an amazing staff and service! I had the best time at the hotel- from my room the up keep the good the care … I mean at some point I was overwhelmed with how much attention I was getting but very pleased. The people I will recommend you asking for are- Ashwini at the guest relationship department, Chefs Akshay and Rajiv, Upendra who helped me with my bags and just so lovely, his managers were also lovely, Abi the restaurant manager, and finally Yogendra the hotel manager who took complete care when I had issues with my room. I mean the entire team just came together and you can clearly see the commitment to give you a good experience, make sure you are okay and cater to you. I will recommend this hotel 1,000%. It is safe and the hospitality is AMAZING! Definitely 5 stars all…

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Iscm
Detailed Review: We had two events here in May month, the venue 'Amber" has great ambience, and I would say the height of the venue make your function grandeur. Food was good, Support staff was good, Rohit, Nikhil, Tushar, and their team was very supportive. Rohit personally have taken care one of my client. I would say thanks to all. Regards Sanjay Gupta Institute of Supply Chain and Management Pvt ltd.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Mahendra Chowdhary
Detailed Review: This is our 7th consecutive event at Courtyard Marriott and we are really happy with the service. Good support from your team members, especially Leticia, Vinit Patil, Pratik, Smith, Kunal & Tushar Patney.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: hiya sharma
Detailed Review: 10/10 food, immaculate service!! Worth the money.!!!The servers and staff were very polite and helpful, made us feel home. Venugopal and fozail were the ones serving us- ,,10/10 service. Hats off!! Keep up the good work

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: LP
Detailed Review: This is one of my many stays in Marriott hotels in India.  However the  service from staffs  of  COURTYARDS MUMBAI International Airport is really exceptional. They are very professional and have great initiative servicing their guest.   There are many from front desk, Conceige and Cafe that I would like to mention their exceptional service and particularly Chef Akshay, Ashwin, Chef Rajiv and Abhijit.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Arti D
Detailed Review: The service here is amazing including the buffet. All the staff were extremely warm and welcoming, which adds on to this hotel’s qualities. Aneel and Venugopal (staff) were amazing and were always there to help us around the hotel. Loved our stay here! Would advice others to visit too :))

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Michelle
Review: Wonderful stay at Courtyard - highly recommend
Detailed Review: We had a wonderful stay at the Courtyard by Marriott, Mumbai International Airport. The staff at the front desk (Sreejit, Umesh & Asif) were very welcoming. They were very helpful and fulfilled all our requests.  The F&B staff (Ashok, Mayur, Shubham, Aneef, Isteyaq, Ashwini) took care of all our breakfast needs. They took care of us so well. Chef Akshay made sure we try all the new stuff on the buffet and surprised us with some special treats.  The rooms are comfortable & very clean and we had everything that we wanted.  Highly recommend this hotel. After the hustle & bustle of Mumbai, the pampering at this hotel is very welcome.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Gomes
Detailed Review: Mayur,Shantanu and the team set the gold standard for customer service at our party.  Right from ensuring prompt service and courteousness to each of our guests, they went the extra mile to help our guests with a broken shoe strap and packing takeaways   As for the hotel, the food and desserts were simply delicious and we had a great dinner   Really excellent job team, you made us feel like family... keep up the good work

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Shahbaz Inamdar
Review: Would love to visit more often!
Detailed Review: I stayed at the Courtyard Marriott International Airport in the 3rd week of May 2022.  Before COIVD I stayed there a couple times and can say they really ensure to maintain the consistency in all the aspects. Be it, service, hospitality, ambience, food, etc.  The staff is welcoming and always available should any help be needed.  Since I was on a business trip my Lunch and Dinner were outside but I had my breakfasts at the MoMo cafe. There's buffet and live counters and the taste of food is great.  The restaurant staff is very prompt with service and offer you great suggestions. Shout out to Chef Akshay and team for such hospitality.  I'd say my overall experience was really great and for such a welcoming team I'd love to visit here more often.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Andrea
Detailed Review: Pleased to have found this hotel. Good service standards, comfortable room. Among the other I would mention the Club Lounge (very important to have an unwind  place also suitable to work), great food selection and the service and quality of the breakfast/restaurant. Particular mention to the Chef Akshay for his kindness and advises in selecting the right Indian specialties. RECCOMANED!

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Emmanuel
Detailed Review: We stayed here for five days with our six month old baby.. the staff made us feel very comfortable and welcome.. they went above and beyond to make sure we and our little one were happy. The executive lounge was perfect to step away to get some work done and invite business clients and associates to meet. The breakfast, lunch and dinner buffet was fabulous and Chef Akshay was always happy to accommodate special requests.. if you’re looking for a comfortable stay in Mumbai for work or a clean pleasant stay for the family then this hotel and it’s staff will make you feel welcome. Thanks Ashwini, Ashriya and Geeta for going out if your way to take care of our needs and especially the baby. Thank you chef Akshay for making our stay special..

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ketan S
Review: Excellent hospitality and the staff makes  you feel the royalty.
Detailed Review: Great property, fantastic spread of food and above all service levels par excellence.Would like to acknowledge and praise Ankita Choudhary at reception, Aadira at Momos gave homely attention. Aneef, Abhijeet and Isteyaqu  made sure that we were  well fed. Attention to minute details cannot be missed.Rooms are spacious with great views.Has a strong character of the destination and a great place of a family weekend.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: MD
Detailed Review: Had a wonderful stay here. Special thanks to the staff, Mr.Abhijit was very friendly and walked us through a wonderful dinning experience.  Compliments to chef Tejas and ashwini for the small surprise to celebrate our wedding.  And big thanks for Mr.Ashank for providing us with best room and arranging late checkout and making our wedding celebration the best.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Savio Almeida
Detailed Review: Wonderfully arranged and well managed by the entire team, the food and ambiance are perfect for an corporate event, the staff is supportive and ready for last minute challanges as well,  kudos to the team

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Patel
Detailed Review: Very great service from the marriott i really very impressed with the hospitality. Special thanks to Ms mamta from excutive lounge she is such an amazing staff. When i came from meeting she help me with the bottle of water immediately thankyou.  Also thankyou to Mr tejas from room service very fast service thankyou guys for making my stay superb thankyou to courtyard marriott.   Room can be better but i still like service.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Anmol Arora
Detailed Review: I was staying at the place for 14 days and it was a comfortable stay. I would like to extend my thanks to Chef Tejas and Chef Akshay from the F&B team for their amazing hospitality. They ensured I had a good breakfast with something different and suiting to my taste for most of the days. I would also like to thank Hrithik from the team F&b team who ensured I had everything I needed and for his sweet good bye gesture. There were some hiccups with the front office team but Ankita helped me get through it nicely and smoothly. I would also like to thank Arif from the housekeeping team to ensure my room was well maintained and helped me with everything that was needed.  Overall it was a wonderful stay and i would love to visit the property again.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Hexie
Detailed Review: Miss Mumta from the executive lounge was very nice and was really kind to me and my family!  Mister Asif from the help desk helped me locate my lost charger from the old rooms!  Mister Hitesh cooked wonderful food for us and gave us a few requests as well!  Mister Arbaaz was was very helpful, serving and taking our requests!  Everyone was very friendly especially these people I have written about and i hope to visit again!

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Mithesh
Review: Very good food, good quality and amazing service.
Detailed Review: I have been ordering from MoMo Cafe (Food home delivery) in the last few months. The quality of the food is great. Not just that there is consistency in their quality. One that stands out is their Mini- Buffet box, which is incredible value for money. Their service has been amazing too. Be it on time delivery of food, or the service by their staff, especially Mr Vishal and Mr Vinod. Mr Vishal has been really helpful, helped us with ensuring the food is made exactly as per our requirements and timely updates with food delivery. I would definitely recommend ordering from MoMo Cafe!

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Harshad
Detailed Review: This was a very stay with this property for the first time I have stayed here for the so many times but this time my stay was very comfortable special thanks to Mamta  and Arbaaz from lounge. Tejas chef Mayur Ashok rakesh and  Abhijit thank you for making me special.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Amrin Shaikh
Detailed Review: Wonderful service. Great Staff Love the vibe. It is very peaceful and the staff is so welcoming and friendly. Beautiful ambience and great food. The staff members especially VenuGopal and Aneef were so sweet to talk to and Very helping. The experience here has always been very lovely. Must visit

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Vivek
Detailed Review: Was there for a couple of days that I needed to be out of home. Wasn't expecting much given it's been around a while, & not the most relaxing of localities. But as soon as one took the driveway, I was pleasantly surprised. The hotel was packed, but not once did I see the staff stressed or slip up. Check-in, reception rooms, lounge & staff, breakfast, gym, service at restaurant, all was excellent. The only small feedback I have is for some guests. Is disgusting to see people cross their legs & place them up on sofas like it's their home... & saw this with multiple people at the lounge. I wish the hotel would at least put up signs on tables requesting them not to do so. Another small suggestion. While the move towards cutting on plastic with fixed squeeze tubes is great, I found…

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: SachinBhandari
Detailed Review: Very good location and ambience. The staff is very courteous and well groomed.   The rooms are comfortable and AC is great.   The most important aspect, food, was super . The breakfast spread is very good and the quality of food is amazing. Chef Tejas and team ensured a great start of the day. They made sure everyone was taken care of.   The servers, table assist , team at counters  at CAFE MOMO were awesome and very pleasant.   Thanks for a wonderful stay

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Pri
Detailed Review: We thoroughly enjoyed our stay! The staff is friendly & very helpful. Breakfast time was one of the best, Mr Abhijit and his coworkers made sure we were comfortable and his assistance gave a personal touch to the overall experience.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Kush Gupta
Detailed Review: Great location, really this was such a good place to stay and the staff tanuj shreejeet  are very helpful 👍 it was an amazing experience and will surely visit this place again🥰 the room service was provided very well too

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Nita J
Review: Great service at the breakfast buffet!
Detailed Review: Chef Tejas, Ashwini and Akshay made our stay very memorable as they exceeded our expectations as always. They provided us with exceptional, professional service and attention during our stay. You are a credit to your hotel and we look forward to staying with u again on our return to Mumbai! Thank u!

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Guest
Detailed Review: We couldn’t wait to write a review. Restaurant Staff sought to serve and please beyond our expectations. The food is excellent and we enjoyed the wide selection. We hope to come back and bring our family.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Cas
Detailed Review: Wonderful staff. Great atmosphere. The food is amazing!!!! Thank you for being so friendly and making this a memorable time for us! We will definitely be back to visit again soon. I highly recommend this place.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Akanksha S
Detailed Review: It was such a pleasant experience. The food was amazing. The desserts especially were to die for. Shreya and Sajid made us feel welcome, comfortable and were at our service to the best of their ability. I would totally recommend, not that your brand needs any recommendation, but still. Thank you for an amazing night!!

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Snehal A
Detailed Review: I had visited Ummrao on 2nd May with my colleague and my boss for a pre birthday dinner and it was just mindblowing. Just from the ambience to the food and the beey amazing staff. Ambience - 10/10 Food 10/10 Staff 10/10  Special mention :- Mamta ,Amin ,Shubham, Rahul and Vedika.  These people made my day !  Such a warm and caring staff really makes the experience much much better.  Will surely visit soon. Thankyou Ummrao❤️

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Attila G
Detailed Review: Special thanks to Mr. Mustakim and Mr. Shivanji for the outstanding service at the restaurant. Large, clean and comfortable room, breakfast buffet is fantastic. Very friendly staff. Only few minutes from Mumbai airport.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Jasmeet Singh
Detailed Review: Great location, really pleasant and clean rooms, but the thing that makes this such a good place to stay are the staff. All of them asif pratik  mainly akhil are incredibly helpful and best.Best Corporate hotel near by international airport

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: vinoth8306
Detailed Review: Wonderful location, friendly staff, good choices of F&B and good location.  Front Desk Team was always busy with check in and outs but they kept up to the IHG Standards. They welcome their IHG members with their recognition. I had a problem with my room location and wanted it changed, it only took them less than 15 mins to relocate me to a better room.  Breakfast choices were good and the crowd management was perfect. No one was waiting for their seat as it was well managed.  Definitely coming back to stay again. One of the best airport hotels I have stayed at in India.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Din
Detailed Review: I had been staying since last 7 months at this hotel. Very impressed by all the Departments right from the Front Office to Housekeeping, F&B and Engineering Department for their impeccable service and always willingness to serve. Their attention and details for individual guests requirement is commendable. I will definitely be staying here whenever I visit Mumbai again. Keep it up!

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Trav
Detailed Review: Had a pleasant stay here. There are two views... On one side there is tall apartment building and on the other side is a city view. Better to choose city view on higher floor to get good views. The rooms have a persistent smell which could be due to old carpets, prior smoking or poor ventilation.   Better to choose a buffet package with all three meals included. The restaurant serving buffet has good variety and good food quality. Staff is courteous.   Located in a congested area with metro station adjacent to it. Hotel provides free one way airport pickup on many packages.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Akanksh Eati
Detailed Review: I don’t actually write reviews but for this one k had to. The room is quite decent and the food is also great. And coming to the service, especially the manager of the restaurant who is Anand Choudhary he has taken care of his customers very well especially when we asked for a different flavour of ice cream apart from the buffet, he told he would check on it and he brought it even though we came back to the room. He called us and served it in the room itself. So finally, this place is a very good place to stay and enjoy with our loved ones. I recommend this hotel each and every one of you. Thank you for spending your precious time. Have a nice day😄

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Jose Stanley Williams
Detailed Review: Good hotel situated close to the Mumbai Airport. ...approx 20min in fee traffic, so good pick if you desire to stay close to the Airport... Also has a nice, clean gym and swimming pool... Most frontline staff are fresh recruits though we still have some tenured good staff line Dinesh who make the stay a real comfort!!!...

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: KIM PARADISE
Detailed Review: We had such a great time at Holiday Inn. Decided to avail the weekend escape offer and spend some time with the family and we just had a blast. From the special kids Saturday brunch, to the exciting breakfast spread,  to fun night at the 72 bar with fab cocktails ,then the explicit Sunday Market brunch with a great spread, then enjoying a great high tea set up while the kids enjoyed in the kids corner coloring, playing and having a fun time. The spa experience was also just so relaxing.  We just couldn't get enough of the infinity pool on the terrace.  We also got a great 20% discount on laundry service with the offer. Our entire experience was so so so good. The kids just didn't want to leave   A special thank you to all the staff in all departments for their great hospitality.…

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rudrangshu
Detailed Review: I had a business trip of 15 days at Holiday Inn near Sakinaka. The service provided was pretty professional and the food at Saptami was really good. The in room dining service and housekeeping was very sincere. To rate the overall experience, it was pretty great and would highly recommend for any business travellers.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Soumya S
Detailed Review: I had a memorable stay at holiday inn mumbai International Airport. The staff made me feel very welcome and the rooms were very spacious and clean. The food is worth a mention since both buffet dinner and breakfast were excellent. I would be happy to come back again

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Tanaz Lakhani
Detailed Review: The experience has been nothing short of amazing and memorable. I enjoyed and relished all my meals at their Saturday Children's Brunch and Sunday Market Brunch I had a very relaxing and rejuvenating experience at Tattva Spa. I enjoyed the musical night with my cocktails at 72 Bar. The infinity pool at the rooftop was literally the highlight of my staycation. The hospitality and the staff service at Holiday inn is impeccable. I would really recommend you guys to come and enjoy their weekend escape package

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: RG15121972
Detailed Review: Absolute stunner when it comes to hospitality in related to Kitchen and F&B. No match with changed culture to be really guest oriented. People like Sunanda Mausi will remind you of your mother like treatment. Really impressed with Nandan, Henry, Pooja, Ravi, Chef Vinit, Vishal with the way they treated me and have taken care of me in last 2 weeks. Special Mention of Shrishti who seems to be a great host when you enter restaurant.  Even though I like staying in Holiday inn by this time I was really disappointed with couple of things like bad experience with Puck up, with carry bag and the room. It just felt that they have given me a room which should have been under renovation. I hope this is not repeated again.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sabiha
Detailed Review: I organized my brother's reception at Holiday Inn, and it turned out to be amazingly beautiful. The food was the best, Chef Umesh was all out there for the menu planning and the execution was at it's best. The guest were all praises about the food. Mr. Ameya who was fairly new to the property, went an extra mile to cater to all my needs along with Mr. Kaushal. The decor was done very elegantly by the WNS team. Last but not the least, the F&B Service team was on the toes, especially the young ones like Shankar, Anand, Sahil, Prathamesh, Akash, Rujit And Wasim. The Group Check-ins were very prompt and streamlined. It was by all means a dream wedding reception.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sukanya Suresh
Detailed Review: Had a pleasant stay. The staffs had been extremely good. Mr. Dinesh & Mr. Ajay showcased exceptional service. Front off staffs too had been exceptional.  Defines recommending!☺️☺️  Way to go team!! ☺️☺️☺️

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ayush
Detailed Review: Very much good to stay here. Staff service service is good. Breakfast was alsoo best. Room service is much better then any other hotes. Room cleaniness was exellent. And the reception staff sercice wqs exellent. The stay was much convenient

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sanjeev
Review: My stay in Holiday inn sakinaka Mumbai
Detailed Review: The service was good and would love to suggest change in breakfast menu add some Italian stuffs, have more number of therapists in spa.  Please always keep your representative for airport pickup and drop in hotel sometimes they are not available.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sanjith N
Detailed Review: Nice service and good food…… Very polite staff especially Sudeep and Ajay at the front desk………… Housekeeping staff is was at their best….. I will suggest my friend and family  Thank you………….…********….

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Professor Gold
Review: Corporate Event - A Mega Success: Special Thanks to Holiday Inn
Detailed Review: Whether you are staying here or organising an event, in Mumbai, Holiday Inn is the best place to do so.   We had a very crucial event, with leading personas in the field of Dermatology. Holiday Inn stood as a face and made it seamless.   Starting from the Duty Manager, Kiran, each and everyone had a polite way of greeting and do things with impeccable understanding.   Mr. Jay, Mr. Akash and Mr. Prathimesh: No words to describe their commitment to make it a grand event.   Finally, one man who was an embodiment of Proactiveness is Mr. Rajit from the Banquet. He is a master in arranging, organising and optimising events. Without him, we would be running around for umpteen items.   Give a brief.  State your purpose.  Sit peacefully.   These people are the ambassadors for the Brand…

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Teodoro frances... d
Detailed Review: Well located near Mumbai Airport .it represents my first choice when stay in Mumbai . The whole staff is really of a superior class of hotels as they are motivate of finding solution in any occasion . Breakfast delicious and well served . Room facilities prperly adeguate .

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Charan T
Detailed Review: I had stay in holiday inn Mumbai excellent service by team…………. Front desk staf good service by Ajay he help me for ola cab booking.. Housekeeping team good…… Security service excellent  Food service good…… I will vist soon thank you………….

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Poornima Mathur
Detailed Review: Amazing stay at the hotel!  Stayed here for 14 days on a business trip Great service, meals and everything great! Fantastic Food...  Would definitely like to stay again with friends/colleagues/family. Highly Recommended

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Shibani
Detailed Review: A very pleasant stay at Holiday Inn. Great service and clean rooms that were extremely comfortable. Courteous staff too. I will be back for sure. Thank you for hosting us.. please keep up the amazing job!  See you all again soon :)

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: 225akasha
Detailed Review: I tend to stay at this hotel during my business trips to Mumbai. I decided to use my rewards nights to spend a night here on out way to Goa...this time with family. I was treated very well from the very start! They accomodated every one of my requests without question. Rooms are very tidy and the service is top notch. I am a diamond elite member with IHG and not once did they allow me to forget it... Super! I wish IHG would step it up and offer free breakfast for Diamond members given that marriott offers it at just gold. That was the only downside...but that has nothing to do with this property. Keep up the great work!

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Poonam
Review: An amazing experience with super helpful staff.
Detailed Review: In my two weeks visit to India, I have stayed with Holiday Inn Hotel three times, the last stay being the longest and most comfortable one. Dinesh helped me from day one to get me a cab to go to the airport. Ajay the DM was always ready to assist me with currency exchange and most Important Kinjal at Reception, the most friendly and ever ready to assist with guiding me to places that I can visit while in Bombay.  My stay in was smooth and comfortable thanks to these people. Keep up the good work and team spirit. Customer service at its top notch.   Three cheers to the team of Holiday Inn Hotel.  Thank you

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Hetal Bhuta
Detailed Review: I'd recently visited this Hotel for dinner on the eve of Mother's day and we sure did have a memorable experience! From the classy ambience, to their hospitality, to their impeccable service, everything was top-notch! Looking forward to visiting again!

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Shrirang U
Review: Staff is not very friendly, strong odour of the floor cleaner or something similar in lobby / room
Detailed Review: I reached hotel in the evening from international airport by Auto rikshaw as I didnt get the cab/ uber / ola . I had to get down at the outside gate which is on road , far from the entrance lobby ,I asked the guard about it , he said just walk for 2-3 minutes You will reach the entrance lobby , no guard came to help me with my luggage , from where I had to walk for 2-3 minutes with my luggage . When i asked at the reception about it , I was told that autos are not allowed inside due to NOISE, and generally they send the staff to collect the luggage , but the guard at the gate asked me to walk down for 2-3 minutes. The staff at the reception was arrogant & was not at all friendly. Hotel had some strong smell of some floor cleaner in the lobby & something similar in the room.…

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rajeev
Detailed Review: One of the best places to dine in around airport, has an amazing Rooftop Restaurant which offers a breathtaking view and the food tastes amazing too, so if you're planning a lunch or dinner date this is the place to be

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Nikhil Sonawane
Review: A good luxury option in budget near airport
Detailed Review: I have been visiting this place for quite a some time. Only reason why I love this place is because of the restaurant this place offers. Specially "mostly Grills". The view & the service is just so mesmerizing here. All my special occasions have been celebrated here. Looking forward to visit more.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sid_Kapur
Detailed Review: I stayed at the Orchid for one night on a business trip. I was staying at this hotel after many years and had chosen it given its proximity to the airport and also my good experience at my last trip. However the hotel has gone down the drain. The room looks jaded. The wooden furniture looks scratched and the polish is all gone. The bedsheets and pillow cases look old and decrepit. The worst part was that in the morning there was no hot water in the room. The maintenance staff took 20 mins to respond and could not find a solution. By which time I had a bath with the water available as I had to leave. The only bright side of my stay was the breakfast at the South Indian restaurant. Restaurants seem to be the specialisation of the group and not running hotels. A very poor value for…

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: MamtaDeven
Detailed Review: I visited the Orchid Mumbai Boulevard restaurant and was pleasantly surprised to find the Wedding festival having Gujarati and North Indian themed food and decor. The Buffet brunch had about 15 types of Salads main course had about 20 dishes and about 15 types of mouth watering desserts    Spoke to the chefs Mihir, Chef Lad and chef Paramjit and they guided us to try the various dishes in the Cusine and explained the stories  behind them their ingredients and how to consume the as well as their health benefits

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Nitika Gupta
Detailed Review: Mostly Grills is located on the rooftop of Orchid Hotel .  The entire ambiance is casual , stylish & breezy . Also you get a gorgeous view of the airport . They have an open kitchen & a well stocked bar . Live music only adds extra stars to the overall experience . They have a rotating dessert display with droolworth desserts which simply cannot be missed . Chef Vaibhav took par excellence care of us & ensured we are treated to piping hot freshly prepared mouth watering delicacies which tantalised our taste buds . Mr Sailesh Shetty made our dining experience super comfortable & enthralling one by serving us to the best of his capacity .  We tried the following items .  Hare patte ka paneer roll Chef Vaibhav won our hearts with this exceptionally extraordinary dish .The melt in…

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Food_obsessed_guys
Detailed Review: We visited mostly grills in orchid hotel it was a great restaurant the view of airport was amazing from there.we ordered    (MOCKTAIL)  Cindrella Peach bery bull (Startes) Chilly Cheese Cigar roll  Lal mirch ka paneer tikka,  Bharwan kumbh PINK SAUCE PASTA  (DESSERT) TIRAMISU.  Everything was amazing loved the food and ambiance specially the airport view.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Simran S
Detailed Review: The staff here is very hardworking and polite. Chef paramjeet was very humble. Poonam, Pranjal,Snehal and Kanchan were very quick with their services and were always smiling. Had a great time here. Nice ambience

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Wonderlust
Detailed Review: We enjoyed are breakfast at boulevard at orchid hotel good food and helpful staff special mr Ashish harshda and Kanchan thanks for service . Food is also very good thanks to chefs parmjeet for food thank you.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Brijlal
Detailed Review: Service was very excellence the event looked by Mr adesh for continuous 5 days he was a excellent coordinator and gave us the best service the event went smoothly how we wanted special thanks to Mr adesh, pushpendra,chef mahesh..

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Radheshyam
Detailed Review: Great food, great service it was a great event and  the team was excellent. Also the food was fresh and extremely testy. The ambience good and refreshing.. Specialy thanks to mr adesh, chef mahesh and pushpendra.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rohit
Detailed Review: Had a great time at orchid hotel mumbai very good spred of breakfast at boulevard. Staff is also very quick in service thanks to mahesh and Kanchan for their service we really enjoyed are time here at orchid hotel.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Mr. Priya Ranjan Prasad
Detailed Review: Very convenient location for domestic travel.  But Reception Desk is very slow. Wifi didnot work in the first or second attempt. Of course it was working after 8 hours. Stayed in room 335. It was quite spacious and convenient.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: abhijit a
Detailed Review: One of a kind experience at breakfast. Live counters serving delicious and a wide variety of South Indian breakfast. Filter coffee is excellent and the vithal  dosa with homemade butter is a must try. Loved the mini bananas on offer too.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Jane Doe
Detailed Review: The service was very welcoming and extremely helpful.  The food was appetizing and drinks were refreshing, it was a pleasant experience overall. Yasin, Shreenivas and Vikas were especially helpful throughout. Definitely recommend to anyone looking to book a hall here.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Suvashree
Detailed Review: The service of the restaurant and the food is very good. The staff is very helpful. And kind to us.while serving.the chat is many more varieties.the staff is good.and thanks to Ms sneha and chef Rohan for the service.thank u

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Hasansh07
Detailed Review: My trip to the orchid Mumbai was too good as staff was too helping, humble and they also helped us with a problem regarding our car keys. We were so comfortable here that we think the next time we visit Mumbai, our stay's fixed

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Vidya G
Review: Stay at Orchid - Meals at Boulevard
Detailed Review: The services offered are very good for both stay and Conference facility. Courteous and Friendly staff go out of the way to help. Would like to make a special mention of Mahesh and Harshada at Boulevard and Romeo at the Chancery. Such staff are assets and a credit to your Hotel:) Keep up the good service👍

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Afdhel A
Detailed Review: Sometimes you worried about booking the brands you not aware of, but these guys have tried their best to match up to the upmarket guys. Proper systems, linens, good washroom etc. yes the perfection of 5 star is missing. But for a price of 3* ibis you get a a good value for money service and infra

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Vikram
Detailed Review: Had my breakfast with south of vindhyas excellent taste and wonderful hospitality. Truely enjoyed it. Thanks Kranti for making this memorable .chef bos prepared food very nice .amazing food and device

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Lali V
Detailed Review: The food was great, the indian delicacies were great. Waiter Rushikesh was a great help, he made sure we got the dishes. Very good customer service. There is a decent spread of breakfast and, the team has done justice to the food.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Jayesh
Detailed Review: Food made by chef mahesh  was awesome starters were excellent especially welcome drink made by Mr Romeo was superb services were top notch everything went how we wanted thanks yo Mr vikas and Romeo for getting this event to end in a best way

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Anjeli
Detailed Review: The food was really good  Employee was really good and humble . Employee was cooperative and proactive.Willing to help.I enjoyed the food . she was calm , polite and very humble.  Thank you Dakshata for your kind behaviour  You are amazing ❤️🎊 Keep it up.  Regards  Anjali Kumari

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Shreya awasthi
Detailed Review: Really it was an wonderful experience itself in orchid the food and the service really is appreciable enjoyed alot yummy food and the service was excellent for miss Dakshata ahi is very nice very helpfully and very friendly thank you

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Nirbhay
Detailed Review: After pandemic great experience in orchid hotel with the team great service by team banquet good food by chef Mahesh and banquet satff Abhishek & Yasin were very polite and helpful thanks to all of them 💯💯

Detailed Review: The sty Wass good and food is excellent 👌 and the sarvice is very nice form miss dakshata and shi is very friendly for guest and the live counter is dosa omlette is very nice and room also very good so the for the orchid hotel for everything is very nice and very good 😊

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Jordana
Detailed Review: Everything it’s perfect in this hotel. Very clean, food is very good and the service is amazing! I hope come back to here someday! Thank you Dakshata for help me and live counter is good spec omelets and the dosa is very good

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Philemon
Detailed Review: Beautiful food as well as drinks... we enjoyed the staying... cheers  We met Mr.abhijit&prathamesh, they served us new types of foods that we never tested before. Drinks like wine was fine. We promised to come back again after 15 days.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Hemant Gaba
Review: Training Session on Allen & Heath and Shure Geat
Detailed Review: Excellent food quality, support from Shilpa Kirdat, Vikas More and Aniket & Team. Have been doing events since last many years, good place to conduct events. Looking forward to conduct many more events in future.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Harleen
Detailed Review: Its a great great property its been 6 years i am coming to The Orchid they are superb, Food is great perfect authenticity do try their fish curry its out of world. Staff is too generous and helpful. Good to stay ambience is too good that you feel like home.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ashok
Detailed Review: Excellent hospitality & very professional approach. The staff & chef were very curtious. Sumptuous food and a variety of exotic South Indian breakfast items.  The ambiance was exceptional.  Very best wishes.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rajesh Patidar
Detailed Review: I tried South Indian breakfast here, must say the taste & varieties owesome, the staff is great explaining and offering in best possible way, the overall ambience is cool, the presentation of foods is also good, it’s the best South Indian I have ever tried

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sarnali Das
Review: Worst service provided by Housekeeping staffs to the Indigo crew
Detailed Review: I am a cabin crew in indigo airlines and we go there frequently for our layover . Yesterday when I went for my flight ,I left my facewash in the washroom which is quiet normal as I didn't check out ,I asked for room cleaning but they cleaned the room by trashing my facewash.Later on when I reached hotel around 2230hrs ,I started looking for it by calling the housekeeping department,they started enquiring me with such statements " Mam facewash full thi ya semi full" I lost my temper still I stayed calm as I was on duty .They literally thought about buying one and gave me around 01:30am .Today while going for flight I have informed Rohit from front desk to speak with the housekeeping staff and brief them not to throw anything as I am very sensitive with my stuffs but the…

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Veer Pasi
Detailed Review: We had a event with orchid hotel in chancery 2 we are very grateful to have a such wonderful service given by Mr Sachin and i thanks to mr.abhishek also this guys are very helpful and kindness and co operative.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ishani Choudhury
Detailed Review: A great place to stay. Food is great here and all the staffs are very polite and always at your help. A girl named Pranjal helped me with anything i required at the breakfast. They are all very helpful and nice. Hygiene is also very well maintained. Would stay here again.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Hitesh
Detailed Review: Food was excellent n authentic South Indian  today I had my breakfast  with my friend  at South of vindhyas amazing  food prepared  bye chef boss good service  provided by vinayk and kranti thank u so much for the breakfast

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Pushkar Chincholikar
Detailed Review: Its was extremely endearing and a fantastic experience with an array of Maharashtrian n Chettinad delicacies..Extremely cordial and warm hospitality with Live Sitar playing Sitar the background..particularly noteworthy Harshada and Rahul and Dakshata

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Yogesh
Detailed Review: Good, pleasure ambiance, with great food, with good staff service, we got good service at the table, with veriety of food, when we visited the theme was maharashtrian and south indian which we liked it alot. Thank you ☺️

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Prajna B
Detailed Review: Good food. Service was good by harshada. She helped us with our order's. Thanks to her!  Staff is looking in there treditional look food is also nice puran  poli i specially like and dessert all resturant is decor very nice

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Parul
Detailed Review: Amazing decor and staff ,harshada ook great care and was quick with service..thanku for great hospitality.The food was amazing and staffs are really nice. Decoration is very nice staff is looking nice in traditional wear

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: calvin d
Detailed Review: Amazing Setup and even better food. The team has really taken care of every small detail.  The menu which consisted of Maharashtrian and South Indian cuisine took me on a culinary journey.  Look forward to more such events!

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Alok
Detailed Review: The decor was thoughtful and artistic. Food was really good. We especially liked kolhapuri and brinjal subzees, prawn curry and कैरी पन्हे. Chettinad fish dish was also good. Chef Reshma was welcoming and helpful. Overall event was a good idea.  The serving staff was very helpful and caring thanks to harshada

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Deepali
Detailed Review: Everything was amazing, the decoration was stunning . A lot of hardwork has been put into making this thyme successful.  The attaire was appropriate to the thyme. Food was delicious and the spread was quite large. I would like to visit the hotel for Sunday Brunches.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Nitin T
Detailed Review: Really enjoyed them wedding theme at boulevard  brunch service is excellent . I like food  Maharashtrian & South Indian cuisine  Staff very helping I would I like to recommend the few staff name mr mahesh rushikesh and harshada thanks for great service

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sanjay
Detailed Review: Service and staff both is cooperative and awesome...   Harshada &  Snehal both the staff is very kind.... I never get such kind of staff in my 10 year business meet...  Keep your good work contribute... really you both have great work.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Mazhal
Detailed Review: The service of the restraunt is very nice. The food is good. We like ambiance of the restraunt. There are may more varieties in live countr. The staff of the restraunt is very nice. And helpful and thanks to Ms snehal and Harshada. And Mr ashish. For there service.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Dhruv bhatt
Detailed Review: Great food, Great service it was a great event and the team was excellent. Also the food was fresh and extremely tasty, the ambience was good and refreshing.  The place was well cleansed. Also the washroom was clean

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Riya
Detailed Review: Great experience in THE ORCHID hotel it was excellent memorable day for me we organise event in orchid it was arranged by team banquet exelent appritiate in future I will book this hotel sure thanks to Mr Abhishek Mr YASIN and Srinivas for giving great service

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Washington M
Detailed Review: The stay was fantastic heart melting staff from check in to check out good experience. Ms. Pournima from front office  help has with good  hospitality thank you so much pournima for you kind love and gesture toward us. Will see back soon.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Niraj
Detailed Review: The service of the restraunt is very nice.the buffet food spred is very good.many more varities is there in live countr.the ambiance of the restraunt is very good.thanks to snehal and chef mihir for there service.food was very excellent.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Chandresh T
Detailed Review: Wonderful spread of SOUTH INDIAN & MAHARASHTRIAN food - an excellent choice with a very wide variety.. Absolutely awesome taste.. Highlight if the stay is the breakfast at this place.. Excellent service too..

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv

Detailed Review: The stay was amazing,  old school charm ,being greeted by lovely Namastes, varied choices of food and Rushikesh served us very well, taking care of the food ordered, very polite and hospitable, thank you Rushikesh:)

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Viraj
Detailed Review: Service was very excellence the event looked by Mr Romeo for continuous 5 days he was a excellent coordinator and gave us the best service 5 days the event went smoothly how we wanted special thanks to Mr Vikas and Romeo

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Deepa Sharma
Detailed Review: Amazing event held at this hotel, Srinivas, Romeo, Vikas & other partners did great job, highly recommend.. Managed so well with buffet till end. Hotel Team are very professional had done great job you all.. Thankyou to whole team.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Muskan
Detailed Review: Chef Mihir really helped me out with my choices  of food and the food was also really tasty and well cooked , the hospitality provided by the staff is amazing and helpful.  Chicken tikka was suggested by my mr Mihir and mr mahesh and it was really tasty so thank you so much for that

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Parth A
Detailed Review: was having my dinner at mostly grill and this fellow Caridad dsouza made my day with his hospitality and smile.. I had a great after dinner when I was having drinks and relax after the day.. and that guy and his convo was very adorable...

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sunaina G
Detailed Review: The South Indian restaurant on the ground floor serves a good spread of variety of South Indian menu for vegetarians. There are 2 separate restaurants for breakfast and this one serves only veg. Excellent concept. Lovely filter coffee and choice of lassis to choose from including mango lassi. Would recommend to my friends in Mumbai.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Pooja
Detailed Review: The hotel is very close to airport and makes a perfect stay for business travelers. The rooms are spacious and service is good. The staff members starting from the door man to literally everyone are so humble and welcoming. The elder guy at the concierge (do not remember the name sadly) was extremely enthusiastic and told us all about the hotel and it's exhibits and treated us like his kids for straight 10mins. It was adorable.  The food options at the buffet was pretty good Alister was sweet and made the dining experience even better by recommending diff food item. Thanks to team orchid. Looking forward to another stay soon🌸

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rasika
Detailed Review: Fantastic service, it's a great place for special occasions, visited with Family had a great time at coffee shop, the entire staff is very humble and polite. Our overall experience was great. They also have a fabulous rooftop restaurant with amazing vibe and view will definitely try this next time. Thank you once again see you all soon.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Dindo N
Detailed Review: Chef Shyam - another masterpiece of such a wonderful and tasty cuisine. Also displayed kindness to every guest. Kudos to you chef.  Caridad Steward whom attended to us during our dinner, a kind of steward whom got the kindness in which every guest pay respect for. Such a gentleman. All respect and well recommended for both of them. And last but not the least, to ma’am Hazel the kind Hostess, thank you for you hospitality. We’ve seen your kindness and patient in our every request. Thank you guys

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Mahesh
Detailed Review: Fantastic view. Stellar service by Rosish, Rahul, Caridad and others. Mushroom stir fried was delectable. An evening outing with friends family or colleagues at the rooftop restaurant is worth an experience overlooking the runway of Mumbai Airport. Make reservations before you go.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ashish P
Detailed Review: Food is very good and served hot. Authentic south Indian coffee and music.  There are 21 different varieties in a platter. Fruits and fruit juice is also available to start. Gujarati varieties like khandvi , Fafda and Khaman is good.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Shivani J khanna
Detailed Review: We had a great experience while staying here.specially for the food it's amazing and my kids loved it . Thank you chef Mihir and the whole staff for taking care of us and treating us with love . Thank you.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Neena A
Detailed Review: Food is incredible! Haresh explained the variety of dishes and helped make the experience so memorable. Food is perfect South Indian with balanced flavors and unique take on traditional dishes. Thank you

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Manoranjan Puthal
Detailed Review: Today I had India’s best pure vegetarian breakfast amazing food prepared by chef bos good service by learning and Madhu ….that Vittal and Venkatesh dosa was yummy I really enjoyed my breakfast in south of Vindhyas

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Kirthana Baskaran
Detailed Review: Mr. Caridad who works with the rooftop restaurant is extremely friendly and professional.  We loved the service rendered by him. We enjoyed the ambiance and the service rendered by him . He’s extremely friendly and hospitable. Keep up the amazing work . Cheers :)

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: V-Baxi
Detailed Review: We had to await check in and spent nice time enjoying delectable South Indian coffee at the Gourmet Shop. Pooja very kindly looked after us. A cheerful looking place to relax and while tine away. @&@&@&@&@&@&@&@@@&”&@@@@@&@&&@@@@@@@@&&

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: RoshanRay
Detailed Review: Going out with family to mumbai after 2 years and to book a hotel was tricky in Mumbai  The best decision was to book orchid hotel near the airport!! From the reception to the checkout was smooth!! Loved the ambiance and the place  Special shout out to kanhaiya and his team  Geetanjali for taking care of us !!

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Srinivas Y
Detailed Review: Well maintained ambience. South Indian touch and pleasant music. Full scale South Indian menu and well presented choice of items. Felt home at heart of Mumbai. Ending with nice filter coffee - South Indian style.  Kudos to chef and staff. Highly recommended

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Amit Rathod
Detailed Review: Amazing Spread of South Indian dishes.. especially Vithal Dosa. Good service. By vinayk ,kranti and adhes ..amazing  food prepared  by chef boss this is a India best pure veg breakfast  try this breakfast  thank u

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: sagicharles
Detailed Review: Excellent food luv those itally and dosai definitely will try again, Service by hranri and hareh  was very personal great ambience perfect for single or family visit chef Bala prepared  the food  very tasty thank for the treatment...

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Far
Detailed Review: Amazing food. Lovely conversation with chef Mihir. Very customer oriented. Loved the chat prepared by chef Vansh too. Buffet is widely spread. Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv

Detailed Review: Thank you so much for all your excellent customer service and good communication towards the customer. The chat here is amazingly mouth watering 🤠 Thank you Mhir , yash and all the crew members. Hope to see you all around.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv

Detailed Review: Had a great event at mostly grills restaurant it’s very good place for dining under the sky...very polite and helpful staff thank you it was a wonderful experience. With lots of love ❤Thank you for everything 🥰

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Shree sagar
Detailed Review: Good service .good food best hotel five star .thank you very much Mr Romeo Mr pranay Mr vikas for your great service hope to come again in orchid hotel as I was surprised with the level of service given by the staffs

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv

Review: Review for the staff and food
Detailed Review: Stay at this hotel was amazing especially the food. Anytime I come over  here food never disappoints me. Chats section is delicious never miss out on it, chef Mihir did a great work on the whole buffet.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv

Detailed Review: Great experience with orchid hotel lovely food and service by team banquet thanks to Mr Yasin  and Sachin were very helpful and about banquet hall is very clean good vibe and we like to visit again in orchid hotel

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv

Detailed Review: Was just passing by for business and had the opportunity to have a fully example of the best south Indian cusine, tasty but delicate, sweet and sour, warming and refreshing... a fabtastic mix of contrasts that makes dining and intriguing experience and leave your body and spirit totally pleased. A must try!

Review: Special thanks to Mr Mihir and Paramjeet
Detailed Review: Chef Mihir and Chef Paramjeet made an delicious food and the service was very amazing. Very professional with work and they checked on us every 5 mins. Would definitely recommend you all to come 😊 Thank you for taking care of us

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Swapna Kadam
Detailed Review: The food was amazing 😋 and the sarvice was the excellent by miss. Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Laughinglungs
Detailed Review: We visited the 'The South of Vindhiyas' restaurant for our Mothers Day brunch. The hospitality and the delicious food made our celebration extra special. Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: manpreet
Detailed Review: I would like to appreciate Cheff Khushali And Cheff Mihir  The food is really really tasty and the customer service was so excellent i would recommend if you are visiting mumbai Orchid must must try the aalo chat and pani puri   Thank you so much cheff bringing the amazing food on our table when we were really hungry after 12 hours of continuous flying .

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv

Detailed Review: The food is just so tasty and delicious. Authenticity is the key here. They serve authentic South Indian Food in Mumbai. Loved the food, ambience, Hospitality and gazal in background. Kranti and Harish served very well, thanks to them.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Shiva sagar
Detailed Review: The food is splendid. Live music is traditional. And the ambience gives a south indian marriage vibe. Loved it!! I ordered parotta and butter chicken and can see the absolute feel of south indian ghee. Staff  name : kranti

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rahul
Detailed Review: Great visit in the orchid hotel Mumbai this hotel is near by airport so that's good for every visitors had a event in orchid hotel which was very smooth thanks to staff Vikas Yasin shrinivas and pranay for good corporate

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Kunjan
Detailed Review: The Orchid- Very good event, Great location, really pleasant andclean rooms, but the thing that makes this such a good place to stay are the staff. All of the people are incredibly helpful and generous with their time and advice. We travelled with two six year olds and lots of luggage and despite the stairs up to the elevator this was one of the nicest places we stayed in the four weeks we were in india.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Asha
Detailed Review: We had a event in orchid hotel it was arranged by team banquet very good initiative by all staff vikas Yasin pranay and shrinivas guys are awesome in their work and food is also excellent by chef mahesh

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Milind K
Detailed Review: Service was very good food was excelent food staff were very humble and everything was on time we wanted lunch early without any excuse staff accepted and made it early thanks to banquet staff for making this event go very well special thanks to Aadesh,Romeo and Ayan

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Salil Parab
Detailed Review: Very good service by all staff members food was great thanks to chef Mahesh for preparing such a delicious food and all request was fulfilled special thanks to banquets team Mr Adesh Lad Mr Romeo and Mr Ayan

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Reetika S
Detailed Review: Chef Khushali made excellent mouth watering chaat, and I ended up having 4 varieties of it. She was keen on knowing my preference before making it and thank you for that Ms. Khushali. Best place to dine in.. The beautiful food-decor of Aai and the food is just too good! Chef Lad also asked how was the food and whether we are enjoying or not!

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Dr Prashant Rane
Detailed Review: After covid pandemic it was worth attending medical conference at orchid hotel . Service was too good , breakfast snack and lunch was yummy . Ambience was too pleasant . Big applause to the hospitality given by Mr vikas ,Yasin ,Pranay .

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Vertika
Detailed Review: Amazing food with great hospitality . Thankyou so much Chef Mihir and chef Lad  ,you guys are truly an asset for the hotel .  I am super happy with the services . Thankyou again to the very wonderful Khushali for taking care .  Wish to visit again very soon

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Muskaan
Detailed Review: Orchid is super great!  The pure vegetation South Indian breakfast spread is really good at the Vidhyas.  Even the staff is very friendly and communicative. Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: #MruNeel
Detailed Review: Chef Mihir is to look out for.  Awesome spread  South Indian food is to look out for ask for South Indian coffee  And if you are a Gujarati there is an awesome Gujarati spread as well  Cheers  Look out for fresh juices

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Jenifer
Detailed Review: I visited The Orchid Hotel Bombay with my colleagues. I had a very pleasant stay as the staff is very warm and welcoming. Lovely staff and service. I would recommend everyone to come and visit the experience!!

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: shivanii s
Detailed Review: Amazing food and especially the masala poddi Dosa by chef Mihir. One must try this and chola and bhatura too. Totally loved the taste and the ambience and the services. Hope to make my next visit here only. Thanks.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Mj
Detailed Review: Loved the service and food. Healthy and delicious. Had south Indian breakfast, very good variety and taste. Loved their filter coffee. Overall happy and would definitely try again. Nice experience and breakfast

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Aniket
Detailed Review: Great food great service!!!! Thanks Rahul, Chef Vinit. Great place The Orchid near T1. Good room service too . I like the ambience. Facilities are awesome as well . Just 10 min walk from T1. Will would love stay here again.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
