Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Mohammad D
Detailed Review: Visited here many times with friends but this time Visited here with family, it was amazing experience, the staff is very friendly the food was delicious and the cocktails was exceptional! The service was excellent with smiling face, We definitely visit again.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sherry
Detailed Review: Nimisha has done a wonderful service on our room for the last few days ,she has kept the room clean and always ensured every item is stocked.  I would recomend her to any housekeeping job ,as she is very prompt in her service.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Akshay
Review: I had the vegetarian sit-down buffet at the “South of the Vindhyas” Mumbai and it was absolutely delicious

I have been here a few years ago ( back in 2016) and it’s amazing how they’ve maintained their great quality of food and service over the years!

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Shobha jain
Review: One of the best and authenticate South Indian cuisine
Detailed Review: Last sunday visited South of vindhyas at The orchid hotel and experienced one of the best South Indian food. Huge spread, goood veg options which will surely tickle ur taste buds. Cherry on the cake is the filter coffee. Must visit

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv

Detailed Review: Mihir was very approachable and he provided us with excellent service , always asked us what we needed .always recommend Mihir to attend any of your guests.The food was also very excellent and he provided with great options .

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv

Detailed Review: and give nice food..chicken good vegetables  good in Boulevard  nice place restaurants breakfast goods  served nice ..nicely served breakfast morning breakfast good food breakfast and dinner  nice  그리고 좋은 음식을 주세요.. 치킨 좋은 야채가 좋은 Boulevard 좋은 장소 레스토랑 아침 식사 상품이 제공되는 좋은 그리고 좋은 음식을 주세요.. 치킨 좋은 야채가 좋은 Boulevard 좋은 장참소 레스토랑 아침 식사 상품이 제공되는 좋은

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Manas Parakh
Detailed Review: Mostly grills located at the hotel orchid at top floor is the best place with great hospitality and beautiful ambience. It's the rooftop restaurant with a great airport view and it's own ambience. I loved the mocktails and their presentation. Enjoyed it with live screening of the match. In appetisers we had chilli cheese cigar roll and grill sesame panner. Both dishes were nicely presented and were too delicious with great flavors. The fillings of cheese between panner makes it more tasty. In mains we had fried cheese quenelles which was served with chutney and contains four pieces. It was full of cheese and and other was sizzler which had fries, rice and veggies. In desserts we had vanilla ice cream with choco chip melting chocolate which was too refreshing. The staff was too…

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Stanzin L
Detailed Review: So called five star hotel, their in room dining service are really bad, quality of food they serve in room is pathetic, even at the buffet as well. Very slow service. I would not suggest anyone to go this hotel. They should really look into this matter

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: kc_dude
Review: Great luxury in a perfect location
Detailed Review: Stayed for 2 nights in two one-bedroom suites.  1. You find luxury and richness throughout the property and several nice displays in common area 2. The racecourse and skyline view from the suite is perfect 3. Nice sized suites considering it is Mumbai 4. Breakfast and Dinner in Seven Kitchens is best. 5. Nice outdoor rooftop pool 6. A good sized gym with lots of good equipment 7. The spa has a good Jacuzzi, Sauna and Steam room 8. It is connected to a very upscale (probably the best in India) mall called Palladium Mall which rivals many American upscale malls both in appearance and luxury brand presence. 9. They accommodated a very late checkout but asked to switch to a regular room from suites for the last few late hours.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: VonVintlo
Detailed Review: The hotel rooms are nice, a decent size, good wifi and aircon. The bathroom has a separate bath and shower. The strange thing is that there is a phone next to couches by the lift, why I cannot fathom as each room is equipped with a phone. For 3 nights in a row I heard people using the phones, screaming and waking me in the room.  The hotel staff are friendly. The in room dining is very expensive compared to the food in the restaurants. The breakfast spread was good, but the tables were dirty and not wiped down properly..

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: ankur a
Detailed Review: The location is superb , staff is fabulous …. Specially Prashant from Concierge.  He takes care of u right from the entrance untill u check out . If i can hove 20 points out of 10 . I would do that. Only concern is their eve cocktail place …. The menu there is sad . I took a package which incudes free cocktails in eve , and all they serve there is peanuts Rest 9/10

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Reha S
Detailed Review: I’m not one to write reviews but I have to say I had the most pleasant stay at the St Regis with my mom. Special mention to Mr. Shadab Ul Haq at guest relations who took wonderful care of us from the get go. He checked in to see if everything was in order and to our liking from time to time and always greeted us with the biggest smile. It added so much value to an otherwise regular stay at a five star hotel. Five stars for him.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Chandsahrawat
Review: Only place we will stay in Mumbai from now on
Detailed Review: The butler service from daily ironing, making reservations and hosting us in the cocktail lounge at Mekong everything organised by our butler Pratham was great. Service in the hotel and facilities were awesome. Buffet brekkie was the most extensive in choice and amazing quality  Only annoying thing is the elevators and having to wait for them 2x times each time as you have to swap at the 9th floor to different ones. But that is not St. Regis fault but that of the building designers.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Shreyas B
Review: The Regis Check-in to Check-out Horrendous Experience: Be Careful.
Detailed Review: The whole experience from check-in to check-out has been horrendous, feel scammed to be honest and would ask for a complete refund given the mental trauma.   Came to the St.Regis to celebrate my birthday with my wife and my two year old.   Please think twice before booking this property even if you are a Marriott Bonvoy Member.   Check- in:   We booked a suite with high tea and cocktails included in the tariff, when we got to the room it was deluxe room - what a birthday surprise!. Check-in took over 20 mins. The person checking us in (Neha) didn’t bother to check the room category booked, didn’t walk us through the sheet of paper saying which room and what is included but just handed the keys inspite of us mentioning that room is on a higher floor with a suite. We entered our…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Jasmine S.
Review: Great service with very friendly and helpful staff
Detailed Review: As a solo black woman traveling to Mumbai, I found the service to be quite welcoming. The check in experience was seamless and all of the amenities of the property were explained to me in detail. The main drawback of my experience was how crowded the hotel was and how that impacted how quickly I could board the elevator to get to and from different areas of the hotel. The butler and housekeeping staff were amazing and I was delighted to find little tokens of their appreciation each day after I arrived from various excursions. The highlight of my trip would have to be my experience with Namrata, the restaurant manager of seven kitchens, each day she ensured I had the highest level of service at the breakfast buffet and encouraged me to try different Indian meals to expand my…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Vinita
Detailed Review: We had the perfect staycation with family at St. Regis Mumbai   The hotel has everything that a family traveller would need.  Our children really had a great time  We really recommend this hotel to everyone.  Would particularly like to appreciate the efforts of Namrata and Farhat during breakfast service.  Keep up the good work..

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Kishan gopal Khatri
Detailed Review: St. Regis Mumbai is by far the best hotel that we have stayed at in Mumbai.  Rooms are beautiful, everything is lavish. Everyone is hospitable. Staff members at breakfast are very caring and cordial. Namrata and Farhat took great care of us.  Most recommended !

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Basant kumar
Detailed Review: I stayed with my family at St. Regis Mumbai for a week. It has been a great experience. We were put up on the 34th floor and really enjoyed the view. The rooms are beautiful and lavish. Breakfast experience was amazing. Staff is extremely hospitable. Namrata and Farhat have been taking great care of us. We will definitely stay again.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Kartik Gupta
Detailed Review: I had a wonderful experience at St. Regis, the staff made the extra effort at every possible stage for making it more special for me.  Pratham Baing, the butler assigned for us was always there, making sure after every hour that if things are doing well and the stay is comfortable and if we need something and incase we did, he would arrange for the same within minutes with a special touch always attached.  It was a complete pleasure to be hosted by him.  Suman at the reception desk was also really kind, helpful and went the extra mile always to make sure that his guests are feeling special and are having a comfortable stay.  We would really like to come again and be hosted by them.  Commendable job by these two!

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Yash Maniar
Detailed Review: Amazing & very courteous staff. Always available for any requests. Quick in response. We met Mr. Prathamesh who was designated as our butler. One of the best guys they had to offer. Hats off to him. He's treated us the best way one can ask for.  Thanks to the entire team of St. Regis for making our stay so warm & looking forward to see them soon.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Dee B
Detailed Review: I found the service in this hotel to be surprisingly weak. Indian luxury hotels are usually some of  the best you get in the world and that combined with the St Regis brand, I was not prepared for some of the snafus. They put me in a room with a double bed instead of a King when I landed late at night. I called to ask if they could change it since my husband was to join me - the lady told me that they couldn’t that night since all the king beds were taken, but assured me that it would happen the next morning when the guests with early morning flights checked out. I have rung them up a few times and as I write this, it is 4pm the next day and I am waiting for the lady to tell me if I can unpack in this room or need to wait for another one.  I also came back to the room to see…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv

I shouldn't have to ask for the same things Everytime. Thanks

Detailed Review: Sunila and Prashant had been a great host for the evening. The poolside arena is a great place for a candlelight date and offers great food. Out of all the cuisines, Dal rice stile the show. The pool is also closed for hotel guests hence, it gives a quite environment around.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Suryakant
Detailed Review: It's very good breakfast & superb serve we are fully satisfied. I would like to thanks to Mr Samaresh and Kishore who has made us morning memorable with personalised service. Thnks to vits team. Will love to come back

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Dhananjay M
Detailed Review: Good hotel to stay, very near  to Terminal 2, food is good, staffs are very nice and  over all had very good experience. Thanks for mr kishor and karan for nice breakfast and the poolside is very gooooood thank tu all

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ketan
Detailed Review: I had a short stay but It's a wonderful place to visit, the people at Front  desk were courtess & food was very good. It was memorable to stay here will like to visit again.  The breakfast at poolside is amazing too..

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Pavan
Detailed Review: Had a great experience at the hotel. Very nice service was provided by the staff and the hotel was very hygenic. All in all a great experience.overall stay was comfortable....the poolside view was amazing

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ritesh
Detailed Review: Best hotel for solo travelers.. very close to the airport and metro station. Hotel gives very good services starting with welcome drinks at the reception and reception people are very sweet giving a complimentary upgrade for rooms. Food is amazing will also recommend to include breakfast in your package its a must…!!! Hotel is worth it

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Saurabh mehta
Detailed Review: Best FNB and banquet team including Sachin,Parth and Chef Lokesh. They were always on toes and gave the best support they could. Food taste also liked by everyone.  Full negative marks to the sales team who literally harassed us falsely in spite of giving written confirmation but on ground team is superb.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: David
Detailed Review: Our stay was good, important means of commuting is easily accessible. Hotel and rooms ambiance are good.   I had forgotten one item in the hotel, got a call from the staff member - Ashaji who informed me that I could collect it from Lost and Found counter… So overall it was a good experience.  Would recommend this hotel to someone who is looking for a pleasant stay nearby the airport.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ketan
Detailed Review: It was great experience in Vits ......rooms are very clean with good views....Mr Rajesh from HK was very helpful....hotel was very close to airport.... thank you Vits family for making our stay peaceful......over all experience was amazing

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Joy
Detailed Review: The hotel is very clean and the staff are so very welcoming . The reception they are so very polite how they talk….the check in process was really smooth…poolside view was amazing.overall stay was amazing

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Amit Joshi
Detailed Review: Its was very good  Good Service  and staff is also good and its was very nice view off poolside we will visit  again with my Family   and special  thanks to manish mane to support  alots off thongs  and its very beautifully  view and excellent  Service

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ajay k
Detailed Review: It’s a wonder property  My family was quite happy Special thanks to Mr.Rajesh (H.k) what a great guy  He was very helpful in every way . Quite good service in every department  Check in and check out too was done very smoothly  The bell boy from the property gave a very good impression as we entered the property  Food was very tasty  Service in the pool side restaurant was too good  With wonderful ambiance  The calls were answered within no time  Needed hot water and milk  for my daughter  the front office staff Didn’t loose anytime to provide us with our needs  Would suggest this property to every family who are travelling to Mumbai  Thank you vits  Thank you for everything

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Khan
Detailed Review: Amazing stay with breakfast and other services. The breakfast menu was vast with alot of varieties.  All in all amazing service and good rooms. Would recommend  -sameer was an amazing host with all services

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Dr francis
Detailed Review: It was a good experience stay was comfortable clean rooms good room service restaurant was the best especially Shawn was very caring to make sure you enjoy the best from the menu. Continue the good service

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Poonam Sinha
Detailed Review: I attended a conference at vits, liked all services provided by Mr saurendra Ojha and his team would appreciate all staffs at poolside breakfast as well. Once again thank you very much to the entire service team.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Utkarsh
Detailed Review: Nice place with very tasty food. I visited on my anniversary dinner and had a good time with family. Thanks though the place was crowdy still the manager make the day special. Thanks to the team for serving good and quick food

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sachin
Detailed Review: Really great service overall from everybody at the hotel….specially the reception staff was very helpful…and courteous….it’s great place to relax and chill…the poolside restaurant view was beautiful….

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rajesh
Detailed Review: Thanks vits for making my stay memorable. I had great stay it was short but gud enough. I would like to thank all the FO team . Breakfast at poolside was so delicious and also service was too fast. Soon will be back

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Tanuj P
Detailed Review: Hotel VITS is an amazing hotel for business booking. Nice short stay with very helpful and friendly staff at reception. The rooms are big and clean and food is amazing. Will surely come back soon for a longer stay next time.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Narendra R
Detailed Review: Excellent comfortable stay in heart of Mumbai very near to airport. Fantastic room and delicious food thanks to the cafe staff for best service.would like to thanks the manager who was there and his promt response

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Piyush Singh
Detailed Review: The breakfast was great totally fulfilling and tasty. There is a lots of varieties in breakfast. Salads and freshly cut. The support and service from the staff is amazing. Very quick and on time. Overall a great experience.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Prathmesh
Review: One of the best hotel in Mumbai
Detailed Review: We booked the Vits  for small family celebration and it was best decision we made. Front desk staff are very helpful.... special thanks to Eklavya Vikas.....the  poolside view was beautiful.... truly amazing

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sanket
Detailed Review: Overall great service...the entire hotel staff was humble and supportive...which made the experience at the hotel complete.... special thanks to Eklavya vikas.......for making our stay... lovely thank u Vits.... family

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Minalshah64
Detailed Review: If you are searching for place to stay before catching International flight skip this one.Better options are available.  Staff :Very uncooperative. Roo.s weee nit alloted till 3pm Not a single desk staff apologised for  the delay.  Food : unhygienic pool side restaurant. Food counter always empty. When asked for mineral water and also agreed to pay extra it  took good 20 minutes to serve one bottle.  Rooms bedsheets ,towel napkins of poor quality. Overall a big disappointment.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Parminder
Detailed Review: Beautiful pool side cafe, feels so good and relaxed the ambience is perfect for chilling out and having good time with loved ones…..would definitely recommend…. The attendant Sonia was very professional and humble.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ravi S
Review: Excellent Buffet Brunch at VITS Mumbai
Detailed Review: Had a family get together in VITS Mumbai for 25 people, the food quality was superb and entire staff ensured that guests are comfortable and accepted adhoc orders for kids. The service is prompt. Special mention to Manish Mane for getting us the best deal and ensuring all the necessary arrangement on time. Staff members Sonia, Ojha and other chefs were really helpful and provided us customised food menu.Overall very happy with the service and must recommended for family get together.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Suhel danga
Detailed Review: Verry nice hotel and verry nice food and cleaning and all ….staaf is verry good  and room service also nice .thanks to team i love the place its excellent.the manager and team is very coperative, this will be prefer place

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: D W
Detailed Review: Excellent breakfast! Really enjoyed the meal . Service was cery good. And the ambiance is brilliant... lovely poolside breakfast..i enjoyed having all my meals while listening to the sound of water.. i would hihgly recommend coming here.thanks Mr Samaresh for everything

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ravi Jha
Detailed Review: Good food and service.. Loved the hospitality resturant people have shown.excellent team.love the place.we would love to come back again.very nice.thanks to harsad for your kindness to help in all places.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Karthik
Detailed Review: Brilliant stay at vits. The staff are very friendly. Really loved this hotel and would want to come to this hotel again...

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Deepak5384
Detailed Review: We had wonderful and delightful experience of family function at VITS. Food  was amazing specially the Goan Fish Curry.Pool side ambiance view was nice.  Staffs are very kind, polite and professional.Looking forwards for future visits and cheerful experience.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Saylee Gawde
Detailed Review: Thank u chef lokesh and shawn for food and service soniya thank u for ice cream  thank u hotel this good place and awesome food is also awesome and brunch setup is cool  to click photo is awesome place,,,,,,,,,,,,

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Amol
Detailed Review: Appreciate all good service and excellent food by chef Lokesh and his team .. thanks .. your Sunday brunch is indeed a good experience.. thanks 🙏  for a family your service and spread is good . A bit of faster service may also be helpful but overall it’s a great experience

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Shubham pathak
Detailed Review: Had a wonderful time here. Enjoyed a lot and all possible due to the support and effort of the staffs like Joy, Pankaj, Chef Sanjay, Shaista, Chef Lokesh and Mr. Ojha also a wonderful decoration by Rahul ji

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Snehal
Detailed Review: It was great experience with Vits and hospitality.... The staff is hospitable and we'll aware of how to treat people with kindness. Specially Eklavya vikas. Really great experience.... The poolside restaurant view was amazing...

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ajay
Detailed Review: Everything was just great. Service throughout was outstanding as always right from the reception check in to check out. Specially thanks to Eklavya vikas... For making our checking process smooth.   Just few minutes ride from the airport this hotel...

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Mantej Singh D
Detailed Review: Having Breakfast at poolside was very enjoyable. Breakfast was excellent. Manager and staff were very friendly. Had great time enjoying poolside breakfast. Would love to visit this place again during my next trip to Mumbai

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Harshal Kulkarni
Detailed Review: Hi Shawn how are u thank u Shawn Ilyas for service for breakfast u are are best friend Shawn your hair and services was excellent thank u i am grateful. Proper service was provided during pool side breakfast.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Kamal
Detailed Review: Pool side breakfast was awosome and ambiance is very good and food was very good quality and soread was very good and spiclly south indian dish was very very good and tasted and server shawn and ilyas is very helpful for verery thing.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rohanpawar@indai.com
Detailed Review: Food was excellent and Manish and ojha was given excellent service over all your poolside restaurants is very good ........and staff is also very helpful to explain about hotel and restaurant food...overall is very good

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sachin
Detailed Review: Had wonderful stay at VITS....... specially poolside restaurant view was beautiful 😍...the reception staff was very helpful....rooms are clean and neat......one more thing the hotel is eco-friendly..must visit...

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Karan T
Detailed Review: The poolside café is amazing, it enhances your dining experience. The ambiance in the lobby is awesome. They bumped up to Club Executive King's room. It was a pleasant stay. The staff response was prompt

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Jordan
Detailed Review: I visited vits mumbai the ambiance at lobby is very awesome the hotel is very good. The staff are really polite  and helpful. The food was tasty the rooms were cleaned and well maintained. Thanks for giving me the service  will definitely visit again..

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Abhiraj
Detailed Review: The stay was really good an awesome at Vits Mumbai the property is good and close enough to airport the room was neat clean and well maintained the reception staff was really helpful and very courteous I would like to recommend the name of some staff jiya digvijay and vikas. Would like to recommend to come and stay at Vits Mumbai...

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Jai
Detailed Review: It was my third visit at VITS for official work. Everything were just upto the mark. Nice entrance and worm welcome. Contactless check in was smooth and food was also good enough. Reception staff were too good and welcoming. Here the few names Viraj, Digvijay ,Vikas and Jiya guys keep it up

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sanjay S
Review: Due to excellent service i had visited on four occasions during the month of April 2022and was satisfied in every visit
Detailed Review: The service is prompt and courteous  Always satisfying the needs of guest  The ambiance is very clean Quality of food is of highest level offering variety of delicious foods  The food menu is of highest quality  Whenever i visited the hotel Overall very good

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: SiddharthDhamija
Detailed Review: Decently sized rooms, good people (which makes it as a nice place to stay), multiple eating options, ideal location for both business and leisure traveler. Slightly busy early morning for breakfast and hence suggest that one should have early breakfast

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: ghodlur
Review: Damn expensive, close proximity to T2 Airport
Detailed Review: Stayed for 3 nights in April 2022 as couldnt get a hotel nearer to workplace. The hotel is close to the International airport Mumbai but still takes min 15-20 mins by cab. The check in process was pretty smooth but the room rent was expensive. The room was spacious and comfortable, I was told the room was upgraded to Executive, didnt feel the upgrade much. The room service was quick and had to request for the dental, shaving kits. The wifi in the room was fast n good. The breakfast spread was superb, unfortunately had to pay seperately as was not complimentary.  Check out was smooth with free airport transfer included. Over all enjoyed the stay. Had it not been for the high cost, it would have been a value for money visit and stay.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Adarsh K
Review: 3 letters will explain the entire stay 'WOW'
Detailed Review: It was a wonderful experience in Marriot, the hospitality is just amazing. They treat you like a family member , bear with all your tantrums with a big smile.. Stayed here for 14 days and they were on their feet for all these days.. Highly recommended. Top staff and top service And yeah don't forget to have dinner at Umrao- probably the best Lucknow and kashmiri food in Mumbai..  Kudos to Abhijeet, Raviraj,Hrithik, Rohith and Hitesh..

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Manoj
Detailed Review: Visited momo cafe for dinner buffet spread is really good but the thing I like was the service by Olen shivaji Pawan Mansi  was excellent will recommend my friend and family members      By manoj kumar will visit again

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Arshita K
Detailed Review: Stayed here for almost a week while on a business trip. From check in to check out, everything was smooth and effortless. Spacious rooms, well maintained and sanitized common areas, a great pool, yummy food and most importantly, impeccable service. Umesh went out of his way to ensure all our needs were taken care of and we experienced zero hassle!! Kudos to the staff and the team here

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Urvaksh D
Review: Top notch service and care for guests
Detailed Review: I have stayed at the Courtyard Marriott many a times and they always go out of their way for guests. My last trip was a 1 day trip, yet Hemant and Shri went out of their way to help and get me everything I needed. You always feel very well cared for and you know that everything you possible need will be made available. Excellent and keep it up guys!

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rishi Kejariwal
Detailed Review: The service at the restaurant is amazing and and. Arshiya was very helpful ! The quality of food is really good and is server fresh. The chaat counter is a must try for every customer !!  Do not miss to stay for an amazing experience

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Zack Fenwick
Detailed Review: I loved the property the ambience and all of it. I would really like to thank the manager on Duty Yogendra Indulkar who was a really amazing person who not only gave us a good room but also comp us the cocktail hours. Him and his team of Moin and Umesh were absolutely delightful. I wish all the hotels could be as amazing the Courtyard Marriott. I loved my experience and it was blissful.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Avinandita M
Detailed Review: The service they provided was really good and efficient. Extremely happy and satisfied also the cocktails made by the bartender were really good, loved them! Would definitely recommend to others as well! 👍

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Gaurav
Detailed Review: Had an amazing experience at the momo cafe, loved the buffet spread..Staff were very polite and helpful..Thanks to Vinugopal and Arshiya who servesd us also the kitchen and service team.  Keep up the great work guys.!! 👍 🤗

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Smriti
Detailed Review: The room, ambience, food, everything was great. Hemant’s hospitality & the lovely coffees were the perfect extra touch that made my long weekend getaway even more memorable. Marriott never disappoints!

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Soyuzjose
Detailed Review: It was an extremely pleasant stay with the Staff and management very cooperative. Rohit extended the courtesy and never forgot to ask if everything was ok. Aneef as usual took care and was extremely hospitable.Arshiya always ensured that the right order was placed and delivered on time at the table.  Not to mention Shreya and yashashvi at the front desk in the restaurant coordinated to see that you are doing ok.   It was a great stay and the entire team takes lot of effort to deliver at the rush hours. Appreciated.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Nilesh Jivnani
Detailed Review: Rude, Arrogant & Highly unprofessional staff. Right from check in to chek out experience was not good at all. No request was approved, i felt like i hv book the room there for free or what? Is this the same with all guest? Guest have to take follow ups with the staff

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sanika Shelar
Detailed Review: It's wonderful experience during our stay in Marriott.. I have taken Marriott membership for the first time but trust me it's my wonderful experience with it. Specially Mr. Mahesh Sawant who offered me this membership and helped me throughout my stay with Marriott and  because of him we were more confortable there. All staff of Marriott was really very good. Would like to mention name of Mr. Abhijeet Patawardhan who was very such supportive and helpful through out our experience in dining and other supprt 🙏. Overall very good experience. Thank u team Marriott for making it memorable for us

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Akansha
Detailed Review: Amazing experience. I stayed here for a month. The staff is very helpful. Amazing service. The complimentary breakfast was really really good. Felt like home here. Chef used to prepare meals on our demand. Highly recommended.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Manisha Bathula
Review: One of the best place in Mumbai for Staycation & Good food
Detailed Review: We have recently visited this amazing place in Sakinaka Andheri   Ambience is pretty cool with amazing Fest Decor So we have Visited for the ongoing Fest which is  The undivided food fest at Holiday inn Saptami   This fest is till 8th May Stay tuned to their page they always come up the New Food Fest everytime   Coming to the food we tried  Some of the best North-West Dishes were in buffet with some asian food, Wide varieties of Desserts, salads,etc  A must visit if ur looking for amazing hospitality & best food  The concept of the food fest is:-  The Partition may have divided one homeland into two countries, but the common culinary culture remained undivided on either side of the border.  Trust me you'll definitely love the dishes here some of the unique & best street food…

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: LightPacker776604
Detailed Review: I had stay in holiday inn Mumbai sakinaka from 28th april to 30th April excellent service from frontdesk staff Ajay he is friendly person help us to book  ola cab.... Housekeep service good.... Security service good.....

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Varsha G
Review: Excellent experience. Clean rooms, courteous staff
Detailed Review: Excellent stay at Holiday inn.Mr.Akash and mr sujeet  were very polite, courteous and helpful. It was wonderful to interact with them. food was awesome and the hotel is located near to airport will come back and recommend to our frienda

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Akanksha Sharma
Detailed Review: Courteous, warm and really quick service by Malachi. Definitely recommend staying at Holiday INN. Really enjoyed the food especially the desserts. Had a really comfortable and enjoyable stay throughout the 10 days.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Happiness241194
Detailed Review: Kudos, to the room service, front desk, restaurant, Ajay, Nilesh and the entire team. The staff are very friendly, welcoming and go above and beyond to ensure my stay was fabulous. I definitely, recommend the hotel to anyone visiting Mumbai. The hotel is close to the airport. It's very clean and has all it takes.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Vikrant
Detailed Review: Rooms are nice and clean. The size of the room is good. The dinner and breakfast buffet was great. Staff was very polite and helpful. The room service and housekeeping staff and the reception staff were excellent.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: A Srivastava
Detailed Review: Great service, hospitality extended at the hotel. Would especially like to mention Mr. Akash from Front desk who was helpful with everything. Food at the restaurant was good too. Overall, a pleasant stay at the hotel.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Yadav
Detailed Review: Good and pleasant stay in holiday inn mumbai. Friendly staff and great ambience. Food at the restro is fresh and lots of variety. Buffet is also nice. Dinesh ,sagar and rutikesh from housekeeping team will take care of all the things you required during your stay in hotel.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Dhanashree
Review: A must visit place to enjoy some amazing food!
Detailed Review: Hello, I was here today for my birthday lunch. The food here was just amazing and too yummy.  We loved every dish we ate from the starters to the desserts. The ambience was superb. Special thanks to Malachi, Ragini and Vishal for the best service. Two best things were one the birthday pastry and the Paan ice-cream, superb!! Kudos to the FNB team!

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Mallika
Detailed Review: The only thing I felt was the entry card was not convenient while swiping in the lift. The ambience is wonderful and the staff helpful.  Also please look into the issue of ola/uber cab GPS location since the apps were unable to tract exact location point of the hotel entrance. We had great difficulty in getting the cabs.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Arun Mohankumar Anitha
Detailed Review: I have Visited Longue bar.. The Customer Service was top class Kudos to Holiday Inn mumbai for such Excellent Staffs. Special Mention to Pukar & Manager Anand  They are incredibly awesome.   10/10 for the service

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: P Krishnan N
Detailed Review: Great stay..friendly staff..Pool was clean and well kept..Vaishnavi as humble and polite in her approach..Thanks for making me and daughter feel nice..Overall service was also good ..All the best......

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: RAMIT B
Detailed Review: Amazing dining experience at Saptami - at Holiday Inn - Mumbai International airport. Great platter and table service. The platter of both veg and non veg was great with plenty of choices. The live counter had an amazing spread too.  Our table was served by Aftab - he was very prompt and very polite gentleman. We enjoyed thoroughly. Aftab - Kudos to you !!  all the best !! Hope you have a great career ahead.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Culture794493
Detailed Review: I am a regular customer in holiday inn mumbai the services  is super excellent special by kinjal and ajay from frontdesk .......and excellent food Housekeeping  service good..... Security service good.... I will vist afain and again

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Avyaan
Detailed Review: Aftab was a fabulous host. He served us well with courtesy and care. The food is excellent and finger licking good. We have been here many times and every time they make it a memorable experience. Thank you Holiday Inn and Aftab.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Roohi
Detailed Review: My stay at the Holiday Inn was extremely delightful. Sandesh and his whole team were extremely hospitable. It was my birthday and indeed I was treated like royalty, from a superb room to a beautiful cake. The staff members Dinesh and Himanshu were extremely helpful at all given times as well and they truly made the stay super amazinggg. I give Holiday Inn and it's staff my highest recommendation and five stars for the wonderful customer experience, rooms, cleanliness and ofcourse the hospitality. Thanks a lot for making it such a memorable birthday!

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: smbjmn
Review: A good hotel that can improve
Detailed Review: We picked this hotel to take rest before continuing our trip to other parts of India as we know that Holiday Inn is one of the most family friendly hotels and we travelled as a family of four.  Weeks before, while booking, we specifically requested connecting rooms. We called 3x to emphasize how important this is to us, and on those 3 calls, staff said 'we'll make a note'.  It didn't happen when we checked in very early in the morning as staff mentioned that they could not find any note saying that we requested connecting rooms, so we had to be 'happy' going in and out the rooms from time to time to keep checking our children's wellbeing during our stay.   The hotel itself is located about 3 kms away from Mumbai international airport, so after a long flight, not having to deal…

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ishaan Thapar
Detailed Review: Excellent stay at the hotel . Really had a wonderful experience at holiday inn mumbai . Really great ambience of the lobby especially staff at is very supportive and helpful and special thanks to Hitesh for being supportive and going out of the way

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Mohini K
Review: Absolutely pathetic hospitality display from Hotel & Staff
Detailed Review: Short version: Unaccomodating staff, rooms had a worn-out bed, leaking ceiling, all plug points blocked, AC not working & finally giving us 30 minutes to vacate the room if we wanted a refund.   Long story, stick around for this one:  Well, where do I begin from? We booked a 5-day stay considering The Orchid is a 5-star property. Having traveled overnight and knowing that the check-in would be in the afternoon, we mentioned to the front desk staff (Deepika, who is also the duty manager) that we were exhausted and looking forward to the stay. She then mentioned that they would be upgrading us to a better room on a complimentary basis. To a tired pair of ears, that sounds heavenly. However, that was the beginning of the misery.  This is at 1:30 PM.   Room 1: We arrived at the…

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Lazinum
Review: A note of Appreciation for Amit(in-room dining
Detailed Review: Amit helped me get the cutlery despite his pain on his feet.He was on his toes for the service with a professional smile(he showed no facial expression or grumpiness while at service which is inspiring and needs an applause👏🏻.He is an asset in your team!  Thanks&regards

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Prathamesh
Detailed Review: It was best view in this location, nice Ambenience and amazing food, it was my first visit in mostly grills restaurant, this is next level experience with location and very courteous staff very professional service in this restaurant, staff was very polite thank you definitely visit again

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv

Detailed Review: Visit with family for dinner we had great time at coffee shop staff is very soft spoken & very polite Mr shubham & his team provide best services    Services was good. Food was excellent. A must visit place for dinner.

Detailed Review: Visited boulevard restaurent  just for casual meet with my friends. Experienced exceptionally good service buffet was awesome with variety of multi cuisine option . Special thanks to service team to make us comfortable and making ease by suggesting menu. Would highly recommend to my colleagues.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv

Detailed Review: Visited Mostly Grills few days back and trust me it’s been one of the best experiences ever. This place is top and best at everything be it the service, the food, the view, the ambience. Love the live music band as well! This place is definitely a vibe and I highly recommend this place for dates and dinners. Do give it a try!

Detailed Review: Visited mostly grill and let it tell you it’s one of the best and happening place in vile Parle near airport !!!  Mostly grills has beautiful ambience!!! They serve dinner also next to top swiming pool !!! In starters you must try their chicken Jaipuri kebab and in Chinese you must try three pepper chicken !!!  In mains : I literallly loved the biryani and rumali roti with butter chicken !!! Butter chicken was spicy !!  Must say this place have great presentation!!!

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ajey
Detailed Review: Mostly Grills !!! One of the finest Rooftop bar !!!   Tried Beer Margarita (Such Huge Drink) which recommended By Rahul , it was electrifying  We had Lamb Ribs... it was delicious  They do a magic on your table with melting Chocolate and Rum (must recommend dessert) Amazing View of the City and airport.   We’ll be sure to sit with you again!

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Juhi Garg
Detailed Review: Visited this open roof restaurant Mostly Grills, Located in The Orchid Hotel, on a Saturday evening. It is located on the 7th floor  near Mumbai Domestic Airport. The view from here is the best as you get to dine with a view of the airport. You get to see the runway view while having your food or just while chilling. If you visit don’t forget to take the seating next to the fence for the best ever view. The best time to visit would be during the sunset so you can make the most of it.  Not to forget the staff here is so so friendly, they all know their job and are too good at it. They will take care of you from the start till the very end. The place is crowded on the weekends. The crowd is decent with mostly being families. They have a huge seating area, beautiful interiors with…

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv

Detailed Review: After having a rocky start during my stay, I wasn't expecting anything good, but Mr Jaggannath, chef Mihir, Mr. Pawan, Mr. Shubham ,Mr. Mahesh , Mr. Amit and Ms. Snehal from the F'n'B took utmost care of me and my colleague to make sure that we check out of the hotel happily. Food as always was 10/10. I hope all the issues I had to face gets resolved. Cheers.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv

Detailed Review: I am giving one star for multiple reasons though primary reason is their no outside food policy.  Well I am paying a 8K rental for a room and on top of that you want to shove your food down my throat as well. That speaks volumes about the quality of their food and greedy mindset. If the food is of great quality then people would automatically eat it but if you have to force people too eat your food then it's very clear. Also since i am staying here for four days then i am supposed to either go out of hotel or ear hotels food only. After paying 8K i am not entitled to have a meal of my choice in my room. That is the weirdest rule i have come across any because of this I'll checkout only after 2 days.  Now coming to other reasons. When I checked into my room the linen was all…

There was no call. I could not sleep as that smell was killing me and making me suffocated.  It was very disturbing.         I had to travel last minute so I did not carry much clothes except my nigh suits, So I requested Ms. Priyanka from IRD to serve me a lunch in my room , she was extremely rude and the food took 2 hours . I did not…

Detailed Review: The spread is good. We liked the fresh fruit juice, khandvi, sausages, steamed fish and the omlettes. Bacon was too hard and salty.  Overall good food and Good service by Dakshata and Harshada. Excellent sarvice  Enjoyed the breakfast.

Detailed Review: V visited the orchid vile Parle East boulevard restaurant manager mr dipesh Naik treated  us with smiling face n very politely gave us fantastic service n Chef Mihir of boulevard made us lasagne and paneer a must try dish! If u do visit ask for him, with great years of experience and expertise in his field chef again n again ask us how was food v r happy to his hospitality Mr Pawan gave us hospitable and quick service

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sanjay C
Detailed Review: I am  a frequent business traveler, so have seen it all. This property is big, but urgently needs an upgrade and refurbishing. Everything seems old, used and worn-out. There is a musty smell inside. The washbasin in my bathroom remained clogged. Food is quite overpriced. For a property charging Rs 9k plus taxes for a night (equivalent to five star hotels), one expects much better in terms of furnishings, furniture and room ambience. This is at best a 3 or 4 star property charging 5-star rates. Will give it a pass in future.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rahul
Detailed Review: Good service and food. Team is quick to respond and helped a lot in conducting the event successfully. Mr. Vikas, Romeo, Chef Patil, Sachin and team are simply awesome. Food was delicious and tasty. Looking forward

Detailed Review: as always orchid is the best,we r having regular meetings in orchid,today we had meeting in chamber 7 Good care taken by all the staff,good hospitality, special thanks to Roshan Lobo and his team,mr Aniket,mr yasin,mr Abhishek all were very helpful ,we will continue in future also with orchid

Shameless.  The food in the buffet was bad too.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: jsj13
Detailed Review: I stayed for 3 days at the Orchid as a team meeting. 1. day 1 - booked a taxi 30 mins before - on coming at the desired time - no taxi was made available. 2. hot water not working - had to have a morning shower in another room in the morning. the engineer in the morning was unable to fix the issue 3. at check out - it took me 30 mins for them to print out a receipt - they were unaware of how to do the process 4. a colleague of mine had rashes on arrival to the hotel. had to vacate as this was fatal

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv

Detailed Review: Good food,we had great experience  every thing was managed good,very cooperative  staff,Really  appreciate Mr Abhishek,RoshanLobo ,and specially chef gautam for giving us good food on both days,Mr Yasin and huzefa was also good with their services ,keep it up team

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Shiv
Detailed Review: service was.Excellent . Food was good. Staff was helpful. Extremely supportive. Humble staff. Specially thanks to Mr aadesh, dharmavir, mr. Aniket. Thanks to all FNB staff.  Ambience was nice Recomended by me

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Bhaskar
Detailed Review: We had a 2 days Bank of India meet at orchid in chambers hall,overall,great experience, hu od job done by Abhisek and Roshan for excellent service,which was given to my md and managers, We enjoyed the tasty food also,keep it up team,special thanks to Mr Ryan to manage all the things on time,

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: hafish M
Detailed Review: Amazing hotel with great facilities. The service was excellent beyond my expectations. All the staff were very welcoming including the managers. I appreciate the service and will highly recommend this hotel to my friends circle.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Krishan
Detailed Review: The service of the restaurant is very nice. Food is also very good. Ambiance of the restaurant is good.the staff is very helpful and cooperative.we enjoyed a lot thank u snehal shubham and Harshada  for the best service.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Raju
Detailed Review: We had a conference in The orchid hotel mumbai it was very excellent and great cordinator with Mr adesh and Mr yasin great people and excellent service and food we all very satisfied all the best to both of you for your feature will meet very soon

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Paul B
Review: Poor service, hotel below brand standards
Detailed Review: I've stayed at this hotel several times over the years. It was never at the top of the St Regis portfolio, but now seems to be at the bottom. Rooms and public spaces are very tired. Dirty pillows, stained carpets, chipped furniture, and rough edges. Definitely does not feel upscale, more dated. Training of higher level staff/concierge/management is definitely lacking. Cleaners, valet, security all friendly and capable, but the higher level staff don't know how to run a hotel charging this premium. Loud and clumsy construction in odd parts of the hotel, a amplified speaker in the lobby for a champagne toast that feels more like a sad carnival ride. The breakfast buffet is also lacking sanitary standards. I was shocked as staff watched children sneeze on the buffet, touch food,…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: PM
Review: Amazing views, attached to a mall, great amenities and breakfast spread
Detailed Review: Excellent hotel: Amazing hotel with great views of Mumbai from the room,  pool on 10th floor, breakfast restaurant as well as the  roof top bar. The room was nice with a nice range of guest amenities and the breakfast spread was very elaborate. It is attached to Palladium mall so great for shopping.  However, there was no offer to assist with my luggage, no welcome orientation and I found the rule on no bluetooth speakers (even though they let me go with it) a little absurd. It would be better to just remind guests not to be a nuisance to others - most people understand this anyway.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: kulks
Review: An amazing stay and a wonderful property
Detailed Review: Stayed for a couple of days last week. What an incredible experience! From check in to the beautiful room with an awesome view, the attention to detail was incredible. Devina, the front office manager is an amazing person with a great attitude. Also met Paul Kinney who is an exceptional human being. Very helpful regarding food choices and knowledge of the property. Definitely will return again with family and friends.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: gauravjalan2409
Review: Hospitality at St. Regis Hotel, Mumbai
Detailed Review: We would like to thank each and everyone making it very special for a 4 weeks long stay in the executive club room in St. Regis Mumbai.  Mr. Pratik was extremely extremely generous and took very good care, and checked everyday. He was an asset to the hotel. Ms. Deviani is a very soft humble and checked minute details and saw everything is comfortable including the logistics. From the lobby, reservation desk, the Butler service everything is well deserved and done extremely well coordinated. It's a beautiful dedicated people ike who really bring out the best. We would love to continue our stay in future definitely and wish everyone to do a magnificent job. Thank you  Gaurav Jalan

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Carakeshgupta
Detailed Review: Hi, It’s a wonderful hotel and occupancy is so good that this mail will have no say in the hotel conglomerate. Still as a guest I have my own rights to give feed back . Let me tell about my horrible experience of first time trying this amazing property in Mumbai just on recommendation of my client (I am a chartered accountant by profession and a frequent traveler and always select ITC and Taj). Silly of me to book this out of the world property this time. The experience I faced  1. Check in was awful as communication between reservation and front desk was not proper wrt payments. 2. Luggage delivery takes an irritating long time and no response after repeated calls  3. No one responds the calls . I have two videos of one minute each where calls are not picked up by any…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Pooja Palan
Detailed Review: I stayed at St Regis with my kids for 3 nights. The high quality of service and attention to detail is truly noticeable throughout the property. Very friendly and knowledgeable staff who went above and beyond to make us feel at home.   Our butler Pratham was beyond exceptional. He anticipated our needs and checked on us frequently and was very courteous. Any concerns or needs were quickly addressed. My kids still remember him.  We dined at By the Mekong and The Sahib room but Chef Taj in the Sahib room blew us away. The food, drinks, ambience was top notch. The breakfast buffet spread at Seven kitchens was mind blowing too. Next time in Mumbai I am definitely dining in The Sahib room.    Thanks to Neha too for making our check in process seamless and quick after a long travel. …

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Pooja
Detailed Review: Thank you st regis mumbai , the sahib room for the amazing dinner from staff to chef taj  every body was coperative specially staff  azam thank you for making my birthday so special must recommend place to visit in mumbai . Also the food was amazing ..

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rohit J
Review: Horrible - avoid all electric items, and check for faulty wires- I nearly died
Detailed Review: What a shame for a Marriott property. I was already skeptical seeing the tacky interiors for a “five star” experience. My room had a faulty iron box machine that upon unplugging it I got electrocuted and nearly died as there was a hole in the wire. The assistant manager only offered to change our room to a higher floor and a suite but nothing of that sort compensates for the near death experience, and no one seemed to care to follow up with us thinking we were happy with a bigger room they offered. I emailed the room director and general manager but haven’t heard from either acknowledging this accident.   Besides that, there were several housekeeping errors like not leaving floor mats, face towels, enough bath towels, dirty sheet, and a broken faucet. You are probably better off…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Satoshi
Detailed Review: Very nice service. I had drink in drawing room and listening to piano everyday was amazing experience. Sushmita the lady is very polite and everything was great! The ambience is great and nice stay overall I am from Japan nd I love this place

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Param
Detailed Review: One of the worst stay ever .such bad hospitality was not expected ... staff is not cooperative at all.. not at all responsive to guests problem .. i am here since 2 days and my car had been parked by my driver as per guidance by hotel’s parking staff in the parking and when i asked my driver to bring car back as i urgently needed to go in a event ..parking officials had demanded for 2500 as parking fees , which is not at all accepatable ..like for what i have to pay ?? Ive been staying in the property for 2 days .. and certainly its Not the way to greet the guests ? Since last 3 hrs parking officals are not releasing my car . ..very poor service .  Who is liable to guide the guests drivers to park at right spots .. its the hotel’s staff duty to duly guide the drivers where they…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Dshah
Detailed Review: We’ve stayed at this property a number of times on our visits to Mumbai. Every time the staff go out of their way to ensure our stay is comfortable. Upon arrival, the staff at reception were waiting for us and gave us an early check in. Neha at the reception was exceptionally polite, courteous & patient with the family. We had a family suite this time on the 12th floor and the first few nights we experienced issues with the power in the room. The team tried to repair it but unfortunately it seemed to be a major issue and we had to be moved to another room on the same floor. Butler services were slow this time. It was a busy period and it did take a while before someone answered the calls and attended to us.  Breakfast as always is an amazing spread with varieties like Lebanese,…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: regulus08
Review: Luxury Property But Can Do Better!
Detailed Review: This is a great property in terms of Location, gives you a ultra luxury feel and with all the great art; the lobby could rival a minor museum for its collection of Raza, Paresh Maity, Hussain and more.  Rooms are big and spacious and come with everything which is expected of such a property. Breakfast spread is really good and the extended hours (till 11am) is perfect for weekend stays. What didnt work for me was the Housekeeping or so called Butler service. Which i think lemon tree probably does better than Regis! Mostly they dont pick-up and when they do, nothing really happens! you can wait hours, literally. PS: I would not have written this review if there was a feedback form sent by Hotel post stay.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Harsh
Detailed Review: I have recently stayed At St. Regis and it was everything I expected from one of the best hotels not just in Mumbai but in india! It was my first time staying here and I don’t have anything bad to say (Prathmesh) my personal butler was great he helped me everything I needed and made sure my stay was nothing but comfortable I definitely plan on coming back again.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Hafees S
Detailed Review: Great property. Ample access to central businesses. Comfortable opulent room. Wonderful staff. Greatest breakfast buffet I have had in a long time.  Concierge services were very knowledgeable and useful. Room service menu was excellent

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Vidhushree A
Review: One of the best Asian fine dine restaurant in Mumbaj
Detailed Review: Amazing food, great vibe, lovely music, excellent hospitality..this restaurant has everything and more. Special thanks to our host Ankit who took extra care in serving us.  Amazing amazing dim sums, chicken, noodles, the coconut dessert and the mocktails 😍

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: akshayer2018
Detailed Review: Happened to be at the St Reges yesterday for what I can easily call one of the best dinners I've ever had! The oegendary chef Massimo Bottura was dishing out his art on the plates at By The Mekong & this could only happen courtesy the fabulous team of St Reges! A fantastic evening that all of us who were there would remember forever!

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Amit Aggarwal
Detailed Review: My stay was excellent.  They took special care of my needs. Ameyaa was very supportive and she made things easy for me, during my stay. Every minute requirement was taken care off.  Best services  All the best

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Anvesh R
Detailed Review: Definitely worth every penny. Beautiful property and hospitality. Especially Badal and Pratham made our stay extremely comfortable. Unparalleled service by the two of them. Will definitely stay there next time we visit mumbai. Thank you once again for making our stay memorable guys.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Anil
Detailed Review: Very efficient and prompt service. Great staff. Ms Sushmita in particular. I have been frequenting this hotel very often for business meetings. Always found the staff to be helpful and prompt. Would definitely like to recommend this to my friends.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Esha chainani
Review: Amazing hospitality and warmth at St. Regis
Detailed Review: We had our engagement ceremony at seven kitchens at the st Regis and it was amazing - all credit to Namrata who helped us plan it and executed everything so well. The food was great. The service was excellent. From the manager Sanjog to the servers - they made our day. Would definitely recommend

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sanath Kumar
Review: A fantastic Hotel with all boxes ticked
Detailed Review: A great place to stay in Mumbai. This property is a 5 star one, with all boxes ticked. The staff, the warmth, the food and the rooms are all above par and excellence.  I had a mind blowing 2 night stay with the best luxury experience.  Rooms are spacious and have all amenities included. Could not find much to complain about.   The only 2 points which I would add here  1. The building does not look like a hotel. More like a business centre. And the location is also not ideal (next to a mall) 2. There are too many lifts to access various parts of the building. Hence, could be annoying at times.   But if you have the money . Go for it

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Priyanka
Detailed Review: Me n my friends visited for lunch buffet...staff was very polite and took special care in serving us food....food is great...ambience is great .loved the desserts... especially rasmalai and rasgulla...

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Achim
Detailed Review: Great service with good food. Ilyas was indeed a great guy who’s service was amazing. The only problem I have is deluxe room comes without fridge plus tv is way too small,compared to other hotels that charges the same price.  Thanks Room no. 405.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Subhasmita
Detailed Review: This place is excellent to stay. I was there for a day its was a pleasant stay with this hotel. The poolside cafe is very nice staff are very corporative. I was in Lunch time the thy service its was really excellent. All the food are hot Mr Samareh cane to me to took the feedback about the food and the stay when I have asked for hot roti he has got they personally in 2 min excellent. The hotel staff are very courteous. Even whenever I have asked anything they always deliver the thing's. Thanks to team . will see you again.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Anshu Saraf
Detailed Review: The property is below average. The services at the front desk and the staff are arrogant. Washrooms tap doesnt work properly.  For hot water, you need to turn towards green side and vice-versa. Which you Imagine, what happens if you need cold water.   The linen and towels are dirty to an extent that can be used for just floor cleaning.   Breakfast Restaurant staff was very rude.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv

Detailed Review: The stay was comfortable and service true to the spirit of the VITS as always... Poolside restaurant was amazing..... Hotel is very close to airport... Eklavya vikas was very helpful and courteous. Definitely coming back...

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv

Detailed Review: The stay at vits was really comfortable and awesome. The front desk staff was really helpfull all the rooms were neat and maintained. Would like to refer some names of staff jiya, Digvijay, and Eklavya

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ala A
Detailed Review: Excellent services. Nice staff. Helping me alot. I really recommed them. Thanks for reception staff mr digvijay jiya and vikas are really helpfull thanks a lot for giving the best service... will definetly come back soon

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv

Detailed Review: I'm a frequent visitor for Vits... Nice ambience of lobby... And hotel situated at prime location. Check in and check out were smooth as usual. Room was neat and cleaned. I would like to mention Eklavya vikas from reception for helping us.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv

Detailed Review: The staff starting from reception to housekeeping to room service were all excellent. Reception staff was very helpful...... specially vikas and Digvijay....hotel is located in Andheri near international airport...overall experience was superb.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Suresh
Detailed Review: Had a very pleasant experience at Vits where as a family . We reached early and the reception took proactive steps to allocate room before the checkin time. special thanks to Duty manager Mr Viraj.... Thank you for making our stay a memorable one!

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Shobhadevi
Detailed Review: Had a great time at VITS . This hotel is really good for a short stay as it is near to the airport and even provide airport transfers. Special thanks to Mr. Rahim as he assisted me really well. Also Mr. Paresh and digvijay from the front desk staff are also very helpful.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Nishant Tomer
Detailed Review: Food is amazing with pool side view. Staff is also coperative, must visit thanks to all of them. We would love to visit again and agin.thanks samaresh.all the hotel team are excellent. Even the buffet is amazing.this is my excellent experience

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: vipul d
Detailed Review: Good Hospitality , Very good Food , Good ambience  Good general upkeep , near to airport and other markets . Staff is very coordial , helpful and polite  With ipl they have screening so enjoyed that as well

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv

Review: Loved the experience with vits Mumbai
Detailed Review: The hotel rooms and breakfast both were amazing  Had a lovely stay at vits  Hope to come back soon  Orchid and vits are the best hotels in the vicinity to the airports.They have a clean room,amazing staff ad breakfast

Detailed Review: I came for lunch  at poolside restaurant it was amazing  service  was great by chayqnika and Gavin. Food was excellent mainly chicken Tikka  masala thanks  to chef for food. Ambience  was awesome. Definitely I'll  come again...

Name: Rohitghayal
Detailed Review: I stay at Vits hotel my experience are very good I like the Vits hotel staff very good and friendly I like the service and very good food………..I like the poolside restaurant … thank for the service …..Soniya 🥰🥰

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ranjeet kumar
Detailed Review: Had a wonderful stay at the hotel. The ambience and the comfort level was great. Food was tasty and had a wide variety. Reception staaf was very supportive.. specially vikas.. The location is beautiful of poolside... Would definitely recommend staying here.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: atulkyadav90
Detailed Review: Vits hotel has provided us with a very pleasant stay. The breakfast menu is well spread and the guys managing it ensure that your satisfaction is paramount. Highly recommend the hotel and the courteous staff.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Elizabeth K
Detailed Review: Had a great stay in the hotel just cause of the staff...there is nothing much to look forward in this hotel but just because of the staff this hotel still has its existence specially at reception Mr. Rushad and Mr. Digvijay were very gracious and helped out alot and at the food department Ms. Chayanika was very courteous.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Bhavik
Detailed Review: I visited with the family at VITS found nice location near by the airport and also lobby ambience was too memorable. We found good room and check in to till check out was too good and smooth. We ouod love to come back again.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Armaan Dhillon
Detailed Review: Had a lovely time with my loved one. Will visit VITS Mumbai again. ❤️ Staff is courteous and helpful.  Also big thanks to reception to upgrade us to executive room. No complaints so far except that food menu should have pork/beef options as well.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Shweta
Detailed Review: Attend my sister wedding and reception in Vits mumbai amazing experience marvelous decor.  Food was excellent with lots varied in it. The whole banquet team were helpful.specially thanks joy & Rajesh.  Good work done by Vits team .

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv

Detailed Review: Came to attend my cousin  sisters wedding ....love the decor....Food was awesome.........having a great experience.....Poolside area decor looks awesome.....found this place very unique....Thanks to Banquet team and the F&B team

Detailed Review: amazing and brilliant buffet I ever seen and IPL live screan and the offers and buffet spread also pool view and ambiance also very good... and staff is well trained and chef puskar and server ilyas and soniya also very help full. thanks to chef and also the resturant team.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Angel
Detailed Review: Food is great and best place to stay. Staffs are accommodating. Great job to staffs especially Ilyas and the manager. The room was great and has a big space. Room service have the best service.  Thank you for the best service.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Karan tirwa
Review: Buffet dinner at pool side restaurant
Detailed Review: Beautiful hotel good service ilyas and soniya was so supportive to make this the perfect and memorable one. I will highly recommend this place to all the people who want to visit mumbai. The food and and the buffet spread was good and desserts was very good and cotinantal food was very good and teat as well and all the item was good thank you restaurant team. To make my day good.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv

Detailed Review: Pool side view was awesome and the ipl decorate is very good and break fast was buffet speed is awesome and South indian dish is good and lots of verity in the buffet and also room was good conditions and good Enimities placed in the room and alos service was very good specily thanks to ilyas. For given me everything. Thanks to vits team for make make my day good.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv

Detailed Review: I’m a member in VITS. I keep on coming to this hotel. Always a good stay at Vits. The housekeeping team is amazing and very hard working. The from desk people are very good in talking and very friendly. Always a good time in vits.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Yash
Detailed Review: Overall stay was amazing specially breakfast was delicious and staff super friendly Chef Mr. Rohan and Mr. Ilyas. Buffet dinner needs some improvement with the taste and varieties. Rooms were great and hygienic

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Debabrata Sen
Detailed Review: I attended conference at vits Mumbai. I am very happy with the service provides in regards to set up food timing and rest all requirements. Mr Saurendra and his team were very helpful in all aspects would definitely like to visit again.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Mastu
Detailed Review: This hotel is very good for short stay. I enjoyed a lot. The lobby is very well maintain and the reception staff are very very helpful. The food is amazing. Hotel is worth coming and staying in. Would recommend it

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Toshal
Detailed Review: Had a great time,place is amazing with beautiful view along with pleasant vibes ,staffs were very cooperative,with fast service,taste of food and deserts were yummy and amazing ,good place for family .

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv

Detailed Review: Very good place to set and have lunch and dinner soft music and nice pool and nice food and all the staff is good thank to all to make my day very goooood and the food part is very nice and meny type of food is ther in this hotel thank vits hotel to make my day

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Monika Chhimwal
Detailed Review: The hospitality was very nice and staff was cordial and welcoming ( especially Soniya as she attained me). Food quality was superb with lots of variety. The room services was upto the mark. I enjoyed my luxerious stay with homely feelings.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv

Detailed Review: Really good service nd staff. Niraj give us really good service to us and help me. Really tasty breakfast with good view. The hotel rooms are so comfortable and good. Really loved this hotel. Tasty and yummy food. Loved it

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Pearl
Detailed Review: Beautiful place, friendly staff, good food! We’ve been staying here since quite some time and we’re quite happy with the food, stay and staff. One of the best place to live in Mumbai  Highly recommend:)

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sweety
Detailed Review: Food quality was too good.. delicious food. Halwa was too good..will suggest any cooperates to tie up with VITS in terms of formal meets and events.  Really loved it!  Will appreciate the staff and their behaviour.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv

Review: Stay and lunch at pool side resturant
Detailed Review: I came to visite mumbai with my family and had a stay at vits hotel Mumbai . It was a pleasure to stay here . We had our lunch  at poolside resturant  , the food was amazing and we were served by mr.ilyas and Karan  And are truly thankful to him for the hospitality.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv

Detailed Review: Jagdish and shawn is excellent in work and  good service thank you shawn and jagdish keep it up we are proud of you  good smile  take care luv you shawn and jagdish housekeeping good luck thank u for help

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
