Detailed Review: Excellent breakfast options.. Flawless checking process.. Very excellent  service  from steward Gavin  and all other staff was helpful too and the restaurants ambience  was perfect  too suitable  for lunch n dinner timing

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Gagan M
Detailed Review: The food was really tasty, my family and friends really enjoy breakfast. Niraj give us good service to us . The hotel and staff is really good.  The south Indian dishes are so tasty , the dosa are so yummy. I loved it.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Aadil
Review: Visit of Courtyard by Marriot Mumbai
Detailed Review: This hotel is a very good place if you want to find a hotel in andheri east. The staff has very great hospitality and the rooms ar very high quality. We are still currently living here and would like to give a special thanks to Asif and also head chef Akshay. I would also like to thank vishal, Ashok, Namta and Mayur.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: ramsaeiou
Detailed Review: A pleasant experience of stay and comfort and Devraj is a very humble and supportive staff . I have never seen him saying no to me so far. Will always look upon to stay at Courtyard marriott. The service of the staffs are worth mentioning and kept me at ease . Food spread is one of the best I always enjoy.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Nehal N. Shah
Review: Must stay here.. will always return back!
Detailed Review: The courtyard Marriott Mumbai has been our to go place since 2015. My family and I always return back for the hospitality and great service received by all staff members. I would like to mention a few specific ones that made our stay the last 2 weeks one of the best ones. Starting from the managers, Abhijit, Sachin Jadhav, Mayur and Vinod. They always made it a point to check on us and make sure we are comfortable. Other staff members I would like yo mention personally are the hosts in the dining hall, Shreya, Mansi, Yashashree, Sahil, and Mustakim. I always made it a point to talk to them Since they have such a caring nature and always had a welcoming smile on their faces. I would highly recommend staying at the Courtyard Marriott Mumbai, and can say next time I and my family…

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sameer
Review: Amazing staff you cannot find at any other hotel
Detailed Review: My trip started with getting service from two of the most helpful employees ever. Mayur and Omkar. Whether it was food allergies or things not on the menu, these two guys made dishes appear from the kitchen that were cooked just for us even if we were having a buffet. Every morning they would come and ask us to try things that were freshly made. Making us feel at home. I have stayed at this property about 15 times and I will continue to stay only at this property in Mumbai going forward. Hats off to the people who pick employees at this hotel. Then there are two other peoplr Asif at the front desk at Asif at the concierge desk. They both gave us great service and the feeling of tiredness after a long journey was gone because of the things they do to make your stay comfortable.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Gaurav mhatre
Detailed Review: Had a amazing experience of food at momo cafe food was delicious and staf was polite chef akshay suggested starter was so yummy akshay was helpful best place for lunch buffet service was very helpful at cafe

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Salman B
Detailed Review: I will like to thanks sayali duty manager at the time we checked in she was very friendly helpful like to say she is the best Assist to courtyard when I asked for late checkout she has approved it n made my time wonderful . Apart from that she has also given me a complementary breakfast. I will also like to mention that the check in and check out procedure was made way easy by sayali n team thanks n Regards team courtyard mumbai specially sayali

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Abhay Goyal
Detailed Review: Hi All, I generally don’t post reviews & it’s my first one and pleased that it’s a positive one.  I stayed in Courtyard Mumbai during my business trip. The stay was pleasant and staff were very responsive and  supportive.  Now come the best part, I forgot my 2 bead strings in my room. I am wearing these since Moses than 20 years hence I have emotional quotient to these in addition to religious aspects attached to these.  I called, quite uncertain & ambiguous, the front office & I was referred to Mr Mayuresh Gadmule who went extra mile and got his staff to look for my malas and, to my pleasant surprise, got the same delivered from Mumbai to Jaipur within a day.  @Mayuresh, coffee on me whenever we met next.   I am confident now where to stay whenever I am in Mumbai.  Thank you…

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: ps r
Detailed Review: Location,  it’s easily accessible for air travellers, metro rail connection and close to Western Express Highway.the  staff are very courteous and too quick in service , really appreciate. The quality of  food is delectable

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Naresh B
Detailed Review: Stayed two nights at this hotel, which is conveniently close to the international airport. I checked in quite quickly after arriving at 2am. The room was spacious, clean and comfortable. Had breakfast there which served a wide variety of items from continental to Indian, hot and cold. On my last day the staff were chatting about my stay and as I was getting up, the waiter told me to wait as they had something for me. They brought out a slice of cake with "See you soon" written on it, which was a lovely touch. The chef even came out to take photos and wish me well on my onward journey. To have taken time out at such a busy time was so much appreciated. The lobby is very nice. The hotel has a lot of hand sanitizer points and at the entrance for the baggage security check.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Dr Harish Sharma
Detailed Review: It was pleasure staying at Marriort couryard Andheri mumbai , staff is well trained and has service attitude , good and wide spread food and clean rooms , gym , and newly opened Lounge is great experience

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv

Detailed Review: So I had stayed for a day. The  buffet is fantastic at momo cafe. Vinit Patil served us some chef’s special dosa which was delicious 🤤 , Mr. Gaurav Bhatte helped us with the buffet and was always around to help us with lot of care . We were served and treated like a family. Thank you Marriott for such a good food and service.❤️  Loved the awesum hospitality and service ❤️

The lunch at Cafe Momo was delicious. An invitation to the executive lounge was a real bonus. I liked the rooms, especially the one with the pool view. The proximity to the airport is a plus.

I booked executive room with club benefit and surprised to know that they don’t open laung but give food in room that too worst of quality.  There is staff Ashank At reception who has high attitude and has less interest in customer’s comfort more in his style .

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv

Detailed Review: This is the best stay i stayed ever in courtyard. What a room pool side view. Well I would like to appreciate Hemant and Moin from front desk ..Such a fast service and formalities of check in ..All done within five min.... About room service absolutely fantastic well organised  and cleaned room .Very quick service .Thank you so much Vishal and Vinod for your quick service and friendly nature. Chef santosh chef  Akshay chef Mohit are excellent chefs ..Whatever you ask them they will prepare as u wanted Thank you guys. Miss Ashwini you are beautiful charming person so friendly and make comfertable to…

Name: Jainam K
Detailed Review: We stayed at the Courtyard Marriott Mumbai for one night. We had a fantastic time with the rooms and the food. On the occasion of Holi, I was there with my family for a break. We met Mr. Hemant at the front desk, who was quite pleasant and helpful. Although we had a fantastic pool view, our room only featured a King Bed. My mother, on the other hand, recommended that we just ask Mr. Hemant if we might have a Queen bed room. I personally went down to Mr. Hemant and informed him of our concern. He was quick to reply and moved us to the room type we asked. Thank you for all of your assistance, Mr. Hemant. If we return, I would like to express my gratitude in person. We enjoyed a fantastic stay thanks to the Courtyard team.

Name: Apeksha Saxena
Review: Mediocre service and ineffective ac cooling
Detailed Review: I decided to stay at Holiday Inn based on good reviews. However, the stay turned out to be a downer.   Firstly, I was not informed about the airport pick up charges whilst I had requested for one. I did not feel welcomed on arrival. No welcome or atleast water could have been offered since I had checked-in late at night after a long flight. Check-in was so mechanical and nothing was briefed on arrival. I had to figure out breakfast timings and way to my room. Secondly, upon reaching the room, I noticed something very strange I would not expect from a brand like holiday inn. After I entered in my room, I saw the sofa in my room was wet and which really disappointing. To raise the concern, I tried using intercom but sadly it wasn't working either. Later, another staff came to fix…

Name: GSM T
Detailed Review: I dont have time for reviews , however this i thought i must write so here it goes. We booked the hotel 1 day prior, when we arrived at the hotel the booking was cancelled due to credit card rejection. The staff rebooked it which was very nice of them. We payed in advance 1 day in cash, we did not receive any receipt of cash ! Next day we had to stay half day extra so we had to pay 1 more day in advance in cash without any receipt. During evening we checked out , however they had no record of the cash we paid, after 30 minutes of waiting and wasting our time , the staff at counter admitted we paid in full and asked us to go , like we are 3rd class beggars. We demanded invoice which we received then we left.  Anyone paying by cash, please get receipt / invoice copy !!!  Staff at…

Name: Global-Bhatakanti
Detailed Review: Main reason for low rating is no one very less flexibility in early check-in and late check-out. 3pm is a bit odd time for check-in in any hotel. Food related staff is cooperative, room service/facility related staff is also good mannered. Buffet dinner is 1200 plus tax if included in package else 1900 plus tax (costly). Keycards hardly work in lifts. Wifi is fast. Ask for good sky view rooms instead of neighborhood building.

Detailed Review: This is one of the most ideally located hotel as it’s right next to the airport. Be it international or domestic airport, both are at a stones throwaway. The hotel is beautiful and neat and clean. It’s old but well maintained. The rooms are spacious and pretty. They have beautiful restaurants in-house which serve great cuisines. The stay here was pleasant and would definitely stay here again.

Detailed Review: An amazing menu lavish spred and good ambiance.it was best ambience with easter brunch.amazing experience with best hospitality, staff was very nice , thanks for mis kanchan and shubham giving prompt service Thank you 😊

Name: taps7291
Review: Great Place. Good Interiors. Excellent Facilities.
Detailed Review: Stayed for about 15 days at a stretch. Positives: =========== 1. Great interiors lined with money plants and plenty of flora and fauna including a nice water body / fountain in the lobby 2. Excellent, clean swimming pool on the terrace 3. Awesome view of the airport Runway and Planes from the terrace 4. Restaurant on the terrace served some sumptuous food and drinks 5. Rooms are nice, big, wooden flooring and well lit with a nice big table making it conducive for office work  6. The WIFI was also strong 7. Breakfast at both "Vindhyas" and "Boulevard" was amazing 8. Perfect location - Right next to the domestic airport - about 8 minutes by walk   Suggestions for Improvement ============================ a) Swimming pool timings should be 6am to 7pm. Morning 8am is too late - we…

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Kritika
Detailed Review: Extremely supportive and humble staff. It is never easy to manage all the guests with such high standards of service.  The team here is a Champion Thank you Subham from F&B team for the service.  You & your team is amazing ✌️

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: PriyaSoum
Detailed Review: Coordinating a long pending coming together of an extended family is challenging but everything and everyone at the hotel made it effortless. Special mention should be made of Noel who expertly managed the all important pickups and dropoffs. Also, the energetic lady (apologies for forgetting her name) at the check-in who intuitively ensured that the rooms were allotted all together at probably one of the best locations. Prathmesh at Merlins was impeccable in making our group feel at ease. Even the maitre'd at MG's was his effervescent best making sure that the rooftop dinner was a great final hurray. And thanks are due to all the staff at both Boulevard and Vindhyas for the dedicated care and attention to detail. The food and service everywhere was roundly appreciated by every…

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Anjal
Detailed Review: We had  a vkc dealers meet at chambers in orchid hotel,good team work,good hospitality,good service,special thanks to Roshan Lobo and his team,Ayyan and Huzefa was also very helpfull, We will come again for the meet,keep it up team

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: jyotinmehta
Review: Sad present state of a promising property
Detailed Review: With an excellent location and a must visit south indian restaurant this hotel could attract all types of travellers and guests. Unfortunately the management appears to be complacent and owners short of funds to sustain this Ecotel. Furniture and bath fittings appear to be more than 15 years old and ill-maintained.   Covid protocols are flouted as a rule rather than exception. At buffet in therestaurants, staff are lax on wearing masks whilst more than guests do not carry masks to restaurants. With cases increasing in China, HK, US etc. It is hazardous indeed  As an ecotel and to support sustainability the hotel RO water in glass bottles which is worth appreciating. But bottles are not sealed and some have rust marks making guests wonder at detailing by management. Feedback…

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Chakli
Review: Excellent Time spent at Boulevard Restaurant
Detailed Review: We had splendid time at Boulevard  Restaurant, Orchid with very delicious food. Buffet had lots of varieties, we enjoyed them all. The staff was very polite and served us very nicely. We specially thank Mr. Kalpesh Mistry (Manager at Just Grilled Rooftop Restaurant), Mr. Salman Shaikh and other staff members for making our evening really very special  and memorable. We also thank the chef who made various yummy chat items for us. Must visit place in Mumbai. :)

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Diksha
Detailed Review: The service is really nice and the staff is very polite. Thankyou for the amazing experience. Would love to visit again for an experience like this.  Ms. Dakshata took really good care of us and made sure we are served with all what we want.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ajay Cyril
Review: Complete lack of systems and processes - AVOID at all costs.
Detailed Review: The systems here are so wonderful that the front desk assigned my room number to some other guests too. Imagine my surprise when I'm in my prepaid room and other guests walk in freely because their keycards opened my door. Such shoddy processes and security. Then I receive a rude call from the front desk demanding my name. If these basic systems are also not in place, you should shut down this hotel. I'm asking my company travel desk to blacklist this hotel as well. Avoid at all costs.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Nicole J
Detailed Review: this has been my pleasure to post this comment here in THE ORCHID HOTEL  ..the place is nice,classy and elegant. very clean and spacious ..  the staff are all good.. from the reception people namely RUBINA ALI, EKLAVYA KARAN,MAHESH PATIL  this 3 people i met in the reception area,were very accommodating. they really make things alot easy from check in choosing rooms and until this present time that i am here and enjoying my stay.  they were the best people  i met ,the kind of people who doesnt just do thier work but really love what they do . and it really appeals so pleasing to me and my friends by the way they treat us here..   the hotel staffs i met when i order my food,housekeeping and my other needs during my stay  namely  TIMOTHY housekeeping, RAHUL GUPTA, JAGU SIR,ALOK…

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Aishwarya
Detailed Review: Food was tasty and good quantity. Ambience was good. Dakshata was our server for this visit and was friendly and prompt with her service. Would recommend this place for a visit with friends and family.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sidharth Dinesh
Detailed Review: The breakfast had a continental variety with a great serving of eggs, sausages and ham, highly recommended. The watermelon juice as well the cold coffee was blended well, also the location is perfect, near airport

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv

Detailed Review: We had a 2 days budget meet at orchid hotel,very promt service,special care taken by the staff ,Mr Roshan was very helpfull,the tea and coffee served was really good in taste by huzefa at tea counter,keep it up guys

Detailed Review: Good hospitality,great service given by the staff,the ready made tea served by huzefa,was very good in taste,even the food of 2 days we re good in taste ,time to time service,very well manged ,we will continue  our meeting,thanks Roshan Lobo for good hospitality, keep it up

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Arnesh
Detailed Review: It was a comfortable stay. I keep visiting here. The staff is very courteous and the breakfast is great. Nice place to stay around airport with great connectivity to all important places in Mumbai. I recommend this as a comfortable option

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sumit B
Detailed Review: Mr Eklavya Roshan at the front office and Mr Mahesh at the Boulevard are star customer service professionals. The way they go beyond the call of duty to make my stay comfortabl was commendable. Keep up the good work guys... cheers. Sumit Barat

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Narendra
Detailed Review: Very nice hotel near airport and so hamble staff  I would like to return here again. Such a delightful hospitality I came to hotel for business purpose but I will came here for my holiday as well there is one person at reception Eklavya Roshan is helpful and nice to talk special thanks to him.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: MONIDEEPA S
Detailed Review: Excellent property and well trained staff. Rooms are spacious and bathroom very contemporary. Overall memorable stay. The property followed proper COVID protocol. Kudos to the Housekeeping staff for delivering at their best level. We had a great time for sure coming back experience ☺️.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Capt.Rana Rastogi
Detailed Review: I stayed in rm 468 for 5 days.the floor staff..ms.gitanjali..mr.kanhaiya and mr.subash looked after me most helpfully and efficiently. It was a pleasure staying here. Room service was very proper.all staff were polite and courteous

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Shiza
Review: Need to try chaat by Mr.Suresh
Detailed Review: Loved the chaat Mr.Suresh. Having such skills he is a very grounded person.  Also the staff here are really sweet and hospitable.  The food is great and hotel gives a royal feel. Thankyou for having me!💜

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: dxbdoc
Detailed Review: There were several glitches involved with my stay but I have absolutely no hesitation in giving them 5 stars after experiencing the level of service and a very comfortable stay.  My loyalty as a lifetime Titanium Member was well recognized and acknowledged right til the end of my stay. I used my suite upgrade certificates to upgrade my room to the Caroline Astor Suite. in my previous stays it was done automatically but this time I had to struggle and eventually used the certificates. The staff are wonderful and the speed of food in the buffets is uncomparable.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: leshma
Review: Impressive and worth every penny spent!!!
Detailed Review: Stayed at their 1-Bedroom Suite with Race course view. Check in time was more than acceptable!!! We were offered our pre-booked room at close to 4pm though their standard check in time is 2pm. However, during the stay couldn’t have asked for a more wholesome experience.  The suite was huge with grand interior decor. Every single detail in the room from linen to toiletries were taken care of so diligently.The staff also left a welcome note for us in the room. Both Racecourse view and the night skyline view from the room was so amazing. Staff were polite and friendly, Chef Taj specifically deserves a special mention for his hospitality. He took time to chat with us and recommend their must try dishes!! The building also houses Asilo the rooftop bar and By the Mekong restaurant,…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: MiniBaby0501
Review: A home away from home..St Regis Mumbai, India
Detailed Review: We stayed at the St. Regis Mumbai property for 20 nights in March from 7th to the 26th. We have stayed in at other properties in Mumbai but hospitality was top notch!  Coming from our home in Singapore, we (3 of us including my 5 year old son) were warmly welcomed by the staff. The stay was long as we were there for medical purposes but the stay felt just like home. We had a great deal of support from the culinary team, namely the Director of Culinary - Chef Paul, the Head of Pasty  - Chef Santosh, Chef Prema and the team. The service staff at the7 kitchens were always warm and offered assistance to us. We are grateful for their kindness and amazing food!  The butler service team,  including Claudia, Gayatri (and others) were always on point with our requirements (and we did…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: LeeTalker
Review: “Very five star” - next to Mall and Restaurants
Detailed Review: Lovely hotel and felt “very five star” from start to finish. Staff can’t do enough for you. Rooms are big, well appointed, lovely big beds are super-comfortable. Breakfast was outstanding. Hotel is right next door to the Palladium Mall, which has tons of great shops and restaurants. Loved my three nights here in March…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: elf19872018
Detailed Review: Overall a lovely stay.  The rooms are comfortable, the lobby is beautiful and its in a great location  in between Juhu and Colaba area which are two of the main touristy areas.  Kamala Mills is walking distance and has some great restaurants.  Additionally the mall nearby is perfect for shopping and also has some great F&B options. Additionally, the rooftopbar is incredible and in my opinion way nicer than the close by Aerbar at Four Seasons.   The breakfast selection was amazing, especially for vegetarians. Probably the most amount of choice I have experienced in any hotel and the food was delicious.   Generally (around 80%) the service was very good, however not always. All the staff are very nice and polite however not always competent.  There's a lot of "thank you for your…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: sandeep d
Review: Amazing Indian Food at Sahib Room
Detailed Review: We had a formal lunch for two families at the Sahib Room. Amazing Authentic Indian Food and Good Service.  Azam was very prompt in his service. Chef Siqqique personally met us before and after the event.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Cheryl
Detailed Review: Our family had a lunch at seven kitchen at st. Regi, Palatium in lower parel the spread was very good and great ,  especially the dessert. We were served by omkar j. Excellent sevice by him he was very corporative.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Vineet Bajpai
Review: Nice… but nowhere close to Taj or Oberoi
Detailed Review: The hotel is now a faint shadow of what it’s previous avatar, Palladium, used to be.   The only good things about the hotel were the Front Office Manager, Devina, who really did her best to make my stay pleasant, and the black bean chicken as part of the buffet at Seven Kitchens.   I have been a long staying guest at the Palladium back in 2014/15. I came back with the same expectations. But little is the same really. The staff of the hotel are very polite, no doubt, and God bless them for it. But politeness does not make up for real service.   Seven Kitchens, their 24-hour restaurant, has seen the worst degeneration. From the glorious, fashionable, vast & sunny restaurant it used to be, they’ve now cut it down in size, and the decor looks like that of a 4-star hotel from a small…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Swarup
Review: St.Regis a lovely abode away from home n best food ever !!!
Detailed Review: The St. Regis i must say is a wonderful n peaceful place to stay with great staff overall from d moment u enter the premise to ur room service ...the staff is amazing n smiling always ❤.....special mention foe the head chef Mr.Taj whose welcomeness is so warm n kind and the food he prepares with such love n passion makes the restaurants of the hotel a class apart.....amazing food spread at breakfast,lunch and dinner ( world cuisines) so many choices !!! The head chef Mr.Taj goes extra mile to serve u by inventing cuisines as oer ur request on the spot n makes it a delight ....the poaced egg served on banana leaf was one example he made on d spot n its mouth watering n reliahing!!! ....7 stars for the property and the team of staff 👏👏👏🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟❤

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Franciska D
Review: Great food and pleasant stay at St Regis.
Detailed Review: While I do not often write reviews, I feel chef Taj deserves to be mentioned for the excellent food experience at St Regis. The breakfast buffet is fresh and has a widespread variety of dishes from around the globe. His poached egg on banana leaf is highly recommended as is the mutton raan from Sahib Darbar restaurant.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: rajinitp
Detailed Review: Staff was courteous and attentive. It’s a long walk from the taxi drop off to all the way to the room because of the building layout . So it may be challenging for people with mobility issues or joint issues . That also goes for public restrooms in case you wanna use for emergency purpose :( .  It’s a maze to manoeuvre inside the hotel  . Had to change the room initially which was attended well by the duty manager  . The hotel tends to get crowded everywhere be it for dining and lobby there seems to events on n off . So those who are looking to a relaxed holiday . this wouldn’t be the place .  Beds are hard and overused so didn’t feel comfortable. Some of the furniture looked like it needed an upgrade . Didn’t like the bathroom taps . Staff was courteous n proximity  to the mall…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: kamlesh2109
Detailed Review: Sushmita and her team were very warm,  and caring,  food was also good.. The choice of food and quality was good and the portions were also big enough.  We were at the Drawing Room and had a very good time

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Shewale N
Detailed Review: Why is it so difficult to get through tbe operators. I was on hold for 20 minutes straight to get through you bar people. The operator directly transferred without even knowing if I was connected too. That is soo Pathetic. I just wanted to gey connected to check on the availability however never got through the bar people

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Kunal R
Detailed Review: I have stayed at the regis since the past 4 years but I have to say that my stay this weekend was amazing as I celebrated my 22nd birthday there. Special thanks to Badal Thakkar for making my stay absolutely amazing. Thanks to Ameyaa & Khushi from the butler service for having me over at sette Mara for the cocktail hours and Mr Suman for an upgrade with a beautiful view of the racecourse. It’s been absolutely amazing and a very special thank you once again to Badal. Looking forward to visit again.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: khushi
Review: Best hotel with the best staff ever
Detailed Review: Best in the classroom service, restaurants, ambiance, hygiene and friendly staff - special thanks to Fiyana, Ameya, Badal Thakkar, Khushi, and Suman for making our stay memorable and special.   Thank You, St. Regis.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rey
Detailed Review: The ambience of the hotel was wonderful, Good food and the dessert  was  just amazing. The service was excellent ,very professional and helpful  behaviour of the  staff  -  Special thanks to Allwyn .  Amazing Hospitality

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Nitin Khatri
Detailed Review: Superb ambience and really awesome service.. Food was very tasty. Very personalised service by Jeshan and his recommendations were very nice!!! Overall it was a memorable experience and will surely like to come again.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Bhagwan Bansal
Detailed Review: Very good food and very pleasant surprise for anniversary.  We went for a lunch during our anniversary. Vegetarian food was very delicious.   As a surprise, they brought a very beautiful cake for our celebration as a compliment.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Bhavsar
Review: So unkind of St. Regis ,,, not at all ethical
Detailed Review: I have booked hotel on 5th March on early. Morning at 10:00 AM and unfortunately due to very sad uncertain circumstances one of our friend got admitted to ICU and immediately I have called hotel staff and breif them about all things at 11:00 AM itself and I have requested them to change stay date but they have bluntly denied,, even they r not at all ready to helpful,, infact I have informed them that one my friend got accidentally expired and I have to be there very urgently and that's why I was supposed to change or postpone my stay at hotel ,,but very unethically they said that they can't do anything,,, infact they choose their 14k rs over someone's very sadfull event,,, I feel this is very unexpected and unethically way of earning ,, we were not asking to cancel my booking…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Aakash C
Detailed Review: This was our 4th time at The Sahib Room. Great experience. Terrific service. Delicious food. Azam was great with recommendations. We highly recommends for Indian cuisine, esp vegetarians. They keen modifying their menu, which is great.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ravi patel
Detailed Review: Good service, specially thanks to mr badal , for proper guard nd good service.. We r booked 2 room and nice  to stay here , breakfast was yummy , but dinner nd lunch is average test, but no matter, good staff good service and good 👍

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Vikram M
Detailed Review: I stopped by on a busy weekday at the All Day Dining at St. Regis. While St. Regis is one of my fav hotels in Mumbai for its banquet space, I don’t spend much time dining within the city Hotels. My lunch experience was fabulous with a great salad and gluten free sandwich, accompanied by yummy fries.   Big shoutout to Azra and Sushmita who were constantly running around and multitasking. They were hardworking and courteous in their service.   I will definitely visit again, especially for quick meetings or a great evening cup of almond milk cappuccinos.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: DVi27
Detailed Review: Just done with a staycation at St. Regis with a few friends and there are no words to describe how wonderful they made it for all of us. The staff is so helpful and polite and went out of their way to give us a marvellous time and a comfortable stay.  A special to Ms. Akanksha Mattoo who took care of even the smallest detail and ensured we had the best time possible. We’ve come back happy and with beautiful memories of the place, the food and the people!! Thank you St. Regis and see you soon again!!

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: rica
Detailed Review: beautiful hotel greatly staffed. clean and safe  the bell desk Avndesh and Rakesk who always greeted took care of your packages. the concierge Sohan and Nilesh were always on hand to assist with everything you needed the drawing room has great food and Sushmita was always there to serve you with a smile and genuine concern. always asked about your well being Madhav Ganesh and the rest of the housekeeping staff who cleaned and kept the room well stocked and spotless. Lavina and the Inroom dining crew who always knew how I wanted my tea .  From pick up through my stay I felt comfortable and well looked after. a big thank you to all of the St.regis crew. I will see you next year.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: mokooheji
Detailed Review: This Hotel is Amazing.  Central to everything. Staff are friendly. Great restaurants in the hotel. Go to 37th floor to mekong. Go to the Sahib room Indian restaurant. Excellent service by Azam. Palladium shopping mall is right next door with brands and restaurants.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Vijeta S
Review: St Regis Bar a really cool hang out
Detailed Review: The Bombay chowpati sandwich, the hot chocolate, the iced coffee and the lovely gin sour prepared by Pooja.. all dishes and the service and ambience were just phenomenal.  Where as the rooftop bar Asilo is a complete let down for the simple reason, if you are not dressed in Zara and in something shiny enough, you won't even be allowed entry to try out their signature cocktails.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Seema
Review: Staff and food both were amazing
Detailed Review: I was amazed by staff's professionality in serving,  customer contact and appearance.  I will personally thank to hema to help me with breakfast and other things.  I will surely be back and recommend   to others..

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Girish
Detailed Review: I had a very comfortable stay with VITS, Mumbai. Great food and gorgeous infinity pool. Had our dinner at the Restaurant with great IPL offer along with live screening. Staff members are very polite including floor manager. In house dining is very prompt. Rooms are neat and clean. Check in and check out was hassle free.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Anil B
Detailed Review: I had checked in on the 19th to the 26th of march and had a booking done thru RCI for a 1 Bed Suit .On 23rd Marchbefore the checkout I had asked Mr Gopal about an extension in the same room till 4th April.The rate given to me  by Mr Vraj manager onDuty was 5000INR plus GST n 24th and the 25th I left a message with the reception to inform Mr Gopal and the manager that i would like to extend my stay till the 4th of Aril,till then there was no communication from the management on the 26th morning  I went to the reception and informed that I will pay for the extended stay when I come back in the evening.That day I receive a call from Mr Digvijay and M Gopal that since I have not paid for the room now the room rate is 6500 plus GST. I did inform them that no one had asked me to pay…

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Amrit
Detailed Review: Had a really goo stay at VITS. VITS is a hotel very comfortable for a short stay travelers. It's near to the airport and even has airport pickup and drop facilities. Reception staff are quite the people as they are very helpful and friendly. Special thanks to Vikas Jiya and Digvijay.

Detailed Review: Good place and good food and the staff was very nice buffet spread is nice and lost verity in buffet and service was good socially yhanks to ilyas karan vijay and chef lokesh was very polity and helpfull. Thank to vits team for madevmy day good..

Review: Buffet Dinner at pool side restaurant

Coming to the rooms, we stayed at the suite which is simply beautiful and absolutely comfortable. Best Cooperation recieved from Gopal ji from Time Share Division and Rahim ji from Vits. Thank you. Definite heads up for a staycation at Vits!

Name: Pathfinder304958
Detailed Review: Worst experience. Was called for a voucher and invited for a presentation when I mentioned it should not be a scam they assured it is not and provided a voucher for stay and movie. But on trying to redeem the same they say that it requires 7 days advance notice.   Who can book movie tickets 7 days in advance when movies change every week. Pls avoid this scam.

Name: Pramod H
Detailed Review: As always amazing Hospitality and service st the Courtyard Marriott Mumbai Airport. Have stayed here a few times and will continue to do so. They make you feel at home and like family.  Big shout out to Chef Akshay and Chef Rajiv for the personal attention at Momo Cafe!  Also to Abije for the same.  Hospitality Manager Umesh also recognized me from last visit byful name, that is amazing. I highly recommend staying here notify for the proximity to the Airport but as stated above the unparalleled Hospitality that is genuine, not forced and can be be seen in the entire Staff's attitude.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv

Review: Courtyard Marriott is a fantastice hotel

The superb food is really breathtaking with the flavors of India in every bite. This is truly home from home and every single person makes you feel that way. Wonderful atmosphere that gives you the R&R that anyone is wishing whether its for a holiday or business.

Detailed Review: I stayed from 15th - 19th Feb 2022 in the property. I had a great stay & hospitality from the team. The food was amazing & the staffs of MoMo Cafe was very particular to take care of our taste buds.

Congratulations to every member of the team. Special mention to Pratik from Sales, Tushar from Events, Rohit from Ops.. well done !   Best wishes,

Detailed Review: I stayed at the Hotel Courtyard Mariott, Mumbai for one week (16th Feb-22nd Feb)My stay was just GREAT, Food n Hospitality was Awesome. I really enjoyed the delicious food prepared by Chef Ashwin,  If you ask me about the desserts n sweets i must complement Chef Vikas Rawat, As sweets prepared by him like Angori Rasmalai, Raj Bhog were just mouthwatering n celbration to my taste buds.  Last but the best of all was hospitality from Mr. Ronit  Periera and Mr. Nilus D’silva, They are so humble, Kind and sweet people who took care of me n made my stay much memorable.  I look forward to visit again n recommend to my family n friends as well…… Keep up the Good work as always……Kudos Guys👏👏👏

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Vk
Detailed Review: Great fredindly staff especially Asif at the entrance. 🙂 Nothing to compare with. Unique in its own way. Ambience, staff courtesy, check-in was absolutely gracious.  Buffet was just great, everything was just there.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv

It's the best one to stay in Mumbai, well sanitized and following covid protocols. Especially Asif shaikh from concierge to mention, helps everyone.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv

Thank you Jafer& Courtyard Marriott for unbelievable stay

Detailed Review: I stayed at Courtyard by Marriot for 8 days. The staff is extremely polite and helpful specially Mr. Asif, he took great care of all the needs and made our stay pleasant. Name: Explore yourself
Detailed Review: Very poor hospitality including check in experience.They do not ask even water on arrival. you are kept standing at the Check In counter. Staffing is inadequate.Only busy in marriage functions. Missing no charger. do Not other they found the charger or not but yet to get response. TV not working. Engineer did call when we went to sleep after 3 reminders. Breakfast spread and service is most ordinary.

Keep it up dear...God bless Over all its always been a pleasure to come back to this property

Detailed Review: Hygiene is well balanced Had a comfortable stay, Rooms n ambience are awesome.Would like to pass a special gratitude to Amol k from housekeeping, Sayli from front desk and shubham from beverage dept. Well coordinated right from check in to check out,Would luv to come  back definately.The stay was very good one of the best hotel I find the above staff are very well trained they are the star of your hotel 🌟🌟💫💫

Detailed Review: We had a group staying at Courtyard by Marriott AndherI from 14th to 15th February for conference. Vineet Patil and his team ensured timely delivery of services and considering our last-minute changes. We are hoping to come back soon and would be delighted to be assited by Vineet and his team.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: MAQSOOD
Detailed Review: Best hotel in Andheri area,good hospitality,best hygiene, helpfull and co-operative staff.... specially ROBERT from front desk & MAMTA  from food & beverage department who helped me a lot during my stay. THANK YOU ALL STAFF MEMBERS  KEEP IT UP.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Akshay P
Detailed Review: There are various other Marriott properties in the city of Mumbai but I have not come across any that pays as much attention to its guests. Umesh, the elite programme manager, Chef Tejas, Chef Akshay or the support staff of Mayur, Shubham are just a few names among all others who have been on their toes 24/7 to ensure that I have a comfortable stay. The front desk is always the most courteous and greets you with a smile no matter how much chaos ensues during group check-ins. The room service is always mindful of your needs and always goes the extra mile to ensure that they never say no to your request. The housekeeping staff makes sure that the room is up to date and all special requests are taken care of. It just makes me want to come back again and again.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: BOB THE EXPLOERL
Detailed Review: Thanks courtyard marriott front office and f&B team for making best wedding anniversary for me and my wife .and special thanks to Mr Abhijit Patwardhan for making my wedding anniversary special.he very active person keep it up thanks

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Mosam S
Detailed Review: Mr. Ronit Pereira and Mr. Raj Parmar were amazing with their cocktails. The customer experience was par excellence. Kudos to your attention to details. Can’t wait to visit again. More power to both of you!

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Binu Sebastian
Detailed Review: Had a wonderful stay for 9 days. The staff was very helpful and courteous especially Mr Devraj Shetty. Mr Devraj was regularly checking if my stay was comfortable and if I was in need of anything. The food is also good.  Whenever I am back in Mumbai I  would love to stay here!

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Chetan SINGH
Detailed Review: HI   NICE HOTEL   AND NICE TO MEET MAYUR AND AKSHAY THEY ARE VERY POLITE AND HUMBLE PLUS SUPPORTED   And he suggested to eat this at the time of breakfast this is so gud   I like the hospitality  Too gud no comparison seriously   Regard's MOBIZONE CHETAN  9211111110

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: GAURAV
Detailed Review: Never had a better experience in terms of service and staff.  Staff including Ronit & Nilus went out of their way to provide outstanding service. Chef Ashwin was interactive and the custom-made meals provided made a memorable experience. Probably one of the best hotels to stay in Mumbai.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: VenkyRangachari
Detailed Review: What can you say when entire staff take extra care to see that Guests are pampered all the time.  When the Chefs come out and interact with Guests and cater to every whimsical demands of Guests  You think you are living in your personal hotel.   As i checked in early morning on 7 Feb , i was pampered for choice , loss prevention team on arrival ensured safe and quick entry and then like clockwork front desk had prepared my room and reconfirmed that my preference of change of linen and towels once a week would be done.   In the morning as i walked down to go for my run , Mayur greeted me and asked when i would be back so that my smoothie can be kept ready on arrival   At breakfast Avijit , Vinod and the Women staff as always ensured i was fed and watered well.   When you get…

The room… was clean but not even a writing pad and a pencil by the phone… the basic you expect… Covid norms 🤔 During checkin did give a charge for the room … but still every time we ordered food … was told no credit available on your room… mode of payment so on…  Even till dinner order at 7pm they had not updated!!!   The bathroom glass towards the room had a roll curtain… on the outside of the bathroom… a kid can be playing…

Detailed Review: The food and service is good. The team at boulevard is great, friendly and helpful. Food is pretty good, some italian classics and some twists, and for their prices it’s 100% worth it. Love this place and will continue to visit.

Name: Manas
Review: The Lunch Boulevard & the stay overall was excellent
Detailed Review: Excellent food and amazing staff, Harshada was very cooperative overall and I absolutely loved the ambiance and the service overall, a must visit for some delicious food and some exotic vibes, excellent hotel.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Amit
Detailed Review: Very nice hotel, highly needs up grading and updating if they want to stay in 5 star catogery.  most courteous and helpful staff across all departments but especially in the F&B dept. Mixed grill restaurant was nice, Boulevard coffee shop for breakfast was excellent, though the spread of traditional Indian breakfast was nice but heavy unless anyone is working on a farm, you cnt digest it ;) ..so be smart and eat light..  Miss Dakshatta and her lady colleagues in coffee shop were of atmost helpful and went above & beyond in delivering hospitality, i wish i had known there names to write down a few.  Many thanks Orchid, probably you are 5 star only because you have gems of a staff members. Thank you

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: RAMESH R
Detailed Review: 12th  Feb 2022 Special Thanks Roshan & Aniket for the event service. Thanks to Manisha for earlier helping us choose Orchid.  We had family event & dinner at Chancery 1. The list of  positives were endless- well arranged guest tables: great service staff ;mouthwatering starters and well pampered service set off the evening to a great start.  DJ from in-house choice made the event lively.  Dinner was  well made & delicious and well placed and chat counter was a hit. Service staff & managers had gone the extra mile to leave us well served.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sourabh Sakhuja
Detailed Review: Food was fantastic in Boulevard and it tasted so yummy and thank you so much for the kind assistance given by restaurent staff... Dakshata, who did an extremely outstanding service at the restaurent... Keep up the good work!  God Bless You!

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Manali
Detailed Review: Overall the visit was good, but restaurant bar merlins was closed so we went out  Breakfast was fine live counter was good to have. Room was good and service was also good from staff members. I would suggest fruits kept in breakfast must be ripped

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sanjay A
Detailed Review: Got Delighted for my room upgraded to club room from base room … the person Mr Rohit at reception just do it as I had ask him to have room with AirPort view …. Very nice hotel with good hygiene & food .. walking distance from AirPort …must recommend all to stay

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Bhaswati Banerjee
Review: Worst employee in the Orchid hotel
Detailed Review: I, Mrs Bhaswati Banerjee of age 48 years stayed in this hotel  from 4th Feb to 16th Feb  with my son of age 17 years in Room no. 531 this time. This is the 4th time  I visit the hotel  as from the first time I found persons like Mahesh, Wesley, Rohit were very well behaved. Usually  I come for my treatment at Lilavati Hospital.  Everything in the room was good every time  when ever I visit, but before the day of checkout an incident happened  very badly with me and my son at night Mr. Smith who was the duty manager behaved so rudely  initially me in front  of a guest which gave courage to the guest to say that I am shouting there. This time whenever I had to enter my room I had to validate my lock card everytime I arrive  from outside.  When my son asked them they said they have…

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Kaushiki Singh
Review: Great place to being your day with in terms of Food.
Detailed Review: The Food Was Great. I really enjoyed having a perfect meal to start off the day. A better place and value for meal for all the solo travellers and foodies One of the best places must to visit and try out different cuisines with Indian touch.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Veena980
Detailed Review: We had a wonderful experience! Great hospitality, warm and welcoming.  The room we booked was bright and decorated beautifully. Shilpa, Mr. Koli, Mr. Gawde, Mr. Tim all made sure we were well taken care of.  Everything was perfect and we could not have a better setting for our family celebration.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Aayushi
Detailed Review: Amazing service, food hospitality, taste, the speard everything is impecceble! Must visit for a great experience and quality time. Very kind staff and willing! Worth every penny! Do visit! I am gonna visit again sure.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Datta khanolkar
Detailed Review: The hotel is very clean, service is efficient and staff is very friendly.  The food is excellent.Though the hotel is close to the airport and Western Express Highway, it is still in calm and quiet area.   I will definitely like to stay here again and recommend it to anyone

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Nilesh Patel
Detailed Review: I regularly visited orchid hotel . Today I request them that I am ur regular guest so pl upgrade me room . In front office me.Shivam is their and he is soooo cooperative and given very good response. Really this type of employee proud hotel and I pray for his bright future. Shivam gave me very very good service . Thanks

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rita J.
Detailed Review: "The orchid hotel is one the best preferred place of stay in Mumbai for me during my business trip.  The room, ambience and overall services are extremely good.  Special mention to Mr. Deepak Thakur for their Housekeeping services.he is such gentleman. And great asset to the orchid hotel.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Tapan
Detailed Review: My fiance was staying at The Orchid, so I wanted to send a midnight snack from in room dining for him as a surprise from Ahmedabad.  The process was made easy with the great help of Mr Amit Verma from in room dining department. He assisted me throughout and made a sweet gesture of providing a dessert on the house with a sweet note. My fiance was very happy with the experience,  so was I. I travel a lot however very rarely I get to see such helpful and courteous staff. Thanks Amit, you made my day, KUDOS x PS , beautiful picture of the food attached :)

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Seema Vaid
Detailed Review: My sister and I were at St Regis for a Wedding event and wished we could have stayed longer.  Booked by our hosts I  was surprised by the fine details right from the check in to check out. Extremely courteous and efficient  - the entire staff made our stay comfortable and relaxed Never expected a city hotel rooms to be so spacious with a beautiful view.  The buffet breakfast was most elaborate and delectable. The highlight wasToufiq and teams cutting chai !  Definitely going back again !!

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Nihar Gala
Review: This hotel can really try your patience
Detailed Review: The rooms of this hotel are great!! but everything else is a real test of your patience. we unfortunately checked in on a day there was a party at the pool side due to which we were not important at all. we were not allowed to use the pool or sit beside the pool, food service took over an hour the hot food was cold and the cold drinks were hot. dinner service was pathetic at best, the staff was just interested in packing up and not in the service at all. At breakfast items ran out and were not replenished and even check out was painfully slow. overall my suggestion is ----- any other hotel but this !!!

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Anup
Review: St Regis : Lovely place and Memorable experience
Detailed Review: Celebrated our 1st WEDDING ANNIVERSARY at St Regis.It was the most memorable experience.  The team led by NAMRATA BHALLA along with ASHTON FERNANDES and SHWETA made it even more special by offering a complimentary delicious Chocolate cake.  The atmosphere inside Sette Mara restaurant was very soothing and relaxing. Beautiful interiors and accurately placed lighting system.Joojeh Kabab + Braised Chicken Maqloub dishes were outstanding.  My special thanks to NAMRATA BHALLA , who has shown nice gesture of service and made us feel special.  Truly a most memorable experience.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Doldur
Detailed Review: It was delicious,thanks to Sushmita We loved the music& ambiance, this is the best place that we  like in this hotel. The service staff was excellent. Meantime, we also like the masala tea here. The taste is always different. Will come back sushmita

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Garima T
Review: VERY BEAUTIFUL PROPERTY and amazing food but breakfast service needs to be better since the food is great
Detailed Review: I must say that Miloni at the front desk did an amazing checkin where she saw that I had a small baby and she was very courteous she did my in-room checkin where she just dint make me wait . Ameya thanks for making my day even more special with very promot service.  The only concern was the breakfast service even after food being the best I had so far the service was not upto the mark I dint receive my parantha and egg that I had ordered . Waited for half an hour and then I had to leave without having it . Service needs to be improved.since things like this are not expected brands .

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ankur Sagar
Detailed Review: One of the best places to try if you're a fan of Asian food in Mumbai. Great ambience and vibe, equally good staff and service. Food quality is excellent. Must visit! Great view of the city, try getting a window table

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Mary Dsilva
Detailed Review: Had visited this place for my brother's birthday. The buffet spread was extensive with many options in non vegetarian. Loved the prawns and pizza. David was an excellant server and always attended to our requests :) Kenneth too. The staff is warm and friendly with speedy service. Wish the desserts had more option but overall, great experience.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: S_Fph
Detailed Review: I had come for dinner at Seven Kitchens. I had an extraordinary experience that I haven't in most of the hotels around the world!! Nikhil, Gajendra, Easter, Bikram, Shivam, Prathamesh, Allwyn and Jonathan were all very accomodating. Berezida handling the desserts was also surprising us with a lot of desserts. Had a wonderful time overall. Thanks to every staff member I missed to mention as well. Will definitely visit again!!

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: AsherT7
Detailed Review: From check in to check out we had a fabulous experience at St. Regis. We stayed in a racecourse view room and the view was beautiful. The rooms are spacious and we'll designed. The restaurants serve scrumptious meals. We dined at seven kitchens, asilo and By the Mekong and I would like to highlight the service at Seven kitchens and mekong being fantastic. Asilo has a great view and ambience but service was average. I definitely recommend this place for its location, luxury and most importantly its hospitality. A special mention to our butler Hrithik Pardeshi & Chef Taj and the staff that served us at both Seven Kitchens and Mekong. I will definitely visit again for a longer duration and highly recommend this hotel.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Harshada
Detailed Review: What a fantastic stay it was. And all thanks to none other than our superb butler - Mr. Kiran who ensured every request by us was fulfilled and beyond expectations I must say! We celebrated bachelorette of a friend here and Mr. Kiran left nothing to surprise us. He welcomed us into our room with fresh juice which was must needed after a long drive to the hotel. He also welcomed us with beautiful bouquet of roses as it was Valentine’s eve! And a mouthwatering chocolate cake!! He made sure our Spa appointments and dinner reservations were made on time.  Mr. Kiran thank you for being a wonderful host at St. Regis. We would definitely love to be back and ask for you next time!

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Jay A
Review: St regis or Motel 6 you can be the judge
Detailed Review: This has been the worst property I have stayed. From jeopardising my kids safety to the dirtiest room. Ripped furniture. You can see the pictures and be the judge. My kid who is 9 years when asked upon if they want to go to the pool, she said have you see  their walls,  You think the pool is clean. Absolute disappointing in the name of St. Regis . Last time EVER.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: jayraj dabhi
Review: thank you for your support and help
Detailed Review: my experience with this is amazing and I really appreciate that.Travel makes us wealthier. We see new places, meet new people, indulge in new activities. The experiences make us a different person. Travelling isn’t merely about stepping foot on a landmark, but also inhaling the essence of the very place. The culture and the beauty should grow in you and with the help of this its easier to travel.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: prateek_gary
Detailed Review: Had an amazing lunch at seven kitchen post the wedding of my friend. Special Thanks to Farhat, Shubham who take care of us like a family and made the day for Bride and Groom. Also, thanks to Kritika, Namrata, Shardule, Bharati for arrangements.   Always the best.   Thanks again. Keep it up!!

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Parena Sahukar
Detailed Review: Very great food and service provided. The staff was incredible. Adnan was especially helpful and provided excellent service. The food was good and there was a large variety of dishes. Will repeat this place.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: monica4343
Detailed Review: So we visited St. Regis for our 4th anniversary stay for a nite… this was our 1st staycation in Mumbai..   To begin with, we absolutely loved loved loved our stay at this beautiful place. Top notch quality - spacious rooms excellent food…   Since it was our anniversary, Miss Ameya from the Butler service department was so considerate and professional - she made my feel super comfortable - offered us welcome drinks with some cookies and a pastry. She was super sweet and super approachable… We wish her immense luck in her journey..  Mr. Taj Shah - chef at this hotel - was soo sweet.. their food quality is too good. Being vegetarian the spread was so good … we loved their service and efficiency..  On top on this, our room was decorated with a cake and balloons for our anniversary… …

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ashwin
Detailed Review: Regis hotel.Had ordered out Kung pao kitchen and chicken satay for appetizers and chicken and egg white fried rice, nasi goreng and phad Thai noodles for main course. Also had paani Puri and sev puri.The service was good and the ambience looks beautiful and is spacious.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sanjay Guha
Detailed Review: It was a good decision to come to Sahib Room for the occasion of my husband's birthday.  Kevin and Azam were extra courteous and nice and also were kind enough to offer us a birthday cake from the kitchen.  Recommended place for food, service and ambience. Will be back soon.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ajit A
Detailed Review: The best hotel to stay .thank you Noel and suman. We had. A great stay at the hotel.the food and the ambience is great  ,look filtered to staying at the hotel again. Being an ambassador member i have always been looked after .thank you to everyone again.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sandesh
Review: Excellent service, impressive attention to detail
Detailed Review: Planned a one day staycation to celebrate my son’s birthday. I had asked for a higher floor and had asked them to not provide a cake as we are Vegan and I dint expect them to have vegan cakes. Suman from butler services made it sure that everything was as per expectations.  From the get go the service was top notch. The checkin process was a breeze. The double upgrade resulting in our room being on the top floor was a pleasant surprise.  The property is very well kept. The swimming pool as well as the jacuzzi kept my son busy and not to forget the amazing view of the Haji Ali, Racecourse and the sea.   The cherry on top was the breakfast the following day. I understood the true meaning of the seven kitchens name. We were spoilt for choice. I want to mention Taj Shah (chef) and…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Moin Shaikh
Detailed Review: Gajendra was very hospitable  overall amazing food and hospitality.will definitely like to visit again had and amazing evening. Had a good time for the event i had visited with my spouse. Will like to rate food and staff 10 on 10

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Cain J
Review: The St. Regis just doest not seem to astound us
Detailed Review: Writing this review on behalf of My Mom on her experience and stay   It was a long time when My Mom and aunt actually just galavanted away on their own.  And I decided that we would just book them together for a night at the St. Regis.  The experience that they had was absolutely amazing right from the front office taking care of their check in with the choice of room provided.  They both decided to roam around the hotel and merrily just went to the Seven Kitchens and they just could not stop talking about it .  I think the team there just took to them or they took to the team and it is just awesome , would like to state a few instances of the team there:  1. Bhagyashree: Made sure to inform them that they reserve a table for dinner in time and made sure that they got the same.…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Jugal Ruparel
Detailed Review: It was my anniversary and I thought of lot of places but zeroed down on St Regis as our staycation and must say it was one of my best decision. While checking in we were asked if it was a special occasion and I casually mentioned yes it was and we are celebrating our togetherness. Little did we know they would make our day so very special. Butler Prathmesh made sure we knew  everything about our room and hotel. He also briefed us about a special tradition that hotel followed of opening a bottle of champagne at the same time in chain of hotels all over the world. We were so glad to be part of it. He alongwith butler Hritik had arranged balloons and delicious cake for us.They also sang for us. We thought the surprise was over, but it seemed just the beginning. We explored the…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Pratik mehta
Detailed Review: Excellent food, excellent service,remarkable experience..the chef and his team made my dining experience very memorable..no reason to complain and loss of words at how good everything was..will definitely be back..thanks team 'sahib room'

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Harshidh
Detailed Review: Amazing! One word to describe our experience at St Regis - Seven Kitchen. The food and service was impeccable.   A big shoutout to Gajendra for the amazing hospitality. I would really recommend visiting seven kitchens whenever you’re in Mumbai!

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Nadeem Deshmukh
Detailed Review: Had a great time at St Regis (Sahib room) food was very delicious thank you Chef Taj Mohammad and all team Atmosphere was very nice presentation of food was very impressive and of course hospitality was awesome 😊

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Paresh612
Review: Superb service by Allwyn , Sandeep and team at Seven Kitchens
Detailed Review: My wife and I went to Seven Kitchens to celebrate our anniversary. Once the staff knew this they arranged a very nice table, away from the crowd.  Allwyn and Sandeep almost exclusively waiting on us rendering superb and sincere service. Thanks St Regis for making my anniversary  experience special.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sharmeen M
Detailed Review: Lovely view especially at night Awesome food esp arabian prawns and satay chicken Must visit with family Good family outing Fine dining Excellent service Will definitely come again Bit pricey but moneys worth

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Priteck
Detailed Review: We stayed at the St Regis, Mumbai for 2 nights. It was great, with excellent service, great food and an overall great experience. Definitely worth a revisit. Special shout-outs to our butler, Prathmesh, Abid at Seven Kitchens and all the staff in general.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Isha
Detailed Review: Really enjoyed our time at Sahib with masterchef Taj, who customised the menu excellently for my vegan diet. The dhaba dal and the martaban chole were our of this world. Food was timely and ambience was excellent as well!

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ishita
Detailed Review: The room, amenities, and cuisine were fabulous. The staff was very friendly and Dhanraj, our butler, was particularly helpful, catering to our every request. The overall stay was very pleasant and memorable

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Pallavi M
Detailed Review: Place has the best selection, width of menu, variety and taste. Love almost everything on the menu. The dessert section is unending. You won’t be able to eat everything in one go. You’ll have to make a couple of trips. Great ambiance and music to go with the food.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sumithra
Detailed Review: We celebrated our anniversary dinner here - the team was so thoughtful and made it very special for us with Stefan on the guitar and singing a beautiful song to make our evening memorable . The entire team was also wonderful in taking excellent care of us . Food was excellent too. A very memorable dinner for us at By The Mekong.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sakshi
Detailed Review: We had great time in St Regis. It's a beautiful property in SOBO. We had dinner in By The mekong. They serve best Chinese & Thai food. Prathamesh , Aditi , Sanket ( By the Mekong) & Hrithik are the rockstars they were so cooperative & caring. Prathamesh was always present to help us & guide us. Breakfast at 7 kitchen was amazing. They have wide spread so don't miss it. Overall it was an Excellent experience. Special thanks to Aditi Rampal for special treatment on our anniversary ❤️

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Peter
Detailed Review: Coffee and cookies are amazing! We are staying in Regis hotel for months and sushmita is very kind to us. We love hanging out in Drawing room very often very nice ambience and heartful services! All very nice hygiene standards and well maintained girls

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Priyansha
Detailed Review: Azra was an amazing host to us. Had a great time and got to witness the evening ritual. Thank you for the coffee. Caramel coffee could be less sweet. Will be coming back for more for sure. Cheers!!!!!

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Aakash D
Detailed Review: Very comfortable and lovely experience. Love the hospitality and friendly of staff. Really appreciate their work to make our stay luxurious and comfortable. Check inn time also they corporated alot and thanking them again for packing breakfast for my father as he had a very early check out.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Manish Manwani
Detailed Review: It was a very pleasant time we spent at 'By the mekong'. Many thanks to Sanket and Pratik for excellent service. Our day was made special. Food was great and please do not forget to try the authentic Thai dessert named 'Thap Kim crop'.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Anand N
Detailed Review: Amazing Buffet spread at the Seven Kitchens. Very warm hospitality and taken good care by the staff. Special Thanks to Nikhil who really made sure that we enjoy our food and making our anniversary special. Thanks.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Chandni G
Detailed Review: The food at setta mara was fabulous and the the service by Mr Rohan was par excellence! He was superb! And very attentive. It was a splendid evening. The food is exotic and with a twist. We were upgraded to a private dining room too.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Yamini Upadhyay
Detailed Review: We had a really nice experience at Sahib Room and Kipling Bar. The food was phenomenal, the galauti kebab was absolutely delightful. the staff, especially Abhilash was very courteous. We would definitely love to visit again.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ronak K
Detailed Review: Amazing food. I just tried the chicken kathi roll. Pheeww!!! Blew my mind. So tasty and flavorful. Azra was the one who suggested it to us and such a polite, helpful girl. Amazing suit too. Loved it!!!!❤️

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Kinjal
Detailed Review: Overall had a great experience with the staff was incredibly helpful,and the amenities were great. appreciate the front desk staff, for being really helpful and polite...the room was wonderful.........

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Faye
Detailed Review: Had a great time during my stay with vits...i was celebrating my birthday and my stay was made memorable, staff was very friendly especially the reception and the good & beverage dept. Mr. Rushad had given me a nice room upgrade to one of their suites and I loved it... over-all it was excellent

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Helen M
Detailed Review: Decent place to stay.  Friendly helpful staff.  The pool is currently closed due to COVID but I had a comfortable stay.  Convenient for airport.  Would be good to have some outdoor space on roof available and update room decor a bit.  I didn't have breakfast so can't comment on the food.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ankesh Dandekar
Detailed Review: Nice stay at hotel and good service provided  Mudt taste food, it's tasty miss bhoomi has given me good service and take care of all the things  I will recommed the stay at VITS and see you soon again by next month

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sunil
Detailed Review: The Best Breakfast and Excellent service by the staff  I like the dosa and eggs prepration very good very helpful staff and hygiene . poolside resturant are very good 😊😊😊 Thanks soniya and ilyash for the service

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Girish Sudhakaran
Detailed Review: I stayed for ten days.. An amazing experience i got also nearby the airport which is the best thing for traveller. Over all experience was just amazing. Thanks to the all FO team. They are polite and helpful.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Santri min
Detailed Review: It was a very nice experience  Mr surrender okay and team were very courteous and prompt in their service I would like to recommend every one for this hotel Thank you and beat wishes to the team. Will definitely visit again

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sumeet hans
Review: Brask fast at pool side view cafe at Vits hotel
Detailed Review: Food was good service was good and break fast buffet is awesome and verity buffet was good and buffet spread was a alot of South indain dishes was good and also continaltel food was very good and egg pepration was awesome and spicly thanks to Ilya and Rohan chef.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Cleto Gracias
Detailed Review: Very good. Chef Rohan Thakur found to be very efficient. He has a very professional approach and observed that he keeps all the guest satisfied to a great extent. All other waiters and staff found to be very good

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: sunil tayal
Detailed Review: Hotel is good , staff is very nice , but washroom is not comfortable, need to improve washroom quality , breakfast is amazing . Value for money hotel . Personally i like this hotel , its very near to t2 .....................

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Seema tayal
Detailed Review: It was a nice experience to stay here.  Food is also very nice the room which i got was nice and clean  , breakfast was very mummy with lots of varities ,server was fantastic . thanks to saurendra Ojha and his team

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Nitesh
Detailed Review: Attending wedding in vits mumbai at poolside venue great views with fountain food was delicious. Decor is good food counter has variety.   Staff service were good and helful.   We recommend place to everyone

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Shandhank
Detailed Review: Amazing service and food I like the poolside wedding very good stuff and manager I enjoy  poolside restaurant and food thanks soniya for the service Mr. Surendra allso very  good given service thanks❤❤❤❤

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Bharat D
Detailed Review: House keeping service excellent   Supervisor munish and attendant kaikash are very good. Everyday clean thoroughly room changed bedsheets and toiketeries. Rest all found satisfactiry.          ……………………………….,…….,,………………..,………………………………..

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Vaibhav wani
Detailed Review: It was a very nice to stay here. Rooms was clean & staff is also very helpful. Breakfast is awesome. Staff are very humble and friendly, food is good service are super they are support for every time.... Thanks to udal for his service
