Review: Wonderful stayed in vits. It's always pleasure to stay here.
Detailed Review: Thanks to vits for making my stay wonderful. It's always pleasure to stay here. Room was clean and well maintained , buffet breakfast is mummy with many varieties , lovely server  nice ambience too thanks to Mr udal for his kindness thanks you

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: San
Detailed Review: Best placr to celebrate valentines with your loved ones with lavish buffet. Great hospitality as always. Polite and humble management . Everyone is good from valet tibthe managar. Good decoration, good music and good food.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Arya
Detailed Review: All experience was awesome so much fun we have our sister wedding  delicious maharastrian cuisine .so much variety in the buffet.  Special thanks to saurendra ojha and Priyanka from banquet team to make this day special.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Raj
Detailed Review: Attending wedding of my sister.. amazing decor and special food was delicious.  Staff service was excellent and prompt.  Great service by Vits staff   Thank you so much to Priyanka,Joy and banquet manager

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Anuj
Detailed Review: Attending engagement ceremony in vits mumbai it was so much good ambiance of hotel and lobby decor was good.food was so delicious that so variety and quality of service also excellent overall we enjoyed it  Thanks to priyanka and team for excellent service

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Jessica
Detailed Review: Having breakfast at poolside with lavish buffet fountain view was great so much variety in food with live counter staff was good specially thanks to iilyas and priyanka . Ambiance at poolside it was great

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Navin
Detailed Review: Vits is the best one to stay  for business travelers  very near to the airport  , Got a nice room to staycation the breakfast is super with mummy food  service is excellent for the restaurant staff  special thanks to Mr vijay. Udal. Rohan and his team  thanks you guys

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Vergo
Detailed Review: We are having conference in Vits Mumbai on regular basis but after pandemic we start using Vits Mumbai service it same as before we loved the food and meeting amenities.so having different size Venue as per requirement will provide.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: india
Detailed Review: We went for valentine's night it was just an awesome ....loved the ambience, great food by Chef Lalit, Chef Salim and Chef Lokesh.....lovely service by Udal.....great live music...the singers was awesome..will definitely visit soon back with my family. Thank you for everything...

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Yusuf khana
Review: Valentines celebrate at Pool side restaurant
Detailed Review: FOOD WAS VERY VERY GOOD, DELICIOUS FOOD SERVICE WAS EXCELLENT BY ilyasshaikh and joy  has maked amazing choice of food selections by  and  view was very good location was also very good very and ambition was really very nice and decoration was very good. Thank to vits  restaurant team to make my night good.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Preet
Detailed Review: Valentine at poolside .Loved everything about the buffet, right from the appetizers to dessert. The staff was warm and welcoming, especially Ilyas Shaikh. Joy , and jaish  do an amazing job... Lovely 😍 .

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rajnish Shrivas
Detailed Review: Worst experience at Hotel in 4 star category ever stayed till now. Bad Hotel ..rude behaviour by staff enforcing undesirable policies. Behaves like they do favour on you even you pay to them I will never ever stay in VITS hotels.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Shilpa
Detailed Review: Awesome Experience....Nice Atmosphere and peace...Had a wonderful and romantic date night with my love. Good Food with Great Staff Service. Thank you Udal,Kunal and Ashish for making our day special. Thanks

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Roohi
Detailed Review: Had an amazing dinner. The valentines decor was very romantic. The live singing really set the mood. Ilyas Shaikh was really good. His service was awesome. We enjoyed a lot.  Overall it was a good experience

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sukant Mishra
Detailed Review: The buffet had a good spread of welcome drink, starters, chaat, italian and North Indian main course…and the food was delicious… soniya served as well and was polite and courteous throughout the dinner service..

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sanjay M
Detailed Review: The stay was very comfortable and staff is courteous. Breakfast is very scrumptious. Well served by Mr. Udal and Mr. Rohan at the buffet. I recommend for business travellers and families................

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Hitesh
Detailed Review: Great room, very spacious, amazing view Our stay was made memorable by the service provided by the staff from front office Cleanliness of the room, restaurant was very satisfyingOverall a very good stay

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Himanshu Aggarwal
Detailed Review: The Ambience of Hotel is good but the rooms are not upto the Mark They need some serious Modification Moreover The Breakfast Buffet is very delectable Chef Rohan served us delicious Cuisine But they need to add some more beverages

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Chandan
Detailed Review: Nice location and good ambience in lobby area. Hassle free check in and staff were reall very good and helpful. Food was good and room maintained well. I would love to recommend VITS as i stayed and good experience.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Mithil Mohan
Detailed Review: Nice experience and good services. Food is excellent and staffs are friendly. No delay in any kind of services. Room is clean and well furnished and room service is good enough. Overall its a good place to stay during quarantine.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Radhakrishnan R
Detailed Review: Vits hotel is one of the best hotel to stay ,Room was very spacious and well maintained by the house keeping department , breakfast is too good in poolside with lats of varieties to choice ,server are to polite and friendly  thanks to Mr Udal Rohit, Saurendra ojha and Rohan.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Kamal Singh
Detailed Review: I had a short stay in vits mumbai  they give me nice experience as feel like at home ,room was specious and clean too , buffet is mummy with full of varieties , Mr udal  Rohan ,Sachin kunal they are doing fantastic jop , Mr saurendra Ojha whom i met at the desk he was ensuring that i was well take care of ,i same up with 5*  thanks for guys

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Amarjot Singh
Detailed Review: Good service , great ambience , great rooms , worth staying at . Rohan from breakfast service has been very helpful , prompt and ready to help . Everyone is very helpful and Udal from breakfast service also helps very much !

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Snehal Adarkar
Detailed Review: My Stay at courtyard marriot was the most remarkable only because of their outstanding services and chatming staff out there. Vinit Patil had been an amazing and helpfull staff throughout. We really find such customer oriented staff nowadays. He made sure we were always comfortable whether in the room or in the kitchen for breakfast....always at our back to ensure everything is rightly done❤️ Surely gona recommend it to others and seeing more to stay with you'll. Best food and best hospitality ever❤️ Thankyou Vinit and team❤️

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sharon Roy
Detailed Review: We chose Courtyard by Marriott to celebrate our first night of wedding and it was nothing less than perfect. Our booking was seamlessly smooth and given as per our preference, we received a warm welcome into the room with balloons and pretty decor of the rose petals and all of this was just a plain surprise to us. We also received a personalised best wishes message from the General Manager - Victor Chen which was also very kind. Just expressing our heartfelt thanks for the kind hospitality and services offered through our stay :)

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Shruti
Detailed Review: We stayed here for our anniversary for 3days and it was definitely one of our best decisions. From the time we checked in everything was perfect n hospitality was at its best. The management there was quick and responsive, even though they had to attend to a whole crowd of wedding guests we were attended without any wait n within 10 mins we had our room keys. On knowing that it was our anniversary Mr. Ashank Patil the duty manager there arranged for an upgrade of our room to a Suite 😍 and a special cake for both of us. It was definitely a sweet gesture and made us feel very special. The other days of our stay as well the staff always ensured we were at our comfort. Thank U so much Courtyard by Marriott and Ashank for making our stay special and memorable.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: pratz28
Detailed Review: I recently had a mesmerizing experience during my stay at Courtyard Marriott on my wedding Anniversary. We had opted for a breakfast meal package and  am glad we choose to eat here. I would rate them 10/10 on hygiene and 10/10 on customer satisfaction. Would like to pass on my special gratitude to Ashank the Duty manager who made our stay extra comfortable and made special arrangements for our anniversary with a complimentary cake and a beer. I loved the gesture and the cake was extremely delectable.  Would love to go back to the same place again given thier warmth and hospitality. Thank you Ashank once again for going the extra mile and ensuring we had a pleasant stay here without which this stay wouldnt have been so memorable for us. Cheers to the entire team.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Tanvi Matreja
Detailed Review: We had a post wedding Lunch, just a casual lunch at ummrao on one of the Sundays in January. Must say we had the best food and service out there.  Not to forget yogesh who was heading the team did a fantastic job in coordinating throughout the event. With the entire staff out there Amin, Shubham, Adnan were helping us with what not.  Thankyou for all the chefs who were involved for such amazing food including dal makhni, butter chicken, paneer and beetroot halwa. Never imagined that we will enjoy the Tomato daniya shorba ;)  Overall the event was soo good and the best of all! Thankyou so much for a memorable experience at Courtyard by Marriott.  You will surely have us back very very soon

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Bhushan J
Review: Amazing stay at Courtyard by Marriott Mumbai. Must recommended.
Detailed Review: Though I had stayed at this property multiple times, the last stay in January’22  was just amazing.  The service provided by staff and especially Mr. Moin was beyond customer expectations. Right from the confirmation of arrival until checkout, everything was simply brilliant and beautiful.   The staff  at front desk though busy, were quick in check in and checkout formalities.   The food dinner and breakfast buffet was lavish. The food was fresh, hygiene and tasty. Though there were covid19 restrictions on timing of the restaurant, the restaurant staff ensured you get what you need and leave happy.  All covid19 appropriate behaviour were followed.   The house keeping is excellent too. I always use the Marriott BonVoy app for all the service requests and they are full filled on…

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Arnav R
Detailed Review: Right from the start till the end of our stay at the CY Marriot Mumbai was just splendid.  We were made comfortable at the time of check in by Yogendra and Hemant. Early check in was given and not just that, but also we were given rooms facing the pool. My brother was also given room just beside ours, so we all are together. It felt like home.  Inside the room, besides your regular hotel amenities, we were welcomed with a beautiful towel art done by the Housekeeping team. It was wonderful and just the welcome we were expecting.  Rohit at the Momo Cafe was just amazing. He recommendation of starters and food was just lip smacking and we enjoyed every bit of it. Rohit is truly an amazing human being, very humble, kind and treats you like a king. Even during the busy breakfast…

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Harshad desai
Detailed Review: The stay was very good one of the best hotel I find the staff is very well trained a specially thanks to mr Asif and Sachin and Prashant they are the star of your hotel definitely will return I have been stay here for serval time’s

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: ganesh avhad
Detailed Review: Nice and awesome food. Polite staff full of hygiene overall great experience .. good food and Courteous people.Spacious place thank you Dhurav for excellent service.the variety is amazing in terms of food options to choose from.look Forward to many more visits.🤗

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Gleson Gomes
Review: Good hospitality, cleaner rooms and good food.
Detailed Review: I am very pleased and happy with the services provided at Hotel courtyard by Marriott, Mumbai. All the staff are very polite and take all safety precautions all the time. Meals served are very good. Also cleaner rooms and good wifi services. Mr Devraj Shetty had been very helpful and is very courteous  and takes the feedback about the stay at all the times which is most important in the hospitality.Thank you Sir for the hospitality during my visit. Overall the experience was brilliant and enjoyed.  Thank you all.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: ekta g
Detailed Review: One of my best stay near Mumbai Airport. family , food, excellent service at breakfast. Kids enjoyed like anything the play ground near Pool. worth visiting Spa.my spl thanks to Harshul at front desk for express check-in. i will visit soon...

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Swapnil desai
Review: Great place to stay while in mumbai
Detailed Review: My stay at the courtyard has been wonderful the rooms and the facilities at the hotel are amazing, all staff here are well trained and are very helpful and want to say a special TY to yogendra the FOM and also meet chef akshay and chef tejas who were really amazing and also want to say TY for the cake you gave us on departure sometimes small things make a huge difference. My stay was good till then and your gesture made it amazing so TY to your entire team and will be back soon, TY.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Alzira
Detailed Review: Thank u to the staff of this beautiful hotel for making our stay so comfortable.... specially Mr. Yogendra  , Chef Akshay and Chef Naik. We will surely visit again and also TY to the full staff who helped us during our stay here

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Jasline Lai
Detailed Review: This is my first time stay in Courtyard Marriot and today is my 2nd day of stay, I will be having 8 nights of stay in total for this trip. The first impression that I stepped into this hotel is the concierge Mr Davraj Shetty. He really gave us a very warmth welcome by getting our luggage into our room and a brief conversation of the hotel facilities. On the 2nd day, he helped us on our Mumbai city tour arrangements, overall he gave me a very knowledgeable impression and keen to help attitude. The most important is his well spoken English, as a foreigner this is very important, he let us feel that there is no culture barrier in between. I will put more feedback here after my stay.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Abhishek Rai
Detailed Review: Property is located at nice place, staff working their are very helpful and cheerful, food is also good overall ambiance of the place is great. Best part the staff working their making your stay more comfortable.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Vinodhan Vidhyasagar
Review: Good Place to Stay Near Airport
Detailed Review: We booked 2 rooms for an overnight stay during Transit. The hotel is close to Airport.   The Check-in was smooth. They had trouble in finding our booking ( We booked through their own app!! ) about 30 minutes before arrival. We were given adjacent rooms. The room space was good. The restroom was neat. The amenities were plenty! Only issue ( not that it bothered us! ), was that Mini Fridge was broken.   We hardly stayed for 8 hours. So, we could not check out other amenities in hotel. We ordered in-room dining. The taste was good and served promptly.   Ensure you promptly mention "Courtyard Marriott" to taxi from Airport. As there is JW Marriott nearby as well.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Dhyey28195
Detailed Review: I stayed here for 1 day before joining the ship, one of the best hotel near Mumbai airport where you can stay and chill. Rooms are clean and tidy.  Staff are very polite and cooperative, especially desk staff asif helped me very well.  Food is also very good specially breakfast, looking forward to stay again at courtyard Marriott.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ahmed
Detailed Review: Amazing people all over the hotel.  Special thanks to Devraj at the Concierge desk for making the stay more comfortable   The breakfast is better than many 5 star properties I have stayed all over the World

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Abhishek G
Detailed Review: The chef and guest relations manager were very co operative. They address the concerns diligently. They were concerned about the quality of food. The chef visited our room to check and how he can improve the quality of food. I would visit this hotel again for the exemplary service.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ashwini
Detailed Review: Excellent service by staff especially by Mr Purvesh and Mr Ashok they went out of the way each time to make our stay comfortable and delightful 🙂 It was an extremely pleasant experience would definitely recommend others to stay at this amazing place.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Mukund P
Detailed Review: I would like to express my sincere gratitude to Team Courtyard Marriot Mumbai. especially to Mr. Patwardhan and his team who have done an excellent job taking care of dinner & breakfast, they were very professional & helpful. Thank You!

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Miguel G
Review: Outstanding experience: excellent facilities, extraordinary service, amazing food.
Detailed Review: My partner and I stayed in this hotel for three nights, we were provided an executive room, and it was an absolute delight! Also, the service was extraordinary throughout our stay, which made our experience such an amazing one.   We arrived a few hours earlier than the official check-in time and they were kind enough to provide us with a room immediately, without having to wait, which I appreciated greatly.   The room was so comfortable and nice. I was impressed by how the staff strove for customer satisfaction.  One highlight of our stay was the breakfast (paid in addition). Such an amazing selection of Indian as well as international foods. It was a buffet so we could enjoy so many of their varieties of foods, and we loved them all! At the end, Ashok, service manager, was so…

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Altamash Ansari
Review: Courtyard Mariott Mumbai  Great Time with Great Team and Greatest Exp...
Detailed Review: Excellent service and good staff. First time i stay in Mariotts group its really nice experience for both as business trip and for couple outing. The service and amanities are excellent location is easily reachable and transporation facilities is good with optimum rates

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: malhar
Detailed Review: we loved the stay at Courtyard Mariott.food was excellent. Yogendra ; Moin and Prathamesh were very helpful during the stay period. will recommend to my other friends and family to stay at Courtyard Mariott!!

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Pavendhan
Detailed Review: I had stayed here for almost three months.October 2021 to January 2022. People working here are normally very polite and kind to the customers. (I)Room ambience The room neatness and cleanliness is worthy for the month we give. I can give 10 / 10 . (II)All over the hotel housekeeping and maintenance is very nice i.e., meets more than expectation without any compromise.10/ 10 only. (III)Momo Cafe Food As a long stayer,The food was not comfortable for me.Repetitive menus and sometimes noticed repetitive foods also. Regarding Food,hotel management should look into this and change this quality definitely.For one day booking and coming to eat, obviously they cant able to find the flaws.But for long stayers definitely within 2 weeks will find out what is happening in entire food…

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: darpan98
Detailed Review: Had a super stay at Courtyard, got upgraded to the Suite, everything was fabulous and perfect. Special Thanks to Asif at Concierge, Umesh - the Marriot Champ, so warm and hospitable and Abhishek from Cafe - he remembers exactly what I want and how i want it - they all make you feel to much at home

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Dhrumi
Review: A successful Wedding Event - Thank you note to Keyur & Team
Detailed Review: We just want to thank you from the bottom of our hearts for helping us make the wedding day beyond wonderful!!  From the first time we met with you to discuss prices and options for our wedding day, we were always confident that we had picked the best place to hold our big day.  We were thoroughly impressed with the personalized and courteous attention given to us.  From the start, Mr Keyur answered all our questions promptly and we were always treated like a top customer.  Because of this treatment, we never once worried about how the wedding would turn out with regards to food, staff and coordination. You all played significant roles in helping us set up such a flawless & smooth day. Right from the grand ballroom to the amazing food and the spacious rooms made it comfortable…

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ravi
Detailed Review: Food was very delicious really enjoyed the Indian food really amazing tast and nice quantity for two persons and room was neat and clean also would like to appreciate service team ninad helped me in service with his polite nature thanks Holiday inn to make my stay memorial

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Avneet
Detailed Review: The hotel service and staff is very polite and efficient. Very fast and always available at the service. The food is amazing and the offers are also very good.Loved my stay and I’ll be back soon :) Keep up the good work

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Liza
Detailed Review: Great Food. The food was excellent. Pani puri was the best. Covid protocols were take can off. Enjoyed our dinner time here at Saptami.  Indeed a great time.   Also excellent service! Special thanks to Mr. Aftab for his hospitality! He was very good.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Niren
Detailed Review: Perfect stay and Excellent service. Smiling staff all over the hotel.  Manager Mr Kasar helped me for the car it was convenient for a old citizen like me. Will come back soon.Five star service ..I will come in this week

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Walid Juwale
Detailed Review: In room dining is very good. Service is good. Food quality is good. Transport arrangement is very good. Service provided by room service man FAIZAN was excellent. He has excellent talking skill. Stay is very good.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: chetan
Detailed Review: visited with friends got to have a good time and good food , great aura and great service was provided by server henry.would like to visit again and also suggest others to visit and have a nice time .

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: aparnesh b
Detailed Review: Went on republic day. They had a food theme with respect to the colors of the flag accompanied by live music. We enjoyed the salad section and also the Indian non vegetarian curries. We were ably and politely served by Joseph and Deepak. We look forward to visiting again.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Manjunath
Detailed Review: Excellent services of miss Chhavi and miss Samina of the front office made my life very comfortable during my visit. Please keep up the good work ladies. The staff at this hotel are doing a great job during this difficult times.  Best Regards  Captain Manjunath.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Tarun
Detailed Review: Excellent stay. Superb hospitality. Hitesh has been outstanding with his customer service. The breafast was amazing. Vety comfortable rooms. staff was good with service. Loaction of the hotel is nearby airport.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Vignesh
Detailed Review: Had a very comfortable stay at holiday inn mumbai . Staff is extremely professional especially people at desk roma , chhavi , nilesh , hitesh . Would surely come back to the hotel . Rooms are spacious . Amazing breakfast.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Manoj kumar
Detailed Review: I Appreciate so much to aakash for his service because his behaviour is very good and he is very polite guy he is always supporting and motivate the people  but the resion is your food is not good because they give me lunch and dinner same as yesterday

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Nikhil Thakur
Detailed Review: Stay was extremly comfortable . Nilesh and hitesh were very helpful . Rooms were spacious . Breakfast was amazing . Will definately look forward to come back . Nice location near to the airport . Even salman helped me with my luggage at check out

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Karthik C
Detailed Review: We really loved the service and hospitality. Thank you very much for all the efforts. The food was amazing and the room service was great as well. Kudos to the team Chhavi, Roma, Akash and Prashanth.   Kind regards, Hema and Karthik

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Kavita
Detailed Review: The best stays i have had in the recent past...the staff deserves a special mention. They literally took care of everything that we needed. Hitesh at the front desk was super helpful and very co operative serving us with a smile....way to go ...coming back again for sure

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Hardeik P
Detailed Review: Great staff excellent service . Hitesh and chhavi at the reception were amazing . Hitesh was kind enough to help me out with the documentation . Rooms are neat and clean . Would surely come back and recommend others to stay .

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ashwin
Detailed Review: Holiday Inn have always been one of the best..Friendly and respectful staff..clean and big rooms..Good and timely room service..good breakfast spread..Employees like Kinjal and Aakash are a perfect example of service with a smile...Thank you once again.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: jay
Detailed Review: Thankyou for the wonderful experience. Our second trip it was kinda good from last time too including the food, staff, room ambience etc  Hoping to visit soon again. Thanks Mr.Hitesh for hosting us. Had a great one.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sherpa56492510336
Detailed Review: Very nice hotel and rooms are very clean. Talking about restaurant staff like Ravi ,Rajani omastha,Henrry and Deepak are very cooperative and always ready to help and chef Sidharth ,Balu is also very cooperative .very happy to say I am staying in very good property ,really appreciating.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Prathyaksha
Detailed Review: So I stayed in HolidayInn in Mumbai and I had an amazing experience throughout my stay, Mr.Hitesh the duty manager over there was so helpful and took such good care throughout the stay!  Thank you so much for an amazing experience.

Name: divya g
Detailed Review: Had a comfortable stay . Staff is very professional at reception . Hitesh and Akash at reception were very professional . Rooms were neat and clean spacious . Would definitely recommend people to stay holiday inn

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Jeetendra
Detailed Review: Had a excellent stay at the hotel . Room were spacious enough.  Duty manager  hitesh was very helpful during the say . Would surely come back and recommend others to stay at holiday inn international Mumbai

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Raj patel
Detailed Review: I stay here for my business trip I like hotel service excellent staf in front desk 5⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️  For Ajay who help me for medical person and Tribhuvan duty manager help me for smoking good room They help me specially and housekeeping service good and security check also good on enterence  I will definitely recommend this hotel to my friends and colleagues

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv

I have spent enough time in this hotel and I will definately recomend this hotel to anyone who is reading this.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Chitranjan
Review: Excellent service at best hotel in Vincity
Detailed Review: Good atmosphere with excellent staff special recommend to Prashant and Ajay at reception.  Humble person helped during my documention for my visa and flight booking.  Would recommend everyone to stay here ans enjoy. Will visit soon.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rahul
Detailed Review: It was a very calm dinner at saptami enjoyed the food and the service witch was given by aftab, everything was too perfect all the food was coming warm and hot even my wife was too happy with the service given by him , we had a peaceful time all thanks to aftab.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Farheen
Detailed Review: Nice hotel friendly staff and great services , hotel rooms were clean and special mention to house keeping for their services and mr. Ajay was very helpful . Will visit in future and recommend To friends and family

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv

Detailed Review: Here the staff  is really very hospitable to guests.  Vaishnavi, is really a good person and helpful to the hotel guests.  I enjoyed this kind of hospitality. 😀😀 Dhaneshree, a staff member of laundry service treats guest in a very humble and kind way.  Always smiling and helpful in nature 🙂🙂 I really enjoyed here my 24 days of stay,🤗🤗
