Detailed Review: Had a excellent stay at the hotel .. staff was very professional duty manager was help Since the Tum of check in only honoured us a late departure also . Rooms are very comfortable neat and clean . Would surely come back .

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Hirachand Jain
Detailed Review: The staff was very welcoming and the hospitality was up to the mark. The ambiance was very good and the food was excellent. The rooms were clean and they were well maintained. It was an amazing experience.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sayali007
Review: Stayed at the hotel for Birthday celeb.
Detailed Review: The Orchid Mumbai is an amazing property and has 3 restaurants. The staff is courteous and very cheerful. Nilam from Front desk is an asset to the hotel, always looking after every guest satisfaction and the needs. The entire stay has been great.  Looking forward to visit again.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Nad Fernando
Detailed Review: Good to be back at orchid, my third stay and as always very comfortable with the same old world charm. Can see quite a lot of new staff around. Food is the main selling point of the hotel and not so heavy on the pocket also. A must try property!!

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Habib Mithiborwala
Detailed Review: One of the best venue in town , superb hospitality by Shreya Mane and advisor Harish ,Shilpa, Adesh&Romeo from Orchid Banquets . Hygiene at the top and yummy food . Best service in Covid protocols. Thanks Orchid

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Harish siyag
Detailed Review: Our company has corporate tieup with the hotel for quarentine purpose and their room is not as much clean as it should be of five star hotel. After making several calls and reminder they normally serve cold food. It seems food department has no experience of handling the customer because they can't even remember the food choices which I have written in the form at the time of check-in. I request hotel management to train your staff properly so that they can handle guest well and also improve house keeping.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Tracy C
Detailed Review: The hotel is a 4* and that is noticeable in the decor and older room styling. However it performs like a 5*.  The delux room was comfortable and had a decent seating area and was well air conditioned. The bed was an extra king size and we slept well although the pillows were a little uncomfortable. The shower, bath and toilet amenities were decent and clean and toiletries, including toothbrushes, were provided. We received clean towels each day as well.  The in-room dining food was tasty and as foreigners, there was plenty of choice on the menu if we didn’t wish to eat local food. Alcohol was also available if we so required.  The staff were wonderful, from senior level to room cleaner - this was 5* quality staff. We were always greeted by the polite and friendly staff who went…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rhea D
Detailed Review: I had one of my best birthdays at the sahib room & kipling bar the staff was very calm, gentle and warm additionally received a birthday cake too which was on the house, it really made me feel special

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: AshK
Review: Wonderful stay at the St Regis Mumbai
Detailed Review: I had a wonderful stay at the St Regis mumbai property. The staff was friendly and  the food was excellent at the 2 restaurants I ate at ( By the Mekong and Sette Mara). Especially would like to mention Ms Ameyaa Sirari. She was the butler in charge of us. She invited us to experience the champagne sabaring which we enjoyed. I also appreciate the ease of accessing the neighbouring mall which was very convenient. Looking forward to my next stay!

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Jamshed Billimoria
Detailed Review: There are times one likes to just have a change of scenery even if it’s the same city and that’s what my time at St.Regis was. As a bonvoy member you do get to taste the comforts of the various properties and this one didn’t fail to impress.  Whether it was the panoramic views from the room, the grand staircase that’s Instagram worthy or the view and lovely food at Mekong.  Saving the best for the last was ofcourse the St.Regis butler, but saying that would actually be short of truly appreciating the extent they go to make your stay comfortable. Ameyaa, was a blessing whether it was organising tea and cookies or arranging tablets that I’d forgotten to carry. All in all a wonderful experience with great staff and food.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: IVAN DSOUZA
Review: Thanks - St Regis - Hrithik , Sharik , Jonathan , Abid
Detailed Review: We had a fantastic experience at St. Regis. Super friendly staff and exceptional services , special mention and thanks to our Butler - Mr. Hrithik. Gem of a guy , he was very polite and courteous very professional. He ensured everything was taken care. Wonderful job Hrithik … thank you for making our vacation a memorable one. You were fantastic.   Special thanks to the seven kitchen - operations team - ( Sharik -,dinning time ) was very kind and went over and above to keep the desserts for us for extended time. He also ensured the kid charges were waived off. Jonathan -and his team ( chef Abid ) During the breakfast ensured we were very well taken care and he spent some time with us on the table with a personalize service. We want to thank everyone at st. Regis for this warm…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Royston Dsouza
Detailed Review: Had a wonderful stay at St.Regis,Mumbai.Exceptional hospitality is the first thought that comes to my mind while I write this review.The hotel has an excellent ambience and gives an amazing view of the city skyline and the Mahalaxmi Race course. The view from their roof-top restaurant Asilo, is breathtaking.  Although it is situated at one the busiest localities of the city, you feel completely relaxed and rejuvenated the moment you enter it's premises. The staff is extremely warm and courteous and goes out of the way to make your stay truly comfortable and memorable.   The hotel serves a lot of cuisines at their various restaurants but the one we enjoyed the most was our dinner at The Sahib Room & Kipling Bar which serves North Indian food.Their Peach Phirni is a must try for…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Meetjain
Detailed Review: We booked a staycation to celebrate our anniversary. The staff is welcoming and makes you feel comfortable. We stayed in a skyline room at 25th floor and the view was super cool! Food at all restaurants was really good. The evening champagne ritual accompanied by live piano was amazing. Pool and spa were unfortunately closed due to covid. We also enjoyed complementary evening cocktail hours at Sette Mare. Further, the hotel has a direct entrance into palladium, which is perfect if you want to shop. Overall - great food, incredible skyline views and comfortable stay.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Gaurang B
Review: Always a great experience to stay at the Regis
Detailed Review: I have stayed a few times at st regis with Family and the experience each time has been exceptional. For this particular time it was a staycation package for the racecourse view room. and as usual the overall experience was outstanding. A shout out to few of the staff who made the  stay an outstanding expereince. Tarandeep at the front desk made sure the the checkin process was smooth and easy. Adam & Sayali at the sahib room restaurant were exceptional in taking care of our party twice for the meals we had there ensuring everything was perfect and Nikhil at the 7 kitchens as well ensuring the meal experience was great. The rooms are big and with great views and overall the cleanliness and housekeeping is also excellent.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Adhiraj Malhotra
Detailed Review: Amazing food, exceptional service.   The starters - tandoori broccoli was to die for. The Galawati kebab was outstanding.   Azam our server went out of his way to ensure our meal was simply a truly sinful affair.!

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Vaibhav
Detailed Review: Great staff & excellent hospitality…  Appreciate the efforts taken to make our stay special…  Excellent property located in the heart of the city next to an excellent hall! Definitely recommend the place…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: D Kothari
Review: It feels like second Home what more can I say.
Detailed Review: Me and my sister travel regularly here, we love the food, the vibe and most importantly the service right from the front desk, we have Devina and Suman and Ganpati to Greet us with their delightful positive energy and top personally escort us every time!  Akansha to make sure anything we need is covered in room, Avdesh; who happily takes care of all our luggage and the impeccable in room service whenever we stay.  The rooms are always up to date and keeping in mind covid times there is no stone unturned when it comes to sanitization!   They know their job well and most importantly make our journey smoother and stay very blissful. Most of our trips are for work and so its always a race against time but they take care of the basics as well as the needs seamlessly and make sure we…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Aditya
Review: One of the most gourmet experiences
Detailed Review: I visited St. Regius for my brothers bday. The service and the food was exceptional. I would like to especially mention Ms. Bharti's service who was so kind and patient with us.  This was a very blissful experience

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Dharmesh Muni
Detailed Review: It was an excellent stay @St Regis Mumbai. Notable positives: a)Smooth check in & check out  b) Delicious breakfast and best in class spread c) Great hospitality and supportive staff  d) Super sized room with fabulous views  Definitely looking forward for a longer stay. Special thanks to Mr. Prathmesh Dumbre.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: shilpamvaid
Review: An actual Gem of a place
Detailed Review: Made a plan to lunch here purely on having perused their menu.  We love our Lebanese, Turkish middle eastern food and rarely come across the same here, so were happily surprised that Sette Mara goes beyond all expectations.  On order was the humus Muhammarah- richly toasted peppers, walnuts and superbly made. The truffle scented tirakafteri- oozing with truffle oil, light, moist and soft. Both served with a variety of pita and Lavache .  The pita made of nachni was brilliant.  Portion was generous.  Next was the Georgian  styled baked bread boat with Zhoug and truffle oil. Perfectly baked and all ingredients perfectly melted. Divine taste.  Finally were about to order 2 deserts just to try them, the baklavaand knafeh and were v keen to sample the ice cream as well when they…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rhea
Detailed Review: The Mezze Musings were an absolute delight. Tried out the Avo Kafferi Avocado and Muhammara Chicken, both of them were equally delicious! Can’t wait to be back and try out more from their signature dishes!

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: jaineel123
Detailed Review: Hi I am dr jaineel parekh and my wife khyati sanghavi parekh have visited seven kitchen for our anniversary celebration  The entire team of Prashanth and  Kenneth made the evening very memorable Food is very great and service is excellent  We will take this opportunity to recommend everyone to visit seven kitchen and enjoy the hospitality  Thanks  Until next time

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: darshitjk
Review: Excellent service by Pooja and Azra
Detailed Review: Excellent service by Pooja and Azra Very polite and outstanding individuals The food was very good grilled sandwiches and french fries Very nice bar called the drawing room I will definitely visit again  Thank You

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Mahesh
Review: Excellent stay at St Regis , Parel
Detailed Review: Had a wonderful stay at St Regis in Mumbai Everything right from check in with Badal Thacker at reception to chef Ashish in Seven Kitchens It was a very warm stay Excellent staff , superb breakfast ! Very customer centric  Thank you Team St Regis

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Mayur kore
Review: Loved the food and hospitality at seven kitchen
Detailed Review: Awesome food, lovely set up, and very hospitable atmosphere. Special mention to avocado toast, Sushi, lamb chops and Pizza, this was out standing. Kudos to team chef prerana, Mr. Prashant and pizza chef .will surely come again soon.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: H K
Review: Excellent stay, awesome food and great hospitality
Detailed Review: Our check in was handled by Ritika and she was really polite and sweet during the entire process. Also, during our dinner at Seven Kitchens, we were looked after by Prathamesh, who was constantly on his toes to ensure prompt service to us alongwith the rest of the staff/ team. Furthermore, it was really sweet of him to check with us if we were celebrating any special occasion (which indeed we were) and arrange for a complimentary cake for us... Overall a memorable stay with awesome food and commendable hospitality!!!

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Prathik
Review: Amazing birthday celebration at Seven Kitchens!
Detailed Review: We had a wonderful experience! I would especially call out Mr Gajendra for his amazing service and hospitality. He was simply superb in the way he welcomed us, suggested food to try and the food here was great!

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Deb
Detailed Review: We had such a great time!!! It was a celebration day and they surprised us with dessert…what a beautiful city-line view ,nice ambience and some amazing food!!!! Thank you for this experience !!!! Thank youu

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Amita B
Detailed Review: The restaurant has nailed the concept of a non traditional buffet. You order at the counters and the food is prepared for you on the spot. We loved everything we tasted and the best dishes were the desserts, pizzas, sushi and Indian food. The Sheekh kebab  here is the best I’ve ever had in my life. And lastly, the service is impeccable.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Uddhav
Review: Worst experience ever, never go here!
Detailed Review: We came to seven kitchen for a snack and coffee with our family. Absolutely the worst service I have experienced ever. 50 minutes to serve food, our children were starving. Staff was uninterested totally. Allwyn the manager took our order and seemed to have forgotten about it after. Absolutely pathetic experience

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Animesh V
Detailed Review: Great lunch at The Sahib, good food, paneer & dal Dhaba are a must try. Ambience is also great ,next time going to go for nihari, I think it’s their speciality.   Definitely recommend, for all fancy & not so fancy events

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Akhil Srivastava
Detailed Review: It was excellent stay many of the excellent features were provided to us even our room was upgraded. The butler provided to us, Prathamesh was very nice and polite. He took care of all the arrangements and ensured we had a good time. Would surely recommend to stay at St Regis

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sandeep N
Review: Beauty in the City of Mumbai. Exceptional Service and Amazing Food.
Detailed Review: St Regis is simply fabulous. Yes, that’s the word. We are a resident of Dombivli, Thane and never ever thought about spending the weekend in Mumbai City. However, this experience of staying at ST Regis for one night has changed our mindset. This is one hotel one should visit. St Regis is first class in service, amenities, room quality restaurant. We were allotted One Bedroom Suite located on the 31st floor and it gives an amazing view of the Mahalaxmi Race course, Haji ali dargah and the Arabian Sea. Special thanks to our Butler Ameyaa Sirari who ensured that everything was perfect, right from the time of check-in till we checked out. We were informed about the St Regis ritual that happens in the evening. It was easy to connect with her and always available for any suggestions…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Jasdev S
Detailed Review: Great service, sublime experience and undoubtedly guest oriented staff. Multi-cuisine breakfast and timely delivery of food at your room.   The view from the room is amazing with sea facing  and race course that will enchant your stay.   10/10 on everything. Thank you.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Pooja Gwalani
Review: Anniversary dinner @ Seven kitchens - St. Regis
Detailed Review: One of the finest and best luxury hotel in South Mumbai ...  An amazing dinner ambience , delicious food and an amazing time on our special day(wedding anniversary)...The staff and service made us feel really special ...Mr . Saurabh Sammal was very humble and courteous ...  From his recommendations to surprising us with a complimentary dessert tray with roses and drinks and the entire team coming together to wish made us feel even more special

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sneha
Detailed Review: Loved every minute spent in the hotel...Top notch Hospitality specially by the butler Ameyaa Sirari And Snehal from Seven Kitchen....Perfection....Thankyou St Regis for Super Awesome staycation Experience...Must Must Visit...

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Aamir Latif
Detailed Review: Good ambience n food choices. Awesome desserts. Ask for the inhouse classic chocolate cake. Its a must try. Mr sharik, the manager is amazing ! Wen here for the sunday brunch :) you have multiple cuisine and beverage choices

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Aaron Lin
Detailed Review: We had a fantastic stay at St.Regis.. It’s the epitome of hospitality cause the staff was extremely courteous especially our personal butler “Prathamesh”.. One notch above the rest for sure.. The food was highly delectable.. The rooms were perfectly done with a contemporary design and felt like home and they were even spacious with an amazing view.. Definitely visiting here next again !!  Shout out to everyone reading this - Please don’t hesitate or think twice cause you are never gonna be disappointed with St.Regis.. Regardless whatever the occasion is or whether it’s a staycation this is the best place to be at !!💯

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sayani
Detailed Review: We had a very good time, visited Seven Kitchens, St Regis to celebrate my birthday. Saurabh and Gajendra served us and highly appreciate their service and attention. We ordered asian food amd it was very good. They also gave us a complimentary cake since it was my birthday. Worth visiting again!

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sayali
Review: Amazing stay and dining experience at St.Regis Mumbai
Detailed Review: We went to St.Regis Mumbai for birthday celebration. They made sure that our day was made special in every way possible. We were offered complimentary room upgrade with amazing race course and sea view. We had opted for celebration package in which they decorated the room beautifully and the cake was very tasty.  Dinner we did in The Sahib Room which again was amazing. The chef personally came and spoke to us, complimentary cake was given and special attention was given not just to us but every guest/table in the restaurant. Private dining is available where we ordered biryani which is very yummy. Breakfast buffet was sumptuous. All in one it was a paisa vasool experience. Our Butler Prathamesh also invited us for a special event in the evening which we couldn't attend due to…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Mansi Medkar
Detailed Review: Good food  beautiful ambience  The staff truly cares abt our experience  Friendly service  We thoroughly enjoyed ourselves 😍 As bday occasion they surprised us with a delicious cake  All over very satisfying

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rohit
Detailed Review: Hotel is very well maintained and food is too good all the members are very good.  Thanks Badal Thacker and team thank you for making us feel special.  It was our anniversary and we really enjoyed that moment..

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: sheetalc21
Review: A delightful dinner at the Sahib Room
Detailed Review: This is a must visit restaurant. Everything about it is wonderful. The ambience, the staff and the food. The service is impeccable and warm. We were delighted by the suggestions. The cocktails from the Kipling bar were also great.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Vahbeez
Detailed Review: the following people shubham T,shubham B, Ghagendra, and ayush were super nice and helpful! very good service! will definitely keep visiting! ! food was amazing. still miss the classic dinner buffet bbb

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Anushka
Detailed Review: Great experience! Highly recommended! The pork belly at the Sette Mara restaurant was to die for! And lamb chops were heavenly. Best miiddle eastern cuisine in town….The stay at St regis was also smooth and very comfortable!

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Urvish
Detailed Review: Had an amazing time the food is pretty awesome and also the staff is very much friendly and helpful I was guided and attended by Rohan I must say a very humble guy and did some special arrangements for us and looked after us orrery well.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Naveen
Detailed Review: Very good service and the food was delicious.  Saurabh was very helpful and friendly during service. The ambience was apt for our anniversary. So much to cherish and remember the time spent here. 🙏🙏🙏

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Nikesh
Detailed Review: Great food, variety, wonderful service ...  get away from it all at Mumbai's finest!  Wonderful views of this beautiful city in the heart of the city of dreams.  Don't miss out on the hand washing ceremony.  Special mention and recommendation for Azam and team for their impecible service and hospitality.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sachi Goenka
Detailed Review: Best Lebanese restaurant in Mumbai, really enjoy the ambiance, food, service. We went for our 10th anniversary and it was a perfect choice. The avacado hummus, Muhammara, pizza was really really nice. The baklava dessert was also very nice.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: NANCY KHAKHAR
Detailed Review: I had an amazing experience and a wonderful staycation. Especially to name, Mr Aaron D’abreo has given us an explicit service with everything possible make it really comfortable and pleasant. Special thanks to Aaron and Saniya Khan for having us and welcoming us with their great efforts and gestures. Would love to visit again.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Pranay Adhvaryu
Detailed Review: Simply outstanding. Brilliant food, personally curated. Oriental chicken, radish & carrot cake, pad Thai veg noodles and edamame dumplings .. all superb   Service is not 5 star, it’s 7 star. Even when you leave, you feel like coming back for more

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Halima
Detailed Review: Great service My personal butler Ameyaa Sirari was amazing She made our stay so special... Credit to all the staff and especially my butler Ameyaa  Will definitely recommend the breakfast The variety is amazing and the service is great The staff are so attentive... The hotel is very central so easy to tour around mumbai

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: abhishek v
Detailed Review: Our stay at the hotel was very comfortable and pleasant thanks to the kind staff who were very welcoming , and special thanks to our butler Aaron D'abreo  who made our anniversary more special and memorable with his sweet little gestures.we really look forward visiting again soon..!

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Kaushal Gupta
Detailed Review: Amazing property with great ambience. Everything was great at this hotel. Amazing staff that is friendly and makes customers feel welcome. Would like to thank Azra for her hospitality, she was extremely efficient, pleasant and helpful.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Anand Iyer
Detailed Review: Dear St Regis Management,  I would like to call out the following staff for making our stay a memorable one: Tarandeep and Prabhdeep from Reception Sonia from the Lobby Area Restaurant Staff -Zeeshan and Junaid from By the Mekong Restaurant Manager -Abhishek Venue Manager - Arvind Yadav  I want to specially call out Tarandeep for ensuring that our check-out was not only smooth but she took extra care of us and was very kind. She is very professional and deserves a praise from her Management. I also want to appreciate Prabhdeep during Check-in, she gave us an upgrade and was very kind with the way she interacted with us. Lastly, I must mention that Restaurant Manager Abhishek is a gentleman and someone who ensures that Guests are made to feel at home and valued. This was my first…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Yash Mehta
Review: Very helpful, courteous, kind, friendly, staff. 🔥
Detailed Review: Hey there, 		    	I was in touch with one of the front office personnel Ms. Khushi Jain, for arranging the stay for my brother and his wife. She was so courteous and helpful, instead of denying for something, she got alternatives to make his stay memorable & arranging what he wanted. Really thankful of her that she done everything what I asked for. Staying in touch and asking me every single thing about the arrangements & suggesting the possibilities to enhance the stay.  Really thank you Ms. Jain.  Keep it up. 🥂 Cheers mate 🥂

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Juhi
Detailed Review: Amazing service by Azam ! We really enjoyed our dinner . Lovely food . Chef Siddiqui was also absolutely warm and made us fantastic. Food . Thank you for the surprise cake and fantastic live music experience .

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Anil P
Detailed Review: Had dinner at the sahib room extraordinary food by chef siddique and amazing service by the manager farooqi Azam.  Must visit always an amazing experience with them. Do try the dal makhani and the paneer sabji.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Tejal
Detailed Review: Prathmesh was very quick and polite person. The service was very perfect he was on his toes around the table. He made sure that each of us are comfortable. He checked on each thing after ordering and before ordering right from taste to any minute details.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: mhdMumbai
Detailed Review: We were at the sahib room and the kipling bar, the food is awesome , and service is outstany, special mention to azam  who made our experience even better and masterchef asif qureshi the curator of the  all the dishes we had like paneer kandhari,nadri kebab,dal and the most unique dish was haldi ki sabzi, we had a lovely evening here, will be here soon.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Supriya Atal
Detailed Review: A visit to St Regis is always memorable  Great food and service (by Sushmita)  Liked the ambience and music as well  The desert was excellent in the Lobby cafe.  We were able to enjoy a relaxed afternoon as a family. The coffee was good.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Surabhi
Detailed Review: My husband and I came for food here and expected it to be a normal dinner but it ended up turning into a very fancy date. Thanks for the amazing hospitality and service. The food was very delicious as well.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Krisha Thakker
Review: Very good service and it's providers
Detailed Review: Extremely hospitable and polite service provided. It was made sure that we are comfortable and all our needs are provided by Miss Ameyaa Sirari and the rest. We had a great time. We went for my Mom's 50 th bday,She had a memorable day.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ritika Thukral
Detailed Review: Great hospitality served by Aaron for our stay at the St Regis.There was absolutely no issue that was not addressed timely and with satisfactory results. We were particulary impressed with how our butler anticipated our needs (periodically coming by to check with us). You’ve surely set the bar high! Thanks a-lot for the service!

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Dimple Sabuwala
Detailed Review: The food was outstanding .. the service was great. Rohan and his team were very friendly and warm ..thank you so much . It was my first time at sette mara. The ambience was lovely. My family and 1 really really enjoyed our quite dinner

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: lucky l
Detailed Review: Very nice food. I had buffet at seven kitchen food here is amazing. And 10/10 to staff. Very professional staff. We had a great time. Very helpful and courteous staff thank you for the great service.the ambience is too good desserts are superb

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: 129farahp
Detailed Review: Awesome experience hats 🎩 off to sharique and his team served us very well inspite of protocols  My 7 year old loved sushi at seven hill Thank you for impromptu birthday celebration for my daughter  Will see you guys soon

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Gourav Singh
Review: Staycation at St. Regis Made my Day
Detailed Review: My wife surprised me on my 35th birthday n took me to st regis.  we were booked for a stay at one of their best rooms. The room (located at 24th floor) was beautiful and overlooked the race course and the skyline of the city.  The hotel had arranged for decoration and cake ahead of our visit. Mr Prathmesh Dumbre took care of us during our entire stay. We enjoyed everything in the hotel- the well equipped gym, the cocktail hour, the dinner and breakfast spread and the amazing service. All staff members were polite and helpful especially the butler staff.. who arranged a beautiful present for us while we were checking out of the hotel.. thanks for making my birthday memorable !!!

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Mark
Detailed Review: We had the Texas Bloody Mary with Jalepenos and the Mumbai Mary. Both Spectacular. Similar to the drink trolley at the Connaught Hotel in London. On the mezzanine on the ninth floor and the serving staff are wonderfully affable.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Roopam Kishore
Review: St. Regis Mumbai and our Awesome Butler Aaron
Detailed Review: A fabulous stay with Ultra Friendly Staff and Great Arrangements. Our Butler, Aaron, went out of the way to make our stay comfortable and our celebrations memorable! We had a great time and will surely visit again!

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Michelle Fernandes
Detailed Review: Had planned a surprise for my better half  for his birthday and Mr Dhanraj Kolte was very helpful. It was way above what I had expected. We were greeted warmly and right from our check-in he kept surprising us with his wonderful yet a very professional attitude. It turned out a surprise for me as well. I would definitely recommend him if you planning a visit at St.Regis.Trandeep and Anshul also were helpful specially when Dhanraj was not around they did their best to make us feel comfortable and as a team they have worked perfectly to provide excellent customer service. Would definitely visit again and would definitely request  Mr. Dhanraj to assist us again.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: kapsikum
Detailed Review: Sahib Room and Kipling Bar just never disappoints. The food was delicious, we had the Sahib Nihari and the Lucknowi Kulcha and Chef Siddiqui cooked up an excellent dessert Angoori Rabdi. The manager Kevin and his team especially Abhilash made us feel right at home.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Poonam Merchant
Detailed Review: Had an awesome time at Sette Mara at St.Regis.. the cocktails were outstanding as also the appetizers. So thoughtful of the staff to bring us an absolutely divine chocolate cake with a message to add to our celebration 🎉

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: aniruddh4u
Detailed Review: Very nice coffee.. and excellent service by Ms. Sushmita chauhan.  Very nice cocktails. Looking forward to visit again .we loved the cookies and tea also. Over all very kuch satisfied.  Very nice paintings and nice ambience.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Chitwan
Detailed Review: Divine kebabs, amazing  black daal.  Fish kebab melted in my niirh.  We had the best meal, and even better service. The sous chef was just super! Great service by Azam. Definitely will come again soon.  The mukhwaas at the end was also something special.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Nitesh Gupta
Detailed Review: We visited for my girlfriend’s birthday and it was absolutely amazing. The entire staff was very courteous. Special mention to Ameya, who made sure everything was well coordinated and our stay was comfortable.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Alf Marcussen
Detailed Review: Fantastic Ceasar salad with smoked salmon at St Regis hotel downtown Mumbai.  Great service and atmosphere. Can highly recommend this posh hotel.  What more could one ask for…. Too bad It is in the middle of Covid times.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rashna26
Review: The Sahib room is the place to be
Detailed Review: The Sahib room is my best Indian restaurant and thanks so much to chef Quereshi, Adam and Kevin my mama mamis 50th was so special. The nalli nihari and the prawns were divine. The service so attentive and the cake to celebrate was also delicious.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Traveltuous
Detailed Review: What converts time into moments is an exceptional experience. We as a family experienced tau during our visit at St Regis Mumbai. Visited there for a nice morning tea experience and it was delivered perfectly by Ms. Sweta Raut at the breakfast cafe area. Thanks Sweta and the team for creating this special moment for our family. Highly aporeciate the same.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: akshayihma
Detailed Review: A true Sahib like experience at The Sahib Room and Kipling Bar, thanks for the amazing food and service. Angoori rabdi truly stands out as a signature dessert!  Will definitely visit again and recommend too! Kudos to Azam for curating a fantastic experience.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Mallhar Kanungo
Detailed Review: Great service with amazing food.  Multiple cuisines available which makes it easier for the picky eaters to have a great time. Ambience of the place was great with a very supportive staff. . Covid protocols were followed.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Hoshil Thapar
Detailed Review: Really Royal. Excellent service and some lip smacking kababs. Really royal. Abhilash was super! Plater was amazing & The place has beautiful interiors with royal seats. Indeed a must visit was food lovers

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ibrahim
Detailed Review: Service was amazing but food was not up-to the mark. The expectation was too high but the taste of all the dishes served was average. We would appreciate the enhancement of the quality of the food served.  Thank you,   Ibrahim kamle

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Surbhi Tiwari
Review: New Year 2022 - At this absolutely dazzling place in Mumbai.
Detailed Review: What a great kickstart to the New Year it was 🎉  #thesahibroomandkiplingbar  We are impressed and beyond. Thank you for all the scrumptious food and superlative hospitality ❤  Also, a huge shoutout to Chef Asif Qureshi's special "Dal" and Azam Farooqui's hosting ✨

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sanjay
Detailed Review: Manish was a very warm and welcoming host... He assured me everything was in place and took extra efforts to make and take care of everything.   I will really appreciate VITS for having such a great staff and service!

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sabo1972
Detailed Review: Inwas here in January because I was tested positive to covid and this hotel there are rooms for quarantine. Food is good and everyone is very kind and ready to help for anything you should need. It was a pleasant experience

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Eliyas
Detailed Review: This hotel for business travelers is very convenient. As it is closer to the airport and it saves much time. The good facilities of the hotel is that they check vaccination of the guest in the entrance only. So it is quite a safe hotel to stay in. An other good thing is that it is a non smoking hotel. Good and safe hotel.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Anshuman Tiwari
Detailed Review: I was given a stay period of more than a week in this hotel so I qualify to review it. The catering is top notch and they deliver your meals on time, you can even request them to bring it earlier. Around the clock service for other amenities are also good

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Vishnu
Detailed Review: This is the second time I’m voming to vits, it is always a fun time at vits. The staffs are like family and very friendly. They are helpful enough in all the departments. The housekeeping, room service and front office people. Special thanks to the front office people they are very sweet and kind. Will come back again

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ditesh Palan
Detailed Review: I had booked the pool side restaurant for my grandparents 50th anniversary. It was an awesome experience, All the things i had requested to Mr. Vijay had made it possible. The food and the service both were excellent beyond expectations. Even menu was modified as per our requirements. Will Always be grateful for such as a wonderful experience! Thankyou so much.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Nguyen tuan ngoc
Detailed Review: Loved the stay at vits. Had a good experience 👍 the staffs are friendly and kind to help me with everything. The food is good and the rooms are clean to stay in. Had a fun time at Vits. The staff at reception are kind enough to help to book a cab. Mr. Digvijay and Miss. Jiya. Thank You

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Jyoti Prajapati
Detailed Review: Was a great experience at the hotel starting from entrance, you cab say that receptionist are the face of the hotel and it is true...zoheb and rushad were very gracious and helpful. At the pool side restaurant the food was amazing as well as the staff was very courteous and gave us many options as per we liked, jydut was very good at his service

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Jenny
Detailed Review: Had a wonderful stay at hotel, the food was awesome at pool side and the staff at the reception was very jolly and helping in all aspects especially Rushad was great and he gave us a upgrade to a very nice room.. overall it was amazing.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Nitin
Detailed Review: Very good food and service from Mr Saurendra,Udal and team would really like to visit again Ambience was also great rooms and service was upto the mark really happy with all the hospitality give to me during my stay.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Vigneshwaran J
Detailed Review: The stay at VITS is really awesome, love the way how they treat us. Special thanks to Hariharan at reception, he was so professional and kind to get our work done in minutes. Breakfast was good with buffay near pool table. Chefs was very kind. Had a nice experience with vits.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sheldon
Detailed Review: Stay at VITS for a long time. Had a great time. The staff, rooms are really very good. The front office people are quite helpful. Theya re kind enough to assist me with everything. The food is tasty and the rooms are clean to stay in. Would recommend it to all. Thank you vits for a great time.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Shakar
Detailed Review: The stay was really awesome in vits hotel Mumbai.the reception staff is really help full they give me the good the room.thanks to digvijay and jiya from the reception.the rooms were cleaned and well sanitized.thanks to jam shed from housekeeping he gives a good service

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Amit choudhary
Detailed Review: Stay was very good. The rooms are clean and well maintained. The staff is good and helpful. The staff at reception is very helpful thanks to Ms.jiya and viraj the food is good and had a great stay. Thanks for giving me good service

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Namrata Shetty
Review: One of the most memorable stays ever!
Detailed Review: Dear Team Vits, Namaskar! All the way from check in to check out, everything was seamless. The service is super quick & all the staff members — Reception to Engineering — professional & genuine. Special thanks to Vikas (HK) to make my stay a memorable one. Just asked him to make the bathtub ready, but he made sure to make it the most beautiful one — added rose petals, placed candles, brownies & also made towel decoration. The towel decoration was the best part, something unexpected & the one I will cherish forever. Thanks a ton Vikas for making sure we had a comfortable stay at Vits.  The other staff members Hariharan, Jiya, Sujay, Digvijay, Sandeep, Ameer, etc (Extremely Sorry if I have missed any names) were all kind, friendly & equally professional.  The breakfast buffet…

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Raj kumar
Detailed Review: Fantastic experience  , it is a nice hotel to stay   and enjoy  , the breakfast buffet is yummy with many varieties   poolside has nice  location  too,  Would like to mention few name  mr udal and rohit they are fantastic with their service over all is good

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rohan
Detailed Review: My stay at VITS was really good. All the staff are very kind. Specially the front desk people. They were very helpful and sweet to assist me. The rooms are clean and hygienic. The morning breakfast was very tasty.  I would recommend VITS to everyone. Will surely come back.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ritesh patil
Detailed Review: The stay was really good in vits hotel mumbai. The front office staff was great they helped me a lot. Thanks to Mr viraj and digvijay the gave me the good room. The room was clean and well maintaied...

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Pankaj Kirtane
Detailed Review: Had a great stay at Vits hotel. All the staffs are very helpful. The reception staff are very sweet and kind. Special thanks to Digvijay, Viraj and Jiya. Very friendly people. The rooms are very clean and hygienic. The food is great. Will surely come back soon!!!

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rajkumar dhumal
Detailed Review: Eklavya Vikas from housekeeping was a delight, had a lovely conversation at a difficult time, along with the great hospitality.....Mr Rajesh Naik Hk executive are very helpful person....the rooms are lovely with amazing views...........food also good....

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sanjoy Dasgupta
Detailed Review: The lobby ambience is very good and staff is very helpful and friendly especially at bell desk Mr. Rahim was very courteous and helpful. Receptionist Mr. Rushad was very gracious and gave me a great room.. Just there was little problem with internet in the room Or else

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Mayank Sheth
Detailed Review: Had a short stay in vits hotel Mumbai whiche is near to the airport,all the staff was perfect from front desk, restaurants n lobby. Well trained n well grom. Had a good breakfast next morning with varieties with smiley faces. Mr Udal & Tushar, Rohit was helping all for pretty morning.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Asit M
Review: Ourstanding staff at the VITS International hotel, Mumbai
Detailed Review: VITS staff, right from the reception to the house keeping and the room dining services, was phenomenal in making sure that our stay was comfortable. They were impeccable in the way they efficiently fulfilled our requests. Thank you VITS! We will definitely remember your hospitality forever and will not ever hesitate to visit you again if we happen to travel again through Mumbai.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Naseee
Detailed Review: Today i went to poolside. Restaurant for my breakfast i had nice food  ,staff is very cooperative specially udal  he served me food with lovely smile and great eye contact  all the staff is good 👍......

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: KK M
Detailed Review: This was Quarantine package stay . Room was big but yes it appeared being used for quarantine purposes not maintained well . Also housekeeping , hygiene is lacking . Services of house keeping , room service were good .  Reception staff looks bit loaded with work so services are not that prompt .

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Naveen
Detailed Review: Had come here with my friends for only one day but had the best time. The staff at the reception are very friendly and sweet. The rooms are very clean and comfortable. The food is also very tasty. Had a good time!!!

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sreekumar Nair
Detailed Review: We had an excellent experience in VITS. We had at family function in one of the banquets 'Saphire'. The staff were very cooperative, well managed by Sofia & team. The food was really tasty too with a very vast variety of spread ranging from continental, Oriental to live Indian chat counters, apart from the regular main course stuff.  Highly recommended. Will return soon again.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Feroz Zaveri
Review: Grateful for the comfortable stay in difficult times
Detailed Review: My family & I stayed in VITS to isolate during the early days of the third wave. We had a comfortable stay with good service & great food. The room was quite spacious & the staff are generous with their time & understanding.  Huge props to the entire team at the hotel. I will not hesitate to stay there again or to recommend it to others.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Bheru suthar
Detailed Review: Vits hotel  is the best place to chill relax and spend a fabulous time with family and friends.. Food quality is too good and telephone comunication was good. Thank you room dining ilyas shaikh for the lovely service his understanding by the eye contact is superb Will surely visit again !! Cheers. .

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Manisha Rani
Detailed Review: One hotel staff named Eklavya vikas is very hood During my stay in hotel due to quarentine he helped me a lot  His ways of talking providing room service whenever required is very good  Overall stay in this hotel has given me excellent experience

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: dabhi meh
Detailed Review: It was my first visit to VITS Hotel. I came to have Lunch the food was amazing and service by Kunal Shetty was great. he was very poilet and friendly he helped us in suggesting food which were very nice. Loved the service and food. Kudus to the everyone.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ganesh Y
Detailed Review: Quality of service was good.well behaved crew & well disciplined.. house keeping supervisor Mr Manish Solanki  was well behaved & regularly used visit cabin & ask for any requirements.regularly interacting whenever meets outside also.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Prakhar S
Detailed Review: The hotel is awesome. I stayed in room no. 104 the house keeping is super awesome and courteous by house keeping supervisor, Manish Solanki. The room is very clean and mantain all the covid protocol. Also I liked the elaborate breakfast. Everything is great about VITS

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Gajendra Londhe
Detailed Review: Hotel is good , rooms are clean, very obidient and polite staff specially Eklavya,Rahim, Housekeeping manager Mr.Shivaji Jagtap deserves his position for maintaining hygienic and keeping well equipped rooms. Front desk Digvijay and Viraj also good and helping in nature. Breakfast was good,Overall good stay at Vits, Recommended hotel to stay.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Suman Ray
Detailed Review: I was very happy with the service provided by the banquet staff with all courtsey and promptness special thanks to Mr Saurendra ojha and his team for all the service provided .also the ambience of the poolside was very nice.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: K Patil
Detailed Review: I am here for few days. The hotel has good amenities and cleanliness. Prompt service is provided. Vikas and also other staff are quite helpful. Use of reusable glass bottles for drinking water is commendable.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sastava
Detailed Review: Soniya Vaid has served us nicely. Her approach to the guest is very caring..... Very good stuff and food I like the poolside restaurant u like the ice cream and I very happy with the service thanks soniya

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Suresh
Detailed Review: Food was realy good .....staff is really helpfull during the event ....Big thanks to chef and his team.....will surely come with friends and family for stay.....and Thanks to shaista ,jiyut and there team for support.,,

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Akshay
Detailed Review: I came to attend the conference in vits hotel ...really liked the place,food and the ambience...specially the poolside...staff are very friendly and helpful...like the way they greet to people....will surely come with our family.....Special Thanks to shaista and Jiyut during lunch time☺️

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Pankaj
Detailed Review: Great service and very good breakfast I like the breakfast and I like the poolside restaurant very good stuffs thank Soniya team for the service very good soniya you are the hard working and friendly and helpful 🌹🌹🌹

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rakesh Kumar
Detailed Review: Very good experience VITS hotel very good service and food I love breakfast I very good staff spicy for soniya she is very friendly and helpful thanks soniya for the service I enjoyed the my trips  🥰🥰🥰🥰

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Gaurav B
Detailed Review: Great place to stay. The room was very clean and room service is very quick. You have to order food from the hotel itself but food is also amazing. I really appreciate Eklavya Vikas's service - very friendly and very genuine person.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Dr.Shashikant
Detailed Review: Owsm breakfast,impressive service and very good environment staff is very much cooperative .I found stff perticularly Soniya is personally taking care of customers.we especially enjoyed our stay at this Hotel

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Chinku
Detailed Review: Writing this review for the lovely impeccable hospitality by Vits hotel .  Our last visit to Vits 4 years ago and still recollect the lovely dishes prepared by Master Chef Deep.  After many years we placed order online for Chi biryani and Mr Jiyut personally ensured that it was prepared to perfection . Loved the biryani and appreciate the attention given to a single order by such a big establishment, which is rarely seen nowdays.  I would highly recommend to stay at Vits, bcoz the hospitality is simply amazing.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Vrinda
Detailed Review: Our stay here was fantastic the staff was excellent and very helpful especially Mr.Raviraj who helped in every way possible and made our stay excellent and helped us out even later.I’m looking forward to be back soon.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Amit Jesani
Detailed Review: 1.Amazing service enjoy a lot . Want to visit again soon Staff was amazing specially moin and gaurav they have provided best service  2. Room was big and great and has all the facilities 3.Lunch ,Dinner and breakfast was amazing everything was available

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Nik S
Detailed Review: The Courtyard at Andheri was exactly what we needed after a hectic and crazy trip in India!  Devraj and rest of the staff at check-in and Rohit and folks at the breakfast were fantastic The entire staff was extremely friendly and more than happy to cater to any of our custom requests - including a fabulous ginger chai!  I will highly recommend this hotel!

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Naina Pandya
Detailed Review: My family and I had an 11 day stay here from the 10th Dec to the 21st of Dec 2021. It was an absolute delight, we have never ever experienced hospitality like this whereby we felt we were home. This feeling wasn’t just from the managers but it’s started from the barricades/gates the security guys, the entrance staff, the bag scanner guys… the concierge, the reception, the house keeping and we can actually write a special review just for the dining team be it the chef or the serving guys they are the real stars of our trip…  Shout out to all of these guys and anyone that we may have missed …  Hemanth Abhijeet Rohit Vinod  Zubeir  Chef Rakesh  Chef Rajiv Chef TejaS Chef Santosh Chef Bhau Chef Rasika  All the three Siddesh Baburao at the gate  A sniffers who became my daughters…

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Nikhil Shanbhag
Detailed Review: Excellent service by staff, they took wonderful care of us. We visited the restaurant for new years celebration and were impressed with the variety of the menu and the overall level of service by the staff.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Dion
Detailed Review: My experience with Courtyard Marriott has been nothing shy of amazing!    Great service,good food, well sanitized and clean rooms, but the thing that makes this such a good place to stay are the staff specially Raviraj who went out of his way to ensure that we had a beyond comfortable stay while there . All of the people are incredibly helpful and generous with their time and hospitality.   Thanks for making our visit absolutely fantastic. Will make Marriott properties our 1st option to consider for lodging, whenever we travel.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: vinayak k
Review: Amazing food at MOMO Cafe , awesome hospitality
Detailed Review: It was all because of Mr Abhijeet Patwardhan from the MOMO Cafe, our stay at this hotel was amazing. He was all for the every guest dining at the MOMO cafe, from Breakfast to dinner, Also supported by his Staff and chef who provided authentic No onion and No Garlic food for my wife, would definitely visit this place again.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Girish2902
Detailed Review: Have stayed there on 11th Dec and 12th Dec night. Points not credited for 11th night in the membership despite multiple reminders. Asif at the reception has been terrible. They keep harping to use the Bonvoy App. The App is also third grade. Multiple other things to write but don't have the time.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Vineet J
Review: Amazing food and location & value for money
Detailed Review: It is at a walking distance from Metro Train station and Bus Stop. It has a few good options nearby in terms of shopping and eating. The Juhu Beach is 8 Kms away. Our Executive Room which is a notch upgrade from Deluxe was nice. I wish that the curtain for the Restroom was inside rather than outstanding it for the privacy purpose. The Front Office staff was very cordial but as the other guest hbhanu mentioned that FO could work or talk more human than customary. They provided us with Sanitizer Wipes and Masks for these CoViD times and we appreciate that. Our best experience was around the Food and Beverages. We longed to see the variety and quality of the buffet breakfast and the smiling faces of the FnB team including Abhijeet Patwardhan who led the FnB Service from the front.…

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: simran
Review: Definitely recommend to stay if you are ever in Mumbai
Detailed Review: The staff The F&B The housekeeping  Maintenance and upkeep Everything was perfect  Surely deserves a 9/10  They will remember you and your preferences  I stayed there for more then 3 months this entire year and felt like home And whatever request we have in our minds they always tried and helped us out

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: vinphilip
Detailed Review: The Courtyard by Marriott has great food, ambience and hospitality. Thanks to Vinit Patil for taking such good care of us during our visit.  We were served some Paul John exquisite wine as it was the occassion of Xmas and customised mocktails for which we weren't charged adding to an enhanced customer experience.  We had a splendid experience at the JW Marriott in Juhu as well when we visited. Goes to show the standards for hospitality runs high across the group.  - Vinod Philip

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: hbhanu
Detailed Review: Decent property, value for money.  Good food and amazing service in the F&B area.  Thanks Gaurav- your team was just great. Akshay(chef), Abhijeet, Ashwini, Mansi, Ashok and Fom-Yogendra- you guys were fantastic.  Merry Xmas everyone!!!   I noticed GM walking around the lobby several times a day which makes a difference.  It’s fantastic when chef Akshay walked out of the kitchen everyday to check how is the food.. this small touch goes long way.    Department that can do better in service is Front Desk. They work hard and non stop but the service is very robotic, slow and full of text book answers. Chat takes long to reply and they close your chat with just a dot as a reply, it’s frustrating.  I asked for several things on a chat but it takes long for them to deliver or…

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Vivek M
Detailed Review: Had a great stay - truly awesome and hassle free! One of the smoothest hotel stay experiences I would say - great service at the room as well as at the restaurant!! The breakfast spread was great - augmented with great service!!

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Mohamed Samir
Review: Polite Staff, good service and near to airport
Detailed Review: My stay  in this hotel was awesome. It is my first visit to India and the staff were helpful and kind in particular Asif of concierge who serves you with care, patience and warmth. I would definitely visit it again.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Prashant Agarwal
Detailed Review: My recent stay at Courtyard Marriott Andheri was awesome with pleasant hospitality and prompt service.  Courtyard Marriott has always lived upto my expectations and given a better experience each time. It's by far the best 5 star property in all in Mumbai. All the staff from bell boys to the higher hierarchy are so cordial and well trained Especially Mr.Hemant takes personal care with so much warmth and makes me feel so special each time iam there.  I feel I'm loyal to Marriott because of this property.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Saurabh S
Detailed Review: Had book 5 room for myself and my business associates had comfortable stay so would like Would like to rate 5/5  Would spl like to thanks Mr. Moinuddin for making stay comfortable and sloving some billing issue with prompt action.  Room service need little improvement

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sidharth rawat
Detailed Review: Came for a tennis league.Staff is very kind and polite specially asif from concierge ssrvices who has a very positive attitude.  Rooms are spacious ,a very good gym comparing to other hotels and great surrounding with lots of options to eat plus nearby to the airport(around 10mins by car)  Will definitely recommend this hotel

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Santosh G
Detailed Review: Perfect location from the Mumbai international airport and a good price. Buffet was phenomenal. Highly recommended for family and friends. The staff are very helpful and courteous. I will continue to stay here on my Mumbai trips.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rudresh
Detailed Review: Really enjoyed my stay at Courtyard Marriott Mumbai, travel cab experience was great, overall great hospitality. Asif and Uday were really good. Food was great and overall ambience was excellent. Totally enjoyed

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Noor Arfa Shaik
Detailed Review: Amazing hospitality by all staff, especially Mr. Asif.  A lot of Importance was given to cleanliness and hygiene in the hotel. The food at one of their in house restaurants “Ummrao” was delicious. Overall, I had a pleasant stay!

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: gauriJC
Detailed Review: Excellent place with great food.  Special thanks to Mr Yogesh Sonawane and his team, specially Akash.  We ordered abla cart and chef was very attentive .  He also gave us special soup of pineapple and carrot complimentary.  Keep it up and the best place in Mumbai.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rajveer Jaani
Detailed Review: A weekend brunch gives that much awaited break and confluence of a family gathering always. What better place to opt than Courtyard by Marriott?  The ambience of the hotel is at its Christmas glory. The buffet is immersively exhaustive, the Momo Café team ensures that a dedicated children’s play area is also available to keep the kiddies busy.  What we liked the most from the humungous array:  1.    The dahi puri chaat was amazing n lip-smacking.  2.    The pasta was perfectly seasoned and loaded with flavours  3.    The salad bar is the highlight, wish we had feast some more with this set  4.    The mocktails are decently tangy and add the punch.  5.    We sampled a bit of everything on the cart – from the dal Amritsari to the goan curry. Most dishes were adequately…

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Preksha Desai
Detailed Review: Worst Service Ever Only treating customers as money making Machine Zero customer service Very bad food service and quality Will never come again Marriott has spoilt its name and service. No wifi......

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Geeta Hansaria
Review: REVIEW OF UMMRAO RESTAURANT IN COURTYARD MARRIOT
Detailed Review: Want to feel like royalty like the Awadhi Nawabs ? Or even better feast like them  !? Then go to Ummrao , a beautiful restaurant tucked on the first floor of the Courtyard Marriot in Mumbai ! The interiors , the vibe and the whole set up was warm and inviting and our table was beautiful!  I especially loved the pretty chandelier there ( yes I notice small details like this and the restaurant has given great attention to every detail !) Ambience 👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻 We had the full 6 course winter menu meal ! They have veg and non veg set menus as well as you can order A La Carte !   The whole meal has been well curated and tasted so good that the flavors are still lingering !   The  mocktails were beautifully presented and my personal favorite was the Ba Dastoor — a muddled…

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Mehul somaiya
Detailed Review: Best hotel to visit with good staff service and accomodation  The location is good and safe to travel for all purposes   Thankyou the manager of this hotel Mr Ankush for the best services    I refer one should visit this hotel

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Avantika Bafna
Detailed Review: This is the best hotel with good service and staff they are very sweet and calm   I refer this hotel at-least once you should visit and have beautiful accommodation and service.  Thanks Ankush the manager of this hotel COURTYARD MARRIOTT Andheri

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv

Detailed Review: Had a wonderful and hassle free stay. Staff was extremely helpful. Shoutout to Devraj the concierge for being very helpful too! Will come back soon for another visit. Food was lovely too. Incredible service.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv

Detailed Review: I am staying in this hotel from a long time this review is for the excellent staff Mr. Asif and Mr. Santosh they works for concierge desk they are one of the start at the hotel best service ever got mr. Asif help me in a lot of things he is very good person

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: AKS
Review: Stayed in Mumbai for as corporate customer
Detailed Review: Breakfast quality needs to be improved for serving corporate customers. "SET MENU" should be of multi-dishes and should cater customers from Northern parts of India as well.  I can see that food items like Paratha/Bread/Sandwiches are missing. We can assume the Hotel is cutting budget on breakfast by providing everyday only Upma or Sabudana Khichri. Mr. General Manager, do u start your day like this? I hope you people will improve upon your breakfast. Thanks

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ashish U
Detailed Review: Thank you for amazing food and amazing deserts as well! Great ambience and people here are amazing and staff is very helpful. Thank you for making our staycation a worth a visit trip. Hope to see you guys again.

Review: Occasion - Marriage anniversary of My Father and Mother
Detailed Review: Services provided was excellent . All the  staff  are quick to provide service. Food also was  excellent . Maintenance of Hotel is excellent and also the Infrastructure is good. Food variety is also good.

Name: Jhon
Detailed Review: It was a fantastic experience , i and my family came for dinner at saptami there was lot of food and stuff we were too confused from.where to start , but luckly mr Aftab came to us ,he was to polite and very much attentive for telling us about the food and makeing us feel too much confortable he was with us through out the opration very much helpfull and suggesting us about the food , we were too happy and our experence was too fantastic . Thank you aftab meet you soon.

Detailed Review: The food quality and ambience was great, the order was taken up quickly and was well prepared.  We were served by Henry, who is very courteous and prompt. Great taste, great food. Must visit Thumbs up!! 😊

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Manmeet
Review: Wonderful service and great attitude by Mr Henry, he served us delicious pastries as complementary dessert as well.
Detailed Review: Wonderful service and great attitude by Mr Henry, he served us delicious pastries as complementary dessert as well. He is very polite as well. This kind of staff makes the tired customer also happy! Thank you

Detailed Review: Everyone was very friendly and welcoming at the hotel. Helped me and my kid to settle in very well. We checked in late but they provided the room at a short notice with little chck in time wil recomend this to family and friends

Detailed Review: Ashish Ashish is very nice guy...very polite and coprative nature..very much hardworking to his work...I must say that he is  very professional.  The all over holiday inn services is too gud. And the food is too yum 😋 . It's feel like we live in our home.

Detailed Review: The stay was really good, rooms were clean and the service was excellent, and the staff was also really helpful especially Mr. Hitesh who helped us get settled       The food was fresh and delicious too. Would love to come here again.

Name: Abdul Azeez C
Detailed Review: Amazing stay at the holiday inn international Mumbai .. especially hitesh who helped us with an early check in .. comfortable and spacious room .. breakfast was good . Would definitely come back to hotel

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sourav
Detailed Review: Had a very comfortable stay at the hotel . Breakfast was amazing and room was extremely  comfortable and would especially mention Hitesh name he was very helpful  during the staff very posit attitude. Would surely  come back.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Manoj
Detailed Review: Excellent stay at the hotel . Staff was very good especially hitesh was very helpful . Room was nice and spacious enough . Would definitely recommend help to stay at Holiday inn Mumbai . Would surely come back

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rahul G
Detailed Review: Beautiful wedding arrangements at Holiday Inn !  Enjoyed with my family. Great food. Great service. Amazing ambience.  Staff is dedicated. They followed all safety measures. We got lot of cooperation. Overall Very Good !

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Amaresh Panda
Detailed Review: Really appreciate and loved the gesture upon arrival specifically how I was welcomed by concierge Salman and Duty manager Hitesh. They knew my name which really took me appreciate and write here. Other then location I highly appreciate holidayinn Mumbai Sakinaka location.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv

I would say all the departments that I interacted with were very professional and still they have the Human touch which is very essential in the hospitality industry.  Special mention - Hitesh (Reception), Mamta (In-room dining), Ashish (Gym) !!!!!!  Keep up the good work guyzzzzz  Lsk signing out

Name: Mohammed Shafi
Detailed Review: Comfortable staff . Hitesh was extremely helpful in assisting .the hotel upgraded my room . Breakfast was and room was extremely comfortable . Would definitely come back and would recommend people to stay holiday inn .

Detailed Review: The stay was great, they had good service and the staff was very friendly and corporating. Enjoyed the stay and the food too was good and fulling. Recommend this hotel for stay would love to come again.
