Name: Mr Pravin
Detailed Review: Good hospitality organise by hotel . Entire staff are helpful specially Mr Anand and Mr Jay who are maneger are supportive . Halls are good /entire ambiance was good . Good place to arrange any program . Food are also delicious . All people appreciate food quality.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Aniket bhakta
Detailed Review: Visit to saptami for the he Sunday brunc Saturday brunch, it was a great day for me , the food and the service was too amazing specially want to thank Mr aftab who was very much alart and too much professional we enjoyed alot and even even our kids were very much happy with the service donee by him  planning to come again with the same experience thank you holiday inn for the great hospitality.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Riddhi Turakhia
Detailed Review: I celebrated my daughters birthday and had a great experience ...all our needs were accommodated and taken care off ...special thanks to Mr. Manish , Mr.Nashid and Ms. Rajani ..they took care of us personally and made sure we had great time.. they really made my daughter's birthday special..will def recommend each one of you to visit holiday inn...

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Aditya Masurekar
Detailed Review: We had a 5 day residential wedding with around 70 inhouse guests and 200 odd visiting guests at Holiday Inn Andheri Sakinaka.  We had booked Meeting Rooms 5&6 for Mehendi and Haldi functions and Grand Ballroom for Engagement Sangeet and Wedding. The staff was very supportive and helpful, our rooms were cleaned nicely by the housekeeping team on 6th and 3rd floor. There was not one moment where we faced any issue.  Mr Keyur Sangani managed everything flawlessly and made it the most memorable event for all our friends and family. Hitesh at front desk was really helpful in allocation of rooms. The highlight of all our events was the Food. Special thanks to Chef Umesh Patil and Chef Yashwant for making sure our guests ate tasty meals. Kudos to the chef's for making sure no guests…

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rahul T
Detailed Review: The place is my favourite all time. So, currently I am staying in the property from last 5 days and I just love the place. Specifically their buffet spread is too good to satisfy your cravings.  I must appreciate Mr. Malachi in the service he has been really a nice guy to serve you with almost humble and welcoming way. Property must appreciate and apprise such nice folks.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Prerna S
Detailed Review: I had the most beautiful experience at the hotel very courteous and warm staff ..  a big shout out to Hitesh (duty  manager) and Shraddha for being absolute gems..  Holiday inn has earned a happy customer indeed ..

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Avadhoot K
Detailed Review: I had a pleasant stay here and the staff especially Hitesh was very helpful. They helped me get on board and the gesture to give a handwritten card for being a platinum member was wonderful. Recommend to definitely stay here! It was a great stay!!! Keep it up guys!

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sanjay N
Review: It is not 5 star hotel.  Less than 3 star
Detailed Review: I stayed this hotel on 19th Dec on way to Nagpur , after long international travel, I was expecting nice clean hotel  When I entred lobby it was smell with pine sol. Bath room very old style , small and rusty spot . water getting from shower , whole bath room was messy  Bed Bed sheet very poor quality   Only OK part was breakfast  Not worth of 5 star

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Nikita
Review: One of the best hotels to stay in Mumbai
Detailed Review: I spent 3 days at the hotel with my partner and we had a great experience. The location of the hotel is quite convenient, with transport easily available. Airport is quite close too. The hotel staff were helpful and very courteous. Nobody oversteps their bounds or disrupts your privacy. The room was big and spacious and so was the washroom. One of the best things was the hygiene and the cleanliness of the hotel. The room service was quite prompt and they'd clean the rooms at a designated time, every single day. But if you wish to dine in the room, be prepared to get your call transferred to 3 different lines before they patch you with the restaurant. Don't worry, that isn't really a big problem though and at most costs an extra minute of your time. All in all, it's a great place…

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Manoj
Detailed Review: Good Things - Good location - Nice Breakfast spread - Well Behaved Housekeeping staff Bad Things - Solo travellers are paying money to stay. You don't do charity and let them stay for free. Advise your staff to be respectful. The front desk tells me sternly not to bring guests as if I'm subletting the room for a guest house. The guard at the gate asks me for room number before check in. As if I'm there for break-in. ZERO etiquette.  -The rooms are specious but bit tired. Fittings are old and needs maintenance - Maintain hygiene in the glass bottles you keep for drinking. Clean them and remove the ones with rusted clips. That's the least one should expect Bottomline- There are a number of hotels in that row. I will give a second chance. If things are the same, I'll do exactly the…

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Patel
Detailed Review: We are very happy to join with orchid we had very good event and supportive staff is here .mr roshan koli, lobo, pranay, yaasin ,the meet at chambers,thanks to.mr Ryan for supporting with lovely team members

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Kalpesh jain
Detailed Review: Hey thanks a lot Manisha for your excellent service and work,it was really great working with Hotel Orchid, you nd your team,thanks to Ryan,Abhishek,Vikas,Roshan nd every single person of your team,special thanks to chef Hrishi he won our biggest fear of food,we are really happy with the food and arrangements part,the food was really delicious.thanks to you Manisha you made every single nd small things possible for us,you stood cmpltetly with us everytime, best part on wedding day was you nd your team was on their toes whole day with us.you did everything possible for special entries and all event thing.thanks a lot again from whole family.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Pankaj
Detailed Review: The service given to us was excellent. The staff and manager both were very helpful and professional. Captain Koli and Haresh both are dedicated. Pranay and sachin did their job beyond expectations. I will recommend the team to others.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Zachariah Samuel
Detailed Review: Excellent food and service. Special thanks to Harish and Team. Keep your good work going. We will plan events again at Orchid Hotel. Thanks you the food was very tasty, hospitality too good  Thanks Pushprndre.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sri R
Detailed Review: MRS Nidhi gave us great welcome with smile on face...the food quality is delicious and outstanding....Choice of multicusine food with superb service provided by Mr Shubam ...Nice place NYC ambience...over experience is outstanding

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Arvind S
Detailed Review: The Service given by Mrs Nidhi and Aleister from last 30 days was just amazing and truly lovely.... Everyday felt like home been here leaving today but surely visit again for sure..... Thank you so much guys

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Eternity 12
Review: B.R.I.L.L.I.A.N.T Stay - Thanks Devina, Gopal & Dhanraj !!
Detailed Review: The St. Regis Mumbai is one of the most luxurious properties, I've stayed at, across stays in many global cities. The staff is super courteous, has hospitality as their mantra and everyone goes above and beyond to provide you an exquisite experience. The Signature butler service is top notch and Shawn & Dhanraj are masters at their work.   Front office is handled by a plethora os super awesome staff and the front office manager (Devina) who helped us check-in ensured our stay was top notch through and through (e.g. handling restaurant reservations, accommodating date extensions etc.)  While a few restaurants are currently non-operational, it was gastronomic delight at the ones that were functional - Mr. Gopal Jha has created a paradise of his own across the restaurants at this…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Adi M
Review: Excellent Service , Fabulous Rooms , Amazing Breakfast...... All at a Price.
Detailed Review: We celebrated our Wedding anniversary with our one year old with a staycation at the St. Regis Mumbai . I had made reservations in advance and had known about the Butler Service there. The Butler staff emailed me a few days prior to our stay inquiring about our requirements. When I told them about our anniversary , they offered to Decorate the room for us with balloons , lights and have a cake ready in the room at arrival. ( Paid extra for it …. but worth the smiles ) . My son and wife both really loved the gesture.  The rooms are very well maintained, beautiful views of the city and Mahalakshmi race course. The amenities in the rooms are second to none. Nice bathroom and plush beddings for a sinking-in sleep experience. Now for the best part ; The Butler service , Every room…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: SangeetaJukar
Detailed Review: Beautiful hotel. Spacious room.  Butler service was great. They iron your clothes. They bring you hot beverages. Buffet   Staff shortages continue with Covid.  Buffet was elaborate.  Several stations and cuisines.  Seven Kitchens was where the buffet was served. We tried the other restaurants like sahib and by the Mekong too. Palladium mall is few steps away and it was a huge attraction.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: mansingh c
Review: St Regis is our most favorite hotel in Mumbai.   The staff are wow amazing.   We love the sophistication of service.
Detailed Review: St Regis Mumbai is one of our most favorite hotels in the world.   We stay here every time we visit India and we strongly encourage everyone to stay here.   The service from all staff and butlers are incredible especially Ameyaa who was our butler.  Even though she was new to the girl she was polished and customer focused.  She made our experience amazing which we are grateful for.   We are already planning our next visit.   We love the hotel for its ambience, service and hospitality.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: vipul p
Detailed Review: I stayed here with my family for 4 nights. Location wise it’s the best property , but service was not that good. Specially during breakfast they have no staff to attend you. I order for dosa at live counter but that were unable to deliver in next 30 mins after which I cancel my order. also waiting period for breakfast table was approx 20 mins.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Tripti D
Detailed Review: St Regis was beyond put expectations and the service level along with attention to detail was the high point of our stay. Our butler Ameyaa Sirari ensured that we were comfortable and arranged our baby’s food for us promptly. We appreciate Ameyaa’s impeccable work ethic and service.  Thanks St Regis!

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Anuya J
Detailed Review: Some of the best Indian food I've had in Mumbai, together with the best service in the city. It's a deadly combo. A must visit! We had the Nadroo ki Shammi Kebab and the Aloo Bukhara something kofta and the Lucknowi Kulch was superb.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Dion
Detailed Review: The food was awesome, but moreover Azam was a great help in suggesting us what to eat, also he is always a great help at sahib. His presentation and hospitality is great. Thanks sahib team special thanks to Azam.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Dipti Muni
Detailed Review: Thanks for making our dinner and occasion so very special and beautiful..memorable..with fabulous meal ..and hospitality with grt service. Entire staff was very very polite, cooperative, attentive..and very kind.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Neeraj A
Detailed Review: I think the staff here is excellent and do a fantastic job of making sure that you have a memorable experience. The view is great from the place and so is the ambience at the restaurant. We had some dim sums, the Kung Pao chicken and some rice. The dim sums are worth it, the rice was good and tasty. The kung Pao chicken is well made but was a hint on the sweeter side which was surprising. I think this was the only slight let down for me here.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Deepika Khaitan
Detailed Review: Was visiting Mumbai for a week and had a reservation at Four Seasons which we cancelled to stay at this hotel. Biggest mistake.  First night the air conditioning made so much noise we couldn’t sleep. The safe wasn’t working and the carpet was full of hair.  They moved us to another room the next morning and I specified that we are in Mumbai for my daughter competition and we wake up at 5 every morning. Need a room on a quiet floor. They were over booked due to weddings and the room down the hall was playing loud music and smoking inspite of it being a non smoking floor. 4.30am we had 30 drunk men screaming while leaving the floor.  The room they assigned my kids was stinking of cigarette smoke. Any complaint all the duty manager Neha could say was “give me a Moment”. That moment…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Anupkumar
Detailed Review: Yummy lamb finger licking well balanced of spices taste and not at all spicy.... Could feel the lamb warmly blended with spices... Just loved it   I loved the lucknow kulcha is softness was as soft as cotton.... Mouth melting   Combination of lamb and kulcha was soul touching   Thanks for hospitality by saylee and Azam and superb cocktail by Abhilash   And thanks for the moments surprise of yummy 🍰by Ms. Saylee  Thank you guys and sahib & kipling bar @ ST. Regis

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Bhushan P
Detailed Review: Excellent food. The sweet chilli paneer was awesome. The cakes too are amazing. We loved it!! The service is excellent.. the chef was very accomodating and made a special Jain meal for us .must visit restaurant for celebration. Our daughter really enjoyed the food  and she said that she will surely visit this restaurant! Amazing experience and service.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Deepak Chaurasia
Detailed Review: Awsome ambience n help full staff at the sahib room & kipling bar the food and the service was provide by KEVIN  SIR it was awsome and the quality of food and taste was awsome quality time was spend over their thank you

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: krupeshg
Review: Special mention to Kevin and team and specially Ankur who was more then happy to help till the end!
Detailed Review: The Sahib Room & The Kapling Bar takes you back completely to the Old age India, the Maharaja era.  The backdrop as well as the interiors are so traditional and yet contemporary to the core. The food was an icing on the cake.  St. Regis never disappoints you with the food and it's hospitality!

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Saumitra
Review: Not up to the mark for a st regis
Detailed Review: Goods  1. Location is excellent as it's attached with the premium shopping mall "palladium"  2. Warm and welcoming staff   3. Interiors are good considering its a 10 year old hotel  Bads  1. FnB needs to be improved, specially the multi cuisine and the in room dining 1a. Over crowded restaurant during breakfast all 5 days 1b. Understaffed 1c. Extremely poor refill of every dish including basics like butter, poha, puri etc 1d. None of the tables would have salt or pepper and you would struggle to get a hold of any Stewart to get you the needed 1e. In room dining was so poor that my child was eating plain rice without any vegetables as ird mentioned that only butter paneer or chola is available for child that is less spicy. Does lt mean that st regis serves frozen food and can't…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: R G
Detailed Review: Ambience is good Food is Great We had vegetarian starters and soup, it was good and u Service is good Special thanks to Azam, Mayank and Kevin They have been great team and trying their best of service

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: arjun84
Detailed Review: Amazing stay and service! Kiran and team went above and beyond to make us feel welcome and get our parents comfortable. Will stay again every time we come to Mumbai. St. Regis spoilt us for ever. Love it!!

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Khushal Arora
Detailed Review: Lovely ambience at the bar drawing room with the amazing burger and the coffee we had, not to forget the Salmon salad. The champagne bottle opening ritual was nicely done and top it with the welcoming curtsy and service by Sushmita, just like the lovely smile in her eyes that we could see from behind her mask, made the experience very pleasant. Will be back for more

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: BhavP
Detailed Review: I have only 3 words for this hotel...  WOW, WOW and WOW !  Tallest hotel in Aamchi Mumbai !  This hotel is all love !  Visited their few days ago to witness the Tree-Lighting session as they brought in the Christmas !  Impressed beyond words !

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Greg Jacobson
Review: One of the top properties we’ve stayed worldwide.
Detailed Review: What’s not to love about the St Regis, it’s exceptional! From the over the top breakfast, champagne ritual, to the sunset hours snacks, we are very happy here. Arvind made sure our glasses were always full (no charge), and our butler Dhanraj is taking outstanding care of us. The hotel is elegant and first class without being stuffy or pretentious. Strange enough, the have a root vegetable hummus that is the best I’ve ever had (Israel has amazing hummus too, no doubt). We are truly enjoying Mumbai and the St Regis has turned out to be an excellent choice of properties. I highly recommend it.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sheetal Tulsyan
Detailed Review: The food was delicious. Ambience was also splendid. Evening well spent. Thanks to Kevin and Azam for their impressive service. We ordered paneer Sabzi,  mughlai paratha, veg kadhai, chocolate milkshake and dal makhani and all of them were really tasty.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Pallavi P
Detailed Review: Excellent stay and MANSI PAINTER gv us MINDBLOWING SERVICE. Very happy with her gesture and would surely love to come and stay and VISIT MANSI PAINTER AGAIN😊THE ambience and the food was awesome. The view from my room was excellent. Very happy 😊

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: PUNITBANSAL
Review: Average Service for a 5 star hotel
Detailed Review: Excellent Location , Good food . Service can be proved .  Hotel is located in a very nice place adjoining phoenix mall . Checkin is smooth . Rooms have good amenities. Food quality is good .  They slightly lack on service . You have to search someone for luggage on Checkin and checkout. Even in dinning room service is poor for a 5 star hotel .

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sudhir T
Detailed Review: Nice hotel with good views from top. Food quality is good.   Overall arrangements were okay. Place is conveniently located and have proximity to Racecourse Haji Ali science center Nd nehru planetarium etc.  Rooms are spacious. Overall a nice experience.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Noel S
Detailed Review: I have a wonderful time at the Mekong restaurant and the service was top-notch and will definitely visit friends and family and would like to thank Mr. Junaid & Ananth for taking such a good care of family with great efficacy and care. Not to forget Mr. Abhishek for arranging vand help us curating the menu and helping me since day one.  Great restaurants with wonderful and decicated team.  Thank you Abhishek, Junaid and Ananth you guys made us feel home

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ravi Singh
Detailed Review: Great stay we enjoy soo much in marriott mumbai is a nice place but sooo costly.......But the hotel ambience was soo good and We will visit again and the best thing supportive staff and professionalism we are very happy for services   Thank You So Much St Regis Mumbai For best Services.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: shivang desai
Detailed Review: A very Luxurious Property with amazing view from 22nd floor, you could see the Mahalakshmi Race course. The Breakfast Spread was simply superb and grand.. any dish you choose it was just perfect in taste.  The butler Dhanraj Kolte surprised us with a wonderful gesture. A special thanks to him for that kind gesture

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: nayan kothari
Detailed Review: We went to seven kitchen for dinner.   Pizza & thai currey were ausome.  Wounderfull service was given to us by bikram & gajendra.   It was our anniversary.   They both made it very special   They put so much effort to make our day special.   The property is designer   Ambience & interior is very very very classy.   Staff is very polite & curtious

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sanai
Detailed Review: Great Place..with exquisite cuisine. Scrumptious meal with sushi dumpling italian arabic and indian delights..Liked the amenities and the food..Great place for sunday brunch..definitely looking forward to come here again..

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Jui Chavan
Detailed Review: I had a lovely time @Sahib Room and Kipling Bar, St Regis. The food, the hospitality, the ambience everything was top notch. It’s one thing to ask how the meal went in a rushed pass by, it’s another when the sous chef himself comes and asks you for your honest opinion or review for restaurant's future betterment. They even surprised us with cake for special occasion. Mr.Azam from the sahib room restaurant made our experience memorable. Definitely visiting again ! :)

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: israshashank
Detailed Review: We celebrated our anniversary evening here. Loved the ambience and our server Azam was great. He surprised us with an awesome cake. Loved the experience.  The food could be better though.  Paneer was very average but churra parath was good.  .

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sandeep Soni
Detailed Review: It was a brilliant experience. All thanks to Mr Kevin for the amazing service and amazing food. Finger licking food ... Of course if you use your hands to eat 😋 Impressed 😀 thank you for the amazing surprise cake

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Hoshang V
Detailed Review: Many thanks to the entire team for warm hospitality and good service provided to us during our stay. Located near metro station (airport road) it’s easy to manoeuvre in near by city area. I would like to specifically thank Ms.Smita for her help and generosity which we will never forget. Hard to find such good human.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Shubham
Detailed Review: We have stayed at Vits for three nights..The hotel is very close to the airport.Check in process was smooth.All the staffs are very helpful..Poolside breakfast was great choice of varieties.. Rooms are neat and clean and spacious.. Thanks to all team member for their great effort..

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv

Detailed Review: 31st evening dinner ... Its been over 8-10years i have been coming to vits for 31st nite party.  No complaints .service at its best ..great ambience ,nice music . Priyanka one of the event organiser has been planning the event to perfection over the years along with other staff members.

Detailed Review: Been there for new year celebration..everything  was perfect.. Highly recommend  for all ll... Will come surely in future.     Chef was very helpful and all the staffs too.food was good in taste.  ............

Detailed Review: We stayed there for couple of days till 31stmm.Location is heart of the city.Rooms are neat and clean .Poolside restaurant was very organized..It's highly recommend for all types of travellers.We will visit very soon .

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv

Detailed Review: We had a pleasant experience and atmosphere with excellent and delicious  variety food.  The ambience too beautiful  and different...The pool side gives a different view and it is relaxing too.. The service

The room was clean and well furnished the housekeeping staff jamshed and Bikash was very helpful to me they cleaned my room on priority bases jameshed was very fast with work with in couple of minutes the room was clean by him thanks for giving us best service.   Must visit vits hotel mumbai once will have great experience and best service.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Dipayan
Review: One of the worst hotel I have ever stayed
Detailed Review: To start with: If you are travelling from an international destination and carrying duty-free liquors, you need to drop them outside. Why? Outside food & drink are not allowed inside the hotel.  Last 60 days I have stayed in almost all major cities in India @ 3 & 4-star hotels. Never had I had to face this problem. Stayed at Ibis, Four Points, Fairfield, Courtyard - no such "amazing" policies.  Rooms are in old, bad condition with cockroaches at times.   Water in the room is not from any brand, unlike other hotels. So you can't be sure what water has been provided to you. Especially in these covid times, you got to be sure.  Every time in the last 2 days I have called the reception nobody picked up or called back. Every time I had to visit the front desk to request food etc. …

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rajit
Detailed Review: I had celebrate my first marrige annivarsary....I got owsome service from Pratik...thanx for Grt service Hotel Vits...All things are like decorations,food all good....thanx once again..I strongly recommend for this hotel...thank you so much Vits and There Staff...

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv

Detailed Review: Amazing and very helpful service, the ambience is very pretty and beautiful plus the food is also amazing, Karan and Soniya were very helpful and generous, glad to came here, They have a nice sunday brunch also, surely coming next time

We are planning to visit this place again. Specially starts are really tasty and fresh food they serve to us  This is somthing perfect eve looks like We enjoy here with family after so long

They help us to make a creative memorable evening.   Miss priyanka is really polite in nature and her team is really good st work  They people enjoying there work . Detailed Review: Amazing service. Good food. Service is Good. Shrutika and priyanka very helpful person. Keep it up. Surely will visit again. We really enjoyed pool side area. Rooms are sparkling clean ! Specially thanks to Shrutika

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sanchita
Detailed Review: I was there for a two week corporate stay and the staff made tremendous efforts to make my stay as homely as possible. The food was delicious, rooms were extremely comfortable and the staff was extremely courteous and accommodating- they go out of their way to help you. Their dinner service at Ummrao is simply delectable! I would strongly recommend this place to anyone looking for fun filled luxury!

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rajiv Jindal
Detailed Review: Wonderful venue. Totally satisfied with the event management, Tushar and his team. Food was awesome. Each and every guest invited gave a feedback about the arrangement and food. Thanks to chef Rajiv Das.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rakesh R
Detailed Review: We stayed there from Nov 17 till Nov 21. We came for an engagement ceremony. The hotel rooms were clean and tidy. The staff at the reception were fast and kind enough  to give us an early check in. The food was very tasty and the chef was kind enough to prepare gluten and lactose free Menus for us. The concierge desk was excellent in receiving the guest and managing the luggage. Mr. Devraj, Mr. Prathamesh and santosh did an excellent job on greeting the guest and giving warm welcome. Mr Rohit was the star to co-ordinate for engagement party.   The worst experience was with the decoration co-ordinator Ms. Dimple from Bhoomi Events. Despite giving full advance without negotiation, most of the requirements were not met. Whats even worse was  the event company's attitude towards…

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Priyanka S
Review: One of the best hotel in Mumbai
Detailed Review: We stayed here for 5 days. We got free upgrade to  next category because of our Marriott Bonvoyy membership. We also got free airport pick up and drop. Both of these things came as a surprise to us. Our stay has been really enjoyable. This is a well maintained property, clean and hygienic rooms, staff is courteous, food is delicious. Overall 10/10. I want to mention great work by Mr. Hemant and entire front office team. Our check-in was really smooth. Actually, our flight got preponed but to our surprise we were given early check-in around 10AM which I think was amazing. This is a great place, nearby to majority of famous locations in Mumbai. This was the third time we stayed here and i hope more to come in near future.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Riya s
Detailed Review: Nice place to spend time with your family and loved one. We stayed at pool view club room which has spectacular view and room was big with clean linens and soft pillows. Bathroom was also cleaned. Food was good at the restaurant called momo cafe which is on the ground floor and it's is properly sanitise and huge place with comfy sofa set. Staff is courteous special Amin at the restaurant was really helpful and Mr. asif from the travel desk arrange a car for us on special request. Which we like the most. Staff is well trained and courteous.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: babs5662
Detailed Review: Rooms are spacious & well lit.   Services from check-in to check out were good. Need some more check-in counters as the time is taken to check-in is quite long.   Food & snacks r of good quality  Recommended as a good Business Hotel.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Manaf
Detailed Review: I had a wonderful experience in the hotel. The rooms were very comfortable the front office staff, the concierge team especially Mr.Devraj was eagerly helpful and delightful.Thanks, front office staff, and Concierge team.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: TheLazyTraveller
Review: Does not cater to Indian hygiene sensibilities.
Detailed Review: While the room was good and the staff very helpful, there were 2 major deficiencies that all travellers (particularly Indian travellers) should know.  1) They do not have a hygienic spray in every room (only a few rooms have it). I realised this only after checking in, following which I brought it to the attention of the front desk, who while being courteous could not do much more than offer a bucket and mug (No blame to them, as this isn’t their fault. However, the swiftness of their response tells me this was a regular issue).  2) My Amazon co-pay credit card with which I booked the room did not work at the billing counter during check-in. There was nothing on the Bonvoy website to indicate this (not sure if there was some fine print I did not read).

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sujit Karath
Detailed Review: I have been staying in this property for a month now. Whilst I did mention earlier that the property did follow  protocol, I must say that their service has been extremely poor. Checked in on 21st Nov, came in late, ordered in-room dining and requested for 2 sets of dinner plate. Only 1 set came and we reminded in-room dining that only 1 set was delivered. The second plate did not come. My wife and me ate our dinner on one plate. There has been other issues with respect to house keeping, Today my wife ordered plate and cutlery and it came after 45 mins.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Dagmar
Detailed Review: Staff is absolutely amazing; very accommodating, professional and friendly. The hotel,rooms and bathroom are very clean. There are plenty of complimentary water bottles in your room and the wifi works perfectly. Very centrally located and a perfect choice if you are traveling on business.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: SuperrDad
Review: Another visit this time as a Gold member!
Detailed Review: As always seamless check in (Prachi).  Umesh from Concierge has always been extra helpfull and professional.  Devraj was kind enough to arrange a quick airport drop. Courtyard is like home and these star tem members always make it a point to keep it that way.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Dr Arshaj
Review: Amazing stay. Fantastic Food. Outstanding hospitality.
Detailed Review: Was here for an AO Course with my wife. The room was amazing and clean and cozy. The staff very accommodating, granted us an early check in. The food that we ordered for dinner surprised us even more. We got mesmerised by the tasty Dal Khichadi and Fish curry . We did call the Room service to let them know that the food was amazing and to compliment the Chef, who was Chef Tejas. He was kind enough to send us complimentary desserts in gratitude. High appreciation for the culinary team at the Courtyard Marriott.   Kind regards Dr A S Gaikwad Dr S A Gaikwad

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rahul patil
Review: Such a beautiful and Amazing Experience.
Detailed Review: The property was awesome and clean all staff are helpfull. food was awesome and tasty 😋 admin staff are awesome for help and quick service❤️❤️. Mr NIKHIL GUJARI - FRONT OFFICE DEPARTMENT thank you for the recommendation this property.. Thank you so much 🥰

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Neeraj Malik
Detailed Review: Thanks team Marriott for ensuring our experience remains the best. Excellent service and food , no waiting for check-ins or checkout, neat and tidy rooms, fastest room service..simply great   Umesh you are an asset to the Marriott. Thankyou

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Satish Pokale
Detailed Review: A nice Full day Experience...As Unexpected...Hotel Provided Early Check in...as i arrived earlier..Mr Ashank Patil Served Me As Like KING..So The boring travel Period become fresher... after Wash with warm water. The Full day gone through The various services offered & Served by Mr Shrikant &: Adnan Ali ko.At the time of breakfast.Mr.Vinod Gaikar..

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Munish
Detailed Review: Good housekeeping services, good hygine specially during pandameic. Staff and services are good and adequate. Transport pick up-and drop also good.Food is also good. Enjoyed my stay in “Courtyard by Marriott, .

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Siddharth s
Detailed Review: I Had a fantastic experience from start to end. Moin Shaikh on front desk made sure a hassel free experience. And always obiliged me  with more without even asking for it. I am writing this review after my 3rd stay over here. And this property is much recommend in mumbai.   Kudos.  All the best.  Thanks a ton.  Going to visit soon

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: ysn123
Detailed Review: Hospitality was awesome,  staff at front desk were super helpful and courteous. I would love to visit again.  And would definitely recommend to our friends and relatives. Thank you everyone to take good care of us.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Robin
Detailed Review: Nice stay, ambience is good. Special mention for Asif at the concierge desk. I have been staying with the hotel for a year now. Property has been maintained in highest hygienic standards. Must stay for all types of travellers.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Saiba Ansari
Review: Must visit to Courtyard by Marriott
Detailed Review: Love the ambience of cafe breakfast and memorable stay from concierge to front desk. Got to chat with sayali and two more guys (forgot their names) but all were on points with their service. Would surely recommend to friends and family for event planning as well. 👍

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Guide10346113484
Detailed Review: Great services specially in terms of smooth check-in by Mr Dhaval at front desk was too kind and polite to consider all our request for all 4 rooms and getting us interconnecting rooms aswell inspite of hotel running on full occupancy.  Great and valuable experience would surely visit next time we are in mumbai.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Vivek
Detailed Review: Stayed over here after this long pandemic but really enjoyed the service ,great hospitality especial kudos to Ankita from at your service she is always ready with all best solutions  keep it up 👍🏻👍🏻

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Gayatri S
Review: Courtyard Marriott excellent service and hospitality
Detailed Review: I stayed at this hotel for almost a week. Service and staff had been excellent throughout. To name a few Asif, Mayur, Umesh, Prachi, Ashank and Devraj have extended excellent customer service and care during my stay. Thanks a lot for making me feel at home. Apology for any inconvenience we may have caused during our stay. Good luck and wishes from me will always be with you.   Thank you so much.  Regards, Gayatri

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Karthik M
Detailed Review: Everything is amazing about this property: location, food, cleanliness, amenities, but what really stands out is the staff. The most caring and friendly staff I have ever met especially Ashank the most amazing and friendly floor manager made our conference meeting the best we could wish for  Though it was a short stay  it's totally worth the money Looking forward to visit again

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Gautam
Detailed Review: During my stay at Courtyard Marriott, "The service was very good, and our stay was so relaxing.” This quote says it all: The service was so good that we just  sit back, relax and enjoy the experience.  Additionally the staff was really kind and willing to attend any request. Alongside thoughtful amenities and general comfort, an efficient staff that excels at personal attention is a must-have for all hotels which this hotel has.  A great thank you to Mr. Shreejit Pillay and Ms. Krunali for all the support and co-operation as always.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Kunal P
Review: It was great stay after Pandemic
Detailed Review: Overall, it was a fantastic stay. My first trip after pandemic. Ahhhh, it was rough year all together. This time, I stayed at Courtyard Marriott Andheri. Everyone from the hotel are amazing. But Mr. Hemant at the front desk, who was extremely pleasant, helpful and professional. Because I was exhausted, he assisted me with short and quick check in and offered me bottle of water. The room was fantastic, housekeeping guys was polite too. During my stay, I met Mr. Hemant several times in lobby and every time he asked me if everything in your room is fine and how my stay if going or do I need any help. Overall Kudos to Courtyard Marriott team for providing such a wonderful service, with special gratitude to Mr. Hemant. Definitely, my first choice for stay next time I visit Mumbai.…

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Shah789011
Detailed Review: I was visiting Mumbai for business purpose and chose to stay at the Courtyard. It was a good decision, especially the manager on duty Mr. Rony along with the entire front office team was very hospitable and gave me the best room as my request he also gave me access to the high speed wifi as I had multiple meetings to attend from the room. He was helpful and is leading a great team. Kudos!

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Vijay P
Detailed Review: entire hotel staff from Sachin at the concierge desk to Hemant at the front desk and Umesh the Elite custer Ambassador were very helpful. Sachin airport who arranged the airport pickup to Hemant at the checking desk. The next 2 days Umesh the Ambasdor for Elite guests  made  sure we had the most comfortable stay.  Gaurav Bhatte the Ast F&B manager made sure we had wonderful experience at Breakfast and Dinner. Overall it was a wonderful experience thanks to the Staff.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Aniket Pardeshi
Detailed Review: Had a wonderful experience at courtyard by Marriott pleasant stay. Umesh chanigala was best helped us with everything start to end and crystal at momo cafe was very polite and make us feel like home people like umesh and crystal make us visit this place again n again thanks alot for everything namaste 🙏🏻

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ss09
Detailed Review: Great hospitality, nice and clean rooms and lobby area. Front desk staffs and restaurant staffs are very friendly and courteous. I would love to visit again with my entire family.  Thank you everyone for all you did.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Shivam
Detailed Review: One of the best hotels near mumbai airport. Staff is very professional and kind. Duty manager Umesh attended me at reception and he is so humble and always ready for every support from his end. Nice food, ambiance and that pool view generate high positivity. After all it was a good stay. One thing i wanna mention here that food here is too costly, it should be affordable.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Mahinder Prasad
Detailed Review: Excellent service.Visited several times during panedemic ( corona ) period.staff members Followed all protocols of safety for corona.Special facility for sanitization.Saff is vey humble and co-operative.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Tahir Sheikh
Detailed Review: Stayed for a week for official purpose. Very close to Airport. Cleanliness is top notch. All necessary covid protocols being followed and implemented. Very supportive and courteous staff. Food is amazing. Also, feedbacks are taken very seriously.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: kpk
Detailed Review: Nice to be back at hotel where most of the staff still remember me which makes me feel great. Hotel is the same as last time I was here except some restriction due to covid19. Facility is clean. Food is tasteful like before. Rooms are clean.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rajesh
Detailed Review: Excellent service done by Rakesh dekorJason britto very happy with service provided definitely will visit nxt time we felt very comfortable  with the staff thank you very much courtyard  Marriott & Even concierge was very helpful specially asif was taking good care of us

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Brittany M
Detailed Review: Stayed for 3 nights at the middle of November 2021. The hotel, staff, service and food were all incredible. We enjoyed breakfast daily in the dining area. The omelette station and dosa station were both wonderful. The room service was also great - sometimes it’s nice to just eat in the room in your robe! The room itself was so comfortable - I could have taken the bed home with me and slept more and better than in my own home. They have thought of every detail. The housekeeping service is above par - they cleaned up while we were out for 45 minutes and yet did a thorough job plus.There are so many little things - they even left a small pack of masks for our use, the drapes have a sheen layer to let light in gracefully and a second, thick layer to keep the room dark - which has a…

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: RD
Detailed Review: Best place I stayed in Mumbai , very quick and easy airport transfer.  Staff was very helpful and kind.  Rooms were super clean and service was quick.  Food was amazing.  Over all a great place to stay!!!

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Akhya rastogi
Review: No no for a family vacation
Detailed Review: Dint feel welcome. Service felt sluggish. No slippers in room. A vaccum cleaner and dehumidifier was stationed outside room throughout. Asked for Housekeeping service twice..couldn't avail. No turndown service. FNB staff seems well trained and pleasent but less in nos esp at the all day dinning. Overall wont choose the hotel again for any kind of visit.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: yogeshwer Sharma
Detailed Review: I usually refrain from writing anything negative even if my experience is unpleasant. But place need to rated for there services.  First I have confirmed pickup from airport I re confirm with front desk via email as well and shared my flights details as well.  But once I reached at airport no one was there for pickup  I informed front desk and after that I start getting call from 3-4 person every one is saying different location for pickup. Finally I have to walk to local bus stand where driver was waiting. It has been better if I have booked taxi to hotel.  2nd) Check-in process is pathetic - As I reached hotel on 30th Nov 2021 at about 8:30 PM, I was in a hurry to reach my room and take shower as I was travelling since 7am. The reception ask me to do some paper work and ask to…

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Tushar R
Detailed Review: Very friendly staff, clean rooms. Overall, it was a very pleasant stay at the Holiday Inn Hotel. The reception was very helpful too and enabled a smooth check-in, check out process.   Mr. Hitesh was very helpful with the room check out.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Jaie
Detailed Review: It was fun staying in at Holiday Inn, Mumbai. To begin with we were welcomed by Hitesh and oguided through with our stay experience. The room was spacious and well maintained including hardware and fittings. The breakfast was a cherry on cake after a long while. With the choices of options and service it was an homely.  We do recommend everyone to book it not only for it’s location proximity but the service tops the list.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Kevin
Detailed Review: I have very good experience in saptami restaurant I'll give 5 star to the staff they are very helpful specially nikhil, shrishti,Malachi they are helping us to do good dinner i enjoyed alot and food was also good buffet spread is good I'll definitely come again in hotel

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Pushti
Detailed Review: We booked the ballroom at Holiday Inn, Sakinaka, Mumbai for my elder sister's wedding reception on the 21st November, 2021.  It is a unique little gem, really!  When the time came to finalize the venue for the event, we did not think twice and finalized the ballroom at Holiday Inn. It was the friendly service that made it worthwhile, special shoutout to Keyur, Ashok Sharma and Chef Umesh who pulled off the entire event smoothly. The food was very delicious, our guests enjoyed the vast spread and the number of varieties offered. The quality of food and the service by the serving team has turned out to be unbeatable experience and memory for our family and our guests. If not for the botch up by Parul Daftari from Marigold Events of the decor and stage height, this would have been…

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Amitabh
Detailed Review: Stay warm extremely  comfortable  . Hitesh was kind enough to provide a late check out . Rooms were neat and clean . Breakfast  was very good . Would definitely recommend people  to stay at the hotel . Would surely come back

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: priyank sharma
Detailed Review: Had  a pleasent stay at holiday inn andheri   Smooth checkinn check out. Experience and hospitality by  hitesh at front desk   Good food  and valuable meal combo options   Comfortable stay .... overall 5/5.....

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: scoutBAR L
Detailed Review: The place was really comfortable   The staff was very helpful and friendly will definitely stay here again   Very close to the airport   The breakfast was very good and had tons of options   The terrace pool was also really nice

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Akash
Detailed Review: Stay was very comfortable and rooms were neat and clean . Hitesh was very professional abd helped us to provide an early check in . Would surely come back and recommend others to stay holiday inn mumbai .

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: libranof1987
Detailed Review: I have stayed at this property for close to two months while travelling on business before the pandemic, and most recently, a night before an international trip.   The hotel is very close to the airport, and right next to the Metro station so very conveniently located.  The restaurant has a delicious breakfast spread, and the lunch/dinner service as well as the bar are pretty good.  Some observations basis my stay before the pandemic and now: 1) Our room didn't have the clock by the bed, but the other room on my reservation did. I first thought they didn't have them because of Covid concerns but the other room did - was just surprised how it was missed. 2) No menu card, notepad in the room - possibly because of Covid concerns? 3) The front desk most definitely didn't seem as…

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Veera
Detailed Review: The stay was good service was good the staff was good we were assisted by hitesh he was very professional and he has assisted us a lot and he has provided best service he was very professional only for the resto the waiting hour is too much

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sidharth C Masada
Detailed Review: We had a very comfortable stay at the hotel .. service were excellent . Room was neat and clean . Duty manager Hitesh was very helpful . We would surely come back and recommend others to stay at holiday inn Mumbai

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Avneesh M
Detailed Review: Had a great experience at holiday inn. Akash at the front desk was helpful. Aftab at saptami restaurant was super at service and helpful. Good buffet spread. Will visit again for sure. Good clean rooms.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: IndiaTravelGuru9999
Review: I would give this property the lowest rating of all my hotel visits worldwide
Detailed Review: The staff is not trained on how to communicate with incoming guests. The front desk person who answered my call after reserving did not know that the hotel had a breakfast option in the morning. It was very difficult to get through the bureaucracy of getting documentation and approval needed and each time I spoke to the staff they provided conflicting versions of what was required for ID proof, address proof, etc. Reaching the duty manager was hard during my stay. Overall, I felt that the hotel staff were not properly managed nor were they properly trained. Communication and guest handling is the main issue here. One of my worst and frustrating stays ever.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: NNS
Detailed Review: Had a get together at Saptami Restaurant for Sunday Buffet Lunch. Good food, Good service. Definitely recommended. Pretty reasonable for the kind of spread and for the time spent. Great place for also kids to enjoy.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Faizal Ansari
Detailed Review: Great experience. Food was great. Great ambience. We visited at the time of festival and one of the best experiences. Great assistance from Anand and service was great by Aftab and team, the menu was really very vast and included various drinks starters salads chaat counters waffle station pasta counter etc. The main course was delicious and the desserts were amazing!!

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: GAURANG SHAH
Detailed Review: Excellent  in every thing, we enjoyed lot.  We met Anand Chowdhery, he is very very co-operative and helpful. The food was quite good, with a lot of options for all courses. Would recommend the desserts.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Abrar
Detailed Review: Had a very comfortable stay at the hotel . Duty manager Hitesh was very helpful since the day of check in . He had taken care of all our prefrences . We would defintely come back and reccomend others to stay at this hotel.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: vigneshpatil15q@gmail.com
Detailed Review: Came to visit Holiday inn hotel with my family to have a dinner buffet every thing was to superb the front office assistment every thing but when it came to our dinner time It was too amazing specially I want to mention aftab's name who specialy taking care of our table everything was too quick and professionally done by him thanks and well done.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Swati
Detailed Review: Food and Staff is good. Aftab was a wonderful host and very cheerful. He suggested some good dishes and was polite. Always smiling and the dishes he suggested were sumptuous. Best of luck to him and keep smiling.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Kamlesh
Detailed Review: Aftab was a wonderful host at Saptami. Kudos to him and keep smiling always as u do. We had a good time and he did make us feel comfortable and his suggestion for food was good. We would visit again. Thanks

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Raj K
Detailed Review: My stay was almost for a week..with most appreciable service provided by employees.. Food was also 😋 With neat and clean rooms, Rooms service guys especially Montu and Suraj being prompt in service Overall had Ideal stay for my corporate/business trip.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sandip S
Detailed Review: Very centrally located and courteous staff. Checking was fast and cleanliness was good . All hygiene care have been taken and the food is also good.overall experience of the stay was pleasant and value for money

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Vijay
Detailed Review: Really enjoyed my stay stay is always helpful and polit Nina's is extremely good in his services manta was helpfull so me and was good on calls thanks to team ird raiash really helped in my stay and made my stay memorable

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ashish
Detailed Review: Mr.Weesley  Manager at VileParle is one the best Customer-Centric person ever seen. Both kids (13 years & 20 years ) enjoyed the hospitality from The Orchid. I really recommend this hotel for family vacations.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Dhawal tandel
Detailed Review: Very nice hotel, i was here for 1 day only and  my experience was so good restaurants are good and there's on person who always help me out so want to cheers him Excellent work Roshan at reception  Thank you roshan

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Chandrika20
Detailed Review: The food was delicious and the staff is so amazing.Mrs Nidhi and Kanchan very copreative and quick service  all the time  Beautiful customer service.... I'll surely recommend to my ..... Family and friend's

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Nelson D'Souza
Detailed Review: Excellent service , great bartending, experienced staff, the staff around is very Cooperative and the food is delicious. The ambience is great and the management has a very friendly touch to it , felt like home

Detailed Review: Overall a great hotel with some good facilities, especially if you enjoy some great food and drinks. They have a lovely  24 Hr Coffee Shop, a fabulous rooftop restaurant with a nice vibe and view at night.  The staff does their best to be helpful but you can tell they are struggling (as is everyone else in this business) with the long list of rules and regulations that they must enforce upon all the guests for reasons of safety and security, which is fine, but the frustration comes across in the tone and language which can be a tad bit disappointing. Just a smile would make things so much easier.  Having said that, some of the staff stood out and did an exceptional job. While checking in, we approached an empty cue at the reception and were quite abruptly asked to step back by a…

Do not miss the wine sabering every evening at the lobby, it's some experience. The breakfast spread at seven kitchens will surely brighten your day.

Name: Cherian Mathew
Detailed Review: I had an awesome stay at St Regis Mumbai last month. The attention to detail by the Butler (Mansi Painter) made my stay all the more enjoyable. Keep up the great attitude, courteousness, service mentality and you will continue to my preferred hotel on every stay in Mumbai. Also have to call out the most amazing breakfast spread, so many options of such a high quality. Truly would class  Regards, Mathew

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv

Detailed Review: The stay at St. Regis was very comfortable and luxurious. Everything right from check in to check out was very smooth. The rooms were super premium with race course view. I am looking forward to my next holidays to book my self there.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Mohit544
Detailed Review: first impression of any place starts with check in process ! I had to struggle thru check in process for at least 25 mins.they were hell bent on upgrading me whereas I kept on saying I needed the room which I booked! later on I realised that probably they have given my room to some other guest & I had to settle for smoking room !this was my first experience with this property but I think this will be probably last !my woes did not end here..phone was not working properly, water-logging in bathroom added to woes too.apart from this response time was so poor that I had to call thrice to get the dinner table cleared..this property definitely need upgrade in customer service !

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv

Anyone who wants to experience an amazing hospitality ...well the BEST ADDRESS IS ST.REGIS Mumbai .   id also like to shout out for Asst Manager Devina, Rupesh from housekeeping , Pradad from FnB ....well u all make my stay at home and seamless ...   im delighted to be a part of Marriott Bonvoy and fortunate enough to encounter amazing ppl and der extended hospitality.

Special thanks to our butler Mr Vineet Pai who made our stay very comfortable and decorated my room so beautifully for my birthday, I appreciate and thank him for all the efforts. I am also very thankful to Revaldo for a memorable in room dining experience. The entire staff at St regis is very kind, warm and always ready to help. I am already planning my next visit.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Bhumika D
Detailed Review: Amazing place for staycation in Mumbai. Room: Deluxe room. We had a king size bed and racecourse view from 16th floor. Comfortable bedding, matress could be a little softer. The interior of the room is classy and elegant. A good size bathroom with bathtub is cherry on top. A decent office table setup.  As the hotel is located just beside the mall, cabs are easy to get.  Food: Don't dare to miss the breakfast :). We initially didn't include in our stay, but after trying on the first day after early check-in, decided to go for it for the entire stay. Menu was the same for all 4 days, but still we couldn't try every item, as the spread was so huge. The menu is combination of Asian (including Indian), Middle eastern, continental and many more. Freshly made juices are must have. The…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv

Detailed Review: Wonderful one week experience. The amenities where up to standard in the room. Very well cleaned.  Very fast check-in. Considering price other options can be sought. Probably one of the less maintained VITS property.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Dorothy Fernandez
Detailed Review: Me and my colleague had stayed here. We had the worst experience ever 1. At the reception; the staff was very unprofessional and rude. They just cannot be in hospitality. Our check in was not smooth, we were not informed outside food is not allowed and when we ordered and while pick up the security guard was so mannerless and he was just not letting me go in as if he wanted me to sit and eat at the porch. Somehow I managed to get the food inside. If they had informed us prior we would not have ordered.  2. If I talk about the room; the rooms are very old and barely maintained. There was too much musty smell; switches were not working; telephone in the room did not work and it was so difficult for us to reach the reception. We needed water bottles and cutlery but I had no way to…

Review: i stayed for two days in this hotel and the house keeping room service was not good but the restaurant and breakfast services we

Review: In need of repairs, Location - Good. Rates Reasonable
Detailed Review: The check in took an inordinate amount of time.  No bellboys to take the luggage up.  The Wifi was provided - but could not connect as the devices repeadely searched for an IP address - but we could never connect.   The dinner menu was limited - but tasty.   However, for the price, it seemed reasonable. The best feature of this hotel is the location and the price.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Jigar Patel
Detailed Review: Issues I found during the stay: 1. Locker of my room was not working 2. Door was not getting locked properly 3. Floor tile was broken and could damage someone who walks with barefoot 4. Telephone line were not working 5. Wall paints in the room and lobby wall paints were old and looks unhygienic 6. found long queues and empty bowls at breakfast  All these were enough to rate the stay below 5/10.  After pointing this out, they upgraded me from deluxe to suite. Other than long wait and queue, food was good.  over all 2.5/5 star.

Detailed Review: The stay at VITS was amazing. The rooms are amazing. The front office staff is prompt and courteous. Overall a total recommendation for all. Value for money . The food quality is good. The location of the hotel makes it very convenient for travellers

Name: Dr.Nadia Rumman
Detailed Review: Thanks to Courtyard by Mariott Mumbai . I had visited for my aesthetic and sculpting training in 2019, during Diwali and Durga Pooja holidays. Thanks to my travelling partner ( agent), who makes and arranges my visa & tickets. And also to my training institute and Dermatologist friends / cum colleagues and family friends for making my trip memorable apart from professionalism. Their visit to the hotel plus the service to my guests by Mariott was very nice. The chef was kind and gentle when I had requested to fix my Salmon steak the way I wanted. Firstly, my suggestion would be just ask them to make it spicy with more peppers both white & black plus lemon and rosemary  garden. But the price was reasonable if compared to the portion they serve. Their local was also great,…

Name: Sameer S
Detailed Review: As a business traveller, you need comfortable rooms, good food, a nice fitness centre and polite and collegiate staff.  Ticks all the boxes.  The rooms were nice and spacious, and the workspace in particular was roomy and well thought out.  They do everything they can to look after you and more.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Niteesh
Detailed Review: Overall great experience. Kiran Mohite part of butler services went out of his way to make sure that my stay was great and helped me sort out an issue with laundry. My favourite hotel to stay in, when I visit Mumbai

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: TheCoupleTravels
Detailed Review: Pros: Location, Ambience, Food & Restaurant staff, Cons: Service at the reception and delay in getting rooms.  We booked 3 rooms for 2 nights in October 2021. The check in was at 2pm but even after 3pm we weren't given our rooms and the staff at the reception were very arrogant and high handed. We took the sea view facing rooms (you dont really get a good view of the sea more like a partial view.). Good spacious rooms, well maintained with all the required amenities. We had one lunch and all our breakfasts at Seven Kitchen, the staff there is very courteous and the food is very good with a wide variety of spread. We also had dinner at The Sahib Room & Kipling Bar which wasn't great and can be skipped. Apart from the initial issues at check-in the hotel is nice and highly…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: ShabbirMerchant
Review: Luxury with efficiency in the heart of the city
Detailed Review: Had stayed at this hotel earlier when it was under the Palladium brand. The St Regis brand has definitely done well for this hotel. Location continues to be a premium if you have work meetings between South Mumbai - Worli - BKC. Room is super comfortable, luxorious and spacious (which is a premium in a city like Mumbai) with very efficient housekeeping service. Loved the view (ask for a room facing the racecourse). Breakfast service has all the possible choices you can seek (don't miss their freshly baked Vanilla muffin) and some great service by the restaurant staff (big thank you to Kenneth for his exemplary service on both days). They have only 3 elevators for about 24 floors - so elevator wait time can be slightly long.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: PrernaBirla
Detailed Review: We purchased a romantic getaway package.....where we were promised a special private candlelight dinner...I thought it would be perfect on the occassion of my husband's b'day. Once it unfoled, I realized that there was nothing private about it. Not only that, there was no decoration at all. No candlelights. In fact, the staff could care less as to what we had purchased. It was clear that one department - the sales team was saying and promising something that the F&B staff either had no clue about or could not care less even if they did know !!! I also purchased a 'celebration package' which means that I get lights, balloons and 1/2 kg cake. To my surprize , I was told that they are making this complimentary. But then they cut corners in such a cheesy manner. The 1/2 kg cake…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sani V
Detailed Review: Exceptional service - especially Tejas (from Butler team) was extremely cordial and proactive any offering help. Our package included dinner and breakfast buffet - and both meals were excellent, especially breakfast had a really large spread. Overall - location close to shopping place and Nehru Science center, top quality food and very good staff.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: kunal agrawal
Detailed Review: Travelled in October'21 for a 1 night stay, we were celebrating my wife's birthday. We had booked a high rise city facing room and were upgraded to a suite category room facing the race course on 31st floor. We were also given an early check in as per our request. The check in process was quick and smooth and Tejasvi at the check-in desk took good care of us ensuring that the process is smooth and quick.  The room itself was beautiful facing the sea and the Maha Laxmi racecourse. Jonathan ensured that we were provided with a complimentary cake for my wife's bday along with a small teddy and a cake for my 3 year old daughter.  We had taken a staycation package which included dinner and breakfast at the Seven Kitchen and complimentary cocktail hour at their new restaurant - Sette…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: karnathota
Review: Worst hotel in Lower Parel Mumbai’s
Detailed Review: Worst hotel worst management ..cleanness and look wise very nice..but comes to management and food worst here …i stayed here for 7 days and my stay was horrible…food cost also not affordable ..avoid this hotel have a great options near by with half the cost of this hotel

Name: Harshad Dhamankar
Detailed Review: Much awaited Festive Beano is on the door and how can I ask a great start than this. Exuberant Joy is at poolside located at @vits.andheri @vitsmumbai where I found myself surrendering to this captivating Sunday Brunch. No words to define the Hospitality. Right from entering till I leave, my every moment was worth spending. Priced at 1200 plus taxes per person, it's definitely worth visiting. Review as follows- Ambiance - Poolside is one of the magnificent area which you can look forward to dine in here & worth spending time with your friends, family, loved ones. Enough of space to accommodate large groups as well. Food -  One thing I love about Kamath Group of Hotels is that they never compromised their quality. I loved the quality of each and every dish they served. Fresh…
