Also they did excellent Halloween  theme at Poolside. Room service was prompt. Few staffsvlike Ilyas, Karan and Ram was very helpful..  In room dining Lady was also very polite to serve our dinner order. Highly recommend for all

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Akanksha
Detailed Review: We had a lot of fun with friends, the food was great. The jalebi stall was to die for!! Staff was so Friendly! Best food I ever had. Homemade dinner rolls. The staff was so friendly! Will definitely visit again!

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ayyub
Review: Sunday brunch at pool side cafe
Detailed Review: I have visited your hotel vits hotel mumbai & came for the Sunday brunch with my family.Firstly i loved the greeting from chiyunika whoes smile is so beautiful.And also she assisted us to our table and explained about the different live counters.But last not the least Mr ilyas shaikh the  took great care of us.And big thanks to all the staff and chiyunika.It was great pleasure meeting all of u at pool side . We will visit the restaurant again

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Dipesh
Detailed Review: Great stay have a great experience at vits hotel Stayed here for 2nights  Service was excellent Restaurant team was great ms soniya Tushant and jiyut was very helpful during breakfast Thanku for your help

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Johntravelr
Detailed Review: Had a stay with my family great experience we came to restaurant at poolside restaurant team was very helpful Tushant soniya kunal was very polite at service thanku so much for your prompt service .we will come back soon

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rohit Thakur
Review: Excellent food, amazing service and good staff. Will Strongly recommend this hotel.
Detailed Review: The best part of my stay at this property was the food especially the options they served at breakfast is amazing in terms of taste and variety. Really enjoyed the hospitality and service by Mr. Kunal Shetty at restaurant. He really took great care of us.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Monika
Detailed Review: Stayed at Vits with my family.Location of the property just center of the city.Rooms are spacious.All the staffs are very welcoming starting from their General manager to downline staffs.Foods are awesome.Special thanks to Vijay and his team mate Ram,Ilyas and Rohit.Chef deepprakash prepared awesome food for us.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Wahid K
Detailed Review: Location is nearby ordered in room Renuka was excellent polite and helpful .prasad delivered the order on time service was excellent room was clean .good food and service would like to visit again and stay.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Samir Daini
Review: Excellent Hospitality, Staff Cooperation and Food
Detailed Review: I would like to highly recommend this hotel for your events/ business meets/ stay etc. The staff under manager Ms. Priyanaka Mahadik is very cooperative and professional. Food is an additional plus point here. Overall an excellent experience, Thank you Team Hotel Vits!   Samir

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Abhishek
Detailed Review: Good servise done by chayanika saeindre. All veg and nonveg was good , ambiance was was good , servise done by all the ppl was and humble in nature , we came for office lunch with 33 ppl , they have done good service,well done team

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Zunee
Detailed Review: Pool side cafe  is simply superb. Excellent food and service. During my stay ilyaa  and prasant has provided dedicated service and really excellent guy.surtika  is very understanding and provided delicious food. I could not remember some of the names but overall they provided excellent service.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Swapnil Shah
Review: Overall everything is good especially breakfast
Detailed Review: I had stay with the VITS hotel the Breakfast at the poolside was amazing. The service was excellent. I would like to mention Mr. Kunal for this great hospitality. He was very humble polite ad friendly. Loved the sty at vits.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Nirav
Review: Beware! Entire hotel has black fungus.
Detailed Review: Terrible maintenance of the hotel. Room and lobby has paint peeling off and humidity. Black fungus growing in entire lobby which I showed to the staff. Most 2 star hotels will have better maintenance than this. Not worthy of being 4 star property.  Food had rotten corn salad, live cockroach in glass. I showed it to staff.   I asked for refund against immediate check-out which was denied.   This couldn't be compared to any other properties in terms of facility or luxury. Old bathrooms, old shower, old tiles, old basin, only lukewarm water (no hot water), etc. You just cannot accept it being called as 4 star. I will be scared of VITS property everywhere now.  Overall not a good place for business visits or infant any visits if you are a health concious person.  The only reason the…

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Jitendra Shende
Detailed Review: I have been travelling to a few locations in India and abroad for business trips and when it comes to India, VITS has always remained the first choice. Greeting with "Namaskar" by the friendly staff adds cultural fuel to the success of VITS success engine. Specifically would like to mention the Guest Relation Executive, Ms.Tanvi who ensured the check-in and check out process is very professional and she is the reason today for writing a review about a classy experience in VITS

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Tarannum
Detailed Review: The hotel with affordable price in andheri, few minutes walk from airport & marol metro station. Quick service whether it's a Reception or HK or RS. Room, hygiene, staff & security -  full mark 100/100

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: vasudevhri
Detailed Review: Staying here for business purpose  Great stay and very polite service from restaurant team  like to mention Mr tushant mr Karan pathania Mr ram and was very helpful  thanks so much for ur hospitality.  Great stay Great experience

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Bhavna
Detailed Review: Diñner for veg / non veg was fantastically brilliant in terms of quality and quantity. Chicken in oyster sauce was too soft and just melted in the mouth. Spring rolls were equally brilliant in the texture and crispiness. If this was not enough for the starters,  tawa veg, dal makhani really stole the hearts of everyone.. kudos to the entire team at VITS.. you guys are brilliant.  A big thank you for making our event so successful

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sudhanshu
Detailed Review: The food was superbly given.paneer was superb,hotel stay is superb, beautiful campus,rooms are very nicr Awesome staff chayanika and prashant were really nice and helpful.the food was amazing and delicious

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sureshbabu
Review: Well maintained and good cleaning services.
Detailed Review: Had a good maintained and well cleaning services. Every day they will make room as fresh and neatly. Thanks for kamalesh and bikas for make a room clean and freshly....so enjoyed a lot in the room.....

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Bhagyashree
Detailed Review: It's was a really nice experience visiting pool side cafe , ambiance was amazing , service was amazing , servent was very polite , we was take care by chayanika , prashnat , they  was very polite and it was amazing service

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: John
Detailed Review: Vits hotel is really good and their staff is So helpful and specially thanks to Rajkumar gupta he was working their as internship but he's service very grateful  Thanku so much Rajkumar. I like to came again

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Prasad Gudi
Detailed Review: Really really enjoy the service atpool side restaurant specially thanks to ilyas and Karan . Me and my family would really kyu to visit again . Thank you team Resturnt team  Really like a food service service .Kram  was very kind . help us with a gud table and service .

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Kartik shah
Detailed Review: Best service from Ravi and mansi they are good and excellent must be upgraded from there job...  Breakfast is extremely good..  Also thanks for breakfast allowed to get in room ...  Thanks for allowing early check in...

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Usaif
Detailed Review: I n my colleague went for dinner in pool side cafe . The ambience was superb. The restaurant was packed up but our server kran pathniy and ram made sure that our food don't get delayed. He took good care of us. The way he was handling us was very good. Long way to go Buddy. Eagerly waiting to come back. Thanks for the hospitality.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: NIPUN
Detailed Review: Currently I am staying in the hotel for last 25 days  The hotel room is good and housekeeing is ok... but the bigger concern is on the reception staff and hotel policies.. every-time I had food i was asked to pay immediately and they did not bill the same to room.. I dont see such policy in other hotel.. also outside food is not allowed and they committed 25% discount initially but the same was never applied on bill. their polices are are really poor and not customer friendly. they disturb a lot for payment if you had food.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Affan shah
Review: Location near the  airport and cafe pool side break fast
Detailed Review: Hotel atmosphere was very good and buffet was very very big poolside  restaurant is very very good and food was very very tasty and @ lotus restaurant  mr Ilyas  & Ram very very good service given and Ms.priyanka very helpfull and entire staff service is good HAPPY TO STAY

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Jitendra
Detailed Review: Service provided by kamlesh and bikash was good excellent ,nice clean rooms,time to time and fastest service I ever seen, thanks vits hotel ,for this memorial stay ,I visit again with my family again thanku

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sunil kurmi
Detailed Review: Vits hotel  is the best pool side restaurant ever and staffs are really amazing specially  pratik and karan p  they got everything towards our table and make my experiance memirable and chef puskar  offered some great Chinese food that was delicious thanks to vits and cafe team.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Abhishek S
Detailed Review: Amazing food Friendly staff Excellent service by  pratik  and karan pathaniya  Go for it Great deals available Good spread for buffet. Starters are amazing. Deserts are amazing. Pratik  was very hospitable. Karan pathaniya  gave amazing service.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Jorge
Detailed Review: Evening well spend with friends at this hotel restaurant with pool view. Lovely ambience Thanks to Clint and managers for ensuring great setup and nice meal. All team members were very polite and helpful. Thanking chef for recommendation. Will visit soon

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Amit
Detailed Review: Thank you saurendra and bhoomi for wonderful service we really liked the venue specially the poolside restaurant and also the food quality and ambience of the coffee shop with the view of pool and water cascade we will definitely come ro the restaurant again.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Shuzain
Detailed Review: The sunday brunch of visit Mumbai was amazing there were many options in buffet  and those pasta,chaat live counter was very attractive and thanks to Himanshu and visit  team for giving as a great service we enjoyed a lot

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Shweta S
Detailed Review: It was an awesome experience in poolside cafe which is located in vits hotel..chayanika was very polite and good in the presentation..my overall experience was amazing ..had amazing birthday party .. ambience,food,staff, hygienic was maintained very nicely..must visit place..

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sagar kuperr kar
Detailed Review: Good food good service by pratik and ilyas and karan these are people very help full nad aslo Sunday brunch is very spred and alots of food veritys and the live counter diffrent types of pasta vertiys iam so happy to come virs team and thank you bits tema to make my day spicel.....

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Michael M
Detailed Review: I am enjoying my stay here especially as the staff are very courteous and friendly, always helpful for anything that you need. Food is very good the service of the Banquet Manager Mr Saurendra Ojha and his team were very nice.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Dhruvil S
Detailed Review: Awesome stay. Was given upgrade to my rooms to executive and thereafter suite category. Loved the support of the staff. Thank you. Look forward to staying again in my next visit. Everything about this hotel is very good especially the dining area near the pool.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Patsy P
Detailed Review: Thanks to all people at vits hotel. Their poolside seating is really great Great ambience and tasty food Much appreciate Clint and his brigade alongside chef for special attention Will visit soon. Keep rocking

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rashmi
Detailed Review: Ordered in room dinning  food was ausom special thanks to renuka and jadish for giving me special service and make me feel special and gave me excellent service. Rest all was good . Location is good near international airport. I wish to visit again

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Amit Kathare
Review: Pool Side Dinning - An amazing experience, must try place along with family & friends
Detailed Review: We had order veg & non veg menu.. Panner dry & chicken was just mouth watering, prawns tandoori nice & tasty. Biryani had good quantity and amazing taste.   Pool side view and sitting is just relaxing  Service provided by Chayanika is wonderful, thank you very much!   Thanks

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: MAYUR SOLANKI
Detailed Review: Dedicated to all staff of hotel their behaviour, hospitality and services was awesome. Food was delicious room was excellent i really like it. And Kamlesh Gore who come to make my room his way to doing his work was outstanding i really liked it.Thank u.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rachit
Detailed Review: Hotel is well located near airport.The ambience of the restaurant was amazing.Foods are yummy and lots of varieties.. Management was very helpful Specially Pratik,Himanshu.Recommend for all types of event.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: ms.ruchi
Detailed Review: ordered food from room dinning the food was piping hot and great thanks chef and thanks  to himanshu for being so kind and helpful  wanna visit again to this amazing  place nd a special thanks to vits team

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Muriel R
Detailed Review: Hotel is well located near airport. Rooms are good  Team is well led by the Hotel management  Food is nice with good ambience  Restaurant team is very courteous and meet your expectations  Thanks to Clint and his team Vijay. Tushant. And more team members  See you soon

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Tejal Desai
Detailed Review: Great place for get together with family food was excellent mainly breakfast was amazing with sperate...  Ambiance was great with waterfalls.. we got excellent service by chayanika. She was so polite and helpfull. Definitely I will come again.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rajukholge
Detailed Review: Happy with the stay great experience at pool side restuarnt for breakfast Thanku mr Ranjeet and Tushant and restaurant team for great service thanku so much for ur promt service during the stay hope to see u back

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ashok C
Detailed Review: Stayed for 2 nights in vits great experience  like to mention the restaurant guys Mr ram and Tushant was excellent top at the service great hospitality  great pool view restaurant  good sound of water thanks so much for your hospitality

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Nitin Barse
Review: Excellent Spread of Breakfast , superb service
Detailed Review: Really Nice , feel good hotel , staff is extremely polite ,  rooms are good, centrally located,  Parking available, wish to have operational gym and pool , nice to stay with family and friends, ecotel concept truly taken up

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Satya Goswami
Detailed Review: VITS hotel is only 1 km from airport and hardly 200 m from metro station. Friendly staff, clean and large rooms. House keeping response time is too good. Good place to stay, rooms are large and well organised.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Piyu
Review: It was worth to stay.. grateful to have an experience
Detailed Review: The food was excellent and the service also nice @chayanika… the hospitality and greeting were kind and was nice gesture.. by her! I came here fir my exams with my husband.. but it was nice to chill at pool side with one bottle beer in hand😜🥰🎉

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Mihir Maniar
Detailed Review: Fresh piping hot food, great taste, good quality fresh ingredients and lightening quick service...I must say I thoroughly enjoyed my buffet breakfast experience at Vits poolside. What a great start to the weekend, thanks to Vits Hotel chefs and service staff. I have had buffet breakfast at many 5 star hotels in Mumbai, but I must say in terms of service and few other aspects Vits poolside is better. The managers, servicing staff were prompt, made sure the food was delivered to the table super quick...If you are coming here for breakfast live dosa, live omlette are a must have..plus they serve fresh juice without sugar and great milkshake...

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Vinay Sindhwani
Detailed Review: The spread is awesome, cut fruits, fresh juice, smoothie, buttermilk, milkshake, salad counter, corn flakes milk, eggs, live counters for omellete, dosa, paranthas, south indian, porridge, sausages, fresh bakery products, dessert etc. Their service is also impeccable, the ambience around the swimming pool adds to the freshness.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Aayush S
Detailed Review: Great stay this property. Nice pool view room . Staff was helpful and polite. COVID norms were taken well care of. I attended a conference , the conference hall was good . Overall nice stay. Highly recommend visiting here.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Naveen N
Detailed Review: Attended my company conference at the emerald hall recently. The service was great and the staff was very polite and helpful. The conference hall was nice and clean. Hospitality was great. Had a great experience altogether.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rajneesh Ambadi
Detailed Review: Had lunch at pool side ,I should mention specially that the service provided by Chayanika was great and that will make us to come again. It's really recommendable to everyone. Had a memorable experience

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Tejashwini Parmar
Detailed Review: The Ambience is Excellent, staff is polite and helpful. The hotel is is kept hygienic and clean.the food is yummy and a huge variety available. good experience. A must visit place for a date for couples.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sandeep B
Detailed Review: I stayed for 4 nights in vits mumbai it was great experience especially want to mention the service of Mr Tushant he was there at restaurant for execeptional service thanku for service hope to see u back i will definitely rate the service of Mr Tushant great hospitality

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: RAA
Detailed Review: By far one the best experiences we have had in any Courtyard Marriot properties 👏👏 Kudos to the management and every staff member of the hotel. Form security to reception to room service to restaurant to spa to car valet services … amazing experience and most courteous staff !!  Amazing food and team would happily service and get you hot food at the table if requested.  I will strongly recommend this hotel for family stays and family gatherings 👍

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sukhbir S
Detailed Review: Amazing stay, My family really enjoyed the stay  Thanks to Mr. Shreejit pillai who helped in the process of staycation and chick in process and the room services are very amazing with high end facilities. After this COVID Crisis the whole faculties are working under covid guidelines

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sss
Detailed Review: Good staff, all front office and HK were amazing. Food was awesome, decent spread of buffet breakfast. Enjoy the food and stay... Will definitely recommend to all my family and friends member. Thank you all.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Subho
Review: Value for money and excellent service
Detailed Review: Great stay - fantastic service!! Value for money and convenient, especially for travel around the city as well as in and out of the city.   Rooms are spacious and the food was great, with the ability to be flexible with food and dining requests given the COVID-19 context.   Will stay again!!

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Varun
Review: Seamless experience by the front desk team
Detailed Review: Loved the experience and stay at Courtyard Marriott. The overall experience was good. Everything seems to be perfect there, specifically the front desk team. They were very well behaved,polite and professional.  Everything was done quickly without any trouble.  Will definitely visit again in future. Keep up with the good work front desk team and other management staff.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Abbas ALI
Review: One night stay at this marvelous hotel.
Detailed Review: I cannot think of any negative aspect about Marriott Mumbai... From room to food each and every thing was exceptional. Staff was well behaved, supportive and very friendly. Food was simply awesome. Pan cakes were too good. My wife and 14 month old kid loved the pan cakes. Kudos to the entire team at Marriott.   SPECIAL THANKS TO AMIN KHAN WHO ASSISTED US DURING DINNER AND BREAKFAST. THE GUY DESERVES A PROMOTION FOR OUTSTANDING SERVICE.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Akshay
Detailed Review: The service was nice the front desk and travel desk was really helping and felt like home . I would like to name Devraj from front office and main chef both were given a good nice service . Money worth and  best service

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Priyansh M
Detailed Review: Brilliant check in experience. A 3 pm check out and an early flight had me worried but got room quickly within minutes at 9am.  The front desk team was extremely helpful as well and gave me an upgrade as well.   The breakfast was good without being spectacular. But considering the hotel property, connectivity and the rates, definitely would be a repeat guest.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sanjana Pherwani
Detailed Review: Amazing stay!! Umesh Chanigala at the the front desk give me a complimentary extra bed from his side and made my stay very comfortable he was very   helpful. He is a pillar of the property with his team. The breakfast was excellent, Shruti at the breakfast area was very sweet. lovely rooms had a memorable stay can't wait to go back!

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Indradip
Review: Excellent Stay in Mumabi during Covid Times
Detailed Review: Excellent team, great hospitality, Hygiene conditions are superb, great restaurant serving buffet breakfast and dinner, try the cocktails..they are great, spacious rooms, near to the airport!!!  In addition, try the O2 SPA and they have a great selection of Massages, right from facial to scrubs.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Neil Paul
Detailed Review: It's been a amazing stay at Holiday Inn Mumbai  I've been enjoying the service here Thanks to house keeping and staff  And Kinjal from reception desk for being kind and help me out with checking it  And Ishani for helping me book the stay

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Nici
Review: Good stay - good rooms for good price
Detailed Review: The stay was good, rooms are very clean and the price of the accommodation is not very high. The restaurant and bar is a little overpriced. Location is also very good as it is close to the airport. Perfect for business travels

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Jyotsna Salvi
Detailed Review: We planned to celebrate our Compay’s 3rd Anniversary at Holiday Inn. It was amazing experience at Saptami. Staff was attentive. Manager Anand was pleasantly attended. Aftab was serving us effortlessly.  Thank You so much for adding a pinch of happiness in our celebration.  Thank U so much Sanseep Ahire for suggesting the beautiful venue.  😇😇

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Shikha Gupta
Detailed Review: House keeping Dinesh, work is excellent also I want to add chef Dinesh, breakfast attendant name Nikhil, Joseph and sumit all are very nice and Helpful.. One touch service attendant Shwetlana is very kind and polite she helped in arranging A4 size papers for my daughter online classes.. Overall our experience was very nice here..

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Shashi
Detailed Review: Very warming service. Service with a smile. Special thanks to Varsha & Ashwadi for their kind words and ensuring comfort. Will rate very high for Cleanliness and hygiene. Location is great to reach places

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Raju
Detailed Review: Excellent service by ninad Prathamesh Nitin mamta Anand rahes really enjoyed my stay food was delicious and on time all hygiene was maintained by the team ninad really was helpful all while his service really would like to come with family again

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: VIJAY
Detailed Review: There was a water logging in my area due to cyclone in kolkata, so couldnot take the flight from kolkata to mumbai , so requested for hotel cancellation with some refund, but the reservation person Mr. Tejas is so very rude and uncooperative , that he didn't listen and is very rigid. Will never recommend this property to anyone.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: priyank khare
Review: Great Hygiene, amazing breakfast and very well trained staff
Detailed Review: Except the check in process which took some 20-25 minutes, all other parts of my stay here were appreciable. The room was big, going by Mumbai standards. Clean and neat. Breakfast spread was pretty good. Mr. Nikhil Dalvi, who was handlling 72 stood out.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Trip252930
Detailed Review: Excellent place with cordial staff. Especially Mr. Aniket at the front desk and Mr. Mahesh along with him were excellent and extremely cordial and efficient. The place was well maintained and very hygienic.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Akanksha
Detailed Review: Extremely good service and hospitality.  Good food! The breakfast spread was very good and palatable.  The ambience is very soothing and the prices are affordable. Look forward to visiting again!  Ashish and Ajay were very hospitable. All the best to the Holiday Inn team!

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: NUK
Detailed Review: It was just supposed to be a simple layover halt at Mumbai but turned out to be one memorable stay.. we got upgraded from a King Superior to a Suite and were treated to a beautiful room, delectable food and refined hospitality .. Thank you Holiday Inn ..

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Vijeyta
Detailed Review: The overall experience was great except the check in. The desk staff wasn’t good and helpful on the first day. I called to ask about the check in time, someone told me over phone that it was at 14:00 but then later they told us at the hotel that the check in time was 15:00 but still I didn’t get the room till 16:30. Since we had two rooms booked, they gave one room and other one after 16:30. As per the front desk person told us they’ll send the key in 30 mins to the other room but we waited for more than 1.5 hours. We called couple of times from the room to ask about the details of the other room, one person saying that the room has been done, other ground staff saying that at 16:23 that it will take more 20 mins. Finally we had to go down and check for the room key. It was…

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Awungshi
Detailed Review: It was a happy stay. Starting from my check in to check out. Big shout out to AKSHAY at reception who was very helpful and welcoming.  Food was good and excellent.  Will definitely visit again. Slightly disappointed, room service was delaying for orders and need to call multiple times to reach them for ordering.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sandeep upadhyay
Detailed Review: Visited this hotel , had a pretty bad experience, requesting same thing on phone for several times. Poor hospitality shown by staff. In-house dining is good . Location is Ok but you could get other hotels too, better avoid as your privacy will be hampered due to a housing society at back . Stinky carpet in my room.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv

Detailed Review: Amazing ambiance, the food was super delicious and the service was absolutely fab, Aftab who served us was very polite and helpful and made our experience much more enjoyable! Thank you so much, we truly enjoyed it there!

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Kashyap Rawat
Review: Attended 2days banquet. Very good hygiene, good food, great taste, good attentive staff, good housekeeping too
Detailed Review: Visited for attending our Aargatic Yoga course of Pranic Healing with my wife and many other healers.  would like to thanks these few people for their extra efforts and attentiveness for making our visit more smooth, happy and great. It was like we could cal Shankar for anything we needed help with. Prathmesh was very open to all feedbacks and made sure that it was implemented as soon so possible. Chef Yashwant who was  standing there many times and for what I understand....That's a good way to get guest feedback on the food and what food the hotel should focus on. As he was also observing most peoples expression and which counter was getting more attention by guests and then he almost understood that I wanted to praise the food and came n spoke to em and thanked me for smiling…

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv

Detailed Review: A 30-year old heritage hotel, situated right next to Mumbai Airport would ideally give you an impression of a beautiful vintage hotel and something which would NOT give you bad experience. Contrary to my assumption and belief, I had one of the most terrible experiences in terms of cleanliness of the hotel room However, After raising the issue, the staff looked into the details of the issues and tried their best to resolve it  Just want to call out these two gentlemen who went out of his way to ensure I get justice to my bad experience  1- Rohit. 2- Smith Roy  Both the gentleman were supportive enough throughout the process. They helped me until it got resolved Yes, my experience at the hotel was bad but when talking about the staff..I think they deserve the credit for their…

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: FamilyManNoida
Review: Strive to be better - and you can claim back the glory
Detailed Review: Stayed at orchid Mumbai. And I must say that it was designed and built with passion. It has all the amenities one expects from a five star hotel.  However, there are certain nuisances that made me think of it to be a 4-star hotel rather than a 5-star rating that it claims.  The bed mattress in my room had given in and  formed depression on the side I slept on. I heard the complaint about the mattress being uncomfortable from my colleague, who had stayed at the same time, as well. In general, the mattress height seemed half or two third of what one encounters at the five-star hotels.  Orchid has replaced plastic based water bottles with glass based water bottles. Room had these glass bottles filled with water. Kudos to them!  However, there is no taping of these water bottle caps…

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv

Housekeeping manager Mr. Shashank made sure that the room was decorated as expected, in fact better than my expectations. He was continuously in touch with me for the arrangements and made sure that the surprise plan for my husband was executed well. The hospitality at hotel Orchid is outstanding because of an amazing staff. The rooms are spacious and well lighted. The ambience of the rooms is beautiful. Room have amazing modern bathroom with both…

We have stayed at this property in past for 14k per night for double occupancy and the experience was completely different. Today I have to cancel my bookings @rs2607 per night for double occupancy and opted for other hotel due to wrong commitments.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ali Niyaf
Detailed Review: Great place to have brunch - everything india is under this roof. Amazing staff always ready to help Sea food , vegetarian , non vegetarian Certainly a lasting experience.  Live music   For both Businesses meet & family

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: mehakdeepduggal@gmail
Detailed Review: Such a pleasant place to enjoy with your friends.. Mr. Smith had been a great and a very polite person who attended us with warmth. Thankyou for the beautiful experience. The most beautiful part hotel is very near to airport

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Mithilabapat
Detailed Review: Had a lovely experience at  Orchid. As i reached early still I got the room and the process was so smooth. Got superb supoort from Mr. Smith who helped me with all the necessary requiments and helped me in  getting room that is early check in.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Neeraj
Detailed Review: Excellent food and excellent service by the entire crew, Harshada, Rahul, Sonali . Will definitely revisit . Good ambience too. The selection of menu is good and is filling especially the starters are very tasty

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: manishasingh
Detailed Review: Early check-in was offered by Mr.Smith Roy the hotel is close to airport and I had requested one day prior which was honoured and also premiere room was given it was a great check-in experience thank you Rahul Yadav and Miss Manisha singh

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Milan T
Review: Excellent hotel and great food and service!
Detailed Review: Excellent and comfortable stay at this hotel which is very near the domestic airport.The staff at the Bell desk was highly courteous especially Ms. Rtostay and Mr Roshan who efficiently handled the check-in  formalities so that we could settle quickly  in our room. Luckily we had an upgrade in the room as well ! The lunch and dinner buffet menu at Boulevard restaurant had a wide range of both vegetarian and non vegetarian items. Mr. Rahul attended to us promptly.Definitely would recommend to friends.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: screennameistraveler
Detailed Review: The food and the service at the Boulevard is what takes the cake. The breakfast buffet with a widespread option is one of the most elaborate and complete morning meal I have come across in my recent stays at the hotels. Even their lunch & dinner buffet is worth it.  Keep it up!

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Shyam
Detailed Review: Very well maintained rooms and courteous staff. Food is tasty and the variety is good.  Room: Spacious and comfortable. Cleaned regularly   Staff: Humble and courteous   Food: High on variety and taste.   Keep it up.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rupesh N
Detailed Review: Very nice food and service provided by the staff. Recommend to visit with family and friends. The rooms are also nice and comfortable with good hygiene. My best wishes to the orchid, staff and entire team.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: SHIDHARTH
Detailed Review: Amazing Food Nice decor and ambience.Excellent staff co operation.I have been here for teh first time.Liked it.Will recommend to visit again.The food quality was great.The buffet had a variety of delicacy.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Girish P
Detailed Review: Service at the restaurant Boulevard is too good.   Personalized service.  Booking was well organized. Buffet was served at the table to help guests.   Overall the booking, service of buffet was very good.  Quality of food is excellent. Taste has been maintained as before.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sneha Vaskar
Detailed Review: The food was excellent. The staff is extremely friendly, affectionate and helpful. We were served by Snehal and Harshada. The seating arrangements were good. The place is very good. Overall it’s a recommended place for buffet.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Abhay agarwal
Detailed Review: Dear all my genuine review absolute fantastic service less time for check in rooms were given on priority thanks to Smith and kunal for their extended hospitality bar is nice breakfast spread is awseome

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Nilesh K
Detailed Review: It was very amazing checkin experience given by Orchid staff Mahesh at reception.  I enjoyed my contact less checkin . N i realised it is very safe process and quick. He help me from self registration till giving each and every small details related to my stay . I came too early but still he help me early check in . Thnx to Mahesh for warm welcome .

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Vicky
Detailed Review: It was pleasure to be here after long time, staff here at the hotel is super helpful, polite, cooperative. The service is great. Harshada and Sonali served well. It feels like home here.  I humbly thankful to your staff for Service provided to us.  Thank you

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Chunnilala Nagada
Detailed Review: The awesome hotel with Nice location near to airport very friendly staff with warm welcome  by kunal very helpful with great smile on face 😀 specially I love South indian food in restaurant I will come back again n again with my friend n family

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: ARVIND K
Review: Mahesh loby Manager is very helpful
Detailed Review: I checked in orchid hotel and I mate Mahesh . He is very helpful during my checkin . He gave me nice and upgraded room with bathtub . Restaurants staff is also very polite. It's very close to airport . Whenever I will come to Mumbai I will surely stay with orchid hotel . Thank you orchid Team .

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Devang Y
Detailed Review: very nice hotel and staff is preety good and cooperative ..mr. krunal was really helpful. the food is really good specially the breakfast. I really enjoy the Bar there a good place to watch cricket while having your drink

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Riddhi
Detailed Review: The service was excellent.They are very cooperative.Beautiful decoration.the room was very clean.the view was too good.the rates are reasonable.the  set up was very beautiful.they are very polite and coopearative.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Oliver nizanthan
Detailed Review: The liquid buffet has many more varietys in it and the service is also very good.the staff was very helpful .I would like to thanks Snehal kanchan and sameer for there efforts and service very nice abimance of restaurant

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Shreya jain
Detailed Review: Really loved the work😊😊😊 Great hospitality  ESpecially shashank from orchid vile parle good work😊❤️ Loved the food and breakfast  Great variety for vegetarians❤️ Good ambience ❤️❤️😊 Thankyou guys for great experience

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Harshita avasthi
Detailed Review: Excellent hospitality by the staff at boulevard restaurant. We had gone for Sunday brunch on teachers' day and it was superb. Special thanks to Ms kanchan for her support and making us so comfortable. Kudos to Snehal and Shubham for excellent service. Would love to come back again. The food is very good as well.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Yoy333
Review: Excellent service by Mr. Shashank and Mr.Tarikh
Detailed Review: It was really an excellent food buffet. Was very pleased by the service of Mr. Shashank and Mr. Tarikh . Amazing food with good music and good sound . Well treated by the team . Hoping for more frequent visit.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sky
Review: Excellent service provided by Mr. Shashank and Mr Tarik.
Detailed Review: Food was amazing. Mr Tarik and Mr Shashank provided us the best in the buffet system . Kudos to you. The service by the staff was very helpful. Large spread was available. And the variety of food was Good.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sai Kumar kanugunutla
Detailed Review: Breakfast,Lunch & dinner awesome here.  I never find  a 5 star hotel before with this much items . For taste and varaties . U have to go orchid . this is the best hotels.. u can find number of desserts ,non veg items , veg items . And Pani puri..   In look point , this hotel interior looks in traditional manner ... little Museum u can see here..  Coming to the food serving staff , they serve with polite , respectful and  they give immediate respons  what we want ..specially thanks to Harshada

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Neil Joy
Detailed Review: Today we came in for a lunch Buffet at Boulevard - Orchid Hotel Mumbai and the spread of food was huge. More than 75 plus variety of dishes to choose from for both Veg and Non Veg options. It was an amazing experience. We were assisted by Harshada and Sameer - Amazing Service and Support. Greatly appreciated.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Gaurav
Detailed Review: I was really amazed on cehcek in i met lobby amanasador Mr Smith it was very ease in checkin we were offered complimentary strawberry drink which was dam good in martini glass a great feeling like other luxury hotels mr kunal and umar assist with my check out which was quick and haseelfre

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: gaorav
Detailed Review: one of the best place with exotic food had agreat support from from front desk smithand kunal the teo days meeting was never feel tored it was home away from home feeling chers to all i will recomend to others for sure

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Vijay
Detailed Review: The 2 days seminar which was at orchid hotel in chambers , we got a promt service from the staff,Roshan Lobo and Aniket and Abhishek were always on their toes to help, keep it up team and wish u all the best for ur future

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Nitin Y
Detailed Review: It was a pleasant stay at Orchid Mumbai . Our room was upgraded to next category. And we could check in before check in time.  Mr Smith assisted us with all check in formalities. hope to visit this palce again soon.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Dr. Sahil kul
Detailed Review: It was a great experience we had a 2 day meeting at orchid. Me. Abhishek who was managing the banquet halls gave excellent service and was always available. Overall great experience. Will recommend for team meetings

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Anand kulkarni
Review: SIRMAXO chemicals Sales Conference at Orchid
Detailed Review: Great and Amazing experience , Mr Roshan and Mr Abhishek did a great service. I wish them good Luck !   The promptness and the availability was good and also were very responsive ! This shows they are well groomed and trained ! All the best

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Vinit G
Detailed Review: It was well managed and the staff was very helpful. Will like to specially mention Roshan Lobo, Abhishek and Pushpendra they were always on their toes for the support during the 2 days conference. Highly recommended

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sujeet
Detailed Review: 2 year back we had event in orchid  Again we do it bcz of the food and service. Banquet staff and manager both r very supportive thank you team orchid for service. Special thanks to roshan , aniket and adesh.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Jayashree
Detailed Review: Had a great lunch on the occasion of your wedding anniversary. The staff were very helpful and took great care of our special occasion by arranging a nice cake for us .would like to appreicate the efforts of snehal harshada and kanchan and sonali who were great host

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Mudit m
Detailed Review: Good lobby more interesting  food at boulevard which was recommended  by Mr.Smith from lobby he is a gem off a person housekeeping staff fantastic rooms are well cleaned  check out experiences like other hotel it is much swift.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: dhanrajvarshney
Detailed Review: the people food staff are very amazing hats off to ratoshte gayatri Smith from the lobby for amazing work and very guest centric the gourmet shop cofee was amazing and thanks Roshan at Bell desk he was great player

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Keval
Detailed Review: The stay was very satisfactory. The staff was very helpful, especially the lobby manager Mr. Smith. We even got a free premium upgrade and a late check-out exception. Overall experience was very good.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: pre k sen
Detailed Review: Stayed in September 2021.   Writing this review after a long time.   Wonderful Property . Beautifully Maintained. Superb Clean .   Everyone from top to bottom are humble . in the reception desk , restaurant everywhere. Special appreciation to the Leadership who is managing the Hotel.   Special mention : Ganapathy , who is so humble . He had born specifically for this hospitality industry , he does his work with great passion.  Will Stay again.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: babsNagpur
Review: Good Hotel,nice service...Superb Location if you a Shopaholic
Detailed Review: a good centrally located Property just above the Phoenix mall...staff is very attentive and courteous.....breakfast can be a rush, but again managed well by the team and the spread is quite good.....rooms are quite nice and well maintained....higher floors have a good view of the city. best part is the access to the Palladium and Phoenix malls.....lots of choices for food and shopping.....go for the St Regis if thats your agenda

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: sadhvia2015
Detailed Review: To say we had a horrible experience would be an understatement! Maybe telling you that we have complimentary night stay available at the St. Regis mumbai and none of us wish to go back is the brief review of this property. For the detailed review, absolutely everything that could go wrong, did  This staycation was a Rakhi gift to us 5 sisters from my brother who lives in Australia. Also an occasion to celebrate a bachelorette since we couldn’t be travelling elsewhere  We arrived at the St. Regis property and before our bags are taken off the car the guard asks us if we have any sheesha or speakers in the car, we confirm that we have a small portable speaker only, however we’re happy to discuss with the front desk on the discretion to use the same without disturbing people.…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Jonathan
Detailed Review: Had a great one-night stay at St Regis. Checkin was smooth and the staff was very courteous.We were upgraded to a deluxe room and it was well equipped and clean. Though we checked- in in the afternoon, room service cleaned our room in the evening after we went for a stroll. The bundled dinner buffet and breakfast were amazing. Will visit once again.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: MaddamPresident
Review: Wonderful stay at the St. Regis, Mumbai!
Detailed Review: What a wonderful 2 night stay at the St. Regis, Mumbai! We took the staycation package for 2 nights with breakfast and dinner included. We stayed at the Grand Deluxe room with a race course view on a high floor. Adequately sized room for 2, with all amenities one needs, and plenty of bottled water, spacious and well-appointed bathroom. Room cleaning and turn-down service was thorough and timed when we were out to breakfast. Every staff member we came across, be it the check in and front desk, room service, dining at Sette Mara or Seven Kitchens, the lobby bar, concierge etc. were courteous and hospitable and offered all the assistance possible. Lobby, Check in and lounge bar were on the 9th floor and restaurants on 9M. There was easy access to palladium mall from the ground…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: ShreyaB121
Detailed Review: Writing this from the breakfast table.. my only complaint about the hotel is that it spoils you silly… the breakfast and dinner spreads are so large that you possibly can’t taste everything! The breakfast spread was made extra special for the kiddo with a rabbit dosa! The views are spectacular from the partial sea view rooms and the night views are worth a million bucks.. after staying in almost all star rated hotels in Mumbai, can happily recommend this as the top hotel in Mumbai in the luxury category. Looking forward to our next stay here. Considering the overall experience, would call this a great value for money staycation… forgot to mention that the rooms are awesome too, with great spacious bathtubs and bath areas and fabulous by the window, lounge settings!

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Akshitaa S
Detailed Review: Had a wonderful day at st Regis. Great ambience and aesthetically pleasing. The staff was very helpful and friendly. A great gym and a pool to chill at. Can’t wait to come back again and enjoy my stay here.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Divita Rai
Detailed Review: I visited for a shoot and was really impressed by the hospitality and ambience of the hotel. As an architecture graduate, there was a lot of interior design & lighting inspiration that I took and looking forward to visiting again.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: sachi k
Detailed Review: Had an amazing time! The ambiance is beautiful and we were made feel very comfortable! work environment was great and the services were efficient! cleanliness was at its best and we had a really good time

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Neikitha
Detailed Review: Amazing experience staffs are so polite and well behaved. Stay was because and nice, ambient is beautiful  The view is mind-blowing looking forward to visiting again very soon. Love the rooms and especially the lobby.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ojasvi Sharma
Detailed Review: I loved the experience here! The ambiance is beautiful. More than the beautiful rooms and comfortable beds, the staff is very friendly! We had a shoot at St Regis and they were super co-operative with all of us!

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Pallabi Saikia
Detailed Review: It is an amazing place, great staffs, amazing foods & a hygiene place to visit. I would definitely love to visit this place again whenever i will visit Mumbai and so do you visit . I just loved it. Thank you.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Lavanya Sangwan
Detailed Review: Amazing ambience love it here! The staff was very professional and well behaved. Thankyou for having us and being a part of my dream journey. Will always remember St. Regis Mumbai. The decor is lovely too.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Siddhi Gupta
Detailed Review: Had an amazing shoot day at this beautiful property. Staff is very cooperative and friendly and the property is very hygienic. Also my dining experience here has been great. Overall I had a lovely experience and would recommend everyone travelling to Mumbai to stay at this property atleast once.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Tarini K
Detailed Review: St Regis Mumbai is a beautiful property with great facilities. I had a very comfortable stay and can’t wait to visit again. Most importantly, covid19 protocols were followed and all safety precautions were in place.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Aishwarya
Detailed Review: Had an amazing time here while my stay for a shoot. The staff is really helpful. Food is good . Also they are taking care of sanitation measures properly in this situation.  Definitely coming here again

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sudarshan V
Detailed Review: I write this review as I'm still staying in st Regis . Reason :: the sheer hospitality that I've witnessed during my stay . Having stayed here before , I always knew what to expect in terms of room , service , food , location , cleanliness& the grandeur . It was anyways & always 5 on 5 for me , but this time it beyond expectations . Specially in this pandemic time , I've seen the staff go 2 steps higher in terms of safety . Traveling with kids ,I've seen the kind of understanding & care shown to make their stay happy & memorable was sandesh at business centre .  My gluten free options was very well taken care by chef Amit at seven kitchens & Bharti assisting us at the table is a delight , she's ever smiling and happy to help 😊. It was MR Suman ( The duty manager )  Who got our…

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Prabir
Detailed Review: We did our conference at Bits Mumbai..all the arrangement was good.Halls are big and neat and clean..Poolside ambience was great.Foods are outstanding here.All the chefs and service staffs are very helpful.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Akhilesh
Detailed Review: We stayed at this amazing hotel due to our  office conference. Arrangement was nicely  done.Food was lip smacking with buffet counter.Service of the staffs are very good.Rohit,Vijay,Sachin all are very helpful.Good experience at this property.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Kaushik
Detailed Review: I had very good experience with this hotel. Always they treat me as a family member. Chef has prepared home made food everyday as per my requirement. Inhouse dining and house keeping staffs are very helpful. Special mention Dadso, Sandip from House keeping. Vijay and his team Jugal, Pratik, Himanshu all are very friendly and always help me during my stay. Overall good hospitality with very friendly staffs.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sanjay
Review: Comfort stay with good food and service
Detailed Review: Been there for three days.Experience was just awesome.Very good hospitality.Food was upto the mark.Room service and restaurants staffs are very good.Chayanika and Ram was very helpful from room service.Bell desk Rahim was polite and helpful.Overall it's a comfort stay.Highly recommend for all.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Prajit S
Detailed Review: Loved the experience and stay at Vits.Overall it's a memorable experience as well.All the staffs are very polite towards their customer..Their room service is very prompt.As per the suggestion of room service lady we have decided to had our dinner in the room.And the food and suggestions were really great.Thank you chayonka for your suggestions.Rooms are quite big,neat and clean.Always will be there once visit Mumbai.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Jay
Review: Food and service was top rated
Detailed Review: As we are a regular visitors of VITS just because of their hospitality. Rooms are big enough and neat and clean. Food was yummy. Out server Himanshu was very friendly. Ambience of the restaurant was eye catching. Highly recommended for all types of travellers.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sush
Detailed Review: We stayed at Vits during our trip to Mumbai.  This hotel is very close to the  airport and also to the express Highway.  The interiors of the Hotel is magnificient  and very clean.   I noted names of Chef Deep and Chef Prahalad who prepared v tasty meals during our stay.  Hospitality of the place was fantastic .  Highly recommended .

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Nikhil
Detailed Review: The stay was amazing with great hospitality. The room service as well as house keeping (special mention Glynn and Ravi) were very kind and prompt. Special thanks to Ms. Darshna who was very kind and helpful and made the stay very comfortable. The buffet breakfast was very sumptuous and tasteful. Overall a very comfortable stay.   Would love to stay again

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Devesh G
Detailed Review: Well, I booked for a suite room and couldn't be more pleased to have so much comfort and leisure time in this property. The buffet which I had in poolside was lavish and surprisingly delicious. The rooms was very hygienic and I love the fact that it's a non-smoking property as it relates to health and environment concerned. I really appreciate the hospitality of each person who made our stay memorable specially a staff from your reception named Salman. He was very polite and kind, very generous to us. He helped us throughout our stay. I just wanted the management to know you have excellent staff with you. Keep up the good work. Will surely visit again. Till then Adios

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: R1tesh
Review: Can get better stay with same cost !!
Detailed Review: There are few things to point out Food price for Vits is equal to that of Taj land ends but the stay is as good as 2 star Motel Washroom door was without a lock Few seconds of hot water supply Shower room as plastic doors. Only one switch for charger if you want to celebrate anything special you can order anything from outside. This was the weirdest, they check you up everytime you leave the premises. its better to spend your money on a 2 star stay then this.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: divyasachdeva311
Detailed Review: Horrible experience! Insensitive management policies and  reception staff of Vits ! They have a policy of not allowing outside food and since I was new to town I didnt know the restaurant closes at 9 30 in Mumbai so despite several requests the reception staff didn't allow outside food .  Not recommended for stay! Food is fine  There are better hotels in the same area.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sanjay Patil
Review: Sanjay Patil..... Comfortable stay, nice food, best staff
Detailed Review: Visited with family 14.9.21. Good location, (5 min from T2 terminal) Very comfortable stay, nice food (we took dinner & Breakfast.... Both very delicious) Very cooperative staff especially Ms Ramika m'am was very helpful. Our special request were fulfilled. Highly recommended as value for money.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: San
Review: Delicious food and hassle free stay
Detailed Review: One of the best hospitality i have experienced and must taste the lovely food at poolside , good staff, nice ambiance and much more.  Best and affordable property in mumbai near airport, THANK YOU FOR YOUR HOSPITALITY

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Deepen B
Detailed Review: Always stay with Vits mumbai I am regular with Vits team and services it is pleasure to be here because as regular guest staff take care and attention.  I like poolside breakfast spread is really good with variety food item Ranjit is very helpful.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: kanchida
Review: All I wanted was a comfortable room to rest!
Detailed Review: Sometimes all you want is a clean and simple room that is comfortable. I booked for two nights for work in the area. The first night there was massive seepage in the room and water all over the floor, under the bed, on the table, went into some edibles and clothes on the table. They were kind enough to launder my clothes and upgrade me to a better room.  I extended my stay for one more night, with the intention of sleeping, chilling etc. Next morning the renovation started on the same side as my room. Extremely loud noise. I called the reception she assured me of fixing it. I called again after 20 mins. She said these things take time. I finally went to the reception and she had not yet done anything about it. She called the guy whole I was there and continued to chit chat with…

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Raviabc
Review: Too good. Worth staying. The best part is bathroom towels (I know its absurd). Towels are scented. After using whole body is per
Detailed Review: I stayed in this hotel from 2nd Sept till 3rd Sept. Hotel, its staff, specially Salman are excellent. Ambience is good. Stayed for the first time in this hotel, was little reluctant but after staying I dont regret at all. Above all breakfast is the best.  Would love to stay again.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Aishwarya Chandoskar
Detailed Review: I am so glad that I booked Courtyard by Marriot, Mumbai, highly recommended, loved the ambience, also the staff is polite. It’s easily accessible from the airport. Would recommend to my other friends.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: ExpressTraveller
Detailed Review: Excellent staff that truly espouse the warmth and hospitality that's quintessential to Marriott. Special thanks to Yogesh, Umesh and their team at the front office, as well as Abhijeet and team at Momo Cafe.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: AMITDHAKAD
Detailed Review: Proximity to airport coupled with efficient hospitality is its USP. Excellent food and well maintained property. Expect welcoming front desk, ageing rooms, mouth watering food spread and all services at your disposal with their mobile app.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Naturelover0409
Detailed Review: Courtyard Mumbai is well located and we'll managed hotel. Staff are very courteous, always on toes to help the guest. Well equipped rooms. Everything you need to make your stay comfortable is there. Highly recommended.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sheetanshu Agarwal
Detailed Review: I stayed from 14/08/21 to 16/08/21 in room 653  I’m a Titanium elite Marriott Bonvoy member for the last three years. Having been to many 5-star properties around the globe for my business, I expect a high standards from a Marriott property, and gladly Courtyard by Marriott Mumbai does not disappoint at all. My request for suite night was accepted well in advance.  On arrival my loyalty was immediately recognised by the front desk. Moreover Mr Umesh Chanigala, pinged my beforehand and made his mine single point of contact for all my needs. This was really a nice gesture.  Service - 5/5 The service was impeccable. Special mention to Umesh Chanigala and the entire in-room dining team, for making an effort to provide executive lounge benefits to my room. The housekeeping went an…

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Mr. Shah
Detailed Review: Travelled with family and our stay was awesome!! From check-in to check-out, everything was smooth. Special thanks to Mr. Hemant and entire front desk team for making our stay comfortable. Keep up the good work guys!! Will definitely stay again!

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Dr. Nahas
Review: Pathetic Customer Service and rooms with poor maintenance.
Detailed Review: I had been there for leisure trip on 13th August 2021. I am a Marriott member so I have been to most of their properties. This one is the most pathetic place I have ever been. You are unattended at every point. Right form the entry to front desk. No one offers you to carry your luggage to Front desk from the entrance. One guy in Front desk, I guess his name was Dhaval. He was the only guy I could find there being kind and polite. Rest of them were not even ready to smile. Rest of the people in front desk were disinterested. At weekend they have a policy like they charge Rs. 200/- extra for any plates and glasses you ask while in  room. Any such fee must be mentioned while making a booking and not while I am standing at the doorsteps. I make regular stays in Kochi Courtyard. I…

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Khushi Madan
Detailed Review: Amazing service by chef Tejas. All the staff members were very polite and courteous. Cannot wait for another staycation. The food was delicious and the buffet menu had a wide variety to choose from…..

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Shrushti
Detailed Review: We had the best thing here is the late checkout and most warming stafffff I appreciate Asif Shaikh been really helpfull So kind that me and my sister was happy the way he treated  us  and best pasty was late checkout highly appreciated you and your team manager chefs thanks to the core. I make videos reels on Instagram so will definitely post the best ❤️❤️❤️ front desk Asif Shaikh this is for you

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv

Detailed Review: Mr. Abhiraj  gave his best co-operation for this event to become a success. There were smooth check in's for all the guest, immediate reply was there for any queries to be sorted out along with accurate communication and proper management skills. Mr. Kevin too managed the guest breakfast, lunch and dinner services with proper management, all the staff was in  accordance with good management. During the meeting as well there was undivided attention through giving their support and co-ordination. We would be glad enough to continue these good relations with Courtyard Marriott Mumbai for the years to come by.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: dipak2012
Detailed Review: We enjoyed our stay at the hotel.  Location - convenient  Staff - polite especially the steward and team at Momo cafe Room - we were at 7th floor pool facing room. Good view. Room interior was nice and practical especially for business travellers.  Bathroom - well equipped and spacious

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Muskaan Madan
Detailed Review: We went for a staycation with family and friends. Tejas was hospitable and welcoming and took great care of us. Excellent food and impeccable service. We had a great time at Marriott and cannot wait to visit again!

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv

Detailed Review: Staff including the security team are excellent and very supportive. I forgot to take my laptop along with some ID documents.  Security team kept them safely and after identifying us properly they couriered them to me.  Thanks 👍👏

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rina G
Review: Self made Covid rules- Avoid staying here
Detailed Review: I usually refrain from writing anything negative even if my experience is unpleasant as I work in hospitality myself..but this place is clearly a cause of concern for health and damage to valuables all under the pretext of "Covid"   My India stay was -   14-15 Sept 2021 Sahara Star Mumbai 15-18 Sept 2021 Holiday inn hotel Jaipur   18-19 Sept 2021 Holiday inn hotel Mumbai (Check in time 2:15 pm - Check out 22:40 pm on 18 September- approx 9 hours stay)   On check in my Stella Mcccartney purse and bags/laptop bag were sprayed or rather bathed in a solution in a way that everything is still damp and sticky..to the extent some clothes are still damp and sticky. Even my otc medicines at the zipper packing is moist..now I'll have to throw them. I really don’t understand the need of…

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Resham
Detailed Review: Best service of house keeping name dinesh whenever call avilable all time with good nature & food order was quiet good & bed was comfartable and pool side view was awesome  nice environment whn can hav a good time in lobby

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Kerfegar Kerawalla
Detailed Review: Amazing food Friendly staff  Excellent service by Anand and Runikesh. Go for it Great deals available  Good  spread for buffet. Starters are amazing.  Deserts are amazing.   Anand was very hospitable. Runikesh gave amazing service.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ds
Detailed Review: Very nice and cooperative staffs, nice ambience and service. Shall recommend to friends in future. Near from airport and good to come with family . Good room service and have maintained well safety measures for covid risk

Name: MAHESH BAJRACHARYA
Detailed Review: Came to Holiday Inn Mumbai on Friday 13 Aug and met Akash in the reception, he had really help me to arrange things even at 11 pm. On 14 Aug I was struggling to fill forms related to COVID 19 related for flying back to Kathmandu. Eshant really step up to find out the requirement and fill them for me. He also provided print out for me to show in airport counter. Appreciate you are having staff like Akash and Eshant to help gaust like me. Thanks Holiday Inn Mumbai for having staff like them.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Anubhav Rana
Detailed Review: A very pleasant stay. Enjoyed every bit of it. All the staff and associates are really helpful. They made our stay the most comfortable in every way.  The Breakfast was delicious !!  Thanks Holiday Inn !!

Name: Surbhi Mewara
Detailed Review: I really enjoyed my stay with Holiday Inn Mumbai International Airport. Beautiful, clean room and absolutely wonderful staff. Staff is extremely courteous specially Ami Rajeshwari and Akshaansh Singh, they provided us the best facilities as possible.

Detailed Review: Dinesh from housekeeping is a really very gentle & cooperative guy. Rooms & very clean & services are perfect. Available food facilities are too much Good. Really good to have such comfortable & convinient place to stay.

Detailed Review: The service of the restaurant is very nice the staff is very kind and helpful spread of the food  is very it was good experience with orchid hotel specifically thanks to ms.kanchan and Harshada  ,sonali keep it up all the best and 👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍☺️☺️☺️☺️☺️☺️

I couldn't have asked any more from orchid because Nilesh is fabulous at his place with great attitude and he make sure his clients never goes with poor experience from South of vindyas. The especiality of vindyas is it's Thali. Food is so delicious and so tasty we all have enjoyed our time at South of vindyas.

Detailed Review: When you visit a 5 star hotel of the standard of Orchid you expect everything of extremely high value …Today team orchid made my stay unbeatably awesome ..From Reception to-service to -food -to room upgrade everything was beyond my expectations..Special thanks to Nadeem, Gauri, Nilam and priya from operators and of course the Duty Manager Mr Newton ..Team of relentless performers..it’s a strongly must come hotel ..  Thanks again  Abhi

Detailed Review: Staff Is very kind we enjoy a lot specially harshada snehal & shubham very helpful 👍 buffet spread also vry lavish, the entire atmosphere is also vry good with good staff also vry co operative, thank you for the entire service 👏

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Mrs.Henrietra Vaz
Detailed Review: Excellent service given by harshada and snehal we are enjoyed the buffet spread food is very testy  ambiance is very nice staff is very helpfull and mr salman is very kind thank you all the best Of luck

Detailed Review: excellent  service my booking was done from wallem group as iwas not aware of early checkin but however they provide excellent hospitality andbroomwas given with in 15 minutes thanks smith gayatri neelam for the same

Name: Manoj N
Detailed Review: I have been regular at the orchid and the hotel has always treated my like a family. Reception Manager Mr Umar And Kunal always treat and greet me with a big smile. I always visit this hotel for their warm welcome and gesture . I always recommend this hotel to my friends.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Chinmay vyas
Detailed Review: The service was wonderful at the hotel and the staff was friendly and cooperative. The food was awesome at the dine and a great hospitality was offered by HARSHADA , RAHUL , SNEHAL and KANCHAN. Worth staying and definately i would recomend to stay here for sure.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: satyan_israni
Detailed Review: I had a business meeting so had booked a room for freshening up. The check in process was very smooth as they had already sent me a link in advance to self checkin. The check out was equally swift. The staff was very polite and courteous. Enjoyed the in room dining as well. The room was spacious and well maintained. And its bang next door to the domestic airport. And ofcourse everyone was masked up!

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Mitesh V
Detailed Review: Awesome place very clean and safe they believe in the old adage Atithi devo bhava .. thanks Mahesh , Anshul and Agnelo you guys deserve a raise for sure you made my wife's birthday in of the best in the last few years ... They believe in the most simple value .. make your service speak for you .. Will surely revisit

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: sanjay khemka
Detailed Review: Food quality is good staff was also good Vikas also cooperated very well Desert quality need to be improved Overall good hospitality overall Kamat group have good reputation and quality service Keep it up

Review: A great stay with a great service!
Detailed Review: I would recommend this hotel to everyone out there who is looking for a good hotel with good services and a good staff. The staff has been very cooperative and helpful, especially Mr.Vikas More from the banquets. A special thanks to him and his team for giving us this quality service which made us a repeptative customer for this hotel.

Review: Mahesh is very helpful  and polite
