Name: amu1817
Detailed Review: Brilliant stay to say the least with whole staff taking best care of us especially Caesar and Suresh as our butlers to Ameya Sakre and Rene from the main team…food is great and is the overall ambience so would love to visit again asap. Thank you

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: NayantSavani
Detailed Review: This hotel above the palladium mall in lower parel has its own distinct personality. The lobby is on the 9th floor. Weekend chk was heavy but was smooth. The room was with great views. All work here showed good quality.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sanjiv P
Detailed Review: We had a celebration and did they make it really special for us 😍  We sent them a request for adjoining rooms and they obliged us by upgrading us to an apartment 3003/3004   We were welcomed by Ganpati & Shubhami Chirag & Tarun our checkin was over in a jiffy  They decorated our apartment with Balloons and sent us a yummy cake 🎂   The butler team was really commendable from their team leader Chirag to Tarun who were most accommodative & obliging   Was very happy to meet the very friendly & humble GM Mr Nicolas   The breakfast spread is the biggest I’ve seen Chef Ganesh was very attentive.  At these prices it’s a steal and you should surely go for it.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Abhishek A
Detailed Review: Yes the hotel gives a feel of having everything best! Starting with the best GM in the country Nick Dumbell. The best suits The best lunch at Sahib Room The best location next to palladium mall The best breakfast with elaborate spread  Overall everything good except evening drinks at Satte Mare.  Special mention of Devina and Aditi in front office Caesar our butler  Kapil at the breakfast l.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Dhaval1982
Review: Fantastic experience. Partial city and sea view from the room making it a memorable stay.
Detailed Review: Memorable experience, sea and city view from the room. Food was just excellent. Ganesh from housekeeping took extra care to make our stay comfortable, Thank you Ganesh for your very courteous approach. Mansi from Butler service was very polite ensuring a memorable stay for us. Thank you Mansi for arranging the pastries, it was delightful. Overall, it made our stay very pleasant.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Trotterduo
Review: Couldn't have asked for a better stay
Detailed Review: Had the most amazing time. Excellent place and super service. Rooms were comfortable and food was too good. Amazing selection of cuisines and buffet spread was great. Our butler Dhanraj was very helpful and took good care of us. Special mention to all staff at Seven kitchens who go out of there way to make you feel comfortable.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Bhauti J
Review: Home away from Home and Family away from Family!!
Detailed Review: We had recently gone to Mumbai for my husband's medical treatment. After surgery we decided to stay at St. Regis, and what should I say, we had an AMAZING experience. Beautiful location, good size room with a good view, excellent service and the best part was the people. I wish I could name all the people who we interacted with, to name a few who became close to us are, Chef Athar (specially took care of my husband's dietary needs), Chef Ganesh, Shubham J, Shubham Sharma (my favourite), Sidhesh, Amanpreet (Amazing and pure soul), Chetan, Jitendra, Alibo, Elue and last but not the least Bikram. Thank you St. Regis team for a wonderful experience! Miss you all.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Amar2402
Detailed Review: Stayed 4 nights with family. All in all a very disappointing experience Positives: Proactive concierge desk, seamless arrangement for pick-up's.  Attentive butler service Negatives: Everything Else Stayed in the one bedroom residence. the rooms have significant wear on them including cracked wash basins, stained carpets, mirrors and chairs. On complaining about the broken washbasins the option provided was to wait outside and it will take three hours to fix it the following day.  Every single meal was an issue. From  1.5 hrs to bring food even for set menu to breakfast orders being forgotten to being made to be seated for ala carte pizza to a no show for order taking.  Light in the toilet went out (fused bulb) it took 12 hours and a reminder to get it fixed. We were offered a…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Snehha
Review: Horrible horrible stay ! This place is a circus
Detailed Review: This is by far the worst experience ever in a hotel. We checked in at 2.30 and the first room given was not the view we had booked. A apologies later we were moved to another room which was not clean let alone sanitized. Eventually after a few rude responses from the hotel staff and another hours delay, we were moved to a suite which was half decent.   We ordered dinner in our room, which was cold and portions were super tiny.   The hotel staff is inefficient and rude and need a class in hospitality.   Half the guests were not wearing masks and crowding spaces in the hotel lobby and elevators   Eventually after wasting our entire evening, and dealing with crap service and food, we decided to check out At midnight !   The duty manager insisted that we still pay for our stay. Far…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Aby Riz
Detailed Review: This would be our 5th time at St.Regis both pre Covid and present time. Had a fantastic and comfortable stay with my family. Although the breakfast and dinner buffet dishes have been reduced, it really didn’t make much of a difference, it was as tasty as ever. And staff as usual were as helpful and polite as ever. Will definitely be coming back here soon.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sagar Sikdar
Detailed Review: Thanks St. Regis for such a heartwarming welcome! From arranging a surprise cake to giving the best view room, you guys made my stay! Really courteous staff, special mention to Akansha (our butler who arranged the surprise). Fiyana at the front desk who greeted us with a beautiful smile and Rohit at seven kitchens  who took care of us throughout. Kudos to you all!

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Akshay
Detailed Review: It was our first in this hotel Kudos to the hotel staffs for their attitude and help throughout our stay. buffet breakfast and dinner was great choice of varieties.F good was great indeed.Special thanks to Chef Pushkar for special food for us.Server Ilyas,Ram,Karan was amazing.Will visit very soon in future .

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Kumar
Review: Best food and service ever had
Detailed Review: Been there for few days..Location is central of the city.Rooms are neat and clean Order food from Room service mFood and service was amazing.Few items like Grilled chicken and Pasta was outstanding.Staffs are super friendly.Will visit very soon .

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Venkata
Detailed Review: As a regular customer we are visiting often in this hotel. We had a very pleasent stay in this hotel. All the staffs are very helpful and polite towards their customer. Rooms and lobby are neat and clean. In house dining is very prompt and the lady was suggested their best dishes in dinner. Morning breakfast is lavish. Staff member like Himanshu, Ilyas and Chanika was very helpful. Highly recommended for all..

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Hitesh P
Detailed Review: We stayed at Vits last month.Ready to help staff from bell desk to all places.Smooth and speedy check in / check out process. Very friendly and helpful staff. Memorable trip. Thanks to all staff . Room cleanliness and service really good.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: basilio d
Detailed Review: BASILIO MAGNO ANTONIO DIAS. Room No.441 House department Rajdeep Lachan very obedient room attendant. Hard working and loyal person. Quick service . Very hygienic and pleasant atmosphere. Very cool Ambience.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: AtravellerD
Detailed Review: Front desk was extremely helpful, very professional and smooth check in & check out process. The food was as usual very well prepared and lovely buffet spread at breakfast. Staff maintaining adequate precautions in the present pandemic scenario and well placed sanitizers in lobby, restaurant and outside the lift area on the floor i stayed in.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Saigopal Rangaraj
Detailed Review: Great service and friendly staff. Mr. Jagdish Chaudhari was very helpful. Overall staff are very friendly and helpful. No complaints. Rooms are clean, but there could be a fridge. Restaurant food is good.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rewati Raman
Review: The Awesome stay with Awesome Hospitality at VITS Hotel Mumbai
Detailed Review: Each time I come here I have just amazed with the hospitality. And the food in Swimming pool area that is awesome 👍 Chai, Aaloo Paratha all so delicious and apart from that Dishes from all corner of country. they themselves ask you to try more from their in house dinning which they make special on that very day. And apart from that the very important thing now a days is Sanitisation which is also very good. Good fragrance allover.❤❤

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv

All staff are following Covid guidelines and very helpfull.  You stay can feel u like homely environment .  Rgds,  Manoj Room no 228 Date : 19-08-2021

Detailed Review: Mr. Vikas Lengare has a Kind behavior and energetic attitude, very good personality. Done best hospitality in my room service. Highly appriciated for his performance. Helpful for the guest. Totally hotel stay was plesent

Detailed Review: i am staying in this hotel from last 2 August  ,its very good hotel and  hotel staff, I want to say about housekeeping department staff giving me very good services thay are so professional ,specially Raajdeep lachan ,Mainish solanki and Asha chavan thank you so much  for giving good services.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Hemant
Review: I stayed through my Shipping company
Detailed Review: I stayed through my company for seven days over here . Everything was nice food was also good. Specially breakfast . It as my official visit I would like to visit once solo. Overall happening place ..

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Satish Sundareswaran
Detailed Review: I have been a regular customer to vits since 2019 and the reason being, its very good and comfortable n perfect hotel for relaxing. Rooms are very neat and spacious. Hotel staff is very friendly and supportive. The room rates are also not expensive. I would give it 9 out of ten. The food too is very well.cooked.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Damodaran C
Detailed Review: Excellent service given by Mr Vikas lengare , his communication with guest is fantastic . I'm very happy on Vikas's service . This is a best hotel for spend for vacation .  All staff are Vaccinated. Good

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Swapnil
Detailed Review: It was a very important and special day for me and VITS did a incredible job to make it a memorable day. A special thank you to Mr Sandeep Miranda , Priyanka Mahadik and Chef Sandeep. Not only do they strive for perfection but also pay attention to every detail themselves. My wedding ceremony was organised and planned to perfection also considering the government restrictions and norms by the amazing team at VITS Andheri. Food , Hospitality and attention to detail by Mr Sandeep Miranda, Priyanka Mahadik and Chef Sandeep is extraordinary and deeply satisfying. I would suggest all to experience what me and my family have experienced. A grand thank you to team at VITS.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ravi J
Detailed Review: We had wedding rituals conducted in the Sapphire banquet hall. The hotel staff including the security personnel were very kind and helpful. Especially the manager Priyanka Mahadik was very involved and took personal interest in the planning, deciding food options, and executing the plan. She made sure that the bride and groom were fed early in the morning so as to survive through the rituals until lunch. She personally made sure that the bride and groom's extended stay was comfortable and all there requirements were met. Excellent service!!

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Arshaq K
Detailed Review: I stayed at VITS with friends we booked two rooms over here and got great hospitality from them. Staffs were too good and found room neat and cleaned . Entire stay was just awesome nothing to say. Overall great experience.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Akshay Singh
Detailed Review: Visited VITS Mumbai for an official stay, the stay was very comfortable with very friendly staff .  Food was great with a lot of variety , room had a nice pool view . All the covid precautions were well taken care of. Check-in procedure was also quick and smooth. Really enjoyed the stay . Definitely recommend

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: sushant k
Detailed Review: Amazing service from breakfasts,housekeeping,front desk and concierge desk devraj shetty made me feel like I was at my home wonderful service . The hotel staff was very good . Room service was on time .

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Disha Taneja
Detailed Review: I stayed here with a group of friends last month. All the staff was extremely courteous especially Chef Tejas. He really ensured all our needs were looked after and went above and beyond his duty to provide us with a comfortable stay.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Mutallib Sheikh
Detailed Review: My stay at the hotel was excellent. Support staff was very good and cooperative. Right from the reception to check out my experience was good. Staff at the restaurant was polite and humble. Room service was good too.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: vinay k
Detailed Review: Folks - I'm writing this review as Lifetime Titanium member of Marriott properties, Ive stayed 1000+ nights with Marriott.  The staff  at Courtyard Marriott was one of the least friendly ones I've experienced over 20+ years staying at Marriott. My data points.. - Requested 1-2 hours early check-in as I was arriving at 2pm for check-in and had a night flight at 11 pm the same day. I constantly got told will be provided only based on availability. However the tight the schedule, have never been denied early check-in or told we will not take care of it -  The executive lounge was closed; Requested complimentary wine in-lieu of that and was denied, when other hotels in Pune provide it - Reception staff was very curt - I asked to speak to manager and had to do multiple follow-ups for…

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: sanvaz78
Detailed Review: Early Check-in was not given, infact out of the two rooms, 1 room was ready after 17:00 hrs and that happened after several reminders...I saw several other guests either waiting or arguing with the reservation staff for early check-in or late check-out. Basically the weekend rush overwhelmed the staff and they lost coordination. The rooms were good..The Breakfast spread was good and the Dinner was Ok.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sapna nair
Detailed Review: Excellent service. Super ambiance. Celebrated my daughter's 19th birthday with her friends though I could not attend Mr Yogendra front office manager  ensured all went well and kept me posted. A big thank you Sir.  F&B  Mr Shreyas  Mr Gaurav a big thank you for the good service and not forgetting the Manager and Ahmed Shaikh.  Food was sumptuous. Value for money. Exec chef and Sous chef a big thank you for the lovely food.   I highly recommend courtyard Marriott hotel Andheri east to all. Rooms are spacious.   From Hyatt I have shifted to this hotel only because of Mr Yogendra's personalized service and attention to ensure our stay was and is comfortable.  Great welcome by each and every staff right from entrance to check in.   Keep up the good team work. Super team always…

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sandeep M
Detailed Review: Stayed for 6 days in first week of July 2021. Rooms were clean and comfortable. Service was very good. But the best part was the excellent food....be it Indian or Chinese or breakfast. The food quality was top class. Compliments to the Chef. Certainly recommended.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sudha Sonthalia
Detailed Review: Kudos and well done. We had the pleasure of staying at the hotel and organizing a wedding in the Banquet and have nothing but heaps of praises for all who we interacted with, the general ambience of the Hotel and above all the lip smacking food served to our guests each time. The Banquet Hall is worthy of a mention with beautiful chandeliers and well appointed interiors. The food served to us was beyond excellence each time and was loved by all our guests without exception. Special mentions for Sous Chef Rajiv Das and his excellent team, Mr. Abhiraj with whom we interacted on an hourly basis and he was always there for us and Ms. Priya Singh who set the ball rolling in the first place. The rooms were also very spacious and comfortable and the House Staff willingly catered to all…

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Tejal T
Review: Courteous staff, good food, awesome time
Detailed Review: Loved the buffet served at Momo Cafe, sumptuous finger licking food served.. Loved the chicken tikka kebab and paneer malhanwala. 4 options in salad, I personally liked the ceaser salad in white sauce... Highly recommended

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Vinayak
Detailed Review: Attended the RBL FINSERVE LIMITED AT the courtyard Marriott, food was grt and ambience was really nice. Not to forget the care and awsome sustomer service by vinit patil, Kevin patil, abhiraj singh and to top it the sweet hamper was icing on the cake.   Keep up the good work people. Appreciate all u do.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Shoaib
Detailed Review: The experience was great  The ambiance and the staff are really good and friendly. Food was tasty and I would love to visit again in future. They are following good precautions during pandemic scenario.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: SG
Detailed Review: We had an amazing lunch here recently. The food was delicious! We were in the mood for Indo Chinese and the food here didn’t disappoint. Highly recommend both the chicken appetizers ( the Chili Chicken was especially mouthwatering) and the Kung Pao chicken. Chef Akshay Naik and his staff went out of their way to take good care of us. Highly recommend!

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Oves
Detailed Review: It was a great experience being here and I must say that the service is so good.  The behaviour of staff is so well behaved and If i speak about the ambiance it is so nice and also the food is too good

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Dhara Kundalia
Review: Harrowing experience by Courtyard Marriott Mumbai
Detailed Review: Such an Appalling experience at Courtyard Marriott-- Mumbai  How can a hotel of this stature treat its clients with a lie? And not once but multiple times.   You ask for cutlery, they charge you Rs 200/- You have health issued and ask for a slice of lemon, be rest assured you will be charged Rs 200/- Even an empty glass would cost you Rs 200/-   We had booked the place for 3 but were made to pay for the 3rd person.   Highly unprofessional!   Do yourself a favour by not booking a room there

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Karan Bhardwaj
Detailed Review: To start with, we had booked room for 3 people but we were made to pay for the 3rd Person   Everything from cutlery to glassed were CHARGED extra for usage.  If you want a glass for water- 200Rs extra A slice of lemon- 200Rs extra Even empty Plate and spoons were charged at Rs 200  The staff LIES to customers. Not once but multiple times.   The behaviour is completely appalling.  Never expect such unprofessional behaviour from a hotel like Marriott.   Do a favor to yourself, DO NOT book a room for anyone there.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: AbhishekAcharya
Detailed Review: It was a wonderful time at Marriott with the family. The staff at Momos cafe went put of their way to celebrate a family member's birthday. In all a very warm and helping staff to make your stay memorable.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Riya s
Detailed Review: We were guest at Courtyard Marriott Mumbai on weekend. Love the Hospitality and courteous staff.  Food is also Good. Specially liked Tawa Machli and desserts. Chef Akshay Naik and whole Team of Momo cafe made sure that we will enjoy our stay with Best Food. Looking forward to visit again.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Meenu Arora
Detailed Review: Akshay Nail , chef at Courtyard Mariott at Andheri kurla road made our stay at mumbai extremely special and memorable.   The care, personal touch and attention to detail was remarkable. Every cuisine was made and served with great warmth.  Truly an exceptional customer service that Akshay displayed.  Being regular visitor at mumbai, we will surely be back at the hotel!!   Thankyou   Meenu and Ashwani Arora

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: RG15121972
Detailed Review: It was my second home before COVID as I used to stay every week 3 nights there and then I started travelling again from July and thought of going back to my second home but to my surprise COVID has changed this property a lot interms of attitude and behaviour of employees. As a service provider that is not expected out of them. The F&B Team and Team in Restaurants and Kitchen is fantastic. They duly take care of the needs of guests and are very humble and customer friendly. However Front Office Team and Sales is full of attitude and arrogance and it’s challenge to work with them any issue you face in property.  I recommend to use other good properties around Airport if location is a preference. My recommendation is Hilton, Courtyard by Marriott and ITC.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ganesh Ramakrishnan
Detailed Review: Holiday Inn has always maintained an excellent level of hospitality with a very homey feel. Their rooms are always clean and well maintained.   The highlight however has always been the staff, the chef and the food!   We live in mumbai but frequent the property for the food at Saptami which is exceptional only due to the hard work of the chefs and the stewarts at the property.  I have had the pleasure of interacting with Clint who i have known for the longest time along with a whole slew of chefs including Yogesh who are like family by now.   I do keep looking forward to my next visit to this property.  Thanks for always helping out and being awesome hosts!

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Nancy D
Detailed Review: Had a staycation planned with my gal pals. Had excellent time here.. the check in process was super smooth. All safety measures were maintained. Rooms were cleaned and staff was very helpful.  Nikhil and Farooq were one call away for any needs as we were just girls.  Thanks had an amazing stay. Highly recommended

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: deepak d
Detailed Review: The staff was cordeal, hospitality was  awesome..Good food.  Overall a very pleasant stay.  Housekeeping staff dinesh kept the room fresh and clean during my entire 5 day stay.  CHEF SERVICE  WAS VERY GOOD.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Kumars k
Detailed Review: Stay was very good. Staff especially the front desk were extremely friendly and helpful. Special mention to Nikhil who was wonderful always there ready to help . Would love to come back keep up the good work thank you

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sandeep
Detailed Review: Banquet Team was very helpful and made sure all the last minute requirements were also taken care off during our two day conference.  Recommended to conduct corporate events here.  Goodluck the team. Cheers!!

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Anand Sinha
Detailed Review: Stayed at Orchid for two weeks. The rooms are nice, the facilities & service top notch. The manager, Mr. Wesley and his team were really helpful and always available. Final shout out to great food and phenomenal views from the hotel!!!

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Raju Khubchandani
Detailed Review: My wife and I were stranded at the international airport when our sons flight from LHR was diverted to Ahmedabad. roads flooded visibility 10 feet we struggled to get accommodation overnight near the intnl airport rather than drive back to the city Orchid where we drove in was so warm and comforting to our plight and especially Mr Rohit Newton in the front office bent backwards to comfort us and provide shelter. Really hospitable. Keep it up !! Rohit deserves a pat from the management.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Jatin Sethi
Detailed Review: Is one of the best Hotel, staff has been very courteous and hospitality at Highest level. Food was excellent . Staff is excellent..Jagannath is excellent ,taking good care of food and guest. Would be visiting again. Keep it up guys !!

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: shubham sarda
Detailed Review: we arrived very late returning from our honeymoon. the hotel was busy due to some exhibition happening.  we met dity manager rohit on arrival who welcomed us and made our stay memorable by upgrading our room inspite of hotel being busy. the hotel staff goest extra mile to accomodate guest requests and to ensure a pleasant stay

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Tarun
Detailed Review: The visit is very comfortable in this eco hotel. Staff is courteous and empathic. Be it duty manager mr rohit or naveen at restaurant all were friendly and helpful. The manger mr Sachin is a helpful and friendly guy helped me whenever needed.  The room is spacious and bed is super soft   Neat rooms great ambience tasty food  And amaziing kaapi   Overall great experience

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Krishnasainanee
Detailed Review: We had lunch to celebrate my friend's birthday.We enjoyed the sevice which provide from restaurant.Specially service of Ms.Suparna , Shubham & Ms.Kanchan was very attentive gentle behaviour.We really enjoyed their services.We also enjoyed quality of food & cleanliness

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Anmol goel
Detailed Review: The hospital staff is really helpful. The restaurant boulevard is amongst the best I’ve visited and the service of suparna, Sameer, Rahul and prathamesh was really good. The room had really good views and the ambience was very pleasant

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Monika Singh
Detailed Review: Dear team , I visited orchid hotel Mumbai on 18 of july . I forgot my stuff in my room ,also thought never going to get that back. However when i call the hotel they solved my problem immediately aslo got my stuff back.   I would love to appreciate Shashank for his great hospitality. He kept me updated and courier my stuff back. Once again Thank you so much for your assistance ,great work  Shashank .

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Abhijeet2111
Detailed Review: Had been with friends to Boulevard, the staff was very attentive. All the precautionary measures were followed. Even in this tuff time the staff was smiling and were at your service. Food was great too.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Mohammad D
Detailed Review: I would like to thank the F & B manager Mr. Tarun Samvedi to make it memorable and arrenge their arrengement seamlessly at the last minute. Excellent work orchid team. Manager Tarun Samvedi demonstrated utmost professionalism and was very quick to reach out to materialize the plan made at the last minute. I appreciate Mr. Tarun samvedi and his team as they always available for any request. The hospitality is great and I highly recommend it.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Abu Huraira Khan
Detailed Review: It was one of my best experience. I was really pampered by the Entire Team of Boulevard. Starting from the hostess, I was greeted and seated at my desired Table. Restaurant Manager personally looked after our table to ensure we have the best experience. Chefs prepared Mouthwatering dishes of our choice. Entire team was humble and caring.  Constant feedback was taken for the food we ate. Overall, This was the best experience at any Coffee Shop I have ever had.  I would suggest, If you are towards the Airport Side, Boulevard is the Coffee Shop which you should be at…!! Thank you all for the wonderful experience.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: R K SETHI
Detailed Review: The Marriage Event in Orchid was memorable. The Response and Service from Enquiry to End was excellent.  Facilities provided were very good.  Food was good. Some Dishes like Dal Makhani, Masala Khichadi was very tasty. All the Staff and Service Provider were very helpful, polite and always quick response.  Appreciate all the efforts of everybody involved and specifically of  Manisha Jain in concluding the Deal and making the Wedding memorable.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: 60prathamesh
Detailed Review: The Orchid- Boulevard is such a wonderful place... It is situated near domestic airport... The food was very delicious..me and my friends had a Indian meal. The menu was perfect and great service by the team. The ambience was beautiful..The food was too yum.. Do visit this place with your friends and family.. Food-5/5 Ambience-5/5 Staffs Service-5/5

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Shahbaaz B
Detailed Review: My experiences with Hotel Orchid have always been good. Impeccable service.   Services of sales executive and manager- Mr. Noel D'Lima is laudable.  Being in the Aviation, we always book our passengers and crew in Orchid in case of flight delays and diversions. Noel has always gone that extra mile to make them comfortable. He  is always there whenever we need  a reservation, be it any part of the day or night.  Our calls are answered by him at the first ring. He is just a phone call away to make necessary arrangements and give good deals. Bravo!  Also there's fine dining experience at Hotel Orchid.  Excellent ambience and different variety of cuisines.  Wish Hotel Orchid more success in years to come.  Shahbaaz Busheri from Iran Air- Mumbai

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sajjad Khalfay
Detailed Review: A musty smell greeted me. Room no 370 smelled damp, unused with fungus on sofas. As per my observation looks room isn't cleaned post reopening for business during pandemic times. Mr. Mahesh offered me to change room.  All three meals are not up to the mark. Always, severed with Paneer in Lunch and dinner.  The staff Mr. Nadeem, Mr. Mahesh and Mr. Wesley were very helpful.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: akash t
Detailed Review: Everything was amazing thanks to entire team 👏👌 food was good and the service was the best all covid protocols were properly followed... strongly recommended for safe and amazing dining experience..

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Neel
Detailed Review: Courteous staff, nice environment,got very good service from Gauri and Datta.I have booked stay for my parents, they enjoyed a-lot. Thanks to Jayni,Rahul,Salman and Navin for giving them best service.Thanks to team Orchid for making my parents happy and comfortable stay.Food was great.After prolonged stay at home & not going out anywhere,finally headed to Orchid which really made them happy in all kind of service.Sp thanks to Gauri for giving the complimentary upgrade.Thanks for your great hospitality.Even i will definitely try to visit..

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Leroy Mascarenhas
Detailed Review: I would like to Appreciate the proactive and wonderful efforts which are put in by Noel Dlima who always is very helpful and provides the best customer service. He goes out of his way to cater to our needs be it anytime of the day that we would call him and within minutes he organises everything and ensures he is personally there to handle everything smoothly. Thank you Noel Dlima for great service that you provide always. Keep it up and all the best.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Shiv Saharia
Detailed Review: I want to appreciate the efforts and pro active service of Mr Sachin Lagad and Ms Nilam at The Orchid hotel Mumbai  as they know how to retain guest and the way they communicate with guest is something every one should learn, They make them feel valued and also go extra mile to make everyone comfortable.. Special thanks to Mr Sachin for welcoming us with big smile and greetings... Thank u for making our day and will surely book this property again and also advice others to book this hotel.. Thank u once again for taking care of us .. Have a blessed day ahead.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Bavan P
Detailed Review: 5 very good serive, very good food,   Special thanks to  Neelam mam,  Neol sir,  Gauri mam,  Datta sir,   Who helped in each in every situation,  We came from delayed flight of KLM,   and it was very nice experience being in this hotel,   Thank you,  This is bavan prem,

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Namita S
Detailed Review: We went for the Sunday Brunch at  The Orchid Hotel & they had a really nice spread. Our first family outing since pandemic started, was wonderful as we enjoyed our meal with Live band singing songs all from late 70s to 80s. It was truly nostalgic listening to all those songs.  Some of the things we loved were the starters a crispy veg croquets,  grilled apple, paneer, in non- veg chicken, mutton & prawns were gud. Main course had lots of choice with authentic yummy undhiyo, bhuna ghost & a different preparation of potato. I personally preferred continental dishes like Florentine lasagna, mashed potato & cutlet in risotto sauce . A good variety of desserts too especially fresh made crispy Imarttis(something similar to jalebi) We don't drink alcohol & were pleasantly surprised by…

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Vikas
Review: Khandelwal family Stay in Orchid Mumbai Airport
Detailed Review: I stayed in Orchid Mumbai with my family and our experience was too good. The food is absolutely marvellous, we had our dinner yesterday and Dal makhani is out of the world. Today's breakfast spread was absolutely gala treat to all 4 of us. Staff is courteous n ready to help right from front service to Stewards...We will come back again

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Randy and Rusti S
Detailed Review: Everything you would expect from a top-notch property. The staff goes out of the way to accommodate you. It’s a fairly “westernized“ atmosphere. Large rooms, great location. Beautiful property. Highly recommended. It’s basically five stars, especially considering the surroundings.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Mark_39018
Detailed Review: Stayed 4 nights in this great hotel. Very clean, well appointed rooms, spacious bathroom and great water pressure. I found their Japanese restaurant excellent but the highlight of my stay was the Gin Bar which had more varieties of gin than I could taste. Polite efficient staff and prompt responses.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Priyanka
Detailed Review: It was a wonderful experience from the moment we checked in till the time we checked out of the hotel. The staff was excellent, very helpful and very friendly. The hospitality was outstanding, the breakfast variety was super huge n in terms of taste also very tasty ,  Our room were extremely cozy. Highly recommended if you want to relax and have a leisure time with your family. Definitely hoping to visit again soon....Big thanks to F&B team members....

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rani
Review: Really going bad with the service
Detailed Review: St.Regis is one of the best properties in Mumbai and it has been one of our favourite destinations also. Within the last one year we have stayed there atleast 3 times and hence it has been rather disappointing for us this time. We understand that times are tough and covid protocols have to be followed, but when someone is trying to take a break from their daily lives, hotels are the best destinations and we come here for the privacy comfort and service. We have visited St Regis during the covid times only, and hence seeing the service this time it’s rather disappointing. Had we visited before covid and the norms had changed we would understand, but in November 2020 and January 2021 I’m pretty sure covid protocols were very much present. We had taken the gastronomic staycation…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rajeev G
Review: The Place should be a 3star property!
Detailed Review: I stayed with my family a few days ago and I never right a review. The time however I was almost compelled!  I have stayed here multiple times in the past but now I feel it’s become run down and it truly stinks! I booked it through Amex and under fine hotels but it definitely doesn’t deserve to be there!  I think it should be called a courtyard mariott or a Fairfield instead. The food sucked! The cutlery was sticky and felt unwashed. The service was trash!  I would never stay there ever again!  And yes it was way overpriced and I would rather stay at the airport then here!  I wish I could give it a zero rating!

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Diloo
Detailed Review: Expect cold treatment by untrained staff. Most of them including check in staff aren’t aware of regular guests. They don’t know their guests well. Tried shifting to St Regis since late last year but not what a brand like St Regis should be. Rooms are dusty & so are the wardrobes. Butler service does not answer phone below 10 rings. Breakfast is good though.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: shwets20
Detailed Review: To celebrate my wedding anniversary, I had booked a room at the St Regis for a 1-night staycation (July 3/4 – room 2507). Our staycation included an upgrade to a higher room category (subject to availability) and 2 meals – breakfast and lunch or dinner.   At the time of check-in, we were offered a room upgrade and wished on our wedding anniversary by the staff. We also informed the staff that as we had checked-in from another 5-star property and had heavy meals, we would prefer to have lunch on the next day as part of our package, and they obliged.   The room was quite spacious with nice views of the Arabian Sea at the backdrop of the towering skyscrapers of Lower Parel. We were happy to see the nice selection of teas in the room. The only complaint would be the toiletries,…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: JB
Detailed Review: Amazing hotel with great food from Seven kitchens, Thanks for the complimentary pastry Mr Ceaser (Butler) Special thanks to Mr Siddhesh Bhosle from Luna bar for his hospitality services. Looking forward for many more stays at St Regis with good deals.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Kongkon
Detailed Review: This was my 3rd stay at Vits Mumbai , it truly felt like coming home.This hotel was calming and welcoming. From the moment you enter the hotel, the welcome from the staff makes you feel at home. The warm welcome by every staff member from the bell hops, the front office and housekeeping is nothing short of amazing. The rooms are very comfortable and a decent size. There is nothing wanting from the rooms. I need to mention one staff members who are outstanding! Paresh and Mehreen from reception and Rajdeep from Housekeeping has looked after me on all my stays and has ensured that I had everything I needed. A true professional in the hospitality industry. Thank you both for your warmth and professionalism. I'll definitely wishes to come back.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Suresh Kumar
Detailed Review: •	Location :- Few steps away from Mumbai airport T2. Plenty of Taxis available. •	Style & character :- Average, & not exciting. Check in process was cold & remote.   •	Service & facilities :- Not flawless. Hard time getting in-room dinner arranged. No Menu in sight. The scan code provided on table was not practical & swift. Had to go to the Coffee shop downstairs, and get the menu on WhatsApp from the helpful captain, and loose precious time. The server delivered the much needed hot and salty meal, but never delivered the change for the cash given, even though he promised ! •	Rooms :- Basic and bearable. The bathroom wash basin faucet sprinkled & splashed water all over the place. •	Food & Drink :- The breakfast was extensive, freshly made & quite nice. Superlative service &…

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Virajs
Detailed Review: Had a memorable experience.. The room interiors were great and the food was really good. We had taken a package with breakfast and dinner. Dinner was served in room dal tadka was super yummy. All in all completely satisfied with the hygiene standards and sanitisation done in the room. Such an amazing hotel we really had a pleasent stay over at VITS Mumbai.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: prathamesh jadhav
Detailed Review: I stayed in VITS MUMABI , stay was awesome staff treated us well, good service, nice ambience , front staff helped me a lot  from check in to check out. food was really good and rooms were well maintained thank you for giving good service

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Akansha bhalore
Detailed Review: Everything was great! The reception was safe & smooth, The room was a good size with a large, comfy bed, The view was amazing.the staff was really very helpful to us , mr digvijay & mr viraj was very kind to us thank you for giving us good service must visit VITS HOTEL MUMBAI ❤️

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Laxmanrao
Detailed Review: I visited VITS Mumbai witubthe family.. It was nice experience my family also enjoyed alot. Nice lobby and great staff at front desk.. They all were very helpful an calm. Food was really nice and room was also good.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ayush s
Detailed Review: It was my first visit at the Vits International Mumbai. It was memorable day for us. All staff were very friendly and very professional really guys are doing amazing job keeping guest services on top priority and providing friendly environment. I would like to specially thanks to Mr.  Viraj Singh and his reception team for professional services . Keep it up.....

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Tandel R
Detailed Review: Stayed at VITS Hotel Mumbai Andheri found great ambience. Supportive staff Front desk is very friendly to us. Food was good and delicious and also well maintained and sanitized room. Overall good experience.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: SakshiKulkarni
Detailed Review: Great location and good atmosphere nice staff nearby the airport and great location . We checked in late evening and found very smooth check in. Overall the experience was good. Food was nice and well maintained room.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: SAMEER MUKUND DIGHE
Review: For departure of our son for USA
Detailed Review: Excellent food and very Co operative, knowledgeable staff. Would like to visit again. Order time is very quick. Check in experience is also very good . We observed very relaxed and professional experience with VITS Mumbai.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Mann M
Review: Excellent Hotel stay at Vits Mumbai
Detailed Review: Had a very pleasant stay at Mumbai. Staff was very helpful and paid additional attention to my small requirements.Housekeeping and F&B team deserves special mention for services rendered. Intend to stay in this hotel everytime I visit Mumbai. Excellent services!!!

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ganesh patil

Name: Priyanka Pillai
Detailed Review: As per BMC guidelines, every traveller from Europe to Mumbai has to go under institutional quarantine in the BMC provided list of hotels. As irritating the thought in itself is to stay quarantined for 7 days, the stay I had in Holiday Inn was equally relaxing and refreshing.  I had my best of 7 days during my stay. Though you are quarantined, your every need is easily met with just one phone call. All the norms of social distancing is very well followed and the team make sure you are not aloof in the room.  The 3 meals I got during these 7 days is to another level of taste where quality reaches the top.  Special call out to the duty Manager Ms. Ami Rajeshwari who handled all my query just over a whatsapp message. Such a calm and soft spoken staff she is. I literally took a nut…

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv

Name: Siddhesh
Detailed Review: For a hotel which claims to be a 5 star property, certainly the ground reality at The Orchid, Vile Parle is miles away from what they claim, and being in the hospitality profession myself, this is a genuine feedback for the average hotel in the guise of a 5 star property.  My partner and I had decided to stay for the weekend, as we wanted to experience the property after reading Mr. Kamat’s very touching memoir “Idli, Orchid Ani Mi”, but the service didn’t live up to its mark.  In total we had to wait 35 mins at the reception to check in, while we were waiting one staff member had approached us and stated that as we had been waiting for long he will prepare everything for our check in and take us directly to the room, but a min later he just vanished and was nowhere to be found,…

Detailed Review: Not Suitable for Family or Business stays. The rooms are not sound insulated therefore you hear loud music and movement noise all night. Major clientele of the hotel even on weekdays consisted of youth looking to consume alcohol and party. The staff at main reception to offered shady places for buying alcohol. Stale food offered in dinner. The hotel doesn’t even have dedicated phone lines for various services like room service, reception etc. so your call is always on waiting. Poor service

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Vidhi D
Review: The day of Our Dreams At Orchid
Detailed Review: With the current pandemic situation we were in a tough spot when we had no venue for our wedding just 15days before the wedding. After visiting several venues in and around Mumbai we finally saw a gem at orchid.  it was beautiful. the vintage touch to the hotel gave us goose bums and we knew right then,that this would be our wedding venue. we met Manisha Jain and discussed our requirements with her. Manisha was really cooperative and she helped us with every minute details that we needed. With almost no time in hand all the arrangements were done flawlessly and were perfectly as we required. On the day of the wedding all the arrangements were carried out efficiently by the hotel staff. The rooms were clean and sanitised in the best possible manner. It is a charm to find such…

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Shubham K
Review: Reception is very helpful and polite

They called hotel sales person immediately and help me wid quick check-in. Thnx to orchid team , its really amazing experience for me , Great hospitality and polite n humble staff .

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv

Detailed Review: The stay was very good. The service was impeccable.  The front office staff Mahesh gave a very hospitable service from the time of check in till the time of check out. Detailed Review: I attended brothers wedding and i must say the organizers had handled it very good also the food was delicious. I would like to thank Chef chinmay, chef mahesh and also Abhishek for the service povided.

Detailed Review: I made a prior booking for birthday request it was out of that we did not expect upgraded room with runway facing, birthday setup, complimentary cake big thanks to Ms. Nilam she made our day . Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ameya
Detailed Review: Orchid the one name for quality service.   Day when I checked in I was not comfortable for some reasons so was planning to move out immediately inspite of having a booking for 2 days. But Mr Shashank, Ms Gauri and Ms Nilam from the reception made me comfortable so I decided to stay.  The restaurant Guys Mr Naveen, Mr Nilesh, Mr Bala (Chef) customized the food as per my requirements.   Overall it was such a wonderful experience that, I who was supposed to moved out of the hotel in a few mins extended my stay to 6 days in all.   I wish all the best to the complete team of Orchid Hotel.   Thank you.   Ameya

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sangharaj D
Detailed Review: We booked a room from agoda and called at orchid hotel for a celebration, Mahesh at reception and Shashank and shiva from house keeping help us a lot for room decoration with nice and clean room . Hotel is really nice and staff is very polite and helpful . Thnx to front office and housekeeping team . Thnx to orchid . Thnx Mahesh for upgrading room .

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Aarushi D
Detailed Review: I, Aarushi Dirghangi was staying in room #333 on 12/05/2021, and we landed late and woke up late. But Nilesh and Amit went an extra mile to serve us the food that we wanted for breakfast and moreover they’ve sent the order so quickly though they informed it will take approximately  45 minutes. And they also sent us a bakery basket and did every possible thing to make our first meal of the day amazing and memorable. Thank you so much Nilesh and Amit. You two are the gem of this hotel 💎. Keep doing the great work and keep smiling always. Hope to see you guys soon. 😇 And thank you for the pastry too. 🙏🏻😇

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Dr Anil G
Review: Hotel Orchid the Oasis for travelers in crisis or just for simply luxurious experience
Detailed Review: Reached hotel when stranded by airlines due to present crisis situation. I was dehydrated and right at reception Mr. Mahesh Pahi (the duty manager on the morning of 5th May - as I came to know later) waived of mandatory needs of ID etc for later, got me to the room and nourishment. I sent him my ID by WhatsApp with a thank you note. The room was a surprise. I do not remember staying in the five-star hotel room with a microwave. No plastic bottles for clean water but glass bottles. No plastic in dustbins either. The interior decor merits a separate review for its elegance and style. The service was superb, food was delicious. One can get spoilt by such luxury. Strongly recommended for everything you want in the name of hospitality and luxury. I would give seven stars if that were…

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sunny
Detailed Review: First time visit for me to Mumbai from the UK. Unfortunately I wasn't aware that the city and state was under lock down so most of my stay, for my own safety during covid19 was within the hotel.  Initially I had booked breakfast only but since my flight had been cancelled and for my own safety of dining outside, the hotel changed my booking to also include meals - Chanchal was brilliant for helping me with this. I also thank Wesley, Kunal,Mahesh and Gauri for customer service.  The Food in the hotel was spectacular. Their vegetarian options are plentiful. The paneer Tikka I had from chef Hanuman was best I eaten in India. In fact all the meals from hotel was excellent. Thanks to Abhishek,Shubhan,Minal, Chef Rishi for excellent service in the restaurant.   The rooms were also…

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ishani K
Detailed Review: I found the hotel staff very well mannered and courteous. Food is also very tasty! I love the fact that its an eco friendly hotel!! Thanks a lot Mr Nilesh and Mr Amit for the great in room dining experience!

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Michelle Jane R
Review: First it was the St Regis , then we met Paul.
Detailed Review: So we went for a staycation to the St Regis . Bored of the lockdown and depressed with the pandemic around.  The place by itself is a beauty, the rooms well maintained and all that is expected of a five star.  The food is exceptional and the service outstanding.  A special mention about Priya who was the manager of the dining room.  But my lasting memories was not the room or the food. But the pianist Stephan Fernandes who transported us to another world with his music. He played our requests with a smile on his face and an elegant sway.  We met the most friendliest head chief Paul.  Both Girish n me were appalled  with Paul’s humility and Congeniality.  We felt that we were Paul’s guest although we hardly met him.  He made us feel very comfortable.  We have been regulars to…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sam2606
Detailed Review: Ate  lunch at Saheb room. Most disgusting experience!!! There was a plastic wrapper in the Lucknowi kebab, so we had to send it back. The Lucknowi mutton biriyani was dry... meat was dry and the rice was even more drier. I didn’t have the guts to try anything else. The chef was kind enough to send us some brioche shahi Tukda which was the only saving grace today. My experience- UGH !!!

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rishabh
Detailed Review: Had stayed at the property. Service is excellent. Courtesy of the hotel, room was upgraded to a superior view of racecourse. Mr. Vineet Pai was very kind, proactive and accommodative of all our requests. The chef at the Sahib restaurant, Mr. Shariq was kind enough to accomodate our requests for special food. It was truly a memorable experience. P.S. the bathtub is great and the chocolate ganache is a must try.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Shardul
Detailed Review: We stayed at St Regis Mumbai during the pandemic (May'21) for 4N5D. Overall it was a great experience. We felt safe during our stay as the staff followed covid protocols and social distancing was maintained. Breakfast was really good - comparable to what you would get in a good hotel outside of India. Dinner was included in our package and the food was great! We were presented with a cake since we were celebrating a special occasion. The staff makes sure that you're being pampered. They check with you frequently if everything is all right. Honestly, I feel that the frequency was a bit too much and could be reduced. Other than that, full points to cleanliness, staff service etc.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Muneesh_M
Detailed Review: Good clean place. Nice location. Courteous staff. Well served by Priyanka and her colleagues in the restaurant. Whole set up was very good, the restaurant around the pool was excellent. It is an old property but very well maintained. Keep it up.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Yash
Detailed Review: An excellent and brilliant place to have a memorable stay at VITS mumbai.The rooms are good and best part is their friendly staffs .In house Room dining staffs are very polite and foods are mouth watering.Will visit very soon.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv

Detailed Review: The staff was very co-operatieve and kind . The stay here was pleasant and wonderful . Enjoyed my weekend . Food was also delicious !  Mr raheem from bell desk and front office staff was very kind and co-operative.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sara A
Detailed Review: The stuff, especially mr Rahim and mr Viraj were wonderful. We were in critical situation and they helped us to cool down and had a nice long stay. I stayed in 3 different rooms. The rooms are spacious, the ones with window on the outside are the better, the inside have no direct sun light. Food is very good. Since we were in isolation we did not have room cleaning service. The cleanness may be little more accurate. The best thing is the flexibility of the stuff and their abilty to understand the needs of the guests. Wifi was excellent.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Kuntal83
Review: Staycation experience at Courtyard Marriott: Impressed with the service with the restrictions due to lockdown
Detailed Review: As we were in lockdown and almost everything was closed. We decided to go for a staycation to Courtyard marriot. This was a few days post our marriage.  The checkin process was seamless and we were given a pool facing rool.  Downside within the room is that there is no use and throw toiletries within the bathroom. All the toiletries are fixated on shower area wall which is very hard to use. Also there is no spray jet as well at the WC.  Though the pool area is closed, in levy of the lockdown regulations, they could have opened the garden and the pool side area for guests to just come down and take in the fresh air and enjoy nature  Due to the limited guests, resturant is shut and we had to call for in room dinning. The in room dinning did consider our dietary restrictions( Jain…

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Pankit S
Detailed Review: I had my wedding at this Hotel in April and it was awesome. The arrangement even in Covid time was classy. The food was great. The staff did a commendable job specially Viraj Adhate, Rakesh and vineet. I strongly recommend this place to everyone.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: mehulujala
Review: Excellent Service and very good Room
Detailed Review: I have stayed at the Courtyard by Marriott couple of times and my experience has always been a good one. I like the High standards they maintain for the Brand. service is excellent, rooms are also spacious and cozy. Sleep Quality is also very Nice. Buffet Breakfast has good spread. They have open Cafeteria besides the Lobby which is good to have some business meetings. Highly Recommended.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Myles
Detailed Review: Came for sunday brunch with unlimited Bombay Sapphire gin. The drinks were great! Had the Bombay Sapphire with fresh pressed pineapple and watermelon juice yum! The thai fish cakes and the chaat were the highlights of the food, other than that nothing to write home about.  Chef Akshay Naik was very helpful and hospitable.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Harsh Dhanuka
Review: Amazing stay, super  good hotel and staff, great pricing!
Detailed Review: We stayed for a night, transiting from Mumbai Airport. They hotel was very close to the airport, and the rooms and lobby was  beautiful and worth the price paid for.  We got a room upgrade, and the Executive Pool View Room 838 on the 8th Floor, and the the Executive City View Room 839 were  super great. For the price we got  directly from Marriott Bonvoy, it was a steal deal.   We  needed assistance with the car park, and Mr Hemant was highly receptive of our requests, and  accommodated all of them. At the check-in, Ms, Prachi was warm and lovely.   I am deeply impressed by their breakfast menu as well.   Overal, great stay, warm hospitality, highly recommend.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rima Chatterjee
Detailed Review: Chef Tejas, Vivian, Sahil and Amin had been extremely friendly. They made our stay and breakfast so comfortable. Hospitality was top notch. I recommend that every family should spend their holiday once in a while here. Great stay!

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Prudvi
Detailed Review: Stayed here with family I really enjoyed my stay Met jay and shiv  on arrival very kind helpful girl who assisted us during our entire stay would surely recommend this hotels to other who prefers for a nice service Jay is kind and friendly thanks to all the team member to

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Prakash Mali
Detailed Review: The overall stay was satisfactory. The front desk receptionist ( Mr Akshay and Mr Nikhil ) and the other staff quite helpful and supportive during the entire stay.  The room view was excellent and very comfortable.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Aayush Agrawal
Review: Worst experience due to unprofessional management
Detailed Review: Worst hotel , poor management , unprofessional rude manager ( Duty manager ) . Guys think twice before you book this horrible property they're literally cheaters....we have booked the property on triple sharing basis that includes breakfast , dinner & all taxes but according to them the third person can only have meals not a bed 🤣....if you want extra bed you have to pay 1500 bugs extra which you have already paid during the booking.....& the level of cheating is they nowhere mentioned this in the entire booking voucher......the reply from the duty manager was " I made this policy this is my property i can do anything " 🤣.....Is this the level of Holiday Inn ! Day before we stayed in Sofitel BKC amazing services they had even in this pandemic situation.....guys trust me this…

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Qayamuddin
Detailed Review: My room no.521  Everything is excellent in this hotel  All staff service are very good  Room cleaning also very excellent They are maintaining very good social distances Sanitising is also good Ramzan, Ajeeth, Ajay, are good staff and giving excellent service  I advice to my all friends come and stay here in Ur holiday

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rahul Mitra
Detailed Review: The room was spacious and well lit. No complaints there. The study table was weirdly arranged and therefore all the plug sockets were not accessible.  The food was not value for money at all. And had to remind the in room dining used to take a lot of time to deliver the food.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Salvatore
Detailed Review: I landed in Mumbai and as per the rules, I had to quarantine.  Choosing Holiday Inn was the right thing.  The room is very comfortable, large and the hote staff very helpful, I’m particular Salman who was very very helpful and professional! Thank u! Salva

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Raghavendra Hegde
Review: Reception is very polite and helpful
Detailed Review: We checked in on 22 may , Mahesh at reception help us a lot with nice and upgraded room . Whenever I came in orchid and meet Mahesh feel very happy because without asking he always help me with upgraded room . Service is class and best hospitality. I will suggest everyone to visit and specially meet Mahesh . Thnx to orchid and Mahesh 👌🙏

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: ajay maharshi
Detailed Review: we checked in on 13 May , we mate Mr.Mahesh at reception , who welcome us with with a smile and help us with a nice upgraded room and room also with a runway facing room and sanitise room with a clean bottele. Great hospitality , we will surely come back again , nice experienc in orchid . Thanks to Mahesh and Orchid Team .

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv

Detailed Review: I checked in in orchid hotel , Mahesh at reception is very helpful and always giving me nice upgraded room with nice view ‘ he is always polite and helpful during my stay , all what I can say is hotel is amazing and worth to stay, thnx to orchid team and special thanx to Mahesh , keep it up. I will always come and inform my fiends also

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Manoj Shah
Detailed Review: I had to stay at the orchid hotels bcoz my family members were suffering from covid. The management helped me have a wonderful stay. They helped me book all meals for the day.   The breakfast had great options and healthy food.  The housekeeping staff was awesome. They cleaned at convenience and were ready to help for any requirement throughout the stay. Special mention to Zillu Emelia, for all the help for the duration of my stay. Will definitely recommend this place for their hospitality.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: DIYASHA SARKHEL
Detailed Review: Thank you so much for the wonderful  stay....outstanding  service......Special  thanks  to Mr.Timothy (Housekeeping).Thank you so much Timothy sir,You made my day.....you actually  do service  from your heart....every time you came up to us.. you had a smile on your face.... Thank you so so much.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: rob_oc
Review: Very nice quiet hotel near the domestic airport
Detailed Review: I am quarantining in this hotel, currently on my 6th day. The hotel is very clean and the staff are very professional and helpful. I would like to thank Ms. Silam and especially Ms. Gauri at reception for their assistance during this stay. It is much appreciated.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Kausher A
Detailed Review: We had a conference of two days at orchid hotel in prive hall ,the F&B team has taken a very special care of us in these two days followed proper Covid protocol,the food is also delicious,special thanks to mr Ryan,Roshan,Aniket,Abhishek &team,will suggest the place to my freídnos,keep it up team & chef soufiyan and Rohit also

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: RM
Review: A true sample of excellent hospitality!
Detailed Review: Absolutely outstanding hotel perfectly located. Helpful, friendly staff, especially Kunal who went above and beyond to make sure you have the best time. Also an excellent breakfast buffet. We will definitely come back with friends and I would highly recommend this hotel.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: mohit sipani
Detailed Review: Most anticipated day of our life 10th anniversary & we couldn't have chosen the most perfect hotel and hospitality but St REGIS. We made fond memories and new friends during our stay. I would like to thank Siddharth Dey for helping me with bookings and executing everything we required on a short notice. Special thanks to Suman at the front desk, he made sure that our stay was comfortable and did that was best possible.  Our private butler Tanvi, decorated the room with  fairy lights, balloons, yummy cake and a bottle of wine along with a hand written card from her. She even surprised our kids with a chocolate cake before we checked out.   A special mention of mixologist Shweta Raut, extremely talented and a wonderful person created some phenomenal cocktails for us, especially …

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: rohan9999
Detailed Review: We stayed here on a weekend our of leisure. The hotel has a grand and lavish lobby. There are two specialty restaurants both of which offer high quality food. Two noteworthy aspects about this hotel: 1. Location - In South Mumbai, close to one of the best malls and plenty restaurants. 2. Breakfast - At the banquet hall, highly recommended with one of the widest spread of cereals, fruits, cooked food, waffles and more.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sunny Shah
Detailed Review: Right from check in till check out the whole experience was worth it. Getting complimentary lemon tarts in the evening courtesy the Butler and also see you soon pastry on our last day at breakfast was really touching. A very great thing being provided by St Regis is the buttler service to each and every room across all categories, it needs getting used to in the beginning as we were not at all used to it, special mention to Mr Caesar Aranjo for putting us so much at ease, making us feel so comfortable that the hotel feels like home and also for always being just a call or a message away and the top notch service and follow ups.  We are coming back to St Regis for sure.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: travelreigh1
Detailed Review: I actually stayed a while ago but was unable to set the right date. This hotel has the best service I have ever experienced. It was simply amazing. Make sure you do not miss their breakfast :). Will recommend it to everyone.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Tasneem arsiwala
Review: Celebrating my husbands birthday at The St Regis Mumbai !
Detailed Review: It was purely a mesmerising stay the staff was very polite and helpful. The hotel is beautiful also our Butler Mr Caesar was very helpful he helped me decorate the room.  Thanks alot for this amazing memory for life ! ☺️

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rishit shah
Detailed Review: Mr.caesor Aranjo has given wonderful service throughout my stay . He was there all the time and very helpful with all coordination. The hotel is also maintaining all sanitation which is needed for the members

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Januska Pacheco
Detailed Review: Very Nice Property  and spacious rooms. Ceaser and his colleague was very helpful. Nice staff. Thank you for the lady chef for making it a memorable trip. Love the cupcake. Vast breakfast options. 👍 😊

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Trek43142607813
Detailed Review: The stay was amazing. Visited for my wife’s bday. It was a great gesture by sending a cake at 12.00 am at night. Food was good. Service was amazing. Breakfast buffet was superb. Vinit was really helpful and personalised. Thanks to Team St regis . Keep up the hospitality. You guys are great.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Mahesh
Detailed Review: The service provided by hotel is excellent,the staffs are well mannerd,gentle and polite and always keen to help.Room service was quick and Restaurant staffs are very friendly.BreAkfast spread was good.Mr.Ilyas was very helpful.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Prashant Dattaram
Detailed Review: Stayed at VITS hotel for my quarantine.The location is very convenient with all the transport access.The staffs are very friendly and polite.They strictly followed all the Covid-19 protocols.Sanitization done on daily Basis with thermal screening.I felt really safe and secured during my quarantine.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Babli Dey
Detailed Review: VITS is located at a very good location within affordable price. Staff is very cooperative and prompt service. Clean and spacious room. Breakfast ambience is too cool. Covid protocols strictly maintained. Overall very good experience. Looking forward to stay again

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rahul
Detailed Review: Everything is just perfect..! The hotel is maintained well with all amenities & cleanliness is given high importance. The staff is extremely courteous. Really enjoyed the stay. The location is near to the Mumbai international airport.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: shakir shaikh
Detailed Review: excellent hotel, very nice facilities like food,parcel service inner space of hotel is beautiful, claenness area,room have good arrange for couples as well as family and also hotels employee is gave very good service

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Anirudh
Detailed Review: Had a great stay. Thanks to Ashank from reception  who made sure we had a comfortable stay, right from smooth check in to check out.  We arrived late and were surprised to have everything ready upon arrival.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: ANSHUL_MI
Detailed Review: It was an excellent stay. Right from checking-in till i left, the staff was very kind and helpful. Rooms were clean and spacious. Breakfast spread was huge. Elite benefits provided were excellent. I will definitely stay again.  Thanks for taking such good care of me and my family.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Kavitha M
Detailed Review: I stayed in this hotel for 2 weeks. The staff are warm, courteous and alert to every need of the guest. The Momo cafe, which was the only restaurant operational due to covid protocol, is an excellent choice in terms of food, ambience and attitude of the staff.  I recommend this hotel whole heartedly and look forward to going back .

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Akshay Gupta
Detailed Review: I would like to commend the coffeeshop for taking such good care of me for my breakfast needs. In particular Abhijit, Chef Akshay, Mayur, Sahil, Amin and Crystalline for ensuring my happiness each morning Keep up the good work!

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: vishal K.
Detailed Review: It was an fantastic stay at Courtyard by Marriott Mumbai, right from front office associate to restaurant manager  everyone here is so proactive in providing bespoke hospitality. Thank you I enjoyed my stay, see you soon.... And I specially thanks to Mr abhijeet patwardhan, Rajas samant from fnb (momo cafe) ,chef Akshay and Harshal ,Hemant from front office ,Marshal ,Aditya Badal from room services all are so friendly and helpfull that I never feel that I m living out. They treated me as of am  family member so I wish all of them all the best for their bright future. Excellent ambiance, quick service,value for money Thank you so much n all the best   team courtyard....

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
