Detailed Review: We stayed for couple of nights and had a good experience. The food at momo Cafe is really perfect and one of the best. Also the staff is friendly and looking to work towards guests requirements. GM Babita Kanwar is prompt and upgraded us to a suite given I am marriott platinum. Rates are reasonable and hotel is well maintained with a good lobby. Overall a good experience

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Antra D
Detailed Review: It was great stay very beautiful ambiance staff were very courteous and approachable, while check-in ashank and prachi from front office was very polite and sweet, IRD team was great special thanks to rohit  panchal and rishi they were too helpful choosing over the food and beverage they gave us excellent option  and we really enjoyed the food, we were looking forward to visit again

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: RVB
Detailed Review: I had booked the hotel for my parents anniversary. Everyone was so lovely especially in terms of service. They guided us through all our queries and paid attention to the smallest detail! Highly recommend this hotel for any kind of event.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Alex
Detailed Review: Wonderful birthday breakfast with a surprise chef’s speciality cake to celebrate!  I had stayed at this hotel some time ago and got to bring my family this time for a birthday breakfast.  Everything was excellent with good precautions and top Notch service by the staff.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Nilesh
Review: Awesome hotel near Mumbai International Airport
Detailed Review: Courtyard Marriott near International Airport Mumbai has become my new favourite when i visited the hotel recently in March. Hotel is approximately 15 min drive from the airport. My driver sent by hotel Mr. Jagtap was already standing there to pick me up from the airport even before my flight has landed who is very nice & polite guy. The staff here are very well behaved, humble & co-operative people. Mr. Badal, Prathamesh,Daniel & Melvin were very cooperative & helpful people. Chef Akshay Naik catered to my specific taste buds & dietary needs & has a very professional hand in many cuisines. Tasty food & delightful ambience makes it a perfect destination of a food lover & a tourist with in. Will refer to my friends & also visit next time I am in mumbai.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Vish G
Review: Great service at affordable price, excellent location
Detailed Review: If you are looking for 5-star services and amenities, near international airport in Mumbai, look no further than Courtyard @ International airport.   To be clear, this hotel is not exactly next to the airport. It's about 15 minutes ride by cab in Mumbai traffic. But it's really not an issue since it's still close enough that you don't have to worry about Mumbai traffic jams.  The service is professional, very polite and friendly.  The food is great, especially the typical Mumbai style food is fantastic. Chef Akshay Naik was particularly very helpful and catered to my specific dietary needs.  Overall, its a great 5-star experience at a very affordable price.   For those international travelers, particularly the business travelers, do consider this property as it provides…

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Himanshu R
Review: Great place to stay near the airport
Detailed Review: Stayed here twice in 2 weeks and it was perfect both times. Tried their amazing lunch buffet recommended by Chef Akshay Naik and everything tasted great. Would highly recommend, especially if you need a place near the airport.  The staff is friendly and cordial and available to serve you 24X7.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Pratik S
Detailed Review: Service was very good. Mr Vinit patil and Mr Kunal patil has take care of our hospitality in very well manner. He attends all our query or demands in proper way. Appreciate the efforts. I would like to suggest all to keep there bussines meet here.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: DeeBeeTraveller
Detailed Review: Very good Guest service offered...as always Generally Luxury hotel, at present hotel offering reasonable rates. Name: Shreyar
Detailed Review: Cafe momo is our favourite go to place for best buffet in town. The variety and prices are fantastic. The quality of the food is excellent as well. We are mostly served and taken care by Sayar. He always goes out of his way to make sure we are comfortable and given the best service. A proper child friendly restaurant.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv

Detailed Review: Salman tulway  was very excellent and hospitable helped me with a lot of things he should be promoted to be a manager never seen such a good staff great service  very polite very attentive smiling staff  Rixon Maben

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv

Review: Regarding my recent stay in Holiday Inn
Detailed Review: Thanks to the Covid situation I had to stay in Holiday Inn, Mumbai International Airport for 14 days.  Here's what was good about my stay:  1. Service was excellent. People go out of their way to ensure your genuine needs are met. 2. I did my son's engagement ceremony there and the Banquets manager Ashok provided excellent service. He was there well before the event. He was there until the event finished. He was constantly checking if I was happy with the service. 3. Food provided during the event or in In Room dining was excellent. No complaints. 4. The management needs to give full credit to the foot soldiers of the hotel. Right from the people who serve you, people at the reception, lobby manager, people at the bar and restaurant, they were all excellent. 5. When ever we…

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Mala Dinesh Ohri
Detailed Review: With this note, we (Airlink Tours & Travels India Pvt Ltd.) would like to express our sincere thanks and appreciation for the services you and your team provided to make our corporate brunch a great success.   Awesome service in Covid pandemic situations having proper sanitization and staff with proper face masks and gloves. We sincerely acknowledge the leadership and professionalism of members from your team Mr. Ashok, Mr. Vijay, Mr. Umesh- Chef and the entire team who provided us the services which were above and beyond our expectations and making it a pleasant experience dealing with them. Talking about the Food served  MOCKTAIL - Guava Merry- this mocktail was absolutely refreshing to the tastebuds. MAIN COURSE -Chalo Bhature - have always been our favourite and this one…

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Gaurav N
Detailed Review: It was again an excellent stay in holiday inn.. Every time you come here, you get mesmerised by the hospitality here.  Special call out to chef Rajesh, nasibuddin, amisha, dhanashree and nikhil for making the stay more comfortable.  The food at Saptami again exceeds expectation.  Keep up the consistency. Looking fwd for next visit.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Jalaj S
Review: Regarding the feedback of hotel Holiday inn .

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: divisha
Detailed Review: After lockdown it was the first hotel I stayed in, front office team was very helpful and funny. Ajeet, Kinjal, Ajay, Nikhil Shantanu were very friendly and made my stay memorable. I’ll definable visit again.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Poonam M
Detailed Review: Good service at Banquet,  food is ok, but variety food options, nice people, good treatment, provide instant service whenever required, internet little slow but managable, will definitely come back, sitting arrangements are perfectly managed, thumps up to all staff and their service

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sid
Detailed Review: I have been to more than 100 hotels worldwide in the last 2 decades and in more than 30+ countries. So my review is based on my experience which I have got at the time of stay, dining, check-in, checkout, etc.   1) According to Ms. Mukta Assistant Manager - all the IHG hotels authorize the credit card (block it) for other incidental expenses like breakfast, lunch, dinner, etc. at the time of check-in.  2) We have stayed in Intercontinental and my brother is a Platinum member and he never had to block the credit card (pre-authorize) for incidentals at the time of check-in.  3) The location of the Hotel is very pathetic. Sakinaka. It is not close to International Airport. Distance might be only 2.6 KM but it takes good 15-30 minutes minimum to cross that stretch. Its located right…

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Tania_Mary_Thomas
Detailed Review: Visited the hotel during Women’s day celebration and absolutely loved the place. The vibe, the ambiance, the food, the warm hospitality everything is top notch. They also follow strict covid protocols and regularly sanitise the place which makes one feel safe. Definitely recommend the place.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: NimeshKapoor
Review: A tradition set to welcome every guest keeping their particular taste in mind ...
Detailed Review: Despite Covid-19, nothing changed in terms to their never-ending services right from the check-in to Saptami to the entire meal. You always feel the warmth of luxury and they way they personalize is a class above all ...  Kudos to Nikhil Prasad, Sachin, Chef Siddharth, Vally, Tushant, Omastha, Amisha, Dhanashree, Joseph, Baliram and many more ...

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv

Review: Excellent service and food taste is awesome
Detailed Review: Really being here  Outstanding service provided by Passang,Anand and Rahul recommended for birthday parties huge varieties of desert, main course and ambience is awesome 😍 really satisfied must gonna visit again 😁

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Nelson D
Detailed Review: Was greeted at Mumbai Airport by Mr. D'lima, his genuine care and concern towards my family was an assurance that I had made the right choice for my stay. The hotel was clean and the service was excellent, Will definitely return to this hotel when visiting India.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv

Review: 10/10 for my stay at The Orchid, Vile Parle
Detailed Review: Thank you so much for amazing service provided by Mr. Suraj Singh during the breakfast. Calm and comfortable stay for family and friends. Booking was done swiftly, directly at the hotel through a phone call with attractive discount ☺️

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Pritam bhist
Detailed Review: It was great stay with orchid Amazing service by In room dining Amit were extremely helpful...I will surely visit orchid again just bcoz of the service provided by orchid..highly recommend if anyone traveling to mumbai... thanks a lot...

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: ram k
Detailed Review: It was very nice food and presentation 👍 Service is very nice staff is very corporate Hotel is very good to business travels very good breakfast  spred and testy food  special  Thanks  to mahesh and kanchan.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Vineet S
Detailed Review: Needless to say that this hotel never ceases to impress me every time of my stay... Looking forward to visit again. Best regards to Sufiyaan, Kunal, Tareekh, Salman and all the housekeeping and maintenance crew. In continuation to my last review as below....  I have been frequenting Hotel Orchid since May 2020 and so far have been here 5 times. Right from check in to check out things have remained smooth during every stay. Reception team were well behaved and informative. Help desk/ Housekeeping/ In room Dining made sure the services were quick and resolved. My deepest gratitude and wishes the star chef of the hotel Mr Sufiyan Sayed who left no coin unturned to service my requests and taste buds. Overall my heartiest and best wishes to the entire team of The Orchid for making my…

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Suraksha Rai
Detailed Review: Mitesh from housekeeping department has been more then helpful, I am very thankful to him so being so humble and kind and assisting guest at all the way possible. Thankyou so much Mitesh I am indeed greatful for all the assistance you have given me throughout. Keep going we ll soon reach the place where you deserve. Thankyou and keep up your excellent work. Goodluck to you and hope to meet you again😊 Regards  Suraksha

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Manpreet Kaur
Detailed Review: I came here after lockdown and I am a big fan of the varierty of food they have always offered. The food was pretty good and all the staff do take care of the covid safety guidelines. Thank you for the hospitality

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sourabh
Detailed Review: Quite a nice and pleasant stay. The staff was very courteous and helpful. Food was also equally good. Highly recommended if you are looking for a short stay near to the airport. Looking forward to staying with them again! :)

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: devranimegha
Detailed Review: The hotel is located close to the airport. The staff is very helpful and every single person there greets you with a smile . Harshada at the restaurant was very attentive to the guests ‘  needs and attended everyone with enthusiasm and smile . The filter coffee and dosa served at the south of Vindhyas was one of the best I have ever had . The place was sanitised well and the rooms were clean .

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: nidhi_travels
Detailed Review: Was amazed at the level of hospitality shown by them and especially by the butler Mansi.  Their breakfast buffet is one the best spread you will find. Highly recommend this place for anyone looking for a good stay in Mumbai

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Mufaddal I
Review: Very comfortable stay in a great location
Detailed Review: My family and I really enjoyed our stay at the St. Regis. The rooms were really good, service was fantastic as was the location - very convenient being connected to the Palladium.  The only negative for me for the breakfast could be improved. I think it doesn't help that breakfast is in the banquet hall due to Covid but it really did effect the breakfast experience.  All in all, I would definitely keep coming to this hotel.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: koeli
Detailed Review: We were put up at the hotel for a night from March 28-29.The hotel had zero knowledge of how to go about the Government norms for COVID, NOONE cared to follow the rules laid down and last but NOT the least the hotel DIDN'T have the money to give our security deposit back.So would warn people to think twice before you book the hotel.And yes I had to keep mailing them and texting them for the refund.They were not even apologetic.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Vishala K
Detailed Review: Our stay at St.Regis was absolutely magical. It was made even more special by the fabulous Vineet Pai - who made sure that we were pampered from the minute we checked in! Great service and even better people! From the special lunch reservation, to the extra special treatment to the adorable take away gift, we came away feeling refreshed, relaxed and very special.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rakhi V
Detailed Review: thanks to vinit pai(my butler) my stay was very comfy, enjoyable and memorable. thank u vinit pai for taking such good care of us, thanks to you, Regis becomes our 2nd home.u we're most amazing, looking forward to holiday at st Regis soon..thanks to u

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Asmita
Detailed Review: I have currently been quarantining in St Regis upon arrival in India  . My experience has been extremely disappointing. I have had to follow up multiple times to receive my meals, often received cold. For any information I require I keep calling the butler service never to receive any concrete follow up from them. The food too is extremely basic and I have received the same curry for lunch and dinner on 2 days, making me wonder if it was even cooked fresh! I expected more from a 5 star hotel! Definitely a dissatisfied customer!

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Kothwala008
Review: St regis mumbai are the Apple and LV in the hospitality industry
Detailed Review: Celebrated my anniversary from room to service its all amazing Kiya at the front desk Farzad at butler service every single person is just polished to the core amazing inroom dinning the hotel is the iceberg  of luxury i will stay here every time

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Christin
Detailed Review: I stayed at the hotel for a night at the suite, the amenities that they offer with the views are out of this world. The entire team was extremely helpful and their private butler service is definitely something that makes things easier for a guest during their stay. Special mention to Ceasar (our butler) who was always available for anything and everything.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: PARAG SHAH
Detailed Review: I and my had stayed at ST Regis mumbai on 13th March on account of our Anniversary it was memorable stay we enjoyed the hospitality specially Mr Vinnet Pai was very cooperative and took utmost care by giving us surprises n looked in our small need we also enjoyed breakfast the best upto ll now . We are disappointed by dinner as there were very few varieties in jain and veg .  Chef Athar also took good care Nb tried to give us the required jain dishes . But overall we enjoyed our stay with wonderful hospitality n service . If given special offer we would definetly like to visit again.  Regards   Parag Shah  9819900924

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Vidhi5
Detailed Review: We stayed here for 3 nights, our room was the St Regis Suite and it was just class apart. Our best staycation experience yet. The check in was quick and easy, they allotted us a room of our preference. The premises were very clean and hygienic, following all the safety protocols for Covid 19. Our room was very spacious, clean and the interiors were very regal. Our Butler, Farzad gave us a room tour promptly upon check in and helped us throughout the stay with any requests or queries that we had. The housekeeping staff was very quick and efficient; kudos to Mr. Ram and Aman from the staff! The in room dining experience was also very very delicious! The food was cooked as per our dietary requirements and was simply the best. The breakfast had a huge spread and the staff were quick…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Jezel Barretto
Detailed Review: I and my partner  had the best experience staying at The St  Regis. Amazing hospitality and service provided by their butler Mr. Caesar Araujo and by Mr. Jonathan Soeiro.  The best place to pamper yourself. Even with the covid pandemic, the St. Regis hotel is one of the most safest places to be at . Their team took  care of all the precautions  required.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: VishShah31
Detailed Review: As it is my birthday month so me and my friends decided to stay at this amazing property. The rooms are spectacular,the view of partial sea rooms is breathtaking,the breakfast was scrumptious. Overall an amazing experience.   Special Thanks to Mr Amanpreet  & Mr Vineet Pai who made our stay extremly memorable and comfortable,trust me these guyz are very professional and had a friendly attitude. They provided us with cake and balloons and yes not to frget while checking out we got a memento a frame with our picture in it,Thankyou Mr Vineet it was a very kind gesture. Even Special thanks to Mr Akshay who was very kind and catered to all the needs at the breakfast table     Once again thankyou for making our stay quite memorable

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Akshayta Shetty
Detailed Review: We had visited St Regis on the 13th of feb to celebrate our wedding anniversary & we were taken utmost care of by Mr Caesar Aranjo! He's service was highly commendable! He took all possible efforts to help us have a memorable stay & ensured at all times that we were most comfortable! We appreciate him & the entire hotel staff being Kind & polite to us! I'd also like to mention Harshala who served us very well during our breakfast buffet! She offered us some palatable dishes out of the menu which made our breakfast more special!   We'd like to thank the entire team at St.Regis for everything done!

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Amit Thakur
Detailed Review: I booked the room for myself.  honestly I was not expecting much in terms of hospitality....  But This is the 2nd or 3rd time I have ever rated any hotel 5 star. The staff were really polite , the room, the view, the cleanliness was excellent.  I would like to give a shout out to MR. Manpreet (Front office ) who done the check in formalities ,Harshila who personally takes care of your breakfast.  Will definitely recommend this hotel and will be revisiting several times a year for sure. Cheers!!

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Jiten S
Detailed Review: We lived at the hotel for just two nights for a 'surprise' staycation for our 5 year old son and spent the whole time practically at the hotel.  The suite we stayed in was luxurious and very comfortable.  The buffet breakfast and dinner had a very wide variety and great quality.  Specially enjoyable though, was their bar, luna nudo. Brilliant ambience, great cocktails.  The most amazing thing though was their hospitality. At the restaurants, the staff was able to anticipate our needs and do all they could to attend to the special requests we made for our son.  Coming out of a pandemic this hotel has been able to restore hospitality back to its fully glory.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: nomadic_amit
Review: Excellent Stay; Personalized service from Everyone.
Detailed Review: This was my second stay in two weeks, this time on a week-long business trip. Being a Marriott Bonvoy member, I was upgraded to the Premier room on the 26th Floor with views over the race course and Haji Ali. The rooms are spacious and, as I was working from the hotel room on weekdays, I had ample space to set up my work desk. The staff, right from the valet to the housekeeping, front desk, travel desk, and the restaurants... everyone was courteous and made their best efforts to make sure that I had a great stay. I would definitely be coming back soon. Bhoomi & Shubham from the Restaurants team, Prashant from Housekeeping, and Harshala deserve special mention for their very personal touch and genuinely heart-felt service.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Pranav Goyal
Detailed Review: Without doubt the stay at St.Regis was very good. Right from check in to check out was a breeze and the staff is very courteous.  Special mention to Kevin who personally got me my meal to the room.  The rooms are big and clean with all amenities and comfortable beds.  I hope that the water bottles being used in the room are recycled or sent for the same to a unit as thats a lot of plastic.  The breakfast was great with a lot of options. Especially liked the bakery goods and the cheese board.  The chef manning the pancake/waffle counter was amazing. She made one of the best French Toast I have had.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Atlglobetrotters
Review: Outstanding hotel with the best staff! Gem of Mumbai
Detailed Review: Typically our go-to hotel in Mumbai is the JW in Juhu after which Taj (Lands end/Mahal, etc) and this was the first time that we tried out St. Regis which is in an ultra convenient location in Lower Parel. From this point, we are going to flip it to St. Regis first and below are the reasons why.  1. Their staff is the best we have encountered in the luxury segment in Mumbai. Starting with Nicholas Dumbell who is an ivy league grad and a veteran in the business. I didn't have a chance to meet Nick, but his staff of Ganapathy, Siddhartha and Inzamam were phenomenal.  2. They have a butler service keeping very much in tradition with St. Regis and boy what an asset those professionals are. Our expert was Caesar Araujo who was a consummate pro.  3. The interior design is just…

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Prasad
Detailed Review: Pool Side restaurant is our favourite go to place for best buffet in town. The variety and prices are fantastic. The quality of the food is excellent as well. We are mostly served and taken care by ilyas He always goes out of his way to make sure we are comfortable and given the best service. Aproper child friendly restaurant.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Jay
Detailed Review: I have been there for two nights. The rooms are spacious with basic amenities. All the staffs are very polite and helpful. Few staffs like Chayanka and Pratik was very helpful through out our stay at vits.  Rahim from Bell desk was very professional and helpful.  Foods there,are very tasty and presentable and quick room dining facility.  They always follow all the covid protocols strictly. So I think it's a very safe hotel to stay in this current scenerio.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Manas K
Detailed Review: Very friendly people. Covid safety precautions are well taken care off. Mr. Rahim at conceirge, and Mr. Ram in restaurant are an asset to the organization. Miss Mehreen at front desk was a great help. Overall, wonderful stay without a doubt.  Regards Manas

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Peeyush Singh
Review: Visited bits Mumbai for office purposes
Detailed Review: Stayed for a duration of 3 days. Poolside restaurant is a nice place to have food, good ambience of the hotel, good staff.. liked it a lot. Room cleanliness and hygiene is as expected from hotel of this stature..

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Prashant J
Detailed Review: One of the best hospitality hotel in airport area,highly recommended,they are taking all the precautions in this pandemic starting from lobby to room all are well sanitise,room was very comfortable,value for money..love the staff there hospitality unforgettable,they were very courteous and professional during our stay they always make sure we feel safe and comfortable..specially Front Desk manager Mr.Viraj..he made our stay so enjoyable and gave good memories of the hospitality..we enjoyed a lot..we will visit soon👍🏻

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Vilas Khadse
Detailed Review: I had multiple pleasent stay with VITS..As it was my family visit with my daughter..All were very good and also warm welcome to Front office team..Got great response during check out from Mr. Viraj, Paresh,Mehreen and Himanshu..Thanks guys keep it up..

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Abbasali
Detailed Review: Nice food and humble hospitality during my stay.   Housekeeping is vigilant and nothing is  left to keep neat and tidy.   Room service is also quick.  Checking process is as per government rule during covid 19 measurements are care off.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rameshhhh5
Detailed Review: I had an excellent stay at VITS Mumbai, very professional service and amazing food! Rooms are spacious and comfortable and have everything that you need. The staff go out of their way. The breakfast spread was amazing, I  would like to  thank you for the beautiful gesture. Mr. Viraj  form Reception was very attentive and took really good care of us.  So I would like to take this opportunity to thank them for my greatest gratitude!!

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: amit s
Detailed Review: It was my Fantastic visit at VITS International Mumbai. It was memorable day for us. All staff were very friendly and very professional. Really guys are doing fantastic job keeping guest services on top priority and providing friendly environment. I would like to thanks specially Mr. Viraj and his reception team for professional services.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ripon
Detailed Review: Very good service by all the staff here.All the peaple are very cooperative..food is excellent and good housekeeping..parking available and safety is the main priority of this hotel.hope eveyone will satisfy with the service.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Gautam D
Detailed Review: Stay is very good, breakfast are very good. Staff's  are very cordial and helping in nature.  Hotel ambiance is good   room service bill sud be posted against room, then and then cash sud not be asked for

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Vivek Sharma
Detailed Review: Amazing experience thanks to .. Priyanka Ghag,  Vasim, Vishal , Priyanka Madhik ..all the arrangements were well managed.. Gala night arrangements were up to the mark. Will surely visit again ... thanks 😊

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Paras N
Detailed Review: Candle light dinner arrangement was superbb  Ambience was up to the mark  Servicing staff are too nice.. poolcafe experience is superbb .. must have visit , worth of money , have a gorgeous day with your couple.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Tandel kenal h
Detailed Review: We had a great stay here. The staff was very helpful and helped us in a great manner for our stay. They helped us check in early and amazing hospitality.. Breakfast was really good as well. Would love to stay here again!!

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: DK Gupta
Detailed Review: Stayed here and the hotel is excellent for corporate guest's, very supportive staff and the food is homely and great. I will stay here again and again. The rooms are very clean and the service is promot.recommended for a comfortable stay

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Kanagaraj saravanan
Detailed Review: Excellent food. Add mor items in buffet.   My stay was good  staff  was good & Helpful.  service was good . Room are ok .  But Ac not working.😑  Poolside restaurant. Ambience & waterfall very nice ......... Thankyou

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Shashikant
Detailed Review: Courteous staff. Excellent breakfast. Prime location for business as well lesuire. Building needs a little renovation but is well kept. Would recommend for a short stay. Pool is closed due to COVID-19.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Biplab
Detailed Review: Stayed there for two nights with my parents. The hotel is situated heart of the city. Ambience of the restaurant was just wondering. Rooms were spacious with all the amenities. Poolside staffs are friendly with good service.Will come back soon

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Priti M
Detailed Review: Visited pool side restaurant, pleased with service n courtesy of management n staff, food was tasty n delicious, like the presentation, followed proper guidelines of covid sop .ambiance was very attractive, fully satisfied, will definitely visit again!!!

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: sonam
Detailed Review: A bad check in at vits Mumbai,  I can't stop myself for uploading a bad review for vits Mumbai,  its a worst hotel in this category we've ever seen. On check in, security tell us to take our luggage at own in very bad manner. After check in there was no hair dryer in executive room and when asked for dryer they didn't get and had to go out without having it . On calling in room service for a plate of pakoda, the fnb told us to give it 40min late, how? I don't understand as in 40min I can fill all 80 people tummy with pakodas in my own house.   Tea in room called by us and skewer took around 25min for just 2 cup of tea and asked for money first then serving as we'll left the hotel without paying,  we were bathing and was wet,my husband told him that Will pay at check out but he…

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Abhishesh
Detailed Review: It was good stay but washroom was not as per expectation.  You can say 3.5 star not 4 star.  I was forced to pay my food bill in room only eventhough I requested to pay while checking out. Staff are excellent. Food are good.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Devang
Detailed Review: The stay was nice along with breakfast. Breakfast had different varieties for all types of food... They need to improve on North Indian food taste. Overall i will recommend this property for strongly.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Harshit G
Review: Great Staff and Pleasant Stay for a Night
Detailed Review: Had a wonderful experience with caring staff around and decant sized room. Definitely in a good area for someone looking to easily transit in and out of Mumbai International Airport. Checkin was fast and simple

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Harshad
Detailed Review: we stayed here two nights. The stay was really  peaceful.Excellent hospitality and friendly staffs Rooms are neat and clean with basic amenities. Foods and service are really  great. Highly recommended  for all travellers..

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Jitender
Detailed Review: Poolside view is awesome also breakfast was excellent   Vishal from poolside was good and helpful  Room are non smoking but well maintained   I would like to visit again  Thank you vits Team and special Thanks to Vishal

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Vishalkhot
Detailed Review: Room is good taking care hygiene in covid situation   had breakfast also good and decent Samrat and joy help with counter service   poolside staff is very helpful   Thank you so much for service   i will visit again

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ashish
Detailed Review: Morning buffet is good. And the staffs are also very polite and professional. Liked the service of Mr. Ranjith. Had a good experience overall.   A basic all variety breakfast is served and its healthy enough.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Balendu
Detailed Review: My family stayed in the hotel for 2 nights we like the ambience of the hotel..we had breakfast at poolside with pool view Ranjith,Illyas,samrat,rajes very helpful with services..  Thank you so much for your hospitality

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Gauarv K
Detailed Review: Yess!! Finally we had a great time and happy to be part of such lovely hospitality and the members who treated us for our anniversary was remarkable. Happy to get service from u guys @samrat @joy  Thanks from hunbun102

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: darwin
Detailed Review: Sunday 26th Feb 2017,  The hotel staff were professional and courteous throughout, starting from sales team to the events team. Everything required for the event was systematically organized and the rapport between us and the Events team was splendid.  Food, without a doubt was fantastic. The staff were extremely helpful and proactive. Kuddos to their team !

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Juhi shah
Detailed Review: We were here for 7 nights. It was our quarantine period after the trip to dubai. The amt we paid for the booking included 3 meals a day. Although we were not allowed to leave our room, they never made us feel that we are kind of locked up. Special thanks to Mr ROHAN KADAM, he made sure that every meal was perfect, exactly how and what we wanted! He would never hesitate to go one step ahead and make us feel more comfortable with the meals.  Secondly, I would like to thank Mr. Dhaval who was always at our service and made sure we felt like home. He went way out to help us with what we need. I would give one star less because There was someone else on the phone who without even trying would always say a NO to our every requirement saying that we are quarantined so we cannot get it.…

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rajesh
Detailed Review: Overall service was Well Organized  by the Team  Food was also Good  Special thanks to  Kevin patil, Akshay B, Vinit patil, Alison Banda, Pradeep Mishra, Kunal patil, Ashton karat  they were very helpful  Throught the Day

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ragini Chauhan
Detailed Review: Thank you for making our dinner special. Great services provided by Abhijeet Patwardhar & Deepak. Have enjoyed the lavish buffet special thanks to Chef Tejas.  Every person's attention to detail, communication, and ready smile made the experience even better than I expected.   Your Happy Customer, Ragini Chauhan

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Anjali
Detailed Review: I chose Courtyard by Marriott for my quarantine post an international trip, and stayed for one week. It was comfortable, the service was prompt, the food was great (quality & quantity), they were able to address my queries and needs. The room was very spacious for one person, and the view was wonderful too. Really appreciated the service and the accomodation, and would love to stay-cay there again if I could.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Gade
Detailed Review: Momo cafe is simply superb. Excellent food and service. During my stay of 10 days Mayur has provided dedicated service and really excellent guy. Chef Santosh is very understanding and provided delicious food. I could not remember some of the names but overall they provided excellent service.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: ClintCpt
Detailed Review: ShanePeacock and Asif Shaikh My wife Tracy Lee Rosslind had appeared in Peacock Magazine for the month of Feb., I happened to be in India in Feb. Asif Shaikh went out of his way to acquire 4 copies of the magazine. After failed attempts via the internet , Asif contacted the Peacock head offices and had it delivered to the hotel. Thank you Asif Shaikh and thank you the Peacock Team

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: NPP
Detailed Review: Great food and spread. We all enjoyed a lot. The filter coffee was also very good. But please add fresh fruits to the dessert spread. Also please do keep more non-vegetarian dishes on the live counter.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: amitwani
Detailed Review: Mr.Abhijit Patwardhan incharge of the Momo's Cafe gave very good service along with his team. We were impressed with the hospitality and staff. Buffet spread was very good. I wish to recommend this Restaurant to those who are looking to have Buffet dinner or lunch.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: pawarsuyog281@gmail.com
Detailed Review: I came at ummrao it was the best experience of my life all credit goes to the young guy gaurav the rock stare he is very good guy he knows his product very well  thanks buddy we will come back soon definitely

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ravi A
Detailed Review: Stayed for almost a month in Jan-Feb 2021 and was very impressed with the level of hospitality, especially of Abhijit in the Momo restaurant. Thanks for making my stay memorable and look forward to coming again

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Nupur Bagdi
Detailed Review: Came to MOMO Cafe for family dinner. The place is a mix of good ambience, pleasant music and happy staff, specially Raju, who was proactive, knowledgeable, jovial & took good care of all our needs. Cheers!

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sameer D.
Detailed Review: We come here very often. The dinner buffet at Momo Cafe is great. We usually use Zomato or Dineout to get a good deal. The spread is great and the service is amazing. Special thanks to Raju for taking good care of us.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rubal Agrawal
Detailed Review: I stayed with my family. Amazing service. The rooms were sparkling clean. The staff ensured that proper sanitation and hygiene was being maintained. The buffet spread at the breakfast was very good, and the dinner was awesome. The serving staff were very prompt. Tasty food with a lavish spread. Highly recommended for family.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Shweta Divate
Detailed Review: Recently went for dinner with my family. The staff is great. Raju especially is so sweet, helping and kind. He is excellent at his job. He made the dinner even more enjoyable and lively. Wishing him all the best for his future.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Shaista
Detailed Review: Amazing food, amazing ambience,  It was a wonderful experience...Raju personally paid special attention to our table..The service was absolutely awesome .........had a great time !!!!! Had a awesome pre birthday celebration

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Tourist.121
Review: All the facilities were very good,all the staff was helpful and very kind
Detailed Review: Having a good experience will wish to stay there in future as well. It was a nice gesture and Mr. Mukhtar & Mr. Asif were very accomodative at the reception which was very grateful. Hotel was maintained very well and found  the best hospitality. The ambience was also good enough. Interaction with the staff at the reception  was good , supportive and helpful.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Gurtej A
Detailed Review: Loved the accommodation area, lovely neat and clean rooms, very good food and lots variety, polite and cooperative staff, location of hotel is very good, near to the airport.value for money. All the best

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: DARSHAN G
Detailed Review: I had visited in the month of Feb , got fast check Inn, got upgraded to a suite , tat was a nice gesture, the food was awesome and was the hospitality best,the spread was amazing and the one thing I liked was the gesture they did for us when we were leaving , they actually gave us  , Would say the best hotel near airport.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Daksh P
Detailed Review: Service is way beyond excellance specially by Ashwani at breakfast area...you were really very sweet & your perfect example of  great Hospitality...really Appriciated...amazing property at the heart of Mumbai...very close to the Mumbai airport..rooms were very clean..had a great time  Thank you

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sheryl Dagaria
Detailed Review: Amazing food, amazing service provided by our server Sajid and Manoj. The desserts were amazing. Salt and pepper vegetables with water chestnut is a must try dish. The quality and quantity is also good.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: nihir patel
Detailed Review: Best service Best food Excellent management Thank you for having us All the meals were as per our requirements Staff was very much...as specially chef tejas mandvia had helped  for delicious food as per our requirement.he had made the experience even better.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sanjay
Detailed Review: We had really great time at Momo Cafe...The ambience and service are so good. Covid precautions are taken care off very well...special thanxs to Ashwini...Raju...Rushikesh...Crystal...and all other staff...They are so prompt... helpful... energetic...They give us homely feelings..I wish them all the very best and always want to dine there.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Expedition828656
Detailed Review: Amazing food and ambiance. The staff made the experience even better. Special thanks to Rajas & Raju. The customer service and the safety precautions taken by the hotel is up to the mark and made us feel bery comfortable. Thanks a ton for making the birthday celebration one of the best experiences.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sailesh77
Review: A great home away from home.
Detailed Review: Courtyard by Marriott in Mumbai is a great place for relaxation away from home. The ambiance is great the staff are very courtesies and helpful. This was my third visit and first visit post covid19 pandemic. A much need break after the lockdown and covid19 pandemic  The staff in Mo Mo cafe are warm andwelcoming. When you enter you are greeted by the smiling face of Nikita who would check your temperature and guide you to your table.   The buffet breakfast is very good and full of verity. The staff over their like Sayar and Deepak is always ready to help you with your orders. I always end my breakfast with a great cold coffee made by Deepak.  The restaurant manger Rajas is a great manager who guides the staff as per the guests need. He ensured that the food is arriving on the…

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Harshad desai
Detailed Review: Everybody  is soft spoken ,when I come here I feel I have come back home they all treated me as they family member . Sayar , Sahil an “everyone” give me they best service.ARM are all excellent. Great job keep it up

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Nori
Review: Good hospitality of all of staffs
Detailed Review: all of staff is friendly and professional For me, very comfortable place to stay there is some limitation for the facility because of corona but still they cover it with very nice hospitality. Here is my home hotel to stay in Mumbai

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: CHETAN J
Review: Safe and lumptious dinner at Momo cafe
Detailed Review: Really enjoyed dinner with my friends at cafe. Special call out for Restaurant Manager Rajas and his team. Sahil is a fabulous person and took special care of us. Much recommended. Felt very safe looking at the protocols followed.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Prachi r
Detailed Review: It was really a very nice lunch that we had at Holiday Inn. Loved the food. Everything was well organized and planned. The staff was very polite and helpful. We will love to visit again. 5 star for hospitality.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: SHAHFAHAD
Detailed Review: I am SHAHFAHAD AHMAD I had reached here holiday Inn Mumbai in 25th Feb and then there was a proper management in all the things which I need here. Now we are checking out from here now in 1st of march.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Neha
Detailed Review: Loved the food and ambience and live music ...special thanx to Mr passang and Mr sachin for taking care of us. They are very jovial n helpful . Variety of food is very good .. and desserts are very yummy .

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Suchitra N P
Review: SAPTAMI - MEMORABLE! special thanks to Amisha!
Detailed Review: It was a very special lunch as we were celebrating our Wedding Anniversary! and to add to it, it was Valentines Day. We had spoken with Ms. Amisha for the booking and she ensured to provide us with the best rates, we were 16 of us! As promised she arranged for a lovely table arrangement and we were more than pleased.  Talking about the food, needless to say all of us were quite thrilled with the buffet spread and the live counters specially. Baliram assisted us at the table and it was quite satisfactory, except for the fact that his eye brows went up when we asked for spoons.   There was also a billing error which if we had not noticed we would have paid few thousands more. Was sorted eventually.  All in all a memorable luncheon!

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Shadab khan
Detailed Review: The food was vwry good. The staff Mr.  passang  here are very nice and helpful. Enjoyed my evening to the fulleat. Do come here for a lively experience. The interiors and ambience is very good. Do try the virgin mohito from passang

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: pgajre
Detailed Review: The decorations of the restaurant was great , it made us feel we were around India though we were in Mumbai . The food was great and the ambience was over the top experience. The helper Passang was of great help . And we look forward to come here again the the later future.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: mehul j
Detailed Review: came in saptami with my friend for dinner.. buffet was very wide with lots of variety of item. good environment with lovely staff.we had enjoyed our dinner. and all this credit goes to hotel staff good huspitality. specially want to give thanks to mr sachin. rahul.passang.nasibbudin. who treated us like a family and make our dinner special and also give thanks to chef yogesh who make very good and fresh good.. thank you saptami team thank you hloiday inn for making our dinner special. will visit again in future👍👍

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Aayush B
Detailed Review: We were a group of 6 members for Sunday brunch at Saptami, Holiday Inn. They had an excellent menu consisting of Thai, Indian, Italian Cuisine. The food was really great. The ambience was amazing. There was live soothing music. We were served and assisted by Mr. Nikhil Prasad and Joseph. They were up on their feet whole time assisting different Customers. Overall, it was an amazing experience with great food and ambience. Must visit for Food Enthusiasts.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Harry
Detailed Review: A wonderful performance in aspects of house keeping and hygiene . Very respected staffs and food tastes amazing.  Perfect place to have a vacational stay. Located in the hotspot of the city and closest to the airport . Transport to and fro is provided by the hotel .

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Jessen
Detailed Review: Stayed here for about 10 days, overall experience was good. amenities and comfort were outstanding. staff behaviour was good, especially executive AKSHAY, his guidance and cheerful attitude for sure makes me visit the hotel again. Really appreciate his effort and passion for his job to make a pleasant   Stay for the guest.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Connector698958
Detailed Review: We enjoyed ourselves at saptami....Manager Nikhil,  passang Rajeev, omeshta and Tushant were very very helpful.... Very friendly.... Special Thanks to Manager Nikhil n Passang...  The Chef Vineet made us some good hot starters...

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Edlyn R
Detailed Review: we visited holiday inn saptami restaurant for dinner at it was a great experience had a great tym with family the service staff was very courteous specially want to mention the service of Mr Tushant,passang,rajiv,and shift manager Nikhil and big thankful to chef Vinit for great pasta.we will visit soon.Happy with overall experience.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: sameer s
Detailed Review: Hello. Please give our thanks to the Manager(s) and others for the wonderful service and the awesome food  had an amazing time.  Thank you so much for the  live music 🎶 we all loved it ❤ .The food was fresh, properly prepared and a great value for the price. We highly recommend it.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Megha raykar
Detailed Review: We had perfect valentines celebration !  Stay was good and pleasant! Shantanu at front desk was very helpful,kind and  nice! Nice city hotel .. I just didn’t like the view.. else everything was perfect!

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: kleanperpetual
Detailed Review: It was a lovely outing with friends. Food was delicious, mouth watering. Enjoyed the mocktails. Vast variety of food. Had a great time. Excellent service from Passang,  Rahul, Tushant, Nassibuddin and Rajiv. Fun night. Will definitely come again.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: kshama Jadeja
Detailed Review: Foods was excellent. Staff and service was very prompt. Ambiance is also excellent. Rahul and Nasibuddin and Sachin helped us with special menu for Jain made by chef Vinit was superb. We would love to come again and again. Thank you.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Suzanna
Detailed Review: Ambience very good Staff Nassibudin & Passang excellent service, very helpful. Delicious food we had a wonderful time. Will surely visit again. Chef Vineet took great care in preparation of delicious menu, dessert was mouthwatering.  Clint Rodrigues went out of his way to make us comfortable,  made our evening special with personalized attention.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sattu
Detailed Review: I stayed in this hotel for more than a week. Good hotel with excellent staff. Staff is very humble and courteous specially Passang Tamang who made sure to delight me at various events. Rooftop infinity pool is very nice and you can sit there and enjoy city view and breeze.  One thing that can be improved is Lift security card access which has to be tried multiple times, every time you try to access the lift. Rest all good.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ghorpade sagar
Detailed Review: Front desk staff are good  Quick check in.  Room was big and and clean. Food was good. Staff are taking covid care. I would take name of some staff like Dinesh from house keeping, prafull and nisar they are very friendly and helpful. Thank you very much for all

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Bharat Phegade
Review: Birthday celebration at Saptami, Holiday Inn
Detailed Review: This is one of the many times we have come to Saptami and they have never disappointed by the food quality and hospitality. Especially Passang and Nassiruddin, Sachin and Rahul. They kept us like we were at home constantly serving us to our needs. Thank you for the wonderful service and keep up  the good work.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Gaurav
Detailed Review: Awesome experience. Food quality too good. But the icing on cake was the staffs generosity and service which they provide.i can easily remeber their name. Rahul, sachon, passang, nassibudin.would love to visit this guys again. Ty holiday inn 4 amazin dinner.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ashwani G
Detailed Review: Great experience. The food and spread was good. More than food the hotel offers amazing hospitality especially by Nassubudin, Passang, Rahul and team. Would love to visit again and relish the Desserts in particular. Keep it up.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Prateek
Detailed Review: Very nice food, nice ambience and very kind and soft spoken staff. loved the ambience. Had a blast with awesome in house music. Very wide choice of food in both vegetarian and non vegetarian. Thank you.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Tasneem
Detailed Review: A feel at home atmosphere with warm and prompt people like Passang and Nikhil to be at your service. An elaborate spread and delicious desserts. Icing on the top were the guitarist and singer. On Valentine's had a wonderful time.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sachin
Detailed Review: The ambience if very nice, safe and clean and you can spend good quality time with your team/ family here. The food options are also very nice from starters to main course to desert. Staff is also co operative , Mr. Passang / Rahul tool good care of the serving. The experiance was very good.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Jaidev
Detailed Review: My room no was 217. Room cleaning was nice  Hotel staff are very nice  The staff are  well groomed Location was near by airport  Hotel are well maintained and hygienc  Whenever I come Mumbai I want to visit holiday inn Mumbai  And I would like to thanks Dinesh from house keeping

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Mihir Pitre
Detailed Review: This hotel is a must visit. The staff is very good, especially Dinesh from housekeeping who was very polite and an overall great person. The rooms are quite spacious, clean and hygienic with a television and the internet speed is remarkable.  An overall great experience.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: sneha p
Detailed Review: Lovely food, friendly and cooperative staff. Passang and his colleagues were very helpful. Looking forward to visiting again :) The paneer tikka and salads were very good.Missed the pannacota. :) Thank you for the time.!

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Suyash
Detailed Review: Excellent service and food. The service from the staff was very good especially from Nasibuddin and Rahul. Nice ambience as well.we enjoyed the dinner.we visit again thank you so much for the good service.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Nikita
Detailed Review: Great ambiance, Delicious food, good service and great staff. I appreciate the staff member Baliram and Sumit specially.   I am recommending this for your business as well as family trips too.   Thank you!

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Indu
Detailed Review: Surprisingly awesome buffet layout with a lot of options to choose from. Equally good options in veg and non veg food. Awesome and quick service too especially from Passang! Keep up the good work guys!

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Arun kumar maiti
Detailed Review: I just checked inn in holiday inn. Check in was really smooth. SPECIAL Thanks to Shantanu from front desk , Akshay and Atul from bell desk. They are assets of the hotel. Hoping for comfortable stay i  future. Very niceambiance. Clean lobby.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Garv J
Detailed Review: Very good experience overall, the staff was too courteous, Rehan, Nikhil, Bhavesh and Jitendra were too good. The food was delicious especially the desserts which included chocolate brownie was all good.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Surbhi Tiwari
Detailed Review: We had a great stay at Holiday Inn, Mumbai Aiport. Hospitality, rooms and all add on services were satisfactory. Dinner at Saptami was great as well, special mention to Nasibuddin, Tushant, Rahul for making our experience so wholesome. Dal Makhni made by chef Vineet was one of the best we have ever tasted.  Keep up the good vibes ✨

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Paresh T
Detailed Review: Thanks to Paasang !!!! We celebrated my son’s birthday at Saptami. Food was good . Nice spread . Ample space and smiling and friendly staff. We are a repeat customer and now bound yo come again . Kudos to the staff and chefs for taking care of my family and friends

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Samir
Detailed Review: It is one of the good hotel in Mumbai, This is my second stay here during pandemic. They are following all necessary protocols with respect to current pandemic. Staff are friendly. Food is bit on pricier side but good quality and quantity.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: A.D.
Detailed Review: I was quarantined here for ten days. it was a comfortable stay. The staff was very helpful and accommodating. All requests were attended to within minutes.  Rooms are spacious. The fixed menu meals were sufficient.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ashwin P
Detailed Review: Spent 9 days in the hotel, staff were nice and friendly. Special mention to Shantanu who took care of a special request very kindly.  Services provided at the hotel were satisfactory.  Room for improvement in calling back guests when there is a requirement.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Jhanvi
Detailed Review: Today we visited saptami restaurant for dinner the restuarant service staff was very courteous especailly want to mention the great service from Mr Tushant pasaang rahul rajiv and mr sachin .They made our day specail we will visit soon ❤❤

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Aditya
Detailed Review: Visited this place today. Buffet is limited but utterly delicious. Do not skip penne pasta arabiata Indian style. Ask for Passang, Rahul or Tushant for a free flow of continuous five star class service, especially Passang really talented and precise in servicing.. Very polite,gentle and helpful staff. Surely visting this place again very soon.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ashish G
Detailed Review: Good ambience Good service from Passang and Tushant, rahul. Sachin and kajal Food was good and hygiene was od high standard  Recommended for family dinners  Location is easy and staff friendly  Value for money option

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Kriti D
Detailed Review: Went for a fine dining at saptami hotel and must say the staff was very courteous and professional to take care of our service . Thanks to Mr Tushant, Rahul and Kajal for all the help and to take care of us .   The buffet was amazing in veg right from soups to main course and desserts were mind blowing .   Must visit .

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Senior777
Detailed Review: Went for lunch at the main restaurant down the reception it’s mini  buffet but great selection still mostly 5* grade for all staff especially Nikhil, baluiram , amisha and sumit .. if I got the spelling right 🤭 attentive polite and always smile face ..great job

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: surendhran
Detailed Review: Breakfast is really awesome in salami restaurant we really enjoy with my family specially service in saptami restaurant is excellent.....special thanks to Sumit , nikhil Baliram Amisha nasibbudin Vally and all term member thanks looking forward to visit again

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Malhar
Detailed Review: Extremely helpful staff; polite and courteous. In room dining services offer more than what is shown in the menu. Mr. Jagannath, the night shift concierge will ensure each meal reaches you safely and hot!

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Atik
Detailed Review: Nice ambienc polite staff food was very good  I visited twice in this month love the runway view hotel rooms are very big bathroom was very clean  Clean hotel with nice ambienc every thing in this hotel was good

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: akshay
Detailed Review: Great menu and service..The guy playing the sitar is fabulous..Used dineout pay and good value for money..was helped by hotel staff Rahul for the best deal and reservation..This is highly recommended for a good lunch

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Meera Raghunathan
Detailed Review: My stay was excellent! I prefer staying here every time I am in Mumbai All the employees were extremely friendly  I stayed during covid, and all the safety measures were thoroughly followed! Would definitely recommend this place!

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Melissa d
Detailed Review: Had an amazing stay at orchid. Humble aver welcoming staff. Jayani and Kanchan were good at their services. The breakfast buffet was great.  Had a wide variety of Indian and continental cuisine. Specifically the south Indian dishes are a must try. The hotel is close by the airport. Easily accessible to public transport. Would recommend this place to everyone.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: soma paul
Review: Always best in their own way
Detailed Review: I always come here for my work and it’s a pleasure to be here. The food is amazing along with the people. I would like to appreciate Mr. Rohit(duty manager in reception) for being so kind to assist us with his effort of some delivery issue and the Manager along with him who made us feel comfortable with some small discussion about the eco friendly concept of the hotel. Gauri was there in the reception who helped with the check in and gave us information of hotel rules after COVID. The security staffs who were always ready with the information regarding hotel. I really admire the staffs who have all the knowledge and it’s commendable as knowing your own stuff is sometimes difficult and not everyone remembers but these people they do have knowledge and assist us with all the…

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ramachandran R
Review: Excellent staff and an Excellent stay
Detailed Review: Due to a layover , we had to stay at the orchid hotel . The stay was excellent and the entire staff of the  hotel were brilliant . Amazing food and special thanks to Snehal, Abhishek and Shubham for making our stay memorable .

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Shelendra
Detailed Review: Excellent food and service.......staff is very helpful and polite...and friendly......the musicians mr Altaf....he was also very nice .........we really enjoyed the music.......thanks to Ms Harshada..sonali....minal and Rahul.......we will visit again....

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Bharathi S
Detailed Review: Stayed over for one night when a flight was cancelled and it was a really smooth and efficient process to check all the passengers in and made us feel extremely comfortable. The service standards here really go above and beyond - with staff taking care of evrryboersonal need including getting medicines from a pharmacy. The food won't let you down either and the buffet spread was excellent. Thank you for the wonderful hospitality.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: supreet w
Detailed Review: What an amazing experience at The Orchid Hotel, Vile Parel. Right from the dinning experience to the stay for a night, loved every part of it. Do try their Grilled Fish, a must try. Thank you so much Charandeep, Aloy, Vikas and Haresh for the great hospitality guys.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Jackensthomas S
Detailed Review: I checked in in orchid hotel . Quick check-in done by reception staff , and very helpfull, always with smiling face . There were few last minutes print out that I needed which was very important. Mahesh and Rohit and Kunal help me very patiently understood and help me with the documentation. It saved lot of inconvenience which could have been done on next day . Thnx to front office team .

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Machindra G
Detailed Review: Housekeeping was done nicely every day by sushil.  bell boy Sachin helped me to settled on my first day.   Housekkeping emelia was quick to my help for everything.   Nice crew, helpful, room cleaning is good, had issie with good but resolved later.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Roopa nanjunda
Detailed Review: Enjoyed stay ,the front desk staff is quite cooperative especially the one goes by the name gauri and neelam those two ladies are the best staff I came in interaction with. I would definitely recommend this hotel a one more visit. Wesley is also quite helpful he gave me a overview of the hotel. Definitely a hotel of my choice

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: GuptaJI
Review: Thank you for all the hospitality
Detailed Review: I keep coming to The Orchid Mumbai and thanks to all the lovely staff specially Mitesh from House Keeping for making my stay flawless.   Thank you guys !! Keep making my stay , wonderful stay always!!!   Cheers

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: ravjitsethi
Detailed Review: Have been staying here regularly and amazing property with amazing food and rooms... top notch service and Mr wesley and the team doing good job.very near to the airport and easily accessible to all major things.  Buffest breakfast is expensive with variety from all over the world.  Good wishes to the orchard team

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Madhav Brindavan
Detailed Review: The orchid hotel Gym is a good place for health freaks to go out and burn some good ol calories. The gym staff is very helpful and courteous. A special mention to Mr. Koli for his prompt help in all gym related matters.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: riyaz ahmed
Detailed Review: Had a very comfortable and excellent stay at Hotel orchid. Mr. Mahesh made our stay comfortable. The rooms were very clean and  tidy. We hope to stay here whenever we come to mumbai. Hygiene also been taken very well.  Thanks.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Siddharth
Review: Excellent service by Gauri front desk
Detailed Review: Special thanks to Gauri from front desk. Visited this place many times front desk team is amazing. Breakfast was ok ok need to change menus. Rooms are cleaned and very comfortable. Great place to stay.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: baljisethi49
Detailed Review: Hotel Orchid is my second home & I have been staying here for the last 10 years. My repeated stay  itself speaks volumes of Hotel Orchid.  Arrival/Reception very well and gracefully attended with a Namaste and gorgeous smile. I was attended by Mr Wesley and the way he attended just unimaginable.  He was very courteous & before allocating the room he asked me my room requirements (floor wise,location wise, view) which hardly any Reception does.  Thank you Mr Wesley.  The buffet breakfast was awesome. South Indian, English, Indian, Continental.  The restaurant manager Mr Rohit & his team mates were doing a very good job by attending personally to every customer &  Making them feel comfortable.   Hats off to Hotel Orchid & it's staff

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: ZeekRulz
Detailed Review: Excellent ambience..staff is very courteous and professional... keep it up..vindhyas t restaurant is highly recommended.. Mahesh was very attentive & supportive..thnxxx Mahesh... overall services were excellent

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Aakshay L
Detailed Review: The hotel staff is very helpful , the location is fantastic if travelling from airport  Following all the Covid protocol  Rooms are very clean  Shall recommend the stay during Covid  Good support by duty manager Rohit

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: maudarshan
Detailed Review: we came at orchid from long journey by road from rajkot , and reception staff mahesh and suranjeet help us a lot with upgraded room . very helpful staff and friendly , feel luke second home . thnx to mahesh specially

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: MK
Detailed Review: Great service, ambience and food. Suparna and Amit were very helpful as were the waiters. The collection and variety was good and different and the taste was different and wonderful. Great view as well as vibe.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: gurjeet a
Detailed Review: Amazing services and helpful staff special thanks to kanchan suraj and Rahul for services food is also very good and testy,😀😀😀😀😀😀😀 thank you for everything, we will come again for everything thanks for everything

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Aarti sharma
Detailed Review: Thank you so much for all the service keep up the good work special thanks to Mr suraj for all the service .    Good team work great housekeeping amazing taste hope to come back on a personal visit .  Thank you

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Kiran R
Detailed Review: I would like to thank Arjun from F&B for all his assistance during buffet breakfast keep up the good work. Food and beverage staff is very professional and helpful. Thank you orchid for the wonderful stay.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Deepika Chetri
Detailed Review: Appreciation for mr suraj Singh from in room services for being absolutely prompt considerate and helpful I was stunned to see such great service conducted by him,kudos to him have more staff like him in your team.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Saloni B
Detailed Review: This is one of the worst 5 star property I have stayed in. Pathetic service, irresponsible staff. For everything you'll have to wait for minimum 2 hours and their first response will be to deny everything. While they claim themselves to be a 5 star property, they frankly don't deserve even a single star.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Lee April J
Detailed Review: I would like to appreciate Mahesh for his impeccable service. For being so courteous and having a smile on his face throughout. Thank you very much Mahesh and I wish you much success in life. God bless you

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sheila K
Detailed Review: I am quarantined at this hotel.The staff is cooperative.Rooms are kept clean.Chef Rishikesh attended personally to my request as I have some health concerns.Also Mr Nilesh and Mr Pawan saw to it that my stay is comfortable.thanks a lot. Sheila kumar.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rinesh Jain
Detailed Review: Food is really awesome Hospitality service is superb  Special Thanks to chief Bala🥰 Great service by staff Minal Sonali Harshada Kanchan Taste is authentic😋😋😋😋😋😋 Ambience is superb😍😍 Must visit this restaurant for yummy south indian food😍😍

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Swapnil Kadam
Detailed Review: It's a pleasant evening, we just visit to have dinner, but we really feel like a special guest by Pritam, good service, good food, good environment, open space view and fresh air, as we enter in to the restaurant we interacted with Pritam, he suggested us the best dishes, Thai murgh tikka was the best, and Begum mocktail which was made by Prathamesh was so good that I will put my favourite drink list, I would love to visit again to have this kind of service.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ganesh Mali
Detailed Review: Very fantastic experience,, I’m coming here for business meetings... always having lunch at Vindhyas.. Ms. Suparna always welcoming us with sweet and warm nature.. always recognised to us.. and giving comfortable seat to us for lunch.. Mr.Minal And mr. Jigar and ms. kanchan giving to us very amazing service... very nice thali I’m having always... with my business partners... very very good service they are giving.. Mr. Bachhan always helping to us..👌 Thank you all of you

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Jiya Khanikar
Detailed Review: I had a marvellous stay!! I was there to celebrate my birthday and our check in was taken by Ms. Keya (if I’m not wrong) she was absolutely amazing at her job and she also upgraded our room to one of the best rooms with a Superb view!! Mr. Rahul from butler service was so courteous and ensured if the room was comfortable!! Housekeeping staff did an amazing job, our room was thoroughly checked, cleaned and sanitised, they made us feel so safe during this ongoing pandemic! Sorry can’t recall all the names but special thanks to Mr. Amol and the entire HK team!! Last but not the least the Food was amazing!! Mr. Akram from In-room dining gave us the best and prompt service!! Thanks to all the Hotel Staff for making my stay memorable. Cheers!!

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: MT
Detailed Review: 4/5 given for the dive in service right on day 1 , we checked in , being bonvoy gold elite , was promptly recognised greeted and upgraded to premier category on 28th floor , but we found the AC wasnt cooling enough , some technical checks later we shifted rooms to 26th floor , no further problems , butlers are well trained to handle tye situation, being our anniversary we got a nice  little surprise by getting invited to Luna Nudo for cocktail hours instead of the usual cake and bath tub rituals other hotels do (took the opportunity on day 2) , had dinner buffet included , was sat down , but service seem to lack when our neighbors with kids were getting more attention, delay in bringing out food , neighbors were given extra off menu items , we did pass on a strong feedback about…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Urvi Anam
