Detailed Review: Had a wonderful experience and pleasant evening and also a memorable one. Cheeersss to Prakhar at the Luna Bar for being a perfect mixologist throughout the evening with the amazing cocktails 🥂 Food was delicious. Hope to visit soon. Thank you Prakhar.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ankit K
Detailed Review: We decided to visit St. Regis Mumbai for our anniversary, stay period - 30th January 2021 - 3rd February 2021. The booking process was smooth, did it over the Marriott Bonvoy app. Split it in two packages, 2 nights Breakfast only and 2 nights Half Board, so that we could enjoy the city's delicacies and the hotel's offerings as well.  Check in was a breeze. Upon arriving at the location, luggage was collected on arrival, helpful staff at entrance helped us move through the right elevators to the reception for check-in and front desk was warm and welcoming. We were given a refreshing welcome drink while all the formalities were being done.  Moving on to the room, we were pampered to be given an upgraded room on the 26th floor for the duration of our stay. Since only a city view…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Jiju K
Detailed Review: Fit for jus staying pls dontborder anything in your intoom dinning as here nobody cares on the service and quality,the staff here forgets about how much they charge for the inroom and treats us like as if they are offering us for free.. Pathetic, I ordered a tea at 9.45 and got delivered something else which cannot be called as tea  in 15 minutes time ,i called the in room and told them about what has happened and asked them for a replacement ,and after 40 minutes also it was not delivered and inbetween i called them throce for the follow up...they have spoiled My day

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: AmolMathur
Detailed Review: I stayed here for 2 nights and found every bit of this hotel a notch up on the standard 5-star hotel across Mumbai. Being COVID-19 times, the rates are very low compared to what the hotel is offering.  It's easy enough to reach  and contactless check-in is well managed. All places at the hotel are well kept and sanitized. There is no hindrance to the smooth operation of the hotel due to the virus precautions.  The extravagance starts from the moment you enter your room and continues throughout the stay while you glare outside the French windows (these don't open) out at the senic view.  There is not a single need that the room does not fulfill to the hilt. From toiletries to the coffee maker , everything was spot on. The bed was very comfortable too.  The fact that the hotel is…

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Nilesh
Detailed Review: Stayed in Vits for family Function.The location of the hotel was heart of the city.Rooms are spacious and neat and clean all the staffs are very helpful towards their all guests.Poolside ambience was very eye catching..

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Guddu
Detailed Review: I recommended by known person to stay here, stay was really comfortable,  we enjoyed too much , team was very courteous and helpful.  Food was amazing , requested home style food to server and had it .  Really worth to commended to friends and family.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Jidhin G
Detailed Review: Excellant service, poolside restuarant very nice, restarant staff all good, house keeping was nicely done by kailas and asha..keeping all covid protocols. Buffet brskfst delicious...   Overall it waa nice stay in vits..

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Vikash Payel
Detailed Review: Stay was awesome but apart for this the hotelier staffs are very professional, cooperative and helpful. Enjoyed my stay at VITS. One of the best hotel in Andheri East, Mumbai. From dec 26 2020 till feb 27 2020. Felt like home.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Vinay yadav
Detailed Review: Everything was perfect , housing , accommodation,  Lobby staff.I had good experience while staying for 7 days. VIRAJ, MEHRIN, Rahim From Reception department were very kind.  And  Asha and Kailash from Housekeeping were very friendly and dedicated to their work.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rohit
Detailed Review: Polite staff , great service , prompt housekeeping,   good food. The air conditioning can be improved.  Gurpreet , Bill desk - sharp acumen in problem solving. Chayana - pleasant,  professional.   Front desk  Viraz, Mejreen, paresh  - hospitable.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Samiran
Detailed Review: One of the excellent hotel at Mumbai I have experience. Very good hospitality, good food and excellent service. I want to special thanks to Mr. Viraj who has make our visit very successful. We will definitely coming back again. Once again thanks to Mr. Viraj.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sudarsan S
Detailed Review: I have been staying here for the last 3 days and quite happy about the service. The stuffs are highly professional. Very impressed by Samrat. He is a Champ 👍🏼. Regarding the food, there are so many varieties and each of them has its own taste. Loved it completely. 😆

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Hemant1586
Detailed Review: Restaurant service is amazing. Ms Chayanika is very courteous and very good and warm service. Food is amazing. For long stays they cook homely food and go out of the way and serve if you want anything apart from the buffet items.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Nishant
Detailed Review: We have done 2 days conference here. I would like to thanks entire team for such a nice arrangement. Food was very delicious. All staffs behaviour was very good. We have decided to do all our meeting here only

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Prashant
Detailed Review: It's Amazing and very good experience at VITS Mumbai. Check in & check out process was also easy , they gave me complementary upgrade also. 10/10 For house keeping & Restaurant Food. only have to upgrade is need hot Water in room.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Prabash Gupta123
Detailed Review: Excellent experience really loved it Mr. Ilys. We really enjoyed it and love to come back and enjoy it again. Mr. Ilys is well behaved would love to served by him again Best of luck to him for his present and future.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Evion rodricks
Detailed Review: The location is walkebel 20 mins from airport  Very nice interior though it's small but very creative and attractive. poolside staff very good service. . Priyanka was very good service.& She has very friendly behaviour. Even it feels home to stay there..  And really willing to stay there again.. hope visiting again to this homely hotel.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: hamid r
Detailed Review: The pool site is good for food his service and his good behaviour and also my mind is my release.  All satff is very good & nice service ,special thanks Priyanka she is very friendly and helpful. Thank you

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: vishal
Detailed Review: it is really nice to stay here, the ambience , staff and the room are all up to the standard promised. Food service be it breakfast, lunch or dinner are all delicious. the view from room is also good. i would recommend to stay here

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Manish
Detailed Review: Excellent  & comfortable saty As always I have satyed in vits hotel very nice.  The staff is very nice & friendly Priyanka & ranjeet extra care & supportive. Hotel is also very careful about the covid protocols.. Nice hotel

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Inzu I
Detailed Review: Staying here from last two days. Staffs here are very friendly and polite.The poolside ambience is awesome.Priyanka and Ranjeet are very helpful.Breakfasts are ok.Rooms are good.Will come back again in future......

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Durriya Bootwala
Detailed Review: Last night was superb and extremely well executed by the staff at VITS. The poolside buffet dinner for the Valentines Day was really a night to remember! The buffet setup was so well set and special appreciation to the staff Prateek for making it even more special for us!

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: amaan k
Detailed Review: Stay was nice ... very convenient staff was helpful and the most important breakfast buffet was great Service was good  at breakfast Swimming pool and gym is still not operational because of COVID  Priyanka was very nice & hostess. & Zoheb  was very helpfull

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Deepak C
Detailed Review: Good food,  helpful staff..  good environment..   poolside ambience viwe  very nice .  Morning breakfast was amazing. Saty was good . .. Service is good . .. Happy place.   Room was very neat & clean.   Thank you .

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ravindra
Detailed Review: Dear Sir . We visited Mumbai for Auto Expo at Goregaon Our stay was at VITS Andheri east. Nice welcome at arrival .Wel maintained Room 128 and good room service.Good breakfast and nice service by staff Mr.Rajesh & Priyanka. Thanks.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Amarjit Singh Bindra
Detailed Review: Superb breakfast with so many dishes, awesome ambiance & very nice service.  Poolside  ambience is awesome. Priyanka is very helpful towards their guest..Will recommended for everyonw.  Thanks vits .......

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Jass
Detailed Review: Amazing Place & Amazing view😍 Really loved the service here👍 Team is really good so recommended to all.  Morning breakfast  was very yummy & testy.   Room & saty  all good.   Poolside staff very helpfully.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Vidurt1000
Detailed Review: Me and my wife came to meet my mom and dad, we thought of having lunch at the city cafe! It has a very old school and peaceful vibe! with its jazz music playing in the background!! Their grilled Mayo chicken & cheese grilled sandwich were exquisite! Pratik at the cafe was very hospitable! Definitely worth a visit again!!! 👌👍

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Susan
Detailed Review: Thanks to Mehreen for a smooth check in and Asha from housekeeping for good services. Good place to stay in a reasonable price. Food can get better, but it's amazing pool side view for breakfast makes your morning get pleasant !

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Vincent Dsouza
Detailed Review: We had a workshop with over 50 pax who thoroughly enjoyed and appreciated the arrangements, food, facilities, and attention to detail provided to us. The safety protocols ensured peace of mind. Happy to come to VITS again.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Pavan
Detailed Review: All Are Doing Great. Good Service From Vits Hotel.Reception Staff are doing really Well From Check in process To Checkout.Paresh From Reception Was Really Helpful.Thank You For All To Give Me A Good Service.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Razan
Detailed Review: All are very friendly all good and best service Paresh from reception is very kind and gives me a good housekeeping staff  and very supportive  Nice vibe Nature I ever see any hotel like this  Thank you for the service Hope to see you soon

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: pawan e
Detailed Review: I had a visit to ummrao with my colleagues for dinner. Never had such a royal dining experience. Our host was Mr Kartik who gave us a excellent service by suggesting excellent choice of dishes. We had Gosht k Pasande which was too delicious. Also had a mocktail which was with coffee and cinnamon. Loved the ambience of this restaurant. Entire team member was very helpful and friendly..! I will definitely visit this place again..!

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rohaan G
Detailed Review: It was a pleasure to celebrate our wedding at your hotel. We would like to express our heartfelt appreciation for the fabulous job  you did for the event. The reception was everything we wanted it to be. Right from the time of booking, we were confident that we made the best choice by picking up courtyard marriot as our wedding day location. On the day of service, we were impressed by the treatment provided to us and the guests whether it was food, staff or co-ordination. A special thanks to Komal Sharma, Riya D'Souza, Chef Tejas and Chef Rajiv for helping in every possible way. We are grateful for your service and kindness.   We will continue to spread our good thoughts about Courtyard Marriot.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: AKS
Review: Worst and humiliating experience as an organizational visitor
Detailed Review: The courtyard by Marriott, i don't know, on whose behest is frisking us and others, opened our bottles as small as homeopathic medicines in search for i do not know what.  They have installed an X-ray scanner at the gate yet I was the one ,along with other employee of my organization, was told to opened our bags, they searched pockets in our bags, smelled our bottles.  Other guests were standing there, they were pretty surprised and amused.  We are the employees of very very reputed organization and i want to tell u that we are not any military level threat, we don't want this treatment at hands of some Pajama and T-shirt wearing staff, doing this thing to us.  I have seen while the people at the reception greet others , the same people don't talk to us properly.  I have written…

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: darpan98
Detailed Review: Was there one night for a staycation  Dirty carpets in passage and in the rooms  Gym was closed so was dusty with garbage bins overflowing and no one bothered to keep it clean even though it wasn’t operational  Dinner buffet was packed and had waiting   Clearly they were short staffed as absolutely no safety protocols were being followed - majority of guests were not wearing masks, everyone touching all around, no gloves or only staff serving, empty buffet dishes with sauces spilled all around. Did complain in the night and was truly surprised to see that in the morning everything was being followed. Proactiveness of the Coffee Shop team was  amazing. And getting a surprise cake for my birthday was a super feeling   Hopefully their housekeeping team gets proactive to clean the…

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Swarupa1023
Detailed Review: It was a complimentary stay as we had the wedding at the same venue with multiple guests and stay. Aviraj helped us with getting the room with no complaints.. he also arranged a surprise anniversary cake in the room. I must mention the Saturday dinner buffet spread was really huge and awesome. The chef really made our evening... I must come to the next morning breakfast spread which had multiple options for the guests to enjoy on. I enjoyed the missal pav, masala dosa, and an amazing scrambled eggs made very fresh. And a special mention to a vanila waffle with strawberries as a surprise by the chef.. really appreciate the effort.  Definetely recommended to everyone

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Grace26
Review: Lavish Buffet dinner at MoMo Cafe.
Detailed Review: It was just superb from start to finish. Nikita greeted us at the entrance of the cafe with such warmth, we had a personalized service throughout our buffet, Deepak was taking care of us and ensured we enjoyed each and every meal laid out at the buffet. He also made sure he cleared our table and kept it well presented after every meal. He also presented us with delicious ice cream, we loved the presentation. Post dinner we were greeted by the Duty Manager Ashank, he was sweet enough to remove time for us and also anticipated to our queries. We were totally wowed with the entire experience. We can't wait to come back at The Courtyard by Marriott. Thank you Deepak & Ashank for making our dinner memorable.   🌟Great value, great location, great deal & Outstanding Hospitality 🌟

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Prashant Mehta
Detailed Review: The food and the service was excellent Ambience is very peaceful and the taking specifically about the desert damn good The room service is very good  The staff servicing dinner is very helpful I shall visit again soon

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Parul Sharma
Review: Good service, great for business travelers
Detailed Review: I stayed at the Marriott Courtyard, for 4 days, during my stopover in Mumbai. The hotel has been careful and taken all safety measures for COVID. The staff has been diligent and understanding. I had back to back meetings and video calls and they did everything they could to accommodate me and not bother me too much, while taking care of my needs.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ranjeet Borawake
Detailed Review: Courtyard Andheri and it’s staff always assist to make a very comfortable stay .  Courtyard has its own culture in its working . Truly polite and gentle .  Umesh Changila , Prachi , Hemant , vinod Lodia , Shweta and all staff very responsive and fast to act on .  All the best . Very very good for family n kids also .

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Vineet
Detailed Review: We got an excellent service and the property is very well-maintained.  The food and breakfast was delicious   The staff is really courteous and helpful  It’s very close to the airport and centrally located in Mumbai  Accessible to the shops nearby

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Priyanka S
Detailed Review: It was best decision to choose Courtyard by Marriott Mumbai. We had a great time here. The check-in and check-out were smooth. Thanks to entire Fronk Desk team and special thanks to Mr. Hemant for ensuring safe and comfortable stay!!  Thanks F&B team for awesome food and beverages! We got complimentary deserts which I felt was great! I'm definitely going to stay here again in near future.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: ts7558
Detailed Review: We went to celebrate our anniversary and opted for Dinner Buffet. The spread was reasonably good and service was excellent. Mr. Sayar and Manager Mr. Abhijit took good care of us; and surprised us with Cake in the end to celebrate our anniversary. Overall quite satisfied and highly recommended.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Mohamed_Taha_434
Review: Excellent service by F&B and Front Desk
Detailed Review: Good & Friendly Staff, i would specially like to highlight Chef Rajeev, he is an asset to the hotel, he went out of the way & prepared Egyptian dishes which was really very tasty, other food also was delicious, other staff from front desk specially "Vinod & Payal", Lodal, Prachi, Hemant, Shrajit, Mehul, Sorabh, Abhijeet & Siddhesh, Excellent work by all will definitely come back, Thumps up to all the staff, Great job from Chef Rajeev, Vinod & Payal all deserve 5 stars.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rohit N
Detailed Review: It was the best decision to start new year at Courtyard by Marriott. Entire check in experience was well taken care of by Mr. Ashank. I'm glad I happened to meet him a night prior to arrival while making pre payment towards the stay. Everything was net perfect and experience worth much more than what we paid for. Also would specially like to mention about at your service manager Mr. Moin he was excellent everytime. We were also met by Mr. Indulkar who enquired about our stay. Thank you for the memorable experience :)

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Jatin
Review: Amazing Staycation at Courtyard by Marriot
Detailed Review: Amazing team at Courtyard by Marriott, Mumbai International Airport. Loved the service at the buffet and also a staff named Payal worked with my wife to arrange an amazing surprise for us! Superb service, Excellent Quality! Thanks for the upgrade and making our trip memorable :)

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Tracy Tauro
Detailed Review: Thankyou to the entire team at the hotel for ensuring our stay was pleasant. Thankyou Asif for upgrading us to the pool view room and for smooth check in. While I didn't get a chance to dine in at the restaurant, we did have Breakfast and it was a wonderful spread and we really enjoyed it. The staff was very cordial at all times. Would like to mention Crystal ( I don't remember her name correctly) who waa very kind to get everything to our table during breakfast.  Cannot wait to come back :)

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: deepaksails
Detailed Review: I stayed for 12 days in Jan’2021 and have been taken care of, very well by the excellent staff.  Picking up the phone and speaking to Megha Kale, Mamta Poojary, Kinjal Rathod has always been a pleasure. The services were prompt with an ever welcoming smile.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rev. B
Detailed Review: I already spent 11days here,staff was vry nice,i m really vry tnkful fr them the main thing is they vil call u n ask if thr is ny requirement in our room.Ths sounds really cool. Service is rly vry good.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: manohar singh
Detailed Review: Overall the service was very good, even though limited due to the quarantine requirements before flying. Food was good. Hotel staff was prompt in any assistance required. A very comfortable and peaceful stay indeed.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rajat
Review: Excellent Hotel to spend a great time nearby Airport Premises. “MUST VISIT”
Detailed Review: My stay was totally fine and hotel assistance was too good. The staff at Reception, Room Service and House Keeping were so polite and humble in nature that it felt like Home to me. ☺️ I stayed for 17 days and I didn’t feel even once that am staying somewhere away from home 😇 Thanks for such a wonderful hospitality. ❤️ Would love to visit here again in future. ✌🏻  PS - DM Ms. Kinjal Rathod was too good in management and making things and stay easier and comfortable.  Thanks 😊

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Srinivasan
Detailed Review: All our friends are enjoyed our Holidays in Holiday Inn. Services are excellent and Food taste is very good and near to Mumbai Airport.employees are very politily and sincerely.Rooms are very neat & clean.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: ArchanaDave
Detailed Review: We had the wonderful experience of visiting this property twice in January, the reason of posting after second trip was to ensure, COVID precautions are same or dropped.  Well kudos to the entire team, all sanitization and checks are well in place.  As usual the point of entry, to check in, the staff are superbly cooperative.  Rooms are well sanitized much before arrival and every day with meticulous detail.  The spread for breakfast and Dinner is absolutely sumptuous and scrumptious.  We would like to really thank all the staff for making our stays wonderful and comfortable,  We certainly like to thank some of the staff we interacted:  GRE /Front Office:  Akshay, Kinjal, Ami,   Bellhops:  Salman and Farooque  Saptami: Dhanashree and Amisha  Saptami - Assitance Passang, Nikhil,…

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: sharma jandli
Detailed Review: good accommodation and service team also very nice behavior and friendly ....but I couldn't go outside from room  bcz quarantine...hopefully will visit again on vacation with family .special thanks to Kinjal Rathod nice talk to you madam like family member.                            thanks to Hotel Holiday Inn team

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Saurhin Parikh
Review: Artharjan Stock Trading mentorship by Rahul Desai
Detailed Review: Hi,  Team artharjan lead by mr, Rahul Desai and Saurhin Parikh are hosting Artharjan stock trading events since December, 2020, January 16, 17, 30 and 31st January 2021 here in holiday inn,  We are extremely happy with all the facilities provided by HI team, as we are hosting our seminars in meeting room, business center  The staff of this hotel is very polite and Nikhil more, Rehan Khan, shankar, praful are very humble and polite in handling their duties and have been very proactive through out our events,   One of the key aspect in having a successful events like ours also requires great hospitality from the hotel staff which we found throughout  We have couple of more module, batches and events in coming weeks and we hope to have the same kind of service ans hospitality for…

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Chetna A
Detailed Review: Really good presentation and was happy with the customer service. Amit Chetna Viraj  Nikhil,sumit,baliram,runikesh & Manager  Sachin were exceptional in service.  We had a great time and it was memorable brunch day for us.  The team saw to it that we were comfortable and doing good.  We recommend this buffet for families.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Chokkara Ramarao
Detailed Review: I stay here in holiday inn 505 room the room is very good cleaning. Room service good the guy Shivam is very friendly every time come to ask about my stay the food come on time they give us biryani but no basmati rice only normal rice

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Kanji
Detailed Review: I had came with my friends for Saturday evening and you guys made it awesome miss Kajal and staff rajiv had made our evening a blast with a live music n all would love to visit again for sure I will personally recommend my friends to come and visit

Name: Chubasco
Detailed Review: Stayed in the hotel to be in quarantine as required by my company. Safety n hygiene standards maintained well. Was not able to use much of the service. Overal food quality needs to be improve .The stay otherwise was pleasant and comfortable.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Nishant Deka
Detailed Review: I visited holiday inn and I would love to say the room is good , the food is tasty and the staff is excellent especially Baliram,Nikhil and Amisha served us and really appreciated their service 👍👍💫💫😊💯 .

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: sudha p
Detailed Review: Mom n i were here fr a break and it was sucha a beautiful stay especially buffet service by Ronikesh, amisha and baliram were comendable,tey Made us smile everyday here and r highly recommended. Do visit

Name: Saugoel25
Detailed Review: I enjoy breakfast in saptami restaurant and the best thing is service we really enjoy the breakfast and special thanks to sumit and baliram.....I really looking forward to visit again in holiday inn specially saptami restaurant. Thanks sumit we love the service 👌😊

Name: Amit G
Detailed Review: Stayed in holiday inn near mumbai intl airport. had a good experience. V. good housekeeping services led by mr. Shubham. Food and beverage services are also pretty acceptable mainly due to covid challenges and limited staff available. But overall a good stay

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: patsfern
Detailed Review: I visited Saptami with my family to celebrate my mothers birthday. As it was a saturday we got the opportunity to attend the brunch, which I must say was massive and beautifully presented.Hygiene was maintained at its best. Everything we ate was super delicious.Apart from the food to the beautiful ambience the people were so caring and alert to each table. A big Thanks to Clint, Anand, Vally , Passang, Sumit and the entire Saptami team.You guys made my moms day so wonderful and she is super happy with all the attention you guys gave her. Special thanks for the surprise birthday cake. Will be visiting soon  ❣❣❣❣❣

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rj sahil
Detailed Review: Awesome breakfast with the amazing hospitality by Sumit n baliram... We wud love to visit again n again n request the team holiday inn to maintain the same n better standards...keep it up.. Thankyou Regards..

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: UMANT Kumar
Detailed Review: Nice hotel and also every thing was good.In house keeping shivam sood performance is excellent and his behavior is very good.He have a excellent experience to keep his guests happy.Shivam sood provided me every thing on time which I need during my stay in hotel.Thanx a lot to shivam sood from my side and also best wishes to him.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Anish Radjesh
Review: Helpful crew at the hotel. Priceless help.
Detailed Review: After coming from the airport I found my watch missing from my bag. Traced it and found in lost and found counter at the airport. I couldn't pick it up as I was under mandatory quarantine, so requested the hotel team. They responded immediately to help collect it. Mr.Wasim in the reception helped me collect it and it was handed over to me. All were done within 2 hrs of my request. Thanks Mr.Wasim, you are an asset to the team at Hotel Holiday Inn.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Nikita
Detailed Review: Stayed in room 701. Overall we had a city view. The chefs were great as they accommodated our request for JAIN Breakfast and provided a variety of Jain items in breakfast. I was amazed by the food and beverage team's hospitality, especially Mr.Sumit, Mr.Baliram, and Mr.Runikesh were very friendly, caring, and always serving with a smile. Thank you, Dinesh for helping us with the luggage.  The front desk staff was very helpful throughout the stay. Really appreciate all staff members for making our stay comfortable and safe.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: aks49
Detailed Review: Stayed here for 6 nights and my stay was very comfortable and friendly.Front desk staff was very helpful throughout the stay. Breakfast was awesome. They accommodated our request for JAIN food and provided variety of Jain items in breakfast. Thanks to all chefs for making healthy and delicious Jain breakfast. Food and beverage team's hospitality was amazing. Specially Mr.Sumit, Mr.Baliram and Mr.Runikesh were very friendly,caring and always serving with smile. Thank you Dinesh for helping us with lauggage. Really appreciate all staff members for making our stay comfortable and safe.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv

Detailed Review: poor service and very pathetic hospitality by the hotel.....we had stay in January and given negative feedback with regards stay.   At that time Mr. Joshua from the management had called and asked to remove feedback from the site to save the reputation of the hotel and offered complementary dinner for the sevice recovery and when after removing feedback immediately with showing some kindness towords the hotel by me ...now  I had called  in September to get the service by the hotel that time current managment  staff Mr. Umamahesh denied for the same and insted he said Mr. Joshua have been removed from the organization for giving fake commitment to the guest.....I guess this is very shameful hospitality provided by the *The Orchid.*  And may be they have fooled many guest like…

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: G.S
Detailed Review: Had been to Mostly Grills,Orchids rooftop restaurant. It has a lovely ambience. We were lucky as there was kebab festival going on. The ambience, live music, and the whole setup for the festival was appealing.  The courteous,warm and polite staff made us comfortable and looked after us like a perfect host the whole evening. The food was excellent and was served with a smile and love by the staff. We had a perfect wonderful evening out with the family and will definitely visit again.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ajinkya
Detailed Review: Excellent food. The spread is pretty vast ranging from continental to indian cuisine. Staff is really friendly and prompt, following all Covid protocols. Would recommend this and will surely come back again.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Dixit
Detailed Review: I allways came here for brunch and all the time the Service is amazing and helpfull staff is very kind and warm thanks to kanchan Sonali harshda minal and Rahul. Mr rohit is very kind and helpfull too we will come again for Service we really enjoyed everything

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Yash
Detailed Review: My first visit to this place for a weekend stay. Great Indian breakfast with great crew (Suraj). Poha, dosa, poori bhaji, upma, bonda, sambhar. Excellent tasting food for vegetarians. Hot and fresh...

Guest was very dissatisfied and not happy with the services.Next time it is very difficult to stay in your hotel.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv

Detailed Review: Had spend a great family time on the roof top restaurant of the orchid....mostly grills is great place for enjoying family dinner food was fantastic....Top view open air we all love thank you amit and jyani for taking care of us

Detailed Review: Delicious food and great service  Every staff was great and helpful Awesome experience Would like to visit again.  Great hospitality Ambience too good. Harshad, Minal Kanchan shubham karishma staff were great at hospitality

Detailed Review: Excellent food. Very good spread. Extremely helpful staff, esp. Harshada, Meenal, Kanchan and Karishma.  Special thanks to the chefs also.  The dessert spread was Indian Sweets and was not over sweet. The moong dal halwa was really good.  The ghevar was on live counter.   Ended it with filter coffee. What a meal.  To sum it up, the lunch buffet was awesome.  Loved it.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv

Detailed Review: Awesome stay with good service and food available. Fabulous stay and nice ambience. The stay was too comfortable. People are very friendly and helpful. Friendly environment for kids and beautiful look.

Name: Shahbaaz B
Review: Hotel Orchid is the first hand choice of our airline- Iran Air
Detailed Review: Front desk staff is very helpful. I had booked 2 rooms through Mr.Noel for my family who was recently under quarantine for a week as per Maharashtra State Government rules. Mr. Noel is always accessible for all airlines. Great amenities and facilities offered by the hotel. Restaurant has a good ambience and serve excellent food. The hotel has close proximity to both International and domestic airports and located in downtown area. We at Iran Air highly recommend Hotel Orchid to our passengers and also family and friends. Mr. Noel is always there to provide excellent services. Bravo! The services of Gauri Neelam at Front Desk and Shorn Bell desk were outstanding.  - Shahbaaz from Iran Air

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Krutika bhindi
Detailed Review: Service is excellent nd food is soo yumm😋 .....just loved it keep it up nd keep more growth in futures!!!!! If something tastes better than you expected, you could use the word wow to express your surprise. If you say something tastes amazing, you’re saying it tastes even better than great or really good.

Name: Rakshhit Kothhari

Special thanks to Mr. Rohit Nuton.

Name: Malvika K

Detailed Review: Amazing place and exceptional service.  The food was amazing and the roof top restaurent was cherry on the cake. Name: Traveler346171
Detailed Review: Wow experience we had at mostly grills... awesome view..music, ambiance best place for grills and sizzlings thank you jayni and pritam warm hospitality...👍👍👍👍☺️☺️☺️☺️☺️ Excellent service had a great time with friends after soo long..

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Shiva
Detailed Review: Had a great stay at The Orchid hotel Ville Parle Mumbai recently. Connected to Executive Chef  Navid Akhtar to get non spicy, oil less food suitable for my palate. I was attended to by Chef Rishikesh Kasare, with the magic touch. He planned the menu according to my needs and churned our delicious salads, sauteed veggies, pasta, curd rice as per my taste. The stay was lovely and I did not have to worry about “hotel food” and did not miss my home cooked food. Thanks Chef Rishikesh. Hope to have more delicacies cooked by you on my next visit. Special thanks to Executive Chef  Navid Akhtar for the wonderful care during my stay.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Tanmai
Detailed Review: The staff were really friendly and the services were given on time. Overall experience was very good. Especially Mr. Wesley has given his best service from the time of checkin to the time of check out.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rashi Samant
Detailed Review: Visited The Orchid at Lonavala in the month of January with family and overall it was a good experience. This is a new property. The staff is extremely cordial and leave no stone unturned to make the stay a pleasant experience. Special thanks to Mr. Abhishek at the front office for accommodating our requirements. This property has two restaurants. Breakfast is served at one of the restaurant which serves south Indian cuisine... Although options were limited but the food was delicious and Mr. Banasi was very friendly and prompt in service. I will definitely visit the place again.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ranju
Detailed Review: Amazing hotel to spend your money and time. People are so polite and helpful. It feels like home. Nice ambience, good food and lovely dining options. The pool side is a place to be when operational. Roof top restaurant is very nice. I will be back soon

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Mehul
Detailed Review: Very unprofessional hotel. Very bad experience. They aren’t true to their words. I wouldn’t recommend. Bigger and better hotels can be your priority. If something goes wrong they wont even provide a solution. Take care ,stay safe.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Janki P
Detailed Review: Have always loved the food and service here.. Jigar was a great assistance..  amazing authentic South Indian taste N the unlimited papaddums r a great hit. Must visit to relish true South Indian taste.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: ROB
Detailed Review: Nice Hospitality shown by the staff. They are polite, humble caring and helpful. Overall good staff, Nice food, Convenient location and pocket friendly. I will surely be back with you guys and will speak positive about the hotel. Best of luck and keep up the good service.

Name: Chitra patankar
Detailed Review: Top nopch view food and hospitality they have would like to come again hope they don't charge for runway view.......I would like to mention jayni and pritama name here they both are very pleasant and smart very polite god bless them...food was super...thank you...

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Arun joshi
Review: Early Breakfast at south of vindhyas
Detailed Review: We had breakfast at vindhyas,food was good. Amazing service by karishma & mahesh.thnks to manager mr bachnan for taking care of us.will highly recommended.we are very happy staying at hotel planning to  come very soon.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: SAURABH RAJURKAR
Detailed Review: Had a fantastic display of hospitality and amazing experience of celebrating my wedding anniversary and daughter's birthday.  Initially a warmly welcome by Suparna and services provided by Sahil and Pritam, and wonderful food prepared by Chef Harish.   We recommend this Mostly Grills a perfect place to celebrate your important occassions.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Anish K
Detailed Review: Service was excellent.  Cooperative and welcoming staff Rooms were clean and all required COVID protocols were followed  Receptionist (Ms Pooja Suryavanshi) was very cooperative and helpful.   Overall ambience was great  Room tariff was reasonable and worth the money

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Dr. Juhi
Detailed Review: Delicious food, great service from Amit Primtam and Suparna and mind-blowing music!! Good job. Cheers guys. Really liked the barbeque menu. The ambience is fun and relaxed. As well as mood and feels is amaze.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Aditi Gurung
Review: Thank you  for food very nice and happy faces nd great service give by Harshada Kanchan Karishma and mr Rohit .
Detailed Review: Thanku for all the good service nd a service from heart Had a great time will visit soon. Specially for the food in orchid enjoyed the service given by Harshada kanchan karishma and Mr Rohit . Stay safe

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Samruddhi
Detailed Review: Lovely food, the spread is just enough to make your day delightful.   supportive crew especially Mahesh and Kanchan. Ambience ethnic in setup and safe for pendamic situation.  Kudos to the restaurant. Thanks

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sejal
Detailed Review: When we visited 'mostly grilled for a b'day celebration.. it was an amazing experience to be here..felt blessed and the service here was too good..we enjoyed the pool side view we liked  it... we got very nice  service from suparna and sahil.. thanks  to them very warm and jolly nature.. cake which is they gave to us its very testy... very very good pattern 👌 of that cake... thanks  to all of us we had our best time overthere we will visit soon..

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Suparna padmanabhan
Detailed Review: Ambience,food and service here is excellent.. thanks to suparna and pritam who given us very nice service.. rooftop is very nice we had enjoyed Airport side view.. it's amezing.. we will visit soon again...

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Dinesh Parida
Detailed Review: Amazing service by Mr Mahesh and Mr Rohit , We have had a wonderful experience there...Keep up the good work....The place is very neat and the food was amazing too...The attendants were courteous and nice

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: La panigrahi
Detailed Review: Had a great experience of Pongal at south of vindhyas restaurants 👌 best of all really enjoyed a lot Pongal special thali nice ambiance excellent service happy faces jayni,minal,Rahul thank you guys..  See you soon...

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Catherine
Detailed Review: We had a very successful and comfortable workshop at Hotel Orchid which really gave us a comfortable and safe meeting with our coherts during this Covid time. We really appreciate the Manager Vikas who had given us an ultimate attention all 3 days and Wasa part of our successfull workshop. Not forgetting the food served during these 3 days. Thanks to the whole team of Orchid and special thanks to Vikas👍

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Azmina
Detailed Review: A wonderful hotel with excellent staff we checked in on 31st at the time arrival we avail some snack which was delicious we upgraded to premium rooms because we requested to Mr salman who helped me through out the stay room was also good and for the gala dinner we got the railing side table which I loved the most with light music the best evening I can say the crowd were desent too with very helpful staff food was also good.in short I loved the stay and services of hotel.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Alan
Detailed Review: I stayed last week at The Orchid Mumbai. Hotel has good connectivity from the airport, rooms were spacious i was upgraded to club rooms by Ms Deepika club manager. She was very helpful and made our stay very comfortable. Would be visiting the hotel soon in near future

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Nangel21
Review: Best thing is the hotel is very close to airport.
Detailed Review: Orchid is very close to the airport. Requested for airport pick and it's arranged on time. The receptionist upgraded me  to the fantastic runway facing club room on 7th floor. Next day as I had an early Morning flight got a quick departure and drop on time. Looking forward to visit

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sweet kapri
Detailed Review: I stayed at The Orchid Mumbai for a short trip, after a long day Ms Gauri at reception gave me very quick check-in also my request for late check-out was honoured . My stay was very comfortable and would visit soon.  Thank you once again

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Dheeraj S
Detailed Review: Overpriced for services they offer. Very average room with below average upkeep and average room amenities. Room services closed with nothing to eat at 10.30 pm. That's terrible for a business hotel near airport in a city like Mumbai. Can't imagine facing it in heart of Mumbai.Morning breakfast was good though, with courteous staff.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Anita f
Detailed Review: I visited south vindyas for dinner on 1 Jan 2020 and my experience was amazing. Thanks to Chef Naved for referring us. The food was authentic and delicious. Hats off to Chef Bala and his team. The thali is irresistible. The staff and their hospitality is 5 star. I had a warm welcome by staff Suparna,  Minal, Rahul,  Mahesh , Abhijeet and the entire staff. Hats off to that entire staff. Words are not enough to explain the hospitality,  a visit to the hotel is a must to experience it all.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Pratik Mapuskar
Detailed Review: One of the best experiences I have had. Shoutout to Rahul for his service during our stay and for the birthday cake and arrangements . Excellent room service. Good breakfast spread. Must visit Luna the lounge bar!

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Saumyata
Detailed Review: We did a staycation in January'21 here, and I have to stay, it was one of the most comfortable ones I have had in a very long time. All the staff are very helpful, the hospitality services are very prompt in delivering their service. Our butler Rahul Bhosale, even gave us his number for easy communication, in case we needed anything.  The best thing for me, which I absolutely loved, was the breakfast buffet. They had so many options in breakfast, including gluten free and jain variations. The only drawback for me were the dirty windows which obscured the outside view.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rohit Sharma
Detailed Review: Amazing service! The hotel is huge and the interiors are fabulous. Situated right In the heart of Mumbai. Rahul Bhosale was extraordinary in his service. He really took good care of us. Visiting soon.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Harbind
Detailed Review: One of the best experiences we have had. Shoutout to Vineet for his service during our stay and for the cake and a bottle of champagne . Everything was really great. Good breakfast spread. Must visit Luna the lounge bar.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Pallavi S
Detailed Review: Let me start with Tara who was so inviting while we stepped in the hotel and she guided us to the checking process with her beautiful smile. Our room looked beautiful with all the personalisation that was done in our room was absolutely beautiful for which I would love to thank Mr. Chirag Gosavi. Mr Deepak from seven kitchens I asked him to get me room sleepers while I was having my dinner he managed to get me that even it was sat night and the restaurant was super busy, thank you Deepak again Mr Prakhar and Mr. Arjun from Luna lounge. Mr. Rakesh while serving us breakfast.,Mr. Ankush from HK dept. St. Regis you got the beat team with you who made our stay as beautiful and comfortable as it get,especially in this pandemic, where we expected to be in a different location for a…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Monil
Detailed Review: I had recently visited to The St. Regis hotel. Had an amazing experience. Good with hygiene factors ensuring during this pandemic Safety is their up most priority. The staff was polite and professional. Took care of us from the time we entered till we exited. The best experience was at morning breakfast yummy buffet...lots of varieties. Quick service...friendly approach... I met Suresh who ensured we were given best service. As far as I remember i have tasted every bits n piece of the buffet. They are just too good. Thank you to all the staff for ur great hospitality and Special thanks to Suresh for helping us.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Maitri Dore
Review: Quarantine review:  Great staff, impeccable service
Detailed Review: I stayed here for a week on travelling from Europe. Excellent service, extremely pleasant and helpful staff. Checked in at 4 am, all smooth. Food was Mughlai lunch and dinner which got a bit too much by the end of the week but overall, facilities impeccable. Arrangements for testing and discharge smooth. Staff were the highlight and I'm thankful to them.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Jinal Parekh
Detailed Review: Hey Guys so this was our first stay over in 2021 and it went magical We didn't expect to have so much interaction but the staff were discreet  We were greeted and given a beautiful room by Kevin  We met Chirag and Farzad from butlers welcomed us to the room, with a beautiful amenities of sweet as well as coordinated  a classy turndown in evening from the Housekeeping with bubble bath prepared for us 💕 And next day a very important thing for everyone was the breakfast Specially on a getaway  We met Akshay who attended us and gave a pretty good tour of the Seven Kitchens while we were just sitting at the table, he sure added few weight in our tummy but it was worth the gain  And then we meet this lovely lady Anshul  Which added a sweetness to our palate by creating some healthy…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: RAJ JOSHI
Detailed Review: Excellent Stay and Wonderful Special Thanks to Stuti who has done a wonderful decoration and nice room view and also Thanks to Utakarash Who was there at checkin formality .   Will be definitely coming back for the stay.   Thank you.  Warm Regards.  Raj Joshi

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: SwapnilNandre
Detailed Review: It was a pleasure to stay at the tallest hotel in asia which also led us on a gastronomic journey with more than 10 options to chose from . Checkin was a smooth process where they gave us an upgrade to partial sea view room. The view was mesmerising and Mumbai looked beautiful with the sun setting down in the sea . Simply marvellous .The race course with all the greenary around it was so peaceful to view at . The food at Mekong and breakfast at Seven kitchens was amazing . The buffet breakfast spread was one of the best we tried The cocktails at Luna were good too. Thank you Arjun for the drinks and small bites . Ruchi at mekong was very welcoming and kept our table ready for evening as well . Rooms nice and clean . Just can't wait to be back .  Thank you team St Regis Mumbai .

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Akhil Miglani
Detailed Review: I visited the hotel on 25th jan for 1 one night. Two things which I would like to share one was positive response from a staff member. At the time of checkout while going back I had rented a bike. I was very inconvenient for me since i had a suitcase along with me. I was seeking some kind of help. Immediately the security guard at main gate came & helped me by arranging a small rope for me to tie the luggage. this was all what i was looking for at the moment. A small effort from me touched me from inside. I thanked him & asked his name. I would have certainly shared his name but I have forgot since I am posting a review almost aftr 2 weeks. His sirname was yadav & belonged to UP. He is a asset to the organisation since hospitality is all about service. Also I had a negative…

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ashish
Detailed Review: Stayed with my friend for one night.Check in and check out was smooth.They are strictly following all covid-19 protocal with social distancing.Poolside restaurant is superb. Chefs are personally meet each and every table during breakfast.Service staffs of the restaurant are very friendly.Uts an wonderful stay for us

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sankhadeep Mondal
Detailed Review: We had an amazing stay. Would like to thank Ravi Rathore from the housekeeping in particular for his prompt and courteous service. Overall it was a memorable stay. The breakfast was very delicious and all the measures on hygiene was taken

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Srikanth Iyer
Detailed Review: VITS is a good place to stay. Centrally located. Rooms are quite neat. Food choices are also good. Special mention to Manish Solanki for his housekeeping efforts. Recommend for all. We have enjoyed the stay here

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Dheer
Review: I fond it a like a average 4 star hotel
Detailed Review: Cons: 1)No adequate noise insulation in the room I got, u can hear almost everything happening in the alleyway and adjacent room. 2) wifi speed is not so fast as the ones you see in normal 4star hotels.but they do provide extra fast wifi on some charges. 3)only One socket was properly functional in my room.  Pros:1)pool side buffet is very good, the setting and vibe is different.even though buffet menu is having a handful of items. 2) location is good,easy accessibility to airport.  I do appreciate their zero plastic policy, u cannot find any single use plastic in the hotel.  These are my opinions, I don't know may be it's because I got much better comfort and services from other 4 star hotels, I found this one just above average.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Prajwal S
Detailed Review: Good hotel.Nice and clean rooms ..good buffet breakfast..wifi speed also quiet good, friendly staff..and  specially housekeeping department Manish solanki and Rajdeep are very friendly provide very good service.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ramamurthy Srinivasa Murthy
Detailed Review: Hello., We are staying in your esteemed hotel for the past three days. It is my pleasure the pool side restaurant in the best and have enjoyed the food thoroughly are very courtesies. Mr.Wasim and Ms.Priyanka are too good in their service. The food taste is also too good. Being south Indian except the sambar other items are good.  Wish you and visit you more to choose your hotel.  Thanks., Ramamurthy Srinivasa Murthy Mobile n WhatsApp 9379034141 Mail ID rsmurthy7259@gmail.com

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: anilpattnayak
Detailed Review: A tap and bucket in the shower room will be better. Other servises are fine. Break fast is so good. The service inspite of covid is very good. Satff was really  helpful.. Priyanka & karan is very poliet to serve.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: akshramehta01
Review: Awesome food at The City Cafe
Detailed Review: Went with my friends recently to "The City Cafe" . The food was awesome , hospitality was great .Ambience is amazing. All the precautions were taken looking at the Covid scenario. Surely recommend to visit here with friends and family

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sanjeev S
Review: Excellent stay . House keeping staffs were helpful. Good breakfast . Hygiene up to  makred. Excellent location.
Detailed Review: Excellent room service. Due to corona period lunch and dinner were served in room only but and quantity and quality were very good.  House keeping was up the standard.  Will recommend this hotel to my family and friend.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Kongkon
Detailed Review: Excellent service provided by front desk staff mr Paresh and mr Himanshu . And by housekeeping staff mr. Rajdeep. F and B service while breakfast was also superb everything was done formally and comfortable just as my expectations. Rooms are pretty comfortable and loved the design.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Feroz P
Detailed Review: Thankyou to the entire team at the hotel for ensuring our stay was pleasant. A special call out to Hemant Acharya for his hospitality and personal attention. Loved the service with everyone at the front lobby. Room service was also good.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sachyish
Detailed Review: Our short staycation at Coutyard by Marriott was an amazing experience.. the rooms are super clean and well sanitized.. the staff was really cooperative and followed Covid 19 protocols.. lovely place for friends, family or business trips

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Siddanth Pai
Detailed Review: I must say they have a wonderful service at their property, The rooms were extraordinarily well designed for a couple and business stays.. Breakfast spread was really amazing at MoMo cafe... Last but definitely not the least nowadays..all covid 19 protocols were taken care of on all the checkpoints

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rituraj M
Detailed Review: The hotel follows a pretty good hygiene standards during this trying times. Was there for only a night but like any other Marriott hotels... excellent staff..very polite and responsive at all times.Close to the airport.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: RachelAMullins
Review: The staff really took care of us
Detailed Review: I was working on a movie and we were all put up here by production. The hotel staff really made a tremendous effort to keep us going despite all the covid rules. We had an entire floor and elevator to ourselves. Asif handled everything all day everyday.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Harish J
Review: Good rooms, Okay service & Pathetic Food.
Detailed Review: Check-in & Check out was smooth.  Rooms were really good and I did have a great nap.  The linen, accessories were all in place and I could see a great deal of care has been taken in ensuring cleanliness.  Kudos to the property there.  The In-room dining service was courteous.  Food was in fact Pathetic..(They served me a charred Tandoori Chicken), Chicken Strognaff in Bowls (may be due to Covid).  The only saving grace was the wonderful Gulab Jamuns.  Next day at breakfast, the Vadas were hard and were oil-soaked, the watermelon juice was more of water than the juice, Cut fruits were begging not to be eaten.  Idlis...not to mention.  when we were dining, I saw about 11 tables occupied and 9-10 people (including probably captains and senior captains) handling these tables...I…

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Pratik P
Review: Terrible soundproofing. Substandard food provided in room service
Detailed Review: I could hear the couple in the room next to mine which I can safely assume implied that they were having loud sex. The sound proofing was terrible. I could hear them very clearly including their names when standing in the corridor. At around 1 am,  another the room adjacent to mine was blasting music which did not allow me to get any sleep till 3:30. I think since they were a part of a large wedding group, everyone was fine with it.  I stayed here yesterday - 19th-20th December 2020. The experience wasn't great at all. I've been a Bonvoy member for a while and have held platinum elite status because of my frequent travels, but this was the first time I was staying at the Courtyard in Mumbai, hence wasn't aware of the terrible soundproofing, which is falsely advertised on the…

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: GAUTAM G
Detailed Review: I really quite liked my stay at the Courtyard.  Pluses Near the airport and convient for getting local transportation Rooms are warm and comfortable, they were really well sound proofed given the hotel is right on a busy road The dinner and buffet breakfast were really good and appetizing The WiFi was fast and easy to connect Staff were really professional and courteous, the check in extremely smooth  Negative Quite missed the bidet shower or the bum shower , the washroom in the room and also in the common areas lacked the same, so plan ahead if you're visiting 😅 The TV in the room had many TV channels which were locked but I guess the wifi quite made up for that

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ashwin K
Detailed Review: Went to Courtyard by Marriott along with my family for dinner and spent wonderful time by having dinner in momo cafe.. The buffet in the lobby was superb with lots of variation and good spread. Specail thanks to head Chef Rajeev who have taken  special care and attention toward my family ..🙂🙂 We will rate Food 5 Ambience 5 Service 5

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Yash
Detailed Review: A firm following one of the highest levels of sanitization and hygiene standards. They ensured literally everyone followed the COVID protocols. Though buffet breakfast wasn't laid out due to Pandemic but they made it a point that everything on the menu was served on the table. Would like to mention Mr. Rajas enthusiastically and joyfully ensured a comfortable dine in experience at Momos cafe. A pleasurable experience altogether and MUST stay place if we want to be sure of sanitization and hygiene.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: S18
Detailed Review: Great service and staff went above and beyond to make sure our event went very well. our stay was great along with the food. The staff went th extra mile and even had live counters at our event. Must visit!

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Kavita Pesso
Detailed Review: I had a great experience in Holiday Inn. This was my 2nd consecutive year spent well at Holiday Inn.. Since last year I had come here for a stay almost around the same time - Dec'2019. And the reason for me to choose Holiday Inn was this year too was the service provided by the entire team in terms of safety, security, hygiene, quick assistance, food & last but not the least a super comfortable stay. I had my toddler daughter with me.. And dint want to risk in anyway by travelling during the pandemic so chose to spend some time with her at Holiday Inn. Staffs were supportive & polite, it was my bday on the new year day & my friend had planned a surprise for me by coordinating with Holiday Inn staffs.. But just to mention nothing much could be done because of the pandemic…

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Vijay kanabar
Detailed Review: Service was quick and good. Clean rooms and breakfast spread excellent. Loved the whole experience ....... Value for money A dded advantage of it being near the airport Good for those who are not looking for great window view and are intended for a short stopover

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Parikhshit S
Review: Oustanding service by the Concierge-Front Desk-Breakfast in room
Detailed Review: I booked this hotel at last minute while taking of from Dubai International Airport.I reached this hotel at 3 am and the front desk was very cooperative.My mother in law who is 83 years old was to join me from Pune and was expected in the morning.I shared this with the front desk manager and the arrangement was done very well.Outstanding performance by the conceirge staff Subhash,he took immense care of my mother inlaw the moment she arrived and till we left for the airport.The care taken by him to handle the wheel chair was heart warming.Due to Covid 19 the breakfast has to be ordered in the room.It was served very well and was delicious.this trip was excellent.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: RAJDEEP RUDRA
Review: Wonderful experience at SAPTAMI, Hotel Holiday Inn
Detailed Review: It gives me a big pleasure to write to you about my experience at Saptami restaurant in your Mumbai hotel today for X-Mas brunch.   I had booked this for myself and my 11year old son almost 10days back through Eazy Diner under a particular offer; I got a WRITTEN CONFIRMATION as well from Eazy Diner.   However, unfortunately yesterday, at the last moment, I got a call from Eazy Diner and they conveyed that due to some unavoidable situation, they are not able to extend the offer today. It was a very upsetting situation for me as I had committed my 11year old son about this dine out and he was very excited about it. It was at this juncture that I decided to connect with Saptami directly and request for a booking; I got connected to Kajal Nadar first, who after understanding my…

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Saa
Detailed Review: Very nice and friendly staff from house keeping person till the manager Really cooperative staff specially a guy SHIVAM who was at the door any tym to serve the best possible  And with all safety measures

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Kamal loomba
Detailed Review: Excellent service and excellent facilities and hotel staff is very cooperative and friendly and it was amazing to stay in this hotel. I hope i get to stay in holiday inn mumbai again in future. ❤️❤️😍

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: AKSHAY SURESH
Detailed Review: The hotel stay was very comfortable. The hotel is sanitized regularly and the staff is very helpful and humble. Covid protocol was strictly followed. But my only concern was that the quarantine food menu could have been made better.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ashok B
Review: Super as ever... thank you holiday inn Mumbai
Detailed Review: After long break I’m back to my favourite place. Clint as always ready to welcome and add that feelings ,his brigade Sachin and rajeev at bar were really nice and thoughtful. Breakfast team vally and Baliram good as ever. Thanks to front desk team and housekeeping team. Will visit Soon. Thanks once again

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Vishwa Punniyakotti
Review: My quarantine stay in hotel holiday inn..
Detailed Review: The quality of rooms and the food provided are upto standards...the laundry service is excellent... Overall I felt really comfortable staying here... The facilities available in the hotel are excellent... They provide us everything we need

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: DrBineshian
Detailed Review: Clean room, great hospitality, delicious food, nice restaurant crews, and more; thanks to two generous gentlemen at restaurant, Tushant and Nasibuddin; well done guys. I strongly recommend this neat and clean hotel to anyone who wants a classy stay.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Arpit Mecwan
Detailed Review: Excellent hotel with extremely clean,  comfortable & hygienic during this pandemic situation. Upon arrival we were warmly welcomed by the friendly reception staff and hospitality was upto mark. Meal was also good.  Overall it was decent stay with Holiday Inn.  Would definetely recommend this hotel to everybody! It's a true sample of excellent hospitality.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: VIKAS NEHE
Detailed Review: Stayed for 5 days and experience was amazing. The cleanness was at high standard during covid and no problem at all during stay.   The problem was resolved on immediate basis by staff. The staff is very friendly and supportive all the time.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Suvesh Singh
Detailed Review: Stayed here for 11 days. Stay was awsome. Concerns were addressed immediately. Would recommend everyone to try this place if looking for a stay near airport.   Special mention to Bell boy Subhash. He was very helpful.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Amar More
Detailed Review: We stayed in holiday inn mumbai airport for 1 night. Hotel premises and lobby is very clean. They are taking all the necessary precautions for safety of the guest. Room was very neat and clean. Special Thanks to SHIVAM from housekeeping for taking care of our room. He was very polite and helpfull during our stay. I have worked with more than 5 hotel properties but people like SHIVAM are gem to the industry 😊 there was not a single thing that he missed while cleaning the room. He should be appreciated by his seniors and managers. 😊 Thanks to Tushar from front office for very smooth check in process and explaining about the hotel policies. 😊  Thankyou Amar More Room number - 702

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ashwin K
Detailed Review: Went to Courtyard by Marriott along with my family for dinner and spent wonderful time by having dinner in momo cafe.. The buffet in the lobby was superb with lots of variation and good spread. Specail thanks to head Chef Rajeev who have taken  special care and attention toward my family ..🙂🙂 We will rate Food 5 Ambience 5 Service 5

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ricky
Detailed Review: I stayed in Holiday Inn, Sakinaka for alost 10 days. The stay was made very comfortable and warm by the hotel staff. Any concerns or issues were quickly addressed to the concerned department and instantly resolved. Special mention of Mr. Aashish Pardeshi from IRD department for his promt services and who was indeed very helpful during my stay at the hotel.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ams eha zavian
Review: 14 Days of my life in Holiday inn mumbai with u tell u get.
Detailed Review: Its been a very good experience while spending my life 14 days qurantine in Hotel Holiday inn mumbai. The staff is very cooperative and the meals on time with all available utilities is like u tell u get.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rohan Rana
Detailed Review: Just completed 14 days of my quarantine here,and I'm more the pleased to have stayed here.The stay overall has been amazing,and the staff here is very cooperative and efficient;the food being very good,and also the services being spot on.It has been a pleasure throughout,and I would definitely love to visit again...

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Vikram
Detailed Review: I visited the holiday Inn Mumbai for almost 15 days for my quarantine period.i have enjoyed full and have a excellent experience in hotel.I would like to come again and experience more moments and best part is location of hotel.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: colin d
Detailed Review: I spent about 11 days in Holiday Inn. The location is great with Airport in immediate vicinity.  The rooms are nice & spacious and clean.  Higher floors offer good view facing Powai area, but rooms on other side facing residential buildings dont offer the same. So make sure you ask for higher floor & metro facing room.  Food is average. Staff is courteous & very helpful.  Would highly recommend this hotel.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Pallav
Detailed Review: Well amenities are good and Mr Wasim is very helpful along with other staff. The only issue is the quality of food which I think might be improved. The cooking is good but quality of products used is low.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sahayarani F
Detailed Review: I take this opportunity to convey my special thanks to Mr shantanu and Mr Farooque for rendering an exceptional service ,I wish them all the very best in their assignments,the reception was extremely good ,They helped me out of the way which really met my requirements

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: VGAUR1983
Detailed Review: The rooftop venue on 31st was nice, the gathering was nice. Food was delicious and the staff was as usual amazing in hospitality. The check-in was swift and the room provided was as per my preference. Thank you for the nice hospitality as always. Will return again and again.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Richard
Review: New Year Eve - A well Organised event
Detailed Review: Had spent the new year at this Lovely property, The team and the management had organized this event very well. The food and Beverage spread was huge and was executed well keeping in mind the Covid Norms. The Team was on their toes keeping sure all guests are attended to. The Check-in to the room was also well organized. The entire staff is very friendly and polite. Keep the good work team Orchid. Loved the stay and will be back soon.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Vinay 001
Detailed Review: i had booked Orchid Mumbai for my family for a new year break, and i must say i took a  wise decision. i was not comfortable taking my kids out and stay in a hotel after this pandemic broke , but finally we made up our mind.  The hotel staff is really helpful an courteous. they truly understand the meaning of hospitality. I could see that the hotel was really busy as they were full on that day , but i remember the name of a staff Bharat who really helped us in the room when ever we needed any thing. Very prompt and polite staff. The food is just amazing . we did not opt for the gala dinner and stayed in the room and ordered from room service. the food portion was apt and the service was also fast. we had a lovely morning breakfast . It was a lovely spread. in all a total value…

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: RB2580
Detailed Review: We were on a Staycation and got an excellent deal from their reservations team. The rate was inclusive of breakfast and we got  a nice spread at their lobby restaurant. As I am a fitness freak, I visited their gymnasium and honestly I felt it was small for the hotel of this size but it was nicely maintained. Rajesh was very courteous and shared few tips with me for stretching and that was very helpful. The front desk team was courteous and they extended an early check in our day of arrival and also late checkout on our special request as we were awake till late on 31st. Overall team was helpful and will come back soon again

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: clark601
Detailed Review: It was the best evening I ever had . When I reached the hotel along with my wife , the lobby was full and really crowded. I thought it will take time for us to be checked-in, but that was nit the case. The staff really was very efficient and professional. They really controlled the guest very well and we had our room in 30 minutes. The room was clean and well maintained. We also has taken the gala dinner at the roof top , it was a lovely evening setup done by the hotel. Great experience sitting up . Lovely music and wonderful buffet. It was in all a lovely evening that got over by 11 pm due to government norms but we thoroughly enjoyed it. Next morning also there was a lovely spread of breakfast and we had a late check-out for us too. I can say we had the best time , I surely…

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Manesh K Nair
Detailed Review: Really loved the service of this hotel. Specially food and room service. Cheers and keep up the good work. Specially continental food by chef which was served was amazing. Check in check out procedure was also very smooth.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Pratyush G
Review: Wedding Ceremony of my sister at Prive Hall
Detailed Review: We had a three day wedding function at the Orchid hotel and I must say that the service was really very nice. Our stay as well as our ceremonies were hospitable. The food was excellent especially the Manchow soup. My nephew who doesn’t drink soups also drank it. The preparation of Chef Rishikesh and Chef Sufiyan has been phenomenal. Roshan Lobo, Ryan, Mr. Aniket Gawde and Mr. Adish have also been very helpful, always on the toes to assist us, hospitable, warm and welcoming. Overall, i was highly satisfied with the food, service and the quality of my stay and would highly urge anyone to consider keeping their function there. Special thanks to Mr. Roshan Lobo and his entire team for making this a success.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Krisha
Detailed Review: The food and the service was really good. The ambience was really amazing, the people who served us were really polite(Rahul and Jigar) .Social distancing was also followed. Overally it was a great express.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
