Detailed Review: The stay was excellent, we had a 3 night stay at the hotel on the Christmas package and the offering was par excellent. The package was value for money, staff from the arrival to the departure from the hotel were all excellent. Food was superb and the festive feel at the hotel gave us a much needed break. Thank you all we will be back soon.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv

Detailed Review: Had lovely wedding Ceremony at the orchid hotel food was excellent thank to chef rushikesh service was very very excellent would like to thank mr Amit mr Ryan mr Koli they took care us very well will like to visit again thanks to all banquet team  Cheers!  Thanks n regards Tejas wasnic

Review: Great hospitality and an amazing experience!
Detailed Review: We decided to stay at St.Regis during our institutional quarantine period and were very happy with the overall experience.  Right from booking to checking out everything was great and one of my best stays at a Marriott Property. Would like to call out a few names who were were warm and helpful throughout our journey.  Bhupendra - for helping us with the reservation. Inzaman - helping us with a seamless check-in at 4 am in the morning. Manish Panchal & Laveena - for taking care of all our in-room dining needs  AND A SPECIAL SHOUTOUT to Mohammed Yusuf and the amazing hospitality he provided during our stay. Very prompt, quick and friendly and I would highly recommend Yusuf :)  Until next time!

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Stefan Menezes
Detailed Review: Everything about our stay was fantastic and we were well taken care of. Right from Check in by Noor to Caesar from Butlers taking care of each and every need we wanted in the room. Service and Food was top notch at Seven Kitchens Akshay the Manager took care of us when ever we dined there. Once a again thanks again for the wonderful staycation.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sneha B
Detailed Review: (Stay in December 2020)   My parents and I checked in for a relaxing staycation within the same city. This was our first experience at St Regis, after having heard wonderful things about the hotel and its services.   From the time we exited our Uber at the driveway till the time we checked out on Day 3, we were greeted by friendly faces, helpful staff and hygienic amenities. From the front desk staff Mr Suman (Kundu, I think) who helped us with a smooth check-in and check-out and also upgraded us to a nicer room on a higher floor, to our very personal butler Vineet Pai, we were floored by the comfort and doled out to us on this indulgent weekend!   Vineet personalised our trip to the very smallest detail, and also arranged for us to have complimentary Sunset Hours at Luna, which…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Nisha Mehrotra
Detailed Review: We were quite satisfied with our stay at St Regis!Tarun Bhatt and Jonathan were especially hospitable and took good care of us. We were visiting to celebrate the birthday of one of the family members and were touched by the cake, platter, decoration and other arrangements made especially for us. We were also happy with the cleanliness and hygiene practices adopted in light of the covid situation and would love to come back soon and visit again!

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: RachelAMullins
Detailed Review: I love the bathtub here, the toiletries are nice but not a brand I've heard of. Hotel itself is super beautiful and connects to a decent mall which is convenient. The check in is on the 9th floor which is confusing. Plenty of restaurant options. I had a meeting with my agent on the lobby mezzanine level and nobody bothered us which is the gold standard in my book.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rinesh Jain
Detailed Review: Had a wonderful experience and pleasant stay. Major credits to Mr.Chirag for being a perfect guide throughout my stay. Food was delicious. In room service was also up to the mark. And had a great experience of Champagne Sabering.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Saket A
Detailed Review: My trip to St. Regis was quite delightful. I enjoyed my stay. My butler - Tarun was also a great help in making things easy for us. The anniversary setup he did was indeed very beautiful. I was feeling very happy & comfortable with him always being there when needed.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Bvsh
Detailed Review: Was very happy with our stay at St Regis and by the service provided by the full team including our Private Butler Tarun.  The complimentary Champagne tasting was a pleasant surprise and I will definitely stay again in the Royal Suite.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Krunal
Detailed Review: Comfortable stay with great food and efficient service... Thoroughly enjoyed the stay and kids loved the food (specially deserts) at Seven Kitchen.  Also a special mention of Mr. Suresh Tamang, for his kind attention and efficient service.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Harshad S
Review: Super Awesome Stay with Excellent Service
Detailed Review: One word to describe St. Regis is Excellent.  Due to COVID, we couldn’t plan our honeymoon hence we chose to go for a staycation at St. Regis and I must say it was a best call we made. Room offered to us was on the higher floor as requested and had a marvellous view of the City and the Arabian Sea. Food was really awesome with Really good spread to choose from. Service, the best one I have ever received. Special mention to Mr. Suresh Tamang. He was really helpful. Would love to visit this place again, soon.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Nikita G
Detailed Review: Very Good Service, Great chef Mr. Swapnil and Mr. Ganesh   Mr. Kaushik was also very helpful for room service and very polite with everything.  Will visit again and spent a very good time. Also thank you for the assistance everytime.  Thank you.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Priti Lokre
Detailed Review: We had been to St Regis, Mumbai for one night and our experience was absolutely delightful.  We were quite worried while visiting because of covid but the team is taking all the precautions to keep the room and atmosphere clean and sanitized. Social distancing was properly maintained.  The food was fresh, delicious and there were many options to choose from. You really need to keep your stomach empty if you want to try this variety.  I specially would like to thank you to the team as they arranged their signature cake with decoration to celebrate our anniversary and offcourse @Harshala who delighted us with her signature dessert. I still can feel the taste of it❤️ Thank you once again to the entire team to make our stay more special and safe. We would certainly like to recommend…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Vishal Shah
Detailed Review: Me and my wife visited St Regis Mumbai on our anniversary occasion. It was really a relaxed stay with an upgrade to a suit room, BMW pickup and drop, specially designed 4 course candle light dinner at Luna, awesome spread of breakfast.  The staff at Regis is just awesome and special thanks to Vineet Pai our butler who is just perfect with his guest relation skills and very prompt and actually he managed us and made our stay special.  I highly recommend Regis for any occasion, staff at Regis will really make it special for you....  Thank you Vineet for this memorable stay....  Vishal Shah

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Maulik Shah
Detailed Review: So we went to St Regis for 2 nights and it was amazing. The room and the view from 24th floor was fantastic. Breakfast spread and dinner at seven kitchens was amazing. Special thanks to Mr Vineet Pai who took care of all our requests. He also decorated our room with balloons and made a special cake for our marriage anniversary. All the other staff also were very courteous and helpful. Safety and hygiene wise too the hotel was very clean. Would recommend everyone to stay at St Regis.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Abhishek Jain
Detailed Review: A class in it self very nice service Clean and beautiful rooms  Amazing and welcoming staff each and everyone in every corner they greet everytime they meet service top notch.  Had a great stay we had gone to bring in a birthday and it turned out to be a memorable one.  Thank you St Regis for your hospitality.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: GDM1954
Review: Our stay at the Vits Mumbai.
Detailed Review: Just to inform those visiting Mumbai, we stayed at the Vits Mumbai upto Jan. this year and like to say how appreciative it was staying here. One person went out of his way to make our stay enjoyable, we would like to thank Manish Solanki, H/K Department, for his help whenever we needed it.  Also like to thank Gopal for making our last- minute reservations. Always been a pleasure staying here.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Shreedhara Chinniah
Detailed Review: Vits hotel is one of the best hotel in Andheri situated near the international airport.All the staff are all caring and polite.They served delicious food and dessert.The restaurant is facing the swimming pool and is very beautiful at night.I really liked the hotel and all the services they provide.Their rooms were also clean including the bathroom.I would like to give this hotel a rating of 9.0/10.Excellent hotel 👍🏽 KEEP IT UP.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Avinash U
Review: Vits Mumbai - Excellent hospitality and well trained staff
Detailed Review: Vits- Mumbai is one the best for stay with reasonable price. Well maintained ambience and staff is well trained to manage guests need. My Special thanks for Vishal(staff member) for being on toe to manage every need of me and my team

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Mueheh
Detailed Review: Front office staff Mehreen was very Co operative and kind enough to extend my Check out timing. The ambiance of the lobby is very pleasing. Very well decorated for the Xmas season...would like to visit again...

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Khushal Bedre
Detailed Review: From the day I checked into this hotel, I found myself to be in a hotel where everyone was like family. Especially "Mr. Paresh Malkar" from front desk lead all communication in a well organised, professional manner.  The room is well organised and the food was also good. Will suggest this hotels stay to my friends and all my family members as well.  Once again thanks to "Mr. Paresh Malkar" for his good behaviour and professionalism with all the guests visiting this hotel.  Thanks & Best Regards, Khushal Umesh Bedre.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Animesh Pratap Singh
Detailed Review: Its very nice and super stay.The house keeping and In Room Dining was very humble and all the services came on time. No delay as such at all. Personal on the front desk Ms. Mehreen and Mr. Zoheb  were really very helpful everytime I called on the front desk. In all it was a great experience to stay here and I will suggest people to come here and stay and experience the same.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Spring2001
Detailed Review: Thank you to all of you at Courtyard Marriott Mumbai. You all do know how to welcome your guests. From the front door to the baggage crew to the Reception Desk to the Morning Breakfast Crew...thank you to all the smiling and wonderful people at this Marriott. You always make us feel at home. An example of the courteous staff: the Manager at breakfast on Nov 3rd (it was the first day they had opened the breakfast area after the pandemic closure) takes the time to enquire if everything is to our liking...then again on an earlier visit the young lady in the High Tea Lounge took the time to talk and listen patiently to my then 82 year old father.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Yadhiraj
Detailed Review: Well in these days one can expect the hotel be at their usual best with s much restrictions. My quarantine here wasvon official trip and was boring to the core. The view, the room and the food served. However the room service team did try their best they were severely restricted in what was allowed and what is not. The first room I chcked in was not properly cleaned and so the staff promptly shifted me to another room. Nothing much to add as my stay was pretty much confined to one room, however must add that the food served was mediocre and at times poor. Even items ordered outside the set menu was not the usual holiday inn quality. One particular example was the ice cream I had ordered which had to be returned as it was simply substandard, though the room service team tried to…

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Kunal Kesale
Detailed Review: I had the most pleasent stay in this hotel, best experience in any hotel so far. The staff was very helpful and the  front desk lady Miss Kinjal special thanks to her for her very helpful nature, she was extremely sweet by her behaviour , with a very welcoming and kind nature. I would suggest everyone to feel free and stay in Holiday inn.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sachin lakhlan
Detailed Review: Hello Ladies&Gentelman I have to give you a little suggestion about the Holiday Inn Mumbai International Airport Hotel. I would like to give reviews to this hotel.I have been staying in this hotel for the last 1 month. I got very good staff here. You will get good service and in that very luxurious room, you will get a queen size king size bed in it. You will get a sofa and you will get an office table . I came for my quarantine here for joining my next ship. My stay was very good here. Got a good staff. I would like to recommend this hotel to you. If you are coming for a stay in Mumbai or you are coming for some business work, then you can stay here. Its location is near by airport within 10 minutes you will reach here in the hotel. Whether the hotel has started from first of…

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: SAILOR GUY ANISH
Detailed Review: First of all thank you so much holiday Inn bcoz you are serving us in this covid phase with good hygienic food,good cleaning, providing us good service.  Location is also fab I can see the sunrise from my room. The sadest part I couldn't enjoy the pool bcoz of this nasty corona.  Thanks a lot the members of holiday inn team.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Khushroo Sarosh I
Detailed Review: I stayed in this hotel for 15 days and it was a very comfortable stay with good hygenic food, good options to order in other times too, found the staff very kind and corporative. The rooms were nice and spacious.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Kushal Volvoiker
Detailed Review: It was a superb stay in Holiday Inn for a couple of weeks. The service was really great, spacious room with an incredible view. Very humble service personel led by Kinjal.Simply fantastic. I enjoyed it.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Amber tripathi
Detailed Review: Cordial behaviour by mr. Tushar and their staff. A thorough gentleman approach. My stay was very comfortable and relaxing. Food was ok  Accommodation is quite spacious and everything is properly  sanitized.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Atul Mishra
Detailed Review: Very Nice hotel with very supportive staff and good quality serviuces. It was a wonderful experience for me as well as my family. The manager and their staff are very helpful. I am quite satisfy with this kind of service. I would love to visit that place very soon,

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Nageshwar C
Detailed Review: Smooth check-in and Excellent stay . Rooms are really nice and well maintained, room service is prompt and swift and the food is good as well. Staff is humble and very helpful. COVID-19 precautions are strictly adhered to as well. Overall, I am extremely happy with this Hotel.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rahul Palan
Review: Bride's Brother (Wedding ceremony for my sister)
Detailed Review: Very generous staff with high etiquettes of service and helpful in all aspects! Amit Khaire and Vikas More have really been helpful in all our demands and needs. It was a great experience and a fulfilling one for us due to their service and support.  Additionally Sachin and Manisha were very supportive for all our requests..  Regards, Rahul

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: NIKHIL U
Detailed Review: Had a dinner in South of vindhyas restaurant with my wife very taste food and best Service Team lovely ambiance polite and caring staff thank you so much for serving us team south of vindhyas very hardworking team..special thanks to Jayni and rahul🙌🙌🙌🙌love to visit again....

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Vineet S
Detailed Review: I have been frequenting Hotel Orchid since May 2020 and so far have been here 4 times. Right from check in to check out things have remained smooth during every stay. Reception team were well behaved and informative. Help desk/ Housekeeping/ In room Dining made sure the services were quick and resolved. My deepest gratitude and wishes to Mr Salman and Mr Nilesh from In room dining, everyone from housekeeping team and the star chef of the hotel Sufiyan who left no coin unturned to service my requests and taste buds. Overall my heartiest and best wishes to the entire team of The Orchid for making my stays pleasant and wonderful each time every time. Will keep visiting. Cheers!!

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Saurabh Padwal
Detailed Review: Excellent service, courteous staff, food is nice well organized. Especially Amit and Ryan and chef sufiyan really did a very good job. Really decent and also followed all the covid safety norms. Very well done job. Chancery is really nice hall.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Kripaniws Sharma
Detailed Review: The food was very tasty and very good hospitality thank you to all the staff Rahul,jayni,minal all were best I really enjoyed in South of vindhyas I will visit soon again with my family 😊👍 Keep you work up fuzz all the best...

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Subhash A
Detailed Review: The ambience and hospitality was good. The taste and preperation were excellent. The musicians were feather in the cap. Staff is awesome Kalpesh,minal,jayni all are very attentive and cordial. keep it up

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Nilesh Patel
Detailed Review: I visited south of vindhyas for dinner had a very tasty non veg thali.service was awsome staff is very polite and caring also Ms.jayni wearing beautiful smile.thank you so much Mr.minal and Mr.kalpesh for serving me i will visit again....

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Kiara
Review: Wonderful and excellent service by the orchid hotel mumbai
Detailed Review: From the time i stepped into the door till the time i left i was treated as if i the only guest in the hotel every staff is wearing smile on face.I orderd breakfast from in room dinning Mr.Amit verma promptly responded to our choice of breakfast had a tasty breakfast in room then we visited to the lobby level resturant south of vindhyas beautiful architecture and interior desingn that wows to you also staff is warm generous helpful and caring special thanks to Mr.Kalpesh,minal for serving us delicious food and Ms.Jayni who welcoming us thank you so much...  Keep the good work up we will visit again soon...😊😊

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ashwin
Detailed Review: Very good food, excellent service we stayed here for three days for a wedding function  and the staff was very efficient...banquet staff was found excellent... specially I wolud like to thank to me.amit khaire & mr.ryan(bqt mgr)got quick response n promt servive from them. Thanks to shubham also he took care us very well Thanks again all banquet team Love the orchid as always  Will c you soon  Thanks n regard Ashwin gupta

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Vinay Sharma
Review: Poor Hospitality Service and no precaution for Covid
Detailed Review: Building is very good , Location is very good . the rating i have given for that only !  apart from this , Nothing is good about this hotel !  at the time of check in , the person was seating at reception was looked like frustrated , he told us only the things which are not allowed ! after that we have asked him about the Gym timing he said 9 AM to 6 PM ... Breakfast timing after 8 we can order and it will take 40 minutes to serve in room !  the worst thing ... we have on the room cleaning sign on the door at the time we left for the office in the morning , but when we reach hotel around 7:30 PM , the room was as it is like we left in the morning ... it took 40 minutes to clean and we had to wait out side   the gentlemen who welcome us at the time of check in at reception had…

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Fatima
Detailed Review: Great service and support from staff especially Amit ,Sachin and Ryan .Amit was of great support and there for immediate help to all the staff.Great service and caring staff .Thank you once again. Thanks &Regards, Fatima Ansari  Wockhardt Foundation

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Subrahmani
Detailed Review: It was a very good stay at orchid and the food was also good Staff were very helpful and rooms were all clean.Their airport to and fro pixk up was excellent  Overall our stay was very comfortable wl re

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Gaurav B
Review: Excellent hospitality by House keeping staff specially from Mr Yogesh ji and Mr Mahendra
Detailed Review: At ORCHID hotel I feel like my second home as this is my 5 th visit which includes minimum 12 days stay at every trip. Housekeeping staff are really excellent and special thanks to Mr Yogesh ji and Mahendra ji. Chef Mr Suffiyan is one of the best chef I have ever met ..he take care of my every meals Many thanks to there hospitality.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Devang
Review: Great drinks good vibes and fun
Detailed Review: Serves very different tasty cocktails. Great presentation.music is very fun and lively. Abhijit is always very attentive and takes care of your wants quickly. The food tastes yummy.we will back again sure😀

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sandeep Jaiswal
Detailed Review: We had family lunch in South of vindhyas they have very beautiful Sunday brunch with so many varieties of desserts ambiance was excellent had a great experience thank you team vindhyas Mr.kalpesh,Nikal,Rahul,Madhu,jayni also chefs will visit soon

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: raosaheb
Review: Birthday Lunch at South of Vindhyas
Detailed Review: We are very Regular at The Orchid Mumbai , today we decided to celebrate Birthday at South of Vindhyas for Lunch.Food was as usual Awsome and Tasty .They had added Chat, Mithai Counter with Thalis .service was impeccable .Special Thanks to Rahul, Jayni, Minal , Chef Bala and Mr Kalpesh to make our Birthday special and memorable .Keep it up .

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: 714himanshup
Detailed Review: The stay was very nice & comfortable. Hotel staff was very much supportive and true to there job. The housekeeping was very much upto the mark and expectations, one person is worth mentioning Mr Yogesh bodke who did the housekeeping at my room and ensured the room is daily maintained with the hotel standard.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Angle
Detailed Review: Weekend spend at the right place with an amazing experience. A calm n cozy place to chill about. Good ambience n enjoyed the tandoori lobester and non veg platter . Well explained at the time of service by Mr. Abhijit. Great place will surely recommebd to people and will visit soon😊

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Meher
Detailed Review: Wonderful time, fabulous service, great food, very helpful staff, specially Amit khaire who took care us very well I would likd mention fee names also thanks to , Mr lobo, Mr ryan, the chef rishi  and the all bqt team  Thank❤️

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Nityananad
Detailed Review: Excellent Arrangements,very prompt service and cooperation received frommr.amit khaire all his team members. Also thanks to Shubham for all Hospitality and services. Food was excellent , caramal custard  was excellent. Thanks to Chef Rishikesh.  Thanks also to Manisha Jain during booking and all required arrangements made.  Thanks n regards Nityanand

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ruchi Subba
Review: Professional staff with pleasant behavior worth our dining 😊
Detailed Review: After dining in speciality restaurant South of vindhya,me and my friends are so happy with the service provided by Minal and kalpesh, Thank you for your awesome hospitality! Will visit again very soon 😊😊

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Manish kumar
Detailed Review: I had dinner at South of vindhyas with my friends had a excillent experience with team South of vindhyas they all are very sweet and polite they take care of social distanceing and well sanitation manager kalpesh Mistry n his team was awsm rahul,Minal and jayni thank u so much I will visit soon

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: WELLMAN74
Detailed Review: The arrangement was up to the mark, with proper layout as given by us. The service was also good in terms of food and other related arrangements for a proper product launch event. Certainly recommend for business meets and such events. The service was taken care of by Amit Khaire  Ryan and his banquet team and chef Rishi.  Thanks, Vipul n Moiz

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Avies F
Detailed Review: Good Stay....... Room was great with good sleep. clean and Hygine, very attentive room staff.good specious bath room . Thank you Aji and team.  Good stay...  Room was great with good sleep. clean and Hygine, very attentive room staff.good specious bath room . Thank you Aji and team.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Divesh
Review: Excellent service by IN ROOM DINING
Detailed Review: Orchid hotel was the best hotel to stay in mumbai.The food was tasty and in room dining staff is very very helpful Mr.Amit verma and Mr.Salman was very polite and cooperative. great staying in the orchid hotel thank you so so much orchid team.Orchid is really a home away from home

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Noorjehan AZAD kanani
Detailed Review: Excellentv stay Mr Akash service was very excellent nice room excellent service breakfast was not good n all other thing were excellent bed scenery tv all were excellent except breakfast Mr Akash n all other staff were very cooperative

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ashish
Detailed Review: We are from Mumbai and dues to this pandemic  did not want to travel out of Mumbai then we came to know about a staycation that The Orchid was giving and we planned to come here for a break with my children.  They had done lovely Diwali decoration with lights , Diyas and a awesome Rangoli. We were also upgraded to a higher category room.  The say was comfortable  and the staff is really warm and nice.  At the welcome they served us Diwali sweets that really touched our heart.  All in all a lovely short break. Much recommend. Wish you all a happy diwaliWe

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sunil Sapre
Review: Visit to South of Vindhyas, Hotel Orchid
Detailed Review: We, 12 of us had sumptuous lunch at South of Vindhyas on 15 November. It was family get-together. Food was extremely delicious. Service was class apart with personal attention from Restaurant Manager and other Staff. Jigar and Rahul were very courteous in serving food.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Shubhalaxmi
Detailed Review: Excellent service. Special thanks to amit khaire, Roshan Lobo , ms manisha appreciate food quality n taste of chef rishikesh.  I must mention that it was promt service from all the bqt staff  Special thanks to again amit n Lobo who made our social event success.  Keep it up  Hope will c you soon  Regards  Shubhalaxmi chitnis

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Salman S
Detailed Review: Best experience ever by Amit khaire and Roshan Abhishek and Shubham whole team is really nice towards hospitality and extreme care it was nice event looking forward again in future   Regards Salman sammani

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Cain J
Review: A Splendid Staycation after The Lockdown
Detailed Review: A Brilliant place in the heart of the city. It really means a lot when the people around know you even if you have never stayed in the place ever.  I did find it rather warm and friendly, inspite of not having all the facilities in place. The butler service was brilliant and with ironing out of clothes to normally getting a surprised organised. The way the things functioned around the property were brilliant even on a skeletal staff. There was one grouse which i did not expect from them, the lunch menu was rather very limited and one has to make do with the limited choices. Altough it was served well,but it definitely left a bitter taste. All in all it was a pleasant experience

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ritika Humne
Detailed Review: It was a wonderful stay and amazing service was given by the staff there. Every one was of great help, kind and polite. Wish would've stayed more. There was also an emergency since I was not well and asked for some tablets, they provided me the tablets at room. It was my friends birthday and we had great party at the banquet their and the staff there were all friendly.😊

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Siddhant Sathaye
Detailed Review: As the lockdown was ending, I decided to unwind in a luxury hotel. St Regis seemed like the perfect hotel for it given its luxury and service record. And it surely lived up to all my expectations. I've already visited the hotel twice in the month of November and I hope to visit it again soon. Mr Vineet Pai provided excellent services as the Butler and invited me to the wonderful Champagne Sabering event. All other employees of the hotel were also very helpful and I received a free room upgrade to one of the highest floors on the hotel. Recommend 10/10

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Crystal
Detailed Review: It was a bday trip for me within the city itself. Decided to pick st.regis. Definitely loved the service and the warm accommodation by the staff especially our butler Rahul. Review: Memorable stay at St. Regis, Mumbai – Room No.3009 : 19.11.2020 – 20.11.2020.
Detailed Review: Hello to all and extremely sorry for a little belated review.    To add to the surprise 25th Anniversary gift from the kids, St. Regis, upgraded us to the room with best of 180 degree view, one could have of Mumbai skyline and seafront.    Appreciate the concern shown by Ms. Shifa Shaikh, Duty Manager, while there was delay in completion of check-in formalities, obviously could be because of our reaching early than the regular check-in time and also probably because of last minute upgrade.  Also appreciate the assistance by Mr. Inzimam for helping out with the check-in formalities.  A big positive for the check-in staff.    A special mention, we feel, is a must for Mr. Rahul Bhosale, from the Butler Service, for looking after our comforts, once settled inside the room and taking…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv

Detailed Review: We have stayed at hotel on 21nov2020, we have gone to celebrate our anniversary.  We have booked staycation pack where we were suppose to get confirm early check-in and late check out. But it was denied by front desk at hotel. Later we insisted so we were given late only check-out.  Room given to us was visible from hotel passage and people walking can look inside our room, there is no privacy at all.  So we insisted for a room change and was given the same by 2pm (instead of 11am check-in).  New room given to us had a problem with AC it cannot cool room below 24degree  that is really hot. They send engineer but he could not help. all this went on till 3.30pm and with no improvement. We were in property since 11am and could not settle till 3.30pm instead of relaxing it was…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv

To top it off, the hospitality here made me feel like I belonged. I loved how every member of the staff is so proper at all times and exhibited such good etiquettes. Simple things like greeting me inside the elevator or being asked to be excused when taking leave after a conversation are much appreciated. Good manners can never be outdated.  I want to give a special shout out to my girl Ruchi who helped me plan a family dinner at Mekong. It was just perfect. Thanks to the chefs at Mekong who made such an amazing meal. And Mayur, who gave us the…

And also have to mention Dev at the reception was professional and so well trained...he is great at what he does...the breakfast area was well managed as there was no buffet but the service was so great that you would not want a buffet setup. And last but not the least I have to thank Chirag who was excellent at everything....Connected with him before my arrival and he has wowed us with his service...so humble,kind,professional...he took really good care...he is somebody you should…

Detailed Review: I stayed almost 1 month and it was very pleasant and comfortable. The staff was very polite and helpful, the location was very convenient.The food was excellent.I recommend this hotel for everyone you can.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ganesh
Detailed Review: Very Good, The food is very good and cleanliness is always there, and all the people are very hardworking and Salman is very good and good boy. And Maintaining Proper COVID Rule. Excellent Room Service Or Good Behavior. And speaking very well, working on time is such a good thing,

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv

Detailed Review: It was pleasure to stay in Holiday inn gotel, room was very clean and food was very testu, and all staff is very good and help full l, specially Mr Farooque and Tushar was very help full thank u very much.

Detailed Review: I am staying holidayin hotel it was pleasure to stay here the hotel room was very clean and hegine food was very good and tasty and staff was very help full specially mr farooque and subhash I hope I will come again thanks for all crew

Name: Javed
Detailed Review: Nice ambient spacious room excellent hospitality all facilities available Very nice and polite staff always available for immediate services during quarantine especially salman and special arrangements and precautions are taken during this pandemic season

Name: Adhiraj Barua
Detailed Review: Excellent hospitality, comfortable ambience and spacious rooms with safety as their primary objective. Special mention to Subhash and Siddharth who have been very cooperative and helpful throughout my period of stay.

Name: Srinivas
Detailed Review: Wonderful staying at the hotel. Rooms are very neat and clean. Reception staff Siddharth and Subhash were very helpful at check out. Keep up with the good work Holiday Inn Mumbai team. Definitely will look forward to stay in future

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Prasun Banerjee
Review: Pleasant stay....Exceeds your expectations on all counts!!!
Detailed Review: COVID-19 protocols strictly followed which is a huge plus. Comfortable stay. Food was very good.  Polite staff. Specially would mention Mr. Akshay who was quite helpful on various occasions in my week long stay.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Harry
Detailed Review: It started from a heartwarming welcome from the mumbai airport by a polite and professional gentleman Mr.Wasim as I know him by this name a very genuine and polite person to have a conversation with. On reaching the hotel the hospitality was of high standards with perfect hygienic conditions.i stayed with the hotel for 14 days and I didn't feel a day not well spent as the room was perfectly maintained and conditioned for a person to stay in utmost comfort.in room dining service gives the best guest service in terms of dining and the way they handle the guests is a home like feel.it was pleasure staying with you guys. The housekeeping provided their best services in keeping the stay hygienic and in best conditions . Altogether it's a great team work guys . I wish you could…

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Amit Y
Detailed Review: Stayed in hotel during quarantine as per local regulation hotel staff very humble. Very cooperative never felt had a being isolated taken good care Thanks to all  I don't remember all names but few I must say were really helpful and polite   Room was good hygienic and good view   Subhash Kalpana Amisha  Sorry guys I know I miss out many names all were fantastic  Thank you very much

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Mahesh M
Detailed Review: Iam stay in your hotel it's was my Best Experience with holiday inn. And Hotel room was very Clean and Hygiene. Staff was very Help Full Specially Mr . Subhash and Farooque they was great to help me . So thank u very much. Hope I visit again

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Jucel Soares
Detailed Review: Excellent service by Abhijit Bhandary.Good food,good music,amazing ambience and clean.Had an amazing time with my friend when we went to merlins bar.Value for money.Highly recommended.Will definitely visit again.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: sagar joshi
Review: My experience and review staying in the Orchid hotel, Mumbai.
Detailed Review: The Orchid Hotel in Mumbai was the best hotel I had stayed in a while. The hotel's cleanliness was well maintained. Room service and laundry were good. The food was terrific. The staff were very helpful and chauffeurs were on time whenever you needed them. All in all, my experience was great staying in the Orchid Hotel. Looking forward to visit the hotel soon.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Jofin
Detailed Review: The room is very good with comfortable furniture and the bed was comfortable too. The hotel stay was very pleasant and comfortable. The staff was very polite and helpful, the location was very convenient.services are good and housekeeping. If we were to travel again, we would stay there again! Good service and housekeeping.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: 696anandn
Detailed Review: Had a great time last night. The food was great, ambience was nice and service was superb. The music was surprising (person playing old Hindi songs on Veena) but was great. The menu was limited but there was something from all their restaurants ( so yes there was south India ln offcourse, but also Indian and continental). We had some beer, some veg and non veg starters and veg south Indian main course. The entire restaurant staff and waiters were very helpful and service was quick. There were also only 3-4 tables with other guests so that helped. While overall we were very happy, the veg south Indian options could have been more - they had only 2 main course options, but they were delicious! Overall, it was great to step out after s long lockdown and have some great food.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: vibz13
Detailed Review: I really want to thanks entire orchid staff. Specially thanks to nidhi whose hospitality was too good. We visited first hotel after lockdown with my four year daughter. Hotel was completely sanitized. Well hygiene over all too good. It was very much safe to travel and celebrate in hotel orchid. Really wants to thanks Miss Nina and Mr. Kalpesh

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sanjays
Detailed Review: By the grace of mata rani our engagement ceremony was very nicely handled by your entire staff who were given instructions to handle. Mr Amit Khaire was very soft spoken and took amazing care of our guest with his soft heart.He is very good in handling the ceremony and I pray for his success in his carrier. Mr Roshan Lobo Mr Abhishek and Mr. Shubham also took immense care of our guest.I wish all of the entire staff good luck in their careers and one statement I would like to say to the organisation that you are lucky to have such hard working and sincere staff in your organisation which may help to increase the potential of your name in your industry.  Thanks

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Challa sudhir
Review: Excellent cleaning of room and sanitizing
Detailed Review: Rubina from sales  and mitesh from housekeeping are very polite hats off to both of them food is goodif for breakfast buffet section is available  so it would be fantastic.... thanks for the stay wonder

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Munna
Detailed Review: Very nice people and well maintained rooms.especially all are smiley faces crew members with very understanding and cooperation. Especially  they following proper hygienic procedures. So I really thanking to all crew members for the hotels

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Captain Hemen k
Detailed Review: We had a 2 night stay at hotel .  We were very satisfied with every aspect of the hotel. WiFi is very good. The staffs  are very helpful.The hotel is very clean throughout, and our room was spacious with everything that we needed. Food is very good and suited all the tastes. The hotel is quiet and is situated within easy walking distance from the Mumbai Domestic Airport.We would highly recommend a stay at this hotel.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: ROHAN SHRIVASTAV
Detailed Review: It was my Mom's 60th Birthday on 10th October 2020 and our first family lunch after the Lockdown in a Restaurant. Mr.Kalpesh Mistry The Restaurant Manager and his team were really upto the mark and delivered a WoW experience. The Food Quality was BEST as compared to other 5 stars I'll visited. THANK YOU TEAM ORCHID..👍👍👍

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Dinusha
Detailed Review: We had a wonderful time. The service was impeccable. The arrangements made the meeting run smoothly. The lunch was delicious and the sitar added that extra lovely touch to the atmosphere. Amit K and Kalpesh deserve a huge pat on their back for their efforts.  Thank you. Hope to organise more events soon.  Dinusha  Medtitans

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Chiragp001
Detailed Review: Had meeting at this hotel,got wonderfull experience owesome service n food,like the way they arrange thing systematically,n they maintain social disatansig too... Really appreciate the services and response from the team especially Mr. Amit Khaire

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sampada Sahu
Detailed Review: The stay was very comfortable. The house keeping staff Timothy kaka took care of every minute thing and served at his best making the stay even easier. A big thanks to him. The place is at very calm location making it a perfect break for you.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: S.F.Jafri
Detailed Review: Excellent Ambience, I m proud to be Platinum Member of Orchid Group of Hotels. Especially Hospitality of Front Desk Team Member Mr Kunal.. He is so polite and Concern about each and every Guest's Comfort, until Kunal is there at Front Desk the Patrons get Homely Feel at Orchid. Because of Mr.Kunal's hopitality I feel like staying with Orchid again n again.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Shiv Saharia
Detailed Review: I am really happy with the service provided by Sonya mane, she is great hospitality.. I really like the way she was doing multitasking and helping each n everyone with warm welcome and smile on her face.. She represent brand and am happy and can assure to visit again and will also tell my frnds n relatives to come.. Thank u sonya..

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sanjayb
Detailed Review: Had a wonderful experience for a first live show after six months. Thanks for a lovely arrangments and set up by incharge Amit Khaire,n his team Abhishek and Amit Verma,  specially considering social  distancing.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Lonelynomad
Detailed Review: I stayed at this hotel (room 2717) for my friend's wedding in September - October last year. It truly lives up to the reputation garnered by this hotel & by Marriott. Being right above of one of the best shopping venues in India (Palladium & Phoenix Mills) is an icing on the cake. The service was impeccable right from then check-in till the check-out, the breakfast lounge on the 37th floor & Luna (the wedding venue on 38th floor) every one was very courteous and attentive to all the requests. Special mention to concierge (I don't recollect the name) at the ground level for being helpful with all my queries. All the aspects of this hotel are well taken care of. All the best!!

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Dimple Chainani
Detailed Review: Happy Diwali to each and everyone of you at St. Regis. We visited for a staycation last month and it was the first time we stepped out post the lockdown and was my birthday.  I don’t believe we could have chosen better. From the reception counter onwards, the staff was not just helpful but were super friendly. It felt like home away from home though Uber luxurious.  The high tea, the Champagne sabering, dinner and breakfast was awesome  A special mention to Aditi, Farzad and Akshay (at the breakfast table)  So to celebrate once again we are back for a staycation and this time with our extended family.  Mahesh and Dimple Chainani

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: divya j
Detailed Review: Had an amazing time and special mention to Dysis and Vineet, thanks for making my birthday extra special by arranging multiple surprises. Coudnt have asked for more. Highly recommended if anyone is looking to make an occassion special. Staff is very friendly and prompt which added in making stay very comfortable. Not to forget food which is amazing. Being a Jain didn't feel for a moment that options were not given to us. Rather chef was extra careful and accommodative in making our food and suggested special dishes. Kudos to the whole team... keep up the good work!!

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ashlesha14
Detailed Review: It was a pleasure staying at this St. Regis property..It was my husband's birthday and I would like to especially mention Vineet's name who went out of his way to organize everything for us and make the stay enjoyable as well as comfortable for us.  Overall the experience was brilliant and enjoyed our weekend getaway a lot. I will definitely stay there again.  -Ashlesha Patankar

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ronak
Detailed Review: Stayed at the St Regis for 6 nights in the Astor suite and it was a great experience. The rooms are top notch and their butler service is amazing. Special mention to the butler Vineet who really took care of us.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Jainita S
Detailed Review: The St Regis Mumbai has exceeded all expectations of hospitality. A couple of us had booked a suite for a long weekend staycation. I’ve been to the hotel multiple times and stayed there too and they are awesome !! Specially our butler Mr. Suresh, he made sure we were super comfortable throughout our stay.  10/10 in hospitality in my books !!!

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: chirag dhanresha
Detailed Review: it was just awesome i really like it  i would thank vinit for coperating so much and being there everytym ..enjoyed .it was very nice to be there i would really thank vinit for all helping me out with my dinning and wounderful suprise ..tysm

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Devina Pande
Detailed Review: I recently checked into the St Regis for a staycation. It was on the occasion of my birthday. The staff of the hotel spared no effort from decorating the room with balloons, arranging a cake(delicious, thanks to chef Swapnil) to ensuring we had a smooth stay. It was a memorable day. Special thanks to Utkarsh, who personally ensured that we had a seamless stay and that my day was made special. Overall, it was a wonderful stay and I hope to have many more of such staycations there.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Dhwani N
Detailed Review: Anamica and jonathan helped me out a lot with my staycation from decorating the room for my husbands 30th till the end of the stay they did a fabulous job to make our stay memorable. Thank you for the fabulous service and amazing room view

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Mithi Jain
Review: Review about our stay at the St. Regis, Mumbai
Detailed Review: We had an amazing time during our stay. The staff was very courteous and generous to have upgraded our room and our butler, Mr. Vineet was very humble & helpful. Considering the coivd situation, necessary precautionary measures were taken. Overall , we had a fantastic time!!

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Stalwin K
Detailed Review: Very friendly staff . Polite and humble .keep up the good work.Property is great and nice.Vijay the butler is a good asset to the property .kudos to the Executive chef Dane .Food is tasty and healthy .Can't complain.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Dharmesh
Detailed Review: Recently visited The St. Regis, Mumbai for my wife's birthday. Got a much needed break after the lock down. The hotel staff were very polite and helpful. Special thanks to Mr Kiran Mohite for arranging a surprise cake and balloons. The view from our 25th floor room was amazing with a panoramic view of the city showcasing the Mahalaxmi Race course and partial view of the Arabian Sea. Our stay included Breakfast at 'By the Mekong' and Dinner at 'Luna Nudo' which were both lip smacking delicious.  Looking forward for more stays at The St. Regis, Mumbai.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Khushboo gala
Detailed Review: It was my husbands birthday and Chirag had made special arrangements for him.Everything was excellent. Chirag made sure we got everything and even the staff was so good. We had an amazing time overall.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: amit
Detailed Review: Our experience was too good it was our first relaxing experience after lockdown and the ambience and the service was too good with all the required safety norms of Covid and especially Butler Ceasar was too good at his service throughout out stay . Thanks  Amit Jogure

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Akshay
Detailed Review: I visited St.Regis hotel in October, the property is really amazing, I was given a room with panoramic view which was very luxurious and comfortable.  I got a warm welcome from the staff.I was particularly impressed by Tarun Bhatt, who was the butler of our room. He went out of the way to help us and made sure we have a comfortable experience. He proved that small gestures and sincerity do make a lot of difference.  I would recommend this hotel to every person and would place this hotel at the very top in India.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Hrishikesh Pol
Detailed Review: No doubt the hotel is fantastic..good food , good service. What made our visit even better was the butler assigned to us..the always on his toes Caesar Araujo. He made sure whatever we required was brought to us asap. Ask for him next time you visit.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: akash20593
Review: Best service I have ever received in a 5 star.
Detailed Review: I recently visited The St Regis mumbai for a staycation which was a surprise for my wife’s birthday. Mr Rohit (sales /marketing) Ms Kavita (butler service) and Mr Siddesh (restaurant manager) gave more than their 100% to keep this surprise and make it very special to my wife.   Hotel Room:  I was upgraded room to a room which had an amazing view of Mahalaxmi race course and southern part of mumbaj city from 25th floor for this special occasion. To make it even more special they also sent us a complementary cake and lots of air balloons all over the room. The room was super clean and met all the 5 star criteria.   Butler service:  A big thanks to Ms Kavita and all the staff who were very polite and helpful to help me especially with the check-in formalities and the fasten the…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Harsh S
Detailed Review: I stayed here with my family and one thing for sure people who love opulence wish to stay here and have an experience. I can assure that one will not be disappointed with butler service. The staff is amazing and they go to any extent to make guest comfortable. I would like to mention my personal butler Mr Caesar Araujo & Mr Karan bhadange was extremely polite and helpful. They both have made my check in and check out extremely smooth and comfortable. They even curated special High Tea which was exceptional. Food quality was beyond imagination.  So all in all if any one gets an opportunity to come and stay here then don’t miss that. Caesar & Karan went out of his way to take care of my several requests.   Will definitely be back with family soon.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sayeed
Detailed Review: Outstanding service provided by all staff especially Akshay, Tarun Bhatt, Ceasar, Kavita, Akansha and Chef Harshala. Akshay was at the Reception counter to welcome us.Tarun coordinated during our entire stay till end.Other staff celebrated our child's birthday alongwith Tarun and made her feel special. Thanks a lot.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Kabir singh
Detailed Review: It's always amazing to stay at St. Regis. They always make ur stay feel like home. I would specially like to THANK SUMAN DUTY MANAGER FRONT Desk for taking such gud care and making my stay very comfortble with ur extra efforts. And AKSHAY form FnB for  food.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Asif Shaikh
Detailed Review: Our stay at The St.Regis was Excellent"  The service provided throughout the stay was at the pinnacle of hospitality. Kevin made sure our check-in procedure went smoothly. Special mention to the Butler service, Tarun was simply splendid making sure that we had a comfortable stay. And he saw to it that every detail was taken care of perfectly during our stay. Hygiene Standards were flawlessly followed throughout the property.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Moosa41
Detailed Review: Reception Staff was very nice and good they are very humble and sincere and specially Himanshu and Mehreen,Paresh and Zoheb with Sachin and Shahbaj too.Thank You for such a wonderful experience.I will be coming to get overwhelmed again and again.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Shaikh Saqib
Detailed Review: Very Good and relaxing hotel in Andheri location break Friendly welcoming staff on front desk staff Paresh,Himanshu,Zoheb & Mahreen... all are very Helpful...  I enjoyed the every time Food.Really Tasty and Delassus. I has happy with my stay at the Hotel.  Thank you for the best experience.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rajesh Bhatt
Detailed Review: Zoheb and Mehreen,Paresh,VIjay,Rajesh other staffs in premises including other working departments help in a decent way.  Dr Waqas and Mr Sarfaraz helped me during my stay for medical assistance. Thank you Rajesh Bhatt

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Arpit Gupta
Review: Good Hotel, comes with great food!!
Detailed Review: Great hotel which features one of the best restaurants in city - Momo Cafe. Stayed for ~15 odd days. Every day of the week they have different cuisines in buffet - which makes sure you do not get bored of the constant hotel food. Service, Staff etc are the best.   Rooms quality might need a bit of touch up as compared to other hotels in city. Overall, you won’t be disappointed

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rvee koma
Detailed Review: It was pleasure stay in Holyday inn Hotel.i have styed ther in for 1month.Good house keeping nd cleanlines always super.The staff was good.nd specially Mr.Ramzan was helpfull person..if i have a chance i gojng to visit again..

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: FAHEEM K
Detailed Review: had a perfect week stay, with polite staff and fast room services, food was good and hygienic. Well sanatized rooms and proper precaution taking staff.  Airport pickup facility managed by wasim is good.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Pardeep K
Review: Houskeeping and all services are too good
Detailed Review: Housekeeping persons are performing duty well specially  Shivam Sood is performing his duty very well and very friendly. Hotel is good room is good and hygine maintained. Good hygenic food.  Thanks Holiday Inn

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Pankaj kishlay
Review: A very warm and helpful  support team, recommend to people for staying in
Detailed Review: Had a very comfortable 7 days stay here ,  Few highlights of my stay is a really good  in room dining service , really helpful staff, and a really delicious food to offer .  The hotel overall is very good and neat and clean.  Food served is really full of flavors and are not very over priced . Support team is really really good . Location of hotel also easily accessible.   Thanks for a great stay here , special praise to ashish paudishi from in room dining .

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Angad sahani
Detailed Review: We had to come for a medical check in Mumbai  and had to stay close to the domestic airport. My wife had come to Mumbai few years back and she had stayed at the orchid and had a pleasant stay , so we decided to stay here itself. As we entered the hotel we were not very happy as we found the lobby empty and the air conditioning was off. But sooner we realised why. We stayed in there club room facing the airport. The rooms are very neat and very spacious. I must stay the staff of the orchid is just exceptional. They really take care of your needs and your requirements. I was extremely happy with the food though it was fixed meal in trays delivered to our room. We stayed for two days but enjoyed ourselves well. Congrats the orchid and all the best

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Kavita
Detailed Review: It was a two day stay to Mumbai and we had to stay during this pandemic times for a cuple of days . We chose to stay at The Orchid Mumbai . I must say we really enjoyed the stay. Clean neat spacious rooms. Good Lenin. And the icing was the good warm staff. We enjoyed the days spend there.and during my stay met Varun in the lift who told us that we should try there restaurant in the lobby and I must say it was a good decision by is. Awesome food , good variety and very tasty. The best was how these boys took care of all the social distancing and served us . The restaurant had many customers and I could see all were attended very well. I am sure when all goes fine I will surely come back again here

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Varun
Detailed Review: I was traveling with my family from dubai and had to quarentine in mumbai for three days . My friends had suggested me Orchid to stay in. I am new to Mumbai and I must say I made the right decision. As I was with my small daughter I was quiet scared in choosing a hotel to stay in such circumstances. I was quiet amazed to see how clean and hygienic the hotel lobby was when I entered. Yes it was not light well which i can understand. But the staff was very polite and asked us about our journey which was very touching. The rooms are spacious and clean. The Lenin was up to mark and the boys who attended us were very polite and concerned. The food was fixed trays but quiet good in taste .  In all I had a wonderful stay with my family. Highly recommended.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Terry Travasso
Detailed Review: Our time at the hotel was excellent. Despite the COVID situation, We were comforted that all precautions were taken care of and adhered to by each and every staff of the hotel. I.e. Public spaces like elevators were well sanitized and the staff wore masks at all times.   Although our stay was short, we had a relaxing yet productive time and were extremely delighted by how well we were taken care of by each and everyone at the hotel, especially by our butler Vineet Pai. If we needed him, he was always a phone call away (one WhatsApp message away). He was beyond exceptional and looked after us right from pre check-in till the time we checked out, catering to all our needs.   The food, although slightly limited, was great. And the staff at the restaurant were warm and pleasant. The…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Nik
Detailed Review: Stayed at the St Regis this past week for a few days, i always stay there when in mumbai its the best location with amazing rooms and great food. The standout though is the service! These guys take it to the next level, The Butler service is above and beyond anything i've ever experienced. I've stayed at several st regis and ritz properties globally, the service here is honestly beyond compare We were taken care of by Vijay chauhan and Tarun Bhatt, these guys took care of our every need with speed and attention to detail and kept in touch throughout our stay via whatsapp for anything we needed can't say enough about them. The manager of the hotel Aswati was awesome as well she checked in on us and took care of our every need, when we had a small plumbing issue in our suite she…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: krmilind
Detailed Review: It was an awesome stay. During tough COVID-19 times hotel has taken utmost care and ensured safety of the guests. My Buttler Vineet Pai was very helpful and ensured we were comfortable. Even our Vehicle driver Suresh was very professional and kind and humble. Every one did an excellent job.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Harshvardhan Gupta
Detailed Review: I had the displeasure to stay at this establishment for a night.  The stay started with them confiscating a portable speaker from my luggage for no apparent reason, something that has literally never happened at any other hotel on the planet for me. They also only had 1 elevator working for some reason so you had to wait an eternity to move between the hotel.  Then moving onto the worst part of the entire stay, the food. Dinner was downright inferior having ordered the fried rice and vegetables. We had informed our steward about this and had decided to order a simple margarita. After 35 minutes we were graced with something that looked like a pizza but instead was a cream cracker biscuit lathered in awful mozzarella and store bought tomato sauce, it was close to inedible. To the…

Even though my plans to reside at the St.Regis was regarding quarantining myself and was made at the last minute the staff namely, Tarun and Suman welcomed me and made sure the check-in process went through smoothly. The hospitality demonstrated by all members of the staff had got me overwhelmed.   Furthermore, the room and food service provided by the hotel has set the bar of my expectations to a totally different level. Tarun followed up with me to check that everything was working out well given the quarantine situation and could not have asked for a more friendlier staff.   Everything about the…

Detailed Review: Very overwhelmed by the hospitality witnessed at Regis and I am glad that I chose to celebrate my birthday there . Chef Pradeep was very kind and was very engaging with all customers and made us feel special . Can’t wait to visit again.

Name: Dhruv
Detailed Review: St.Regis is by far the best hotel in India . I am glad that we chosed the hotel to celebrate my wifes birthday . Firstly a special mention to Karan & Siddharth from Butlers to taking care of the sanitary & hygine & making us feel so warm & Special .  Special shout out to Chef Dane for the most amazing food we have had in a longest time . Chef Pradeep  was kind enough to meet & greet everyone personally during the breakfast . We had herd a lot abt the croissants & they live up to the exectation . Will be visiting again only for the food by Chef Dane & Croissants by Pradeep Chef .

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ronit B
Review: The Best Address and very much so
Detailed Review: Over the course of our courtship, my wife and I have stayed at pretty much every major hotel in the city of Mumbai–barring, maybe, two. I'm happy to say I've had excellent stays each time and have given 5 star ratings multiple times but visiting St. Regis was such an immense joy, I feel like going back and changing every other 5 star review to 4.5 stars. St. Regis really elevated what a 5 star experience at a 5 star hotel is.   The booking, to start with, was quick and friendly and Rohit helped me through the process and we had a room decided on within minutes. No long waits while listening to muzak here.   Check-in was a breeze as well and we were introduced to Mr. Shawn who was ever-present for us throughout the stay. For anything, small or big, there wasn't a thing we…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Yash
Detailed Review: Where do I begin? The staff is so courteous, always on their feet and make sure your stay is the worth it.  The hotel itself has taken such good measures during COVID-19- from sanitisation stations everywhere to making sure social distancing is maintained wherever you are in the hotel.  Special mention to Suman at the front-desk who helped me upgrade my room at a short notice. It’s so worth it! They definitely respect your time and money as an institution.  The service - 101/10! The food - 101/10! Everything else - 101/10!  I couldn’t be happier with my stay.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Varun1992
Detailed Review: We recently had the experience of staying at the hotel and it was beyond exceptional. The entire team lead by Dhruv and Kiran gave us the best experience possible. Right from the welcome to the room to the food prepared specially for us were all perfect to help us escape from the world for a couple of days.   The hotel has also curated a few experiences such as evening snacks with games/ live cooking to keep the guests engaged in light of the other amenities being non operational.   Also the entire staff adheres to the COVID 19 guidelines and it’s extremely safe to stay at the hotel.   Since we are also from Mumbai, We can say that it’s must stay if someone is looking for a short staycation.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Raj
Detailed Review: We had an amazing time. It was one of the best stays I have had in years. Everything was just perfect. We totally loved the hospitality. We would absolutely recommend him and his team. Cheers

I’ve seen them well engaged with guests and helping everyone as much as possible even at times When some guests were…

The staff members were pleasant, friendly & welcoming. We were allocated great rooms - 2018 & 2019 on the 20th floor.  Although we had to stay cooped up  inside our rooms for the duration of our stay, the spectacular view from our windows was a lovely experience & prevented any feeling of boredom or claustrophobia. The wifi is good, quite fast & we had a relaxing time bingeing on netflix shows. The food was good & we would like to express our heartfelt gratitude to the chef for providing the meals according to our special requests. I wouldn't say that there were no hiccups or lapses but we loved the fact…

I would definitely recommend all my viewers to visit St. Regis and experience luxury at least once for any of their special occasions.  For Customized Food Menu : Contact – Ms. Urmi (Food &…

Name: Manoj K
Review: One of the best hotels near the domestic airport
Detailed Review: This is my umpteenth visit to The Orchid Hotel . I stayed there 2 times in June and July. Literally a stones throw from the domestic airport, The Orchid is best value for money proposition in my opinion. The hospitality is unmatched and I always feel it is a home away from home for me. The newly renovated rooms are very cozy and comfortable ( I still prefer the rooms from the main wing) , spotlessly clean. The hotel has prepared well for the Covid19 pandemic and all the precautions are taken to make you safe. Food is excellent and service full of warmth. Gauri, Deepika and Kunal at the front desk, Welesly , Harshad in Vindhya's and Chef Bala all make your stay a memorable one. Highly recommended !!

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv

Detailed Review: I was at the orchid Mumbai during last 3 days of this month. Due to the lockdown  scenario the hotel has cut down their services which are otherwise well looked after. However, the hotel staff do their best to make their guests as comfortable as possible. A special mention about a boy in the housekeeping department named Yogesh Bodke whose care and concern really touched my heart, it took great care of my requirements keeping in mind my age and physical needs. In short, I can honestly declare - The Orchid Stands HIGH for its hospitality in the Hotel Industry. South of vindhayas the only restaurant open as of now serves excellent food and Good service as well.

It's an ultimate place to stay at a budget with Five Star facilities. His Holiness Dalai Lama has decided to grace this hotel with his presence, when he was returning from Kumbh Mela in Nashik.  The Orchid is a part of Dr. Vithal Kamat's Group of Hotels. This is Asia's first 5 star Ecotel Hotel in Mumbai. India's pioneer & premier economically sensitive Chain of Hotels.  This Hotel has won more than 90 International & National awards. One of India's home grown hospitality chain.  The 372 rooms and suites offer guests fabulous experience of great food, comfort & hospitality..  All around covered with fresh dense…

Good ambiance. Clean and spacious room. Fancy bathroom with a bathtub, a shower room and wash basin. Complementary wifi. TV with many channels working. I enjoyed my stay there.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Bhavna Darira Chesan
Detailed Review: We celebrated my husband’s birthday at regis mumbai recently....initially we were concerned about the safety standards due to the ongoing pandemic but felt extremely safe as soon as we entered regis and also during our stay here we saw how well the hygiene standards were being maintained ... all the facilities and services were excellent... would like to thank anamika for arranging a wonderful surprise cake and decor for the birthday ... kavita for checking us in and upgrading our room...lavina from the room dining department for great food and quick service... mr Akshay who made us try a delicious tea and had a great conversation with us during breakfast he was very friendly and helpful...kuddos to you guys keep it up ... thank you to all the chefs for making us try delicious…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: zeenia c
Detailed Review: I was quarantined in the hotel for 8 days after coming back from Abu Dhabi & the staff made me feel at home.They were very understanding & helpful especially during this pandemic. A big thank you to Chef Shardul and his in room dining team Ms.Farah & Mr.Dhananjay to cater my smallest requests and make me happy. Mr Rendell at the concierge was also very courteous and the front desk team. I would strongly recommend this hotel especially for quarantine as it is very clean and precautions are taken from time to time.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: sanjay a
Detailed Review: Very good hotel.i stayed 15 days for quarantine. Very clean and neat condition. Hotel staffs are very cooperative.  Mr.paresh from reception has helped me a lot for getting me everything what I required in my quarentine period. I don't feel alone because of these people. I would suggest everyone to have stay in this hotel and enjoy good food, excellent hotel facilities. Thanks to VITS.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Namaste Mumbai
Detailed Review: Was quarantined at Vits, Mumbai. The place is super clean and sevice was fantastic. The staff treats guests v well. We enjoyed the food . Veg thali was excellent..I noted down the name of the Chef and wiring this review specially as an appreciation for Chef Prahalad.  Alu bhendi.dal palak.jeera Pulo, salad.,moong dal halwa,chapatis were suoer yummy..

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Kesha
Detailed Review: It's one of the amazing hotel the food is excellent over the hospitality is really very good the rooms are excellent it is just next to International Airport you must take a stay in this hotel just love this place

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Harsha T
Review: A very good job done during Covid times
Detailed Review: The hotel staff have done a great job during the tough Covid times. This was when India and especially Mumbai had the peak of Covid 19 cases. The support from staff and at the same time though limited but good food was served during my stay here. It was a very good experience.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Aman
Detailed Review: I stayed for a week in quarantine in the hotel.  Very caring staff,  very clean rooms, excellent food service.  Each meal each day were very nice, different variety of daal,  sabzi, salad. In all very healthy food served.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ramneek Bhasin
Detailed Review: I did a part of my quarantine at this property in a suite on the 5th floor overlooking the airport. From 22nd June to 27th June. The check-in was quick and the room was very spacious.  I did not expect so much space in a Mumbai hotel so I was pleasantly surprised. The alleyways were dimly lit which I fail to understand why but once inside the suite things were different. Good quality furniture, quite classy interior. The room was quite, bed was great. The view made the otherwise boring quarantine bearable as I could see flights landing and taking off all the time. Special mention for the Executive chef Navid who went above and beyond. Meals were always great. He was happy to send Kadha, turmeric tea, fruits or even adrak shahad in these extraordinary times.   The two things that…

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Biju
Detailed Review: The Orchid Hotel..  Don’t be put off by the drive to this lovely  hotel. We were warmly welcomed and our accommodation was very comfortable.The staff were very helpful and accommodating, the food was generous and the outlook of the hotel is a delight.  A special thanks to chef Naveed for the awesome food.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Pankaj Yadav
Detailed Review: I stayed at the orchid mumbai during covid-19 it was safe stay.The staff is exceptional Room dining staff  Mr.Amit verma and Mr.Jagganath is very polite and friendly.Thank u so much for your service.food and service outstanding in this time.room was clean m tidy.All the staff is very polite.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Divesh
Detailed Review: We stayed during the covid-19 padnemic after coming back from abroad..it was a good stay with orchid hotel.Very thankful to Amit verma he provided great service to us and ready to help us when we ask for anything really good job done by him we always remember this stay and helpful boy keep it up.Food was good as well as stay.Rooms is ok.All the staff is very polite.Thank u team Orchid hotel mumbai..

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: chandrashekar r... c
Detailed Review: Mitesh has provided great service all the time and he's following hygiene standard,always if request any coffee and tea sachets I will provide quick service,great staff of orchid hotels,This quarantine period he provided good service.

Detailed Review: Good service about all. Room nd other services. Good food provided by orchid. Thanks for the chef. Specially thanks for mitesh. Excellent work. Fast service.  Thank you orchid team.good job guys.thank you.

Name: Rohith
Detailed Review: Mitesh kotian would the name I would definitely remember. This are harsh times we were locked onboard for a long time and finally we came home, we were asked for 7-day isolation, the service and hospitality were commendable. Thank you 😊

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
