Detailed Review: One of the best place i visited ever ,today that is 12 jun 2020 i checked in at that time Mitesh from Housekeeping had a great help for me,he helped me for my luggage very polite and humble staff i have seen ever,i also belongs to a a hotel bagground and as a hotelier

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Shridaya
Detailed Review: After 3 month being on ship atlast we reached india on 2 June thinking what will be the situation over here but it was outstanding to see people so friendly as we reached The Orchid Hotel...the staff were very helpful..we did not have to que in the line in the reception we were well directed to our rooms as we were very tired. Rooms were clean and tidy ..food was excellent ...staff was polite helpful and friendly...felt like we were at home...shashenk and his team were outstanding and very helpful...keep it up Orchid team Miss u all   Take care

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Samson thokchom
Detailed Review: I would like to thank all the staff of the hotel. Some names which I remember are Weysil, Gauri, Nadeem, Kunal, Himanshu & Sanjeev The stay was comfortable and they’re always ready to help in any situation. And some photos of meals which I took. And I really enjoyed it.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Vinit Rao
Detailed Review: During this unprecedented global crisis a total of 219 Indian Crew had a healthy and safe stay at The Orchid Mumbai. The entire staff took personal care of each and every crew member who had not seen their family for more than 90 days. The rooms were very neat and hygienic, staff were pleasant,there was no delay of delivering food[BLD] to all the rooms. After an Epic journey to India we were welcomed by the staff at the airport, transfer and then to the reception. Even though we arrived late at the airport with 219 crew there were no delay in checkin process with great experience leading by Anshul and his staff. Anshul ensured all the crew were accomodated and his staffing with Gauri,Hemant,Sanjeev,Wesley and the entire team were phenomenal. Special thanks and kudos to the chef…

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv

Detailed Review: Hotel services are very good The persons on the receptionist Name pradip and Himanshu Paresh and all the staff ha given very good Services the hotel interior n all the things were attractive we had pleasant stay in hotel vits Mumbai Thank alot keep maintain the same for everyone good bye tk cr all

Mr. Pradeep/ Mr.Deepak/ Mr.Pillai/ Mr.Chirag and Mr. Sopan / Mr. Praveen/ Mr. Himanshu/ Chef Mr.Sandeep Mrs. Sushma (Operator).  Specially Mr.Pradeep has been very helpful. Detailed Review: Good experience while quarantine.  House keeping staff: Manish, Asha, Usha, Sandeep, Pramila.   F&B staff: Vishal, Wasim, Asvjeet Also the other staff Pradeep, and deepak, Santosh.  Really appreciate your help.🙏

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Selwyn
Detailed Review: Hi,My name is selwyn Pereira I had a stay in this hotel,This is 1of the kind of hotel u wish to come back again.As of for the first night when we checkin was abit hussle,bcz it was around 100an above seaman crew(ship) which came in at the same time.It was hard for them but they welcome us with a positive attitude.But the nxt day the staff was so help full it all started from the the top the Hotel General manager visited each an every room to find out how was everything an was there anything else they could do.The service was more then my expectation everythg was so quick an organised from the food the chief cooked,roomservice guys delivery the food, housekeeping taking of the room ,front office was so kind an was easy to approach ,The 7days of quarantine in this hotel (VITZ)was…

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: SURAJ SAHA
Detailed Review: It is an amazing experience staying here in VITS hotel, Mumbai. All staff the worked hard to fulfill our requirements and tried to provide excellent services (Housekeeping and F & B. Thank you Pradeep for helping us in personalized manner. Overall it was a comfortable stay. Also I would like to thank the General Manager, Security Manager for our personal care.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Prasad
Detailed Review: I would like thank VITS Hotel for accommodating us in this difficult situation. I would also like to thank GM and the Management of the hotel who r working in front and back of the house. I personally had excelent experience staying here. Food which was been served was also excellent. The entire staff was very polite and helpful. starting right from the gate of the hotel till the room we got warm welcome and excellent service. Detailed Review: Hi guys myself Girish bhatt first time in VITS hotel mumbai having great experience with very helpful understanding staff and good food i like to come again in this hotel with my friends for parties and to have lots of fun and the staff from bellbox pradeep & deepak was very polite and helpful i m taking great memories with me

Detailed Review: Hotel was very nice...staff was very friendly and stay is soo good mr pradeep and dipak was very helpful and supportive mr.rajiv also suppoter housekeeping service is awesome location was perfect with the nice quality food..

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Clyde
Review: Keep up the excellent work that you have been doing during these unforseen time. God blesd all the staff of VITS
Detailed Review: Excellent stay, the service provided from the staff was exceptional and won the hearts of the crew that was quartine. The staff made us feel like home away from home. Special thanks to Pradeep Himanshu and Deepak from front office that coordinated with different request and services they also checked on us everyday if all was fine. The boy who took our temp checks. The lady at the room service, the boy that delivered food and the housekeeping staff, they all were wonderful, prompt and service oriented. GM of the hotel Mahesh, Rajee from FOM, Shabir from Accounts and also the security that ensured that social distancing is maitained. We all came out negative and now are going home but thank you for welcoming us in your home.  For travellers this is a wonderful hotel close to the…

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: avinash c
Detailed Review: Excellent Hotel  AllStaff is very friendly and helpful Specially very thankful to Bell Desk Staff Mr. Pradeep very supportive and Special thanks to Housekeeping team and Restaurants team very helpful property is very well sanitized and food service is done with poper food higiene followed

Detailed Review: comfortable stay  in my quarantine period with great service provided by the VITS family .Excellent Staff ,Excellent Service-room service/housekeeping and all .well hygiene maintained and neat and clean.polite and helpful management . Room Service Team Member -Mr Tanka from Nepal is very helpfull all the time. thanks to all. regards, room-104

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: sky
Detailed Review: Recently visited mumbai & had to quarantine .  The staff here provided me with everything that I needed.  A special mention about the kitchen staff who prepared very tasty food..loved it .  The service is prompt.  Hotel is well maintained, very spic and span.  Very tasty food & good service.  Highly recommended hotel if you visit Mumbai.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Jackson Dias
Detailed Review: Was an extraordinary plesent experience to stay at the property during time of pandemic Time,healthy vegetarian menu.being the first guests after the lock down opened in Mumbai,was not sure what would be the standards but they surprisingly astonished with their hospitality. All the best for a new adventure.. Stay positive Vits Mumbai, thank you.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Neel
Review: Great Support staff(from Chef to Captains to Front Desk to House Keeping)
Detailed Review: Great Support staff(from Chef to Captains to Front Desk to House Keeping).  It's been a great experience staying here. Thank You team for all exemplary support provided during these tough times.  Staff includes Sameera, Dashrat, Chef etc....  BIG THANK YOU AGAIN!  See you soon!

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Jessica L
Detailed Review: This hotel has gone over the top to ensure our safety during COVID-19 lockdown in Mumbai India. The level of customer service has been unparalleled during this trying time. We are very grateful and appreciate the impeccable environment and service.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ranz
Detailed Review: I returned from sydney and got stuck in mumbai due to lockdown. The hotel took a very good care of me with keeping the surroundings hygenic and also provided us tasty food. Below are some the highlights I wanted to mention:-   1) House keeping staff - they are very polite and helpful. They did not hesitate to keep our rooms clean with proper safety. I seriously appreciate them and had fun talking to them. Special thanks to Sagar, Azeez, deepak and Sandeep.  2) Momo Cafe - It was about three months I had indian food. I felt that taste of home food and it was made possible by chef. Even in this lockdown, they used to take good care of me with protein rich and delicious food. Even the serving staff is amazing, they used to try everything hard from their side to make us comfortable…

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Yuvraj Singh
Review: Best hotel to stay in Mumbai. Stayed here in Lockdown.
Detailed Review: I always visit Mumbai for transit or on business trips. This was the first time i chose to stay in courtyard Marriott. I must say that the staff is full of knowledge and they make sure to do the best to make your stay pleasant. I would like to appreciate & say thanks to few people who made this stay memorable. Special mentions to Darshan Rane, Siddhart,Abhijeet ,Dashrath , Chef Santosh & chef Tejas. Darshan is one of the most soft spoken people we have met. He is always ready to help. Long way to go Darshan. The house keeping staff is amazing.thanks for keeping the room clean and hygienic. Thanks - Sagar,Azeez,Deepak & Sandeep. The Front office staff - Sayali, Sameera  -Good work guys. Apologies to those whose name I forgot. Shout out to the Amazing team of Courtyard Marriott.…

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: MichaelYang888
Review: Great service and location and clean casual rooms
Detailed Review: Simple but comfortable rooms and classic Holiday inn service, Location close to the airport and great if you need to be there,Surrounding area has some shops but is not exactly a tourist destination. Breakfast and lunch options were great, with a variety of Indian as well as international food on offer. Superb roti and curry selections which were delicious, Recommended if you need to be in this area.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Kesha
Detailed Review: This is one of the nice Hotel whenever you visit Mumbai you must take a stay in this hotel rooms are very good aur is very good I give a big Thumbs up to this hotel  staff  is very good like this hotel ....

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: AtMa
Review: Waste of your $, terrible hotel management, lacks the most basic asset of hospitality "Warmth"
Detailed Review: I've been stuck in Bombay due to this COVID situation. Changed to this hotel for some change in scenery and energy. 10 days of being there were the most draining few days during these times. The hotel was virtually empty with less than 5% occupancy which made it easier to realize how it's being run. Just for the record, I am a Marriott Gold at the moment, was platinum was many years before this, and have stayed at Mariott properties worldwide for work and pleasure.  Nick Dumbell, the GM, genuinely does a good job checking on his guests and making sure they've been looked after. However, he does need to rely on his team which in my experience, was unwelcoming, arrogant, and discourteous.  Their Hotel Manager "Siddharth Satay" and their Sales guy "Saurabh" are perfect examples of…

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Tejas Raval
Review: Comfortable Stay at Courtyard by Marriott
Detailed Review: I was on 2 days business conference to Mumbai in early March. This time I picked up to stay at Courtyard by Marriott. It was a very pleasant stay.  Room was just perfect as I had mentioned while booking. Food was awesome and had great time at buffet dinner and breakfast too. Staff lived upto Marriott hospitality.   I would recommend  this hotel for sure for stay in Mumbai.   Regards  Tejas Raval

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: FMR40
Detailed Review: We stayed at the Courtyard for one night only whilst waiting for a flight home to the UK.  We arranged with the hotel for an airport pick up due to the coronvirus escalting and thought they would be cleaner and therefore safer.  On check in we were told that due to an event taking place we would not be able to use the bar or resturant. I do wish I had have been told that in advance as I would have probably booked elsewhere as due to the outside area being not open we just had to sit in our room.  We therefore just used room service for our evening meal which was nice but would have been nice to have the option.  Left prior to breakfast being served so cannot comment on that at all

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Traveller1003
Detailed Review: We were only here for 7 hours having flown in from Mumbai before our flight back to UK.  The breakfast staff were superb, especially Khushbu and Chef Tejus and made it into a memorable, if brief, stay.  I will mention that the glass wall between the bathroom and bedroom was very disconcerting before we found the roller blind!  Even after 48 years of marriage I don't really want to wake up and see my husband on the toilet! Don't think this is an improvement on the usual set up in hotels worldwide.  Thank you

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Steven M
Detailed Review: A big shout to this place Momo Cafe!! Special thanks to Vinod and team for amazing service and delicious food.. had been here with friends and will come back for sure. One of the best restaurant that we have come across.. Cheers!!

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: teressa g
Review: Stay at Courtyard Mumbai International Airport Hotel
Detailed Review: So I have to give a shout out to the Courtyard by Marriott in Mumbai. The service was absolutely amazing. The staff went above and beyond for us. I wanted to get henna on my hand. Not only did the hostess, Khushbu, tell me where to go but she gave me her personal cell phone number in case we got lost... and we did get lost. So we gave the Uber driver her number. She told the Uber driver where we were trying to go so we made it to our destination. The next day we tried to book reservations for the Holi festival at Taj Ends Land hotel and it wouldn’t allow me to book the reservation without an Indian number so we told Khushbu and she let us use her mobile number to reserve the tickets!! She was absolutely amazing. I have to talk about the Manager Abhijeet. He checked on us…

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: litalita21
Detailed Review: I love this hotel. The staff was amazing and tentative to all my needs. FOOD was to die for if you love spicy food. Shout out to the Chief Tejas and the host Khushbu for the amazing tips and suggestions for tours and outings in the town. If you are ever in India Mumbai come to this hotel.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Lokesh Agre
Detailed Review: The hotel staff is co-operative. its a good place to have a small conference..the food is damm tasty..its nearby to airport..i was having only 2 hour to do my setup, but the hotel staff allowed me to dump my luggage early, thats help me to do my setup on time..I am very thankful to the banquet staff @vinit patil,pradeep,kunal,kevin,jason..

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: M K Agarwal
Review: amazing and wonderful stay, beyond expectation
Detailed Review: what shall i say, always full of surprises. A home away from home, the staff Pranali, Umesh, Sameera and one person in Lounge has been very supportive, had been taking care of everything required by me. even in ODD Hours they had been diligently catering to my needs. Wonderful staying there.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Anil P
Detailed Review: This hotel provides standard clean comfortable hotel services. Room service was quick, the bags were brought up quickly. However, our meal at Ummrao was amazing flavors and service by Shivkumar! Equally amazing was the manager of the Ummrao, provided an awesome relaxing few hours!

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Saloni Mathure
Detailed Review: This is by far one of the best bars I’ve been to. They’ve a very elaborate menu. The drinks options are enough to satisfy you.  The ambience of the place is also very classy. The staff is very friendly too.   Drinks: Concubine’s kiss Shiny sapphire   Both the drinks were absolutely delicious. Without a doubt, they’re are my fav cocktails ever.  Starters: Fish n Chips  The fish and chips is apparently one of the recommended dishes here and I can tell why. The fish is delicious. Especially with the dip. This is surely a must try dish here.  Mains:  Nash Goreng  This is an amazing looking and delicious dish. It has rice, egg and chicken on the plate and tasted deliciousssssss.  Overall, had a very nice ambience and the food is delicious too. One major pointer is that it was very…

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: ZenHealer7
Detailed Review: You cannot get a better location than this hotel in Bombay, surrounded by some of the largest slums and shanty houses all around and bang in the middle of an area that is teeming and bursting with humanity. I stayed here a few years ago when there were no roads to approach the hotel. In response to my review, the then GM wrote that the road work will be completed "soon" pending the metro work. The metro is all done and working. However, there is still no signs of any roads to approach the hotel from any direction. The airport is just 2Km away and it could take you up to an hour to reach the hotel. In the process you will break every bone in your body. It is a shame that an international chain like HI chooses to locate itself in such an atrocious location.  When you check in you…

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: MJS
Detailed Review: This was my first stay with Holiday Inn Mumbai International Airport Hotel.  I can happily say that they are one of the best in the business. Attributes like Hygiene, Security & Ambience were second to none. Everyone from Security Guard to Bellboy were upto the mark.  I would like to make a special mention about the Guest Relations Executive Heena Kanoor. Very cordial, polite and dilligent at the sametime. Unlike many it was not just an assurance from her, but she promtly helped me to ensure a hasslefree stay. It is the Professionals like Heena who are taking the Customer Service of the Holiday Inn to the Next Level!  Great Stay & Great Staff. Looking forward to stay with them again and would recommend to my colleagues and clients.  Thanks and keep up the good work.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Miss Prachi
Detailed Review: The morning breakfast buffet was really very yumm..... Chef ARIF QURESHI i really appreciate your positive attitude, Continue with the same spirit. A truly geniune person who has gone always an extra mile in the efforts to showcase what hospitality truly is. Thankyou Chef Arif😀

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: SUBASH D
Detailed Review: It is very nice service and I had great time. Room and food also very nice with minimum cost...  Thanks you very much. And special thanks to Ram Zam. Tushar and jafar...  We will visit again when we will come back

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Bhagawati
Detailed Review: Friendly ambience. Good people.fresh food served hot. Helping nature. Chef Tiwariji was very helpful in selecting of food and guiding me regarding trying new options in live kitchen. Karan internship trainee was good. Baliram was of great help.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: sharjoshi
Review: Amazing stay with amazing fnb manager Mr. Vijay Deshmukh
Detailed Review: We stayed at hotel for 2 nights and we really experienced best Indian hospitality from all the staff of holiday inn and the best was from Mr. Vijay Deshmukh. Amazing cheerful and very helpful fnb manager.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rah
Detailed Review: The food was amazing and the chef ghanshyam tiwari  was very friendly he use to come and talk to us every morning at breakfast make sure that we were comfortable and everything was okay with our breakfast, he made our stay very welcoming and we felt at home

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Hiral Vyas
Review: It is very awesome and delicious food.
Detailed Review: The food is very delicious and the service is also pleasent and very helpful staff. Even the staff people are kind. The Today's head chef Ghanshyam Tiwari is at is best and with all great services.  It is the nest. Thank you..!!

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: harsh j
Detailed Review: The buffet at the hotel has ample amount of choices to choose from. The variety is unimaginable and the food is absolutely yum. Moreover the people here are an absolute delight, very courteous and helpful. I had breakfast here and i was helped by Ghanshyam Tiwari. Pretty genuine and helpful and so nice to talk to. I wish him and his team the best of luck and I hope they keep this good thing going.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Jessica
Detailed Review: I had a pleasant stay for one night here at Holiday Inn International Mumbai.  The team helped me since the moment my car rolled into the hotel. In addition, to everything Tushar, Jaffar and Ramzan have helped us a lot. They didn't even make me hold a single thing as they provided great service of doing everything themselves. When we needed extra room service it was provided instantly also. Thank you and hope to be back soon!

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Louis
Detailed Review: It was great experience in Holiday inn Mumbai specailly have great experience and hospitable staff like to appreciate the restaurant staff Sumit,Tushant,Rajesh,Chung,Nasib,Sunil,Sachin like to visit again in Holiday.. Thanks for great service.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Beryi
Detailed Review: Being at Saptami feels like being at home. Their service, ambience, staff are very hard workers. Esp Rajesh, Sumit, tushant,Henry, Sacchin, Amisha, Heena, Romeo, Atul, Abhijeet. What a staff, always smiling. Esp me a PIA and they served us with smile. Never once said no. Thank u every for gr8 food and great service.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ashok
Detailed Review: Hotel holiday inn Mumbai near by airport very good property and chef all staf was very good breakfast was very good dinner and lunch was very good and very helpful parson chef ghanshyam tiwari my family was very happy thanks chef tiwari

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Shinghrahul
Detailed Review: Very nice property holiday Inn Mumbai ho tel near by air port and sakinaka  and great breakfast and lunch and dinner what service does ghanshyam Tiwari serve? After seeing the man goes to the square really very nice boy.thanku Mr Tiwari

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Namaste Mumbai
Detailed Review: Hotel is clean,  beautiful and amazing.  All staff were welcoming and room were cleant so well that you don't feel experience any unpleasantness.  I appreciate the room service by them. I also like to recommend this place for those who are looking out for hotel that they can feel relaxed. The swimming pool at rooftop is nicely clean and well maintained.  All food cuisines were very delicious with made of good quality ingredients.  I was impressed with the food variety at buffet.  Mumbai is full of traffic problems  and if you stay at far off locations, there is much possibility that you may reach to the airport very late, staying here , you will have no anxiety of reaching the airport on time, this hotel is very close by.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Shan N
Detailed Review: Wow what are amazing experience I got at "72 restaurant". What are amazing place it was_exact Imagination of my Mind.I recently visited this place for having my Dinner. This beautiful place located in Holiday inn hotel  behind the sakinaka metro station Ambiance of this place is eye catchy unique big and so interesting in one word of this place amazing  drinks Lover they has a bar counter as well. ⭐ Beverages:-  #Choclate milk Shake #Virgin Mojito ( Both the Beverages are mind-blowing and very chilled, Nicely Garnished and perfect use of Flaouvr in each drink's )   ⭐Food:- Starter - # Chakori chandi Tikka  #Fish & chips :- Two big piece of fish deeply fired in oil served with Mayonise and potatoes fries Both starter are very nice and well decorated.  ⭐Main course :-  🍕Chicken…

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: aabadi
Detailed Review: A little cheaper than the JW Marriott, but not half as good. Barely any foreigners there. I guess I was the last to find out.  Don’t get me wrong, it’s a decent hotel, but just doesn’t meet the standards of an international 5-star hotel.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Edward H
Detailed Review: The breakfast was good: hash browns that really were hash browns rather than a local interpretation; a vegetable omelette done properly…  The interior has visual appeal. It isn’t just the lobby but also the well between floors.  A free newspaper in the morning is also a nice touch.  But… A small beer, two small bowls of curry from the buffet, each no bigger than a lady’s fist, and a bowl of rice the same size for £28. That is blatant robbery and they had no other eatery available.  The roof-top bar was not serving and all photographs from there are banned, which seems crazy when its right next to an airport and there were parakeets in a nearby tree.   Room service is unusually slow.  I was moved from my original room to another wing because of Covid-19.  When I complained,…

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sweden
Detailed Review: Wonderful service Special appreciation for Depika from the guest relations Neol from the airport services along with alfredrose  These people are real assets to your hotel Keep up the good work and best of luck

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sikander Singh
Detailed Review: I stayed for 4 nights from 11/3/2020 - 18/3/2020. Checked in and checked out 3 times, as I had to be in and out of Mumbai for business.  One of the front desk staff, Urvashi, surprised me by upgrading me to the club floor for the last night of my stay. She was very gracious and professional in her approach.  The only drawback is that I hope that this hotel offer more corporate discounts to the frequent travellers.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Puneet Gera
Detailed Review: Property is good, But rooms need to renovate. Thanks for the Free upgradation to Executive room  but i find Deluxe Better than executive rooms. Executive rooms are good if you have any business Meeting.  Overall Good Stay and Food is also Good. Free Shuttle to Domestic airport

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Krzysztof
Detailed Review: The hotel is very comfortable. Service is excellent. Location is close to the airport. Rooms are very clean. Staff is very kind and helpful. Mr. Smith was especially helpful. He is very active and helps to solve the guest's problems.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Wouterkellerman
Detailed Review: As we came from South Africa we land at this beautiful hotel initially we were not aware of check in time and also not aware off outside food we met smith and rohit at reception and everything went on ease excellent service great work smith thankyou

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Desaip
Detailed Review: I had been staying this place more than a month as the service level are very high especially by Smith the lobby manager and by gauri very helpful and very kind.this ishome away from home all credit goes to entire front office Team

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Katarina S
Detailed Review: The first time stayed in this Hotel. Stayed for 5-6 night and had an Amazing experience. I felt welcomed when I arrived at the hotel and special thanks to Deepika from Guest relations as she been very helpful throughout my stay. My farewell was Amazing wd this special staffs. Also from housekeeping venkat and rajesh gamre was taking care of my room cleaning. viraj from service, pritam and whole team of mostly grillas who look after my food preferences.  Look forward to stay with the Orchid again.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sawar Sharma
Detailed Review: I am Group coordinator very good location and very good food also staff is very helpful duty manager Rohit Ms. Priya from operators Deepika and mehreen guest relations ensured everything was flawless thank you.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Anil
Detailed Review: I have being coming orchid for past 15 years . Excellent service good staff and very clean hotel . Rubina is always very good to us . I am pleased with my stay. Umar was very helpful with early checking . Deepika from guest relation excellent girl. Very helpful and also Rohit was very kind and helpful to me . I would like to recommend them for promotion.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Veena
Detailed Review: The whole experience with The Orchid had been wonderful. Right from the security guy greeting you Namaste to the Duty Manager Rohit. After a tiring journey I came to the hotel for check in and was informed that I am early for same but without any hassle the Duty Manager checked me in immediately as I was with a 5 year old kiddo. Mr. Aman the bell boy ensured that I am not waiting in the queue and Ms Fabiola was quick enough to clean the room and make us feel home. Would recommend this hotel to everyone and the service is what sets this hotel class apart. Kudos to the team

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Shrey Patel
Detailed Review: The Orchid Hotel is very nice eco friendly hotel. The check in was very smooth and Urvashi guided us very nicely for the check in. She was very humble and gave us the all requirements we required. Overall the experience was very good

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: ramchandra v
Detailed Review: I must say the hospitality is amazing the staff very supportive smith from front office very helpfull food at south off Vindhyas the food was amazing even dinner the food quality is excellent and very amazing

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Resham arora
Detailed Review: The check in experience is really nice 👍 The staff was very courteous and friendly . Specially Dipika from the reception and Rohit the duty Manager at Reception Area. It was out first visit and we are actually enjoying it at the fullest.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Kamal
Detailed Review: It has been been a wonderful stay and i would love to be here again and again."mostly grills" the rooftop bar is also a very good experiance.the staff was very courteous.Mr.smith one of the staff member is also very kind and was very helpful!

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: nikhiljain1984
Detailed Review: The checkins hospitality and staff especially Mr. Smith was really helpful and had a fast and express checkin.  The lobby of the hotel is excellent nd the approach to the hotel is best as it is near to airport snd situated in ville parle.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Mitravarssha
Detailed Review: There was a long queue at the registration desk when I arrived, I thought it’s going to be a long wait but Assistant Manager Mr Smith promptly took over and cleared my registration with such ease. I am very impressed and highly recommend the hotel for their hospitality, service and food.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Anna B
Detailed Review: A very good hotel with an amazing view of the airport. Supporting and helpful stuff including Anuja, Smith. Close to the airport good food nice ambiance good and clean rooms with crystal clear swimming pool

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Kajal S
Detailed Review: It was great having dinner here at boulevard..food was delicious !! And the executive harshada & akash were really helpful and customer oriented..they are really good with their work....!! Had a great time there & enjoyed my dinner...

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: sanchit b
Detailed Review: The property is very good I will be glad to visit this property again smith was very accommodating and very professional the ambiance of the restaurant very good food at mostly grilled I like the most

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: KamalLakhate
Detailed Review: Thanks for understanding  our need and upgrading us to  a bigger room. Staff Dattatray, Kunal along with Urvashi were really helpful while check in. Food at the restaurant  was very nice. Staff is very courteous. Once again thanks.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Menazs
Detailed Review: I and my husband celebrated our wedding reception on the roof top of orchid hotel, even though it has been 2 weeks to the function, our guests can’t stop praising the location, hospitality and food served by orchid. Post reception, we booked a room for two nights stay in orchid. Sonya Mane who is a part of the hotel staff in orchid, made sure that our stay was comfortable and memorable. She pampered us with confectioneries and balloons. She kept following up with us regularly during the stay and didn’t leave any stone unturned to make our stay pleasant. We would love to come back to Orchid Hotel in future.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Venunair
Detailed Review: Excellent work by team special recommendations to Wesley from concierge Mahesh mehreen from front desk lobby team Smith along with the smart gentleman Umar God bless you all it was wonderful experience

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Abhishek N
Detailed Review: Stopped by the hotel to relish hostalgic memories ! I remember coming to the hotel as a young kid, enjoying the Sunday brunch experiences at Boulevard.  Now my wife and I decided to stay here for a night to suit our morning flight the next day. The staff was exceptional with their hospitality - Rohit, Nadeem and Himanshu at the Front Desk were courteous at all times and made ensured a warm welcome always. The rooms may appear to be rustic and certain rooms appear to not have the best of a view - but that is mainly due to the location of the hotel among its adjoining premises. We also had lunch at the South of Vindhyas and the experience was exhilarating !! In all, it was a nostalgic feeling to come back and revisit the Orchid hospitality.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: nhyj
Detailed Review: Very nice neat & clean hotel. Friendly staff  especially the duty manager Mr Rohit & front desk Mr himanshu and Nadeem. Good ambience .Good food. Also have midnight buffet. Good location. Love this hotel so took membership also. Rates are reasonable but sometimes very high. It's a eco friendly hotel.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: DrMohanAgashe
Detailed Review: If you look for a long relationship with a hotel there is no option but The Orchid, Mumbai. If you don't believe me try it yourself. My experience started with Mayuri and Smith at the reception. It was the beginning of the Best!  Dr. Mohan Agashe, Actor-Doctor, Health & Media Consultant

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Munish
Detailed Review: All staff members are very helpful and polite. And are always ready to help customers.  Specially night duty manager Mr.Rohit is very helpful and his team too. Team members  Himanshu and nadeem.........

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Lawrence Davies
Detailed Review: Had a wonderful evening at The Orchid. Enjoyed Spending some quality time at Boulevard specially enjoyed the services provided by the staff members. Bravo to Hostess Margret for quality service. Thank you for making my visit memorable.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Jasnoorkaursidhu
Detailed Review: The ambience of the hotel is very nice in all people we meet in lobby are very humble lobby musicians are very great old man smith you had really help us in mumbai city tour plan by him with help off travel desk excellent service hospitality housekeeping person shamveer also took good care in cleaning room..

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: 804atuls
Review: Excellent customer service at orchid MUMBAI
Detailed Review: My journey to this property right through check in checking out the experience is amazing Mr.Smith proactively showed me the property the rooftop restaurant is very nice the room’s are very neat and clean the food at rooftop is very mouth watering which was suggested by smith the ambiance’s makes me more welcoming and enjoying smith your effort for keeping me happy was outstanding and I will recommend to this my company colleague and family

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Abhinay
Detailed Review: Had a memorable evening at Orchid. The staff was extremely courteous especially Uravashi's hospitality and the way she interacted was very welcoming. Would recommend this property for all occasions. The food if delicious and flavorful.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Neha12
Detailed Review: It is pleasure to stay in rhis beautiful property. Staff are very friendly and helpful especially Urvashi and Smith.They always welcomed us with good smile and helped in finding location for good weddin shopping Buffet breakfast was good. Would come back here soon

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Hoshangcharna
Detailed Review: Bring an old member off this beautiful property  Services are as bold as beautiful rooms are very well maintained staffs are very courteous Smith mehreen from  guests relation they are fantastic good as is the hotel

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: David
Detailed Review: Cannot day enough good things about this hotel! Indian hospitality at its very best. The staff went out of their way to ensure that my stay was a wonderful experience. From the moment I arrived I was treated like an honoured guest. Himanshu at reception was a true gentleman and efficiently processed my check-in ensuring I received an early check-in after a long late night flight. Rohit, the Duty Manager was a consummate professional who is clearly a leader and a manager who has mastered the art of fine hospitality. As a frequent business visitor to Mumbai I can highly recommend this perfectly positioned hotel!

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Akshay L
Detailed Review: Really enjoyed my stay here. Very well located and Breakfast was great, speedy check in too. Many thanks to Smith (duty manager) for making it an enjoyable experience and giving extraordinary service. Very highly recommended.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: DESMOND-LORNA
Detailed Review: Staff were very helpful and accommodating. Check in was a breeze. Conveniently situated close to domestic and international airport. The comfort of the hotel is beyond words. Staff are always willing to go the extra mile to help. Hotel is definitely recommended

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Azra
Detailed Review: Kanhaiya sir from housekeeping department was very kind and helpful during the stay. He took care of our comfort and  needs throughout. I will look forward to arrange my personal stay with this hotel in coming days with the amazing staff

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: raosaheb
Detailed Review: This is my tenth visit in seven years i had visited almost all the kamat hotel brands the best part off this hotel rooms are big airport facing special thanks to sonia smith who gave this wonderful huge room i am happy with all the services

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Selva K
Detailed Review: The hotel was very neat and the staff was very helpful. The front office person “Smith” went out of the way to help me with early check-in even though I arrived a couple of hours earlier than my check-in time.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sri R
Detailed Review: I booked this hotel whenever I visit Mumbai. It is an excellent ecofriendly hotel with best service. It is a value for money deal every time. The breakfast spread is out of this world. Gujarathi dishes also available. The hotel staff are courteous and helpful. This trip I happened to check in with the duty manager Mr. Rohit Newton and he was highly professional, helpful and courteous. He carried out his professionalism throughout the process assisting me for the early check-in. Staff like him make the difference and will be an asset to the organization.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Tikreeti
Detailed Review: The hotel is very good my stay was very nice Ms Dipika club manager and Mr Welsley is so so so very very very nice and helfull for me really me and any visitors will be happy with Mr Welsley from concierge   Best warm regards to hotel staff and all members thier

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Roshan Mally
Detailed Review: I recommend many of my national / international guests to stay in the orchid, Vile Parle because first of It’s close proximity to the airport and secondly cause of the helpful and friendly staff and their great customer service.  Recently one of my guests from Germany needed a late check out and without any hesitation the duty manager Mr. Rohit helped him out and ensured that he had a late check out as well as a very pleasant experience during his stay.  I will always recommend the orchid as the ideal choice of hotel for stay in Mumbai.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sweta singh
Detailed Review: I would like to appreciate the way the staff of the hotel specially Mr.Shivram who assisted me in getting back my personal belonging that I forgot in my previous stay which was about two months back. I wasn't hoping to get it back so easily as they made it to be. Really thankful and it's always a pleasure to stay here and experience the lovely hospitality and great food. Best wishes  Sweta Singh

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rahul S
Detailed Review: the front office team is very superb smooth check in checkout house keeping service very appreciated rooms are neat clean good food at cafe and mostly grilled restaurant on the seventh floor Smith and urvashi showed us the entire property  thank you for the way you treat me.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Daksha Doshi
Detailed Review: It was a pleasure to get in touch with front office staff Urvashi and Smith. Thanks for the complimentary upgrade given to us. Hotel is located very close to the airport which is very convenient. Keep up the good work.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Raj D
Review: Long stay at the St. Regis, Mumbai
Detailed Review: We stayed at this property for over 7 weeks. The welcome and feel-at-home attitude of the staff definitely earns a 5+ star rating. From the personalized butler service to the welcoming staff at each diner, the service was excellent. Also, during the virus pandemic, the staff made sure safety and security was give prime importance. We enjoyed many evenings at the Drawing Room with Stefan playing the piano and catering to our individual selections. Overall, we never felt away from home during the long stay. Thanks to the staff at St. Regis.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ankur S
Detailed Review: hing was fantastic.. right from the room, resturants, breakfast, management services. Special mention for our butler Caeser who provided a personal touch to our stay there by making surprise arrangements for my wife's birthday (by placing a nice photo frame of ours which was a superb thought)..add to that he was available 24/7 throughout our stay for anything that we needed. We are going to visit this again for sure. Cheers.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Jose Manuel B
Detailed Review: Perfect location, amazing room, incredible sights, personalized service. Really nice restaurants, superb breakfast. Travel was for bussines but also you can enjoy the hotel. Gym and wellness center very good, shopping center at the bottom, perfect place for visit Mumbai for bussines and/or leisure tourism. Sure I'll repeat.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Misbah
Detailed Review: Had a lovely time at St Regis Mumbai, Dashmi from drawing room was really friendly. The Indian tea she made was amazing! Will definitely visit again hopefully for high tea 😃 I would definitely recommend St Regis!

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Joel M
Review: Review of stay at St Regis
Detailed Review: My stay at the Regis on 9th April was of mixed feelings. Quite impressed with their butler service , Kaushik  and Farzad were smiles all throughout. The food by Chef Ali at the Sahib room was exemplory especially their  PAN ice cream. Seven Kitchens, awesome as always with their spread for the breakfast.   However, their turn down service was a disappointment as they entered my room while I was at dinner. Vishwajeet tried to cover up by blaming the butlers and the frontdesk but this is not customer service is all about .   over all a great experience ...   Joel

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Camilla S
Detailed Review: that hotel is the most contrastive 5 star experience i have ever had.  the GOOD:  - personnel is very courteous, friendly and eager to help, the BAD: - the multiple layers of delegation leave your requests unfulfilled as noone is actually taking ownership of processing an issue. so once their shift is finished the next shift is unaware of the issue and you have to start over again with getting the complaints through.  the GOOD: - rooms are spacious, clean and quiet. the beds are very comfortable. - the housekeeping arranged flowers and cake for our special occasion. - they also would leave some nice notes with small gifts (like the nice lavender pillow spray which is a nice touch). - the management provided us a complimentary transfer from the hotel on our departure which we…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Dr Sharad N
Detailed Review: stayed 1 night at this hotel. My first attempt in Mumbai staying outside Trident, Oberoi or Taj. The holistic experience was very good and I don't mind going back to this property for another stay soon. Good places around the hotel to eat and shop is an added bonus. The rooms have great city views!

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Shon B
Detailed Review: Had the best 4 days at the St Regis.  Breakfast buffet was amazing, as was the butler service, overall quality, friendliness of the staff, and stunning suite accommodation.  The ambiance and decor were also first class.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Kinda S
Review: One of the top hotels and best service
Detailed Review: This was my second stay at the St Regis hotel and it has been an exceptional experience. The service is second to none. It is impeccable. The quality of the hotel is outstanding, the restaurants are great and my butler Vineet Pai made sure my experience was so smooth and comfortable. I highly highly recommend this hotel when in Mumbai.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Chicago Traveler
Review: You don’t have to venture out into Mumbai
Detailed Review: Two of the selling points of this hotel are that there is a nice mall right next-door to the hotel, so you simply walk a few steps to get to the mall, and the hotel has a night club on the 38th floor! The security x-ray machines at the entrance, the constant interruptions by hotel staff are minor disruptions understanding that this hotel has your comfort and security top of mind.  The enormous breakfast buffet spread has to be seen to be believed. The hotel cab (which is a Toyota) from the airport to the hotel will run you about $50, but an Uber car for the same journey costs between $6-8. If you want to stand out more, the hotel offers transport in a luxury car from the airport for about $75, as long as you realize that it’s about 10 times more expensive than an Uber black /…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ben L
Detailed Review: Very caring staff incl the butler, doorman, reception, concierge, servers at restaurants  Excellent location as it locates close to business CBD and is connected to a shopping mall  Clean and decent room hygiene. As an allergenic person I haven’t had a moment of allergies in the room  Spacious and well equipped gym room  Restaurants and bar at top floors are worth for a try as well  Stayed for 6 nights

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Jose Roel
Review: Best Check In Experience at The St Regis Mumbai
Detailed Review: After a long evening flight, we had the best check in experience at The St Regis Mumbai. Our personal butler CAESAR ARAUJO made it all possible. We requested for a honeymoon stay and look at the magic he prepared. He also made sure we were well settled in. From showing us the amazing features of our room, to giving us welcome snacks, and even pressing our clothes done in an hour. What can we say but thank you very much. It’s just our first night and we can’t wait what’s in store for us the coming days. Keep up the good work!

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Jibin s
Review: Warm Stay and good customer Care
Detailed Review: It was a very pleasant stay and the staff are very friendly and helping... especially Mr. Bansi... they made us feel at home... food is extremely tasty... Next time also we are sure to stay at VITS when in Mumbai

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Y.koonbeeharry
Detailed Review: Since we arrived the doormen to the floorman has been very helpful. The hotel is very nice,clean and pleasant. We all time had in room dining and it was very efficient and fast service. Thanks to HUSSAIN from room service always ready to help with his charmingly hospitality to us.  Thank you for the stay. 😄

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Jagadish
Detailed Review: Hotel is Excellent. Food is Delicious and different varieties. Good Hospitality Given by all crew from all departments.Mr.pradeep helped me out a lot.... Thanks for the giving a pleasant   Experience...

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Anish M
Detailed Review: Service and courtesy of the staff is so good.  Especially Bansi in the Swimming Pool level done a great job. We are booking this hotel for our regular meetings and visits.  The spread of breakfast and dinner is so good yummy.  I can recommend this hotel for business as well as leisure also.  Very near to international airport

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Kanika
Detailed Review: It was a very nice stay at Vits Hotel. Staff was very helpful specially Pradeep helped me with luggage. Pool side restaurant was good.Food was good, specially the breakfast.Shainika was very polite and helpful.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Praful Jivan
Detailed Review: Stay at Vits hotel Mumbai was vey pleasent experience hotel is clean staff are excellent i highly recommend. Mr Rahim the trip advisor has been excellent with advice. Also at front desk varun and Devendra was good and courteous need to increase more staff at front desk  also mr bansi at poolside was good  Chef deep was also helpful and courteous

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Madhumathi
Detailed Review: Had a lively experience at VITS. Loved the ambience and the service they provided. The staff is very polite and helpful.  Special mention to manager Vijay, who assisted us during our check in and check out.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Vinod
Detailed Review: Best service and iternry.  Nice pool side restaurant and nice hospitality and we'll delicious food and beverage,. I came here for ,03days stay for business purposes.. felt very happy with the staff behaviour and their services..

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Abal Zaidi
Detailed Review: Excellent service provided by WITS Mumbai. I was extremely thankful for my stay with Vits Mumbai. All staff members are very courteous, genuine and thought full. Raheem bell desk provided an excellent service with my baggage and lobby manager Vijay helped me to managed my baggage weights. Food was delicious and service was very important to me. I highly recommend this hotel for an outstanding service. Keep it up all the good work. Thank you!

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: rohinik203
Detailed Review: Excellent staff of the hotel especially the Bell desk team  Pradeep, Rahim, Paresh & Rafiq Food was very good & service was superb Enjoyed my stay Even the reception staff was very helpful  Especially Pinky  Room was very neat & tidy Location is excellent & pool side is beautiful

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: P bhatty
Detailed Review: I Am a regular guest of the VITS hotel Mumbai, this time round webhad booked 8 rooms as it was a family wedding and had many guests staying in the hotel. The front desk staff were very helpful and provided all rooms on the same floor as we requested. The housekeeping team were very discreet and attentive and provided us with any extras that we requested. I would like to commend in particular ganesh,raheem and pradeep who were especially helpful and made our stay in this busy and stressful wedding scenario as smooth and as relaxing as possible. The door staff were also incredibly helpful finding taxis and loading/unloading luggage and always had a smile on their face. And lastly a big thanks again to pradeep who always looks after us everytime we visit as a family or even if it's…

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Seemuvarmulian7
Detailed Review: Super hospitality , food was awesome especially Mr Pradeep and me Rahim from the lobby staff were very help including reception staff , must visit ...nice rooms 👍nice restaurant pool side highly recommended

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sonal Thakur
Detailed Review: I reached Mumbai  around 11pm, my flight landed late and it was a long day. First thing I wanted was a nice warm cozy dinner and then a peaceful sleep. Since the hotel is in close proximity to the Airport, I reached smoothly cutting short any traffic.  Marriott's hospitality is world class, you would find every thing ready for you. The rooms were super clean and comfortable. For breakfast they have N number of options to pick from, no matter which part of the world you are from, you will definitely find your kinda satiating breakfast.   Over all it was an amazing hassle-free stay.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Serah F
Review: Service we had at Momo caffe
Detailed Review: So I have to give a shout out to the Courtyard by Marriott in Mumbai. The service was absolutely amazing. The staff went above and beyond...specially server Sohal  he works there Breakfast Buffett. He is very kind excellent customer service.   Chef is great we met him. He made special RAVA Dosa for us.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: JYach
Review: They say “four stars” I say FIVE
Detailed Review: Hi  My trips to Mumbai enable me to stay in new suburbs and to enjoy different forms of hospitality  This trip found me based around this hotel: - good location - access was a little troubling but soon the road outside will be fixed - the service was lovely, attentive and swift - nice rooms, comfortable and well-equipped - I dined only in their Momo; good food and service, nice range and their salad bar was super - unusually, the checkout was accurate and swift! - a great pool   Well done and thanks

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Traveler123
Detailed Review: Stayed here one night from 2/22 to 2/23 on our way to Pune. This was my second visit the first being 10 years back. Close to airport. Nice property although a bit old. The Indian breakfast of masala dosa was excellent and so was the masala tea. Room was clean with sufficient drinking water. Bathroom amenities could be better. Room service was prompt and food was reasonably priced. Staff was excellent with very efficient check in facility.  If you want to stay near the airport this is the right hotel. Would come back to stay here again. Could not find any fault with this hotel.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Divyesh Kotecha
Detailed Review: Good venue for corporate trainings..  Very cooperative & proactive team...  Excellent service provided by the entire sales and banquet team (especially Anish, Beverly, Kevin, Akshay Sawant, Vinit Patil, Rohit)

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Alan T
Review: Awesome welcoming staff from start to finish!
Detailed Review: From the time I checked in to the time I checked out I felt like the staff really had my interest and needs at heart.  I never heard a negative comment or felt like a question or request was being brushed off.  The breakfast was amazing with so many different regional tastes to choose from and a staff that never left you feeling alone.  I loved the 25 meter lap pool!!  Not many hotels have a pool that is designed for actual swimming.  That is my primary form of cardio so would return just for that.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Willyxv
Detailed Review: Dear Courtyard Team,     Thank you again for the pleasant and refreshing stay.     Indeed your Wonderful team made a difference, and I thank you for your efforts as warm and delightful hosts.  The city itself is difficult and vibrant, and I am appreciative that your team have carved a sanctuary both in facillities and levels of service.    The right people truly represent the greatest assets, and I am lucky to have met such a wonderful team who include: FrontDesk  Ummrao Resturant Breakfast/Buffett Security, Door and Airport Transfer     In particular Umesh, Pranali, Sweta, Sameera (Ambassadors), Asif (Front Desk) have especially impressed me with their genuine professionalism, hospitality, integrity and charm.    I am so very honored you accept my ongoing loyalty to the Marriot…

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: RandyMan69
Detailed Review: I stayed here on business for 6 days.   The hotel is super quiet, and clean, though there is a rough edge here or there. Breakfast and nigh time buffet are as good or better than the ITC at twice the price.  Handy location near the airport.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: KaushikB
Detailed Review: This is one of the best hotel.experiences that i have had in the recent past. The service is fast, prompt and the staff is exceptional The rooms are plush and have an interesting lighting feel to it. The beds and pillows are truly world class I will.definitely go back to this place again P.S. The lobby is an out of norm experience!

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: tikiskis
Detailed Review: You would think a hotel advertising itself with the word "airport" in the name would be convenient to the airport. Not so.  It started with the walk out of the airport in search of my ride. The Marriott Courtyard sign was hanging there, but the driver was not. My plane was 10 minutes late, but surely the driver could have Googled it. He ran over as I was walking away and we connected. He said we had to walk a few blocks to the car. He parked about a quarter mile away. Then it took him a long time to pay the garage parking attendant. Then there was traffic. Without exaggeration, it took 30 minutes to get to the hotel from the moment I connect with the driver.  At the hotel, I was clear that I had an imminent meeting and would appreciate a speedy check-in. Next question out of the…

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Aamera siddique
Detailed Review: Excellent service given by Abhijeet Patwardhan in momo cafe Thank you pranali khadbade for arranging the B-Day cake and being a part of it!!  We liked each and everything in buffet!!! Good customer service  Thank you so much  Food was amazing!!!!

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Pranav M
Review: Excellent hotel. Exceptional staff! Best place to stay near International Airport.
Detailed Review: I stayed here in Feb 2020  for three days. This was by far the most customer friendly hotel I have stayed in ever yet.   Since IHG is a US  brand, the in-room and hotel amenities were well suited for my family and the three days we stayed there did not feel anything different. That is important because this was the first time my kids were travelling to India and we were worried about 'acclimatization'.   Staff was very nice and helpful and I can not stress that enough. This hotel and its staff took care of my family like their very own.Whatever we requested, be it a change of room, upgrade due to IHG platinum member status,  food for kid at 4 AM in night, milk for toddler in late night , was honoured with courtesy. Tips were appreciated though couple of times it was refused…

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sneha dhaksya
Detailed Review: Thank u so much holiday inn for the amazing stay. It was a great experience and lovely staff who were completely professional and friendly. Would like to specially thank Priyanka fuley who took my booking she was a warm heart lady and did every possible thing to make my friend’s birthday special. Heena from guest relations who did amazing decoration, shubham from cafe gave his best service in breakfast and thanks to kinjal and tushar for smooth check in and check out. Bell desk and concierge staff were very welcoming  My friend was very happy and the surprise given by you guys was overwhelming I will definitely recommend the hotel to my other friends for their special days since his birthday was celebrated perfectly

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: S N
Detailed Review: the room was nice and dining experience was made excellent by service., chef Vineet, Chef Yogesh, chef Naresh &  Ms Shahnoor intern walked extra mile to personalize the service. Mr Swapnil Mktg Mgr was very cordial and took pains to make me comfortable.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: JAGUAR33Bordeaux
Review: The most suitable place for a short business trip in Mumbai  !
Detailed Review: We spent 4 nights at Holiday Inn to perform 2 days negotiation either in one of the meeting rooms or outside at the headquarters of our partner for a contemplated Joint Venture. Business Center is a pleasant place to work or have afterhours drinks. The staff is customer-oriented to answer your requests or organize activities and pick-up at airport at 1.00am ! Restaurant is OK for delivering food to european stomacks not too much spicy..... Superior rooms are large, well-equiped with a desk & armchair and a funny full-glass wall bathroom. An excellent ratio quality vs. price

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: AJW
Detailed Review: I recently complete a long term stay at the Holiday Inn Mumbai International Airport March 2020.    The front desk staff was professional and personable Salmon, Tushar, and Ramzan thank you for making my 5 week stay feel like a home away from home.   The Saptami restaurant and 72 Bar-a chic lounge bar offered great food options, thank you to the wait staff Shubham, Isran, Sumit, Vally, Parag, Ganesh,Rahul, Rajiv, Anand, Isran, and the gentleman that fixed the ginger tea for me every morning for breakfast.   I would also like to thank the One Touch Services representative Ms. Vijeta Pal for making sure my in room dining meals were correct and sent in a timely manner.   If you are ever in Mumbai make the Holiday Inn your hotel of choice.  Regard,  Mr. Williams

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: buya_65
Detailed Review: I happened to transit in Mumbai for a night and chosed this hotel as it is convenient for airport Checked in late in night, was welcomed gracefully by the staff, Akshay chavan was very helpful to upgrade me also with  complimentary late check-out.  Room are spacious and CLEAN!.  Woke up next day to munch on some b'fast  Ms dhanashri smile was contagious and so was her hospitality Overall the stay was relaxing (that's all I was looking for) Coming back again in later this year.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Dr Anuja P
Detailed Review: I stayed here for two nights before an international flight. The location is convenient in the sense that it’s close to the airport. I had to get to the airport at 7pm during peak traffic hours but still arrived within 15 minutes by using a back road. The hotel itself is good in terms of design and decor. The service, however, is lacking. Always took forever to get staff’s attention. The service at the restaurant was by far the worst. It was slow and the staff often forgot orders, and this happened during dinner as well as lunch. Service at reception was efficient but nothing extremely warm or welcoming. The room was spacious and had all the necessary amenities. I’d say stay here if you need to get to T2 but avoid if not.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ram1958
Review: A Nice Stay at the Holiday Inn Mumbai Internationa Airport
Detailed Review: I along with my colleague from Germany was on a business trip to Mumbai during 24-26 Feb 20. We stayed at the Holiday Inn for two nights. I was picked-up from Mumbai T1 on 24 Feb 20. The check-in was simple. The Room was quite big and well furnished. The in-room wi-fi worked very fine. Executive Lounge was good enough. Breakfast spread was simply huge. The Check-out was simple as well.  We were dropped at Mumbai T2. It was a pleasant stay.  Look forward to visit again.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ajay Kacker
Detailed Review: My umpteenth visit and review of the hotel  Located next to Saki Naka metro station, busiest road in Mumbai.  Check-in was comfortable and so was the room. Wash room too had all the toiletries and was neat n clean.  Tried in room dining of combo meal in a bento box, really good and wholesome. Git chicken biriyani, butter chicken masala, daal amritsari, mixed veggies, salad, papad, tandoori roti and gajar ka halwa. All for below 1000 bucks. Great initiative. Would recommend similar combo meal even in continental cuisine.  Breakfast was in Saptami which was again good. Had lovely upma and egg Benedict. Vada weren't as crisp as expected and the cappuccino too wasn't hot enough.  Overall a great stay

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Vas
Detailed Review: The customer service and well trained super friendly, attentive and helpful staff. convenient location and delicious food . Room was spacious and very clean. Breakfast  buffet was fantastic, with a wide range of dishes enjoyable and well organised.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: NM_rafter17
Detailed Review: I visited the coffee shop where the breakfast was served at around 7:30 am the staff was very humble especially Perpetual who was quiet cheerful. Keep up the good work. Planning to visit here with my family again.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ta8
Detailed Review: As we didn't wanted to travel to pune at night so we booked the airport hotel as we were arriving around 2200hrs and leaving in the morning to pune. The check in was ok !! with few weird questions, they never asked for any deposit as we have booked & paid for the room with expedia.  Rates were quiet high compare to the rooms and service.. If i have known then i would have paid couple of hundred more and would have stayed in Lalit which i did on the last night from pune - mumbai.  As Holiday inn is normally good chain, so didn't do much homework before booking. We ordered room service and we couldn't bill to our room and can't pay on check out.. it was compulsory for us to pay at that minute only ( no reason given, why we have to pay cash or card on spot only ). 2 cans of soda we…

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ruchi S
Detailed Review: Absolutely poor service, rude staff. We were greeted with dirty bathroom and stained laundry. The staff first came in to lock the mini bar as if we would have ran away without paying( everything was already paid and we never refused for security deposit). We were with a guest and this was highly humiliating.  Next day, at the restaurant, despite asking for tea thrice, we weren’t served. The staff needs training. They need to work on their social etiquette skills and customer service too. Highly disappointed.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: sanjoyjg
Detailed Review: We had gone to the hotel in our car. First of all the location is not convenient for domestic airport passengers. We had gone by car, at the Maingate like all hotels they check the car boot and sides, but suddenly one security guy told me he wants to see the glove box of the car. I have not seen anywhere the inside of a car is checked. I feel it’s unwanted and never come across such a practice elsewhere. So I was uncomfortable and opted to park my car by self, then it’s a long walk back to the lobby, no lift from parking area to the lobby. Since I had to leave very early in the morning I asked the receptionist if I could park my car in front of the hotel so I could put in my luggage and leave early,, they told it’s for hotels own vehicles,, but I could see a taxi parked there,,…

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Anahita T
Detailed Review: Always love going to Holiday Inn.. Their Sunday brunch is too good n worth the money... Celebrated my in laws 50th anniversary there with the brunch.. It was an amazing experience.. awesome food... awesome spread... amazing staff including The manager Vally who made a special arrangement for our grp in the Bar, Amisha and Dhanashri were always around for great service.. And amazing songs n guitar sung by Yash and Mandaar... I am def going back there again n again.. !

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Thgai
Detailed Review: This hotel I understand used to be a Hilton.  I was very impressed. The staff are over the top friendly and helpful. I ate there on 6 different occasions and swear by their incredible good.  I would never stay anywhere else in Mumbai.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: raju s
Detailed Review: Good room good breakfast but the best  was Aashish the gym trainer smiling willing to help thank you 🙏  The entire team had a fantastic stay. Must say the restaurant at the lobby level has a great spread, delicious food with lovely staff serving us. Would highly recommend.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: pravin k
Detailed Review: Recently visited to 72 Holiday Inn Fabulous Place amazing Ambience they also have really good food and bar menu. I Had really great time here, the staff members are helped out with menu they also suggest us. They serve different sizzlers which is what i recommend.. Drinks Daiquri - The Fine Art of Mixing Drinks,Daiquiri is a family of cocktails whose main ingredients are rum, citrus juice, and sugar or other sweetener.  Bourbon bracer -Bourbon Bracer is a short and powerful cocktail that has a rather unique taste. Food- Fish Finger and chips- Crispy from outside and juicy from inside, these fish fingers. You just can't go wrong with this delicious and easy   Margherita Pizza- you just can't beat a classic like fresh and simple Margherita Pizza. It features tangy pizza sauce & a…

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Tushar Kesarkar
Review: One of the Top Notch Restaurant !
Detailed Review: *72 Bar*  72 Bar is a stylish and elegant looking lounge bar being the perfect place to relax and unwind over premium malts, spirits and signature cocktails. staff is very Helpful, Friendly in nature and Attentive.its 2 minutes away from Sakinaka Metro Station. Do visit once here with family, friends and with your Loved Once.  what we Had,  *Cocktails :  1.Bourbon bracer : bourbon-based drink includes the additional warming elements of cinnamon, star anise and ginger beer  2.Red Kimono : Red Kimono is concocted with vodka, water melon Refreshing Drink you must try this!  3.Daiquiri :The classic daiquiri is a drink that everyone should try atleast Once ! Three ingredients Drink   *Food :  1.Fish Finger : they are so perfectly golden and crunchy fried appetizer tastes too Good. …

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Nigel Robinson
Detailed Review: We arrived in the early hours and were quickly allocated our room. This hotel is perfectly located for the airport and offers free transfers. We loved everything about the hotel and thoroughly enjoyed the breakfast. The restaurant service in the evening was less than par though. We enjoyed cocktails in the 72 Bar and we were served by the lovely Kajal, who was really helpful.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Yashwant Upadhyay
Detailed Review: Its a really good property to stay at. I was here for 3 nights and I really enjoyed my stay. Specially Mr. Ghanshyam Tiwari who is the Chef & Breakfast and dinner incharge at the hotel, was really welcoming and interactive.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: gurveen k
Detailed Review: The stay was comfortable and well taken care of by the professional staff who know their duties well. Chefs were good and attentive to all guests needs.Ms Gayatri at the reception was very helpful in finding a jacket i lost in the hotel. Even the trainees worked like professionals. It's a good place for business trip as it's very near to the airport.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ashish Kesarkar
Detailed Review: This place ia highly recommended, 72 holiday Inn near by Sakinaka metro staion.   Ambience : Sophisticated, Impressed with the sitting arrangements.   Staff : The staff here is courteous, helpful and attentive.  Drinks:  1. Apple Cider: Which is beer based cocktail and it is too good. If you prefer beer usually then you should definitely go with this.   2. Tropical fruit punch: This one is mocktail and it was also best in taste I will give 5/5 to this mocktail.   Food : so we started with,  1. Fish Finger & Chops:  When you are hungry and then you get to taste dish like this its like heaven.   2. Chicken Tikka: I think this was the best dish overthere. First time ever I have tried this taste of chicken tikka.   3. Margarita Pizza: We've already get the best start in foks and…

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Niket Kaskar
Detailed Review: Holiday Inn is one of the most Prestigious & Luxurious Names in the Hotel Industry. It is one of the Iconic hotels located opp to the Saki Naka Metro Station  On Our Recent visit to Holiday Inn, we had dine-in at 72 - Holiday Inn. The Ambience of it is very much Lavish and Prestigious with Comfortable Seatings. The staff of  72 - Holiday Inn Welcomes us with a Sweet Gesture of Love...  The whole place has a luxurious feel and we had a good time having Dinner over here.  So, In the Beginning, We begin with some Refreshing Cocktails / Mocktails and Appetizers such as:-  1- Long Iceland Iced Tea:- A Spirit of various alcohol Infused with each other to makes it, which contains Alcohol such as Vodka, Rum, Gin, Tequila, Cranberry, infused each other to makes it more Stronger and…

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Velu Balasubramamiam
Detailed Review: Always have wonderful experience staying here. This time Tushar at front desk helped me out of the way to make my stay even more memorable. Thanks Tushar. Keep up the good work. God bless you. See you soon.
