Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Foodadda Mumbai
Detailed Review: We Were 2 Of Us So Planned To Dine In Through Zomato Came Across This Amazing Place Called 72 Bar & Lounge Which Is Located 2 Mins Away From Sakinaka Metro Station. We Had Booked The Table Online . As We Reached Amd Saw The Ambience Was Quite Amazing.. In Starters We Called For  1.Fish & Chips 2. Chicken Kathi Roll 3. Honey Chilli Chicken  And For Main Course Called For 1. Murgh Malai Tikka Sizzler  2. Prawns Sizzler  And In Cocktails Called For 1.Bourbon Bracer  2. Liit 3. Sunriser The Food Preparation And The Way It Was Served Was Quite Good Ms.Kajal Did Her Best To Serve Us .. There Comfortable Sitting With The Amazing Ambience Had Spent A Great With My Bestie Gajanan.. It was Value For Money Will Surely Visit 72 Bar And Lounge Again!!!!

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Harpreet Singh
Detailed Review: Have an amazing experience staying at the Holiday Inn. Perfect place for a comfortable business trip the staff takes service to an extra mile to enhance your stay experience at the property.  And the best part is the food experience Chef Ghanshayam Tiwari took an extra effort to enhance our dining experience.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Arif sheikh
Detailed Review: The property is very close to airport well maintained only issue is the breakfast spread is not great in terms of choice and quality same goes for Front desk while checking in the lady told me I can settle all extra while check out ,since I paid advance for room and offered my credit card she refused to take it since there was que of other customers,but made my stay very unpleasant can you imagine be it morning tea or late night dinner person asking for payment standing on face

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Yogesh
Detailed Review: I wanted to thank everyone at the concierge service including Kinjal and Ajay at reception who gave great advice and showed great willingness to be of service. The attention to detail was impressive. The staff that helped me to carry my luggage up and down, as well as those who helped me to ensure my luggage was at the right weight I have gratitude for. A special mention to Heena, the Guests Relations Executive who went out of her to make us most welcome - I highly recommend this hotel for a Mumbai stay.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: KaushikB
Detailed Review: The hotel is situated right in the heart of the city and is closeby to major attractions I had a great time with a friend of mine in a twin bed room(photo attached) The rooms are spacious and clean and organized Overall a great place to stay

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Robin Singh
Detailed Review: Special thanks to person shubham who help us alot at the time of breakfast an shankar who also help us ... Overall awesome experience.. Thnks to all staff very polite behaviour.. Will look forward for visit again.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Uma m
Detailed Review: The rooms are spacious and amenities very good. Rooms are clean and bathroom is good. Wifi is excellent.  Location is very convenient. Cabs easily available. Airport drop provided.  What can be improved. 1. Newspapers can be delivered to room, at least on request. The quest is directed to the lift lobby by service staff. 2. Breakfast service is erratic. Depends on the person serving. Sometimes we have to literally demand or request service. 3. Food is not up to the mark. 4. Access cards do not work on lifts the first time for me and other guests. I had to reactivate card 3ce during my stay of 15 days

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rafat A
Detailed Review: Anmol is very good guys, very quick & spontaneous in service. He is very co-operative and understands customer need and provides the solution.  I would like to visit again and major credit goes to him.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ashok B
Detailed Review: Great team at Holiday inn Mumbai. Stay was very well handled by Abhijit and team. We had event for fourth day’s Very well organised by team. Clint and his brigade is always on top of food and services. Thanks to chef’s Suresh Yogesh as well. I would also like to highlight that my  coach who came from Geneva got an email that his flight was cancelled  and we tried calling airlines but not able to assist.  Abhijit and Sujeet spoke with airline and the issue was resolved and my friend Andrew boarded his flight.  Thanks team for going an extra mile and supporting me it’s a home away from  home for me wen I come to bombay The staff is excellent  must try the hotel

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: JaydeepBalsara
Detailed Review: I wanted to find a place to chill out with my friends so I chose this place it was a really great choice. It was a great experience out here.This place is having a really beautiful and pleasant ambience they also have really good food and really great bar menu. The restro have a nice background music playing while enjoying the food. The staff member helped us out with the menu items to choose from.  Things we tried out:  Cocktail: Crimson Alchemist , Daiquiri ,Concubine kiss  Sizzler: Thai chicken Satay  Appetizer: Murg chandini tikka , Honey chilli chicken  I had a really great time spent here really. If I talk about these cocktails all the drinks drinks water on the mark me and my friends enjoyed all the drinks and the food was really delicious. Me and my friends have enjoyed.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Atul K
Detailed Review: Excellent service house keeping with smiling response and behavior and suggest nearest location   And I am very thankful Mr Anmol to serve properly all things and thank you so much this service and next time will come

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: shash
Review: WHAT IS THE DIFFERENCE BETWEEN A GOOD AND GREAT HOTEL?? THE FOUNDATION!!!
Detailed Review: Whilst in transit between an incoming international flight and a domestic onward departure, I decided to visit The Holiday Inn Hotel, Mumbai for a coffee.  I was absolutely overwhelmed albeit truly humbled at the same time by the "LONG TERM TEAM MEMBERS I MET AND THE WELCOME I WAS GIVEN", despite not having stayed at the hotel for a considerable time.  It was such a pleasure to once again feel like home by the kindness and love bestowed by everyone I met, especially Abhijit, Ajay, Anikit, Chaitali and Dinesh and a number of others too. As you are aware, a hotel may be good, but it is the "TEAM MEMBERS WHO ARE THE FOUNDATION OF THE  HOSPITALITY INDUSTRY, WHO MAKE A GOOD HOTEL A GREAT HOTEL!!!". Without these Team Members, right from the cleaners, maintenance, concierge, front…

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sarawanee
Review: Lovely holiday inn Mumbai international airport staffs
Detailed Review: I like holiday inn hotel  in terms of staffs here very lovely especially for akhter who make nice masala tea and baliram who Served me very warm service   All of ppl here are very warm welcome.  Happy to be here and I will be here again and again

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: S A A
Detailed Review: Stay was great. I really appreciate Mr. Tushar at front desk and wasim at airport. Both of them are amazing. They show too much care and respect. Their attitude and behavior is amazing. I felt very comfortable. These guys are superb and  general manager Mr. Sharad Upadhayay is one of the best gm in the world.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: needlethread
Detailed Review: I and my wife had the pleasure of staying at The Orchid recently. End of February for 4 Nights. This was our second visit and you exceeded our expectations. From the point of arrival after a long day traveling, flights etc. Nadeem was excellent at front desk, checking in was done in a few minutes and we were in our room in 10 mins with the luggage following us. Room 712 was very clean, very comfortable and throughout stay was kept that way with excellent housekeeping.  The team in boulevard café provided great breakfast service. I forget the name of maitre d and the team a credit to the hotel. Food choice was excellent, spoilt for choice for breakfast and al carte food.  I thank Simpson for his assistance try to sort out my mobile taxi application. We will be staying at the…

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: vbss75
Detailed Review: This is an excellent property to stay at. Right from the location, to the food options ( esp. the veg restaurant), the eco- feel given to everything ( incl. the bags in which the newspapers are supplied to the rooms ), this is one great place to stay. The check in experience has always been great with people like Smith helping out to make it as smooth as possible. As a request,.may I request a larger gymanisum please.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: equirasteel
Review: Delightful experience at The Orchid Hotel, Mumbai
Detailed Review: I and my family had a very comfortable and pleasant stay for 3 weeks during the month of February'20 and for that I thank you for your support.   We were very pleased with the service during the entire stay and I was very impressed with the culture of politeness and eagerness to serve imbibed among the staff of the Orchid Hotel. I must particularly mention the names of Mr.Rohit, the manager of Boulevard restaurant and Chef Bala of Vindhyas. It was amazing to see how they waltzed around all the customer to ensure that each and everyone of them were warmly welcomed, looked after and made to feel at home. Definitely, a must stay, hotel and certainly value for money.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ram1958
Review: One Night Stay at the Orchid
Detailed Review: I along with my colleague from Germany was on a business trip and was returning from Surat by car on 27 Feb 20. It took us about seven hours as the traffic on the last stretch was quite heavy. I reached the Orchid at about 11:30 at night after dropping my colleague at T2 just in time to catch his Mumbai-Paris Flight. The check-in was simple. The Room was quite big and well furnished. The in-room wi-fi worked very fine. Breakfast spread was simply huge. The Check-out was simple as well.  I was dropped at Mumbai T1. It was a pleasant stay.  Look forward to visit again.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Top Ratheanin
Detailed Review: Best service and staff helpful and corporate with guest whatever they want. This hotel I strongly recommended. And breakfast they also separate for local people and foreigner that very easy for foreigners to chose as trying India food or regular food they eat at their own countries. Duty manager Rohit he is nice staff and helpful, he can extend my stay here I till my flight time. Thank Rohit.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: MOHAMMED EHTHESHAM UL HAQ
Detailed Review: Great ambiance feel like A luxury star hotel special thanks to smith priya who assist with all my check in formalities as promised by smith the check in experience was amazing the rooms are well maintained neat and clean

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: radha R
Detailed Review: F& b staff and food is excellent specially miss nidhi & hema. Had filter coffee which a must have..😊made by a staff who was from bengaluru.. their buffet is excellent specially the chaats, pani puri, and sev puri !

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Stiglarssen
Detailed Review: Great service by Smith and Rohit!! Very nice rooms,  convenient to airport,  great spicy Indian food,  and Smith is very humble in nature. All the staff is very courteous and helpful.   Gym and swimming pool are well maintained.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Akhil
Detailed Review: Orchid Hotel was nice. Front office proactively gave a free upgrade to a club room. It’s a spacious room. Although the passage and lift to the room was deserted. Hotel is close by to the domestic airport.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Tulika
Detailed Review: Extremely warm welcome and a very smooth check in. They also upgraded my room 2 level up without any extra charges :) room very neat and clean . Few minutes away from Chhatrapati Shivaji airport. A lot of in house restaurants if you are a foodie ;)

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ankit M
Detailed Review: Complementary service (room decoration and cake) provided by urvashi and Deepika from guest service team was marvelous. My wife was impressed and I appreciate the work done by them. I am thankful for the same.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Bhavnapatel
Detailed Review: I am visiting with my family good hospitality Nice gym on th seventh floor good food nice ambiance Smith is Awesome the things which he promised all were fulfilled Great location near to airport Swimming pools are clean

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Jazz
Review: Courteous and helpful front office staff .
Detailed Review: Ms Urvashi was very pleasant and helpful . Have a very kind nature ,asked us if our stay was comfortable and if we required anything . Looking forward to meet her again on the next visit . Thank you for a wonderful experience.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sanjay R
Detailed Review: Nice friendly front office staff, excellent service, in room dining is excellent,Love the services provided by Gauri from Reception , Deepika and Urvashi from guest relations. Appreciate your all the kind and helpful services.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: NParmar
Detailed Review: I am visiting for business purpose and planned for luxury stay at Mumbai and chose this hotel to stay. Few words to describe  the beginning of the day. Great staff hospitality. Highly appreciate the help of Mr Smith and Dipika's help at the reception.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Curiosity995
Review: fab stay at Orchid - thank you!
Detailed Review: I stayed for one night and it was excellent value for money! Smith at the hotel reception upgraded my room, and it was really spacious! The  quality of the room I was given was much higher stars than the ratings suggest. The room had the usual amenities of most 5 star hotels. I had a lovely view over the runway, with a direct line of planes taking off and landing (plane spotter heaven!). The waterfall feature in the main foyer is mesmerising! For the price of the room and its location close to the airport, it certainly gives its much, much pricier luxury hotel neighbours a run for their money. It claims eco-friendly credentials although I am not too sure what that involved. It certainly looked and felt like a good-quality hotel. Would highly recommend if you want 5 star comfort…

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: LoveTravel306129
Detailed Review: Thanks Urvashi for making my Fiance's birthday special! The entire experience was nice. Nice hotel and good location. Convenient hotel for US Consulate proposes also near the airport. Check in process was friendly and accommodating.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: AaronMartin
Review: Very friendly staff - good dinner buffet - amenities out of date
Detailed Review: At arrival the staff was friendly and accommodating, no waiting times throughout my stay but the amenities were not up to western 5-star standards.   That being said especially Mr. Shailesh during dinner hours was a delight and at my service, frequently checking in via eye contact and picking up on my queue immediately.   For other staff members, my orders had gotten lost repeatedly. At some point I had to ask 3 times for a can of coke until the order arrived some 10 minutes later.   I requested a late check-out and wasn’t charged, and Mr Smith made my transfer to the airport a breeze! Thank you!   Last note: the old gym equipment left marks on my hands that I could barely wash off. Please update!

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: sunil p
Review: Extremely poor service and feels cheated
Detailed Review: Guys, I stayed in the Irchid hotel 2 nights with the terrible servicd n headache.  When i reached hotel after 16 hour flight journey, the security didnt allow me to go to hotel. I was standing at gate with all my luggage. Because i was in auto rickshaw. It was really racism. Additionally they dint have car to to take me hotel. I need to wait 30 minutes at gate. It was hortible experience. Additionally when i report to Manager he saud to noise we dont allow. What the hell. They dont know to say sorry. I complained written but until mow no reply.  2. The receptionist doesnt read the customer request. They are really helpless no use kind if service.  3. The rooms are shown with caroetted but the entire hotel doesnt have a carpet room as per the reception and manager. Then i asked…

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Afira Chhapra
Review: Good service at South Of Vindhyas Restaurant
Detailed Review: South of Vindhyas specializes in serving South Indian cuisine. They have a variety of sit-down buffet options which include veg buffet, sea-food buffet or combination buffet of seafood, chicken & mutton!  Also you can enjoy a live ghazal night while relishing the lip-smacking food.  I tried the combination buffet served here which included 3 types of appetizers, mocktail, thali with all the main course gravies, rice and appams/phulkas/malabari paratha.  Appetizers: Rawa Fish Fry: Fish is deep fried in rawa making it crispy from outside and soft and flavoursome from inside. This is my favourite appetizer from their menu  Pepper chicken: Small pieces of chicken are tossed with onion, tomatoes and south indian spices. This is a semi dry appetizer.  Prawns fry: Medium-sized prawns…

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Aparna B
Review: Ideal hotel for a short business trip.
Detailed Review: Tucked away in a lane, a stone's throw from the airport is The Orchid Hotel Mumbai.This hotel is constantly bustling with activity. The floor staff and ladies on the ground floor are always ready to help out. Special mention must be made of Mr. Smith who went out of his way to help us get a room before time as we had arrived early. A live performance at the grand piano in the evening was an added attraction. The rooms are clean and tastefully done up . I would definitely want to come back again.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Yuya
Review: Good Service from Mr. Smith, Front Manager
Detailed Review: I had a very good experience at check-in counter with Mr. Smith, front manager. He served me very well and explained to me everything I need to know. Definitely I will come back to the hotel once again when I come to Mumbai. Thank you, Mr. Smith!

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ganesh C Nair
Detailed Review: Great Hospitality with Awesome staff service  / Great check in experience with Mr Smith Asst Manager and Meenakshi who served a cup of Coffee at the Wait Launch  This is my 3rd visit to Orcgid and Would like to recommended for my Friends and Coullegues as well

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Omkar
Detailed Review: Today I visited this amazing place called Orchid which is located at domestic airport this place have a amazing restaurant called Mostly Grills which is on 7th floor roof top view towards the domestic airport. When I entered I was mesmerize by the ambience and the view f this restaurant. It is known for its nawabi tradition,as the decor is done as per the tradition and the center of attraction is it has its own pool at the roof top of the restaurant. They have arranged table beside the pool. They have live music going on is a traditional way it give different vibes to the food.They have put nawab style seating arrangement .It has a small fountain inside and comfortable seating arrangement.The food was amazing and the service was top notch. We ordered:- 🔶MOCKTAILS : 1)Orange…

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Traveler834358
Detailed Review: Had a very pleasant one night stay in the hotel. Good breakfast and good ambience.Staff here, have been extremely helpful,specially Smith who was at the check out desk. He was very efficient in arranging my taxi to the airport. Over all very good service.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Aditya kumar
Review: Amazing check in experience. Hospitable staff
Detailed Review: We are coming for the second time in this hotel. The front desk staff is amazing and friendly but professional. The hotel ambience is soothing. We had an smooth check in experience. Hope to have more amazing experience and comfortable stay ahead. Thank you

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Olivier L
Detailed Review: Early checking welcome and great complimentary coffee from front desk. Thanks to Smith, front office Manager.  Great looking room and excellent location. The hotel serves continental breakfast as well which is great.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Eyal P
Detailed Review: Got a free upgrade on my third night. Staff is very friendly and the roof top is very nice. Smith and Sonia were very helpful and got me set up with the new bigger room with a nice view. In brief, great stay.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv

Detailed Review: As this hotel is near to airport is the best place services here are very sorted interms off checkout checkin.. Smith mahesh mayuri are very fastidious n their respect work department. Good food.. buffet is amazing you good options

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv

Detailed Review: As this hotel is near to airport is the best place service’s are goods but housekeeping needs to improve as per the star category off hotel bed linen were not up to the mark room smell I stayed there in 639  i would request to take proper care off the property From housekeeping mitesh is very good Smith Deepika and priya from front office are very good

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Vikram N
Review: Excellent orchid's hospitality by Smith and Team.
Detailed Review: The guests experience is truly amazing as i traveled a lot but here the standard are high everything very materialized right from porches to hotels lobby mr.smith nadim they took very good care and looking back to come again and special thanks to front office who was outstanding

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: vikaskapoorkapoor
Detailed Review: Great job smith and team nice ambiance good food good  From xiaomi and team you all are great work Breakfast spread very good  Special thanks to Deepika kanojiya who took good care of us Good vibes good food great people great culture thank you team orchid

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Traveller
Detailed Review: Lovely hospitality. Such warm and caring staff ( Urvashi ). Breakfast spread was excellent. Cant wait to be back again for a longer stay. Overall a good experience. I would suggest good hotel if you want to stay near airport.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Murshid
Detailed Review: I forgot my mobile phone in room during check out and after 1 hour hotel administration called me and told me that I forgot my phone in room, after minimum formalities I get my phone back, Thanks a lot for hospitality

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Henna C
Review: Dirty empty large ice cream tubs left under the bed! Laundry never delivered at agreed times
Detailed Review: Family of 8 from London and California for a 9 night stay during my brothers wedding. Easy check in, polite staff, friendly welcome every time we pass through the lobby. Staff at the bars and restaurants provided great service. Security checks at entrance can be excessive but the security staff are very friendly and quick causing minimal hassle. Kiran at the door was always smiling and professional. Kanhaiyya was also very helpful and polite. A shame we didn't see both of them at time of check out.   Laundry service are appalling. They agree to drop off at specific reasonable times but never follow through. First laundry service was not dropped off until a further 24 hours later after calling several times. I even called the manager four times, who agreed to come and resolve but…

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: amol7472
Detailed Review: Excellent service by team and very good food special thanks to salman akshat shelshs and mr tarik morevriety' on buffet will visit agian and will suggest to all my friends and colleagues super ambitions and lovely place

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: laticsblue
Detailed Review: The hotel experience at this hotel was excellent , the staff , especially Mr Smith , assistant manager, who gave us an up grade and was very helpful in every way , the check in was excellent as we arrived early from goa ,, and would recomend and stay in this hotel all times on my visits ,, a 5 star stay 👍👍👍👍,

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sayam Pokharna
Detailed Review: Himanshu the person at front desk and Smith helped me with an early and quick check-in, the property is very close to the airport and nearby attraction. Would recommend everyone to stay at this property.!

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: nishant dholakia
Detailed Review: I got superb service by Urvashi and smith. They immediately give us a early room as per request. Even hospitality was superb. They offered us tea and coffee as we were waiting for a room. Ambience of the hotel was very good. And very neat clean property.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: A Mdh
Detailed Review: Ms Prachi booked our stay directly via WhatsApp easily.   Upon arrival, Mr Smith saw to us efficiently. We were able to enjoy a breakfast promised from a previous stay. Good choice at breakfast and kind/attentive staff. Mr Smith expedited our check in as we had arrived early and kindly upgraded our room.   Overall, excellent service! Thank you.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ivacrasto
Review: Business Visit excellent service by front office
Detailed Review: As this hotel nearto airport is the best place Services here are very sorted intems off checkout check in Smith mahesh mayuri Are very fastidious n theirs respect work department.  Early morning breakfast spread also very nice

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sen
Detailed Review: Great experience with check in, very helpful staff. Also due to flight change I asked for late check out which was accommodated inspite of the hotel being sold out. Special thanks to Mr Smith for his kind help and going out of his way to organise late check out till 3.30 pm.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: shellw37
Review: Birthday surprise by Smith and Urvashi
Detailed Review: The Guest Relation personnel were very prompt and helpful. They made sure we were comfortable and gave us the best they could offer .  Thanks for the help and keep up the good work !   We need more people like you in order to have a pleasant stay .

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Arpitbajpai
Detailed Review: I met Mr.Mahesh in arrival he introduce the guest experience manager Mr.Smith Roy he made us  very comfortable and the checkin experience was very amazing the hotel services and food are very good Thank you will visit again as this is now our prefered hotel which was recommended by Mr.roopesh soNi

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Mamta N
Review: Smith hospitality at The orchid Mumbai
Detailed Review: Excellent Service by Smith. Swift and efficient check in, greatly appreciated before check in time. Excellent hospitality. Great ambiance. Very welcoming. Delicious coffee by Minakshi at the Gourmet shop.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Bharatnagda
Detailed Review: Very nice hotel, we were welcomed by Smith and took care of checking in and made us feel very comfortable after a long journey. We are sure our stay with The Orchid will be very plesant and comfortable.  Menaxi from gourmet shop assist us with nice coffee.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Vijay Sarma V
Detailed Review: I came in early to the hotel before the check in time and Mr.Smith, the guest experience manager was extremely helpful in finding me a room before the official check in time by making it a priority. Good experience!

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Anand Mall
Detailed Review: Nice hotel firstly nearby to all local attractions Smith Kunal was very accommodating with my request the hotel had very good lobby decorated with strawberry and good ambience as the rooms were not available by 9am still Smith Assured to give me room as early as possible I am happy with my experience

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Maninatraj
Review: Royal experience by Smith Sonia from front office
Detailed Review: Blown by the hospitality and the professional attitude .. guest relations lead mr.smith put us at ease as soon as we entered and tried checking in.  One of the best experiences by a long shot - specially considering we travel extenaively.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Saravanan
Review: Excellent quality experience by Smith and Team.
Detailed Review: Beautiful seamless check in experience the hospitality services is outstanding Smith Urvashi Sonia who identified a beautiful runway facing room Thanks for the awesome quality experience  Thanks once again

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: SaloniKaushik
Detailed Review: Great customer service experience with Smith ,right from entering to the hotel to check out . Every thing went seemless.  Coffee was served by Meenakshi which was perfect after a tiring flight:)  Had a great experience overall.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Arvind S
Review: Excellent service by front office and Gourmet Shop
Detailed Review: It was a warm welcome and fast entry to the main lounge, with the kind assistance from Mr. Smith at front office the early checkin became possibility in no time. Good start of the day with a coffee offered by the Gourmet shop handled by Menakshi which was on the house :).   Never had such an experience during check-in. Thanks and keep up the good work

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: J d
Detailed Review: I came to the hotel prior to check in time. Mr. Smith was kind enough to assist me with my check in process and room was allotted on priority basis. Really appreciate your efforts and kindness Mr. Smith.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Kedar B
Detailed Review: I had a great experience with Orchid hotel and all thanks to the wonderful team! Extremely happy and satisfied with the round the clock help provided by the staff. Look forward to more such events! Thank you Amit, Alex. Really loved the tea counter nearby.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sandra C
Review: Luxury club rooms appreciated Service By Smith And Atul
Detailed Review: I was made feel very welcome by mr smith lovely room and very nice hotel will look forward to a nice stay in Mumbai and taking advantage of the facilities on offer in the hotel the hotel is very close to the airport less than 10 minutes with a complimentary drop of very pleasant              Baza

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: scrumhalfRedditch
Detailed Review: We arrived from Goa to be greeted by the hotel staff Mr Smith was particularly helpful got us an upgrade with free drinks beers coffee etc we got a very nice room shown to club lounge for coffee and cake Mr Smith made sure we were aware of al the facilities and only left us when we were happy Scrumhalf9
