Name: prabhudasamarshighaghada
Detailed Review: firstly very nearly to airport great lobby ambiance  the airport manager Mr Noel very humble and Imran also Mr Smith Umar Priya from front desk very good in their job as they all were very professional and honored my all requests  thank you rooms and facilities very good

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Maha A
Detailed Review: Our booking was done from Canada by my travel partner he said I had Booked’s the best hotel   But I would say this is one of the best in india The clients service is awesome here staff has time to speak to listen and most importantly smith never said No he always used to say I ll get back to you Almost my three day stay my one point contacts was Mr smith he had given me ultra luxury experience

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: nbharadwaaj
Review: Fantastic Event at The Orchid Mumbai - Prive
Detailed Review: We had Organised a 48th Annual Conference at the The Orchid Mumbai for About 100 People at the Prive Hall,  it was a wonderful Experience of the Warmth & Hospitality by the Banquet Team Lead by Mr. Vikram & Beautifully Executed by Mr. Amit with his Team Members Shubham & Mangesh,  Making us feel at Home with Prompt Response to our last Minute Changes & Requests

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Lewis W
Detailed Review: Seek alternatives. This hotel is located close to the airport but far from anything else. The rooms are dated and the bathrooms are not clean as you would expect. The hotel does not allow outside guests even during day time. Food and beverage options at this hotel is limited and expensive in comparison to other options available. Would not recommend.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: ManIshnaroem
Review: Great Check in Experience For CLASSIC TRAVELS
Detailed Review: Beautiful seamless check-in experience at orchid Mumbai  Thanks for the service  We all appreciate the welcome gesture  Specially at lobby by smith umar atul At checkout Mahesh  Check in taken by himanshu and nadim Good food  Clean rooms Thanks for your service.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Michelle
Detailed Review: Everything perfect itz like home away from home front office mahesh and priya are faboluos Mr.Smith at lobby i can see him always smiling for my extention he always help me lot i stay many times just because of this service and hospitality. Mr.Smith and your Team You guys are Rocking...

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Prabhatripathi
Detailed Review: First of all its very near to the airport,Great ambiance. Assistant Manager Smith, and other team members helped a lot to get a seamless early check-in. Have offered complimentary tea on arrivals. overall it was my best check-in experience.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: SunitaN
Detailed Review: I was completely surprised to see a cake placed in my room with beautiful balloon decoration.Staff were really kind to celebrate my special day. THANKS ONCE AGAIN to all the staff especially Guest relation team Urvashi , Deepika Wagh & Housekeeping Emelia.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ketankothari
Detailed Review: Thanks for all the help extended by Ms Urvashi Rathod & Mr Smith Roy The hotel club rooms are very neat and clean view from the room is extraordinary hats off to entire from office Team kudos to this people who reserved  good room all request was honoured and at last with class facilities Urvashi And Smith keep rocking

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Apurva G
Review: Great stay at orchid thanks to front office
Detailed Review: It was splendid a great experience I usually stay at taj Santa Cruz or saharastar I never experience such a good hospitality by front office Team Guest relations Urvashi mahesh from front office and Smith  They all are excellent at work  I had not paid neither front offices team asked for extras charges for early check in this is very good I had paid at saharastar I must say hotel standard very high  Thanks forever the service

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rahul
Detailed Review: I am a frequent traveller and visitor at Hotel Orchid near Mumbai Airport. The staff the hotel is very helpful especially Mr Mahesh, Ms Mayuri and Mr Smith, who had not only gave a nice welcome but also ensured a swift check in. Orchid Hotel Mumbai par excellence due to its reception staff.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Lorenasandra
Detailed Review: Good reception. Excellent service.  Good hospitality of staff Mahesh, Mayuri, Mr. Smith and guest relations Ms deepika.  Ambience of the place is nice and people are friendly and helpful.  A good place to relax and location is convenient too. Very close to the airport.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Avisek C
Review: Excellent hospitality by Front of the house.
Detailed Review: The orchid is a fantastic hotel with excellent staff who are really helpful and kind. At the front desk Smith and Mayuri helped me with reservation and my questions.  Mr Subhash was very acomodating with my luggage very helpful person Gourmet shop Tea at best.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Andrewpeter
Detailed Review: Hi team it was a pleasure to meet all the orchdians. Special thanks to Pratiksha from operators for giving me wake up call dinner at boulevard awesome the asst manager Smith Umar we're very accommodating for the request place Team front office ms.gauri also very humble and soft spoken  Thank you.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Chetanjaygade
Review: You Can Experience Royalty This Place
Detailed Review: I rate hotels mainly Hilton under five categories but here I found and feel the difference of hospitality  Right from check in to escorting Good ambiance nice food oh god front office team is fabulous concierge at best Smith amazing person at lobby Thank you Smith for this Royal Tour

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: AshAsdrian
Review: Business visit at class level experience
Detailed Review: The bell desk team and the front office team are very excellent  Smith the assistant manager and subhash from bell desk they were very helpfull  Smith show me the complete property at checkin Gave us nice view room everything was fabolus as per standard  Nice gourmet shop decorates with strawberry looking beautiful

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Vjrao
Detailed Review: I would like to congratulate the entire team at orchid hotel for their hospitality while i stayed. Staff is very friendly and motivated towards their work. The breakfast area has superb staff who takes care of customers table in very professional and friendly way. Food is good.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: amitmishra
Detailed Review: The good thing about this property itz very easy for excess close to the domestic airport amazing check in experience by nadim the lobby manager Mr smith upsold us to club room with an amaxing view top floor with unlimited starter and liquor Very professional Rooms are very big as compared to hilton hotel. Very good experience Thankyou

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Savitadeshpande
Detailed Review: We have been having a group check-in Sahara Star and now we are having it here at Orchid Mumbai iand there is so much difference in the process here The team has been very Helpful and the coordination was amazing .  I am the group Coordinator and we have check in other hotels also at st regis and four seasons. but the volume of guests and everything has been more here but still so smooth and perfect ..  Special Thanks to Smith ,Atul, Nadeem and Umar.. Even the Breakfast spread was very good at Prieve Ballroom .

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Froomee
Detailed Review: The staff were always helpful and friendly. Service exemplary, choice of foods wonderful. We highly recommend the Orchid hotel for all guests. The restaurant food at lobby is amazing  The upper  deck bar very good  Housekeeping standards also great The front office Team is excellent Thank you

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Kennedy pitt
Review: Excellent Service By Team Concierge Operator's And by front office Team
Detailed Review: I would highly recommend this hotel to my near and dear one right from check in to check out during our stay we noticed every one very helpful the bell desk team shorn Antonio we're very kind and regarding any service call used to pick up by operators most of the time's Ms. Fabiola Nimisha I had conversation with them this people are very good listeners giving me wake up call on time and asking for reminder this is what we we're experienced at this property check in check out process was very smooth no wait time very speedy process.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Journey824982
Detailed Review: Excellent service by Rohit the duty manger who not only understood my plight of cancelled transit hotels - but offered the early check/ check out for my day meetings. This was a good gesture and very business friendly.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Uwe R
Detailed Review: Hotel offers good price to value. Good ambience. Visit Mostly Grills rooftop bar. Execelent food and service. Mrs. Kalyani and Mr. Bachhan will take care of you. And be sure Akshay will serve you well.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Basu
Detailed Review: I'm impressed. It's Day 1 here. I couldn't have asked for more. Room smeels good. They are neat and clean. Staff are welcoming and one could feel the vibrance right from the entrance.  Got some great help from the house keeping staff especially Zeeshan.  Glad to have choosen this hotel.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Nick O
Detailed Review: Perfect device and a superb stay. Special thanks to Deepika from guest relations & Club manager Deepika been helpful in regards with my transportation arrangements. Made even better after my tour via the local train.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: salman s
Review: Excellent hospitality by gourmet shop and front office
Detailed Review: It was a classical  experience  at orchid Mumbai  the front office team very helpful and supportive the gourmet shop well stocked with cakes crossaints pastries  Price's  are also very economical and most important very delicious   Thankyou  Menaxi Vinit Smith Nadim  for your support

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Navambika D
Detailed Review: Mr.Mahesh, Ms.Kanchan and Ms.Hema have been really kind enough towards us and did great job in service. Loved their Hospitality. This is not the first time and it has been a lovely experience everytime.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Pillai
Detailed Review: Good , good conservation. Mumbai time near by AIRPORT.  Traveling near to airport happy in today traffic conditions  Food are good   Car pick is good  Drop also  Thanks deepika club manager for all the help and great hospitality

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Richard D
Detailed Review: Mehreen and depika Waghmare at the guest relations. Bell services vijay and sachin was amazing . Every single person i talked to was upbeat Mr Atul was helpful. I dudbt have to ask for anything.south of vindyas was great . The service was akazing

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Dhaval Patel
Review: Classic experience at orchid Mumbai by front office Team
Detailed Review: The hote is very nice and comfortable the staff are friendly and their service are very excellent good hospitality shown by Mr Smith Deepika the club manager and many more names Rohit mayuri Madhurima Urvashi Deepika from guest relations were very courteous

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Daniel wittman
Detailed Review: Had a good experience staying at orchid. I was waiting for check out .Smith the asst mgr helped me to check out in early. Thanks to orchid team. Looking forward for more stays. Amazing stay!! Lots of food options.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Alistarzavier
Detailed Review: People say in India wah Taj I would always prefer coming this hotel and say wah orchid wah  Excellent hospitality by Smith and mayuri the team is very professional and know what to deliver to guest.  This guys are real asset of the hotel By abundance with smith and Team Great Team spirit  Good rooms nice ambience lovely food fantastic food only at orchid Wah  Wah  Wah.  Orchid!!!!!!!!

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: MattBaraniecki
Review: The wedding trip at Orchid Mumbai superb hospitality by Smith and Mayuri.
Detailed Review: We found this hotel because our previous accommodations were not as promised. The photos alone do not do justice to how beautiful this property is. From the moment we walked in the staff have be incredibly helpful, courteous, and without a doubt the best I've experienced. I supervise at a hotel in Canada and I notice some of the smaller things and this hotel has been above and beyond any expectation. Mr.Smith has helped us in our check in process as our booking had not come through yet and took care of some extra experiences due to the wait. This was not expected at all from us and we are beyond grateful for the service and hospitality we recieved. Thank you for everything!

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Robertarnold
Review: Fantastical service by front office team
Detailed Review: The hotel is very nice and comfortable the staff are friendly and there service is excellent you won't get better service in other places  Smith from front office really took good care and also my entire family went tobody massage at hotel spa which smith recommended

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Virendra
Detailed Review: Staff are friendly and profession and delivered superior customer service I will definitely visit again soon and spend more time with my family as this was my business trip The gourmet shop well decorated thank you Smith NAdim Mayuri duty manager Rohit god bless u Many thanks Mr.virendra

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Prasad A
Detailed Review: Had a good experience staying at Orchid. I was waiting for check in, smith the asst mgr helped me to check in early and also served nice early morning coffee. Thanks to Orchid team...  Looking forward for more stays   Prasad A

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ankit B
Detailed Review: Great restaurant, great food, service and great view. On the rooftop of the hotel with a view of the domestic airport. Naresh and Pritam were very attentive and took good care of us. Tried the Texas barbecue chicken there and was really good!

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Mangala K
Review: I visited with my friends, had a great experience, staff is  excellent, great food and caring staff
Detailed Review: Staff members were too good, specially Hema, Salman, Raul and Mr. Rahul, Manager.Thy were very Hospitable and we really enjoyed the experience,great service and good food was high light of the day. I am happy I became Gold Member of Orchid as I will get to come to this place more often  and enjoy the facilities,

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Drgunasekaran
Review: The orchid kudos Smith and Atul
Detailed Review: I dr.gunasekaran from Abbott india limited   When I came for check in there was a long que. Smith and atul the manager they assist me with my check in  And also room upgrade to next category was given.  I like the room the decor and the lobby with beautiful strawberry.   All people very enthusiastic

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Avinashkakamanu
Detailed Review: I had a pleasant experience great food hotel good room and a very courteous and friendly staff I paid and I am what I got delivered premier rooms was not very good close to airport and hotel taxi and car services easily available

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Kajalchandaria
Review: Excellent service by smith atul mayuri
Detailed Review: It was a greatly appreciated services by Smith and team  I was here for more then 05 days lobby atmosphere food I came from kenya I lived here like a second home peoples are very good listener  All services right from door man to front office yo yo bang on Thanking you for the service provided

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Jenith P
Review: wonderfull checkin by smith the great person in orchid
Detailed Review: Everything perfect . offer me free upgrade room .it was great pleasure to staying at this price .The staff were so kind .Mr smith are so helpfull .and piano at recepition are so good and lobby are so well arrange and clean . afterall everything perfect .Happy to visit again .

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Suheil
Review: Great hotel and location next to airport
Detailed Review: Stayed 1 night at The Orchid. Excellent decor with nice and clean rooms. WiFi wasn’t great unfortunately but staff were very helpful otherwise. Shower was also really nice. Only 10 mins away from the airport so a great location and about 20 mins to Juhu beach.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rajivvora1234
Review: Good show by deepika and smith
Detailed Review: I came early at hotel as rooms were not available Ms deepika assist us with check-in formalities also smith assured the rooms will be given on priority It was an amazing experience though lobby was very busy and crowded They assist me and take good care off me the gourmet shop nisha salman menjadi wre doing good job also

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rahul Tondon
Detailed Review: It was my first visit at Orchid Mumbai for Office Business trip.I was amazed with the overall services,Good restaurant and plenty of choice at the buffet,where you can get delicious and quality meals.Staff was very courteous and friendly,High level service from Front desk.Value for money, Great property

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Vic
Detailed Review: I have been meaning to write this review for the last few months regarding a stay that my parents had in February of this year. Their stay went wonderfully and I am very thankful for the efforts of the entire St. Regis team from the minute my parents set foot in the hotel to the time they checked out.   In particular, I would like to acknowledge the efforts of Chirag Gosavi and the entire butler service for taking such incredible care of my parents during their visit. They were over the top impressed and thankful for the above and beyond service they experienced. Both of my parents grew up in Mumbai during a different time in the city's evolution. To be able to come back and stay at the best property in the city was a true privilege and it was made all the better by the staff.…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Marry
Detailed Review: Before we checked-in to St. Regis, we stayed one night in Four Seasons Mumbai. What a huge difference in terms of rooms, service. Four Seasons is so old and dull, smelly rooms, old furniture compare to St. Regis. St Regis is definetly worth 5  star rating and worth calling it luxurious.. Lobby and rooftop bar were our favourite spots. Every detail of our stay was well planned and organized by our butler Akansha Matto. I liked the fact that butler was availbale 24 hours on whatsapp and if anything was needed, team would be right there for you. Before I even had a thought of wanting something they were there to offer you. Telepathy )) Thank you for your fantastic service and making our trip to Mumbai memorable.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Nikhil P
Detailed Review: We had a corporate party over here in Feb. Ambiance is awesome and place is just conveniently located in Lower Parel , where there are lots of offices situated. It is quite spacious , food is Ok. Overall a good experience.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Nilofar J
Detailed Review: We loved our stay at the Regis. This is our third time staying at the Regis. The service provided is so good that we find ourselves coming back everytime we are in Mumbai.  Our latest visit at the Regis was in Feb 2020 for my brothers wedding, we had 2 rooms booked. Our buttler Joy went above and beyond to make our stay comfortable and memorable. I had an eye infection the day we landed and we had a doctor visit the room at 11pm and the eye drops he prescribed were sent to our room half hour later.   Our 2 month old baby had diarrhea and the doctor was there to see him straight away.   We had breakfast at the seven kitchens and honestly its one of the best breakfast spreads we have seen. We would look forward to just having breakfast every morning.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: JRedmondWA
Detailed Review: I had a pleasant stay at the St. Regis Mumbai during a business trip in early February.   After returning home, I saw that I was billed in USD, ~15% higher charges than preferred local currency INR.  (~US$140)  I did not receive a photocopy of the signed receipt w/ currency preference.  The local currency allows for a better conversion rate.  I complained to Marriott customer care.  They said they would forward a refund request to the St. Regis Mumbai, and to expect a reply within 3-5 business days.  Two weeks later, I heard nothing, so I emailed again.  I received an apologetic response from the St. Regis duty manager saying he is "initiating the currency conversion" and will "provide you the cancellation number as soon as we receive the same from our merchant".    Another 11…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Pratindra
Detailed Review: Very Courteous Staff, Comfortable rooms, Smooth Check-in & Check-out, Delicious Food at Seven Kitchens lavish buffet, Spa was so relaxing though the swimming pool is small. Location adjacent to the Phoenix Mall is so convenient.  Special mention of the housekeeping person Anoop Kumar who made our honeymoon trip special by beautifully decorating the room. Splendid job !!

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ajaypangasa
Detailed Review: It was one of the most memorable trip we have had off late. It was our daughters 13 birthday and we feel very lucky to have to come to your Hotel for the stay. Weather it was the room , the front desk , personal butlers , morning buffet at your Seven Resturant , Chef Dane Hospitable behaviour, to having great time in your roof top bar and having great snacks there or having a amazing experience of Genius Chef Asif Qureshi and Chef Ali brilliant preparations of finger licking meals in The Sahib Room everything was an experience on its own

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Dhruven Patel
Detailed Review: This was my second time staying at the St. Regis in Mumbai. It was again spectacular! We loved everything about our stay. Our Butler Vineet was incredible and his attention to detail was superb. I had mentioned very briefly that my fiance and I were in Mumbai for our wedding shopping and he went out of his way to have a chocolate cake delivered to our room TWICE saying congratulations! Everything was perfect as the St. Regis is always. Will never stay at another hotel in Mumbai!

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Hayagriv J
Detailed Review: An amazing hotel, St Regis is easily one of the best hotels in South Mumbai. An excellent location, super amenities, a great line up of night clubs and of course a to die for spread for breakfast.   All this brought together by the excellent staff whose warmth and hospitality was par excellence. And how can we forget to mention Mr. Kaushik Khadtare who made sure our stay was comfortable and memorable

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Genesis Velazco
Detailed Review: Thanks for everything. I really liked my stay in the St. Régis hotel in Mumbai. Everything was amazing, food, people, customer service, etc.. I want to mention Mr. Vineet Pai. He was really kind with me and my Job's team. He was always taking care of our stay there and our rooms' amenities. Thanks Vineet, for your excellent and personalized assistance!

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ta8
Detailed Review: As i have stayed in this hotel before and i was happy so thought of staying again.. This time it was not that impressive as last time. This time paid nearly 40% more than last time - approx $ 254.00 per night. Grand deluxe rooms which are seaview is nothing different from deluxe beside the view.  So don't think of paying more if you are not serious about the view. As deluxe were sold out so had to go for grand deluxe. The best thing about this hotel is the location and the breakfast. Their breakfast spread is very good and worth taking room with breakfast and their spread changes every day so if you are long stay then also you will not be bored with the food. Our housekeeping guy and room service guys were very helpful. We were assign butler whom we never seen or heard after…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Uday Singh Dhanoa
Detailed Review: My stay at the St. Regis was quite a memorable one, the team was very welcoming and warm, the room was great and had a very scenic view, the hotel right in the centre of the city had one of the best food and beverage and night life offerings, the hotel staff was very courteous and was very helpful through out my stay, I was on the 13th floor and my room overlooked the racecourse and had the skyline in the back drop, would definitely recommend staying at the St. Regis if you are looking at options within South Bombay, the breakfast spread is huge and has a lot of variety to choose from, from bakery offerings to sorbets, they had it all at the St. Regis. The In room dining was very prompt and efficient with their service, Amit from housekeeping was quite helpful with turning my…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Harsha
Review: Extremely distressing experience, worst customer service
Detailed Review: Quick review. Stayed here for a night. Worst customer service ever experienced. Also, please don't be fooled by the 'Butler service'. It's regular housekeeping, just highly inefficient.  1. No one to help you with your luggage (unlike other 5 star Indian hotels). I requested for someone to carry my luggage and it reached 45 minutes later. 2. Room was booked for two but it was setup (towels and toiletries) for one. Took another hour to get that in shape. 3. Requested for turn down before leaving for dinner and came back to the same state with another set of apologies from the manager. 4. The iphone dock wasn't working and they took more time tp fix it. 5. Requested for turn down before leaving for breakfast- came back after an hour with housekeeping just starting to work. Waited…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Slowdown22
Detailed Review: The St Regis is an elegant and well appointed hotel with all the amenities you could ask for including a butler service. This rather indulgent service provides a personal butler to attend to your every whim.  Our butler was Suzala, a sweet young lady that saw to our every need. Tea would suddenly appear, with little cookies on the side, all our reservations taken care of immediately, shopping requests and any information needed was all taken care of efficiently and with a smile. Our stay overall was lovely, staff and services were all outstanding. We even indulged in Afternoon Tea in their beautiful Drawing Room, Daxita made the whole experience extra special with very attentive and personalized service.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: JMD
Detailed Review: If you want the royal treatment with everything in one location, this is the hotel in Mumbai. The staff are incredibly professional and courteous. The restaurants in the hotel are sublime. The ambience of the hotel is highly elegant and you will feel safe and secure in this highly fashionable and exquisite hotel. This hotel is for every traveler (couples, business or leisure) who want the security and quality of a top notch establishment. No doubt my next trip to Mumbai will be longer so I can enjoy more of this incredible hotel.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Malay S
Detailed Review: Very Good room and very good service by Kaushik Khadtare. He was very cooperative and Service given was excellent.  The Bubble Bath option given with rose petals was also very good.  The service via whatsapp was also very good

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Docanuj
Detailed Review: Hats off to all of the staff at the St. Regis Mumbai. At check-in I was presented the option of a paid upgrade to one of their furnished corporate apartments. For approximately 12,000 rupees a night it was a bargain! We got a 2 bedroom, 2.5 bath apartment with nice large living room and kitchen but most importantly with the legendary Butler service. Also included in the upgrade price was breakfast either at Seven Kitchens or in our room, high tea with tea and snacks, and cocktail hour with cocktails and appetizers.   Hats off as well to Akansha Mattoo and the rest of the Butler staff who made sure that all of our stay was curated to the utmost level. I have forgotten names of most of the staff who took care of us but I believe it was Pratik the Chef de Partie took care of us…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Hiren Desai
Review: A hotel that treat you like family.
Detailed Review: I must say this Hotel and its staff is outstanding. I have been staying at this hotel when I travel to Mumbai, and every trip I am blown away with their hospitality. Now that I have been visiting this hotel frequently the entire front desk staff recognizes me and address me by my name.  A special Shout out to Duty Manager Suman, Who is alway eager to help and goes above and beyond his duty to assist.  This hotel is very family friendly and also great for night life.. their Breakfast Buffett is awesome.  I specially like their mini midnight buffet on Friday and Saturday night… I highly suggest this hotel. Worth every penny.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Mayte P
Review: Outstanding service, great place to stay
Detailed Review: Upon our arrival to the front desk we were offer the option of an upgrade (for a fee) by Suman Kundu, the front desk manager that was taking care of us. We took it, as it included daily buffet breakfast, afternoon tea at their tea room and drinks from 6-8 at their Luna lounge on the 37th floor with amazing views. Totally worth it!  The new room had a problem with the window and on our second day we told Suman about it. He immediately took care of it. Since the problem couldn't be resolved, he offered us an upgrade to a beautiful, large one bedroom apartment that was amazing. The views were incredible, as was the butler service, the bathrooms, plenty of closet space, pantry, dining room, living room, etc. etc..    Breakfast was amazing and Sous Chef Sandra was very nice and…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Virendra Pethad
Detailed Review: Me, my wife & my son stayed here in their 1 bed room apartment no 3201 from 15.02.2020-16.02.2020 for a night  to bring in our 11th marriage anniversary and boy we had good time.   Check-in was breeze, we had booked a junior suite but got a pleasant upgrade to their apartment which was a nice gesture by Suman, one of the front desk’s manager.    Our room no was 3201 & was on the 32nd floor and had a stunning view of the city & sea. Our apartment included the afternoon hi-tea from 3-5 pm & cocktail hours from 6-8 pm. It had a powder toilet, a small pantry, a dining area, a sitting area, 1 master bed room with attached bathroom. It was nice & huge.   Our room had a small pantry attached to it with a complete kitchen from a cooking range to a dish washer, chimney, fridge,…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sejal Mehta
Detailed Review: I can’t even begin to express my gratitude towards the staff. I celebrated my birthday at the St Regis and was looked after like a princess. Want to acknowledge a few people that went out of their way to make my day so so beautiful. Pinky,Suman Kundu, Kiran the butler, Arjun at the Luna lounge, the chef at the Lounge during cocktail hrs. What a fabulous team of hard working and diligent individuals. As I have always believed that “a hotel is nothing without its employees”. These individuals have succeeded is reinforcing my beliefs. Thank you from the bottom of my heart for extending such a warm and friendly environment. God bless and keep spreading and creating such memories for all the lives you touch🤗💕

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Hap1970
Review: Short stay on Mumbai st Regis
Detailed Review: I was blown away by the st Regis . The ambiance the decor and styling are fab. I had an executive suite with butler called joy d’souza who was amazing and friendly and helped me in any way I needed. From my checkin at 3am in the morning to when I checked out. He made a big difference to the experience I have to also mention the club lounge which was fab cocktails but the breakfast buffet is the very best I have had . Will be back hetal

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Mary N
Detailed Review: We just finished a four night stay at the St. Regis in Mumbai.  It was a combination of good and bad.    The front desk, butler service, spa and concierge were not what we expect from a St. Regis.  We had very disappointing encounters with each area.    The restaurants on the other hand were fabulous, both the food and the staff.  We ate in By the Mekong twice and The Sahib Room once.  Rishabh, Axam and Sydney provided amazing service.  The restaurant staff should train the staff in the other areas!

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: wan kina
Detailed Review: 街の中心部を動き回るには非常に便利なロケーションで、設備も素晴らしい。チェックイン/アウトなどの手続きは円滑。ボトルの水やアメニティが豊富で、トイレ/風呂などはとてもきれいな状態。 My second stay at St Regis Mumbai for business trip. Good location to move around the central city. Check in/out process is smooth. Room is sufficiently large and very well equipped. Plenty bottles of water as well as amenities are available. Bathroom is clean and tidy.  Very recommendable for all types of visit purpose.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Umar H
Detailed Review: Hello,   I was about to write a review on the booking sites regarding a pretty bad experience I had during my stay at your hotel. But I thought of sharing it here first since you’re the loyalty manager. I booked your hotel car on the 8th of Feb on hourly basis. I had some places in mind to visit as well as the local attractions  recommended by the Concierge. But when I started my journey with your hotel Driver Javed, he kept on insisting to take me places I didn’t want to visit and started rushing/discouraging places i was genuinely looking forward to visit. Although I was paying hourly. He kept pusing me first to go to this pub on Marine Drive for drinks right after I started. When refused, next he kept on insisting to take me to some Silk/Pashmina shawl store near the Taj…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: krishna agarwal
Detailed Review: The stay at the hotel was super comfortable  We were also given early check-in as requested  Upon arrival we were given a warm welcome by the butler Mr. Rahul Bhosale, who also explained us about the details and the functions of the room  Breakfast was amazing!   There were a few negative things like The view of the room provided to us was not that good enough.  The placement of the Hairdryer made it difficult for us to use as it was attached to a specific place which was far away from mirror ( so you cannot see the mirror while blow drying your hair)   But Overall it was super good and I would definitely recommend staying at the hotel!

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Aj13
Review: A wonderful stay at the at Regis
Detailed Review: I recently visited the St Regis hotel in Mumbai and received the most exceptional service along with a luxurious room and view. I was warmly greeted by the entire hotel staff but my favourite was the butler service given by Mr. Kiran Mohite. From making dinner reservations to attending to your smallest needs , he’s your go to guy. I jokingly mentioned to him while I  checked  in that I had a birthday coming up and upon entering my room I was welcomed with balloons a hand written card and a cake prepared by the staff. This warm gesture absolutely made my day and to top it off I even had a gift waiting for me in the room which was an adorable picture frame. I was extremely touched by the care and comfort I received for just that one night that I stayed there . The only thing I…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Patrick
Detailed Review: Stayed here for four nights and was blown away be the level of service, the quality of the hotel and accommodations, and the amenities. The quality of the breakfast and in-room dining is excellent. The gym and spa is world-class. The rooms are amazing. All the employees are incredibly friendly and helpful. And by global standards it is very very reasonably priced. Highly recommend. Also very central location for business travelers.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: vixabs
Review: Exemplary Service in Locating Lost Bag
Detailed Review: A big shout out to St Regis Mumbai and Caesar Araujo for the high service levels, agility and presence of mind, and complete customer centric support sown during my recent stay at the St Regis in Parel Mumbai.  I mistakenly picked up someone else's bag in the plane in my hurry to reach my destination quickly. When i opened my bag in the hotel room and realised that it was not mine, Caesar swung into action. Not only did he quickly deploy the hotel network at the airport to locate my bag and replace with the lost bag before morning, but also provided me with a pyjama kit and offered express laundry service to get the clothes i was wearing laundered overnight. And then followed up the next morning even though his shift was over, to ensure i had got all i needs and was all set.…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: XactTravels
Detailed Review: This is a beautiful hotel and we visited the rooftop bar that offers some great views. Chill lounges with deep house music nice drinks , friendly staff and good service. Nice place to spend the evening.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Tarun S
Detailed Review: Simply wow. I was here for weekend and we had an amazing time. It is connected to the mall so makes it even a better place to stay. There are several restaurants and bar in the property and each one of them is amazing. Rooftop bar is a must do There spa is amazing and the gym is huge. Swimming pool location is perfect and the changing room consists of jacuzzi, steam and sauna.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Vipin
Detailed Review: Hotel is excellent,  all staff is very  good and very helpful,  specially bell desk team pradeep & Vijay very helpful and supportive.  Food is very nice.local is very good with good ambiance very good. Stall

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Anil Bhaskaran
Detailed Review: Great hotel great hospitality and Pradeep is an excellent host. The location is also located at a place which is accessible with all modes of transport. Staff is well behaved and courteous. Special mention for Pradeep who always was willing to help.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Percy260378
Detailed Review: The Restaurant and the staff service was much higher than the expectations. The food was super and Bansi was our table in charge who was absolutely outstanding, very warm and professional. We enjoyed our anniversary  meal with our 4 year old daughter all thanks to the amazing child friendly service by the staff and Bansi in particular. Keep up the outstanding  performance  guys.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ashok Gupta
Detailed Review: The rooms are small with less space for movement. The service is okay. However, the restaurant on SP floor is good with nice spread in buffet. The property is nicely located at the corner of the road and is easily traceable.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Heta patel
Review: Bansi is the one with you should get your service done with.!!!!
Detailed Review: I was overwhelmed and impressed by the staff of Hotel Vits Mumbai, the service is too good and the food service is too fast and the servers are very kind.! Highly recommended.! Bansi is the best among all.!!

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Fenil patel
Review: Best hotel to stay in mumbai
Detailed Review: It was the best hotel to stay while be in mumbai. Food quality is great and service is at its best. Server named BANSI was the best amongst all.! All time food was great and the buffet had great options to enjoy.! Will surely visit it again..:)

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Himanshu Singhal
Detailed Review: Vits hotel location is good, in breakfast time Summit's team working to good, food is to tasty, Pool area is superb. Every meal is tasts perfect. All management is good service provider. Superb Superb......

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Chinhun
Detailed Review: Good place to stay . Location is great. Close to the airport. Hotel services are good. Great food menun and taste  Hotel staff is really helpful and willing to help. I would like to mention Mr.Sumit from the restaurant. He and his team is great at personalized service and is very prompt. Thank you Sumit and team .  Overall a very pleasant experience overall. Will come back and recommend .

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: rajukarania
Detailed Review: My wife and I have stayed in this hotel on and off for over 10 years. This visit has left such a bad taste that I don’t think I will ever return.  On check in I was given a riot act you can not bring guests to the room or food.  We had a suite with a kitchenette with an extractor fan and a huge fridge. A living room decorated like a 1970’s movie. The bedroom looked the same as all the others so the cost of £130.00 is a total rip off when we can not even use the living room or kitchenette.  I decided to go for a beer in the bar where they use to have beer on tap while my wife was getting ready.  Once again disappointed no beer on tap. After my wife got ready and no decent beer decided to eat out.  When we returned that evening we asked for Mr Rajesh Mehta to raise our concerns…

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Nadeem K
Detailed Review: Service along with food was exuberant. Lighting, pool and decorations were quite attractive.  Especially the service delivered by Mr. Bansi was beyond the expected.  Recommended for a couple looking out for cozy place.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ciise
Review: Excellent stay and visit. Thank You!!
Detailed Review: This hotel is wonderful. Location is perfect as you are 8 min walk from metro station with easy access to mumbai. The hotel rooms are very clean, smells fresh and very well kept. Above all,the reason why this hotel is soo good is because of the extremely friendly and welcoming staff from top to bottom. Pradeep and Arun in main loby were fantastic,so was Ram, cheyneika, bhumi in the restaurant/bar. Will be back for sure.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Pravesh
Detailed Review: World class facility is there.. having superb hospitality by hotel staff. Food was awesome. Pradeep and vijay from the lobby shows warm gestures and welcome us. Reception staff is also nce we surely recommends our friends or family to stay there.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Pramod
Detailed Review: Excellent Bell Desk Team compromise of Pradeep , Deepak and Rahim . Brilliant atmosphere .checkin was smooth for the entire group of 80paxs. Food was good . All staff of hotel was very polite and cooperative

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Neel S
Detailed Review: Food is very nice.loction is very convenient. All staff is very supportive....specially mr pradeep.and deepak from lobby is very helpful person. I recommend to my family and friends.  I will always c ok nsider VITS for my future travel. Thank You.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: prabhakar
Detailed Review: Nice Service and Surprises.  A very much Thanks to Bansi for his service  A big thanks to shirazi and GM Sir for all the arrangements.  A nice surprise of precious moments of Anniversary to be remembered.  Nice ambience and good taste and quality.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Mannuu
Detailed Review: Location is good but I did not like the breakfast quality, room was also average. In-room dining is super expensive. No fix tariff. Overall not a best choice. Just one advantage that airport is nearby.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: brooklynaranha93@gmail.com
Detailed Review: Prakash, Raosaheb ,Bhumi were great at serving us, we felt very welcomed when we came and also the food was amazing. Great job! The food was tasty and service was upto pace, the table was reserved as soon as we entered.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Voyager357241
Detailed Review: It was an amazing experience at vits hotel. Very good and nice staff. Priyanka and her partner treat us very well. Chef also came to meet us and asked about the food. Guys visit this place once. Totally enjoyed alot here. Thank you together v and vits hotel.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Mo888
Detailed Review: Very enjoyable stay at VITS Mumbai service par excellence by Bansi, Prakash, Manoj and Arup. Made our stay very memorable and comfortable. Definitely reccomend VITS MUMBAI. Food and stay 100%. Beautiful location and ambience

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Mageshan Govender
Detailed Review: A very warm welcome for the first time in Mumbai made to feel exactly like home with the excellent service,food  and otherwise, especially accommodate by Mr Pradeep (front desk). Outstanding Gentleman assisted from start to end of Stay, looking foward to the return stay.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Yogesh Y
Detailed Review: Must say the way all the staff are all very helpful and polite is absolutely amazing. A very special thank you to Bansi, he looked after my 85 year old mother as if she was his own mother. Also the choice & quality of food was superb, all in a great surroundings.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Bhargav
Detailed Review: Stay was great...bell boy Ganesh and manager Vijay were friendly...hotel staff and room cleaning were good...food was also nice.  Overall it was an great experience...the location of hotel was near airport so it was easy to travel

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Khan huzefa
Detailed Review: Excellent service  Helpful staff Good Hotel Worth the price Good Food Overall fantastic.  Bell desk Team - Mr Ganesh and Mr Vijay - Excellent service and good in nature.  Hotel is also well maintained.  Overall Very Good Hotel to visit nearby airport.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Shetty 1981
Detailed Review: I had visited this business hotel with my family, and the service provided by the staff Mr. Ravsahab, Ms. Nikita and Mr. Shobith was impeccable. They were on their toes to ensure the my family/guests were well taken care off. The food spread is great for business hotel, allowing guests to enjoy their breakfast with poolside view. I would recommend this property.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Dinesh R
Review: Candle light Dinner date with wife
Detailed Review: I had upper deck candle light dinner here. Very nice ambience, presentation, tasty food, awesome staff. Enjoyed to the fullest. Upper deck is basically area above the pool so very pleasant and unique.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Shriya
Detailed Review: Stayed there for 4 days. Everything was perfect. The staff is courteous and helpful. The location is a bonus point. The food served is very tasty and the buffet spread is good. The rooms have all the basic amenities and the service is quick.  Mr Pradeep at the bell desk goes an extra mile to make sure your stay was good.  Would surely stay here whenever in Mumbai.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Tilak_Sharma1
Detailed Review: We stayed Vits During our visit OTM 2020 at Mumbai and experience wonderful hospitality of Vits. Mr Bansi serve us meal and they way he served no words to describe. He is one of the best staff at pool side restaurant. Rooms are comfortable and clean.love to come whenever travel back near future.  Lastly Mr Pradeep at Bell desk give us warm departure and the way he approach is very professional and found assest of Vits. thank you for making our stay more memorable.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sajit nath Menon
Detailed Review: Bansi  was amazing the way he took care of us..he was really customer  centric and ensure we were fed properly   In the hotel industry  you need servers like bansi who take care of customers as their family

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Manobartakke
Detailed Review: As usual we had a great stay at Marriott. The services from the entry to exit where phenomenal at every venue.: Check in, Room cleaning, Lounge and Breakfast. The staff is very friendly and always exceeds our expectations.  Uber is convenient to get but allow extra time due to Mumbai Metro construction going on in front of the hotel.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: 0rmason
Detailed Review: This was a return visit to the hotel for us, which tells you that we like it! The rooms are all clean and pleasant, as is the pool area, which is a welcome relaxing space in busy Mumbai. Through no fault of the hotel, the road outside is appalling and would not be suitable for people with back problems. We ordered an airport pick-up that never arrived, so I would recommend using Uber/Ola directly from the airport. Otherwise, an excellent experience.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: travellingcouple890
Detailed Review: We stopped over at this hotel for one night only as it was close to the airport and didn't want a long travel time as we had a long flight to India. Our flight was delayed and our driver was ever so patience and waited for us, we arrived at the hotel at 3am! and the front of house staff was so polite and lovely. He swiftly checked us and in mentioned he has extended our checkout to 3pm free of charge as we have arrived late and must be so tired.  Breakfast was part of our booking, this was lovely as we were very hungry and enjoyed the freshly cooked dosa's and alu paranthas and yummy masala chai.  At check out we were served by a young man who gave us information on different places and restaurants to visit when we move to the next hotel- fantastic! because the recommendations…

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: lesliepais
Review: Courteous Welcome by Staff and Managers.
Detailed Review: I checked in at 2.00 am and was pleasantly welcomed with utmost courtesy and upgraded to a suite . I front office emailed me prior to my arrival. Many a times I have not seen front desk staff at other hotels at such ungodly hours. I thoroughly enjoyed the amenities in the room. Will come back to stay at this property.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sudarshan
Detailed Review: Excellent Hospitality services by banquet team. Staff is very cooperative & supportive. Food is also very tasty.location is very much conviniate for all the participants. We will plan many more event in year 20-21 in the Marriott hotel

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: choyibarrola
Detailed Review: This was my 3rd time at this hotel, and it's still awesome.  Although i must say that they don't maintain the hotel that much anymore, when compare to my previous visit.  This is because I've noticed several water stain on the ceiling in my room.  The hotel and room were still nice though, and the staffs were very helpful and accommodating

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rakesh Sanadi
Detailed Review: Helpful,kind and courteous staff Good food hygienic and spacious rooms beautiful and well maintained property  value for money  Overall it was great stay at courtyard by Mumbai international airport . Kudos to entire team..

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: blaise c
Detailed Review: I followed google maps and it showed some back door which you cannot enter. Wastes a lot of time in Mumbai traffic. Pls solve this issue of google maps.  But once you get to the hotel it is really nice. The room was airy the staff courteous, the sleep quality great. The Jacuzzi was relaxing   When leaving I asked for a cool cab and was surprised the doorman told the driver in Hindi, assuming i was a foreigner, inform rate, and lo and behold it was a 350/- for a distance that a app based taxi takes just 180/-   Is there a connection, why does the hotel staff get involved with the drivers to overcharge. Should not the staff ensure the meter is flagged given that it is a TAXI and rules demand a meter to be used? This to my mind was unnecessary and not expected from a hotel of this…

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: dipak121
Detailed Review: Location wise a perfect hotel but due to the metro work going infront of the hotel to & fro takes some time. Service-10 out of 10 (special mention-Sayali at the time of check in & Yash Sawant at check out). Koustav & Devraj were very courteous. Overall a perfect stay.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: ricardopok
Review: Contemporary feel in near airport hotel
Detailed Review: Hotel is a very well appointed property in mid-city Mumbai near airport.  Feeling of security is apparent from the moment you arrive and the feeling of super welcoming staff starts with the very first NAMASTE through every interaction.  During my stay, Sameera and Pranali up in the Executive lounge were awesome in greeting me and making me feel welcome.  Aditya which assists, who handles the lounge area took the time to ask me about my stay, to ask me if there was anything I needed and further offered to assist should I need anything.  People like that are the ones that make you feel like you are as important as they come.  Sahin in the breakfast area never let me Chai glass go empty.  I will be back in Mumbai and this will definitely be the hotel I stay at again.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Riaz M
Detailed Review: Close to the airport. Staff extremely helpful from the time one gets to the hotel. I arrived early from an international flight ans wasn't expecting an early check in as i e-mailed the day before requesting the same with was refused.  To my suprise, when we arrived at the front desk, we were assisted by Hermant Acharya and Yash Sawant. I would really like to express my gratitude to these two gentleman who promptly assisted us. Seeing seehow exhasted we were Hemant agreed to give us an immediate check so that we could take some rest. That gesture really made my day and because of that i would stay at this hotel again. I thank you from the bottom of my heart  Situated on a very busy one way street.  My room faced a residential high rise block of flats that wasn't pleasant to look…

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Cornell P
Detailed Review: Last week we stayed here as it was convenient to the International Airport. Booked 2 rooms for 2 nights. Overall the stay was excellent. We were upgraded to the Executive Floor and the Front Office Associate Nikhal was outstanding gave us two rooms opposite each other which was very convenient.  The Breakfast was really outstanding, food was really out of this world and the variety and choice was very impressive. Despite the restaurant being very large, the customer service was excellent we wanted to thank Ankur for his service. Chef Tegas made it a point to visit the tables to inquire on the customer experience and added a personal touch by preparing a special dish for us. Very impressive.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Paresh shetty
Detailed Review: Banquet staff ensured that the event flow was smooth & everything was arranged on time. Right from sales to banquet opetations, everyone was very helpful. Thanks to everyone ! Great food , great service !

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: Pankaj Mahajan
Detailed Review: It is very nice hotel.as the Marriott is all time favorite. But the friendliness and service of the staff was excellent,specially aprriciated to mr.dipesh sohani,gaurav an all the the banquet team. They have arranged it very well. Would like to visit again.

Source.Name: Courtyard_by_Marriott_Mumbai_International_Airport-Mumbai.csv
Name: sam v
Detailed Review: The entire team went above and beyond to make our stay comfortable. Right from the check in to breakfast to room requirements, the service was top notch. The staff exuded genuine warmth - much beyond our expectations! Would highly recommend this hotel!

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: BlessonVk
Detailed Review: Had a great stay. From my arrival to departure the staff took care of things. The rooms were clean and big room.  Their food is very good. Worth trying this hotel. The staff corrected things when complained.  Very helpful staff and good hotel.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Prajwal S
Detailed Review: I had attended Marriage function and Reception on 26th January 2020 in Holiday inn sakinaka. The experience was awesome. Total classy feeling. Thanks to yogesh Amin the food in marriage and reception was yummy. The food was completely authentic.  The food in marriage ceremony was typical south indian, all my family members loves it. The food in reception was also yummy, I love the Pani Puri and chat counter, authentic curd rice serves in leaves etc. Even there were wide variety of deserts were kept.  I would love to recommend holiday inn to people as this was second experience and again a memorable one.  Thank u holiday inn and importantly thank u yogesh Amin for great organising and yummmy food.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Oza JP
Detailed Review: Reasons are many! Starts from the reception at the International Airport by Ajay's wonderful transport team. Then main entrance, security, scanning at the hotel. Followed by Dinesh and his team at concierge.  You get that lofty feeling when front office team of Senior Pros like Abhijeet and Ms. Chaitali, Aniket and all welcome you with a big smile and readiness to meet up or put up with your smallest requests, however unusual it may be. and this goes on all through your stay. A big THANK YOU and GREAT APPRECIATION to all.   Very comfortable rooms with all amenities in place and urgent demands attended to. Making up room speedily and at your convenient time is also a big Plus.  Coming to Saptami .... Welcomed to table of your choice by Dhanashree and then being looked after by…

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Mashaer
Detailed Review: My family and I stayed in this hotel for almost 2 weeks and enjoyed every bit of it. The hotel is kept very clean and the staff is one of the friendliest staff I have ever met.  Everyone was on their toes making sure that we're comfortable and satisfied. From the ones who opened our car doors, Dharam Singh and Vaibhav Patil, to Sony who prepared us the most savory masala chai of our entire day each morning. The buffet was an entire feast and very well organized. Everyone working for this hotel has been wonderful and made us feel extremely welcomed. Thank you to Farooque, Subhash, Aishwarya, Salman, Vishal, Akshay, Chaitali, Kumbhar, Pravin, and many others who offered us assistance and kindness. We will come back again.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Kiranvansia123
Review: Chaitali Shah her colleagues Dinesh & Aniket you guys are too good made our experience had holiday inn. Mumbai Sakinaka
Detailed Review: We checked in for very 1st time in holiday inn were Ms Chaitali shah took our check in she is so well mannered and true eaxple for being great hotiler we miss these kind of hospitality given by her unbelievable...... I was bit confused how it would be after building relationships in Lalit and coming to unknown place like this. For long stay people like me important is not only stay but relations you build as it would be your home. However I was pleasantly surprised to see that right from door to inside of hotel most of staff I met knew my name which was great feeling. Icing on top was when Chef Tiwari, Baliram, Vally, Amisha, Abhijit, Mukta, Heena, Kaushal shah, Nofil, Sai khavle, Farooque, Subash, Vithal Salve and not to forget Ex Chef Suresh Thampy did everything possible to make my first stay feel like home. I genuinely appreciate their efforts and overwhelming response which never made me remember my…

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Mayur marchande
Detailed Review: Is was great stay , staff is very polite and helpful, Mr akshay chavan  is very helpful guy and very professional , will like to stay here again, ambience is very good.  Saptami breakfast delicious, overall great experience

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Faazi
Review: Booked hotel for my sons marriage
Detailed Review: We had a marriage ceremony at the hotel sky terrace on Feb 17th. We booked 5 rooms for a week. I am an IHG Spire Elite member. My wife works for Delta Airlines and I am a U.S Government employee. We travel and stay at holiday Inn’s around the globe. IHG hotels are my second home. Mumbai Holiday inn treated us very well. Marriage ceremony function went well. Thanks to the sales team and thanks to Salman in baggage. He went out of the way to do things for us. I also like the massage. I took four massages through out my stay. This is my seventh stay at this location in last 5 years and I am already planning on visiting this location.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv

Detailed Review: Had an amazing experience with all the staff, specially the morning breakfast chef (ghanshyam tiwari),also vineet patil food was amazing... Arif qureshi.. Overall experince with evryone here is amazing.... Must stay and visit this hotel.... Cheers.

Name: C R
Review: 15 min by pickup car from airport
Detailed Review: Very nice to be picked-up by hotel car and within 15 min check-in...nice room...friendly staff...stay was to short to make use of all available service like gym or restaurant..perfect for having a stop over

From check I’m to check out It had been nothing short of amazing. I want to specially thank Heena the guest service manager who went way and beyond to make my stay memorable. She is beyond amazing and I give her a perfect 10 for her attention to detail and Customer service. The lady at the spa was greatly well I wished I remembered her name. But cheers to such a wonderful staff. I will be returning again.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Kalisetti A
Detailed Review: Hotel is fantastics..clean  decent hotrl..met Chef Tiwari..breakfast and dinner incharge..had nice chat... Well recommended for the best food.. Thank you Holiday inn staff n thanks  mr.Tiwari.......thanks

Name: Rush M
Review: Heena Kanoor made our experience had Holiday Inn, Mumbai & Goa excellent
Detailed Review: We arrived at Holiday Inn, Mumbai on 09th Jan 2020 to be warmly greeted by Henna Kanoor. She swiftly had us checked in, answered all our questions, recommended a local restaurant within walking distance. Heena organised a city tour and transfers back to the Airport. She is thorough, knowledgeable, approachable, polite and hard working.   I would like to add Amjad (our driver) on the city tour is also excellent, has sound knowledge of the roads, Mumbai and respects everything his customers wish to do.   We were due to proceed onto Goa after a few days, however Air India wait restrictions meant be couldn’t travel will all our baggage. Heena arranged to store out bags at the hotel without any charge. We trusted her to retain our personal bags safely.   A few days later, we…

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Elsabe Herholdt
Detailed Review: I enjoyed everything here and we had a great experience at Holiday inn Mumbai. Very beautiful and friendly heena was helping us.The food was very nice. Also Naman at reception helped in arranging transport.

Name: LaohuPenang

Detailed Review: For a layover in Mumbai this is ideal place, allows you to get to/from airport at short time. Not suitable for downtown visits, spend much time snarled in traffice. Staff very courteous and helpful, special mention Mr Sachin from the lounge and Ms Heena from customer reltions.

Detailed Review: We stayed here after a long flight from JFK and it was the best place to land. Airport pickup was seamless, customer service was excellent, and it was a really great experience. Heena and Sutapa in particular helped to make our stay a real pleasure!

Detailed Review: Very good holiday Inn Mumbai very helpfully and all sttaff breakfast was very good and dinner also Tiwari pays attention to all the tables and asks everyone used to play attention to my family so well that I did not know that I was out side it seemed that everyday someone is waiting for us in the breakfast we and our family are very happy if we ever want to come to the future, we will come to this hotel and eat food from chef Tiwari's ✋ hands.thank you so much Mr.tiwari

Detailed Review: 1. The hotel was very easy to get to from the airport 2. The staff were very friendly and cooperative 3. Rooms were maintained well and were clean 4. Food was up to the mark. Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Vidur kapoor
Detailed Review: Over the weekend I stayed at the contemporary Holiday inn Mumbai international airport hotel which has an easy access to the terminals and north mumbai businesses.  As soon as you enter you can enjoy their peaceful ambiance of uncluttered, glass-walled lobby before chickening into your modern guest room. Holiday inn mumbai international airport's modern rooms feature warm wood accents and white linens. Each is equipped with a radio, minibar , ergonomic chair, tea/coffee making facilities. Environment friendly toiletries and 24-hour room service is available.  Holiday inn Mumbai also provides ample dinning options. "Saptami" an all day dining restaurant offers regional and international cuisines. A contemporary multi cuisines all day dinning restaurant with floor to ceiling glass…

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Gajanan Padhi
Detailed Review: Hi Guys,  I had my business conference today and the service provided by Nikhil was really fantastic which made my conference run smoothly.  Hope they give this again n again to me when I visit over here .  Hays off to Nikhil and his team   Xtra ordinary speaker

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Aditya P
Detailed Review: Enjoyed the stay at the hotel. Nice friendly staff. Mr. Tiwari at the restaurant helped a lot in taking care of the guests and interacted well telling his life story. Would definitely like to come here again.

Name: Karan agrawal
Detailed Review: Good Ambience and good hospitality and amazing interaction with chef specially chef Tiwari Sir. The place was clean and peaceful. The buffet had a lot of varieties and the rooftop swimming pool is amazing

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: Amol
Detailed Review: Excellent food quality. As discussed with Chef Mr. Tiwari, suggested to have more Indian breakfast items in menu.Staff is humble and poliete.  Room service us also very good.Thank you so much all staff for your service.

Source.Name: Holiday_Inn_Mumbai_International_Airport_an_IHG_Hotel-Mumbai.csv
Name: jetsetlad
Detailed Review: I stayed here for 1 night prior to catching an early morning flight. Rooms were clean, comfortable and well appointed. Great views from the infinity pool on the roof top terrace and a fantastic selection at the buffet restaurant that was excellent value. Where this hotel falls down is with the little things that actually matter. For example, not enough mattresses for all of the pool loungers, a spa appointment that’s confirmed and then asked to be put back another hour shortly before arriving at the spa, an alarm ringing in the lobby at check out but nobody acknowledging what it is or apologising that it’s going off. This hotel is a great choice for a quick city trip or between flights.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Shivangi Dubey
Detailed Review: The entire experience was nice.Thank you so much for making my colleagues birthday special.Experience cannot be good without an excellent staff.Thanks Urvashi for honouring my request.Hoping to come back again.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Moumita
Review: Loved my stay at The Orchid
Detailed Review: I really loved everything about The Orchid. Starting from the rooms, the decor, the lobby, the food and the extremely courteous staff, everything was great about the hotel. Hema at the Coffee Shop breakfast bar was extremely sweet and friendly. She makes the guests feel extremely welcome. On top of all these, the beautiful piano played every evening deserves a special mention. Would love to be back again in The Orchid.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Dr. Mahesh N S
Review: Do not miss the breakfast at Vindhya south Indian restaurant in the lobby level
Detailed Review: Good, spacious rooms, round the clock good food, two worth trying buffet, theme dining and so on. This property is a No smoking zone, helps many of us. Pleasing live music during evenings in the lobby level. Live Indian music was enjoyable during lunch too at Vindhyas. Do not miss well curated south Indian breakfast at Vindhya. They have a must try signature dosas (pan cake equivalent). Location is very convenient for air travelers.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv

Detailed Review: Very close to the airport. Big rooms . The room had a small living room. The variety of food for breakfast is small for an occidental tourist not used to indian food. Good a la carte dinner. Staff very kind and helpful

Manoj Sarda

Name: SANA ZIYA
Detailed Review: So I happened to visit the South of Vindhyas at The Orchid and must say I had a lovely time. I feasted at the Sea-Feast . They had a huge spread and great variety. The whole ambience was turned into koli style and they even had live performance-koli dance. So coming to what we had: *SOUP* Prawn rasam- the traditional spicy taste, with the crunch of prawns *APPETIZERS* 1. Prawns dry masala- this was excellent, cooked well. 2. Fish fry- fish used was river sole, so soft, mouth-melting 3. Chicken pepper- Andhra style, spicy and masaledaar *MAINS* *Breads* Appam Malabari paratha Kal roti *Rice* Tomato rice- tomato flavoured spicy rice The fish thali had a variety of dishes from veg stew, chicken curry, mutton curry, fish curry, prawns curry, crab curry, and squid. It was quite…

Detailed Review: I Mr.nachai raja from room no 526 my personal and emotional experience sharing on this platform i met smith at checkin who is very nice gentlemen the incident behind this review is very personal i lost my atm card on 26th jan sunday morning i checked everywhere last not found i need to go intl airport which was 945 with tax and i was having only 2400 for my onward jouney my wife was also along i requested smith the incident and also very nervous to tell him give me international drop complimenatry he spoke to Atul and that was done i will be always gratefull to you  God bless each and every one at orchid no words to say thankyou even Smith atul they actually take care of my wife who gave us discount at sov coffeshop for veg breakfast spread i met Mr.harshad thankyou i am taking…

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Amanjot K
Detailed Review: Service here is upto the mark. staff is very pro at assisting. Buffets are amazing. Hema, Karishma and Rahul so pleasant that you want to talk to them again and again. Please visit this hotel whenever in Mumbai.

Special thanks to Karishma ,harshada ,hema, kanchan & nidhi.they always served us with smile when ever we visit in orchid. Thanks to restaurant manager Mr Rohit Gupta for the excellent hospitality.thank u😊😊😊😊

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: saneeshatalim
Detailed Review: They have seafood festival ongoing. The last day is Sunday. I would personally would like to appreciate the efforts taken by Mr Harshad. We were completely relaxed during our entire meal and enjoyed a lot. The food is delicious and I hope that a lot more festivals like such take place. Cheers. Just 2 days for the festival to end, so do visit.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rei K
Detailed Review: Just visited South Of Vindhyas  at The Orchid and they had a seafood festival going on. Let me begin by saying such a wonderful ambience created. The staff was dressed in traditional koli clothes and they had boats nets and various fishes as decoration. I felt like I was literally sitting in the koliwada being served fresh fish from the ocean.  While there, Dakota staff helped us in making some really good choices. Special thanks to Harshad, Vishal, Kunal, Aditya Raj and Sameer.   To begin we called for some delicious starters. Since it was the seafood festival we decided to call for non vegetarian starters. We ordered:  Fried fish: Delicious rava fried boneless fish that was served piping hot along with onion lime and a lovely green chilli. The fish was superbly fresh. Enjoyed…

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Mark
Review: Awesome place to stay in Bombay
Detailed Review: Great place to stay if in Bombay. It's Close to the airport, has very clean and comfortable rooms and also has a great staff especially Ms. Mehreen at the reception. There are many nice restaurants to eat at in the hotel as well.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Deepali Gupta
Detailed Review: South of Vindhyas is a fine dining located at The Orchid hotel in Vile Parle east. The restaraunt is at the ground floor of the hotel and has a very welcoming vibe and ambience. Their specialty is mainly in dishes from Andhra, Kerela and South.  They recently have started their seafood festival where in they are serving the very best of different flavours of Coast and South. The interiors are well decorated as the theme of the seafood festival and they also have a live appam kitchen. Also as a part of the theme, at the end of the day there is a small koli performance done by the staff which added more charm to the entire seafood festival theme experience.   As we entered we were welcomed by the staff and Mr.Vishal, our host for the evening, took care of everything really well.…

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Vipul

Detailed Review: Dear All,  It Successfully done the workshop / an event at Hotel Orchid Mumubai...and genuinely speaking we have found very supporting staff at venue, Also special thanks to Mr. Amit Khaire, Mr. Adesh Lad & Ms. Shilpa for standing behind us to support our workshop.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv

Detailed Review: Our family of four enjoyed our one night stay. The front desk and bell boy service was great! They were very helpful and nice. The two rooms we had were clean and had toiletries in case you forget yours. I loved that the air conditioning was easy to control. I highly recommend this hotel.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
