Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ziku Sarangi
Review: A mouthful delicacy trip to The Orchid
Detailed Review: Just recently had the opportunity to visit the seafood festival in The Orchid. When I say that it was fabulous, it is actually an understatement. Starting from the ambience, to the food, the impeccable service and the hospitality by Hardhad was delightful. There were number of options for variety of seafood you van try. The quantity they serve is humongous and they are utterly delicious. The staffs and waiters were very courteous. This place is a must visit now when they are hosting this SEAFOOD FESTIVAL. Visit it before it ends! Kudos.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: SAMANTASUBHOJIT1
Detailed Review: The hospitality of the hotel is exemplary and every one was truly professional I met guest relation  manager Mr . Smith who assist us with every possible way he can we came early in the morning without any additional charges he gave us early check-in as my mother was along with me and dad too he arranged complimentary Tea with cookies as if we didn't came at orchid we feel like at we landed at hayatt or Marriott  thank you Smith for the excellent hospitality.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ranjitsamanta719
Review: Excellent services by Front office and Team Housekeeping last but not least In room dining.
Detailed Review: At time of our departure we met The Guests Experience Manager.Mr.Smith at lobby who assist us with the checkout formalities with his colleague Mr. mahesh it was a great experience and services rendered by the orchid Mumbai mr. Manmohan Singh and kirti from Housekeeping they are doing fabulous job at hotel and also appreciate in room dining service's Mr jillu also very humble in nature special thanks to Mr. Smith who encouraged us for giving a review on trip advisor.all people's are excellently prepared and do know what to do for the guest. Thank you once again to entire Orchidian.  Smith you are the best at lobby I wish you personally abundance for your betterment at orchid.Mumbai

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sanjoy Ghosh
Detailed Review: Impecabble hospitality very courteous staff...  Especially Urvashi Rathore who was immensely helpful. Very neat and clean rooms, food is awesome and great service. I recommend business travellers to experience the hotel.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Dvswaerja
Review: GRI Alleset India Pvt.Ltd. super hospitality by front office Team
Detailed Review: I Mr Dhanraj came early at hotel but was not aware of check-in time but Mr Smith from Guests relations and Mahesh from fron office along with Md Deepika mr Kalpak and Ms mehreen they all help us with the best possible way to accommodate us with our delegates who came from States of the country amazing hospitality Thank you Mr Smith for your coordination and delegation with every team'members off the concerned department.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sachin Shah
Detailed Review: It’s has good location advantage as very near to domestic airport. Service is good and their South Indian Thali in restaurant is very good.  Room ambience they can improve. Also bed mattress quality needs an improvement.   Overall good.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sharvari Dalal
Detailed Review: Although this is a relatively older hotel structure with fewer amenities than other standard 5 star hotels, the proximity to the airport and BKC scores a win for me. The hotel staff, is very courteous and accommodating - Mehreen, at the check-in kindly helped with an early check-in and late check out. The food is great and the only suggestion is to upgrade the amenities!

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Naman G
Detailed Review: Tried the midnight buffet! Amazing spread! Good food quality and Mahesh in the restaurant was amazing and helped us with all our request and was very friendly and pro-active ! Will surely visit again!

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: multispeciality
Review: Poor service with rude staff  at gate
Detailed Review: Hotel is a very old structure with poor House keeping.  After taking bath you come to know that there is no towel in the  bathroom. And service in their restaurant is worst and really hopeless. You have to order everything twice or thrice in their restaurant South of Vindhyas.  Quality of food is good but service spoils that. And further staff at gate is very rude and their behavior with guests is unexpected.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Abhishek G
Detailed Review: Very poor experience in terms of billing.. the executives at the counter did not register the details properly,  due to which wasted almost half hour at the check out .the staff also does not want to share much details and gets little frustrated when asked to check the details properly. over all leavinv aside this experience,  the stay was ok ok.. should not call themselves more than a 3 star property Rooms and washroom are small Breakfast is still fine One of my colleagues was asked not to enter breakfast hall as their were people inside, despite we already having a take reserved Shall not recommend

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: buds_nz
Review: Nice way to end India trip
Detailed Review: We stayed at the Orchid on our last night in India. We chose it for its location bear Mumbai airport.   The hotel was clean and tidy and of a high standard, although was not well appointed in terms of mini bar and amenities (complimentary food and beverages; as well as mini bar) in the room itself - maybe this is the norm in India. That said the monsoon shower was amazing - I could have spent an hour in there!  The bed was also fantastic.  It is a 5star hotel and it prides itself on being eco-friendly.  There are a number of restaurants within - we only dined at one (Boulevard’s - which is the basic a la carte restaurant for dinner and breakfast). The roof top bar looked great but we were travelling with older parents and a 15 month old - more suited to a younger demographic. …

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Priyal Patel
Detailed Review: Excellent service. Keep up the good work. Helped me with quick room booking. Especially Urvashi who helped me with all the decorations. Thank you so much for all the quick arrangements. Much appreciated.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Surendra J
Detailed Review: Hotel staff pays full attention to guests.  People at house keeping department are polite and do utmost care to to make our stay comfortable and enjoyable.  Food is also very good.   Good cabs for pickup and drop

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Pranab P
Detailed Review: Everything was excellent. Keep up the good work. I will be a regular client from now on. Especially Abhishek, Roshan and Kishor Koli gave us the service we expected so special thanks to them and to the entire team royal orchid hotel for my brother rahul's birthday party event happen successfully.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Veronica
Detailed Review: Oh my days!!! It is the BEST curry in India! Mahesh is an absolute star. Make him manager on day soon :) he really took care of us with a smile on his face and recommended the laccha paratha which was out of this world. 5 star excellence all round

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: deepak_2010
Review: nice hotel.. but needs some upgrade
Detailed Review: Stayed at the orchid hotel for 1 night (club room). Room was spacious and clean. Room Service was good and prompt. But the hotel overall looks old, corridors have poor lighting, and lacks space. Breakfast is good.. there are 2 types of breakfast buffets - you can choose anyone. Overall, a good experience.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Naresh1936
Detailed Review: The terrace of the Orchid Hotel, near the old domestic airport in Mumbai, provide excellent setting for our Alumni get-together. The ambience, the food and service, everything was super. All present were fully satisfied.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Jayalakshmi M
Detailed Review: I come here for my Official Training and tried this time with family stay at Orchid... and the room, staff like kanhaiya, Shashank, Umar, Urvashi all are excellent staff. I will again plan my visit at Orchid

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Neel
Detailed Review: Had a lovely evening at the orchids at Mostly grills restaurant(airport vile parle) the dinner date went amazing all thanks to Pritam who helped us having a good food and having a good time. Ambience was awesome...would surely visit again

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Delano G
Review: Mostly Grills on top of the world
Detailed Review: Back at the Orchid after two years and still excellent food and service. Thanks to Mostly Grills Restaurant for the food and thanks to Pretam and Pankit. Well trained staff by Kunal and excellent singing duo.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Vishal
Detailed Review: Visited mostly grilled restaurant. Great hospitality. Especially Yasin was the charming chap. Taste of the food was authentic. No complaints and got a chance to have some of the trendy delicacies. Would like to visit this with family more often from now on.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Cda6721
Review: Sahil at the rooftop restaurant- awesome waiter
Detailed Review: Had a great dinner at the rooftop restaurant. Food was delicious and our service was outstanding. Our waiter Sahil provided us with some awesome food recommendations and very good service. Highly recommend this restaurant.

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Mahi
Detailed Review: Best place Rooftop, best restaurant Mostly Grill, best service, best Food. Mr. Pritam Jadhav is the boss of service the suggestion is on top the give great preferences with food and drinks. Will visit soon and again and again

Source.Name: The_Orchid_Mumbai_Vile_Parle-Mumbai.csv
Name: Himanshi S
Detailed Review: Mostly Grill is the best place to visit in Mumbai we had some best grills and drinks with a live music.  And our service  guy Pritam  was outstanding  with his job he do have good  knowledge  about  food  and liquor.   Everything  was best love to visit  again.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Anshu
Detailed Review: During both of my stays at the hotel i got very caring service from Raju during breakfast and dinner. He went out of his way to accommodate. My thanks to him again. Ritesh at the Asian counter, Tausif, Sanjay, Sanjiv, Bhoomi, Vaishnavi were also very helpful and so was Paite at the Sushi counter. Manager Carold Buffet also was caring. At the hotel Rohan was very helpful and so were Inzamam and Prashant in Housekeeping.  Thanks and good wishes to all -  Anshu Sharma.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Vinit Patel
Detailed Review: I was staying at the St. Regis in Mumbai and Kaushik was assigned to me as a private butler for the trip. I must thank him for the amazing hospitality, personalised service and going beyond what was required during my one day trip at the property. I would highly like to recommend Kaushik - 5 stars for him

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: debarshipandit
Detailed Review: Having stayed in quite a few hotels, the Butler service at St. Regis is the reason why I keep visiting and it is a hotel of choice for me. Shakir Ali (the Head Butler) ably supported by Karan are simply outstanding....true personal touch every step of the way!!

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Tara Arante
Review: Best Place to Stay in Mumbai
Detailed Review: Home away from Home - with exceptional butler service from Rahul Bhosale. You can't go wrong if you choose to stay here. Amazing views of the city, perfect location if you want to do a bit of shopping with the connecting malls. Top Notch service overall!

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Stella K
Detailed Review: We were staying for a few nights on our way to the Maldives. St Regis staff are the best- polite, friendly. Always happy to help. Gaurav and Raju looked after us at breakfast making sure I had a hot toddy for my cough. Nothing was too much trouble. We always look forward to our stays in Mumbai, particularly at St Regis, with its close proximity to the lux mall.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: priyanka18j
Review: The Best Vacation in St Regis
Detailed Review: St regis is literally the best hotel in mumbai.The rooms,The decor, The staff , The amenities all are the best. It's been 3 years and every time we choose the St Regis for our new year celebration our birthdays and our anniversary.The food in each and every restaurant of this hotel is a must try. From the dungari kebab in Sahib room to the sea food paella in luna from the black cod in Yukka to the lavish buffet spread in seven kitchen it is a must try.The view of the mahalaxmi race course and Haji ali from the suite is mind blowing. If you are looking for a luxurious vacation in mumbai then St regis is the no 1 choice. I would like to thank the entire staff of regis especially Pradeep the duty manager, Joy dsouza the butler for making by birthday celebration so special, the…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: martaromano
Detailed Review: The stay was magical, they treated us like princess. The room was outstanding, huge, clean, with all the necessary amenities.  The breakfast was unforgettable, they offer almost EVERYTHING you can desire!  Our stay was even more special thanks to our personal butler Kaushik Khaudtare, he is one the most amazing soul we’ve ever met. Always at disposal never too much!   I would go back there if I’ll ever go back to Mumbai, no doubt about it.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: MsjH1977
Detailed Review: Thanks to the entire team for such a great & professional job, you guys made my stay smooth and relaxing. And a big thank you to Joy D’souza, one if the great team of butlers at the st.regis hotel, which will always be my preferred choice in Mumbai. Thanks again!

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Mulchand
Detailed Review: If you are staying in St. Regis, then you can not miss The Drawing Room. It is a beautifully crafted restaurant at the lobby level on the 8th floor. They have a very good selection of platter, finger food and some really good collection of wines. The pianist at the side just adds the right melody to the vibe of the place.   Pro tip: Ask the captain for the traditional performance of the St. Regis hotel and its history along with a nice glass of Champagne on the house. On select days only.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: RajG
Detailed Review: We had a fantastic stay at the lovely St Regis Mumbai. The hotel is in a great location. Proximity to the mall and main attractions were convenient. The food was amazing. The staff were extremely attentive and friendly. They went out of their way to take care of us and especially our kids. Kaushik, Pratik, Harshala, Kavita and everyone else made our stay truly wonderful. Looking forward to coming back again in the near future.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Arvind_Meera
Detailed Review: Recently was at the St Regis Mumbai for a casual lunch, which used to be the Palladium some years ago.  I had some boxes in my hand and asked the lady at the hotel entrance if she could hand me a paper bag. After a few minutes she suggested that I take it from Concierge on the 9th level.  The Concierge with a Clefs D'Or emblem, Mr Pratik was on the desk and I asked him for a paper bag. He was reluctant to start with and then he asked me to wait for a minute whilst he would arrange one.  After standing for over 15 minutes, I reminded him again as he seemed to be very busy even though there were no guests around the Concierge desk and he also had another person to assist him at the concierge's Desk. Both of these gentlemen had an indifferent attitude.  I waited for another few…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Shilpa
Detailed Review: Best Hotel with Amazing and Courteous Staff Always Happy To Help ,, Delicious Food in all the Restaurants,, Superb Rooms..One Of My Personal Favorites Everytime we visit mumbai.. Just Don't Feel Like Going Home ;)

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: USNomad257
Detailed Review: Probably one of the nicest hotels I've stayed in. Modern design, every amenity and service to match the best of the best. They have security posts at every entry, even that of the high-end mall which is adjacent. There are employees throughout the hotel looking to accommodate in any way to improve your stay. I took advantage of the complimentary shoe shine, tucking a couple of dollar bills into the shoes before hanging the bag outside the door. A card inside the bag told the workers what time I wanted my shoes back, and they arrived well ahead of schedule. The pool area looked amazing! I wish I had brought my swim suit.☹️  I highly recommend this hotel. Also, if you are in the market for any fine jewelry, there is a wonderful jeweler right outside the Palladium Mall to the left.…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Antoine D
Detailed Review: I spent a week in Mumbai with day trips to New Delhi and Bangalore. The St Regis has been my home during that time, all the staff makes you feel at home. The diversity and the quality of the breakfast is outstanding!  I have also enjoyed the restaurant and the room service.  The quality of the bed ensure a good recovery after a day of travel and jet lag.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: rita p
Detailed Review: This was my first time staying at the St. Regis Mumbai. I have to say that the from the moment I checked in until I checked out, everyone was amazing. I was not feeling well, they went above and beyond to make sure I was comfortable and well taken care. Joy D’Souza from the butler team was wonderful. Checked on me, made sure I was okay and feeling better. Front desk was equally accommodating. I will most certainly be staying here again in the future.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Claudiagmartins
Review: Great hotel to stay in Mumbai.
Detailed Review: St.Regis is a great hotel to stay in Mumbai. Very well located as the mall is within 5 minute walking distante. The staff of the hotel are so polite kind and helpful. I would like to give a special thanks to Ketan our butler and friend who helped us everytime we needed and also Amin our driver. Thank you guys.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Crytrvlr
Detailed Review: This hotel exceeded our expectations. The personal service is unrivaled and our personal butler Kaushik Khatare was a gem. When he found out we were on our honeymoon, he went above and beyond. One night, we come back from the happy hour and there was a framed picture of us, flowers, a bottle of wine and a cake waiting for us in our room. His personal touch made our stay. Well done Kaushik and well done St Regis.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: parker
Review: The place where you will feel someone's there to look after
Detailed Review: the only time i felt , there are people who don't only work but care for you, my butler Juliet thank you for all you offered me while I was not well your indian ginger tea helped me alot , whatsaping me each time for all of the things I wanted was more then enough ,thank you

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: NoMa
Review: Mémorable stay at the St Regis Mumbai
Detailed Review: Our stay at the hotel was perfect. Breakfast was awesome, with a great variety of food including indian, chinese, japanese, british, European etc.  The highlight of our stay was the special attention provided to our family by the butlers team (Shakir/Akansha/Kaushik). We felt so pampered. Shakir in particular was amazing and even prepared a nice anniversary surprise for us. The kids also enjoyed their complimentary ice cream treats.  Room was spacious, luxurious and clean, with a nice view. We particularly enjoyed the sunset from our room.  Location is very convenient (annexed to Paladium mall, and close to High Street Phoenix mall). Only 30 mins drive from international airport.  We will definitely stay there again in the future.  Novan&Ashwini

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Ronak_valia
Detailed Review: Stayed here with my wife. Had a brilliant time. The room was excellent and the staff too was exceptional specially our butler Ceaser. He made sure we were absolutely comfortable.  Thanks for making our stay wonderful.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: CIAOMARYEH
Detailed Review: Both my husband and I have travelled the world and fortunate enough to have stayed in a variety of amazing hotels though, I must say St. Regis Mumbai has won our hearts.  Our experience first started with  being picked up at the airport and taken to the hotel to be met with friendly warm smiles.  We were taken to our room which was simply spectacular offering a walk in shower, soak tub with luxurious bed and pillows.  Everything you need was available to you.  Coming in at  night we decided to eat dinner at the hotel and went to Mekong where the meal was wonderful, ambiance lovely but more impressive was the staff who ensured we enjoyed our dining.  They were attentive enough but not to the point of being a nuisance – they have mastered the skill.  We enjoyed high tea which is…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Aus_Traveller1900
Review: Great hotel. Absolutely enjoyed my stay
Detailed Review: My wife and I have had truly a wonderful experience at the St Regis. The staff are ever so helpful and courteous. Very professional in every way. The condition of the hotel is new and is very well replenished and maintained. The only thing that would be a slight drawback was that The butler service took much longer than expected to arrive. The buffet was extensive and very fresh  and delicious.  I loved almost everything about this hotel. As I am from Australia, Ganpath, one of the Managers at checkout, even wished my family and friends in Australia all the best given all the bushfires we’ve been having. Nice caring touch.  I’ve stayed in many many 5 star hotels around the world - and this hotel exceeded my expectations. Kudos to the staff and management!

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: vina_kachhla
Review: The Bestest@ The best address in Mumbai
Detailed Review: My second stay at StR!  What can I say ,stay at this exceptional luxury hotel, together with it’s exceptional service by all associates makes you feel so royal & welcome !  Must say, a fabulous gesture & a warm welcome from the hotel manager, Siddarth Sahe surely bowled me over !  A must breakfast experience @ Seven Kitchen , a special thanks to Raju for the lovely tea experience & attention to detail and big thank you to manager Carold, Sharque, Tausif,Sanjay, Sachin & Chef Avtar for their great enthusiasm & going out their way, taking care, exceeded my breakfast experience.  A huge shoutout to the most amazing outstanding service , which impressed me most was, by Head butler Shakir, Mayur & Joy ,a service over and above, with class, surely raised the bar !  Loved the…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Mauritian Diplomat
Detailed Review: First of all for me to be writing on trip advisor and setting my profile properly after sooo long ain’t something I normally do just to review a hotel. I’m mainly an insta traveller.  St Regis Mumbai has shaken me to my core and it wouldn’t be right if Mention it on Instagram only.   I have traveled the world and stayed at many 5 stars hotels, I know what I’m expecting and what the norm is. However this hotel is beyond just meeting those benchmarks and standards. The staffs there truly genuinely care about their guests. If you were not a royalty while entering their premises, trust me you ll feel like royalty while being there and leaving too .   All the staffs that I had the pleasure of dealing with were superb-one special mentioned to two amazing souls that have left me…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sharon H
Review: An oasis in a busy city
Detailed Review: The hotel is a quiet, cool spot in a noisy city. Our room was very nice with smooth bed linens, excellent service and a wonderful bathtub. The breakfast at the hotel is excellent and not to be missed! There are malls adjacent to the hotel with both Indian and international designers represented.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: MenonNattu
Detailed Review: I checked in on my birthday along with my wife. A slight (?) glitch by the reception staff for not noticing the same as they had a copy of my documents showing the DOB.... However, all that was upturned by the super hospitality shown by Mr. Shawn Baswant, the Butler in charge. The personal touch in everything thing that he did with routine work to make it look really special, really made the difference. To top it up, a special birthday cake was brought by  Shawn & Priyanka on our breakfast (amazing & delicious spread) table this morning.... Exemplary example of Customer delight.... They wanted to do it the previous evening evening itself, but respected our privacy to celebrate... Good job Shawn , Priyanka & the whole Team # The St. Regis Mumbai.  PS : the reception check in /…

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Alexis S
Detailed Review: One of nicest hotels I’ve ever stayed in and beyond that service and staff excellent!! Pool is gorgeous as is spa and hotel food. Good location in lower parel with lots of shops and restaurants. Concierge Pratik went so above and beyond made stay 5 stars plus!!! Would definitely stay again and recommend it whole heartedly to anyone. This was my third hotel in Mumbai and by FAR the best in every way

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Amit Aggarwal
Detailed Review: It was a very comfortable stay. Warm hospitality, excellent food and wonderful staff. I would like to especially mention butler Kiran, master chef Asif Qureshi and chef Ali who made this stay memorable.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Shaibaz
Detailed Review: Awesome rooms with a view  . We got a 26th floor partial sea view facing. You can check the pictures. Good spacious  room with comfy beds.really good and helpful  staff. And the best butler (mr. Kiran ). Made sure our stay was pleasant and comfortable. The breakfast  had a good spread with all types of cuisines. Thank you st.regis mumbai. For the awesome experience.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Priyanka V
Detailed Review: One of the memorable nights in Mumbai. St. Regis has one of the best restaurants, clubs and roof top bar in the city. Definitely Worth spending a weekend with your friends. The stay was made even more special by our Butler Mr. Kiran Mohite and his polite services.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Good S
Detailed Review: I usually stay at St Regis mumbai given its great location. Over the years service standards have improved a lot and continue to be great. On my current trip I lost my wallet accidentally at the reception area. Mr Irfan, the manager on the floor was very prompt in alerting all areas and helped me discover the wallet within 15 minutes. Life saver !! Thank you Irfan and team.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Atique S
Detailed Review: St Regis hotel was the best hotel I ever stayed. Best service ever. My butler ketan was super amazing. He was always there when I needed him. Its worth the money. The breakfast was super amazing. Wanna say tnx for d amazing service.

Source.Name: The_St_Regis_Mumbai-Mumbai.csv
Name: Randy and Rusti S
Detailed Review: Everything you would expect from a top-notch property. The staff goes out of the way to accommodate you. It’s a fairly “westernized“ atmosphere. Large rooms, great location. Beautiful property. Highly recommended.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Adventure823036
Detailed Review: I have stayed in this hotel for Business trip and I must say the best Hotel to stay. All staffs are very helpful.I would like to thanks specially to Mr. Vijay More,he was very Welcoming and Polite. Excellent Sevice provided by him. Thank u.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Diptokanti M
Review: A late review on a comfortable stay!
Detailed Review: I had stayed in Vits Mumbai between 20th to 25th of Jan this year with my Family on a leisure trip. To be very honest, this was my first stay through a colleague's referral, and I was actually not very clear on what to expect. To say the least, the stay exceeded most parts of our expectations.     Good parts of the stay: - The rates for rooms at the hotel is amazingly affordable when the quality of the rooms are kept in mind.  - Decor of the rooms are comfortingly choicy, with a very subtle use of elegant tones and shades through the room. The maintenance of the room was also very good. - Being a Hotelier myself, I would always lookout for snags in my hotel rooms that I check into. Pleasantly enough, the room was quite hygienic and dust free. No trace of foul smell, dust…

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sateesh N R
Detailed Review: Proximity to airport. Slightly inside the busy andheri - kurla road. Metro station is at walking distance. The room allotted was in split levels, sitting area at the entrance and sleeping area slightly down near the window and is,facing the atrium. Reasonably furnished. Swimming pool is in the atrium around which is the restaurant. The restaurant is always crowded as the hotel is mostly booked by corporates for their employees. This makes the pool absolutely dysfunct  and there are no pool loungers also. But the kitchen and restaurant,staffs are always on there toes to satisfy the guests. Food,is tasty and the chef try,to provide a variety in addition to local flavours. Overall they are doing a credit worthy job to satisfy huge crowd. The maintenance of the premises,especially…

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: D Jamnadas
Review: very comfortable stay, and friendly staff
Detailed Review: I have stayed at the hotel twice for 3-4 nights each time. The stay was very comfortable, rooms were very nice  Booking staff Ms. Shivani was very friendly and attentive in bookings Mr. Pradeep and Rahim were excellent and very friendly bell boys Mr. Sachin and Pinky offered us a very warm welcome at the reception.  Thank you all for your efficient service.  We are very happy with our stay and will definitely come back.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Navjot_Singh_Khurana
Detailed Review: I stayed at this Hotel for one night during offical tour. The major problem is the design of the rooms. There is a covered pool in the middle of the hotel alongside the restaurant and the rooms are designed on both the sides having view of each other windows. So you need to keep the curtains closed to maintain your privacy. Also, probably due to covered pool in the middle of the hotel, there is a major dampness in the rooms.  Rest food was great and the location is also nearby to the airport. Around 10 minutes drive.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sunny
Review: Handled our group booking with great care. Due respect to the staff.
Detailed Review: We had 40 rooms for 2 nights and we had various requirements in terms of room allotment. The way the VITS team came together to make it a success for us was commendable. Thank u team. Special thanks to Rajeev and Shanshank for ensuring all our requirements were met and ensuring our event went smoothly.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: ZMANEngland
Review: Excellent hotel and service from staff
Detailed Review: Stayed here as part of an RCI exchange and the whole experience from welcome at 0100hrs to departure were done to a very high standard. I travel a lot on business and pleasure and have stayed at many 4* and 5* star hotels, I can honestly say that this hotel is extremely good value. To summarise - ++Plus points  Location, close to airport; Service of Concierge (Ganesh), Reception staff (Pinky and company), Porterage, Restaurant staff (Ram, Bansi, Prakash). All staff have been named and there were others as well so a credit to the whole team. Breakfast choice and quality were fantastic. Room service also good value.  1 Bed apartments are a good standard. I would consider returning to this hotel if I was in Mumbai again. --Minus points It is a little far from tourist areas such as…

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Maresa G
Detailed Review: This luxury business hotel is a good option, be it for business or leisure, since it is conveniently 5 min away from the Chhatrapati Shivaji International Airport. It is also close to the Airport Road metro station, which is 3 stops from the Andheri station from where you can catch the very reliable local train. Our first double room in this hotel, before going to Hyderabad for a few days, was very musty and damp, but we didn't complain since we thought the aircon would sort it out, and besides we were just there for one night.  The second time we stayed there, we requested a non-musty room since we would be there for 2 nights this time, and they very kindly upgraded us to a bigger double room, with a mini lounge area. This was a much better room, with good shower, including…

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Honey
Detailed Review: I have been visited to Mumbai for a business trip and stayed at vits hotels for a night everything was perfect from the beginning check in and check out and food all found very nice I would like to thanks duty manager Mr.Dinesh found very approachable person,, management should appreciate he doing such a good job very helpful person,keep it up.hope to you soon  Thanks once again Mr.Dinesh

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: jayanth406
Detailed Review: The room is very spacious and clean. Though my colleague's did not get the room they desired because of some confusion with these online booking websites. I would recommend to double check with the websites and book the room. The breakfast was good. Overall a decent stay.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Dashrath P
Detailed Review: Had a great to stay with vits Hotel Especially  from front desk Devendra and sachin help alot during stay.ice welcoming staff. Food is also good Extended my stay and will definitely visit again in future.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Kunal
Detailed Review: Had a great stay at VITS mumbai. The food and service is fantastic especially Pradeep from Lobby. He is always there to help with a lovely smile.   The poolside restaurant serves delicious  food with topped with a peaceful ambience.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Parekh
Detailed Review: We have been served so nicely for morning breakfast and it’s friendly service with smile by person called Bansi and yesterday lunchtime by Ajay as well and overall staff are very friendly and helpful. We recommend the other people to visit this hotel.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Heidi R
Detailed Review: Staying in Mumbai Vits Hotel should be your choice - short distance to airport and outstanding service in all departments- thanks to Vijay and Pradeep from Bell Box, Varun from reception, to all service crew in the restaurant and the team behind the scenes.  All requests have been taken upmost care of and hospitality is really shown in many small details. All facilities in room, lobby, restaurant etc clean, well kept and focus on environmental friendly service - thanks to all Vits Hotel team members for making my stay one to remember!

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Rahul
Review: Poor and late response from the reception
Detailed Review: I stepped in at 6:30 P.M in the hotel on 23/01/2020.It took 25 minutes for the person for me to handover the keys for the room.  Room he gave me was smelly he told me we dont have any other room then later on he arranged it and we changed it somehow and it almost took 30 more minutes I got the room finally at 7:30 after being tired from the whole days work. When I asked for water bottles it took another hour to handover bottels. The breakfast table will be accompanied by the cockroaches during the breakfast.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Sushil Singh
Detailed Review: The hotel staff is very cooperative, excellent service and understanding with guests. Food quality is awesome.  Rooms and cleanliness by the staff is maintained very well. Ambience is great and we like the pool area for restaurant.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Thein htun win
Detailed Review: 4days stay. Nice hotel n good services. delicious food in both breakfast and dinner.eco friendly hotel service provided by Bansi and Chayanika was great.. Highly recommended for all travellers.. Will come back soon..

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Gurpreet Singh
Detailed Review: Stayed for 2 nights for business. The hotel is clean and comfortable. So comfortably located near the airport and office area.  Special mention for Pradeep who takes care of baggage and transportation.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Hary C
Detailed Review: I gave an approval or block of some amount, without my knowledge they have taken the amount and they were justifying what they did.  Each and every time when we do in room dining they asked us to pay it.  The front office manager or the front desk or the room reservations never felt sorry.  For me its breach of TRUST.  will not recommend to anyone.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Chirag Pagaria
Detailed Review: We were here to celebrate our 1st Wedding Anniversary and the arrangements were really good including delicious food and special thanks to Mr. Bansi for giving us the best service and making our special day more special.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Kalyan B
Detailed Review: I am quite a regular at the VITS given its proximity to the International terminal. I stayed there for a couple of nights this trip in and out and was really disappointed at where one of my favourite hotels is going.  The major change this trip was not being able to charge bar and restaurant bills to the room. I found this out after visiting the bar (who said he didn't accept room charge but the restaurant did); then went to the restaurant, who in turn said he does not accept room charge either. Shambles, no notices or prior warning.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: raghvendra
Review: ENJOYED STAY IN MUMBAI SPL. VITS
Detailed Review: The hotel is very conveniently located in the center . front office staff is very  courteous and efficient .   special thanks toganesh , Varun and shreya . will definetly come back and highly recommended.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: SINGH
Detailed Review: Dinner, surrounding, watet flow, hotel staff was excellent. Mr. Bansi provides excellent support and coordination during bteakfast and dinner.  i enjoyed a lot this hotel.  Night view of dinner and continuous flowing of water gives pleasure and peace.   Overall stay was beautiful and staff was excellent.   I recommend to stay in this hotel.   😊😊😊😊😊

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Shubh
Detailed Review: Nice and pleasant experience. Very good service by FO team Aaron,More and shivani was very helpful will be coming back soon rooms where good bell desk team was helpful food was good extremely good service by the hotel team

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Wanderlust
Detailed Review: Hotel is not very far from airport. Room ok ok.. They had buffet breakfast and mix of items which was good. No bath tub in the room.   They have one strange policy of not bringing the food from outside. It may be good for business travelers but not nice for families for sure. This is one biggest negative point. Visitors are also not allowed...   I'll not recommend probably.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Harilal
Detailed Review: Very nice service by Bansi. Very Friendly and smile on the face. Very nice pool restaurant. Nice room. Will prefer to revisit again. Nearby airport. Very good food quality. Enjoyed the evening dinner.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Eddy ansh
Detailed Review: Good hotel all and all the housekeeping team and  F and B team should be proactive could contribute more pradeep from bell desk and ram from F and B service were two wonderful people I met. All the best guys cheers😇

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Poonja
Detailed Review: The service was extremely amazing and we loved the ambiance. We met Mr. Bansi who served us with so much warmth and we are totally going to remember this place because of him. He’s a very cheerful, happy and positive person, very courteous and prompt  service. Kudos Mr. Bansi and thank you!! Totally going to visit this place again. Nice place for a family stay.

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Harvi savani
Detailed Review: I came for my hubby's bday surprise and it was fantastic.. Good ambience and mr.bansi made our night more special.. The setup was amazing..I loved it.. Superb  it was.. Mr.bansi was very helpful..I will visit again..

Source.Name: VITS_Mumbai_International_Airport_T2-Mumbai.csv
Name: Jimit007
Detailed Review: I was an awesome expereience njoiied alot . Mr.Bansi was an excellent host and luved the ambience as well as food . You should seriously visit as it makes ur special day even more special and the price is also affordable.. THANKS ALT MR.BANSI FOR BEIN SUCH A NICE HOST..

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Fahad abdullah
Detailed Review: I come from oman i feel here at swimming pool and gymnasium mr Manish Chauhan was there and he greeting me every day and nicely talked take care and good knowledge about India and new delhi also..........

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: vivek
Detailed Review: The service was excellent Nitish who helped me out with his excellent service and very calm and friendly nature and thanks abhishek chauhan for awesome cheese omlate especially nitish ke hath ki chai  great job very satisfied food was such friendly nature it's just taste better

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Sakshi Khanna
Detailed Review: We visited Hilton Hotel with friends we had a great time….Had an amazing time at the pool…The pool area is well maintained…Mr Manish took good care and rest of the staff was also very efficient…Would love to visit the place again…

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Naser
Detailed Review: I met to mannish Changan swimming pool life guard and gym trainer he was nice and courteous guy hotel facility also good hotel placed middle New Delhi I will try to stay in next time in this hotel Hilton saket

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Amir
Detailed Review: Nitish has provide excellent services and He is very supportive. Infact all services are good , foooding Very well environment at specially hiltan garden inn. India Grill. very cleaned nice arrangement.  Read less

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Bakhtiyar Khan
Detailed Review: It’s been a great experience at India grill. The food is amazing and it’s really  ‘MAA ke haath ka ‘ food. All the taste is authentic and just mouth watering. Loved the deserts too. 5 ⭐️‘s for Nitish and Shubam. They really catered well and served everything at the table. Looking forward to dine here again

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Fahad abdullah
Detailed Review: I come from oman i feel here at swimming pool and gymnasium mr Manish Chauhan was there and he greeting me every day and nicely talked take care and good knowledge about India and new delhi also..........

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: marcus226
Review: Excel Services at Holiday Inn Airport
Detailed Review: Today I met Ashish from housekeeping department. He was courteous, friendly and helpful. Cleaning in my room is the best one ever can find. Thank you Ashish for your hospitality and service throughout my stay at Holiday Inn.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Utsav
Detailed Review: Dear General Manager, I would like to express my gratitude to the entire hotel staff for making our stay comfortable and pleasant. The hotel is well managed and the icing on the cake is put by your amazing staff. The rooms are spacious, restaurant is good and the bar was very beautiful as well. The good tasted delicious and the service was exceptional. I would like to give special shout out to your amazing colleagues, namely Enamul, Anoushka,Jaspreet and the rest of the team. Also, I would like to thank your staff who helped us on the floor in assisting with the luggage. I think he belonged to your pest control team maybe, his name was Arun or Alok ( sorry I couldn't recall) . But the stay was very nice and we will keep coming back .

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: pallav chamoli
Detailed Review: the hotel is amazing and have great service with good arrangements for breakfast, lunch and dinner. had amazing stay. enjoyed the pool and early morning swim. as well as morning breakfast. i will definitely recommend this hotel to people who love to travel and want to have good experience while there stay

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Neeraj M
Detailed Review: Outstanding service by the restaurent staff, especially Manish & Dheeraj.  Met Chef Gaurav, he was very kind and courteous.  The rooms are comfortable, breakfast was fantastic. Location is close to the airport. I definitely recommend Holiday Inn aerocity

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: marcus226
Review: Excel Services at Holiday Inn Airport
Detailed Review: Today I met Ashish from housekeeping department. He was courteous, friendly and helpful. Cleaning in my room is the best one ever can find. Thank you Ashish for your hospitality and service throughout my stay at Holiday Inn.

The hotel is well managed and the icing on the cake is put by your amazing staff. The rooms are spacious, restaurant is good and the bar was very beautiful as well. The good tasted delicious and the service was exceptional. I would like to give special shout out to your amazing colleagues, namely Enamul, Anoushka,Jaspreet and the rest of the team. Also, I would like to thank your staff who helped us on the floor in assisting with the luggage. I think he belonged to your pest control team maybe, his name was Arun or Alok ( sorry I couldn't recall) . But the stay was very nice and we will keep coming back .

Detailed Review: Outstanding service by the restaurent staff, especially Manish & Dheeraj.  Met Chef Gaurav, he was very kind and courteous.  The rooms are comfortable, breakfast was fantastic. Location is close to the airport. I definitely recommend Holiday Inn aerocity

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: marcus226
Review: Excel Services at Holiday Inn Airport
Detailed Review: Today I met Ashish from housekeeping department. He was courteous, friendly and helpful. Cleaning in my room is the best one ever can find. Thank you Ashish for your hospitality and service throughout my stay at Holiday Inn.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Utsav
Detailed Review: Dear General Manager, I would like to express my gratitude to the entire hotel staff for making our stay comfortable and pleasant. The hotel is well managed and the icing on the cake is put by your amazing staff. The rooms are spacious, restaurant is good and the bar was very beautiful as well. The good tasted delicious and the service was exceptional. I would like to give special shout out to your amazing colleagues, namely Enamul, Anoushka,Jaspreet and the rest of the team. Also, I would like to thank your staff who helped us on the floor in assisting with the luggage. I think he belonged to your pest control team maybe, his name was Arun or Alok ( sorry I couldn't recall) . But the stay was very nice and we will keep coming back .

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Utsav
Detailed Review: Dear General Manager, I would like to express my gratitude to the entire hotel staff for making our stay comfortable and pleasant. The hotel is well managed and the icing on the cake is put by your amazing staff. The rooms are spacious, restaurant is good and the bar was very beautiful as well. The good tasted delicious and the service was exceptional. I would like to give special shout out to your amazing colleagues, namely Enamul, Anoushka,Jaspreet and the rest of the team. Also, I would like to thank your staff who helped us on the floor in assisting with the luggage. I think he belonged to your pest control team maybe, his name was Arun or Alok ( sorry I couldn't recall) . But the stay was very nice and we will keep coming back .

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Mayank Bhargava
Detailed Review: I don’t know what to write: Dirty lien dirty rooms Yea making kettle having red ants  No dental kit  No water to drink for 4 hrs Absolutely pathetic stay NOT AT ALL RECOMMENDED  Plz plz do not think about this hotel  Oyo rooms are much much better

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Himanshu K
Detailed Review: I don't know where to start but since my trip and stay  was more then trauma I thought upon sharing my experience so that nobody going through similar experience.It was my little one 2 year birthday on 9th July and my birthday was due on 10th July so we family planned to have a small celebration in hotel.Since we stay in delhi it didn't took us much time to reach the hotel.Immediatly in checking in hotel we went to room and saw that bed is dirty ,hairs ,stains on bed sheets,no basic amenities in room or coffee and tea sachet.It was really unhygienic and dust allover.Reception was called 2-3 times to send housekeeping but 2-3 hrs nobody bothered to come to clean room.Size of standard room is very small ,you can hardly move around in the room.There after we had ordered two cakes from outside and requested receptionist to send match stick to which they refused and said it's not allowed.Then we told atleast tell somebody to light up candle in cake to which again they refused.We told receptist girl to connect to lobby manager but after first call made to her to connect to lobby manager ,she stopped picking up my call.By now the time was 10.30pm as it was getting late and there was no return call from lobby manager so we proceeded toward hotel restaurant to not spoil little baby birthday .When we reached restaurant we were shocked to see they have only restaurant,first one is very medicore in ambience and road side restaurant ambience may be much better while the second one named something like brewery was so so and mostly a bar type amibence .With no option to celebrate in any good restaurant except brewery restaurant,we sat in the aforementioned restaurant.Again a very shocking experience as only one waiter was there who was occupied in serving a 2 senior old men liquor and just focused on serving them only .After shouting and calling the waiter that nobody has come to take order finally the same waiter comes and take orders.Menu prices are exorbitantly high but in case a good service is done one don't usually check price .Food inspite being very highly charged was given in small portion.We had our dinner after cutting cake of little one and my cake was cut around 12 midnight then we proceeded toward room.When going toward room I enquired at lobby of Looby manager ,lobby manager came.I asked him why he was hiding and not attending calls inspite repeated calls in lobby to which he just kept saying sorry ,when he was told about dirty rooms ,no match stick given to light candle in birthday cake he only was able to sorry .It's very unfortunate such hotels are putting only rosy pictures on websites and reality one get to know only at check in.In morning at buffet breakfast inspite repeated request to waiter to serve water ,they said glasses are not washed yet and it will take time.It was really pathetic experience and my child as well as my birthday was spoilt ,every one mood was spoilt in family seeing such insensitive and lack of customer care.I won't even want to give 1 mark out of five for their service .The hotel is very poor in terms of customer care , ambience,food and they hardly care to serve you if you seat in their restaurant.Our money got wasted and it was very bad experience and we will never ever come to this property again…

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: dheeraj
Review: Do not choose this as your next destination as it is totally waste of money
Detailed Review: The management is the poorest as the staff is not sufficient on the reception only the receptionist is mentioning their problems to the guest . The breakfast buffet management was so bad . They need to work really hard on their management. Or else they have to close thier operations .

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Parul Sood
Review: Pathetic , dirty and unhygienic ! Not recommended
Detailed Review: One of the worst star category hotels I have stayed in my entire, life . Pathetic staff . Our group has checked in for a business meeting. Super lazy staff at the check-in counter. 2 guys, one constantly on phone refusing to checkin the guests standing in a queue , dirty pillow covers , unchanged linen in the rooms , basic amenities like hair dryer are missing , no buffet in restaurant, arrogant house keeping staff refusing outrightly to address any requests and also refusing to disclose their names. The chef with hardly any knowledge about all this is the acting Manager on Duty. Despite clear instructions and confirmation from hotel for btc still demanding payments for food etc. Pathetic. We checked in and had to wait for 2 hours for linens to be changed . The only saving grace was that the food was decent though service was horribly slow.   Not at all recommended to anyone. The rooms are very tiny sized however what is not acceptable is the unhygienic linen and pathetic behaviour of staff.   Would request the GM to pls get in touch since your staff is refusing to help and also refusing to connect us to you…

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: PRATIK EDWANKAR
Detailed Review: Loved Royal plaza, amazing food, centrally located & stellar service. Rooms are spacious & personalised service by all. Ashwinder & Aman were really cooperative !  Royal brewery is a must visit, great pool as well

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Aman
Detailed Review: We stayed at r. Royal plaza hotel . If you stay in delhi city you will have to super experience ever service is not overbearing but they fulfill every wish you could have . Excellent breakfast  Excellent staff lke Aman and Gautam provide best room. Great 👍 stay

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Anjali A
Detailed Review: Me and my family stayed at royalplaza delhi. We were treated like a royal guest . We stayed at the royal plAza which is extremely nice. Nice room nice view good place to explore the city . Staff specifically Aman and Shubhi both were nice friendly. Great stay happy stay  ….

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Harendar Prashar
Detailed Review: Thank You the hotel for lovely gursture . Our experience was amazing. Staff special Aman and Sabauddin  Extremely helpful and caring . Room is nice . Food is very best Breakfast 🥐 awesome  Pool is also good and neat clean. Garden 🏡 beautiful Location best

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Karan
Detailed Review: Wonderful stay over there with itc and very comfortable it becomes very comfortable we people are always used to help the very first is miss Samiksha nice assistance everytime food was very delicious will come back

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Fahad abdullah
Detailed Review: I come from oman i feel here at swimming pool and gymnasium mr Manish Chauhan was there and he greeting me every day and nicely talked take care and good knowledge about India and new delhi also..........

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: vivek
Detailed Review: The service was excellent Nitish who helped me out with his excellent service and very calm and friendly nature and thanks abhishek chauhan for awesome cheese omlate especially nitish ke hath ki chai  great job very satisfied food was such friendly nature it's just taste better

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Sakshi Khanna
Detailed Review: We visited Hilton Hotel with friends we had a great time….Had an amazing time at the pool…The pool area is well maintained…Mr Manish took good care and rest of the staff was also very efficient…Would love to visit the place again…

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Naser
Detailed Review: I met to mannish Changan swimming pool life guard and gym trainer he was nice and courteous guy hotel facility also good hotel placed middle New Delhi I will try to stay in next time in this hotel Hilton saket

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Amir
Detailed Review: Nitish has provide excellent services and He is very supportive. Infact all services are good , foooding Very well environment at specially hiltan garden inn. India Grill. very cleaned nice arrangement.  Read less

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Bakhtiyar Khan
Detailed Review: It’s been a great experience at India grill. The food is amazing and it’s really  ‘MAA ke haath ka ‘ food. All the taste is authentic and just mouth watering. Loved the deserts too. 5 ⭐️‘s for Nitish and Shubam. They really catered well and served everything at the table. Looking forward to dine here again

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: siddharths204
Detailed Review: Thanks a ton Gaurav and Tammana for great hospitality and experience. Beautiful property with such amazing staff thanks once again.A special thanks to Ankit from F&B good food awesome pool awesome service. Thanks all of you for such a comfortable and lovely stay.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: hamzah b
Review: Not an experience I expected from Hilton Chain
Detailed Review: Receptionist during checkin was least interested in explaining the amenities or even greet guests properly.. leaving guests figure out themselves where to find lift and about amenities... again asked Receptionist to have towels changed while going out but she was more interested in her phone and had to again call from room when I realized that it was nt changed... icing on the cake was that I had insect floating in the milk while having breakfast which left me disgusted.. after notifying the floor manager I was surprised they did not close milk section to check the issue ... even when I told manager that they should Ideally close that section and check properly before another guest faces same issue...

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Simran W
Detailed Review: I booked this hotel for my parents and they cannot stop praising it, firstly the location is so convenient and it’s adjoining the best malls of Delhi.  The rooms and clean and spacious and breakfast has been great, they’ve enjoyed dinner every night at the hotel while they’ve been there. All the staff was very polite.   A special mention to: Rohit Yadav, Deepa’s Jogi, Pawan, Raushan Thakur and Rabindra, they really looked after my parents so well and went beyond expectations with their customer service, having staff like them is a real asset to your hotel. We wish them all well and hope to see them soon.  I will definitely be booking this hotel again for my parents and also my next trip to Delhi.  Once again thank you for making my parents stay to comfortable and enjoyable.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Iqbal Hashmi
Detailed Review: The ambience is as aesthetic and elegant as it can be. The environment is posh and fancy and at the same time, the kindness of the staff makes you feel homely, which is quite the hard balance to maintain but they manage to do so effortlessly. This will definitely be at the top of my recommendation list.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Shaan Anand
Detailed Review: The best place to drinks as the ambience is nice. The bartender service of Rachit was extremely well. He made sure everything was intact. I visit here every month and always feels like special guest. All drinks in the menu are always available.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: LailaFreddy
Review: A HOTEL WORTH RETURNING TO EACH TIME
Detailed Review: This is our third stay at the HGI, and this in itself should be a clue as to what we think of the property and services. The location is pretty central The check in and check out are seamlessly effective The hotel build, maintenance and cleanliness are impeccable The room was really good, as was the bathroom, though , personally I need a shower-in-stall, which wasn't an option in a twin bedded room. The staff are polite, hospitable and helpful, I would like to mention Tammana, at the front desk, working indefatigably for hours, with a smile, and a nimble mind. The breakfast was really substantial, varied and tasty, as was the dinner we had one night. The staff here too just bettered our experience. We'll be back.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Pranav Sharma
Detailed Review: Absolutely loved the ambiance and the service they provide. Their staff is super friendly and cooperative. Cheers to the bar tender Rachit, really loved his suggestions of drinks. Must try his favourite list of drinks. Perfect blend of tastes!! Super recommended!!

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Pablo C
Detailed Review: The Hilton Garden Inn Hotel in Sales, New Delhi has the best staff. The facilities are basic but the hotel is also not expensive. The staff is excellent though. They are all very helpful, friendly, very polite and always very charming. I should also add that the food in the restaurant (India Grill) is fantastic and the staff also great, especially Rohit Rai. He is fantastic! Very polite

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: siddharths204
Detailed Review: Thanks a ton Gaurav and Tammana for great hospitality and experience. Beautiful property with such amazing staff thanks once again.A special thanks to Ankit from F&B good food awesome pool awesome service. Thanks all of you for such a comfortable and lovely stay.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: hamzah b
Review: Not an experience I expected from Hilton Chain
Detailed Review: Receptionist during checkin was least interested in explaining the amenities or even greet guests properly.. leaving guests figure out themselves where to find lift and about amenities... again asked Receptionist to have towels changed while going out but she was more interested in her phone and had to again call from room when I realized that it was nt changed... icing on the cake was that I had insect floating in the milk while having breakfast which left me disgusted.. after notifying the floor manager I was surprised they did not close milk section to check the issue ... even when I told manager that they should Ideally close that section and check properly before another guest faces same issue...

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: RAJ CHAND
Detailed Review: Very Bad experience, we checked in around 7:30 PM, there is not proper amenities in the room, TV was not working, No Shower Caps in washroom, other amenities was also only for 1 pax, where we had booked room for 3 pax. it took more than an hour to delivered luggage in our room after checked in that also we went down again to reception to identify the luggage. They will not pick your call in Bell Desk, House Keeping service.  Next day at the time of check out, they again asked us PHOTO IDs which we had already submitted to them at the time of check in and worst part they again filled the registration card, earlier one they misplaced. Very Poor service, we cancelled our booking with another hotel and booked this hotel seeing the brand name, but really they need to improve service and efficiencies specially the Guest Relationship.  Wont recommend this hotel to anyone…

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Rooe
Detailed Review: The service in The Hangar Lounge by Kuldeep and Piyush was exceptional Really good boys And top notch service Food and drinks quality was at par Highly recommended  There are so many exciting alcohol offers going on check it out for yourself! Enjoy

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: RG15121972
Review: Viva - a great host for dinner
Detailed Review: We came in to Viva their coffee  shop for family dinner. The buffet dinner was great. Sandipan and Mohit took a great care of us. They were great hosts! Everything was taken care by them what ever we ordered. I was surprised that I asked for liquid chocolate and raisins for icecream which was not part of buffet, they got me in time. Absolutely amazing experience!

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Van
Detailed Review: I had a quick stay in holiday inn and staffs hospitality was very good. Staff name Rohit was very attentive. Thank you Holiday inn for such a nice experience.   Will visit again in this hotel and share the experience with friends and family

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: WW Sufi
Detailed Review: Convenient place to overnight between connecting flights. Nothing fancy just does the job. Its close to the airport and the car service by the hotel is good. Room service is efficient and food is good.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Siddharth
Detailed Review: We have a nice experience .Lovely stay at holiday inn. And room dining service is soo good. I got food within 20 min. All the staff is soo good. Room dining staff gautam was soo good. He have a good attitude towards his work. I really appreciate his service. Thankyou

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Ravi
Review: Rooms are nicely designed and well maintained
Detailed Review: Everything was good and we enjoyed a lot and pool was good food was also nice. Very well educated staff of housekeeping… … all the covid protocols were followed . Specially thanks to sanjay verma from housekeeping was very helpful…..

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: PRANAV KANODIA
Review: FAMILY HOTEL ! FAMILIAR STAFF ! BAR OFFERS !
Detailed Review: NICE PROPERTY! Family hotel ! Good offers on BAR all full day ! Although aLL hotels in aerocity is small compact hotels  but this manages to be out of box like the JW   Suite room are big and nice ! Infact I can say value of money .   Rates #2 after JW Marriot in aero city

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Dr M N Khaja
Review: Dr Mohd N KhajaChairman & MDBioviz Technolgoies Pvt.Ltd.,Hyderabad- 500034Telangana
Detailed Review: My stay is perfect and breakfast time I can enjoy the team restarent. For me Homely  feeling. My frequent visit to Delhi Aerocity always pleasant because of my second home is Holiday Inn. When ever I visit to Delhi, after reaching airport Hotel person will pickup me promptly without any delay.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: RUPALI Deshpande
Detailed Review: It was a nice stay.clean rooms food quality was also good.Will highly recommend.The staff was also polite and on their toes to help . Overall was a great experience .we have also booked the meeting room for interview,the banquets arrangements were also good

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Compass822464
Detailed Review: Stay was good  Would recommend everyone to stay! The food was excellent I would surely recommend it to my friends neighbours colleagues and all other relatives   Great job done by the hotel team  It has been a great experience

Detailed Review: Very Bad experience, we checked in around 7:30 PM, there is not proper amenities in the room, TV was not working, No Shower Caps in washroom, other amenities was also only for 1 pax, where we had booked room for 3 pax. it took more than an hour to delivered luggage in our room after checked in that also we went down again to reception to identify the luggage. They will not pick your call in Bell Desk, House Keeping service.  Next day at the time of check out, they again asked us PHOTO IDs which we had already submitted to them at the time of check in and worst part they again filled the registration card, earlier one they misplaced. Very Poor service, we cancelled our booking with another hotel and booked this hotel seeing the brand name, but really they need to improve service and efficiencies specially the Guest Relationship.  Wont recommend this hotel to anyone…

Detailed Review: Very Bad experience, we checked in around 7:30 PM, there is not proper amenities in the room, TV was not working, No Shower Caps in washroom, other amenities was also only for 1 pax, where we had booked room for 3 pax. it took more than an hour to delivered luggage in our room after checked in that also we went down again to reception to identify the luggage. They will not pick your call in Bell Desk, House Keeping service.  Next day at the time of check out, they again asked us PHOTO IDs which we had already submitted to them at the time of check in and worst part they again filled the registration card, earlier one they misplaced. Very Poor service, we cancelled our booking with another hotel and booked this hotel seeing the brand name, but really they need to improve service and efficiencies specially the Guest Relationship.  Wont recommend this hotel to anyone…

Detailed Review: Very Bad experience, we checked in around 7:30 PM, there is not proper amenities in the room, TV was not working, No Shower Caps in washroom, other amenities was also only for 1 pax, where we had booked room for 3 pax. it took more than an hour to delivered luggage in our room after checked in that also we went down again to reception to identify the luggage. They will not pick your call in Bell Desk, House Keeping service.  Next day at the time of check out, they again asked us PHOTO IDs which we had already submitted to them at the time of check in and worst part they again filled the registration card, earlier one they misplaced. Very Poor service, we cancelled our booking with another hotel and booked this hotel seeing the brand name, but really they need to improve service and efficiencies specially the Guest Relationship.  Wont recommend this hotel to anyone…

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Rooe
Detailed Review: The service in The Hangar Lounge by Kuldeep and Piyush was exceptional Really good boys And top notch service Food and drinks quality was at par Highly recommended  There are so many exciting alcohol offers going on check it out for yourself! Enjoy

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: RG15121972

Detailed Review: Convenient place to overnight between connecting flights. Nothing fancy just does the job. Its close to the airport and the car service by the hotel is good. Room service is efficient and food is good.

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Bhanu PRATAP
Detailed Review: Hotel stay is very comfortable😊 and happy.  I was with my family👪 Family enjoy and happy😊 Aman is very good with us  Aman help to much during stay.  Food is very good👍 Break fast is very good My special regards and thankx to Aman

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Terashia S
Detailed Review: Our family of 4(2 children) stayed at this hotel for 2 nights. It was a great experience and Aman made is extra special. She always had a smile and was ever willing to help. Uopon checkout, all the front staff stood and wished us well. We felt cared for and looked after. You have excellent staff. In terms of the hotel itself, why we took off 2 stars is because we had to book two rooms as there are no family rooms that cater for bigger children (aged 9 and 11) who are not able to share a bed with the parents. Also the swimming pool was not made available to us due to a function. Overall, a great stay!  Thank you

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Sachin H
Detailed Review: Hotel the royal plaza in Delhi the hotel is good not good it's very good I m staying in this hotel last 4 day it was a excellent stay I have the staff is very good awesome shubhi is very nice person I have seen in my life Aman good all staff is good love it

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: azlinak
Detailed Review: Beautiful hotel  Staff is kind and polite  Aman special thank you Which is very good 👍 Stay was comfortable and happy My children enjoyed A lot  Location is also very nice Hotel near to India gate as well ❤️‍🩹 Excellent 👍

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: mk
Review: amazing and memorable stay in delhi, you will get 5 star services in minimum price, delicious breakfast………………………………………..
Detailed Review: great experience of leaving, amazing and professional staff at reception, only there is bit delay in room services that might be because hotel was full during my stay period.  prime location all places are near or at equal distances being in centre.

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: jeet
Detailed Review: It was perfect mid range hotel, food is also great delicious , great ambiance, perfect location, metro blue and airport are walking distance, service bell boy Raghuvir is also nice person always ready to help front office team is also great😊, overall good hotel I advise to come and stay with hotel the royal plaza and enjoy comfortable stay

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Anil W
Detailed Review: shubhi was very sweet at the reception as was chef vaibhav and ruchi. overall the stay at hotel royal plaza was worth every penny. they cooked special non spicy meals for me keeping in my mind my health. recommend this hotel anytime. i have been staying here for the past 12 years

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Sen
Detailed Review: The ambience is excellent. Variety of delicious food. The hospitality is excellent especially the chef Nasir is kind. Overall it's a nice experience and would love to visit Eros hotel again and again.

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Vikash
Detailed Review: The hotel royal plaza is very nice hotel . It was memorable day. When i entered in hotel at reception i met a hotel staff name Ms. AMAN, she is just amazing. She has that emotional touch with me that i never can forget. Within a minutes, she was like frnd. Her way to behave with me was beautiful. Thank u all the staff of hotel The Royal plaza. There is no MASLA.........

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Jaswinder
Review: ILO stay conference the hotel Royal Plaza delhi .
Detailed Review: It’s an extraordinary experience to stay at this hotel and take part in the best experience.it’s amazing as usual the location suitable as conference stay hotel . The room was perfect clean and luxurious. Staff hotel specially friendly Manager Ashwinder Kour And Mukesh and Aman extremely helpful. Housekeeper Manager Rohit he is also very nice and provides us amenities. Thanks a lot  Team Royal plaza delhi

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Keshava
Review: Ashwani Tyagi made a huge difference.
Detailed Review: I don't know where to start, so give complete background. We had booked a 4-star deluxe property Hotel THE ROYAL PLAZA, NEW DELHI 2 days Banquet event and a 3-night room stay mainly for the location of this property. A week before the event, I called my friend in Delhi that we were coming for the event. He gave me shocking news that a recent review about the hotel are bad. We had already paid full payment, so we didn't have anything else to do, so praying to God to run the show successfully.  When I entered the hotel, we didn't like the way we got the treated from the front desk. Back in my mind many things were running, majorly my friend's words about reviews like Unfriendly staff, Worst service, overall horrible experience, etc. I was too tired that day, just check-in and had…

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Singh C
Review: Amazing service by the royal plaaza hotel
Detailed Review: Beautiful setting accommodating staff excellent lobby . This is my first stay here and they really take care of their clients. Specially the Aman front desk  thank you very much  I will come aging.  Beautiful hotel  Garden beautiful.

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Mani
Detailed Review: The hotel is very beautiful specially the staff Aman And Gautam they are very helpful during stay. Manger Mukesh also very nice humble. Hotel food is good. Room is okay  Central location Near india gate. Beautiful stay  Will comeback again .

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: User rai
Detailed Review: Very cooperative staff, ready to listen to and understand your situation, flexible and adjusting to the needs of the guests.  Problem solvers like Ms Shubhi, who go out if the way to help the guests are rare in the hospitable industry.

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Dr Vijay Makhija
Review: Exemplary Customer Centric by Ms AMANZ
Detailed Review: Wish to recognise exemplary customer centric behaviour by Ms Amanz of front desk team.   She paid attention to details , made my check in , check out & entire stay swift & comfortable.  Thank You Ms AMANZ for all your support & care   Dr Vijay Makhija

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: gogi t
Detailed Review: Deepak has been a good host. Keep it up. Always connected to the place emotionally as we have been visiting since long. Really looking forward for more Innovative and creative ideas for the upliftment. Best regards and wishes forever.................

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Surendra vvb
Detailed Review: Hotel The Royal Plaza is in the city centre.I had  one of the most pleasant experience while in there alone with my wife. We went to celebrate our anniversary ❤ and were given Honeymoon Suite.The  room was comfortable and spacious.At night we sat in roman garden under the stars and it was strawberry 🍓 moon night.So beautiful and serene.
