Ms.Ashwinder and her colleague Aman, Sumo, gautam were good and helpful 👍.They gave us cake to celebrate our special day and it's because of them we keep coming back to Royal Plaza Hotel. I wish good luck to Royal Plaza and will keep telling people how nicely I was treated there.Bye Bye

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Sumit B
Detailed Review: It was a stunning experience to check-in at a hotel that is so old, unclean, and unhygienic in a modern post covid world. This place must be from the old era that has not been refurbished or repaired for a very long time. The water from the tap is yellowish... bathroom doors get "accidentally" locked, and surprise guests drop in during the night... cockroaches, rats mosquitoes... the kids loved it all: the Delhi June heat, intermittently working AC, unclean toilets... rats... cockroaches... smelly beds and linens... I guess that's promoting sustainability... community-use towels... a truly medieval living... It was all topped with ungroomed rude staff, these definitely are not hotel management graduates... guess how great our holiday was... welcome to The Ruffin Plaza Hotel...

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Kaushik
Detailed Review: Polite and Co operative staff. Beautiful Ambience. Nice Food . Aman is very helpful and polite.Ms.Kaur is hospitable and looks after the guest and give personalized service. Hotel is beautiful.lobby is grand and antique Rajesh duty manager he is also very nice 👍. Excellent stay .I simply love this place 👍

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Jaideep G
Detailed Review: The stay was relaxing and the food was delicious and excellently served by Harpal  Hotel suite are exquisite and delight for any guest  909 and 906 view beautiful Especially thank you Aman .overall the best experience. I really enjoyed the hotel royal plaza . Highly recommended.

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Paras8
Detailed Review: Aman Tripathi helped me out with the guest service and he was really helpful all around super helpful ! The hotel is great and it cares about its guests. The royal architectural beauty stands out so does the service.

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Abid Wani
Detailed Review: Miss Aman Front end manager has treated us very politely We wish her all the best. Nice ambience outside,  hotel is good, breakfast is nice with proper hygiene. Recommended to everyone to stay in the hotel.

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Mànu
Detailed Review: Very pleasant to stay in the hotel and staff treated very well. Nice ambiance good food and staff courteous  Special thanks to Aman and Gautam  Provided beautiful room . Nice decor  Garden pool beautiful.

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Dilip
Detailed Review: The royal plaza is a brand which can not match any other hotel in the vicinity.  Front desk team is very warm and hospitable specially Ms.Kaur and Ms.Aman. Spa services were very relaxing and we felt so peaceful and serene post the therapy.  I will definitely visit the place again and strongly recommend to all prospective guests to try this out for pocket friendly rates and wow services.  Big thanks to Vikesh housekeeping for making my room every day so nicely.  See you guys

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Aditi R
Detailed Review: Hôtel the royal plaza Delhi is very beautiful 🤩 hotel . Hotel staff is very nice and helpful. Great hotel location. Food is good  Breakfast is okay 👍🏻  View is nice from the room. Devi Singh very helpful during check out .

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: pawan
Detailed Review: excellent service  by Mr Gautam and Sabauddin . very nice ambience .pool view is very good    room services and behaviour of the was very and nice  hope I room is nice  food is good.   great stay staff friendly.  thank you

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Rohan
Detailed Review: I like the front desk staff specifically Shiwani she was so good and polite. I like the breakfast as well. I would love to visit again thank you so much radisson for everything. Hope to come again soon. #144

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Minu
Detailed Review: I am staying in hotel royal plaza new Delhi located in co janpath market. The hotel staff is very very nice and helpful people her name is shubhi she is doing very well she knows how to handle guests she is super she understands my problem I love her her work is excellent and fabulous very good person and work is excellent hotel service is excellent good is good lobby is very beautiful over all I love this hotel I recommend to my friends my family if he planned staying hotel please go this hotel is super gud..

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Ashish yadav
Detailed Review: Rooms are comfortable and good. Food in restaurant is yummy. View from rooms are very nice. I have enjoyed the stay and also come back soon. Will tell my friends and family about this place. Really good place to recommend.

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: gayatri kaur
Detailed Review: hotel the royal plaza delhi is excellent stay location amenities and staff is good ms shubhi and mr gautam they are so helping people all over good room is clen............ good every thinking is good i will come back against

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: siddharths204
Detailed Review: Thanks a ton Gaurav and Tammana for great hospitality and experience. Beautiful property with such amazing staff thanks once again.A special thanks to Ankit from F&B good food awesome pool awesome service. Thanks all of you for such a comfortable and lovely stay.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: hamzah b
Review: Not an experience I expected from Hilton Chain
Detailed Review: Receptionist during checkin was least interested in explaining the amenities or even greet guests properly.. leaving guests figure out themselves where to find lift and about amenities... again asked Receptionist to have towels changed while going out but she was more interested in her phone and had to again call from room when I realized that it was nt changed... icing on the cake was that I had insect floating in the milk while having breakfast which left me disgusted.. after notifying the floor manager I was surprised they did not close milk section to check the issue ... even when I told manager that they should Ideally close that section and check properly before another guest faces same issue...

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Simran W
Detailed Review: I booked this hotel for my parents and they cannot stop praising it, firstly the location is so convenient and it’s adjoining the best malls of Delhi.  The rooms and clean and spacious and breakfast has been great, they’ve enjoyed dinner every night at the hotel while they’ve been there. All the staff was very polite.   A special mention to: Rohit Yadav, Deepa’s Jogi, Pawan, Raushan Thakur and Rabindra, they really looked after my parents so well and went beyond expectations with their customer service, having staff like them is a real asset to your hotel. We wish them all well and hope to see them soon.  I will definitely be booking this hotel again for my parents and also my next trip to Delhi.  Once again thank you for making my parents stay to comfortable and enjoyable.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Iqbal Hashmi
Detailed Review: The ambience is as aesthetic and elegant as it can be. The environment is posh and fancy and at the same time, the kindness of the staff makes you feel homely, which is quite the hard balance to maintain but they manage to do so effortlessly. This will definitely be at the top of my recommendation list.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Shaan Anand
Detailed Review: The best place to drinks as the ambience is nice. The bartender service of Rachit was extremely well. He made sure everything was intact. I visit here every month and always feels like special guest. All drinks in the menu are always available.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: LailaFreddy
Review: A HOTEL WORTH RETURNING TO EACH TIME
Detailed Review: This is our third stay at the HGI, and this in itself should be a clue as to what we think of the property and services. The location is pretty central The check in and check out are seamlessly effective The hotel build, maintenance and cleanliness are impeccable The room was really good, as was the bathroom, though , personally I need a shower-in-stall, which wasn't an option in a twin bedded room. The staff are polite, hospitable and helpful, I would like to mention Tammana, at the front desk, working indefatigably for hours, with a smile, and a nimble mind. The breakfast was really substantial, varied and tasty, as was the dinner we had one night. The staff here too just bettered our experience. We'll be back.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Pranav Sharma
Detailed Review: Absolutely loved the ambiance and the service they provide. Their staff is super friendly and cooperative. Cheers to the bar tender Rachit, really loved his suggestions of drinks. Must try his favourite list of drinks. Perfect blend of tastes!! Super recommended!!

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Pablo C
Detailed Review: The Hilton Garden Inn Hotel in Sales, New Delhi has the best staff. The facilities are basic but the hotel is also not expensive. The staff is excellent though. They are all very helpful, friendly, very polite and always very charming. I should also add that the food in the restaurant (India Grill) is fantastic and the staff also great, especially Rohit Rai. He is fantastic! Very polite

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Stephanie C
Detailed Review: As a result of a delayed flight and missing my connection I was put up for the night at this hotel by Vistara who also couldn't locate my bags. Courtesy taxi from the airport brought me very tired and emotional to this hotel. The concierge received me from the taxi driver without a welcome glance. I was handed over to check in staff and processed, I had 10 minutes of food left and hadn't eaten in hours so I head straight there. The restaurant staff are the reason I am writing this review - they were excellent! They did not have me on the list as obviously I hadn't actually been booked to be there but it wasn't a problem and I was ushered to a table while they sorted that out. Unfortunately, I was incredibly emotional at having a long delay, missed my connecting flight home to my family and my luggage was missing so even though I needed to eat, my body wasn't cooperating and as it was the last few minutes of service what was left of the buffet did not look appetising at all.  I have a few bites and gave in, opting to head to my room and end this horrendous day. I was stopped on the way out by the restaurant manager - unfortunately did not get his name. He noticed my little sustenance and probably my emotional state and he insisted on sending up a cup of tea to my room with biscuits. i have never drunk a better tasting cup of tea than that one and the gesture was gratefully received more than he can ever know. I asked at reception on check out the next morning for his name so I could leave a compliment but they didn't give it to me. So if it was you and you're reading this, thank you so much for your kindness and caring. I really needed that!…

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: chander
Detailed Review: I visit to the citrus cafe with my friend. The food was excellent and the way mr raju welcome us and treat us tike a family we really impress with him. Thanks to all who help mr raju to make our dey memorable.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Riya
Detailed Review: Visited lemon tree aerocity restaurant one month back with frnds the service provided by Mr. Aniket Rawat of FNB was amazing. Even visited today and I asked for was Mr. Aniket Rawat.  People like Mr. Rawat are asset to hospitality industry.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Anishuanimu
Detailed Review: The rooms here are strictly average and very tiny considering the cost. Food and service were pathetic but thanks to its excellent location in Aerocity, we had a variety of restaurants and cuisines to choose from. Ideal for a single night stay while traveling from Delhi by a morning flight..

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Khan
Detailed Review: Beautiful hotel with amazing services . I have stayed there for Two days and the housekeeping service  was really upto the mark . Thanks to Farhan from housekeeping and Ready to help.  my room neat and clean during my entire duration of stay. Overall experience was good.10/10 Thanks 🙏 lemon tree hotel .

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Sathish
Review: Nice experience and a nice service with the house keeping  staff Ms. Chandan
Detailed Review: It was very nice hospitality which given by Ms. Chandan.. and all the other staffs gesture was very good. And the food was served very good.. even the package given my Mr. Ankit singh was helped me to have the room with additional dinner

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Rohit
Detailed Review: It, s very good hotel in Delhi Aerocity love that hotel and Services are excellent special thank mr farhan from housekeeping he take care of my room very well And farhan is helpfull I tell my friend to go to this hotel thanks to all

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Sunu A
Detailed Review: Very good hotel to stay near Delhi airport. This was our second time stay at the same hotel. Excellent services and transportation . Very good guidance  from Mr.David travel desk cab operator . Suggesting for any family who wanted to visit  Delhi for tourist purpose or  for any official  visit this hotel is very good.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Aman mishra
Detailed Review: Farhan from Housekeeping was excellent in terms of everything. Whenever we will visit to Delhi-we will definitely choose this hotel for stay due to services and staff behavior.They are very polite humble and helpful for everything at anytime.... Definitely recommend for this hotel as a really great and peaceful for everyone one enjoy with their family and friends. Thank you somuch for management. Love you All

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Sanya
Detailed Review: The hotel staff if great , friendly , professional, the rooms were beautiful. Overall a must stay hotel .   I have been to lemon tree hotels across india and they never disappoint. In Amritsar, delhi etc.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Vivek Mehta
Detailed Review: Very good tasty food and staff raju to vivek and Mr pankaj great hospitality and feeling good and music was good. My work productivity was great. I want to come again.  In future if some one come for meeting I will prefer this space

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Nitu
Detailed Review: Couldn't be happier giving you this review, wonderful staff and wonderful experience, I would like to mention Ajeet, he helped us in every way possible and no words or review can describe the way we felt there. Truely amazing experience

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Shreffy
Review: Absolutely beautiful Amazon and excellent staff
Detailed Review: The staff was really kind and willing to attend any request. Alongside thoughtful amenities and general comfort, an efficient staff that excels at personal attention is a must-have for all hotels and I would specifically would love to admire, Ajeet singh. He was very considerate, courteous to all our requests and made out stay in the hotel really comfortable.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Mr reghav
Detailed Review: Good service and friendly staff good atmosphere and happy to come in pride plaza great food and service i like hospitality way the treat with us hotel viwe awesome  thanks for your hospitality..   Spacialy thanks Ankush and Uttam

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Latha C
Detailed Review: It was an awesome experience to stay in Lemon Tree Premier. The staff were very courteous and skilled . Clean rooms and food was awesome and had varieties. They provided complimentary breakfast during the stay. Everyone were very helpful. To name a few ,  Mahavir, Priyanka etc., The best part I liked about Lemon Tree Premier is they include differently abled people like hearing impaired, vocally challenged, autism, physically challenged people etc., train them and they do the services there . I think we have to promote this genuine cause so that they get motivated to add more to the cause .

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Rajvinder Singh
Review: Great location, fantastic service resulted in fab stay.
Detailed Review: This hotel has a great location in South Delhi with proximity to best malls. DLF mall is directly reachable from 2nd floor of the hotel which makes more convenient keeping in view the summer season. Service is exceptional from the front desk which makes the stay more enjoyable.  Regards Rajvinder

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: sam
Detailed Review: Rachit was very professional and hospitable. He made us very comfortable , he was friendly and good with kids. He made us some delicious cocktails and served us with full professionalism. I look forward to meeting him again and come back here to have a good time in this friendly environment. All thanks to rachit for entertaining us . Long way to go boy! Good luck!

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Vishesh A
Detailed Review: 5, the staff was very helpful specially Mr. GAURAV from front office department while arranging check in and transportation, rooms were very clean design for business hotel, connected to mall and other recreational area, Indian breakfast was very good with wide selection of live station food

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: yohanchendriah
Review: Amazing Stay with the best personnels
Detailed Review: Overall amazing stay at the hotel very well situated with shopping malls next door. My many thankful note will be for the awesome staffs from the restaurant team, FO team and the gentleman driver. Special thanks to Mr. Gaurav who been going extra miles in ensuring I have a nice stay and arranging all my transfers for my business meeting. Hilton should be proud of its personnel. Well done. I will be back soon.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: biju2022
Detailed Review: This is a great hotel stay in Delhi,  Great staff, food and location. I really appreciate Varun Talwar for making my stay comfort and great.  I will highly recommend this hotel for a comfortable stay and good food. Hotel has easy access to Saket mall and makes easy shopping as well.  I will prefer this hotel next time as well

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: RuatiRenthlei
Review: Stay was very comfortable  staff was very helpful  specially gaurav tamanna and Vaibhav they helped me a lot during my stay woul
Detailed Review: Stay was very comfortable  staff was very helpful  specially gaurav tamanna indal and Vaibhav they helped me a lot during my stay would love to come back and the food was also good specially gaurav helped me alot big thanks to him and the suite room was very nice

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: johntraveling
Detailed Review: Convenient location if you need to get to many different parts of Delhi. Clean, comfortable, great value for the price. Most of all, exceptional people: friendly, smiling, helpful, fine English.  Everyone goes out of their way to make your stay very positive. I've stayed here a few times over the last 7 years. Always the same experience. Over the last couple of months I have stayed here many days. Shyamveer has been responsible for my room. He has provided the best service I've experienced anywhere, asking each day what time I would like my room cleaned, same with my laundry. Getting me water or towels or whatever when I request it no matter what else he is in the middle of doing. He is a shining example of what makes this hotel exceptional.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Dipti mathur
Detailed Review: It was very good experience with Us...awesome ambiance of bar..the bar manager Rabindra and Submit team member  was sooo polite and kind...always try to help us for suggesting good cocktail.food was really awesome .

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Tasneem
Review: Service at the restaurant and bar
Detailed Review: Mr. Rachit is very helpful and gave us an amazing service at the bar and restaurant. He is excellent at his job. He knows how to make the guests feel comfortable.He made our experience the best! We would definitely come back to this hotel for this kind of service.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Nosirvek
Detailed Review: Gaurav, vaibhav, kunal, diksha, Karan,Tamanna all the front office staff was amazing I stayed here for atheist 7 days and I would love to come back again with my friends and the are so polite the make my stay very comfortable.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Mallika Narang
Detailed Review: Special thanks to Shubham for displaying warmth and hospitality! The food and service was amazing . Kudos to him and the Hilton team 👍🏼  I have been coming here almost everyday for the past 1 week now and it is a pleasure to be here.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Baseer N
Detailed Review: Went for the dinner buffet.Food was good....especially the continental fare. Dessert options could be improved though. Service was very good.We were taken care of nicely .A special shout out for Shubham who was very polite, efficient and considerate towards our requirements. Being a Hilton Honors member, it was a pleasant experience

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Bipy
Review: Wonderful stay at Hilton Inn Saket
Detailed Review: This was my 2nd stay at Hilton Inn Saket  this month.Had a wonderful experience the service was really good n the staffs were so very friendly and helpful. Varun dealt with us especially and he gave an extra effort with whatever we wanted.The best part was also it is directly connected to the mall .They have a wonderful spread for breakfast as well. Would like to stay here only and if you all are planning to visit Delhi please make it your home for those few days.               Aparajita                Guwahati

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Sumanto Chakravarty
Review: REVIEW OF HILTON GARDEN AND INDIA GRILL'S SERVICE AND TEAM
Detailed Review: I had booked this place to throw a party at the India Grill at Hilton Garden. A total of 30 guests were there. The entire staff put in their best efforts in order to make this day memorable for my parents. Starting from drinks to desert, everything was personalised by the staff and primarily managed by Mr. Deepak Jogi. A big shout out to the whole team!

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Guptavikas
Detailed Review: During my last visit to Delhi, my flight got delayed so, my friend advised me to visit The Hangar Lounge and Bar and it was a great decision to enjoy my time, Special thanks to Mr. Utpal Tiwari who was extremely polite and ready on his toes to help. Thanks a lot, Holiday Inn and Mr. Utpal

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: sngcanary
Review: The nicest Holiday Inn I have ever stayed at!
Detailed Review: I spent two nights here at the end of my trip to India. I have stayed at a lot of Holiday Inns, both in and out of the United States, and this was the best I have experienced. Starting with the staff at check who were wonderful, to the driver who took us back to the airport when we left, everything went beautifully! The room was wonderful, very comfortable, large, clean and modern. The bathroom was great. My friend and I both loved the restaurant. We used room service one night and it was perfect. I work in corporate travel with high level executives. I would not hesitate to put any of them at this hotel.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: snjaitly1
Detailed Review: Go for location. Typical business hotel. Good for stopovers and ideal for catching early morning flights. Nice food as well. Airport drop from hotel side is on expensive side so go for Uber / Ola. Although I feel that airport pickup / drop should be complimentary as was being done earlier for gold / platinum members of ihg.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: AM2236
Detailed Review: It was my first time in holiday inn and I do not regret my decision at all. Everything was very smooth . From check in to check out . I was traveling with my  business associate from France who happened to be Accour Gold card member and he was really impressed by the service . Though we stayed there for a night .  I will be travelling again for my work to Europe and definitely will be staying here again .  I will end with a special  thanks to guest relation executive Anoushka who took extra care to see that every thing worked well for us in the end . Thank you once again  .

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Sagar A
Detailed Review: First time in the holiday inn in Delhi, the rooms were neat and clean. Very close to the airport and they have really friendly staff and are very helpful. Recommended to take the pool view instead of the city view

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Laveena Francis
Detailed Review: Delhi being the national capital has many Five Star hotels but the services provided by the staffers at Holiday Inn Areocity is beyond exceptional. I stayed over with my bestie for a week (May 25-31) and the stay at the Holiday Inn turned out to be the BEST all thanks to the BEST services being provided by Mr Vicky Gomes and Ms. Tanu besides other staffers who were only a call away. Always on their toes to assist and make the stay EXTREMELY comfortable and indeed special. THANK YOU for making this trip extremely special. All the best.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Tari S
Detailed Review: THE MOST DISAPPOINTING STAY, 16/17th May 2022 Booked this hotel for a rest after a long flight from Uk before continuing our journey in India - WELL! where do I start -  Arrived at the hotel at 12.15 am (17th), VERY tired, didn't get to the room till 1am! Slowest check in process  ever!  Couldn't connect to the internet - took the IT person 15 minutes  to connect my iPhone and computer to the internet! No restaurant/coffee shop open - very odd for an international's chain hotel at an International Airport?? Ordered room service - chips and two beers - didn't arrive till 2am - was told we can't charge to the room, have to pay - tried two credit cards, both denied, waiter said card reader not working properly because internet very poor! Talked to the duty manager about our…

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Manish Saand
Detailed Review: The lobby is good and  stay was very comfortable .Check in very comfortable so was checkout  .the room was neat and tidy .enjoyed my stay the bed was nice very comfortable .very good to stay .will stay again .

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Birender
Detailed Review: It was pedometer satay…  food was delicious… front office staff was good… all housekeeping staff was well behaved and well educated… rooms were beautiful and well maintained.. Babli, Sanjay,, ruby from housekeeping were also helpful…

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Pradip Kumar Roy Choudhury
Detailed Review: Checked in with my wife for overnight stay,in transit. This is probably the third time we are doing so,during transit. Good rooms. Location great,very close to airport.But this time they informed us that airport drop was not in our package,and hotel car can drop us for a charge-₹781 inclusive of GST,we booked Uber and paid ₹126.Be that as it may, the behaviour was rude. For dinner we had ordered hakka style noodles and stir fried vegetables- both were rather bad. On the good side - breakfast  buffet spread remains  excellent,and tasty. Must put on record Mr.Himanshu who served us at the restaurant both for dinner and breakfast,appreciate his caring for us.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: dhruv
Detailed Review: Hopitality was very good and room services was fabulous.10/10 will recommend to other people.They were such a good host and food was delicious.Mr Sanjay assisted us at all time while we stayed here and was a fabulous host.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Satwik
Detailed Review: The hotel was very good witha good ambience very good breakfast and great room services,the hotel view is also great ,Sanjay from house keeping was very humble and took initiative to make our saty at this hotel very fine . Thank u Sanjay and Ruby.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Ravi
Detailed Review: The room were in excellent condition and food was really good. The staff ( specially sanjay house keeping )was really helpful. The ambience had a different vibe. The swimming pool was clean and well managed. Amazing experience...

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Apurva J
Detailed Review: Excellent stay and ambience all throughout. Staff, food, services and everything that one can need is here and managed excellently.  Special mention to Raguvir for his courteousness  as he’s always willing to help.

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Kamleshhhh
Detailed Review: The attention to detail wonderful. Great room outstanding atmosphere. The front desk staff hands down the friendliest I have experienced the room was easily accessible and very clean . The best part was the service . Aman and  Belk service  Raghveer they are awesome.  Keep it up team Royal plaza .

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Jasbir Singh
Detailed Review: I am staying in hotel the royal plaza new delhi located in lutyens delhi near CP,janpath market.  The hotel staff is very nice and helpful like a family.  I will stay again definitely and recomend all to come and enjoy in this beautiful place. And special thanks to ranjodh Singh front office for my help to guide me.

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Charu
Detailed Review: It was an awesome stay over here. Thanks for the service. I really like the hospitality of the staff and the management! They have lot of good options for the food and look after all the guests will zeal and smile on their faces.  I stayed on 5th floor and the view from the room was so scenic and green.  I will definitely come back and recommend all to come and stay and enjoy their stay int his beautiful place ! Special thanks to Prabhat security from the hotel for being so helpful !

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Sandeel
Detailed Review: The hotel is located at very central location , many places are 1-1.5 km distance & walkable like USA VAC center ,India gate , Rashtrapati Bhavan , Gurudwara and many states Bhavan /Guest house like Maharashtra Sadan , Kerala Bhavan , Connaught place (big shopping place ) , also it’s very convenient to take auto from front  of hotel instead paying double to Ola /Uber (negotiate well).  Hotel lobby is very beautiful liked the all the creative statue’s all over in lobby & each Floor.  Down side is free Internet is limited to only two devices & have to request code every day after 24 hr expiry and food is quite expensive, otherwise our stay was pleasant, room was nice and clean.  If they improve above two it’s very good place to stay and  comparatively affordable than other near by…

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Mohammed shoaib khan
Review: A true example of exceptional hospitality
Detailed Review: Hotel the royal plaza entire staff was wonderful have a command Aman and Gautam for their personal touch as well as providing exquisite service they were most accessible and accommodating. Food is good  Lobby is beautiful ambiance and hotel decor. I will come again .

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Neaan
Detailed Review: The hotel Royal plaza great ambience with Royal hospitality We found gautam very dedicated for his work  Bell devi singh he is also very much help ful during check out  We found hotel arrangements very good  Keep it up  Thanks for giving the best service

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Jitu Deka
Detailed Review: Really high service and food . The staff were very kind polite and beyond their call of duty   Specially  thankx to Aman and Gautam  Mr kaushal  Location is very nice Very pleasant ambience with nice friendly staff .

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Dr ababban
Detailed Review: Hotel is beautiful . Services is good  Staff friendly Aman and Mukesh mahal . Location is nice and very convenient to every area .  Company meeting  Great hotel great services and beautiful hotel  Lobby garden

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Samdarsh Puri
Detailed Review: Amazing hospitality by Ms. Ashwinder Kaur. The staff members Aman, Raghuveer and Devi were very helpful. Lovely location  with clean rooms. Hassle-free check in and spectacular view from the rooms. Must visit!

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Mr Ibrokhim
Detailed Review: Hotel is good, but hotel team is best. Exactly hotel team morale is good. The best guest relation executy is Shubhi, polite and kind. Respect her service. We would like to stay here next time when we will come in New Delhi. 👍👍👏👏

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Aman
Detailed Review: Every time I m staying in the roya plaza delhi . I just want to say great property . The staff are so warm and well trained Gautam and Aman  Excellent service  Hotel lobby with golden entrance. Roman garden beautiful music etc

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Chetan Contractor
Detailed Review: A very courteous staff member Aman has always remained on her toes for extending best services. Her familiar approach has made me a regular client since last more than 8 years. I wish you have such training to all other staff

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Prasanth C
Review: Decent experience living at the Hotel
Detailed Review: We had decent experience at the hotel and we stayed for 4 nights. The hotel price per day is expensive, but the quality is also good, especially beds and cleaning, night-time live music at the dinner place, close to Delhi center. Also, I want to emphasize the house keeper, i.e., Vikesh Kumar. He did a great job in checking with us on the room cleaning, asking for any things required, and several other things. I think such hospitality can greatly enhance a traveler's experience.

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: RTI 11
Detailed Review: Have you ever heard of a hotel which denies you water despite repeated requests? Have you ever been in a hotel where housekeeping tells you its not my work if you ask them to fetch a cup for tea and tea kit or a dental kit and then after csll to guest  services takes 40 minutes to come back with the same !! Have you ever been bossed over and talked to by a bell boy as if u were a fool staying in a property for first time who knew nothing about lifts and room cards? Do you like stale fruits, half cooked meals,leaky juice pots and lousy lazy service at breakfast?  Well if you are looking for all these experiences and more insults then Royal Plaza Ashoka Road is the place for you here nothng is royal except may be the marble..Coz I guess looking at so much marble and stone statues…

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: 600bharatl
Detailed Review: Went for a corporate seminar, stayed from morning to evening. A very bad welcome, very bad reception response, very bad room service staff. After taking 1 hour before check in time to clean the room, toilet dustbin was filled with toilet paper, towels were bad, no toilitiries were in the room. Room which is for 8000/day is bad than a oyo rooom of 800/day  At breakfast, poor varities with cold and tasteless food

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Pallav jain
Review: Very Bad service by Mr Sandhu
Detailed Review: we have booked a event on 05 May 22 but the service which was promised by Mr Sandhu and service given was completely different. He is not a man of his word. He doesn't know how to speak with guest. He is speaking in a way that he is doing some favour on us by giving us banquet. We are paying you the money you are giving any service for free . If anybody wants to book a event pls do not deal with Mr Sandhu. He is not a good person to deal with.

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Vaibhav
Detailed Review: Just wonderfull stay  .overall experience amazing  Beautiful lobby  Hotel staff is very polite and helpful  Front desk Anan and Shubhi   Food is good  We have always loved to visit this hotel and would continue to aswell

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Mahendra
Review: Family hotel amazing experience great value for price
Detailed Review: Beautiful property  amazing  restaurant  with great out side garden.top notch  food and drinks  Mr Dev  Helpful  staff friendly front desk Aman and Rajesh Gautama they are actually very helpful.  Provide us connections rooms.  Beautiful hotel  I will come and stay again

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Suneet😊
Detailed Review: Hotel the royal plaza I m very glad choos this hotel very pleasant stay nice facilities nice staff specially Aman is beautiful  helpful and professional. Food is nice . Bell person Devi singh so much helpful during checkout.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Rajvinder Singh
Review: Great location, fantastic service resulted in fab stay.
Detailed Review: This hotel has a great location in South Delhi with proximity to best malls. DLF mall is directly reachable from 2nd floor of the hotel which makes more convenient keeping in view the summer season. Service is exceptional from the front desk which makes the stay more enjoyable.  Regards Rajvinder

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: sam
Detailed Review: Rachit was very professional and hospitable. He made us very comfortable , he was friendly and good with kids. He made us some delicious cocktails and served us with full professionalism. I look forward to meeting him again and come back here to have a good time in this friendly environment. All thanks to rachit for entertaining us . Long way to go boy! Good luck!

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Vishesh A
Detailed Review: 5, the staff was very helpful specially Mr. GAURAV from front office department while arranging check in and transportation, rooms were very clean design for business hotel, connected to mall and other recreational area, Indian breakfast was very good with wide selection of live station food

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: yohanchendriah
Review: Amazing Stay with the best personnels
Detailed Review: Overall amazing stay at the hotel very well situated with shopping malls next door. My many thankful note will be for the awesome staffs from the restaurant team, FO team and the gentleman driver. Special thanks to Mr. Gaurav who been going extra miles in ensuring I have a nice stay and arranging all my transfers for my business meeting. Hilton should be proud of its personnel. Well done. I will be back soon.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: biju2022
Detailed Review: This is a great hotel stay in Delhi,  Great staff, food and location. I really appreciate Varun Talwar for making my stay comfort and great.  I will highly recommend this hotel for a comfortable stay and good food. Hotel has easy access to Saket mall and makes easy shopping as well.  I will prefer this hotel next time as well

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: RuatiRenthlei
Review: Stay was very comfortable  staff was very helpful  specially gaurav tamanna and Vaibhav they helped me a lot during my stay woul
Detailed Review: Stay was very comfortable  staff was very helpful  specially gaurav tamanna indal and Vaibhav they helped me a lot during my stay would love to come back and the food was also good specially gaurav helped me alot big thanks to him and the suite room was very nice

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: johntraveling
Detailed Review: Convenient location if you need to get to many different parts of Delhi. Clean, comfortable, great value for the price. Most of all, exceptional people: friendly, smiling, helpful, fine English.  Everyone goes out of their way to make your stay very positive. I've stayed here a few times over the last 7 years. Always the same experience. Over the last couple of months I have stayed here many days. Shyamveer has been responsible for my room. He has provided the best service I've experienced anywhere, asking each day what time I would like my room cleaned, same with my laundry. Getting me water or towels or whatever when I request it no matter what else he is in the middle of doing. He is a shining example of what makes this hotel exceptional.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Dipti mathur
Detailed Review: It was very good experience with Us...awesome ambiance of bar..the bar manager Rabindra and Submit team member  was sooo polite and kind...always try to help us for suggesting good cocktail.food was really awesome .

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Tasneem
Review: Service at the restaurant and bar
Detailed Review: Mr. Rachit is very helpful and gave us an amazing service at the bar and restaurant. He is excellent at his job. He knows how to make the guests feel comfortable.He made our experience the best! We would definitely come back to this hotel for this kind of service.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Nosirvek
Detailed Review: Gaurav, vaibhav, kunal, diksha, Karan,Tamanna all the front office staff was amazing I stayed here for atheist 7 days and I would love to come back again with my friends and the are so polite the make my stay very comfortable.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Mallika Narang
Detailed Review: Special thanks to Shubham for displaying warmth and hospitality! The food and service was amazing . Kudos to him and the Hilton team 👍🏼  I have been coming here almost everyday for the past 1 week now and it is a pleasure to be here.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Baseer N
Detailed Review: Went for the dinner buffet.Food was good....especially the continental fare. Dessert options could be improved though. Service was very good.We were taken care of nicely .A special shout out for Shubham who was very polite, efficient and considerate towards our requirements. Being a Hilton Honors member, it was a pleasant experience

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Bipy
Review: Wonderful stay at Hilton Inn Saket
Detailed Review: This was my 2nd stay at Hilton Inn Saket  this month.Had a wonderful experience the service was really good n the staffs were so very friendly and helpful. Varun dealt with us especially and he gave an extra effort with whatever we wanted.The best part was also it is directly connected to the mall .They have a wonderful spread for breakfast as well. Would like to stay here only and if you all are planning to visit Delhi please make it your home for those few days.               Aparajita                Guwahati

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Sumanto Chakravarty
Review: REVIEW OF HILTON GARDEN AND INDIA GRILL'S SERVICE AND TEAM
Detailed Review: I had booked this place to throw a party at the India Grill at Hilton Garden. A total of 30 guests were there. The entire staff put in their best efforts in order to make this day memorable for my parents. Starting from drinks to desert, everything was personalised by the staff and primarily managed by Mr. Deepak Jogi. A big shout out to the whole team!

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: raman
Detailed Review: It was a special moment .and booked rooms.A great deal by Mr.Rajesh dagar his kind and polite nature everything was well marked and arranged.Food was excellent and thanks to Mr Manish who met at check in and very well greeted ..It was kind and loving spending time at hotel ..wish too join soon.Again thanx to Mr Dagar,Manish and whole lemon tree staff .

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Sinza
Detailed Review: Came for lunch with our fiance. Excellent food, good presentation and amazing service by Vivek Singh. Strongly recommend this this place for amazing food and service. Looking forward to visit again.😊😊

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Johnny bro
Detailed Review: Thanks to citrus and their team but specially i want to mention divyam and  his colleague Laxmi who asking me again and again sir anything else we can assist you . It was quite immersive me for that dining time . Thank you 😊

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Sridhar V
Detailed Review: Hi  I am hear on short visit . This establishment is very good. Hospitality of management is very nice. Food is excellent. Raju and Vivek the stewards are excellent in their professional services , they are very keen observers in service providing

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Arjun Roy
Review: Excellent stay nd full supporting staff
Detailed Review: Dinner buffet was very good. The dinner spread was lavish nd taste was good. Loved all the items in the buffet. Wonderful service by Mr. Vivek Singh and team.  Had a great time the food, The spa, The swimming pool. The hospitality was great nothing to complain about will be returning in a year from now with my husband for our 17 aniversary. 🙂

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Kamal
Detailed Review: Kudos.....Team Lemon Tree......Aerocity Delhi Had a wonderful  N  Comfortable Stay..... Mr. Prince Gupta ....Ttanks  for all the support.  You were very accommodating and mature in handling....  I would  like to name few staff who had taken personal interest in making my stay  memorable....  Rawat,  Mandeep , Bhandari, Gautam , priyanka,  kamaljeet , Neha......  Infact every one was helpful...and ...  The way birthday cake was organized at a short notice , without any sweat....was outstanding...  Thanks ....looking forward for more memorable association....

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Neha
Detailed Review: Like the nice and cosy environment. Staff is very friendly and humble. Nice food. Thanks Raju and Mr Gautam for the good hospitality and attending to the family nicely. We really had a nice dinner time.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Prithvi S
Detailed Review: We took a short stay at Aerocity Lemon Tree . Our Son was home after 2 years. It was a welcome break from the hum drum life at home as we couldn't plan a holiday in the hills.  The Staff, from the guards outside to the check in and the lovely Citrus room (Our breakfast joint) were  impeccable in their service. The warmth and hospitality of Shweta, Mandeep and Sandeep was warm and welcoming. Thanks to the whole staff for a great time

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Vidhi
Detailed Review: Breakfast buffet was really good. The breakfast spread was lavish and taste was good. Loved the sausages and chocolate muffins. Wonderful service done by Mr. Vivek Singh and team. Will definitely visit again!

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Mahesh
Detailed Review: Very friendly staff. Special mention of Raju who is ever smiling and courteous. Food quality is excellent and the buffet is well laid out. Very happy with the service. Looking forward to breakfast tomorrow

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: MariettaMcM
Detailed Review: My husband and myself stayed at this Delhi Hotel last week 3rd May. I cannot more highly praise this Hotel and the staff. They went well beyond the 'care of duty' and were very helpful to us, particularly as I am in a wheelchair. What further impressed us was that they employ 'slightly disabled' people, which is so nice to see. 100% for this great helpfulness to the community. If and when I do pass by Delhi again (and I intend to), we will definitely be staying at the Lemon Tree and I'll be advising all my friends too.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: R kapoor
Detailed Review: It was a good experience. Good ambiance & Service was excellent. Good quality was very good. All the best  I am enjoying the staff service secially Sumit was good and food also very good  Keep it up Thanks

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Deepak Khaitan
Detailed Review: The rooms are well kept, clean and there was enough drinking water in the rooms. The restaurant is well equipped and serves tasty food. The staff is very courteous and helpful at every place. The location is excellent

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: neha
Detailed Review: We celebrated our son's 1 birthday here and could say that Hilton INN really amazed me with their services and hospitality. We are really thankful to Deepak, bar guys and chef who worked really hard in organising the party and making it memorable for us.   The venue, the food and services are just amazing and my every guest praised it as well.   Since we stayed here as well, so could say that the amenities were up to the mark.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Priyankita Dey
Detailed Review: I and my brother hosted our mother's birthday luncheon at the India Grill. Amazing and warm service and hospitality by Raushan, Alina, and Animesh. Thanks Arnav and Mayank for ensuring that I get a great deal and managing our reservation. We will be back soon!

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Raj marwaha
Review: Awesome service by rabindra and rohit yadav
Detailed Review: We came here for our kitty party and we all really enjoyed food was awesome and service is top notch specially  I want to say thank mr Rabindra and rohit yadav thank you for giving great service we will come again

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Manjeet singh
Detailed Review: I visited to here for my company meeting,  the service of the hotel was exceptional.  Specially the restaurant service aur the bar service is extremely top. The best part is behavior of staff. Very cooperative and humble.  Specially the sumit , abhishek at bar will take care well. And the your managers also very soft spoken.  Thank you team

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Ajay singh
Detailed Review: Hilton garden inn saket is one of the best hotel is india  We organize our party( services master groups ) we really enjoy food and service was awesome socially Mr Rabindra sumit abhishak are too help full . Thank you guys for giving great services

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Vivek
Detailed Review: My visit to your hotel was great one and i enjoyed the time I stayed at the hotel it was made wonderful by one of the employee named Varun who was a great support from the time of check in to the the time of check out

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Suraj
Detailed Review: I came here to meet my friend the hospitality shown by the front desk team specially Mr Varun Talwar was very pleasant he has set the bar very high. I would definitely recommend this hotel to my friends and family members

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Raju moonn
Detailed Review: The hotel staff is awesome the welcoming staff at reception Mr Sahil Kunal took. a great care  of me Mr Vaibhav Dilraj helped in good rooms the night staff Karan was very polite love the stay will come agian

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Sajjan
Detailed Review: The hotel was very good the stay was awesome would love to come again because of the welcoming staff at reception Kunal and zeniya they took great care of us and made sure that we spend the quality time there . We really enjoyed the breakfast

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Shak_Travel
Detailed Review: A very busy hotel, but despite that very well managed  happen to stay here for transit but the busy hotel made sure that the experience is top notch. Truly tells about the head of the hotel and management  manik ji from the F&B was kind enough to help us in serving plan meals in the room.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Sol786
Detailed Review: Pros: Close to airport, food was tasty and clean, quick checkout, staff was friendly and they tried to help out  Cons: Check-in process took too long. They gave several forms to fill in and asked many details. The washroom was stinking to high heaven, but they changed the room upon request. The room changing process took more time. So in the end, we had to wait even longer. I felt that check-in staff was overwhelmed with their work and most of these formalities could have been done quickly and electronically

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Akhil Dembla
Review: HIGHLY HIGHLY NON RECOMMENDABLE PROPERTY..!! Search for other options Guys.
Detailed Review: Firstly, My preferences were not followed at all, and they gave me Twin Room and took entire 1 hour to change it moreover THEY PROVIDED ME A BROKEN ‘EXTRA BED’, FROM THAT I GOT HURT.  Secondly, The Staff doesn't follow your preferences they randomly assume things & Specially some staff are so rude as if he is the guest in hotel and we guest are working for them, saying straight away NO to guest for just small things most important they have worst Extra Beds ever...!!!   The Location is good, breakfast too that's it rest I didn't liked anything about property.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: SANJANA YADAV
Detailed Review: Stayed here for a night and I must say it has been a wonderful stay. I was beautifully assisted by Satyajit who was at front desk and he helped me choose a room with a good view, smooth check in procedure. Hope to stay with Holiday Inn again soon! Thank you so much for the experience.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Deepa Kapoor
Detailed Review: Celebrated my friends birthday here and enjoyed cherished every moment here the ambiance was very friendly and everyone here was very amicable and super helpful…………😽😽☺️☺️☺️☺️☺️☺️Would genuinely suggest this place to everyone

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Akash
Detailed Review: Everything is going good. Didn't find anything to suggest. The rooms are comfortable and clean. Staff @desk is good. Will visit soon and will stay with you guys again many places to visit are near by .

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Avadhoot J
Detailed Review: Comfortable stay and good hospitality..  food could have been bit better :) ……………………….The food was scintillating……. TOO yum and I would specially like to thank Anoushka for upgrading my room and looking after all our needs

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Supran Biswas
Detailed Review: I came from Bangladesh….. your staffs  environment and the interior design is phenomenal and lastly the breakfast was delicious so was the hospitality vvv nice ……….. I also liked the welcome and how the services were always in time

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Benjamin A
Detailed Review: Rely nice hotel withe excellent staf. They are always helpfully if you need anything ❤️.   And the restaurant has all the fod you can think of. Alosow don't forget to wisit the poll wen it's hot.  Thanks for a lovely stya

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: aseem
Detailed Review: Wow! What a well maintained Hotel. Great cleanliness, great hospitality. Rooms were super clean, great work by housekeeping team.  Breakfast service was fast and the manager was very kind to make sure we are looked at.  Thank you! Will be the choice of Hotel in aerocity!

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Sandeep Singh
Review: Kudos to  Mr.Sumit Iyer & appreciate all his efforts for making us comfortable in Hotel
Detailed Review: This trip to Holiday Inn was very comfortable , food was delicious & hygiene and cleanliness standards were well managed.   I appreciate Mr. Sumit Iyer ( Executive Housekeeper ) for his hospitality and making us comfortable in the Hotel.   Thankyou Mr. Sumit Iyer for hosting us so well & making us feel special . Kudos to you and  backend Team 😊 Holiday Inn ( airocity)  is the best place to feel Home away from home 🏘️

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Rajeev
Review: Services at hotel holiday Inn aero city New Delhi
Detailed Review: Disappointed to come across with an unexpectedly bad services. Leaving services the  property looks fine, but not to the standards which one would expect from a hotel of such a repute. Pool closes at 8pm, Amy in room dining order would take more than the time which is expected in a normal case. Food served are not appropriate, which any hues would rely on during the stay. Loads of confusions right from check-in and since I am yet to check out can be able to give my feedback once i will check out. Overall, not a very good experience and would never like to come here again.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Chandan
Detailed Review: It was my pleasure  that I am writing for this hotel . I got such an great experiences here . Food was good. Staff was well behaved... all the things were well presented.. specially rooms were well managed ... sanjay from housekeeping  also was very good... all the housekeeping  staff was very caring ...

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Vaishali
Detailed Review: The check in was super smooth and the pickup was done extremely well. Mr Animesh was super kind and he’s a gem of a person. Food was delicious and the pool was super clean. Anoushka was pretty cheerful and ecstatic and welcomed me really well. Overall stay was amazing and I’d rather rate 100/10.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Sharma
Detailed Review: Hotel interior was beautiful..Owsome stay...... delicious food...... very caring staff..... front office was very good in behavior..... rooms were good looking.... bed was very comfortable.... all the covid protocols were followed.....rooms were very well made by housekeeping... a person from housekeeping  named Sanjay Verma was very caring and good in behavior... thank u team holidayinn.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Paresh gupta
Detailed Review: The service was very well and I really enjoyed the stay. Will always look forward to stay here again. The staff was well behaved. Specially rajesh and sanjay from housekeeping made the stay very comfortable.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Sachin
Detailed Review: Room are very good food as well including all the staff wanna looking forward to visit the palce again swingpool as and Mr.sanjay from housekeeping is very polite n helpful to everyone and he is one of the best person I have interected.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Aditya
Detailed Review: It was such an excellent stay here. All the staff was very polite and very humble … housekeeping staff was very caring and loving… they maintain my room .. they were following all the protocols of covid… specially thanks to Sanjay from housekeeping… we will come soon …

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: HitenKB
Detailed Review: The attitude of the staff special thanks to Praveen, Anoushka, Vicky and all the security staff. The cleanliness is good, just had one problem which was resolved beautifully by Mr Animesh. The check in was pretty quick and the quality of the food was spectacular

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Kay Sylvester
Detailed Review: The service was excellent from the time we arrived. The minute we reached here the service was excellent, and the people were very helpful from the start. The rooms were very clean. Food was very good. Check in was express and quick, the windows were open nicely, very friendly environment.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Naren H
Detailed Review: Easy access, gret stay ,frndly staff,super efficient kitchen and service. Closer to the airport, The room service  was amazingly fast compared , breakfast was also good, staff was extremely efficient ..Special thanks to Anoushka

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Shrinivaasa
Detailed Review: It was my first visit here was awesome... hotel staff was very cooperative. Food was delicious... front office staff was good. Specially  thanks to housekeeping staff who made my stay nice. Specially  Dev ,Sanjay, Milan were good at all. Keep it up guys ... see you soon ..

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Doctraveller
Review: No early check in and rude staff
Detailed Review: After 24 hr long flight, Despite me emailing them Requesting early check in, they couldnt arrange a room, and made me wait for 6 hrs in the lobby.  I understand early check in is subject to availability. But on top of that the staff is rude, and very hesitant to help with anything.

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Muktesh B
Review: Worst experience in The Hotel Royal plaza , New Delhi
Detailed Review: We booked room for 3 days and we faced so many problems here first of room door access key are not working properly, we asked empty plate for the snacks so they said cutlery will be charged extra 600/- PP Even room cupboard are dirty with lots of dusty, even here check in time is 2pm after check in time you have wait 1 hour, here staff are very lazy, if you order anything they will take one hour one more thing is we stayed here 2 person so between 2 person they give only one water bottle complimentary

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Atiksha Arora
Detailed Review: Had a amazing time, Loved the hospitality by Ms ashwinder kaur and Ms aman at front desk,, My happy place to stay! Bar sitting has a different vibe to chill with,overall food was tempting, Thankful for such amazing stay over this charming place

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Baljinder C
Detailed Review: I wish there would be no star thing. I won’t recommend this hotel because of staff. We checked in today from Canada with my extended family from Jalandhar as I did have my id and other stuff with me and my wife was with me but so called managing person Ishwinder Kaur and other attendant didn’t allow me to check in and I had to check in other hotel with same ID. I mean same city different policies, Staff pathetic and my family had to stay there  because they refused to refund 12000. Don’t go this hotel. Too expensive but doesn't justify the price Smelly rooms not good hygienically. Rude staff

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Vivek K
Review: Worst behaviour /not worth for money/costly buffet  dinner with minimum food
Detailed Review: Staff are irresponsible,rude behaviour  .food not worth it.very long check in time it takes almost 1 hour to check in .Very poor response.rooms are not up to the mark.Don’t book this hotel.Bad hotel at good location.

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Shiva Likhdhari
Detailed Review: Fridge Not working. Cold water not available. Curtains full of dust. Drawers full of trash. This is the royalty of not so royal_plaza. Worst hotel. You will find paharganj hotels much better than this. Seriously wont recommend this to any one.

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Praveen
Review: Kritika, Ipsita and Saurabh well done kids
Detailed Review: These kids are exceptionally helpful and very good at job. Hotel is beautiful and calm. Guest relations girl kritika is very polite and always there to help. Very very active and positive. Will come back soon .....

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Rajkumar
Detailed Review: Service during check in very long time. Room key is not functioning and no person was available for escort. While checking in the receptionist informed that GST number will be added during check out. During checkout, it is informed that the invoice will be given by Yatra booking agent. Telephone was not functioning.

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Rohit
Detailed Review: Worst hospitality ever. Broken furniture, rude staff and irresponsible management. You will be asked to pay for glasses in your room, for ice, for water, for literally everything. Room service takes upto 12 hours to fulfil your order, only if you’re lucky. I still haven’t received the ice I ordered 2 days ago (for INR 325). This is basically Central Delhi’s prostitution hotel based on the crowd and management behaviour. Please do not visit, pay 2k extra and go to Shangrila or something instead which is right across the road.  DO NOT BE TEMPTED BY THE PRICE

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: R kapoor
Detailed Review: It was a good experience. Good ambiance & Service was excellent. Good quality was very good. All the best  I am enjoying the staff service secially Sumit was good and food also very good  Keep it up Thanks

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Deepak Khaitan
Detailed Review: The rooms are well kept, clean and there was enough drinking water in the rooms. The restaurant is well equipped and serves tasty food. The staff is very courteous and helpful at every place. The location is excellent

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: neha
Detailed Review: We celebrated our son's 1 birthday here and could say that Hilton INN really amazed me with their services and hospitality. We are really thankful to Deepak, bar guys and chef who worked really hard in organising the party and making it memorable for us.   The venue, the food and services are just amazing and my every guest praised it as well.   Since we stayed here as well, so could say that the amenities were up to the mark.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Priyankita Dey
Detailed Review: I and my brother hosted our mother's birthday luncheon at the India Grill. Amazing and warm service and hospitality by Raushan, Alina, and Animesh. Thanks Arnav and Mayank for ensuring that I get a great deal and managing our reservation. We will be back soon!

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Raj marwaha
Review: Awesome service by rabindra and rohit yadav
Detailed Review: We came here for our kitty party and we all really enjoyed food was awesome and service is top notch specially  I want to say thank mr Rabindra and rohit yadav thank you for giving great service we will come again

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Manjeet singh
Detailed Review: I visited to here for my company meeting,  the service of the hotel was exceptional.  Specially the restaurant service aur the bar service is extremely top. The best part is behavior of staff. Very cooperative and humble.  Specially the sumit , abhishek at bar will take care well. And the your managers also very soft spoken.  Thank you team

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Ajay singh
Detailed Review: Hilton garden inn saket is one of the best hotel is india  We organize our party( services master groups ) we really enjoy food and service was awesome socially Mr Rabindra sumit abhishak are too help full . Thank you guys for giving great services

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Vivek
Detailed Review: My visit to your hotel was great one and i enjoyed the time I stayed at the hotel it was made wonderful by one of the employee named Varun who was a great support from the time of check in to the the time of check out

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Suraj
Detailed Review: I came here to meet my friend the hospitality shown by the front desk team specially Mr Varun Talwar was very pleasant he has set the bar very high. I would definitely recommend this hotel to my friends and family members

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Raju moonn
Detailed Review: The hotel staff is awesome the welcoming staff at reception Mr Sahil Kunal took. a great care  of me Mr Vaibhav Dilraj helped in good rooms the night staff Karan was very polite love the stay will come agian

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Sajjan
Detailed Review: The hotel was very good the stay was awesome would love to come again because of the welcoming staff at reception Kunal and zeniya they took great care of us and made sure that we spend the quality time there . We really enjoyed the breakfast

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Jasleen
Detailed Review: I came to Delhi for the first time and when I went to Lemon Tree, I liked the people there, they also liked it and everything is good, there I will advise people to go to Lemon Tree, hotel I would especially like to say thank you to Faran who is from housekeeping.If we come to Delhi again, then lemon tree  hotel will definitely come, thank you Farhan and for giving a good experience.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Arpan
Detailed Review: Lemon tree Premium Aerocity Delhi is one of the most favorable properties to stay with if u visit Delhi on an official tour for few days. The Hotel has a fantastic ambience, food, hospitality and all types of budget to premium rooms. I stayed in the property from 26-28 Apr.   Generally, you need to pre book your room as it is one of the most favorable destination for the people visiting Delhi. Although, they entertain and accommodate you even if u check-in without prior information   The property has got very helpful, well mannered and cooperative staff and will help you in all possible ways to make your stay comfortable and memorable. I pre booked my room through Mr. Prince Gupta, AGM Sales ,who ensured and informed front desk about my arrival well in advance. It was a smooth…

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Hridyesh Sharma
Review: Great support of Mr Amit singh  Lemontree Aerocity Delhi
Detailed Review: A nice atmosphere quick service and only delay is in room service otherwise all are good A best staff and ambiance   But problem is in Lemontree smiles as they have created 5-6 profiles of mine and after continually request no one bothered to Marge

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Joydeep Datta Gupta
Detailed Review: I mistakenly booked redfox hotel, thinking its Lemon tree ,as they share same building , oh God that was a great mistake by me , i regretted my 3 N in redfox. To compensate i spent my last night in Lemon tree. It was a great experience .when we arrived at 8 30 pm from Agra , were stunned by seeing a big crowded reception , either chking in or out. But our chk in took only 5  minitues with help from the GM himself ,Mr Sukhbeen Singh. it was pleasant . rooms are ok. Washrooms snaller. The dining is the crown in the jewel, specially the staffs, they were superb in their attitude and professionalism. one thing never book Redfox thinking its the lemon tree hotel. Gulf of differences between this two hotels of same group.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: AJ
Review: Best hospitality and personal care - 5 Star to Mr Prasun Kumar for customer focus!!!
Detailed Review: One of my best stays in recent times. Co-operative staff, quick hassle free check in, clean rooms. Welcome fruits, cookies and sweets offered in room during check in were awesome, speaks volumes of customer care - special mention of Mr Prasun Kumar, Head Housekeeping!!! Employees like him make a difference to Hotel industry!!! Keep up the good job!!!

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Hanish saud
Detailed Review: Lemon Tree hotel is very good  We are staying 2 days there staff was very cooperative and the facilities given by staff and food is very good and hotel Manager Rohit Bhandari is very kind and very professional ..

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Sasha
Detailed Review: The hotel is in a very good location.The rooms are simple but clean. The reason for 5 stars is the staff. We had interactions with 2 of the guys Chef Pushpkaran Bedi & Ishwar ,each of them were delightful.Also I was very glad to see a punjabi boy making dosa that too super delicious .The breakfast ladies were all also very pleasant and accommodating, even on a busy morning.Lunch had such a good choice of dishes.Indian food taste is feather in the cap .Really delectable. A big thank you to all the staff at Hotel.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Manish Kumar
Detailed Review: I checked in this hotel in late night along with my fiancée.the late night checkin experience was excellent courtesy the duty manager Mr Rajesh Dagar and front office Ajay Shoukeen.On calling Room dining in night I found Mr Kapil the manager who arranged the late night food. The Breakfast spread was good and was well served.the pool maintenance was also excellent. Thank you so much for your assistance and wonderful service

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Rohan
Detailed Review: Very good condition of hotel rooms with excellent service provided by Mr Ishwar, Atesh, Kapiljeet, Chef Brijesh & Chef Bedi. Great experience at the hotel and very friendly staff members. Food was really good and overall a great experience.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Deepika T
Detailed Review: This is the first time I stayed at Lemon Tree Delhi Airport after Covid as the International flights restarted. I was recommended to this hotel by my cousin and I must say that I wasn't disappointed. We were welcomed by the hotel staff with a smile and greetings from every staff member from check in to throughout our stay.  The hotel served a great variety of food - a great mixture from Indian, international, chinese and some kebabs. Chef Brijesh who came for feedback informed me that they have upgraded the food items in the menu. Thank you to Chef Brijesh for serving me Moong Dal halwa which I had after many years. It was absolutely delicious. My husband, who is not very fond of Indian food, also enjoyed it a lot. Chef's recommendation on Indian food is top notch. We were taken…

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Ashu K
Detailed Review: Beautiful hotel-excellent food, professional staff, home away from home.  Staff: very professional and hardworking. Special thanks to my bell boy and  restaurant staff.   Food:- DELICIOUS. Breakfast was perfect. Food was very good, thank you chef brijesh for delicious dosa and teatea and always willing to help.  Atish and ishwar at the restaurant helped alot.  We were served so caringly by brijesh and his team,  Chef Khim went from tip to toes to serve us wonderful tea.  Last but not the least Mr Mani from front desk was very humble and gentle.  Cia soon team lemon tree.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: VT1981
Review: Appreciation to Staff - Mr. Himanshu Sharma (Housekeeper)
Detailed Review: Dear Team,  I would like to appreciate not only the Services of Mr. Himanshu Sharma (Housekeeper) but also appreciate his excellent service quality, enquiring about the requirement, comfortable stay and one more important thing of him is that he acknowledges the situation and tries his best to help and show empathy towards the same. One such instance was that while he was cleaning my room, i was having my Daily Medicine and watching it he immediately approach and asked me if everything is fine and requested me to have a seat and take rest.  I sincerely appreciate his services and request you to kindly convey my respects and appreciations to him.  Thanks.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Sindbad
Review: Bite sized rooms, grand breakfast spread
Detailed Review: Surprised to note that RedFox Hotel which is a part of the Lemon Tree property, is not listed here on Trip Advisor.   Conveniently located close to the airport. Was here for a very short, overnight stay. The rooms are decent, near and clean. Though being a transit hotel, the size of the rooms and the bathroom is just about enough. No indulgence.  The breakfast spread however surprised me. Sufficient items on menu, live counter for dosa and eggs, fresh cut fruits, parathas, cholle bhature, poha and more.  The tea that they served was just below expectation, else everything on the menu tasted fine!

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Kapil Agrawal
Detailed Review: I stayed in Lemon tree Hotel, Aerocity from March 28, 2022 to April 11, 2022. Hotel services was very good, and staff members are very polite and hard working. Breakfast of the hotel is very good. I was amazed to see such an active housekeeping staff like Aakash, Deepak and Vivek at housekeeping as all the three persons made sure and ensured that all of my needs were met on time and attended professionally.  These peoples are very hardworking and kind hearted. Thank you to these gentlemen making sure to attend me when I requested for some extra amenities and toiletries for some of our particular need. They extended me courteous gesture and visited me and I liked to see such a courteous staff. Also, Laundry services is very good and cost effective, Mr. Suleman who collect my…

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Shanta Baliarsingh
Detailed Review: Very nearer to the airport....10 mnts away.room was cozy n clean.Had a good sleep.Complimentary breakfast was awesome.Didnt get time to taste other food as checked in around 11.30 pm and left next day 8.30 am  for the next flight.Even staying at the hotel would not be boring for a day or two.sharing the pictures,managed to click within short span.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: rashmicch
Detailed Review: the location,the staff namely Varun was very kind and helpful.they have a good variety in the morning breakfast buffet.we were a trio of friends and found it safe and secure.it has an easy access to the mall so thats an added advantage.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Ranjeeni Singh
Detailed Review: We stayed in this property for a number of days in February / March 2022. we found the property to be well maintained. Breakfast service could be improved but overall very good stay with a lot if restaurants and shopping nearby.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Cruiser48987233852
Detailed Review: the staff was very good and the food in restaurant was good.Mgr Deepak Jogi was very helpful in helping with food and also catching an earlier flight,breakfast was arranged..little far away from Delhi but a quite place

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Isha Bhansali
Detailed Review: Very good service. Great and friendly staff. Very good service. Great and friendly staff. Very good service. Prompt service. Very active. Very helpful. And very coordinating. Very polite. And very accommodating.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Lasse_Andreassen
Detailed Review: One of the worst ever! This is a place for people who don’t care run by people who don’t care. Extremely bad hotel with outdated rooms and a staff they can not be associated with.
