Will never go back to this property. I can’t think of a single thing working from the check in to the lack of cleaning to the very sad breakfast to the non-working toilet. This is a one star property.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Rojma G
Review: Thank you Mr. Varun and also to the entire Hilton family!! : )
Detailed Review: Our stay in Hilton was wonderful and also memorable with wide range of foods for the breakfast. All thanks you Mr. Varun from front desk who have been so helpful during our stay and must say that he is such a welcoming person .................

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Diana S
Detailed Review: Parul has been such a help for me. I have always stayed and loved leela hotel but only because of parul i have been staying in hotel hilton.   She takes care of everything.my stays have been very pleasant there.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Diwakar Bhatt
Detailed Review: After the pandemic related restrictions our first stay here. Property though a little aged , is well maintained and reasonably clean and ensures a comfortable stay. Service is warm and excellent. Access to DLF mall below, is easy and conveniently connected internally, if interested. Breakfast spread is large and sumptuous.  Worth a stay.!

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Phillipe I. Walker
Detailed Review: The room was decent but clearly aging. The products offered in the bath were exquisite and really good. It is well situated next to the mall and also many fantastic stores and restuarants like Haldirams. The hotel needs to monitor the places where guests can smoke as the hotel itself had a smell of smoke all over the halls.  The top selling point for this hotel was the kind and warm staff who were always cheerful and helpful. From the doorman to the receptionists, everyone was doing their best. They have an old product, but are doing amazing at selling the hotel. Kudos to them. And I hope the hotel can make a little investment in revamping some of the rooms.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Cathy
Detailed Review: This is our second time staying here. Hotel is clean and well maintained. Hospitality is 5/5 and food is great too. Kunal from front desk is very helpful and kind. Will definitely book again next time 🤗 Overall, had a great time.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: KunalT
Detailed Review: Perfect ambience with great atmosphere and good hospitality, the food was up to the mark as expected with clean washroom and there was a good fragrance in the room, the view of the city is at par if you want to see the Delhi it is a good option.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Shamina K
Detailed Review: We had s very good stay and room was very comfortable.  Location is brilliant as attached to the malls. Gaurav the reception manager was brilliant and organized a wonderful fresh Indian takeaway breakfast at 6am. He is star of the hotel always taking care of your needs

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Sudheer Kumar G
Detailed Review: I stayed here for 10 nights.. the rooms are very clean and spacious.. the front desk staff is very well mannered particularly Mr. Kunal is very welcoming, very polite and courteous..the breakfast buffet is amazing with lots of options.. I strongly recommend this place as it’s very convenient to all the shopping and restaurants..

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: vipin n
Detailed Review: better than best service, amazing service indian gril restaurant, housekeeping, and front desk. Restaurant steward, chef and manager did an amazing job with personalized service and serving as per our choice and taste. Housekeeping was 5 star and front desk wonderful will always stay in this location

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Monica M
Detailed Review: I checked in late at night, the room was not very clean.The duty manager Pranjal Rai not only changed my room but also gave me a break on the tariff. He made my stay comfortable. I was impressed with his customer service skills. Rajesh at the front desk was also very helpful.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Anas
Detailed Review: It was such an excellent service given by housekeeping.... Such an beautiful rooms ... Rooms were very spacious.....rooms were in good condition... View of the room also was very nice.... All the housekeeping staff was very caring... Sanjay Verma from housekeeping vas very good in behaviour....... Specially thanks to housekeeping team for making my trip comfortable....

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Aravind
Detailed Review: The stay was very good and in decent budget for Biz trip. Good breakfast and nice rooms. Good service 👍 I would recommend the stay here.. quick check in and check out.. They take care of cleanliness and Covid protocols..

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: sumit s
Review: Good Food  and Very good people
Detailed Review: Travelling with a baby could be very difficult but the staff from Viva restaurant was super helpful in understanding the custom needs for our 20 month baby. Praveen from Viva restaurant was very helpful in attending to the needs and helping with the request with his experience  to go out of his waya to make our stay super relaxed. Stay was very comfortable and breakfast is the charm of the entire stay.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: wandererlust
Detailed Review: Checked in at 10 pm to check out the next day at 9, so hardly any time at the hotel. Despite that, must say that I liked the overall hospitality - smooth check ins and out, nice comfortable bed and adequately sized rooms. You really don't need anything more while staying the night. If at all, there is something to complain, then I gues it would have to be the pace of the water flow in the washroom - too slow. Will definitely stay again.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Sisterscorner.india
Detailed Review: We have been coming back to holiday inn … been in their suite and superior room ! Everything including price, breakfast is very good!  Just need to speed up the room service … The bufffet bfast is a good spread and the team v supportive! You are not allowed to carry your speakers so keep that in mind !  Clean, huge rooms are always a good reason and mostly we pick the connected rooms and the hotel has taken the special request!

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Sanjeev Thavakkal
Detailed Review: Very good hospitality .food.service everything superb.anoushka did well. I always come to Holiday inn be it Kerala Delhi can't think of any other place to stay because I love this place so so much .......

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Vikas K
Detailed Review: Stayed for five nights. Staff is great and willing to do anything but hotel requires some serious changes - squeaky laminated floor, hated spray like flow of water out of taps in the name of saving water  (which get further splashed once you use, makes further mess), rooms smells like have mold and last but not least carpet throughout hotel is old. Time to change hotel on my next trip

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Ashu
Detailed Review: Stay was very comfortable rooms are very good. Front office staff was very courteous. Great experience mansi was very helpful. Coffee shop breakfast buffet was very good. Thanks a lot. We would like to come again.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Vikram
Detailed Review: Last month I visit this place with my family All staff is very cooperative. Hotel room was very clean hygiene well maintained . There food quality was also great I request to all  please visit at least once.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Satish N
Review: Wanna treat yourself with some leftovers….come here
Detailed Review: When you stay here get yourself treated in the minibar with leftovers from previous stays……horrific to find leftovers in the mini refrigerator which the housekeeping staff didn’t even bother to clear. The hotel is complete run down with walls coming off and sparingly lit corridors. Breakfast is a sham. Pls don’t go for it. Staff is good though. Cheerful and always with a smile.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Mohit Singh
Detailed Review: A great experience and great service given by Mr. Manish He made our day with great food suggestions and service. Whenever we visit we alway like to take service from him thank you buddy. Restaurant had a great ambience. If I will talk about food then chicken tikka and biryani is awesome.

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Hotels reporting
Detailed Review: Hi,  Before start explaining  my experience in this hotel i would like t ask a question.   WHY PEOPLE CHOSE TO STAY IN GOOD HOTEL ESPECIALLY HOTELS WITH ABOVE FOUR STAR RATING?  People can give their answers whenever they want to. My answer to this question is-  Hygiene-  these days self care and protection of body is very very important because pandemic situation is not fully sought yet. And from my point of view if hygiene and cleanliness is there in the hotels then there should not be any other problem. And of course sanitisation which is already compulsory but hotels are not following the pandemic protocols. No masks and no sanitisation.  I would like to appreciate Mr. Dev Dhaiya head of FNB dept. In this bizarre hotel I only found this person who solved my issues in the…

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: narendra s
Detailed Review: Hello everyone please don't even think about booking this hotel ..... bada pachtaoge, service v. Poor each and every guest was found shouting at the reception , room service : late and poor , front desk : not willing to co operate , room : untidy,  peices of food found on various places , if you want some terrible experience and if you want to punish your known person then please recommend him this hotel.

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Varun J
Detailed Review: The size of the room is even smaller than oyo rooms . It takes 1-2 hours to get a room key even after booking in advance . Pathetic room . U will find much better and way cheaper rooms on paharganj . It's hotel not much different from any sidey hotel in Paharganj

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Shashwat Somvanshi
Review: Worst Place to Stay in Delhi
Detailed Review: My biggest mistake that I booked this hotel, it took 3 hours for them to give room and after that all the services took way too long to even come. All the guests were very disgusted. They took 3 hours and even then didn’t sent water and a guest even just left angrily. Haha

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Kumar S
Detailed Review: Hotel is out of luxury and cleanings. Staff is busy with their phones. How on earth personals phones are allowed on duty. Staff is using lobby as their room. Dancing gigling . So casual . Feels like a dhaba where Staff is making rucus in themselves.  So pathetic.  They do give plastic smile.  I still miss the old Staff here . Restaurant is dead now as well as housekeeping and bar area is lost completely.  😒.  I loved this place but it has lost the charm . It's dead .   SPEACIAL INSTRUCTIONS FOR OWNER ---  Management ----------WAKE UP GUYS.

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Mr. alaa
Detailed Review: Hotel is very nice  and special service talking care keep wonderful operations concern good luck to all of you . front  staff Special thanks Ashwinder Kaur  Amazing Aman and Purnima  best of luck team royal plaza .

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: DRSRG
Detailed Review: I had to visit this place as part of a business conference. But to my assessment this is one of the worst kept so called star hotel in central Delhi.  Statues have been placed in cases which are loaded with dust, all pictures hung and even basic furniture is full of dust.  On being taken for food in their restaurant even the table was absolutely dirty with food quality being whatever.  To my shear luck that I was not staying at this property else I would have gone literally mad by imaging that even a basic lodge should be more clean than what this place is.  I am being honest this place is just a disaster and I strongly recommend to the management to look into all this and not spoil a hotel at an great location.

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Pankaj Bohra
Detailed Review: I stay with my family in Royal plaza.my stay was very good and memorable. Ms Purnima and Aman help me alot just like a family , food was so good in rrb, hk Vikesh is make my room the very helpful.thank you

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: rashmicch
Detailed Review: the location,the staff namely Varun was very kind and helpful.they have a good variety in the morning breakfast buffet.we were a trio of friends and found it safe and secure.it has an easy access to the mall so thats an added advantage.

Housekeeping was 5 star and front desk wonderful will always stay in this location

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Sahil Kumar
Detailed Review: The hotel is amazing and i enjoyed every moment of my stay at the lemontree hotel. The staff was very friendly and cooperative. I’ll suggest a visit over there to my friends and family members. I would specially thanks to Priyanka, Shweta and Vivek whose services were so great to me.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Ramya
Detailed Review: Went to the restaurant in lemon tree with my family! The food was great! But above all were the people! My husband has some food allergies and we were travelling with a 1 year old baby. Ishwar was especially helpful. He offered various alternatives keeping in mind my Husbands allergies and even helped us out with food for my daughter. Would definitely visit again! Kudos to the team! They are doing a great job with their guests!

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Bhupender3006
Detailed Review: Overlal good experience and the staff were polite and courteous, there services were excellent. Stay is good. Rooms are maintained. Moring wake up call and the complimentary airport drop was perfect for the morning hustle.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: KM
Detailed Review: I visited last month and to say the least, everything was just perfect!  The location of the hotel is in Aerocity which is very near to the airport so for frequent travellers business or leisure it is one of the best options. Highly recommended!

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Darpan R
Detailed Review: I am very happy with the food and In room service ..Mr. Sartaj from F&B and Manager Mr. Kapiljeet took care of my food request late night at odd timings they went extra mile, Avdesh from housekeeping did a good job keeping then room in-line.  Thank you so much for a nice experience.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Asif shabir
Detailed Review: Good ambience We stayed here only for 1 night to catch next flight to Varanasi. Mr Amit is very cooperative and polite. Sleep quality was excellent. Outstanding is the breakfast. Nice variety. Surely I will visit the hotel next time I am in Delhi.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Aditya M
Detailed Review: This was our 2nd staycation at Lemon Tree. We went there for a weekend cum Anniversary Getaway.  it was an excellent stay. The hospitality standards are truly world class. The rooms are spacious, super comfortable and very well furnished.  Apart from being an excellent Airport transit hotel (located within IGI Airport campus) , it is also a great destination for a peaceful weekend getaway from the hustle bustle of our daily routines.  Cherry on the cake was that they have opened the Swimming Pool after 2 years of COVID restrictions. Thus, lounging in the swimming pool was a wonderful stress buster.  Special thanks to Front Office Manager Kuldeep for our wonderful stay.  Lemon Tree is definitely one of our favorite aerocity hotels.   Tip - For Budget rooms choose Red Fox. For Mid…

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: geeta_nishkriti
Detailed Review: Have been deployed to Delhi for work....the hotel staff has become like family...they have been extremely great with smiles and service all through these 4 months ....appreciate all their hard work to make my life easier each day and make me miss home less...God Bless

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Kuldeep gupta
Detailed Review: Hotel facility is very nice. I am so impress  hotel staff's work. They are very laborious.The stay was very comforting. The staff made sure that safety and comfort is properly maintained. The staff was very polite and courteous towards their all the guests. Location was very nice 👌. View from the room was perfect. Our stay was very warm and very clean. Thank you Hilton 🙏

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Akshay
Review: Staff is good and assuring but Food is not that great.
Detailed Review: I got a Chicken Puff packed from their Deli Bakery on 23rd Feb, and I had loose motion and smelly acid reflux for 4 hours and then loose motions. My wife could only smell the foul odor from the puffs. Her health was okay. As the food was old, it had a bad odor to it. The Chicken puff was very dry also. As it was a very slow-moving product, the chefs put the puff on the Display without making a new one.   I did inform the hotel staff, and Arnab was swift to make sure the chef connected with me the next day. The chef spoke to me the next day, but there was no conclusion of the conversation as the chef was not even sure that the puff could be old or new. He said it could be a possibility that it is old, but the team also has a robust audit. Two very contradictory statements assured…

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Abhinav m
Detailed Review: Love to come Hilton again and again with my mother I come to Hilton twice or thrice in a month and loved everystay specially thanks to front desk team Gaurav Kunal vaibhav Karan and Varun they helped me a lot in every stay

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Adesh
Detailed Review: The hotels lobby is good Mainly tha staff at reception  Two guys they took great care of us during the day Perfect location good food loved the hotel would be coming back soon Hilton  would be loving to visit it

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Aaron J
Detailed Review: Such fantastic service, from the people at the front desks to those that would bring my daughter and I food, we can’t thank you enough!  Special thanks to Meena, she was so kind to me and my daughter and served my family so well! Thank you Meena and entire staff!

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Soumil
Review: Amazing hospitality, Fantastic food, and superb staff
Detailed Review: Room was super clean and there were all the amenities available. Staff was kind enough to attend to my small requests like taking a few pages of printouts etc. Even though the room wasn't clean when I reached hotel, an expedited cleaning was performed and I was provided with a room within 15 minutes. Morning breakfast is the best I have had in a long time in a hotel. There were so many choices and live counters available for many things ranging from egg delicacies to parathas etc.  I specially thank the staff for providing an amazing experience. Special kudos to Diksha from the front desk who attended to my urgent printout needs.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: ganbat
Review: Best place, near the hospital and mall as well. Best part us the staff who is extremely courteous
Detailed Review: Fantastic experience. Ranging from Front desk to food and beverage, nothing which can go wrong. Mr Karan at front desk is really helpful and courteous, teaches you what true hospitality is all about . Have always loved to stay here and will continue to do so

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Niranjan
Detailed Review: Stayed in Hilton garden in with friends for few days and enjoyed a lot and the best part is that you can go to the mall with second floor and the front desk staff is so kind specally Karan at front desk helps me alot. Would like to come back again

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Kunal Dass
Detailed Review: I stayed in Hilton Garden Inn from 4th to 7th February along with my wife and daughter. I booked for 1 twin bed and 1 double bed and requested Ms Parul Gera in resevations to give me good rooms . And I got really 2 good rooms. Thank you so much Parul! Now location.  It is located in Saket adjacent to DLF Mall, just beside Select City Mall. There is another mall called Metropolitan Mall just beside Select City. So it is situated in Shoppers paradise. Not only that, many top class restaurants are there in all the malls. So you can have a wide choice of restaurants also. Hotel is very clean. Rooms are spacious. The staffs are always eager to help you out. Mineral water bottles are free. Just call the Reception and they will send you Mineral water. This I have never seen before. …

Detailed Review: This is a home away from home. The staff here is thoroughly professional and guests concernscarectajen care of promptly A special mention for Ms parul geral who has been at the forefront in taking care of guests and coordinating and addressing their needs and queries in a very professional way. I have been a frequent traveler to delhi and Hilton garden is my place of choice to stay always. Keep up the good work..!!!

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Sridhar S
Detailed Review: We arrived from the airport at almost 1.00 am. Then Vikas at the front desk tells us he can see booking only for 2 guests for 2 rooms! While booking online (using my membership account) I had requested 2 rooms for 4 people. So, it seems the system has a glitch.   On top of it he wanted me to pay fully for the 1 night upfront. I told him I have used 100’s of hotels and have never been asked by a 5 star hotel to do this. After consulting with the Night Manager, who was nearby, he then quietly gave us the keys to the rooms. I hope the management improves staff training. What was most surprising, was that the night manager, who was nearby did not even offer to intervene. We stayed there 21st to 2nd Feb 2022.   Interestingly, I did get a call about a week later from the hotel asking…

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Shivani
Detailed Review: I really love the ambience, food and staff over here! Specially Mr Gurbir Singh, who dealt with us with so much of calm and positivity!! He did the function, the way I wanted!! Every aspect exceeded our expectations!! Thanks to Mr Gurbeer Singh!! Thankyou!!

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Trek787868
Detailed Review: Booked a stay for a friend they really enjoyed the stay. Thanks for everything you guys have done. Special mention to Supriya and Eugene for arranging cake and decoration. Keep rocking. Will visit again soon.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Ritvik Y
Detailed Review: Tried different dishes on Day 2, Aakash Pandey in the cafe was very helpful and polite.  Pan cakes were wonderful and the onion uttapam was outstanding!   Will surely visit again for future travels.  Milkshake was straight out of Pulp Fiction film..

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Ankith
Detailed Review: Shahil  Good service, doing everything and doing good. Hotel  well maintained, good ambience, the food is good and neatly maintained with everything. And well done all of. Goes well and everything is good and nice service

Name: manishsanganeria13
Detailed Review: No doubt the name is enough for this property but I visited Delhi for few hours for a business meeting but the room which they gave was not good where the view was very bad and also no toiletries were placed properly at my room and have to ask for small little things which was never expected for them so overall not a good experience.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Saniya
Detailed Review: My experience was soo nice In hotel from the team front desk specially sharadha at the reception was soo nice she didnt made us wait in lobby hassle free checkin and checkout , inroom dining food was also soo good and fast in delivering the services as well. Rooms were clean . Would love to visit again !! 😊

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Sanjay Jethmalani
Detailed Review: I stayed a night at this hotel and it was a pleasant experience. The Front desk staff was courteous and completed the check-in efficiently. The room was clean and the bed was comfortable. The room had a safe, mini-refrigerator and some bottles of water. The bathroom was well-lit but the the knobs/switches looked aged and worn-out. They had a frosted glass partition between the bathroom and the bed which ideally should have a blind/curtain instead. From the room, you could see the shadow movements of the person inside the bathroom - this marred the privacy in the bathroom. The buffet breakfast was well laid out and offered multiple choices.  The best thing about this hotel is it's location. It is next-door to the Worldmark mall which has a superb food-court offering a variety of…

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Purnima
Review: Front office team good 👍and thank you jannat
Detailed Review: Hotel is good......... And...... Great location.... Food was very testy ummm..... Room very good....  Special thank you front office team very good attitude..... And positive miss jannat she very attractive... And good GRA thank you jannat

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Hariom sharma
Detailed Review: Omg this is honestly one of the best hotels I have stayed in I loved the stay so much .......  Breakfast was 10-10 rooms 10-10 everything 100........  I am planning to come again super soon with my entire family

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Ashmita
Detailed Review: We had a great experience. Staff was incredibly helpful, and the amenities were great. The room was wonderful, clean and sanitised. Mr. Deepak Panwar was very friendly , which made easy for us to choose the right package as per our requirement and he went over and beyond to help make our stay comfortable. I highly recommend this hotel to everyone.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: sakshi
Detailed Review: An amazing experience at the restaurant  The food is delicious and the hospitality by Mahendra was simple commendable  Not only was he professional but extremely polite in his approach! With out a shadow of doubt cafe Viva happens to be one of my fav spot in NEw delhi

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: sanjeev
Detailed Review: the stay was for business and holidayinn gave ne the best of experience ... well managed team and well managed staff ...the lobby was beautiful and the staff was sweet and polite ... team was extra polite on everything

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Sajith
Detailed Review: The stay is going superb...inam from bernard company staying here from last 14 days and the food and services jere are superb the staff is wonderfull and the team is doing a great job thank you for the wonderful experience

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Sachin
Detailed Review: Excellent stay very clean and neat hotel. Buffett Breakfast was the best. Located very close to the airport. Staff very friendly. Must stay if you happen to be in Delhi or transiting via Delhi. … the staff is polite and the ambience is superb

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Kasturi
Detailed Review: The stay was superb I was there just for one day.i am from.mumbai and Delhi holidayinn was superb and wonderful for me... I felt like home the services were up to the mark and the food was great the team made me felt awesome and superb thank you for the awesome experience

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Shabbir A
Review: There would be nothing much better than this.!!
Detailed Review: From nothing to the best ,a great round of plause  for the F&B team-VIVA  who took the small to big attention  with seemsless  efforts, a big shout to Vishal,Mahendra and and  entire  staff of Restaurant, for amazing buffet. Much respect for Supriya at GR, to take  care of mine as she notice that i was really tired since I landed early morning,she made sure that my first stay would be the best from her side with a smile on my face and I get th room  by the earliest even the hotel was extremely busy.   Thanks  a lot for your efforts, without any doubt  she made my stay from worst to the best.

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Subhash C
Detailed Review: Lobby  ambience very beautiful, food was very tasty, front office staff  professional and helpful special thank you for ms Purnima, Mr Mukesh and gautam  who make our visit perfect 🥰.  Belldesk  staff was very helpful.   Thank you   Dr. Subhas chaudhary  Room number- 618

Name: Mukta
Detailed Review: This was a business trip where we arrived late in night and was attended with professionalism. Staff was very courteous and helpful specially Ms Aman at reception. This hotel is also at the prime location which makes it even more better for sight seeing. Overall it was worth it.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Purabi D
Detailed Review: I was there on a business trip to attend an event. The location is very convenient being near the airport and just adjacent to Aerocity metro station. Rooms are well appointed and well maintained. Staff is polite and helpful. What I especially liked is that they have employed specially abled person as employees.     However their focus does not seem to be on service. I have seen checking in taking quite long. Some of my colleagues complained that room service is very slow. I also had to wait for very long to have a cup of tea during breakfast. Buffet breakfast menu was ok. However after taking lunch on the first day many of us having a common dish developed upset stomach. So, later on I got a bit hesitant to have food there.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Sonakshi J
Review: Fantastic Efforts by Neha. Very Well Organised the Ring Ceremony
Detailed Review: We had organised ring ceremony at Lemon Tree poolside. Very beautifully organised the event by Neha. Keep up the good work you are anyway amazing at work. Look forward for many more joint events. ☺️☺️ Cheers 🥂

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Barun mondal
Detailed Review: All services are very good housekeeping staff are friendly  Goutam is taking care of my room very well.he is always there to fulfill my request .sushmita that smily face also makes my day .I ofter meet them . I wish their success in future

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Krishna
Detailed Review: The experience was excellent. The food is very delicious... thank you for the wonderful experience. I would give 8 out of 10. I would want to visit the place again. The place is clean and the people are very welcoming. I would recommend people to book their stay there

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Ishan Malik
Detailed Review: Had a wonderful stay at this hotel. Great service and terrific food. The staff was extremely warm and went out of their way to make you feel welcome. A special thanks to Mr. Rohit, he was most helpful in making it a pleasant stay. Offered us a great deal that was worth every penny. I would recommend choosing this hotel as your choice of accommodation.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Tushar_Toronto
Detailed Review: This hotel is managed just at an average scale. First the positives - employees at this hotel are it's biggest positive- their behaviour and patience for rowdy customers is huge!! Lots of differently-abled employees which is something I haven't seen at all anywhere in India..warms your heart.  Now the negatives - Rooms are very very small, mattresses are uncomfortable and you don't get good sleep. Also they seemed to make money through weddings and parties and if you get stuck in between those timings, all he'll will break loose. There was telling at the check in counter by a disgruntled customer as rooms weren't ready even by 3 PM and the check in time mentioned was 2. I also had to put my foot down to get a room at 3 PM.  crowd management is something this hotel seems very no…

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Hazu khan
Detailed Review: Complete value for money experience  It was a wonderful experience. From reservations to house keeping to front desk all the staff was very cooperative. A special shout-out to Amit Singh for assisting me not only in reservations but even during the stay. For all it was a value for money stay

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Mohammad wasif
Detailed Review: Had to travel urgently without a fixed travel plan. Remembered the friendly warmth and assurance of best services at lemon tree when I had last stayed. So I requested for a last minute booking request to Mr Amit Singh and not only did he assist me in the booking but provided the comfort that makes travelling so much less stressful. An example and service par excellence.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Analben
Review: Want to give my feedback to mr rajeev Kumar
Detailed Review: He was excellent while assisting me, and went out of his comfort to provide me with what I wanted!! I really like his energy and  dedication to his work and how he provides the customer service Best wishes for his future!

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: mehak b
Detailed Review: Mr. Rajeev and Mr. Himanshu has given great services they are very passionate about their job I would love to visit again this hotel just because of these guys. They guys are very helpful and they were great on their work.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Mathews Mammen
Detailed Review: I stayed at Hotel Lemon Tree Premier Aero City New Delhi on 14 /15 Feb 22. The stay was extremely comfortable. The staff was very cordial and receptive. I like to make special mention of Mr David driver and travel desk staff who recieved me with warmth. The experience at Citrus was homely. The house keeping staff were prompt and efficient. I like to make special mention of Mr Santosh. Thanks

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Pawan Bali
Detailed Review: We had a very good stay for 5 days. Food and service at citrus cafe was very good. Staff was courteous and attentive.  House keeping staff was also very good.  A nice place to stay . However needs to start bar. Special thanks to cheff who on request provided spiceless food. One Madam neha was very courteous and helpful.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Sim
Detailed Review: Stay, service and food was excellent! Thanks Amit for going above and beyond to address any issues or needs. Just the room and beds could be spacious... Pool area was lovely! Would definitely stay again :)

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Nitin kambli
Review: Great experience with  Lemon n Red Fox
Detailed Review: It was great experience,  staff are very helpful,  only you need to ask them for extra things without any extra charges like hair oil pouch, ressor, room foot wear,  bags,  also Mr.Brajash helped me for some documents courier,  mortally I stay in redf fox  hotel but this time red fox hotel is reserved for international traveler for quarantine,  so they have upgraded me in Lemon Tree premium hotel. In Red Fox hotel Mr.Buhran who is also very helpful and co operative.  Thanks to both of them, wonderful experience

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: MAHMUD
Detailed Review: Placed at Aerocity Delhi. Clean and pleasant environment. Staffs are cooperative and supportive specially Yashani & Monu.  They have engaged physically challenged people to run the hotel. Surprisingly, these people are doing well. This is inspiring. Good luck Lemon Tree Hotel. 🌲

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Gynaprakash
Detailed Review: It’s is one of the best cafe I ever visited and staffs Mr.Eshwar,Pankaj,Yeshwani,Rekha and rest all staffs made me feel prince by serving me my food on time with all time good attitude and it feels great to come back to lemon tree always.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Danish R
Detailed Review: I stayed in lemon tree and had a perfect stay, starting from welcome, the staff was very helpful, room was well cleaned, we had multiple request & Mr Amit Singh was very prompt and professional with each request... thank you for a wonderful stay. Kudos to entire team at Lemon tree

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Suresh S
Detailed Review: I have stayed at Lemon Tree Premier for 5 days. What makes your stay comfortable in this hotel is the people they have. I have enjoyed the buffet at Citrus Cafe during my stay. Restaurant Manager Vijay is amazing, courteous and open to feedback.  Yeshwani is a happy face who makes your dining experience wonderful.  Virendra is amazing.  You just have to ask him once for anything.  Also special Thanks to Chef Bedi for listening to my concern on the first day and trying to resolve the issue.    Spectacular work folks... Keep up the good work

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Aj
Detailed Review: I stayed lemon tree aerocity over for 3 days service and food was excellent  Specially service was excellent.The restaurant manager Pankaj and his team was highly motivated and taking care of all guests needs. Staff names to mention Pankaj Kumar Sanjay  Mandeep  Yeshwani Shweta Kudos to lemon tree for hiring such wonderful staff and making our experience delighted.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Rashi Gupta
Detailed Review: Love to come Hilton again and again with my husband I come to Hilton twice or thrice in a year and loved every stay specially thanks to  team they helped me a lot in every stay. Thank you so much hotel Hilton team.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Ankur Sharma
Review: Nice hotel in South Delhi 5/5 Rating Big Room Tasty Food Excellent Staff
Detailed Review: I would like to Appreciate Ms.Parul Gera from hotel Reservation Team,Staff Reception She was  Best hotel in South Hilton Garden In SAKET, Big Spacious Room Size Wonderful Ambiance of Mall View from hotel Window. lovely Dining n Breakfast Area,Amazing Food Recommand to Come Again an Enjoy Relaxing Stay Free Peace of Mind.

Detailed Review: While the location of Hilton Garden Inn, Saket is an absolute delight, what’s better is its staff. From the reception to the housekeeping to the servers and managers everyone is simply cheerful and humble. Today’s is the 3rd day of my 15 day long stay and I can not be more eager to drop in a note for the amazing service. Big shout out to Ashish from housekeeping, who’s really making this place feel like home one smile at a time which is rare so to say.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv

Detailed Review: During covid times they have a high level of cleanliness and went out of their way to make it a pleasant stay. We were in town for a wedding and the staff were very helpful and kind and helped organize food and cars for us when we needed them.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: ericajoyschaefer
Detailed Review: A great place to stay in New Delhi. Located near a mall and a lot of other great tourist venues. Great breakfast with tons of options and amazing restaurants in the mall within walking distance. I recommend.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Rituja Deshmukh
Detailed Review: My stay was very good because of the person on reception .The reception staff was very friendly and mainly I came to know they are staying in hotel only and serving us which is a great thing of hospitality away from there homes . The guy at reception During day on Sunday didn't remember his name was really a very good person . Loved the reception staff very courteous .

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv

Detailed Review: Rohit Rai has provide excellent services to our organization team.  He is very supportive. Infact all services are good , foooding, tea etc .. Very well environment at specially India Grill. Conference IRIS and Oryo room very cleaned nice arrangement.

Detailed Review: This is one best hotels I have visited in delhi. The staff is very pleasant & proffessional. I was specially impressed by the care & concern shown by the staff throughout. Special mention to Assistant manager Mr. Deepak, whom I could not thank personally, but was very polite & helpfull with all the details & information regarding the current covid guidelines & hotel booking.

Name: 131marcia
Detailed Review: Very good option to stay outside Delhi. Aerocity zone has good options for food and restaurants, shopping and a pleasant atmosphere. A very pleasant choice to avoid traffic and crowded streets in this city.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv

They have some of the most friendly staff Ive come across in a while (Including the drivers). Only cons about the stay was related to the bathroom. Shower door was damaged and the Bathroom door had gaps (Not aligned so it didn't shut properly)

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv

Review: Supriya - Talented , prompt and positive person
Detailed Review: Supriya working at this property is highly professional and promptly comes with solutions to any problem.  Such staff is an asset to any organization. She is young talent and full of energy. The hotel property is good and has a great location.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: AK2022
Review: Terrible experience staying at this place
Detailed Review: I am a Platinum elite member of IHG and lives in US. While visiting India I stayed at this property. I am not sure why this property is rated as 5 stars. When I checked-in my room, I noticed blood stains on the toilet – appeared to me that bathroom was not cleaned properly. No compensation from duty manager when I complain about this issue.   Staff was nice but confused – not properly trained for 5-star standards. Worst part they put my luggage in hotel taxi when I was check-in out and the driver took off with different passenger. Staff helped me to track down the driver, and I had to chase the driver in different hotel taxi all the way to the airport.  I would avoid this place at all costs.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: S.
Detailed Review: Even before checking in, they spoiled our experience. Staff is cold and don't even have respect of your time.  They offer us a package for long stay and then showed us dirty room which was disappointing. Pathetic attitude of staff towards their guest will ruin your first moment at the hotel. They won't even care to attend you and will treat you rudely.  Never expected this from a brand like this. They don't even care for your experience. Staff takes you for granted, not aware about their own amenities and rooms. Bathrooms are shabby, full of fowl smell, talking about their furniture, it is old, torn upholstery.  At first, reservation desk ( Nisha) will offer you will exiting offer to mislead you. And the moment you reach there, front end will people like Rahul and Pranjal Rai (…

Detailed Review: I like the hospitality and the services of the rooms ….. it was a great stay vacation…… it was too good…. Room was too good and the view was good too .,,,, team was  to good …, food was tasty ….. quick service

The place is clean and comfortable, and hotel services are standard.. The room service is outstanding. I heartily thanks Rahul,  for everything specially their professionalism, care, and commitment. Their eyes were always on the details. My appreciation also goes to all the young people at the restaurant and the front desk all over the day.. Some of the names I remember: Supriya (IT) ,Himashu, Vishal, Naveen and Hepuni from F& B. All the people at this hotel were amazing.  Thanks from Mary Lalhmachhuani :-)

Detailed Review: Poor customer service .  I asked for tea - they did not have Indian style tea in India  I ordered from tea from outside after that and the guys did not let me in or serve me Tea Indian style .  ( so if you are Indian and crave true tea- can safely stay away)   ( bear in mind I have pre payed for all my meals at hotel so not about money and also ordered room service mean as well)

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv

Detailed Review: Good stay and the trip was .... I stay there with my friends .... I liked my stay and the room was too good .... And the team was soo helpful....  Everything was good. Faced no issues  with the stay ..... Mansi ,shraddha was helpful

Detailed Review: Have stayed at Holiday inn delhi aerocity several times in the past and each time it has been a wonderful experience. Excellent buffets all around..Clean and hygienic rooms.This time had a pool facing room which added to the beauty. My first choice always .

I am not happy with the behaviour of there CSO ,he behaviour is very rude. Only the one thing I like about this hotel is the ambience and the behaviour of one of the server named Parthana Saud and a Housekeeper Vikesh Kumar. Both made my stay a bit easy .

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Bhakti S
Detailed Review: If there is negative marking, I would go for that. This is my first negative review ever. Absolutely not worth the price. It definitely looks royal from outside but sadly the service, etiquettes, policies, behavior of staff is utmost poor. Would not recommend to anyone specially who is vegetarian, as in breakfast time I saw same spices used for veg and non veg live counters (both chef dipping hands in same bowls). I wonder what they do behind in kitchen. I am staying here for a reason as entire hotel is booked for skill competition and my child is here. Regret to not read reviews about this hotel before booking. Being a pure vegetarian I happen to pick small packet of food for me and my husband but I was stopped by security regarding hotel polices etc. Even after insisting on…

Name: Jose George
Detailed Review: Easily accessible & Good excellent location. Wonderful breakfast & polite staff.  Ala carte was a bit expensive. Rooms strategically placed tp promote privacy without any disturbances. Great housekeeping.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Singprad
Review: Food and people are so amazing
Detailed Review: I had another opportunity to visit Delhi and once again picked LTP at Aerocity for my stay.  Have stayed here couple of times in the past several years and i feel like at home whenever i am here. The culinary team does an absolutely fantastic job, lead by Chef Brijesh, who is always  so approachable and helpful. Breakcast was  so good and Chef Brijesh came to the table seeking feedback about food selection and was all ears for any improvements.   I would stay again here during my next visit. The staff was as usual very helpful, always welcoming and ensuring Guest satisfaction.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Sumuuuu
Detailed Review: We stayed in  for the month of jan for 2 days. Hotel has good location near airport. Other all facilities are also excellent. Best things was they have maintained the cleaness and hygiene in entire hotel, rooms are clean and staff are very comprative We are coming here frequently thaks to Mr.Prasun  always giving us excellent hospitality.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Nidhi H
Detailed Review: Excellent stay  Great hospitality by lemon tree.  Amazing staff.  They take care of you really well.  Amit singh is an asset to this hotel. He handles all our requirements very nicely.  We would like to come back for this hospitality again.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Vaishali Gupta
Detailed Review: I was staying at your hotel and stay was very comfortable. I would like to appreciate Mr Anil gupta (house keeping staff) he’s so kind, sweet and helpful all the time. Best wishes for him.thank you so much for such an amazing and comfortable.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Debarshi Preetom
Review: Nice Hotel within a fabulous location
Detailed Review: The hotel is good. Nice environment. The GMR Aerocity is such a fabulous place for spending quality time. Among others, the hotel and the hospitality of staff are really nice. Housekeeping department has really good mannered staff. Akash, the housekeeping staff who happened to be handling my room for nearly everyday of my 15 days stay, is a gem. Good mannered, polite, dedicated. God bless him.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Deepak Tripathi
Detailed Review: I stayed at Lemon tree this time and absolutely loved it! I've stayed at various properties before but none come close to the level of services offered by Lemon tree. A beautiful personal touch to everything they do - this is the first time that we felt at home in a hotel. The managers, staff members and attendants were extremely respectful and warm throughout. Food and service were prompt and attended to with care.  Special thanks to Amit Singh for taking care of us.  Baljeet & Ishika from reception were wonderful professionals - very prompt and thoughtful service!  Never across did I feel not taken care of! Absolute pleasure!  Million thanks to Pankaj for catering to all our special dining requests and getting our pulse bang on! Kapil and Sumit from in-room dining were great…

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Priyanka
Detailed Review: I was overwhelmed by the service of Mr. Rajeev of housekeeping department. One of the kindest staffs I have ever met. Very kind, polite, professional behaviour and his service is upto the mark. I am elated with lemon tree and it’s service. Thank you lemon tree and a special thanks to Mr. Rajeev for going that extra mile for customer satisfaction.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Abhiee Z
Detailed Review: Rahul from the front desk was very humble and catered well to our asks and need. He and kapiljeet from in room dining made the stay pleasant.Except them others weren’t upto the mark. Some blunders were made by other staff of in room dining which spoiled the experience to some extent

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Deepanshu C
Review: New year plans at The claridges
Detailed Review: Great stay at the hotel. I started my new year at this place and loved the hospitality of the staff here at the reception specially Mr. Nikhil at front desk. Gave me idea of something which really help me. Good one

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Jeffery L
Review: Excellent Staff, Great Location, Clean and Safe
Detailed Review: My wife and I have now stayed at this hotel seven times. The staff is absolutely excellent: very dedicated, friendly, and hard-working. Special shout-outs to Gaurab at the front desk, Mayank in the dining room, and Shyamvir on the cleaning staff. But really the entire staff were all great. The people at Hilton Garden Inn make us feel at home. It really is our home in India. The location is also excellent for shopping (connected to two large shopping malls). Pretty much anything you could need is there. It's also a reasonable distance (given Delhi traffic) from the airport and the center of the city. I recommend this hotel highly!

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: kavitabahuguna
Detailed Review: #HiltonGardenInn #Saket #Delhi  Here we met a very warm, humble and very very positive person, full of enthusiasm GM of #HiltonGardenInn #Saket, Joyjeet Chakravorty......, who has recently joined and also Vineet Bahuguna, the Exec Chef, simple, experienced, who has magic in his hands.  Hilton Garden Inn, Saket is surrounded by the very popular Select City Mall, MGF Mall, DLF Mall, the most happening place in Delhi. It is a hundred plus keys hotel with India Grill Restaurant and a Bar. Vibrant and beautiful decor of the spacious room is quite inviting.   It was #staycation, for us, the booking was done ten days in advance, on the day before checkin there was a reminder for next day, It was a great feeling and you feel special, then you go with a positive mind and then everything…

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Adil khan
Detailed Review: Really liked the hotel, specially Sham vir from Room service. He is a thorough professional and does his utmost to make you feel at home. Dinning options are decent and room service is excellent. Sure to stay here again.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Sangeeta Bahuguna
Review: Staycation at the Hilton Garden Inn saket
Detailed Review: Hilton Garden Inn Saket !!!  Hilton Garden Inn at DLF Mall Saket in the South of Delhi is a Gem we explored just day before and were pleasantly surprised when saw the beautiful room with nice colorful decor, brightly lit with very comfortable setting, spic n span washroom with best of amenities. The location of the Hotel inside the Mall and surrounded by two more happening Malls is a shopper's paradise and Hotel offers discount coupons too to the guests staying with them from few brands they have tied up with.  We reached the hotel in the evening and had high tea with General Manager Joyjit Chakravarty over some great conversations. Tea with some delicious delicacies added to the charm ... nice crisp Bruschetta, soft n spongy carrot cake, crisp tart and healthy cookies were idle…

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Saurabh A
Detailed Review: The rooms was not clean though but loved the stay the staff at reception was very helpful would love to come again because of these people they have very warm gesture towards us and also arranged a early check in

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: James
Detailed Review: It's a beautiful hotel full of energy and very good staff especially  Harish from house keeping he was very helpful and very friendly A place that is very memorable and very friendly. The jovial mode and made me feel at home. India is a beautiful country and I wish to visit again

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Ihsan N
Detailed Review: It really was a pleasant and hassle free Trip for me. Spent 8 nights with no issues with the room. Did extend one night without any issues. Great bunch of staffs. Very helpful. Great location.  Great food to choose from the buffet breakfast. Room service was very prompt.  Thanks

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: shiv
Detailed Review: Great experience at Hilton Saket, stayed for around 15 days in December. Breakfast buffet was scrumptious, laundry was hassel free most of the time, front-desk was polite and staff  member at floor 3, Sandeep Negi, was really helpful and quick with all the room related requests.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Zosangliana B
Detailed Review: The hotel has a very good location the staff is very hospital specially the guy Kunal at reception took great care of me .Food is very good .The entire reception knows how to welcome guest . WOULD Love to come again for sure .due to such wonderfull staff
