Name: harjit2021
Detailed Review: We happy and satisfied , all staff was very help full , we were given 6th floor , and could see the city . we were also given airport transfer, pick up and drop .welcome drinks were offered .Sofa cum bed in room was also their as people feel comfortable who are coming with families . SECURITY LEVEL AT ENTRANCE WAS APPRECIATED . MALL WAS ATTACHED TO YOUR PROPERTY . ALL GOOD EXPERIENCES .

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Shawn
Detailed Review: We were so very thankful to have stayed at the Hilton Garden Inn in New Delhi. We adopted our little daughter and we’re trying to learn to communicate and be first time parents while we stayed here for about 14 days. The staff here were amazingly patient, forgiving, and helpful. We are so grateful for all of the staff that were present to help us in our state. Can you bring this to mommy thank you

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Deepak
Detailed Review: Excellent food , good service I visited on my anniversary. The service was excellent. The staff was very polite  The food was very tasty.   Everyone should try it and come here.  I would rate it really five stars.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Ajhad B
Detailed Review: Room is good the hospitality is good the breakfast is also good The ambience and location is very good Easy connectivity Kunal at reception is very helpful would Come again for sure The food is tasty The rooms are very clean according to Covid measures

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Bharat G
Detailed Review: Mr Kunal and Karan was very helpful throughout the stay They tried best to make our stay wonderful the decoration in room  was very good would love to come again for sure Thankyou hilton. For the lovely hospitality... Food is also awesome yummy

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: The Callaghans
Detailed Review: Housekeeping staff Ganesh and Meena are very courteous and friendly. Therefore, the need for us to take a little time to share this feedback about them :) On another aspect, the breakfast spread at Hilton is awesome and delicious. Kudos Hilton Saket Chefs!

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: gauravn123
Detailed Review: This property needs some serious processes to streamline reception processes if they genuinely care about customer experience.   Pros + location  + house keeping staff + in room dining is decent   Neutral  - cleanliness - not exceptional just ok   Cons - reception. When you have airport drop in your stay package customer assumes it will be in hotel cab and not Ola. If one can spend 21K for 3 nights, 500 to 1K INR for an airport drop is no big deal- just let them know in advance. Also making them wait for 30 mins for a cab - not kool.  - reception. Your check in and checkout process is super slow. After a long journey with mask on what a customer needs is fast processing so she or he can relax in her/his room. Spending 30 mins to check in - are you really serious

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Ashray
Detailed Review: This was my first time in this hotel. Very nice and clean .Very good response from reception and very clean room washrooms. Thank you gaurav and  karan for being helpful and responding  very politely . Thank you

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Pagrawal82
Detailed Review: We visited Indian Grill on our 9th anniversary. The food was amazing. Chicken Tikka is must try. We were served by Rohit Yadav, and he was very accommodative and supportive considering we were there with our 9 months infant. Because of him we had better experience then expected. Kudos to Hilton and their work culture. Must visit. Cheers

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Chirag
Detailed Review: Nice stay and good atmosphere Very cooperative staff  Especially Gaurav and Diksha  Thanks for the wonderful stay.   Would like to visit again as and when I'll be visiting Delhi.   Nice breakfast.  Comfortable stay.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Travelandfood
Review: Best hotel in the area for $
Detailed Review: During our trip through India, we decided that staying there upon arrival from our long flight and also on every domestic connection and it was the best choice. Very nice rooms with a buffet breakfast included and two choices of restaurants on the establishment was perfect to regain strength and continue our journey. A pick up car is provided upon request to and from the airport.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Abhijit Mukherjee
Detailed Review: Excellent hotel and hospitality.  Mr. Shailender Kumar was very helpful with reservations.  He hepled book the rooms and arranged for car rentals.  He was also very accommodating during our return trip when our flight schedule got changed.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Shweta verma
Review: Amazing experience always and value for money
Detailed Review: Amazing hospitality, the hotel is following covid protocol which is appreciable. Breakfast spread is very good with dishes for all age groups. Staff is very polite, helpful and always willing to serve us better. Rooms are quite spacious and maintained . We availed the gala dinner in 31st Dec night , which had grand spread of menu and had countless variety of dishes and my family just loved it . Special thanks to chef Gaurav for such mouth watering dishes. We highly appreciate the efforts n services  by Mr Shailendra (HR) , Mr Rishav and Mr Nishant .

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Travel504765
Detailed Review: Most of the fixtures don't function in the room. The lamp just sits there, non functional. The buffet was a sad experience. The wait staff are in their own world. not paying heed to anyone's request. They forget orders and take their own sweet time. Overall a pathetic stay. I would suggest you to try any other property other than Holiday Inn. They have begun their downfall

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Gaurab D
Review: Big hotel will all modern amenities and friendly staff. Overall a nice experience.
Detailed Review: The airport pickup and drop was on time and the drivers were friendly. Check in was quick. The hotel is neat and clean. The AC is just right and rooms has all amenities like the electric kettle to make tea/coffee. Overall a nice experience.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Vicki S
Detailed Review: This is our first stay. Drivers, reception, room staff, just everyone has been very kind, helpful, attentive and  very supportive to help with any information. Rooms are very comfortable and quiet. Food is great.  We will definitely visit again. Excellent.  Thankyou for a great visit.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Poojaa G
Detailed Review: Nice place to stay in Delhi. Nice staff and good breakefast. Clean room and nice view from window. Good adhearence to covid guidelines. Good gesture and service by Dev and Sanjay from housekeeping. Would come here again.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Sabuna M
Detailed Review: We were staying with Holiday Inn for just few hours... They made our day so comfortable, helped us to the last moment of our stay.. The supervisor at Viva Restaurant, Lupani - the girl who patiently guided the rush at the restaurant and the support staffs, all where super amazing ! After a long journey before reaching holiday inn, we rested and relaxed to our fullest ! Thank you HI team ! Keep going !

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Gaurav Puranik
Review: Excellent Rooms and very comfortable stay
Detailed Review: The cleanliness was excellent. The staff is very courteous. Nice food. Fantastic Ambience. The location is also great just near the Metro Station. Overall fantastic experience. The House keeping staff especially Dev and Sanjay were excellent.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: anusha
Detailed Review: A really well maintained hotel. All proper COVID19 protocols were followed. Special thanks to Dev from the clean team for making sure the room was well sanitized and well kept. He paid us a personal visit and made sure our stay was pleasant and comfortable.  And the food is really great. The staff is friendly and helpful.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Dreamer520047
Detailed Review: Nice prompt service with a soft spoken attitude of the staff but the check in process was very much time consuming. We waited at the check in counter for almost an hour with our old age parents and kids and yet they were not able to take our payment as their card machined were not working. Otherwise staff members Mr.Dev and Mr.Sanjay from housekeeping were very generous and soft spoken and the rooms were very clean and the breakfast too was amazing.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Devashish Meena
Detailed Review: Ashish Das house keeping was amazing and meals were good too. House keeping was on time and service was good too. Even if I don't ask for help they would gladly ask me upfront which is amazing for introverts. Everything was on time and hygiene of room was maintained at great.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: PANDEY JI
Detailed Review: The checkin was very time consuming. The girl at the reception wasn't able to deal with the guests. After luggage scan our bags were left out, we had to go out and find our luggage. We stayed at the hotel for a night, the room was good. Very close to World mark 2 and World mark 3. The checkout was also time consuming and we had to carry our bags to the car. Special mention "Japreet" who upgraded our room.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Rajiv j
Review: Good Hotel for Business and Family also.
Detailed Review: I stayed first time here and stay was good but need some changes in Check in time. My booking was king size bed but they provided twin bed. I checked in around 11:45  hrs but took too much time for check in. It should be review and modify smooth check in.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: utpal deka
Review: excellent condition of rooms . rooms were beautiful
Detailed Review: i stayed here till 3days and i found the best hospitality in this holidayinn hotel.... the interior of the hotel is good ... hotel is very near to airport. the food also was delicious... the fthe best thing in the hotel is to following all the protocols of covid. the best thing in this hotel is the housekeeping staff who made this hotel shiny and very clean . i got an excellent hospitality here. my room Barkesh was very good in nature.   specially thanks to sanjay verma the floor incharge who was always ready for help. i m planning to come back here. i recommend this hotel to everyone for good hospitality... thank u team holidayinn. thank u sanjay...

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Babloo Singh
Detailed Review: I can't thank the hotel staff enough for being on their toes 24/7, the overall stay was so good I wanna come back already!!! The check in check out was super smooth by Anoushka, food variety in such good rates, rooms were super clean... Thank you

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Noor
Detailed Review: Good hotel nice facilities, all staff are very cooperative. In housekeeping one guy called rajesh kumar very positive very nice service he had given  God bless him. My room is always clean because of Housekeeping Rajesh kumar.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Mandaal
Detailed Review: It was a good day   we checked  in and received  warm welcome by mansi , pravewn , ketan team is very good and great , the front desk was helpful too  we love to visit  this place , as it is near to the airport

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Prawin Subramanian
Detailed Review: It was a pleasure staying at this particular propert, which is literally two minutes from the mall… they gave us a complimentary cake for our anniversary and coffee also… all thanks to Anushka from guest relations she’s too sweet! Overall experience was brilliant and we enjoyed the getaway a lot

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Extraordinary766716
Detailed Review: Service is good , food is Awesome, stayed 13 days feels good , one should really book this , used gymnasium for almost 13. Days , thanks  Thanks to room service person Mr Meghraj and floor incharge Mr Sanjay verma.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Ragland Daniel
Detailed Review: Great place and great people to stay with. Food is excellent and staff are very friendly and courteous. The place is very comfortable and the rooms are meticulously cleaned by the staff. The place is maintained well

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Swapna Khandekar
Detailed Review: I always visit Holiday Inn, this is my 5th visit in just a month and I just enrolled myself as a member,  thanks for helping Anoushka. The breakfast was hands down delicious and I am glad to be a loyal member

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Shashank A
Detailed Review: It was a one day stay but it seemed too short for an amazing location and hospitality, def planning to come back soon for a leisure stay with family… had breakfast the food was also amazing….. thanks for the express check out Anoushka and for arranging my cab in a jiffy :)

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Sarvesh nautiyal
Detailed Review: Room is very good and the staff all are very good helpful and the room service excellent .food so good .higlight of the hotel is warmthness and smile....staff is very helpful.... Atmosphere is positive....excellent service given by housekeeping... Specially thanks to sanjay verma for takin extra care... He made me feel like home... All housekeeping staff was very nice... Thank u sanjay i will come back

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Ajmal
Detailed Review: It was such an excellent stay. All the staff was very caring . They made my stay owsome and made me feel like home… my room boy dev was very nice and helpful. The good thing in this hotel was the location and interior of the hotel. My floor incharge sanjay verma was very helpful. He made a towel art for me . I liked it very much. Thank u sanjay verma from housekeeping..

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Akheto Yepthomi
Detailed Review: The greatest thin in this hotel is housekeeping is very helpful and coperative. All the staff was very caring.... the room boy dev was very good in room making... sanjay verma the floor incharge was very nice and very caring .. thank u team housekeeping......

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Riya
Detailed Review: Even though it was a 12 hour long stay, Anoushka made me feel like home. Amazing hospitality considering it was so busy……… the breakfast was surprisingly scrumptious 😋 I’d highly recommend this property to my friends and family!!!

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Ekramul
Detailed Review: Room was very comfortable. Breakfast was excellent with lots of choices! The staffs were very cordial.  Sanjay, the Housekeeping Supervisor has been wondful. Even the Security Guard Gunjan was extremely helpful to guide me about going to the places.  Overall, a memorable stay! Highly recommended!

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Amarsa Bk
Detailed Review: We had a great experience here in Holidayin. Rahul was very helpful with everything. Will be coming back, thank you! We recommend to stay in holiday in aerocity for great service and food, cleanliness quality.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: akash Srivastava
Detailed Review: Great service. The Staff was supportive and did help in a smooth transfers.  Anoushka was supportive. The hotel was well Managed and the House meeting was super well managed. The f & B services were quite well planned too.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Ameer Hamza
Detailed Review: Dev was good in house keeping service , sanjay was good keeping in his duty , food was excellent, hotel services are good everything was so good .          The overall stay was awesome love to visit again......

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Advait Kulkarni
Review: Great stay with our most trusted and frequented property
Detailed Review: As usual Holiday Inn was spot on with everything that is on offer  great room, warm staff, good food.  There is no reason for me to try anything new on my next trip, or any other trips to Delhi, unless there is some very specific reason.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Amit singh
Detailed Review: What a perfect location for a business stay........... fab interaction with Ms Anoushka from guest relations she gave me coffee also how sweet of her .............ill probably come soon for my daughters birthday!!!! Very welcoming

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Mayur
Review: Such a wonderfull view of room
Detailed Review: It was my first visit in this hotel which was excellent and remarkable.... Food was delicious ... Lobby and interior of the hotel also was very nice... All the staff behaviour was good.  Specially thanks to housekeeping team who made my room neat and clean on daily bases... Rooms were in good condition... Bed was very soft and comfortable.... My room boy meghraj was nice in behaviour... My floor incharge Sanjay Verma was very polite and down to earth..... He was very coperative and helpful ... I heartily recommend his name for best and hard working employees.    Thank u Sanjay and team housekeeping

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: manoj s
Detailed Review: Comfy & excellent stay at holiday inn.  Staff is  friendly specially mr akash kumar and anil kashyap.Good ambience at the hotel. Alleways smells nice all the time. Need to improve food quality. Overall good experience.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Babs
Detailed Review: Good service....akasha kumarhouse keeping eggs did his job excellent...over all good service.anil supervisor was kind and helpful...the food was good and the house keeping was excellent.pleasant stay uoh get over here

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Ruchika P
Detailed Review: Thank you so so much for the lovely assistance and super express check out by Anoushka. She helped with the print outs as well…. Loved everything about my stay…… includinfg in room dining to room cleanliness

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Vishal B
Detailed Review: Absolutely loved the smooth check out by Anoushka, lovely location, clean rooms, awesome breakfast plus covid safety measures were taken care of, what else could I ask for? Thank you so much for the amazing hospitality!!!

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Naman S
Review: Pathetic hotel to stay with zero holidayinn class standards
Detailed Review: Pathetic hotel to stay. All interns working in shifts. GM or the head of front office is least bothered to change way of working . Being a IHG spire elite member know what holidayinn services mean and given zero value consideration by this hotel. No one is bothered to change or improve even after 15 plus feedbacks and escalations over a period of 8 months and 20 checkins. There are better places to stay and at cheaper rate in aerocity. I would not recommend you guys to stay here. If you manage to do please do out of desperation.  Flip side is the food is good , restaurant has good friendly staff and that is why they get 1 star of the lot.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Vishwanath
Detailed Review: It was a great visit the staff is great and me and my family really enjoyed it everyone was really sweet and helped us in every way we needed it. Even my 3 year old sister enjoyed the time there. Will be visiting again whenever possible

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Arpit
Review: Owsome stay and good condition of room
Detailed Review: It was my owsome stay here. It was my first visit here and I enjoyed it very much.... All the hotel staff was well behaved ... Housekeeping staff was very caring and well behaved... Specially thanks to sanjay verma who made and towel art for me to make my stay comfortable ... He was very helpful and cooperative... Room  was very neat and clean... The views of room was very nice. Hotel location also near to airport which is a good thing.... Thank u sanjay for everything and your help

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Traveller
Detailed Review: What a beautiful beautiful stay, absolutely mesmerised by the ambience food and overall property........ Express check in by Anoushka and i was treated like family........... Planning to come with my family soon!!!

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Devpriy T
Detailed Review: Very neat and clean property , excellent staff and service.  I very much enjoyed steam/sauna and spa facilities too - after a long tiring day it was very relaxing.  How i wish i could get a complimentary breakfast .. :)  Hotel is very near to One8 commune restaurant ( Virat Kohli;s chain ) which made my stay even better as i could enjoy the mushroom dumplings.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Jagmohan
Detailed Review: Hotel was good ,,,,,,,,    staff aas very cooperative ande halpful ,, ,,,,,,,,,, special thanx toa mansi and gaurav who made my check in flawless and so humble and courtious,,,,   front desk was good, will come back soon

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: suraj d
Detailed Review: The service of staff and people working for service was awesome- special thanks to the driver Deepak he helped with my tests and everything and special thanks to Anoushka her smile changed my day…. I was in a very bad mood but my problems were handled beautifully……

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Manish Riswal
Detailed Review: This is a GO TO property..... Specially for a quick business stay.... I have been coming here since ages now and I never got a single chance to complain..... Thank you so much for this special treatment Anoushka :)

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Sharmistha C
Detailed Review: It was a brilliant experience. From check in to the cleanliness in the rooms, everything was spic and span… Special thanks to Anoushka for being on her toes throughout lovely girl. Food was also delicious!! Thank you team Holiday inn

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Nithyanand M
Detailed Review: Front office staff is very good.House keeping also doing good. Breakfast is good but South Indian food is not in the class. Rava Upma/Poha/Pav Baji should be improved.  Dinner is excellent. White rice is very hard..we can’t eat .  Service is super. Thanks

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Ankit S
Detailed Review: The most pathetic hotel in Delhi. Dirty, without any services, pathetic staff - particularly Night staff - Roy Choudhary is extremely rude and doesn’t deserve to be in the hospitality industry ! The rooms have thick layer dirt ( had I checked with UV light, it would hav been worse) and it’s extremely small. Basic amenities are not there, when u call for services they take a million years to arrive. Small Hotels in paharganj that come 10’times cheaper would be better than this hotel. The view  of the room was all blocked by building and concrete and junk, despite requesting to change my room, they did not even after insisting.

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Jaswinder S
Detailed Review: Hotel stay was good ,front office staff very helpful and kind .. house keeping staff make room very clean and helpful... food was good very tasty  spacial thank you for Purnima  from reception she is very kind helping nature.   Hotel lobby very beautiful

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Muskaan N
Detailed Review: Hotel lobby very beautiful.front office staff very helpful . Spical thank you for purnima at recetion who make my visit very beautiful and memorable... i am coming for my wedding shopping she help me about the market. Housekeeping staff also nice .  Thank you

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Vahid
Review: Very old fashioned, carries a hefty price tag!
Detailed Review: I arrived 10:30 PM and the atmosphere was like a ghost host as there were no activity or guest in the hall or restaurant. The suite was in the 5th floor with a window toward Ashoka road. The look and feel was very old fashioned (I really mean it) and seems there were no renovations for years. Actually, the hotel was closed for more than a year due to COVID-19. WiFi is unbelievably slow (at most 50KB/s); thus it is almost impossible to watch any thing online or have a good video or even audio call. The WiFi condition is the same everywhere even in the lobby. The room temperature were low. I asked reception for fix late at night, but no one came so I forced to sleep with a jacket. The quality of bath room stuff (e.g. soaps) were very low. The safe was very old fashioned as well as…

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Jeffery L
Review: Excellent Staff, Great Location, Clean and Safe
Detailed Review: My wife and I have now stayed at this hotel seven times. The staff is absolutely excellent: very dedicated, friendly, and hard-working. Special shout-outs to Gaurab at the front desk, Mayank in the dining room, and Shyamvir on the cleaning staff. But really the entire staff were all great. The people at Hilton Garden Inn make us feel at home. It really is our home in India. The location is also excellent for shopping (connected to two large shopping malls). Pretty much anything you could need is there. It's also a reasonable distance (given Delhi traffic) from the airport and the center of the city. I recommend this hotel highly!

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: kavitabahuguna
Detailed Review: #HiltonGardenInn #Saket #Delhi  Here we met a very warm, humble and very very positive person, full of enthusiasm GM of #HiltonGardenInn #Saket, Joyjeet Chakravorty......, who has recently joined and also Vineet Bahuguna, the Exec Chef, simple, experienced, who has magic in his hands.  Hilton Garden Inn, Saket is surrounded by the very popular Select City Mall, MGF Mall, DLF Mall, the most happening place in Delhi. It is a hundred plus keys hotel with India Grill Restaurant and a Bar. Vibrant and beautiful decor of the spacious room is quite inviting.   It was #staycation, for us, the booking was done ten days in advance, on the day before checkin there was a reminder for next day, It was a great feeling and you feel special, then you go with a positive mind and then everything…

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Adil khan
Detailed Review: Really liked the hotel, specially Sham vir from Room service. He is a thorough professional and does his utmost to make you feel at home. Dinning options are decent and room service is excellent. Sure to stay here again.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Sangeeta Bahuguna
Review: Staycation at the Hilton Garden Inn saket
Detailed Review: Hilton Garden Inn Saket !!!  Hilton Garden Inn at DLF Mall Saket in the South of Delhi is a Gem we explored just day before and were pleasantly surprised when saw the beautiful room with nice colorful decor, brightly lit with very comfortable setting, spic n span washroom with best of amenities. The location of the Hotel inside the Mall and surrounded by two more happening Malls is a shopper's paradise and Hotel offers discount coupons too to the guests staying with them from few brands they have tied up with.  We reached the hotel in the evening and had high tea with General Manager Joyjit Chakravarty over some great conversations. Tea with some delicious delicacies added to the charm ... nice crisp Bruschetta, soft n spongy carrot cake, crisp tart and healthy cookies were idle…

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Saurabh A
Detailed Review: The rooms was not clean though but loved the stay the staff at reception was very helpful would love to come again because of these people they have very warm gesture towards us and also arranged a early check in

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: James
Detailed Review: It's a beautiful hotel full of energy and very good staff especially  Harish from house keeping he was very helpful and very friendly A place that is very memorable and very friendly. The jovial mode and made me feel at home. India is a beautiful country and I wish to visit again

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Ihsan N
Detailed Review: It really was a pleasant and hassle free Trip for me. Spent 8 nights with no issues with the room. Did extend one night without any issues. Great bunch of staffs. Very helpful. Great location.  Great food to choose from the buffet breakfast. Room service was very prompt.  Thanks

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: shiv
Detailed Review: Great experience at Hilton Saket, stayed for around 15 days in December. Breakfast buffet was scrumptious, laundry was hassel free most of the time, front-desk was polite and staff  member at floor 3, Sandeep Negi, was really helpful and quick with all the room related requests.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Zosangliana B
Detailed Review: The hotel has a very good location the staff is very hospital specially the guy Kunal at reception took great care of me .Food is very good .The entire reception knows how to welcome guest . WOULD Love to come again for sure .due to such wonderfull staff

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Dharampal Dhabai
Detailed Review: The hotel staff was very good throughout the stay loved the rooms and food as well Everything was fantastic and The location is good it's connected from the mall The guys are reception are well trained and know how to make guest happy

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Saurabh pandey
Detailed Review: Excellent service best view super staff and reception Mr Gaurav was very helpful person I will request to everyone if you want stay in saket best hotel. Best rate best services nice views so stay here and enjoy

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: harjit2021
Detailed Review: We happy and satisfied , all staff was very help full , we were given 6th floor , and could see the city . we were also given airport transfer, pick up and drop .welcome drinks were offered .Sofa cum bed in room was also their as people feel comfortable who are coming with families . SECURITY LEVEL AT ENTRANCE WAS APPRECIATED . MALL WAS ATTACHED TO YOUR PROPERTY . ALL GOOD EXPERIENCES .

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Shawn
Detailed Review: We were so very thankful to have stayed at the Hilton Garden Inn in New Delhi. We adopted our little daughter and we’re trying to learn to communicate and be first time parents while we stayed here for about 14 days. The staff here were amazingly patient, forgiving, and helpful. We are so grateful for all of the staff that were present to help us in our state. Can you bring this to mommy thank you

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Deepak
Detailed Review: Excellent food , good service I visited on my anniversary. The service was excellent. The staff was very polite  The food was very tasty.   Everyone should try it and come here.  I would rate it really five stars.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Ajhad B
Detailed Review: Room is good the hospitality is good the breakfast is also good The ambience and location is very good Easy connectivity Kunal at reception is very helpful would Come again for sure The food is tasty The rooms are very clean according to Covid measures

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Bharat G
Detailed Review: Mr Kunal and Karan was very helpful throughout the stay They tried best to make our stay wonderful the decoration in room  was very good would love to come again for sure Thankyou hilton. For the lovely hospitality... Food is also awesome yummy

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: The Callaghans
Detailed Review: Housekeeping staff Ganesh and Meena are very courteous and friendly. Therefore, the need for us to take a little time to share this feedback about them :) On another aspect, the breakfast spread at Hilton is awesome and delicious. Kudos Hilton Saket Chefs!

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: gauravn123
Detailed Review: This property needs some serious processes to streamline reception processes if they genuinely care about customer experience.   Pros + location  + house keeping staff + in room dining is decent   Neutral  - cleanliness - not exceptional just ok   Cons - reception. When you have airport drop in your stay package customer assumes it will be in hotel cab and not Ola. If one can spend 21K for 3 nights, 500 to 1K INR for an airport drop is no big deal- just let them know in advance. Also making them wait for 30 mins for a cab - not kool.  - reception. Your check in and checkout process is super slow. After a long journey with mask on what a customer needs is fast processing so she or he can relax in her/his room. Spending 30 mins to check in - are you really serious

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Ashray
Detailed Review: This was my first time in this hotel. Very nice and clean .Very good response from reception and very clean room washrooms. Thank you gaurav and  karan for being helpful and responding  very politely . Thank you

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Pagrawal82
Detailed Review: We visited Indian Grill on our 9th anniversary. The food was amazing. Chicken Tikka is must try. We were served by Rohit Yadav, and he was very accommodative and supportive considering we were there with our 9 months infant. Because of him we had better experience then expected. Kudos to Hilton and their work culture. Must visit. Cheers

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Chirag
Detailed Review: Nice stay and good atmosphere Very cooperative staff  Especially Gaurav and Diksha  Thanks for the wonderful stay.   Would like to visit again as and when I'll be visiting Delhi.   Nice breakfast.  Comfortable stay.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: navana100
Review: The best location and most hygienic.
Detailed Review: The hotel is located at the best location, close to the international airport, the excellent service, delicious food, swimming pool. The best part os its neat and clean. The manager Mr. Rohit Bhandari is a best host. I had a privilige to meet him personally. We will surely stay again on our next trip.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Shivangi kenayra Dhiman
Detailed Review: Would like to thank Mr.Rajeev kumar from housekeeping department.  After having a very hectic flight he made sure we had a great stay. Without asking he offered us slippers and water. May god bless him. Loads of blessings and prayers for him. Do share this with him.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Pratheeksha K
Detailed Review: The service is amazing mr rajeev was excellent at his work loved the stay thank you lemontree the hotel is super clean the staff are always happy to help true example of service from the heart and the property is really pretty and well maintained

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Subhash
Detailed Review: We really enjoying the stay in your hotel and your hospitality is very good. Your staff managing all requirement very gently really deserve appreciation as they trained to maintain decorum. They were waiting patiently even in the midnight. I am sure the hotel gets good name because of the courteous staff. I would like to stay again when I back to Delhi We used the restaurant for breakfast and found it to be quite good with friendly staff. My only feedback is about the buffet on the occasion of Christmas.that was amazing specially thanks to chef binod and brijesh,I just felt they are too good in their approach and make my Christmas so delightful.  Thanks Mr vijay (incharge buffet) for all ur hospitality.  I am sharing pic for memory.   Subhash

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: rahul kumar
Detailed Review: It was a business visit. Hotel staff is very polite. Special mention to Mr. Sunny from housekeeping, who was prompt to attend any request, be it room cleaning or water bottle orang other need,he was there.     Food also is very nice. There was a special arrangement for Christmas Eve.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Avinash
Detailed Review: Delicious food, deserts and environment.... Superb services provided by Sanjay and monu and all other staffs. Must visit place to have some fun with delicious foods... Buttfet was an amazing. Keep it up .

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Sararaz
Detailed Review: We have been staying in the hotel for a long time. Staff is very courteous in the restaurant specially Sanjay ,Vijay, Pankaj and Gautam who always welcome us with great smile and make us feel at home. Also would like to give my complements to the chefs for such a lavish buffet spread during Christmas Eve. Kudos to the team keep it up .

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Shalini B
Detailed Review: We booked 20 rooms and banquet to celebrate my son’s first birthday. Everything from food to arrangements were PERFECT. The staff was polite and more than willing to help. Much thanks to Kashif, Vijay, Neha Khandelwal and to all the staff who made our stay pleasant. Would love to visit again!

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Mandy T
Detailed Review: I previously left a negative review, as the hotel were ignoring our emails about refunding us from a cancelled booking due to COVID-19.  I am re-submitting my review, as the refund has since been processed and when they finally did respond to the emails quick action was taken.  So thanks to all invovled.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Priyanka Jakhar
Detailed Review: Mr Rajeev is so hard working. He is true asset to the company. Give him regards and rewards. He is proactive.he helped me with everything that I needed in a very short span of time. Give him my regards.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Siva
Detailed Review: Excellent house keeping, management in food sections manager behavior is very good for receiving. Hotel management is fully fallowing co vid safety precautions in the hotel management. Excellent receive for the enquries.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Bhaskar
Detailed Review: The location was beautiful. When we went to the restaurant   for anniversary, the food was amazing and service was even better. I must appreciate Amit singh for his efforts in organising it in a brilliant way. Kudos to the team.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Emmanuel
Detailed Review: I came to this place with friends as it was his birthday. We decided to celebrate it here. The hospitality was superb. Special thanks to Amit Singh for giving such a  fabulous service. Keep up the good work. I would definitely recommend this to others.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Rifat Nabi...
Detailed Review: I am not new to Lemon tree. And every time I visit they don’t disappoint me. Excellent service, covid protection and most importantly the food.  Room service is fast even when the hotel is 100% occupied. I would like to mention about the operations manager Amit Singh who is an asset to the hotel. He went above and beyond to help me during my stay with each and everything.  My trip this time was extra special because of him.  Keep up the great work Lemon tree. I will visit again soon.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Dev
Review: Neeraj kumar @ Lemon Tree Aerocity Hotel Delhi .. for the excellent courtesy and services
Detailed Review: Neeraj Kumar was excellent in understanding our requirements and also catering is exceptional way at Dinner time and also on Busy Break Fast Morning day.. we truest has a wonderful experience at hotel..

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Ashish Anand
Detailed Review: I like the way they interact, most often we don’t find such a kind heart. Very friendly in nature and well mannered.   Consider this as a small token of appreciation.  Thank you  Vindeshwari , Mukesh Singh

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Mudasir Hameed
Detailed Review: Once again, lemon tree efficient team made an emergency overnight trip to Delhi easy and comfortable. All I did was to message our flight details to  Amit Singh, the head manager, and he took care of everything else in his usual, ‘leave it to me’ manner. Everyone, from the security guards to the porters, greeted us.  Check in was smooth.  Over at the Restaurant, the staff welcomed us warmly. Restaurant manager came over to say hello and offer us tea. I looked for Amit to thank him for taking care of everything so well.   Dinner  that evening was casual, fun, and exciting, bringing on an ear-to-ear smile. From Szechuan noodles, and stir fry vegetables to Malai roll and the halwa. the food was seriously delicious. The staff hovered at our table, tempting us with one dish after…

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: GSRance
Review: Great experience of the Lemontree, Aerocity Hospitality .
Detailed Review: Visited Citrus restaurant. Cheerfully nice ambience & great food. I specially liked the fish, biryani, vegetables preparations & the dal was amazing. Special thanks to Mr Vijay & his team for making my international guest feel so welcome.  He insisted on coming again, not only to the restaurant but also to stay at the hotel again during his next visit to India.   Also, thanks to Mr Kartik for arranging the prompt bookung of my guests every time.  My guests love not only the hotel building and its features but also the personal warmth and  attention from the hotel staff every time they stay.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: vinvinmodh
Review: Can easily be taken be a 3 star hotel
Detailed Review: Hilton Garden Inn is in a good location of Saket, Delhi.  The hotel does not have the ambience nor the look of a 5* hotel. Mattress in the hotel room gave us back pain we stay there for 6 nights,  very uncomfortable..  Breakfast was included in the room rate and it was indeed good. At the checking in, the staff said 4 pcs of laundry per day is free. Yet they charges me laundry money at check out.  Overall, if one thinks that it is a 5* hotel, then there will be a lot of disappointment.  Staff is not helpful, nor that much  courteous. I did not go to this hotel on my subsequent trip to Delhi.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: harindranathg
Detailed Review: My dinner experience was worth sharing  One and only smart person and best service provider was Rohit Yadav. Food was good but the quality of service made the experience ever better  Good job Rohit!!!!!

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Siddharth
Detailed Review: Server Rohit was amazing to best of his service helped a lot. Arnab and Deepak were very helpful , welcoming nature. Chef Balveer and Vinod made an awesome food. Superb staff fantabulous service. Will visit here every anniversary 🤩🥰😍

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Stuty_J
Detailed Review: We stayed in Hilton Saket for 7 days. Location is excellent, mall south entrance is next door. Nature s basket and Haldiram are right oppositie. Rooms are clean. Housekeeping staff is diligent. Our room’s housekeeping was done by Harish Kothari - he was very sincere, smiling and took care of all our requests. Highly recommended.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: s j
Detailed Review: Mr. Shyamveer was excellent at housekeeping during our visit. He was humble and jovial at work and has a very good sense of hospitality. He helped us in our stay at the hotel by fulfilling all his duties and helping us around.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Archish M
Detailed Review: Had a very pleasant stay at Hilton Garden Inn. The Staff were cordial and helpful especially Gaurav and Karan at the night shift. Will definitely come back again to stay and will recommend to my frie ds to visit as well.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Salman
Detailed Review: Mr. Maaz uddin suggested to stay in Hilton Garden Inn and it was a great suggestion. Mr Dilraj was as helpful as a friend can be. He was always on his toes to help us with anything needed in 4 days stay. Furthermore, Sumit, Ajeet and Deepak helped in planning a amazing dinner to celebrate our first wedding anniversary! Thank you guys for making our stay so comfy and memorable. I am glad to be a part of Hilton membership programme and looking forward to stay in Hilton soon!

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Siya Khanna
Detailed Review: MR SHYAM VEER helped us and gave commendable service during our stay . They are quick , at a great central location and really hospitable !! We visit the hotel almost evrymonth and never feel the requirement to change !

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Amir
Detailed Review: I visited Hilton garden inn with my colleagues  in india grill restaurant and the food was amazing all the staff was helfull specially front office staff karan and gaurav was available at the duty they personally dropped me to the restaurant they all were soo good

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Neeva
Detailed Review: Our stay at Hilton has been good. We were especially taken good care of by Mr. Shyam from the Housekeeping Department who made sure that our every requirements regarding the room was met. He is a very courteous and friendly person. Thank you very much for such a wonderful service.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Shaleenta Chand
Detailed Review: Loved the stay Mr Kunal and Mr Vaibhav were really helpful during the entire stay would love to come again for sure and food was very tasty and rooms are good The staff is very courteous Thankyou Hilton

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Omkar_Sampgaonkar
Detailed Review: Excellent location, very well kept rooms, very courteous staff and exceptional hospitality. We were a group of 12 family members travelling for leisure and were very well looked after by Vaibhav, Kunal  and the entire team at Hilton Garden Inn. Kudos to you guys and keep up the good work.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Bhavya
Detailed Review: Came for a short stay  Was lovely being here, the team at the Front Desk is exceptional. They take care like family  Vaibhav, Kunal and Dilraaj are to name a few.   Kudos to the team and the hotel, will come soon

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Ru B
Detailed Review: We loved our stay here in November 2021. The location is excellent with it being right next to two malls for easy food and shopping options. We cannot thank the staff enough, they were incredibly accommodating and helpful with anything that we needed. They went above and beyond to make us feel at home. The rooms were very comfortable and quiet. The food at the restaurant was great and convenient. We will be staying here again.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Khursheed Ramatov
Detailed Review: the stay was comfortable  and Mr Kunal And Mr Vaibhav took our care like home as we were from outside woild love to come again to the property  Such people are a example to the industry Thwy know what a guest need s

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Sumatha Kumari
Detailed Review: Everything is fine  Pantry service is superb Room service is fine The staff is lovely would love to come again to the property Kunal at reception is very helpful  Kudos to his service and generous behavior

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Vridhi kapoor
Detailed Review: Hilton is a very good brand i travel here very often . So the property is good i love the food here ...Mr kunal at reception is there who is always there to assist us everytime we visit the property  ..

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Gaurav solanki
Detailed Review: I have visited india grill no of times but the experince of visting here again and again is different i love the food and The night front offce team karan and gaurav  was so helpfull and joyfull nature i enjoyed talking with them..

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: NR S
Detailed Review: Nice stay with very good hospitality staff like Kunal, Vaibhav. Will definitely recommend this property to my friends.  The breakfast we had all the days were very nice.  All the very best. Thanks Subramanian

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Roshan
Detailed Review: The breakfast is good everything is perfect Loved the stay The guy Kunal at reception made our stay confortable by giving us rooms nearby would love to come again …the room services aare good would love to stay once again

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Furqan
Review: Loved the service of Hilton garden inn
Detailed Review: I loved the service of Gaurav he helped me alot loved the hotel service housekeeping service was amazing all the things were great and the staff was very supportive food was amazing I order chicken biryani and it was great

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Mayank singgh
Detailed Review: The staff of hotel is very friendly and most importantly the people at reception are very helpful to name a few like kunal vaibhav they are very generous would love to come again to the property and would recommend to othees also

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Aviiral Mukherjee
Detailed Review: An excellent evening while in the dinner at their restaurant. The staff Mr. Rohit & Mr. Karan were extremely cordial & welcoming by nature... one of the actual highlights for us. Equally delicious was the buffet spread at the place.  The best part was the complimentary cake which was served with the food for one of our members birthday. A must visit place to visit in Saket.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Moklan N
Detailed Review: I stayed at hilton many places but hilton Delhi was very good the staff politeness and Specially to name a few Mr Kunal Mr vaibhav helped me a lot and also ..  food was very tasty the live kitchen is awesome. Though  restaurant services are slow .. but still the staff is great

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Rajni A
Detailed Review: The hotel location is awesome as well the staff at reception is The Reception staff always Helped us through out the stay ... Mr Sahil is a very generous man would love to stay here again .. Loved the generous  behavior of all ....will come again to hilton Delhi again

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Hide A
Detailed Review: I'm really satisfied for the first time visiting to india. The room is always kept clean. Restaurant service is also good. Especially, Mr. Rohit is very kind for the visitors. I want to visit the hotel again.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Mukesh Bhagia
Detailed Review: I stayed first time in holiday inn but couldn’t impress as I heard it’s name. I think price and service wise  other are far better. Main things I noted that Towels and Napkins are not properly washed as it smells bad. Second thing I took buffet on 26th November 21 morning around 9.30-10 am. Quality of food of many items were not good. There was smell in Muffins and other products which were covered by canned fruit layer. Preparation of South Indian food/ Dosa was not good. There were not fresh juices except water melon. Papaya was also not sweet. It seems no one caring for quality and hygiene.   Main thing I noticed that there were small cockroaches were running at dining table and chair. That was horrible. I also informed all these things to the manager and chef but I trust no…

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Devika Sharma
Detailed Review: Wonderful stay at the hotel staff is very nice rooms are clean food was best…… will come back sure soon…location is super amazing with aeroplane landing and take off…. Best property in delhi it self…..

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Suguna D
Detailed Review: It  was a very good stay, with all our requirements met. The hotel staff was very  friendly and the food in the restaurant was fantastic. The  location is just perfect, near the airport. Everyone was very friendly.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: ritesh j
Detailed Review: Excellent Stay like always . Have stayed here multiple times . The rooms are spacious and service is good.  Only the Brekfast could have been more better .  Bathroom toiletries should have been a better .

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Gaurav P
Detailed Review: The hotel is located very close to the airport and next to the metro station. There is a mall next door too. The rooms are comfortable neat and clean. The food is very good and the service is excellent. The people who work in the hotel make the hotel. The F&B service person Mr. Tarun and Miss Karishma are specially very prompt and have made my stay very comfortable. Their fixed thali is very filling and delicious. This is my first stay in the hotel. From the front office Miss Indu is very helpful. The house keeping team is also very efficient. I thank the staff for making my stay so very comfortable.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Terrance L Mayes
Review: Stay at Holiday Inn New Delhi Aero City
Detailed Review: My stay at Holiday New Delhi New Delhi International Airport has been great.  I've been here now for over three weeks   I want also thank the representative-Anousgka  (I apologize if I spelled her name wrong). Her hospitality and professionalism was appreciated.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Ritu
Detailed Review: Beautiful hotel awesome service.. Great ambience.. It was a great experience staff was extremely helpful special thanks to Ms Mansi extremely professional girl.  Well spent time food was also tasty.....

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Mohd
Detailed Review: The staff is amazing the frront desk is polite ...humble and great.... I  The food is superb all the proper sanitization.. I the hotel is beautiful and the staff is great.. Thank you for the warm welcome

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Bela Shah
Review: Transit stay at Holiday Inn, New Delhi
Detailed Review: It's been a short Transit stay for 2 nights. The staff ensured I and my kid and nephews were  made completely comfortable and at home..The service at the restaurant was above expectation. Special call out for Mr Ankit Singh Sengar who served us at the restaurant during breakfast and dinner. He ensured all our food needs were met, customised and were made to perfection. Special thanks to him. The front office was great, Aman helped us do a smooth check-in and took care of our request for an inter connected room. And finally many thanks to Sagar Badwal to help us tele book our stay and also promptly arrange the airport transfer. Overall a satisfactory stay. Thanks.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Jay
Review: Very good option near airport stay
Detailed Review: Well built property and convenient location near IGI airport. However, checkin experience was inefficient. Our luggage was brought up after one hour of checkin which was inconvenient. Room was wonderful, very clean and well stocked. Puneet and his team kept our room cleaned and disinfected during our five days stay.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Mohitmalhotra77
Detailed Review: Was there for a day before flying out. The in room dining executive ms. Karishma kaur was very humble and showered her hospitality to ensure the stay was comforted to the maximum. Will surely visit again in future.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Divya27
Detailed Review: Stayed at Holiday inn for 3 nights with 2 young kids. It was a wonderful stay and we loved their hospitality and care. Kids loved their breakfast spread and the special attention. Would love to come back again and also check out more holiday inn options. Works well as they don't charge for two kids under 12.
