Name: Furqan
Review: Loved the service of Hilton garden inn
Detailed Review: I loved the service of Gaurav he helped me alot loved the hotel service housekeeping service was amazing all the things were great and the staff was very supportive food was amazing I order chicken biryani and it was great

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Mayank singgh
Detailed Review: The staff of hotel is very friendly and most importantly the people at reception are very helpful to name a few like kunal vaibhav they are very generous would love to come again to the property and would recommend to othees also

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Aviiral Mukherjee
Detailed Review: An excellent evening while in the dinner at their restaurant. The staff Mr. Rohit & Mr. Karan were extremely cordial & welcoming by nature... one of the actual highlights for us. Equally delicious was the buffet spread at the place.  The best part was the complimentary cake which was served with the food for one of our members birthday. A must visit place to visit in Saket.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Moklan N
Detailed Review: I stayed at hilton many places but hilton Delhi was very good the staff politeness and Specially to name a few Mr Kunal Mr vaibhav helped me a lot and also ..  food was very tasty the live kitchen is awesome. Though  restaurant services are slow .. but still the staff is great

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Rajni A
Detailed Review: The hotel location is awesome as well the staff at reception is The Reception staff always Helped us through out the stay ... Mr Sahil is a very generous man would love to stay here again .. Loved the generous  behavior of all ....will come again to hilton Delhi again

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Hide A
Detailed Review: I'm really satisfied for the first time visiting to india. The room is always kept clean. Restaurant service is also good. Especially, Mr. Rohit is very kind for the visitors. I want to visit the hotel again.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Shouneha
Detailed Review: One of the very good hotel in Delhi. Rooms are clean and decent. Food is good as well. Breakfast spread is very nice and enjoyed the breakfast well. This is my second visit to hotel and i like the culture they have. Staff is very courteous and very polite. Chefs are amazing and had a pleasant stay.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Sulagna P
Detailed Review: I visited this hotel recently and everything was good apart from communication with the SHI staff. They were just wearing cards, but that wasn't enough to identify these staff members. They should have different uniforms or logos behind their shirts so guests can identify them from the back.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Aman S
Detailed Review: It was a great experience staying at lemon tree hotel with such good hospitality services they provide.  Mr. Baljeet helped us with our boarding tickets printouts, and Mr. Mani & Narendra were so informative regarding airport formalities. Must recommended Hotel.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Jayamandeep
Detailed Review: We stayed for just one night but it was an amazing experience we had. Everyone one was so helpful specially Mr. Mani , Mr. Baljeet and Mr. Narendar they helped us regarding airport formalities information and made our stay comfortable. We would love to visit again.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: myfoodcreated
Detailed Review: Hello.   I came to this property - was given.  A suite room.  Nice complete duplex apartment. Clean and properly maintained.  Amd quite spacious also. Both the rooms wer well lit and clean with al the basic amenities . The food taste was very very nice . I gues the matar panir i had was the bestest I had in years. .most importantly the things were made avbl for r baby as we wanted like plain simple food also.  I wud like to thanks kapil gupta , dev dhaiya and mr tara for keeping up their work.  And most importantly there r lot of differently abled staff works here and they r doing a amazing work . And I really appreciate lemon tree for this.  Room  I look forward to coming back to u soon !

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Pia
Detailed Review: Thank you especially to Eshwar Ojha for all his efforts to make my dining experience impeccable . He made sure that the food was flawless . He also offered various alternatives to the items available which created a personal touch !

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Mukesh Thakur
Review: Horrible horrible Property with lausy staff
Detailed Review: Horrible Horrible experience  My only suggestion for my fellow traveler's is that it's better you stay at airport then spend your hard earned money on this property  Service 0Hospitality 0 room 0 room amenities 0 Food 0.  I wanted to order dental kit, called atleast 15 times but no one answered once, this is the first five star chain hotel which doesn't pick front desk calls no matter how many times you try.  Gadgets provided in room doesn’t work.  So i can only suggest you that this property is worst than lodges at Mahipalpur  0 star for hotel  I am falling short of words how pathetic this property is  Just two words for my fellow travellers  Save yourself !  Stay at airport, bus stand , railway station for night just don’t waste your money on this property

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: rahul r
Detailed Review: Would like to give a review about this hotel in aerocity. Lemon tree hotel maintain a high standard with their hotels and this one is a perfect example to prove it. The food was amazing and thr ambience was appropriate for a friends meeting setup. Mr ishwar ojha took special care of our presence at the property. His warm polite and professional behaviour made our evening perfect.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: paraskapoor1996
Detailed Review: Amazing place, perfect service, we had a great time, everything was just perfect. Would love to stay again & recommend my friends for future. Great work. Keep it up guys. You made us feel so happy. Thank you

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Tanya Sharraf
Review: Amazing service specially one of the staff Mr Monu.
Detailed Review: Commendable service provided to me by Mr Monu. My job makes me travel everyday, I'm a frequent guest to lemon tree, Aerocity. I come here like 3-4 times a month. Everytime my eyes are in search of Mr Monu in Dining. As he is the finest staff of Lemon tree or of the whole hospitality industry I've came across in Delhi. There was an incident when I was very tired and checked near to 1530 hrs, so the buffet was close. And I was very hungry, I asked staff at buffet to serve me atleast some lunch, but they proposed me to have snacks which was pasta n sandwich. I wasn't feeling like eating sandwich as I didn't have anything since morning. Then seeing my concern, Mr Monu came n I shared my issue. He went out of the way to serve me lunch. And fulfilled my request. He took the order fir…

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: IndiaTravelfreak
Review: Let Down Affair in this amazing location
Detailed Review: Have lived in mostly all the hotels in the Saket area especially adjoining the malls of Saket. But, this one did not live up at all to the Hilton standards.   It was a complete let down from the check in which was pale to the below average rooms which were extremely dated and poorly maintained. The bed was comfortable and awesome for a good night sleep but the corridors were smelly and elevators functioning on and off to keep one waiting for long.   Breakfast area and spread was decent with good quality food and the service was also good.   But, overall did not have a great experience and would want to return back to the one's I still prefer. An experiment which was misfired.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: timbyler
Review: Overall ok but would not stay again.
Detailed Review: We slept ok but the rooms were dirty. Toilet didn’t flush half the time. When asking for simple things like water was told they will bring it but it never showed up. When at the restaurant we asked for mineral water because our stomachs couldn’t take the faucet water they just told us they’ll bring it to the room. When ordering breakfast in room because we weren’t feeling good they told us that the buffet is open and already paid for with our room. I wanted to buy in room breakfast but they didn’t seem like it was an option. Maybe some of it was language barrier because I speak English but I wasn’t happy with the service. However some of the staff were very good and always asking if we needed anything. We made sure they were tipped well.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: ADVOCATE THOMAS GEORGE
Detailed Review: Team of Mr Sahel made our stay very special at Hilton Garden Saket Delhi. Handling critical situation was the beauty..! An unexpected extended stay out of compulsion (death) was accomdated stretching and altering the hotels bookings. The house keeping team made us feel at home especially Ms Meena..! Ms Meena needs special mention to be commented since she did a commendable job.👍🙏 She was always available with a smile ( not the usual plastic smile seen in hotels). Inspite of her hectic work schedule she made us feel at home...! Appreciate and thank Mr Sahel's team..!ESPECIALLY HANDLING A CRISIS WITH A SMILE IS DIFFICULTY...!Inspite of an opportunity to make a killing, hotel was kind to give us very good rate for our accommodation..! Wish you good luck 👍and MAY GOD BLESS YOU…

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Soumi C
Review: Wonderful Stay and warm hospitality by Mr. Kunal
Detailed Review: The staff here is extremely helpful and accommodates your request to the best of their capacity. Mr. Kunal deserves an absolute mention in this respect. He accommodated my early check in and late check out. I had a nice stay at the hotel. Thanks a lott 😊

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: tousifp2015
Detailed Review: Hotel staff is unprofessional, they should be educated on hospitality. Room services are terrible, one has to request multiple times for an simple request. Most importantly check in was made deliberately late for us, though we had requested for early check in and our request was totally ignored. What I noticed is, Non Indians are treated very well, Indians are not treated the same way.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Rekha
Detailed Review: Amazing property… clean and hygienic. Food was awesome.. service was up to the mark.. Ms Mansi was very helpful and quick. Every request was promptly answered.. great experience will be back soon. keep up the good work guys .

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Jan
Review: Recheck the name and location.. good service, however, misleading location.
Detailed Review: I recently stayed at the hotel and although the experience with the staff had been admirable, the location of the hotel was absolutely misleading having me believe it to be 'at' the airport (Indira Gandhi International) than 'near' the airport.. Perhaps consider changing the name to avoid confusion with Holiday Inn Express 'at' the airport..

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: EliM
Detailed Review: It was my first visit to North India, I loved my stay here at this amazing property, it felt like at home, friendly staff and I also extended my stay here for business purposes.  Clean and hygienic, properly sanitized rooms. The food was great too. I loved the gobi paratha, dosa, and pancakes for breakfast, and steamed fish in oyster sauce was delicious for dinner.  Close to the IGI airport, so I never got late for the airport.  I wish i had stayed longer at this hotel and in delhi. certainly next time.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Abhishek ayyagari
Detailed Review: Puneet has been a great help during the stay and also has maintained the hygiene of the room. Truly satisfied by his work and never ending concentration towards customer satisfaction.great effort from the guys at holiday inn

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: RAJESH K
Detailed Review: first experience at Aerocity and found the hotel very good and staff very warm and caring. Supriya the customer relations manager, helped decorate the room for celebrations and took personal care to ensure. the food was nice and stay very comfortable

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Preethi
Detailed Review: The food was amazing and staff was polite and good ... The front desk staff was superb and helpful ... They all attended as well ... All happy we will come back soon ... Thank you team holiday inn cheers

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Mukadam
Detailed Review: It was a wonderful stay....... such a beautiful hotel with well equipped rooms..... the exams were very neat and clean and very spacious. ...... all the housekeeping staff was good and very helpful..... my floor in charge sanjay verma also was good in nature and behaviour... all the housekeeping staff was very Hardworking. ... I got a good experience  here....... we will visit again........ thank u team housekeeping. ....

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Mansur hasan
Detailed Review: Such a beautiful hotel with beautiful rooms .... The rooms were very neat and clean......... The room supply also we're good in use.......the linen of the room was very soft ...... The towels were of very good quality.... The floor incharge sanjay verma  also was good and polite. He was very good guy.... Thank u sanjay for making my trip great ... Thank u for your help......

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Swami nathan
Detailed Review: It was fantastic stay here... I enjoyed very much.....such a delicious food..  beautifully made rooms..... bed was very comfortable.... total 8days were classic and enjoyable.....my floor incharge Sanjay Verma also was good and well behaved....

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Siddhant Balakrishnan
Detailed Review: Me and My wife stayed at Holiday Inn, Aerocity, New Delhi from 19th Oct '21 till 21st Oct '21. We wanted to take a break from our daily WFH routine without going out of the city, so my wife planned & booked for our 2 days stay at this hotel. My b'day on 20th Oct was another reason for us to select these dates. On the day of Check-In itself we had brief incident, which led us to believe that Hotel's house keeping staff is motivated to look after their customers. Hotel was well occupied as we can infer from the good number of people at the reception, which meant that even with high occupancy, the staff is well motivated to take care of their guests. I personally felt very overwhelmed by Mr. Shoban, who is the housekeeping staff at our floor for his personal attention and offer to…

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Karan Bhatt
Review: Our Ring Ceremony in Holiday Inn, Aerocity
Detailed Review: We had our ring ceremony at Holiday Inn, Aerocity on the 15th of this month. Extremely overwhelmed at how holistically everything was being taken care of, right from the word go! Our heartfelt thanks to Shivangi and the entire HI team that worked under the hood to make our day special than ever!   All the best!   Karan & Deep.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Sandeep anand
Detailed Review: Owsome stay.......great food.......... very hardworking  housekeeping  staff........... my room boy also was well behavesd. Such a beautiful rooms... ..... Sanjay verma also was good and he arranged a lamp for us .. thank u Sanjay verma ...

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Yogendra
Detailed Review: Such a delicious food... ....excellent  stay...... 0.very comfertable room..... Very competitive  staff... .....very near to airport,...... Specially  thanks to sanjay verma the floor incharge..... Thank u team housekeeping.......

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: TheTrueTravels
Detailed Review: Writing review for 2 stays - One during New Year 2021 with family and most recently last week for a quick business trip.   Regular Rooms are average, Bathrooms are small with very limited amenities. At the price point offered and the aero city location, they aren’t bad. The suites are value for money and are better equipped. If you can spend a little extra, taking a suite is a better bet.   F&B options are limited, the bar/lounge offers limited cocktail hour choices which is disappointing. Breakfast is good, F&B crew takes good care and is responsive. Room views can go either way - back in January, I was given a room with a view of an adjoining land dug out which was then changed to an empty pool view once I strongly raised the issue. The view offered this time was better…

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Surinder pal
Detailed Review: I felt like I'm literally staying at home and all staff was so down to earth and polite v courteous ............... The front office staff is the best. Special thanks to Supriya and Anoushka for helping us with everything

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Satyendra Chaturvedi
Detailed Review: Absolutely loved the stay at Holiday Inn International Airport. All Covid protocols were being followed. Food was also scintillating.. I would give 10/10. I will absolutely come back here thanks for this superb stay

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Dev
Detailed Review: The stay was amazing and superb the hotel is great and the front desk staff is so courteous and polite thank you for all you do guys ....Great work will come back again soon thank you so much for the wonderful stay

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Shinto wilson
Detailed Review: Thank you Anoushka for a wonderful and amicable stay. Much appreciated!!! Food was delicious; quantity can be better though. Quality was good. Housekeeping staff is also very nice. Special thanks to Anoushka for upgrading our room

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Himanshi
Detailed Review: Two Days I stayed in this Hotel but I must say I really Enjoyed and it was a really memorable and comfortable for me  Room,food and service everything was upto the mark  I would like to special thanks Miss Supriya nigam and her team member for making my stay memorable

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Hariharan
Detailed Review: All are very good caring people especially Mr. Mahendar service is excellent. Rooms are neat. Food was tasty. Lots of variety. All covid precautions are followed.  Best for 5 star experience.  Fresh juices are superb

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Mukul
Detailed Review: Stayed in Holiday inn aerocity, Dehi for 2 nights as a business traveler and the stay was just perfect. Room, amenities, food and service were amazing and the cherry on top were the staff members, SIMRAN in front desk and SAGAR in sales were very accommodating of my needs and preferences. Kudos to the team!!

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Kuldeep
Detailed Review: Superb front desk team esp Shoshanna along with his team Gaurav supriya  enamul.. great superb food and I am a regular customer from 2017 and its always a pleasure thanks and cheers will come back soon

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Anu
Detailed Review: The great hotel with superb front desk thank you shashank , Supriya for the amazing and polite hospitality the team was full of enthu  the lobby was maintained by the staff great rooms and food was awesome

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Walid
Detailed Review: We came here for business purpose and got a great experience  with holidaying. I enjoyed the stay very much all because off hotel staff. From starting till end my stay was very comfortable... rooms were very beautiful and very spacious and very comfortable...upon floor Sanjay Verma was very helpful. He assisted  me for luggage.......he was very good  in towel art which he made for me . He made an crocodile for me to surprise me . I liked it very much.... all the staff was very good behaved.... Sanjay has different and exceptional skills. He had good knowledge of everything..... thank u team housekeeping  and Sanjay from housekeeping for making my stay great . I will come back......

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Badal
Review: Had a great time with family
Detailed Review: Went to Holiday Inn aerocity to have dinner with my family. It was my sis in law B’day. Food was very delicious and the staff was very efficient, keeping up to the hospitality standards of IHG. Special mention for Mahendra Restaurant officer and Amit Restaurant Supervisor for their excellent hospitality. Cheers to IHG Restaurant team!!

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: stafordjohn@johnford.in
Detailed Review: I am staying first time in Holliday inn and my experience is amazing, service are great, would like to mention abhijeet ,Anuj aakash Deepu and munish, they made my experience best services are quick response time are great. Will definately come back again.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Siddhartha bist
Detailed Review: Floor incharge  abhijeet  room attended deep  service I'd good . They treated me politely and nicey .  All there service is on time .Cleanliness of room is excellent .  Food service is also good and quality of food is excellent.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Khusi
Detailed Review: Very good service. Rajesh helped us a lot with getting my reports on time for my travel to Canada. Staff was always on point and easy to contact. Loved staying at Holiday Inn. Enjoyed my stay at Holiday inn

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Sandeep Joshi
Detailed Review: My name is Sandeep I have stayed in holiday inn aerocity multiple times but simran at front desk she is outstanding and she always help us out to make out stay memorable so I want to say thank you and keep going and keep shining like a star ⭐

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Chetan
Detailed Review: I am from mumbai and It's my first visit here and I got an excellent experience . I have visited many hotel but this hotel has exceptional skills and staff. Sanjay Verma is one of the best employee who is always ready for guest help.............. Lovely staff...lovely stay... Beautiful rooms... Delicious food...... Very cooperative staff ........ All the hotel staff was very cooperative.... Hotel is beautifully made ..... The supply which was placed in room also was of good quality................ Thank u housekeeping team for making my trip great ... Thank u Sanjay again...

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Shashank Tulsidas Fulwala
Detailed Review: Best staff,good room with a wonderful view special thanks to Mr abhijeet from housekeeping to make my stay great aand also to mention Anuj and Deepu to get the room clean on time... Will definitely recommend and come back again

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Kompal
Detailed Review: I have visited here so many time. All the time I got excellent  service ...... delicious food..... comfortable  bed and beautiful rooms ..... all the staff was so loving and caring.... Sanjay the floor I charge was so loving and caring.............................................................................

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Abhishek
Detailed Review: Lovely stay.......... Lovely room.......... Comfortable bed............ Lovely view.......... Specially thanks to sanjay Verma the floor incharge who was so caring. He is  one of the best employee you have hired....... Such a good skills and very polite......... Thank u sanjay.....

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Chandi G
Detailed Review: The overnight stay was wonderful in the hotel. The overall facility was very nice and tidy. Staff were courteous and very helping. The room was very clean and all the facilities were of outstanding quality. The food was excellent and overall ambience was fantastic.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Vinod
Detailed Review: I came here in Holiday Inn to meet my friend.  I was warm welcomed by front office staff. All front office staff was well behaved.  It was such a Beautiful hotel with beautiful lobby ,restaurant, and beautifully  rooms.  Upon the Floor I was assisted by Sanjay Verma also was wet good and he assisted me till the room. Thank u Sanjay.  Complete hotel was well maintained and we'll  managed. Thank u hotel team for making this hotel so shiny.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Parag
Detailed Review: It was such an excellent stay. ....... rooms were beautiful and very spacious with a good view........ bed was vry comfertable........ all the satff was very well educated and coperative....... ashish my room boy also was good. Sanjay the floor incharge was very polite in behaviiur ....... thank u team housekeeping for making my stay comfertable.....

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Vishal thakur
Detailed Review: Excellent food…….rooms were beautiful……………staff behaviour was very goood……… all the housekeeping staff was very well behaved……room was with beautiful view….. Sanjay the floor incharge also was good and cooperative………..

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Cool vivek
Detailed Review: It was such an excellent stay here. Very cooperative staff.... Rooms were beautiful and very spacious and clean....... Food was good..... Loby was beautiful.... Specially thanks to Sanjay for making my stay comfortable...... All the housekeeping staff was good. Thank u Sanjay from housekeeping for your support....

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Philips
Detailed Review: I stayed at Holiday Inn Aerocity during a flight layover. The experience was good right from the courteous staff to the spacious and tidy rooms and the delicious spread at breakfast. Will definitely be back again during my next visit to the city.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: CHD1069
Detailed Review: Pretty good located, in walking distance to Metro which Connection to Airport and Delhi although may be not suitable for elderly. Friendly and attentive staff, quite large and good furnitured, clean and quiet rooms, good breakfast. Overall good choice

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Kariabrijesh
Detailed Review: Awesome experience at Hotel The Royal Plaza Delhi. Wonderful and courteous staff, great good and comfortable rooms. Great Service, Specially Ms. Aman and Ms. Purnima went out of their way to make our stay comfortable. Extremely wonderful experience overall.

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Niranjan T
Detailed Review: Stayed here for one day for a business meeting .wonderfull place, excellent staff and special thank for front office  team,  for their unobtrusive and helpful.  The staff  at housekeeping  are very  attentive,polite and helpfull,  food was very  nice.  Will definitely stay here again   Thank you Aman and purnima

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: IndiaTravelfreak
Review: Let Down Affair in this amazing location
Detailed Review: Have lived in mostly all the hotels in the Saket area especially adjoining the malls of Saket. But, this one did not live up at all to the Hilton standards.   It was a complete let down from the check in which was pale to the below average rooms which were extremely dated and poorly maintained. The bed was comfortable and awesome for a good night sleep but the corridors were smelly and elevators functioning on and off to keep one waiting for long.   Breakfast area and spread was decent with good quality food and the service was also good.   But, overall did not have a great experience and would want to return back to the one's I still prefer. An experiment which was misfired.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: timbyler
Review: Overall ok but would not stay again.
Detailed Review: We slept ok but the rooms were dirty. Toilet didn’t flush half the time. When asking for simple things like water was told they will bring it but it never showed up. When at the restaurant we asked for mineral water because our stomachs couldn’t take the faucet water they just told us they’ll bring it to the room. When ordering breakfast in room because we weren’t feeling good they told us that the buffet is open and already paid for with our room. I wanted to buy in room breakfast but they didn’t seem like it was an option. Maybe some of it was language barrier because I speak English but I wasn’t happy with the service. However some of the staff were very good and always asking if we needed anything. We made sure they were tipped well.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: ADVOCATE THOMAS GEORGE
Detailed Review: Team of Mr Sahel made our stay very special at Hilton Garden Saket Delhi. Handling critical situation was the beauty..! An unexpected extended stay out of compulsion (death) was accomdated stretching and altering the hotels bookings. The house keeping team made us feel at home especially Ms Meena..! Ms Meena needs special mention to be commented since she did a commendable job.👍🙏 She was always available with a smile ( not the usual plastic smile seen in hotels). Inspite of her hectic work schedule she made us feel at home...! Appreciate and thank Mr Sahel's team..!ESPECIALLY HANDLING A CRISIS WITH A SMILE IS DIFFICULTY...!Inspite of an opportunity to make a killing, hotel was kind to give us very good rate for our accommodation..! Wish you good luck 👍and MAY GOD BLESS YOU…

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Soumi C
Review: Wonderful Stay and warm hospitality by Mr. Kunal
Detailed Review: The staff here is extremely helpful and accommodates your request to the best of their capacity. Mr. Kunal deserves an absolute mention in this respect. He accommodated my early check in and late check out. I had a nice stay at the hotel. Thanks a lott 😊

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: tousifp2015
Detailed Review: Hotel staff is unprofessional, they should be educated on hospitality. Room services are terrible, one has to request multiple times for an simple request. Most importantly check in was made deliberately late for us, though we had requested for early check in and our request was totally ignored. What I noticed is, Non Indians are treated very well, Indians are not treated the same way.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Vrithika
Detailed Review: I would like to appreciate the services given by lemon tree. Especially the staff in the restaurant were amazing and the way they handle and treat people was great . Special mention to Mr. Ishwar ojha, who was very supportive and patient . He is a great source and we need more people like him.   Kind regards, Vrithika.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Ramya
Detailed Review: Was absolutely ravenous when we went to the hotel! The food was good! The service was even better! Must thank Ishwar specifically! Not only did he suggest some great stuff on the menu, he even ensured we got it super fast! Will definitely come back again!

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Tanya G
Detailed Review: Thanks to Ishwar for taking care of our table. The food served was amazingly delicious.  Looking forward to our next dine. I love the service and we had a great conversation... I must say he is great in offering alternatives in the menu curated by chefs.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Shreya bidhuri
Detailed Review: Took my family for dinner to citrus cafe, the service and the food was really amazing. The staff was very courteous they welcomed us with warmth. The interior of the place looks very classy.I would like to recommend this place for family dinner.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Mandeep Singh
Review: Stupendous Experience! Excellent staff especially Ms Neha Khandelwal
Detailed Review: We had organised a family dinner at  the Tangier Hall, Lemon Tree Premier and it was indeed a memorable evening. Right from the our first interaction with Ms Neha Khandelwal, the Banquet Sales Manager, who helped plan and organise the dinner, it was a wonderful experience  with all the staff pitching-in in the most professional and courteous manner. No request was too small or troublesome as Neha and her team worked throughout to make it a flawless function.  Amongst the staff, Vijay & Mandeep, Chef Bedi  and Gudiya, all ensured that all the guests were well looked after. Neha and her entire team deserve a special thanks! Highly recommended.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Munna892
Detailed Review: Worst Hotel ever seen in the terms of Brand Room is 100 sqft hardly bed is if small. smalll queen size with hardly six inch mattress and after request also they gave first floor room and no response from housekeeping no staffs we are two and the water bottle is one and asked for drinking water and they gave after 45 minutes after giving several reminders.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Sapna G
Detailed Review: This was my first experience  with Lemon Tree Premier,Aerocity  New Delhi. I was completely   bowled over by the excellent  arrangements  made by their staff..The Production & service staff  Mr Dev his team of Associates Mr Ishwar, Their Chef Mr Brijesh and the sous chef Mr Rajendra ...Mr Kartik at the Front Office&  the invaluable services  of the differently abled  Ms.Seema in their Citrus Cafe. These names are mentioned only to show their dedication and hard work  which the Hotel should recognize. Both me and my husband are  alumini  of IHM Mumbai & have been in the hospitality industry for  the last 40 years. We visited several  properties in and Aerocity for the wedding and were  most impressed  by them. Would also  like to  make a special mention of Ms Neha Khandelwal and…

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Abhishek
Detailed Review: Want to especially thank Mr Dev Dahiya for his unflinching efforts during organizing of our marriage function and stay. All our problems were resolved in minutes by Mr Dev. Very polite and knowledgeable.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: md junaid
Detailed Review: It’s always a great stay at any lemon tree property but the aero city Delhi property is hands down the best I have ever experienced in terms of hospitality.  The front desk staff is always smiling and greeting us, always eager to help with anything and everything .  The hotel under the supervision of operations manager Rohit, always makes us feel comfortable after a long day of work.  All folks always make us feel at home with their great care and services. The food and service is of the highest quality. The staff are an asset to lemon tree.  Look forward to my return.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Zain A
Detailed Review: Lively ambience with great services specially home made tea. (I am a tea lover) Buffet breakfast is nice and lunch/Dinner is ok. White wine made our evening...good recommendations by staff. Polite and courteous staff ...always ready to serve. Covid protocols well maintained....hotel lobby is always crowded.  Special shout out to all staff and hotel manager Mr. Rohit Bhandari for making our stay enjoyble.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Nandini P
Detailed Review: The service during check- in and  restaurant was quick . Mr. Himanshu from house keeping was courteous and hardworking, he made the stay comfortable and took care of all the needs.overall it was great service. Would like to appreciate for their hospitality.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: KURIAN
Detailed Review: As always, stay in Hilton was a great experience. Our SPOC Arnab was very helpful. He take care of all our needs. Looking forward to have another stay with Hilton. Hilton is always one of my favourite Hotel Brands.

Detailed Review: The entire stay at hotel was very good Mr Kunal was very helpful Mr Karan Mr Ravi Shankar and Mr Sahil all were very good throughout my stay ...They were always there to take care of me ..Will come back again for sure .awesome food

Review: As always a great property with warm staff
Detailed Review: I have been staying in this property for theast 5 years and always feel like home. The location if super with 2 malls adjoining the property so everything is a minutes walk away.  If you feel like eating out - there are great food courts in the mall. Breakfast has never dissappointed over the years here with so much to eat. Arnab at the restaurant was so sweet this time and was always there for any help and i think hes a great asset to the hotel .  Would come back soon here .

Detailed Review: Thank you for the lovely stay a great stay with all of you kunal taniya really both are very helpful..mmmmmmm all to say a good stay for me and my wife thanks to front desk for being a helpful hand to me a great day with Hilton really.....Mmm.m...

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Zifk
Review: thanks to the good hosts at India Grill!
Detailed Review: I just got back from the breakfast at India Grill and with the good taste of food and pleasure of excellent service still lingering I write this "thanks to the good host" review. Where should I begin, I am staying at the Hilton Garden Inn in Saket and the brekfast is included in my stay, so the decision to buy or not was not needed. As I strolled into the place, greeted and invited in by the hostess, the food was laid out for the eyes to feast. I grabbed some fruit and yogurt to start and although tasty, the credit goes to nature. But as i walked around i saw Mr Mukesh frying up a fluffy bhatura and I could not resist. It was one of the best I've had in a long time, the chana and aloo bhaji with mixed pickle goes perfect with it. Mr Mukesh offered another one, but I asked for an…

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Rakesh Yadav

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Sweden
Detailed Review: This property is well located..lovely ambiance and has staff that are happy to help... I would like to mention a few who were excellent in thier respective works...Shivam at guest relations ..Vikas at the front desk...Anita at house keeping and Deepika at the security...they made my stay pleasant and safe...thanks to them and the entire team at holiday inn

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Akshit
Detailed Review: Everything is perfect My first stay in Holiday inn aerocity I am glad to share that holiday inn aerocity is the best place to stay during pandemic staying in hotel is bit scary but the way that hotel staff handled are awesome I love the way staff greet Specially Simran at desk for awesom service and support Thank you Simran

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: sudhanshu m
Detailed Review: Our stay was amazing from start to finish. Absolutely everything about the hotel, from the rooms, to the toiletries, the bathroom and most importantly the staff was just perfect. Fast check in, Truly amazing with hospitality, #Holiday Inn Rocks We have had a repeat visit, Room service was prompt and food was served hot. The staff were very polite and friendly to the children, we felt welcomed but not fawned over. They have impeccable customer service at this hotel.  As a gist we loved staying here and will come back next time we visit for staycation

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Puneet_Nawani
Detailed Review: Recently visited Holiday Inn Aerocity for a family dinner. Staff is extremely polite and courteous. Food quality is very nice. One of the best hotel in Aerocity. Highly recommended for business and family events.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Murthy
Detailed Review: - Short stay for late night to catch morning flight . - Check in was busy at 12am and staff managed well . They charge card upfront and it will reduce time when you check out , if you didnt use room service . - As hotel is running full , got smoking room and its uncomfortable . - Spacious rooms with excellent linen ,  good no of water bottles , coffee maker and toiletries . - Amazing and sumptuous  breakfast with wide spread . Both rush and safety guidelines were well taken care. - Opted for airport drop and it took few minutes to reach T3. * Just next to hotel there are good no of restaurants and Starbucks coffee shop .

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: SUNIL k
Detailed Review: One of the best hotel in aerocity ! Receptionsts are so friendly and rooms are clean and big .In room service is also fast .Only 2 things which i would suggest to :- include bathtub in your bathrooms & try to reduce food prices a little bit .

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Aakash Jain
Detailed Review: Stayed for one week as a part of quarantine period and had good and comfortable stay.. Mr soban who is the house keeping incharge is a very nice guy and very humble and helpful. The room service staff is also good.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: vikash k
Detailed Review: Everything is very smooth, nice hotel and staff enjoyed my time food is also yummy  Covid protocol followed close to airport hotel cab avalble very easily,  Sure i will be come again thanks Holiday Inn thank you

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Yadav
Detailed Review: After long day travel reach to hotel front desk staff vikash anf manager indu show the quick response and give me fast checkin ,food was also tasty every one treat like home thanks vikash once again thanks for you hoapitality

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Aviral S
Review: Stay and Decoration at HI Aerocity
Detailed Review: Celebrations in the room was elegant just the way I wished to and overall stay in the room was comfortable. F&B Service Recovery was done amazingly well by Mahendar. HK Feedback Call in the morning was surprisingly pleasant by Sunita.   Thank you team HI Aerocity.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Roving10162266158
Detailed Review: Congratulations, Abhijeet and Ranjit is a great team, the rooms are very clean and they have all protocols safety.  WELL DONE, I recommending Holiday Inn aerocity. All amenities, for shower, razor, all included, close to the airport and the mall, close to the restaurantes.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: vasu1314
Detailed Review: We had excellent experience while our stay. The staff are very friendly. Housekeeping staffs megaraj and sunita, they kept our room clean and tidy. Receptionist Gaurav is very helpful and supportive thanks for all and best place

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: D B Roka
Detailed Review: Surendra is very helpful and clean the room and update everything in the room. I’m so impressed with his work. I have been staying in Holiday Inn Int’I since 19th September 2021. I will be extended my stay until 01/10/2021. Guest: Dhan Sarki, Room: 146

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Abhijeet
Detailed Review: Location is good, Staff is cooperative, Cleanliness and Hygiene is maintained, Room Service is Quick. Although the Breakfast is good. I preferred it for my business meetings visit to Delhi. Only suggestion is to allow Check-In time to before 2 PM or as and when traveler arrived. No Extra Charges for Early Check-in is suggested.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Amit Kumar
Detailed Review: Had a good stay with no issues in service and staff. On check-in time Vikash was good and took very minimal time in the documentation. Room was clean and well maintained.  I will recommend others to must visit the place and get one experience.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Mingkee
Detailed Review: I stayed at Holiday Inn for 12 days and really liked my quiet time here. The room was clean and I got a nice view too. As for the room, I only find their bathroom floor a bit annoying maybe because it's not properly laid out as water doesn't flow properly.   Their breakfast buffet was also good but they could have improved on changing the cut fruits they served at least once! However, it was overall a good stay with prompt room service.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Jim R
Detailed Review: Convenient location, great food, excellent cleanliness, friendly staff especially Mr Praveen and Mr Mahendra from the restaurant (FnB)...i had a pleasant stay like every time  i visit Holiday Inn Aero city...thank you all...see you again😊

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Priya Ghosh
Review: Review for room service guy Akash Kumar in holiday inn
Detailed Review: He was absolutely polite and well behaved. His work was very neat and top notch. Thankyou Akash ! I will definately recommend him all awards possible here in his line. Keep up the good work Akash.. 😃😃😃

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Rohit Kumar
Detailed Review: Very nice hotel and clean rooms.. Staff is very friendly smooth check-in/ check-out thanks to Mr. Vishal Gupta for making stay more comfortable......... Looking forward to stay again with the property

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Akshansh Dubey
Review: Probably has gone down the hill because of Covid
Detailed Review: It's more like a 4 star hotel with horrible front desk/reception staff. I understand that check in timing is 3pm but c'mon be a little bit more accomodating especially when guest arrives at 1:30 pm. Instead, this particular gentleman started asking for early check in charges. It was not like that i arrived at 8 am in the morning or whatsoever. Plus, you are in the hospitality business, put up a smile while handling the customers and leave your attitude at home(that's just a suggestion though). I want to point this gentleman in particular with horrible attitude but i forgot to ask his name and describing his appearance would make me sound like a racist.  Room was very average. (No slippers (had to ask for it), mini bar was empty).  Swimming pool and vicinity was completely closed…

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Mahesh Dutt
Detailed Review: Check in check out was extremely smooth and very comfortable. Im a member and i always visit here.. Anoushka is very humble and sweet she helped me with everything . Overall stay was quite good and all covid protocols were being followed.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Vipin B
Detailed Review: A nice hotel with good rooms, delicious food and nice staff. I have stayed with my family in September 21. Covid precautions were adequately taken by the hotel. Room was well cleaned. Behaviour of the staff was courteous.  Buffet breakfast was  too awesome!! Overall nice experience.😊

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Muhammad
Detailed Review: Overall I had a great stay in the hotel,room was clean and spacious overlooking the aerocity and  nice view of the street. Housekeeping personal was always at your service as well as the hotel intensip trainees who roaming with the chamber maid. Thank you for the guest service team to print the documents and delivered to my Cabin on time. the lady over the phone who spoke to me was well behavioured and polite. in room dining options was available,  they allways call me and taken my orders in professional manner and delivered to my Cabin on time.only one thing was not happy about that I'm a privilege member and because of the company did reservation for me so I couldn't get the bonus points in my account for my 5 night stay.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Anand Singh
Detailed Review: Great and friendly staff, met all my needs.clean room. Very close to airport.covid has made things difficult but staff went out of box thinking to accommodate my request. I will stay here again for similar need.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: MNJ
Detailed Review: Excellent room service by sovan. Very polite, amazing work looks after the room and people very well. He is quick and efficient . All in all a good stay at the property, Rooms are also nice and in a good condition.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Hschiebel
Detailed Review: I arrived in the morning very late (or early) from Europe. Pickup worked perfectly and friendly. Check in took a bit longer, but still okay. Rooms quiet, Clean and comfortable . All staff very friendly and Open. Breakfast ist easy, but fine. Sunmarizing: A good place to stay.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Sanjay C
Detailed Review: Well run , well managed property in Aerocity Delhi . The hotel is ideally located in the heart of aerocity next to world mark . The rooms are larger than the usual . Perfect for business or family stay . The staff is very friendly and cordial . The sales manager Shivangi was there during check out and ensured about the stay . She helped in my booking for the next trip . Would highly recommend to fellow travellers .

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Akash
Detailed Review: I visited Holiday inn with my friends, it's a wonderful place and we had a lot of fun. The staff from housekeeping was great and the services were really amazing. I would like to thank Ashish for the wonderful services. Mr.Shivam the floor incharge was very nice nd polite person and always ready to help. I will revisit again. This hotel ambience is very peaceful.

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Quest25439957526
Detailed Review: I have been in Hotel The Royal Plaza for over 20nights..!!! It's one of the best places for anyone travelling alone & seeking more security. Starting from the Reception, Ms. Aman (my friend now😊) is a really good receptionist & is so helpful and caring. They indeed get the best for you. Indian cuisines were amazing, very warm welcome in the breakfast table. Chef. Anna (& his team) has made me fall in love wit Indian food. All the staff members are very pleasant and room services (Mr.Vikesh & others) are excellent. The interior view of hotel took me back to the Roman Times.

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Sen
Detailed Review: I loved the hotel. The service are really good. The service time is exceptional check in  and check out was smooth rooms are comfortable  decor is very soothing to eyes and functional too  Staff are very cooperative helpful and well informed . Aman and Purnima in  good and polite , food was so tasty 😋,   Rummy break fast so humble and nice . Thank you Royal plaza team  Keep it up

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Yash
Review: Excellent hotel with well trained staff. Ms Aman was a great host.
Detailed Review: We recently stayed at Royal Plaza as it is located centrally and near CP and it was good to see all the staff wearing proper mask and the room was clean and tidy.   Ms Aman was very helpful at the front desk.  Thank You,  Yash

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv

Review: One of the best hotel royal plaza .
Detailed Review: I have been staying at royal plaza .its a great hotel its wonderful I really feel great while having breakfast at Royal plaza restaurant  Apart from all these food and service and room is good  Everything is all good

Detailed Review: The Royal plaza Front desk aman And Purnima were too good .they were very good cooperative and too informative.  the model was not bad excellent  beautiful.  the royal plaza hotel will come sure. house keep is HELPING me a lot.  vikesh he is kind.

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Ashok V
Detailed Review: We were not informed that we shall be checking in on the first day of the opening of the hotel after the pandemic.  1. We were informed that Internet will function after 15th September. 2. Swimming pool, spa and some restaurants were closed. 3. The room was not the one promised and we changed to a twin bedroom, but since it was converted from a Queen size to 2 double beds, there was no headboard nor proper bedside table. 4. The bedlinen was stained. 5. There were no milk powder sachets in the room. 6. The closet could not be used because water condensate was dripping.  7. The toilet paper was about 5 feet from the comode.  8. The shower door was faulty so bathroom was totally flooded. 9. First day breakfast was a disaster with no cereals, yoghurt or cold milk among other things.…

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv

Detailed Review: As always, stay in Hilton was a great experience. Our SPOC Arnab was very helpful. He take care of all our needs. Looking forward to have another stay with Hilton. Hilton is always one of my favourite Hotel Brands.

Detailed Review: I just got back from the breakfast at India Grill and with the good taste of food and pleasure of excellent service still lingering I write this "thanks to the good host" review. Where should I begin, I am staying at the Hilton Garden Inn in Saket and the brekfast is included in my stay, so the decision to buy or not was not needed. As I strolled into the place, greeted and invited in by the hostess, the food was laid out for the eyes to feast. I grabbed some fruit and yogurt to start and although tasty, the credit goes to nature. But as i walked around i saw Mr Mukesh frying up a fluffy bhatura and I could not resist. It was one of the best I've had in a long time, the chana and aloo bhaji with mixed pickle goes perfect with it. Mr Mukesh offered another one, but I asked for an…

However missing the breakfast is a faux pax with chef ready to personalize your meal.  The flaws however include the lack of late night services which benefit those who have to travel across Delhi. A great place for someone to stay in Delhi especially if it's for work.
