Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Yadunandan
Detailed Review: Excellent room service. Tasty food and great ambiance. Loved my stay over here. Room has nice interior with comfortable beds. The floor incharge Mr. sanjay was very friendly and assisted me with everything.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Saloni Thapa
Detailed Review: It was a good cleaning service. There were timely visits from the cleaners. They cleaned the bathroom everyday and fixed other complications when necessary. Additionally they made proper replacements of necessary items when needed.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Rachit batra
Detailed Review: We experienced express check in and check out experience. Everything went extremely smooth. Smiling faces gives energy when you step in to hotel, we found it here! We really appreciate the service mindset of team holiday inn especially Mrs.Indu ,Shiksha dhillon and anoushka chhabra from front office. Loved it. Definitely gonna book another stay

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Hanish arora
Detailed Review: It was my first visit in the hotel and it was such a classic stay……beautiful rooms…….cooperative staff……. Food was good… specially thanks to Sanjay for good assistance. He was such a good guy…....  thank u very much team housekeeping……

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: C.M.Narsimha
Detailed Review: Very Good Hotel ❤️❤️🥰 All are Good specially neatness and also good Food fecility Hotel Rate rental price also very Good Services also very Good If anyone wants to stay at Delhi Aerocity choose this for excellent service Abhay from House keeping very much good

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Ayesha Verma
Review: Lunch event fantastically managed by holiday inn
Detailed Review: My event at holiday inn was managed flawlessly by their team starting with Manpreet who went out of his way to make arrangements and provide us great deals. He was constantly in touch and kept updating as per our requirements. The main day was managed with utmost perfection from food, service to ambience and decor. Everything was perfect! Thank you Munna and Manpreet was managing it soo wonderfully!

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Kyadari
Detailed Review: Best service and had a great concern from Mohit  house keeping dpt . special interest in holiday inn is yummy food  ,chefs here will try to cook exactly according to our way  we want and great staff ....

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Brindaban Sarkar
Detailed Review: Best for business stays. I always come here for work purpose and the check in was so smooth. Anoushka and Nisha specifically helped us during the entire trip. We have visited holiday inn International Airport almost 5 times and never have been disappointed here.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: The Doc
Detailed Review: Excellent hospitality of the staff including the services being provided by the house keeping staff especially of Mr. Surinder who served us throughout our stay with special attention on covid hygiene.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Manish A
Detailed Review: Great hospitality good hotel good location 100 % Value For money  Great team talk to deepak regarding reservations  He was great help definitely one want to transfer different city via delhi definitely go for holidayin

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Aman Khandelwal
Detailed Review: Anoushka is one if the sweetest employees and she took care of our entire visit. Overall experience was 5/5. I have visited this hotel so many times and not once i have been disappointed since the staff is so friendly and ecstatic.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Manish Goyal
Detailed Review: Stay was pleasant n safe. Staff was courteous n helpful. Pool has not started though. The breakfast was elaborate. The location is very apt. Proper parking with best of amenities. Will recommend to stay during covid

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Preeti Kothari
Detailed Review: We stayed here for few times. It's clean, safe, friendly hotel with excellent location.  Fair deal with excellent breakfast. The staff is very cooperative n friendly. Mr. Sobam use to clean the room n I  felt n extra care is taken to feel welcome in the room while coming from outside. Thanks  n keep it up!

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Ritu choudhary
Detailed Review: In this time of Pandemic your staff is doing a really great job to make guests happy and comfortable..hats off to al the employees working there .Especially Milan and Dev from housekeeping made my stay so comfortable that they really need an appraisal.Also the girl from in room dinning was very sweet in communication..

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: anjani r
Detailed Review: House keeping person Deepak... Very good service.. I'm am very happy with the services provided by the hotel and room service.. At one call they help with everything possible. Very happy with house keeping persons Deepak and dev.. They are very caring and kind.. All covid protocols has been followed during my 8 day stay.. That's a nice discipline.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Elroy P
Detailed Review: The staff at Holiday Inn Aerocity have been absolutely wonderful!  We have a small child with us and they all are so friendly and engaging with her. The concierges are kind, helpful and knowledgeable.  The cleaning staff on our floor (Sanjay and Ankur) have gone above and beyond for us as well.  Even the security staff are super friendly!  We would definitely recommend this hotel to family and friends!

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Pre
Detailed Review: Mohit from house keeping was really courteous and helpful. He made sure all needs were met and room was in great condition. He made the stay comfortable. Will definitely stay at holiday inn again! Amazing hotel

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Shammy
Detailed Review: It was my first visit here in this hotel and it was wonderful but only thing is that the reception  was very busy all the time when I was calling them continuously.  They didn't pick the call till one and half hour  it should be improved so that it don't happen with anyone again. Specially  thanks to housekeeping team who made my trip remarkable.  I would like to come back again.  Another thank u to Sanjay the floor incharge who was caring.  Room supply was good in quality and bed was very comfortable.  Everyday I got fresh towel and linen . Thank u team housekeeping  for making my room neat and clean.  Thank u sanjay again.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Radhey
Detailed Review: Had a good stay in holiday Innfor 3 days. The room was very clean. The cleaning team lead by Puneet did a excellent  job cleaning thr room spotless. Loved the I home provided in room didn't need to worry about forgetting charger

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Chander
Detailed Review: Best hotel in it’s category. I will recommend everyone to stay once at Hotel Holiday Inn and enjoy the hospitality.   I will definitely stay again with family.   Don’t forget to enjoy delicious food, specially beetroot  halwa.   Best wishes to all staff members.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Goutam Jain
Detailed Review: Such a wonderful stay ever all because of housekeeping who maintained my room. All the staff was very caring and helpful…. Specially thanks to sanjay the floor incharge who was very good and well behaved and well professional. Thank u team housekeeping

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: VM Reddy
Detailed Review: This is one of my many stays at this wonderful hotel. The service is superb with personalized attention at all levels. The stay is fantastic with well kept rooms and fantastic service. The hospitality is par excellence. The personal attention and the eye for minute details of Mr Sanjay, the Floor In charge is exemplary. My compliments to the team.   VM Reddy

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Vishal B
Detailed Review: I reached out to Holiday Inn, Aerocity for my son's first birthday celebration. Ms. Shivangi was very helpful and arranged everything as per my requirement. I arrived late due to heavy rains but my guests were entertained in the best manner possible in my absence. In short, I would say it was a "Great Experience"!

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Ankit M
Detailed Review: Had a delightful experience, I would like to appreciate and thank their courteous and polite staff.  Special mentions for Shivangi Arora. And Babloo they were exceptional.  Also a safe place to stay in pandemic.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Shikha R
Review: Holiday Inn Aerocity New Delhi Room No 508
Detailed Review: Happy with service of housekeeper Mr. Soban he is very helpful polite and professional,as per my experience wth other hotels i found Mr.Soban is best. Thank you for everything and All the best for ur bright and sucessfull future

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Ishita
Detailed Review: It was such a wonderful stay with the holiday inn hotel. Specially thanks to housekeeping team who maintained my room cleaning. Thank u Sanjay the floor in charge was good. The gsa puneet also was good . Thank u team housekeeping.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: nand bhatia
Detailed Review: Comfortable stay with very good quality food. Well kept rooms and courteous staff. Mr. Surender and Megh raj were very cordial and took good care of the room. The breakfast Buffet spread was sumptuous and very tasty. There is a gym which is well equipped. Swimming pool though not operational due to covid is a good size pool. Overall a good stay.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Shahnawaz Khan
Detailed Review: My stay at Holiday inn was very comfortable. This hotel is equipped with really good rooms and gentle staff. However staff at reception could be more accommodative.  Soban was responsible for our room clean up and he just maintains it perfectly well..he is nice person and made our stay comfortable.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Shivam1003
Detailed Review: Housekeeping boy Papnesh Kumar, was very helpful and committed to his work. The hotel is very well located and I had a very comfortable stay. The breakfast buffet is quite good with comfortable large seating area.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Aneesh K
Review: Celebrated Grandmother's 75th Birthday at Holiday Inn
Detailed Review: We booked a restaurant at Holiday Inn to organise our grandmother's 75th birthday. It was a big event for us and around 40 people were supposed to be there. Naturally we had very specific requirements of how the arrangements should be there, especially in terms of food, at a reasonable rate. I put my intention on the website of Holiday Inn and was reached back by Manpreet Singh, the Assistant Sales Manager. I was amazed by the way he talked and assured me of the arrangements. We had such brand range of requirements in terms of food and everything was catered. For example, some people required light food due to health reasons and it was taken care of by them. Not only that, during the event, everyone from chef to the caterers were highly friendly. They took personal care of each…

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Johnskill
Detailed Review: Great stay, I stayed here for three days, I would like to to mention the staff, very helpful and the location is the best. Ankur from housekeeping was excellent, he too pains to make our beds everyday and fresh towels everyday, Hr is a great ambassador for the property and also the girls at the reception, will def come again

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Samson D
Detailed Review: Mr. Ajay was very poliete and behaved in a very professional manner.. the is well acknowledged and deserves a kudos for a job well done! Keep up the good work team Holiday Inn Aerocity Delhi! Absolutely amazing!

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Suraj
Detailed Review: Good hospitality!!! More thankful to Mr Vashistha House keeping team for making the stay comfortable!!!  Looking forward to stay in Holiday Inn wherever I visit . Also recommend everyone to stay for better experience !!!!

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: da P
Detailed Review: The guy name Pravin has clean my room, he is so kind great service. Respectful. I am staying into room 228. Recommended his work and service. Great to have Pravin as housekeeper. Hardworking and kind person

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Anmol
Detailed Review: One of my cabin steward his name is Ajay who is very outstanding and great hospitality . Food  is awesome even all the staff in this hotel are excellent always smile in their face and positive response .

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Hetanshi
Detailed Review: Mr.Abhay from House keeping service team - most generous and gentle person I have met, his work and dedication towards it is remarkable, in terms of greeting and preparing the room from messy to crystal clear he is a gem.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Yash thakkar
Detailed Review: Such an excellent stay ever....... very helpful housekeeping team. Specially  thanks to sanjay the floor supervisor who helpes us very much . Room bed was very comfertable . Hotel staff aleays followed the xorona protocol thanks team housekeeping.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Salim
Detailed Review: I was  such an excellent stay......... rooms were very beautiful  and very neat and clean and very spacious..... special thanks to polish and  Sanjay the floor supervisor from housekeeping  who helped us very much ........ food was good... thank u team housekeeping....

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Arun shirke
Detailed Review: The services of the hotel was very good. The food quality was excellent. The staff also is very cooperative. The room service and housekeeping is also very good. We met Mr.sanjay Varma. We found here pleaaant stay.  .

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: psharma
Detailed Review: Excellent food. Clean and big rooms.  Super choise in breakfast.akways prefer this hotel for the excellent service. Soecal thanks to Mr.Manish kumar. Thanks Somnath for always take care of my requirements. A home away from home. Will alwaus prefer.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Ajitesh
Detailed Review: Very good services provided by housekeeper deepak. Everything is on time, he is maintaining social distancing, and is doing a good job overall during room services. Good luck for future endeavors. Keep up the good work.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Anil hans
Detailed Review: Room service was very good and fast. Abhijeet and Mohit from housekeeping made our stay pleasant, all the vivid protocols were followed and food from its was delicious, overall our visit was very good

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Sandeep S T
Detailed Review: Tinku did an amazing job in cleaning the room, he was humble and ask for any additional assistance needed.   He also took care of all the minute details while cleaning the room and made sure room was spotless.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: manoj
Detailed Review: Papanesh did an excellent work with room service. The other person who can't talk was good too..  Decent breakfast..would recommend.   The gym is well sanitized and good. Suggestions...try to.provode free shuttle to airport

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Sparsh Shrivastava
Detailed Review: Rooms are good, and the staff, specially Vashishth from house keeping is an amazing person.....He helped me and informed me about many terms and rules of property. Ofc. The food is great but prity costly.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Kashish
Detailed Review: The food is amazing .. Really liked the ambience at the hotel . Munna served us really well at the breakfast buffet and was very attentive throughout our breakfast at the restaurant in the morning . I really look forward for my stay next time .

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Rishabh J
Review: Staff was very good specially room  cleaning service done by puneet, food quality was also good, nice ambiance, overall amazing
Detailed Review: Staff was very good and supportive specially room  cleaning service done by puneet, food quality was also good, nice ambiance, overall amazing experience I had during my 7day stay. Recommend to everyone for such a beautiful and great experience

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Rashmi thukral
Detailed Review: Had one of my best stays at the holiday inn, aerocity. All the covid protocols were being followed. Anoushka was very amicable and friendly, she helped us with everything and the stay went smoothly. All the staff were wearing masks and the rooms were sanitised. Loved it overall.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Saima Mehta
Detailed Review: Mr Rajesh and Ms Anushka were very nice and helpful and other staff was also very friendly and helpful.All the covid precautions were followed. Wonderful experience!!😊😊 Loved the room social distancing was followed .

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Tourism at peak
Detailed Review: Had booked a deluxe room directly from the hotel reservation team and got a complementary airport pickup. Amazing hotel with courteous staff. While waiting for a checkin, Nipun from the front desk offered us water before we even asked for it. Food variety can be better for dinner, however the food provided for dinner and breakfast was amazing and did not disappoint. COVID protocols are followed all through the hotel. Definitely would recommend for a quick and comfortable stay.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Jogah
Detailed Review: Hotel services is very excellent and hotel breakfast and dinner is very nice and delicious 😋, all staff are professional and nice nature persons.but Mr.parveen is very nice nature person and polite person,and helpful person.he is helping and working in odds hours.my all experience in holiday inn hotel is good.i really like hotel.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Ramesh Raghavan
Detailed Review: Room was very well kept by Vasisht from house keeping, very spic and span and clean and sanitised.  Of course it gave great assurance during these times.  We ordered Veg Biryani which was very well made and excellently served.  The hotel maintains all covid control protocols as per the international standards.  Good and safe stay.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Pratyush
Review: Perfect location to stay when travelling to the National Capital
Detailed Review: perfectly located hotel and well connected by metro. Hotel service and facilities are top notch. Good spread during the breakfast and dinner. As the hotel is located near to the airport, no need to spend all day in the traffic to reach the airport.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Espe
Detailed Review: We stayed for a few days, and our visit was fairly pleasant. The room could use better maintenance and decor, the bathroom door stopper was almost broken and the shower coating had come off in places. The in-room dining however was a disappointment as we were told at 6am that meals were not available despite being informed the service is 24/7. The staff were well trained and polite. Ms. Shivangi at the front was especially helpful and is great at her job. Also have to commend the chef making the paneer parathas, they were the best part of the stay!

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Gurwinder B
Detailed Review: We had an excellent experience while our stay here.Highly recommend.Services were excellent sanitization was up to mark .Overall feel like home.Food was good.Room service guy Vikas was a humble person.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Abesh kannana
Detailed Review: Good and comfortable stay and enjoy  Room service is good  The breakfast is great They service is a classic type really it is enjoyable stay They follow all the covid19 protocol . It is a peaceful stay.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: bhavesh jariwala
Review: Ok hotel, not so good room services & charges extraa.
Detailed Review: This hotel needs some serious maintenance. Showerhead was broken, blindfold between bed and bathroom not worked. Room service was pathetic. I ordered water bottle and extra pillow at 9 pm but received after 3 hrs at 12 am after 4-5 times follow up call. Even I call , write sms, write we email to duty manager but no answer or email. And they charged extra at the time of check out. I have paid for 3 adult in 1 twin room with breakfast for all 7 days before check in on agoda.com. but they charged me 3rd person extraa bed. I paid for 3 adult in advance extra adult not going to sleep in same bed what's logic?.  So my advise avoid if you have other choice

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Anonymous
Detailed Review: the staff is very nice and friendly and will help you out on any problems you face during the stay be it night or day. The best experience i have had staying in a hotel in india yet, 10/10 will opt for these guys when in delhi. Thanks for a lovely stay folks, till we meet again.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Navdeep singh
Detailed Review: Review I absolutely loved the stay, I am from elite mariners. My friends and I absolutely enjoyed the stay and didn't face any issues. All the Covid protocols were being followed and Anoushka from front office helped us alot. The food was also amazing, highly recommended.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Capt Sojin S
Review: Very comfortable stay and good hospitality
Detailed Review: Had a very warm welcome and an easy check in to the hotel. The Manager, Shivangi has made our checkin very comfortable and easy  The stay was nice , warm, and the staff was very hospitable. I would recommend the hotel to my friends.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Ramya Reddy Jonnala
Detailed Review: Hospitality was really good...food was just very yummy and like every item they served was really tasty. The way they received and the way they provide with everything which we need is good. I liked it.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Ankush Verma
Detailed Review: The hotel has good ambience and people were humble. The food at restaurant was satisfactory and had ample variety of items. There were minor discomforts during the stay but they were resolved and managed effectively. The cleaning staff was good. Overall stay was more than satisfactory!!

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: ShRaDz S
Review: Transit city- a night stay hotel
Detailed Review: Good clean maintainence of the hotel,  safety protocols maintained. The booking came with breakfast and airport transfer, perfect for transit stay. Meena was very helpful and looked after us when it got busy in the check out as we were getting late for our flight.  Overall very satisfied.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Vijay Y
Detailed Review: Excellent work by FO STAFF.  KHUSHBOO was amazing with all smiles and work.  Cheers to holiday Inn.  Rooms were excellent and clean. Very cozy and comfortable stay. Easy access to world mark from holiday inn.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Abhyudaya Pandey
Detailed Review: 4.5/5  Had a great stay at the property. They follow Covid protocols very strictly. We didn't notice even minor carelessness from anyone throughout our stay of 2 days.  There were delays during the check in but their policies are drafted in such a way. Also, we were told if you ask for cutlery during the stay, it's chargeable after the 1st time.  Great breakfast buffet. Very courteous and helpful staff. Great, spacious rooms. Spotless clean property.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Manoj Jaiswal
Review: Was okay, but disappointed.. hotel room looked tired.
Detailed Review: Expected quite a lot, but was disappointed in the end. Hotel had an event that day and was overwhelmed. No communication to pickup, late late check in. Too much chaos at front desk. Had a early 10am check yet we checked in at 4.15pm. Maybe not the best day for the hotel team.. could have been better.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Laila Faisal
Detailed Review: Amazing experience! It was one of the best places! The food was amazing and so was the whole ambience. Great experience over all. One of the best hotels I have been to till date. The staff is also very nice and competent.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: IamStoryteller
Detailed Review: Holiday Inn should work on the housekeeping service as the sheets and toiletries are not replaced.The bathroom need a restoration. No bathtub, Hairdryer and the blinds weren't working. Has a wonderful view of the airport which will soon be gone due to an upcoming neighbouring project.

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: REEMA DHANJAL
Detailed Review: It's really nice to explore new property like Royal Plaza. Absolutely wonderful experience, courteous staff & everything is so hygenic.  Looking forward to more visits!! Keep growing Royal Plaz!!☺️👍👍

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Nidhi Chaudhary
Review: Special thanks to guest service associate Miss. Raviya 😊😊
Detailed Review: Such a pleasant time in this property. Really wonderful hospitality and the food was really delicious 😋 rooms were very well maintain and clean. Specially miss Raviya such a kind sweet and friendly nature person😊. She was so helpful too she guided very well.  Overall I spent lovely time there 🤗🤗🤗. Thanks to miss Raviya once again and best wishes for your bright future 😊 keep it up

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Kartikey sahu
Detailed Review: "Hotel staff is superb". They are warm, polite and helpful. Specially Ms. Rabiya. She calmly answers all queries and helps in the best possible manner. People like her make a difference. Kudos. Keep it going!

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Upendra
Detailed Review: Wonderful full satu with Hilton Saket Delhi thanks to everyone specially rabiya from from desk she Very helpful very cooperative also services are good food is tasty NYC room well maintained well groomed   once again thanks to Hilton for the lovely and awesome stay I have very enjoyable in moment  we are very happy in stay

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Abhay S
Detailed Review: Very good service…had very comfortable stay ms mohi and mr barlington helped me throughout my stay one call away… we will be recommending to my colleagues and family. Will be visiting again. Thank you so much for the stay.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Yuvraj Y
Detailed Review: Very good service and staff , ms sonia and mr deshpandey the security head and incharge has been really caring and kind, restaurant, and entire staff is great, mall access is really good ..i will be visiting soon again

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Paramjeet Kaur
Detailed Review: Nice hotel staff is cooperative thanks to Kunal and Rabiya services are good food is awesome hotel is good restaurant India grill is nice bar is nyc rooms are to good view of mall is good nyc very well

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Mohd Ashraf
Detailed Review: The stay was awesome experience from start to finish. The hotel is clean and tidy and the room was cozy with all the basic amenities.  The staff is very cooperative and friendly especially Mr. Faizan, he went out and beyond to make sure the stay was amazing.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Arvind lele
Detailed Review: Excellent help provided by the staff when a minor mishap took place. Persons from Security, FO F&B rushed to help and were very sincere in helping me overcome the trauma. I will be eternally grateful to them. May god shower his blessings on them to further their careers and in general life.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Pradeep C
Detailed Review: Awesome stay. Thanks Kunal for helping us with the best view rooms. Had a great stay and would love to come back again. Thanks for making it a memorable stay for us. Best location with connecting mall entry. Superb breakfast and dinner buffet.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Ini V
Detailed Review: The staff is very polite, rooms are perfectly cleaned and comfortable. The washroom is very clean with all the basic requirements for your comfort. Near DELF mall that is a hub for shopping, with good restaurants! No doubt that is a good decision to take this as your hotel when you come to Delhi.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Abdul Tablib ansari
Review: Hotel stay and welcome by Kunal and Rabiya
Detailed Review: The hotel stay was very good Loved the Entire stay and the welcome by Borge guys at reception Kunal and Rabiya was awesome A lovey Stay and food was awesome  ….. Will visit again for Sure Loved it …….:

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Parshav Shah
Review: Hilton Saket Delhi, a luxurious inn
Detailed Review: A pleasant and comfortable stay in the hotel amidst a pandemic. The location between two malls makes the accessibility to beautiful and luxury restaurants with the occasional shopping spree , making it unlikely for one to order room service. However missing the breakfast is a faux pax with chef ready to personalize your meal.  The flaws however include the lack of late night services which benefit those who have to travel across Delhi. A great place for someone to stay in Delhi especially if it's for work.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Girish Mulge
Detailed Review: The hotel location is awesome and the ambience is very good ...Mr Kunal and Mr Sahil at reception very generous gave me a late checkout....must visit property loved there warm gesture ... Food is awesome ...

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: DrAmrita gupta
Detailed Review: The hotel is Very good the hotel staff is also helpful The food was very .the room services are slow .reception staff like Rabiya Kunal Abhishek Sahil are very friendly ......Loved the stay will come again for sure

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Anandh
Detailed Review: Overall good stay, Good location entire staff was wonderful. Would like to mention Ms. Nabina, Mr. Faizan and Mr. Despal were extremely helpful and friendly during our stay. They suggested me the south indian Restaurant near by.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Ziyaul rehman
Detailed Review: The hotel stay was very good the food is very tasty the guys at reception like Mohi Kunal Karan are very generous. Front desk is always there to help you always answers the call..... Loved the overall stay

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: ShishirJaiswal
Detailed Review: The hotel is very good though there are some challenges But two guys at reception Karan and Kunal are very generous and they helped me throughout the stay .loved the hotel and food . Overall stay was very good .

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Joe Shope
Detailed Review: The hotel is very good loving the stay the reception staff like Kunal Karan Dilraj sahib are very helpful they are always there for requests Loved the food the chef is good Loved the warm gesture of the hotel staff

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Gracygurung

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Mridul G
Detailed Review: The room under our name was given to some other person travelling in our group or let's say the Hotel is least concern about individual's Privacy. AC's are not working in rooms or common Area's, No staff to pick luggage or guide you to your room and the Best Worst Food Quality in accordance to the Price charged.,

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: arnav jethi
Detailed Review: The overall hotel stay was awesome Good room good location stay was lovely The staff was good people like Mohi Kunal Sahil were very helpful and generous throughout the stay Whole thing was good loved it the hotel location is very good awesome hospitality

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Raja
Detailed Review: Ravi Shankar security service is good, man door security is so good, India grill restaurant is very nice and front office staff Sachin Tyagi is good near mall select city walk is 2minute walking. A great place with an excellent staff and a value for money spend.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Appu adhikari
Detailed Review: The hotel staff was very helful the reception people were very polite Karan Kunal Abhishek they all were there to help us Loved the hotel stay will come agin for sure ...The location was awesome Loved it

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Aditya jha
Detailed Review: The hotel location is very awesome Malls nearby infact the staff like Abhishek on Reception Mr Sahil Faizan Kunal Karan They all are so friendly loved the stay and hospitality.will visit again for sure

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: shilpi shukla
Review: Pretty good food and great service!
Detailed Review: I was so exhausted after riding my motorcycle that I decided to stay somewhere nearby and this was one of the best hotels I could find and trust me I don’t regret it at all! The breakfast buffet was the best out there because I’m a sucker for breakfast and it was totally worth it. The room I got was beautiful and spacious and the view was pretty good! Would love to come again!!!

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Naurus
Detailed Review: Had a very comfortable stay in Hilton garden Inn Saket, team members were very helpful,  barlington, Sonia and deshpal are very helpful in all manners.  Will recommend  my friend and family and definitely coming  back soon

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Hajiakbar
Detailed Review: The hotel stay was very good and loved the people there It was my first time in India and Reception people were very warm loved the gesture .There were some problems were reception people were there to help me Like Abhishek Karan Kunal sahil Faizan. They helped me a lot

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Hari
Detailed Review: The restaurant crew – the cooks as well as the wait staff – deserve particular praise. The dinner buffet was superb. The individuals deserve mention by name: Ravi Shankar and Deshpal from security. We would mention many other persons by name.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Mohd. Anwar
Detailed Review: I had a very comfortable stay .only problem was of muddy water but front desk team was very helpful throughout and they also apologized to me for the scenario .Mr Kunal Karan Naveena they were all very helpfull I.Loved th hotel

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Daulat Bhatiya
Detailed Review: The hotel was very good Mr Faizan Mr Kunal Sahil Naveena All hotel staff was very good Loved the stay .Mainly there was water issue but reception staff apologized for same .Loved there gesture ..Loved the  stay

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Manju Gupta
Detailed Review: Our stay was very good .Front office staff specially was very good and warming they welcomed us very pleasantly and helped us in getting good room .Loved the breakfast  Loved the whole staff .will visit for sure

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Sandeepsingh
Detailed Review: My stay at hilton was very comfortable and relaxing I was here for medical visit Mr Mayank at reception was very good Mr Kunal Sahil Naveena all we’re very generous Love the hotel and the stay.  Will come again

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Prakash Gulbani
Detailed Review: The stay at hotel was very good . They helped me in. getting a room very early and also Mr Kunal is a very generous.Mr Sahil.is also a very good guy .Loved the hotel will visit again in next few days again ..

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Sambridh
Detailed Review: It was a pleasant stay Peacefull everything was at my convenience  All people from reception were very helpful they took a quick checkout as I was getting late Loved the gesture will come again for sure

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Vishwesh Kapoor
Detailed Review: The overall stay was good ..The food was also good ..I am from a company so I travel a lot ..I have a very heartwarming experience here .The front office staff was very polite and helped me a lot .. and was always there to help me

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Raag Suri
Detailed Review: Everything was perfect .. Breakfast was good .. Mr Kunal and Karan at reception were very good and also gave us a great checkout loved the entire stay and will visit again for sure .. Love the hospitality

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: LIANNA
Detailed Review: the breakfast is very good ..FRONT office staff was very helpful and always helped us in printouts Kunal and Karan at reception were very generous AND ALWAYS LISTENED TO Our Requests. LOVE THE HOTEL very comfortable

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Tejashwi Giri
Detailed Review: I had a wonderful stay at the Hilton. The staff were very helpful. Special thanks to the security guard Sonia Deshpal. He was very sweet and welcoming. He was always ready to help and carry the luggage’s. Also a big shout out to Mr Valenton. He was in duty at the reception at night. A big thank you to him for his help. He wasn’t hesitant to helps us print out our tickets. He spoke to us very sweetly and made us feel like home.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Parshuram
Detailed Review: I was in Hotel for 1 day for medical visit The guy at reception Kunal gave me a late check out as I was in hospital  ..Loved the hospitality and there gesture .. Will visit again for sure..Everyone was helpful .Mr s SAHIL AND Karan from reception were really great.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Jugal asher A
Detailed Review: The hotel is located at a very good location and it's connectivity to mall is a very good thing The breakfast there is tasty and the staff especially front desk staff is very courteous Always helped me during stay ..

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Wardak H
Detailed Review: I was here for medical visit ...I should say amazing hospitality ..Staff at reception was very helpful and also people there like Karan Kunal ..were very friendly Assisted me for everything.. Loved there hospitality

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Sayan Mukherjee
Detailed Review: Everything was great the front office staff was very helpful .Ms Nabina Mr Kunal Mr Sahil they were all good and overall breakfast was very good ..Loved the hospitality and will visit again for sure ...

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Rahul H
Detailed Review: The breakfast was good The check-in and check-out process by Kunal and Karan were very good .. Mr Sahil helped us with bags Very generous ..Liked the rooms and also It was worth visiting here loved the whole stay lived it

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Amit Vashishtha
Detailed Review: Room was very spacious And all the staff was very good staff like Kunal Nabina Karan were very good ..Mr sahil was very good .. and was very helpful throughout the rooms ..wonderfull loved the breakfast taste .Siting problem sometime but alright.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Chinku
Detailed Review: Recently we stayed at Lemon tree  during our business trip.  This place is located in an upscale prime locality.  The interiors and ambience is simply superb.  We had very delicious food at the restaurant of the hotel.  The staff hospitality is very good there.  Appreciate all staff here for good care during our stay.  The hotel is a Master piece.  This is the best hotel to stay when u visit city

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Sneha Choudhury
Review: Extremely amazing experience and very polite and efficient employees
Detailed Review: I had to book lemon tree because of my flight delay. I was supposed to stay for one night but It got extended to four night and somehow I Loved every bit of their hospitality. Mr. Ishwar Ojha made sure that I have amazing experience and a very special mention of Mr. Shi from f&b service and Mr. Himanshu from housekeeping needs to be done. They are setting the hospitality standards very high and being from the industry I know how much work you guys do.  One again thank you for the best conversations and cheers to the memorable experience.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Hemant T
Detailed Review: Beautiful hotel with a nice maintained things I love to visit here housekeeping had done a fantastic job here I love to visit again and recommend for others also. Thank you team lemon tree for a great welcome

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: tasarrun n
Detailed Review: Mr. Himanshu and Mr. Rajveer Kumar were two of the other staffs who were extremely helpful and friendly.. These two are impeccable at their work and did an amazing job.. Especially Himanshu who is really warm and caring towards the guests .. please appreciate them on my behalf.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: PRAVIN FERNANDES
Detailed Review: Clean and good . Service was good. We group of 10 stayed in this hotel for quarantine prior travelling. Food is good. Housekeeping staff (Rajeev Kumar ) is very good, properly cleaning. All staff are helpful and cooperative. I really liked the initiative taken by the hotel such as giving jobs to people who cannot hear and speak.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Rajib Burman
Review: Business Trip in Lemon Tree Delhi
Detailed Review: I visited that hotel in August. Hotel has a nice ambiance & staffs are good except few once. Most important part now a days are safety. The house keeping staff specially vivek & Bablu yadav taking care that part very well. I am thankful to them for the safety things.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Rana S
Review: Pleasant Stay & Thanks to Mr Akash
Detailed Review: The Hotel Pleasant Stay hospitality was good. Service is good.Much thanks full of Mr Akash for treating like family . Non-Vegetarian food was good. The Hotel lemon tree was at convenience for trvaelling Other than that, everything was good. Overall, experience was good.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: mridul
Review: Amazing Experience!! Thanks To Vikas Dahiya Ji
Detailed Review: Comfortable stay, great support at front desk (Thanks To Vikas Dahiya and Kartik), Proper Car Parking Facilities, and great food! Sums up an outstanding hotel against price  A must must visit for sure, plus really near to airport.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Asen Jami
Review: Wonderful stay at the hotel with the most courteous staff
Detailed Review: Stayed for 1 night for a urgent business trip to delhi .  Last minute booking , but everything went so smoothly . While checking in I was greeted by Faizan , the manager at front desk. He was very helpful with many queries I had of the city, since I was visiting delhi for the first time.  The hotel room was very comfortable, food was delicious &  the staff were all amazing.   Thank you to all.   Will definitely come back to this hotel on my next visit. Cheers

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Rida H
Detailed Review: Had a lovely stay at the Hilton Saket. Location was very convenient. The service was prompt and Special thanks to Mr. Sahil, The Manager who was always on his toes to help. Would recommend to always stay here.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Sushanto B
Review: wonderful stay, amazing food and courteous staff
Detailed Review: I had a 3 days  stay here for a scrabble tournament. the rooms were well sanitized and cleaned. the playing area was in their bar on 2nd floor. It is really neat. the food served during lunch and breakfast which i had complementary were amazing. On request they also had tea, coffee and ice creams as well in lunch time. I am not sure who the chef is but their Kung pao chicken was absolutely drool worthy. Also i want to mention couple of people from Front desk :  Digamber (front desk ) and Deshpal (Security) . they are so well behaved and nice to speak to. couple of times i had issues with my card and they immediately corrected it. Deshpal is a wonderful guy whom u get to meet at the welcome area having a very calm and helpful demeanor and Digamber is always welcoming at the front…

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Jitendra Sahu
Detailed Review: Awesome hospitality very good staff Kunal and Sachin at reception helped me a lot in shifting rooms giving good room i was with family very warm hospitality was given very impressive loved the stay very much

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Aditya S
Detailed Review: My overall experience was very good I was very comfortable they gave me a good room and front desk staff also assisted me in printouts and Overall stay was good  A good and fast check-in was given . Appreciate the hotel .

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Anshumali Singh
Detailed Review: This was our third stay at Hilton Saket. We met Mr. Pawan Khatri in our first visit and since then we were impressed by his earnest and sincere conduct.The room was well maintained and suited well to our requirements. We had a short stay of 4 days and everything was perfect. Highly recommended. We look forward to stay there again in our future visits.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Kartik S
Detailed Review: Overall staff. Was very good the guys at reception were very friendly and overall made my stay comfortable answered calls every time and always assisted me for locations overall a very good stay. Loved it

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Lakshyagourav Moitra
Detailed Review: The stay was really comfortable and all safety precautions regarding covid were followed . The in room dining was also great and the food was amazing in taste. Will definitely look forward to another trip.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Helen Thejao
Detailed Review: Overall stay is good the staff at reception to name a few Mr Kunal Mr Karan Mr Nabina helped me throughout the stay and also made sure that I get a good room .They were very good and food is awesome overall loved the stay

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Praveen Soni
Detailed Review: Everything was fantastic we were having two rooms Kunal gave us on the same floor rooms ..Karan took a express checkout Hilton should have a staff like them ..Best stay will visit again for sure ..Happy with stayb

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Dusmanta z
Detailed Review: Exelent services  and response to the request are good and they answer calls everytime and food is good . Kunal and Karan at reception are very helpful and always help me whenever i come . Must visit hotel

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Aman Singh
Review: Perfect Stay! HGI New Delhi Saket
Detailed Review: Had Fantastic Stay With Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi Saket Always Like To Stay With Hilton Hospitality Thanks To Lovely Service Of The Team Very Peaceful And Nice Stay Little Bit Disappointed With Restaurant Opening Hours Other Then That All Is Well It's A True Sample Of Excellent Hospitality. Next Time Will Visit Soon To You All Lovely Guys.  Thanks To Shyamveer,Bhuwan And Miss Manju (HSK) , Mr Sahil And Karandeep (FO) , Mr Deshpal (Security) And Mr Ravindra (Eng) Thanks To You All Lovely Guys .

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: TanyaSood
Detailed Review: Had a nice pleasant stay with Hilton for a week.  The staff is amazing there. Housekeeping is great especially shyam veer.  Breakfast spread is worth 5 stars. Dinner buffet is outstanding. Quality of food overall is perfect.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: vimalthakur
Detailed Review: Overall stay was good . All the protocols of covid are followed at reception . Breakfast was very good . Kunal at front desk helped me give me a mall side room . The hospitality by every member was amazing

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Vikram aditiya
Detailed Review: I was there till 16 july the hotel staff did a very good job in making me feel like home . There was a guy Kunal at reception he always took care about us on every call and also was strict on covid norms .I appreciate. Hotel's serious Ness about covid .

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Nikhil Sharma
Detailed Review: Had an amazing stay at Hilton. Mr Faizan helped us so much in the booking and made it look so easy. Ms Nabeena and Mr karan provided us the best hospitality and helped us through. There was Mr Ravi in the security who guided us through the entry and was so polite. I will surely visit again because the environment was so homely. Also in this pandemic situation, it felt so safe as everything was so sanitized and clean. I'm positively giving Hilton a 5 star.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Puja611
Detailed Review: It was a pleasant stay with my family. Clean and hygienic  rooms. Tasty food . But valet parking was not available so this was inconvenient for us . Staff were polite and professional.I think hotel should work on valet parking problem

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Vishwanath Rao
Detailed Review: I felt here , my another home, all staff treated me like a family member My all best wishes for all team members who are taking care in this situation, very politely , Special Thanx to Mr.Ajeet who helped me lott . Best of luck all of you guys

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: komalagarwal704
Detailed Review: The staff's enthusiasm, motivation and hardwork is evident. Really amazing staff from house keeping, breakfast, security, drivers, reception, guards, to management. If I start naming all the good staff I met, it is possible that none of the Hilton staff might be left out! This great was my experience at the hotel! Some of the friendly staff names I would like to mention are Manju, Deshpal Singh, Pawan, Sahil Joshi, Atiraj, Ashish, great job everyone!  I came here in June 2021 and I am staying here for 14 days, my 7 days here so far have been great! The hotel is rigorously following COVID-19 safety measures. The staff also helped me with information regarding nearby places, places open during covid, safety in the surrounding areas, sim card etc. Thank you entire Hilton staff.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Sarthak
Detailed Review: Had the best experience since this pandemic, my stay was so comfortable, the room was clean, staff was also Hospitable specially the girl at reception named meena was very Hospitable. Thank you for hosting me.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Bipasha
Detailed Review: I had visited the hotel with my family. Despite it being a weekend with the hotel running at its full capacity, the COVID-19 safety protocol was followed really well by staff and the visitors. We enjoyed the breakfast buffet- the quality of the food was excellent.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Ramesh Ahuja
Detailed Review: A nice place with a good ambience and good staff staff was helpful and was nice. Had a nice stay here will be recommending this place to all of my friends. Staff was experienced and absolutely worth a money place

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Naina
Detailed Review: Quality of room was amazing and clean...  Essential items provided were also of good quality... Must visit for a comfortable and cozy stay there along with an amazing view .  Loved to stay and looking forward to stay again.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Vijay V
Detailed Review: Right from checking in to check out everything was flawless, welcoming and very cooperative staff. Best hygiene practice ever, food was awesome,breakfast had a good layout, the entire staff ensured we are taken care of

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Michael F
Detailed Review: I had arrived at the hotel very early in the morning and in need of a rest from traveling. The staff on duty were phenomenal. The manager arranged for a late checkout to allow me to get some much needed rest. Thank you very much for your assistance.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Nardev singh
Detailed Review: Staff is good n co operative,i stayed for quarantine so cant say abt the food varieties..but what was served to me was good...n hygienic.cleanliness is good. Safety measures are also good. Keep it up and provide discount for yr regular customers.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Jyoti Vishal C
Detailed Review: I really love this place. Room was nice and Special thanks to Mr Shashank at reception and Mr Dheeraj from restaurant for the service and hospitality. I would love to come back again . 🙏🙏. Thank u every one.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Madhavi
Detailed Review: My stay was comfortable. I really appreciate a warm welcome and much attentive towards individual customer and excellent service provided by Dheeraj  - food and beverage coffee shop team. Gurbir, from Sales steam ensured my stay has a comfortable seamless experience. Look forward to stay soon with the hotel.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Nandi i pahwa
Review: Delighted with the hospitality and Ambiance
Detailed Review: Much appreciated ... What a service in this pandemic  The stay here has been amazing with great servers, waiters and overall staff!!  The dining room reception staff are absolute sweethearts and have been nothing but kind to us!                                                                                                                     The Service and Hospitably were also truly amazing.  Definitely Recommended on each and every aspect. There is nothing that I could ask for more.   Well done and keep it up.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Anoushka C
Detailed Review: Absolutely loved the stay, can’t wait to visit again!!!! 🥺 The staff was so sweet and kind, and everything was so hygienic even during the middle of a pandemic. I’m really happy with the stay and I will definitely recommend others to stay here!

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Suru
Detailed Review: I had an amazing experience. The staff at front desk was very professional and all the protocols were followed. The rooms were clean and loved the food here. It’s totally recommended for anyone who is thinking to stay over here

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Sanyam Chawla
Detailed Review: The stay was amazing and hospitality was up to the mark. I’d give a 10 on 10 in every department. The seevice provided was good and I had a very comfortable stay. All the staff was well behaved. Overall the experience was worth it.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Kaushal Jha
Detailed Review: Don't ruin such a big Brand for minor services.  Pathetic hotel I have ever seen in my life who charge for ice bucket and cover to a Inhouse Guest. Rooms are small. Service takes time.   All over my weekend has been ruined, i guess I have made a mistake for Booking Holiday Inn.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: anil moses
Detailed Review: It has been almost 4 years, since all of our guests are staying at holiday inn and main reason being, Mr. Shailendra (Reservation executive). Special thanks to him not only from me but from all our guests. He is the guy who helped us with seamless reservations for our rooms since the very first time.   Rest of other staff, I would mention Pranjal, Vicky, Rahul, Somnath, Rajesh and each one of them from security to front desk, housekeeping and restaurant. Helpful, friendly staff that go above and beyond to make sure we have the best time. You all make a great team. Now about the hotel, I have no hesitation in saying that absolutely outstanding, best hotel perfectly located in Delhi Aerocity area with nice, clean and spacious rooms, excellent service. Food is just fabulous;…

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Maninder Attri
Detailed Review: Beautiful place , with fantastic ambiance  Staff is really cooperative  Mr Himanshu did really excellent job  I liked most chicken lehsuni tikka  In this COVID situation hotel did all safety measures I liked that

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Nitesh K
Detailed Review: The experience was very bad. Far from satisfying. Prepaid for the room. Room was not prepared when I entered. Room had insects. One lamp was on all night even after switching the main off. It took 20 mins for the staff to get luggage from the room during checkout.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Jack N
Detailed Review: Kind and humble staff . Food was amazing . Joyful stay. Thank you for the lovely hospitality. Kudos to the team of holiday inn Delhi..... Abhishek and pravin from House keeping team had always been helpful and kind whenever needed... Thank you Team Holiday inn !!!!!!

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Tejwant S
Detailed Review: I would like to thanks the entire Holiday team for their wonderful hospitality , Special thanks to Atul from IRD , Simran from front office and Angad from security for making everything very smooth and making it a memorable one .......Kudos team.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Pankaj
Detailed Review: We have been staying in Holiday Inn, from last couple of days. I would say the hotel is quite well but the best part is hotel staff, they are well trained to make your stay comfy. I'm not certain about their names but the Gentleman in Front Office who took our Check in, he is very polite and well managed even in the rush...

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: ADITYA KATOCH
Review: Best Value for Money at Holiday inn
Detailed Review: I had previously been to a lot of Hotels before but the service what I received here was really exemplary and personalised.Since u enter the hotel in Security and then from Reception, Housekeeping and In Room dining made my stay memorable.Would highly recommend the Hotel if you are planning to stay in Aerocity..Ms.Shivangi from Sales was very friendly and helpful.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Monisha
Detailed Review: I went  with my family for a dinner few days back ..  referenced from one of my friend .. we had a great time together  .. nice ambiance.. food was  great .. great hospitality .. would love to go again ..

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv

You all made our day . Thanks a lot .
