Detailed Review: The stay was really comfortable and all safety precautions regarding covid were followed . The in room dining was also great and the food was amazing in taste. Will definitely look forward to another trip.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Helen Thejao
Detailed Review: Overall stay is good the staff at reception to name a few Mr Kunal Mr Karan Mr Nabina helped me throughout the stay and also made sure that I get a good room .They were very good and food is awesome overall loved the stay

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Praveen Soni
Detailed Review: Everything was fantastic we were having two rooms Kunal gave us on the same floor rooms ..Karan took a express checkout Hilton should have a staff like them ..Best stay will visit again for sure ..Happy with stayb

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Dusmanta z
Detailed Review: Exelent services  and response to the request are good and they answer calls everytime and food is good . Kunal and Karan at reception are very helpful and always help me whenever i come . Must visit hotel

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Aman Singh
Review: Perfect Stay! HGI New Delhi Saket
Detailed Review: Had Fantastic Stay With Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi Saket Always Like To Stay With Hilton Hospitality Thanks To Lovely Service Of The Team Very Peaceful And Nice Stay Little Bit Disappointed With Restaurant Opening Hours Other Then That All Is Well It's A True Sample Of Excellent Hospitality. Next Time Will Visit Soon To You All Lovely Guys.  Thanks To Shyamveer,Bhuwan And Miss Manju (HSK) , Mr Sahil And Karandeep (FO) , Mr Deshpal (Security) And Mr Ravindra (Eng) Thanks To You All Lovely Guys .

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: TanyaSood
Detailed Review: Had a nice pleasant stay with Hilton for a week.  The staff is amazing there. Housekeeping is great especially shyam veer.  Breakfast spread is worth 5 stars. Dinner buffet is outstanding. Quality of food overall is perfect.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: vimalthakur
Detailed Review: Overall stay was good . All the protocols of covid are followed at reception . Breakfast was very good . Kunal at front desk helped me give me a mall side room . The hospitality by every member was amazing

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Vikram aditiya
Detailed Review: I was there till 16 july the hotel staff did a very good job in making me feel like home . There was a guy Kunal at reception he always took care about us on every call and also was strict on covid norms .I appreciate. Hotel's serious Ness about covid .

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Nikhil Sharma
Detailed Review: Had an amazing stay at Hilton. Mr Faizan helped us so much in the booking and made it look so easy. Ms Nabeena and Mr karan provided us the best hospitality and helped us through. There was Mr Ravi in the security who guided us through the entry and was so polite. I will surely visit again because the environment was so homely. Also in this pandemic situation, it felt so safe as everything was so sanitized and clean. I'm positively giving Hilton a 5 star.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Puja611
Detailed Review: It was a pleasant stay with my family. Clean and hygienic  rooms. Tasty food . But valet parking was not available so this was inconvenient for us . Staff were polite and professional.I think hotel should work on valet parking problem

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Vishwanath Rao
Detailed Review: I felt here , my another home, all staff treated me like a family member My all best wishes for all team members who are taking care in this situation, very politely , Special Thanx to Mr.Ajeet who helped me lott . Best of luck all of you guys

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: komalagarwal704
Detailed Review: The staff's enthusiasm, motivation and hardwork is evident. Really amazing staff from house keeping, breakfast, security, drivers, reception, guards, to management. If I start naming all the good staff I met, it is possible that none of the Hilton staff might be left out! This great was my experience at the hotel! Some of the friendly staff names I would like to mention are Manju, Deshpal Singh, Pawan, Sahil Joshi, Atiraj, Ashish, great job everyone!  I came here in June 2021 and I am staying here for 14 days, my 7 days here so far have been great! The hotel is rigorously following COVID-19 safety measures. The staff also helped me with information regarding nearby places, places open during covid, safety in the surrounding areas, sim card etc. Thank you entire Hilton staff.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: vikash ch. roy
Detailed Review: Here in this hotel the guys who is dumb & deaf is hardworking & really I am thankful to the persons thought who engage them for their smart work. In this way I appreciate this noble cause which is really admirable for all of us.. Really it's amazing.. Few guys are obedient & very sincere.. They are performing their responsibilities within their periphery what they can do.. One of the guy of housekeeping Mr. Awadhesh kumar is hard working & sincere about his work.. I am really cool here & admire all the team of Lemon Tree for their kind gesture for their beautiful thoughts of incorporation of these guys in their premises with all the perks.. With best wishes always..

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Sushila D
Detailed Review: A few months ago me and my wife looking for a dinner plan . Coincidentally it was my wife birthday on 31st July and i decided to have dinner at Citrus cafe. I contacted their telephone and booked a table there with the help of Mr. Neeraj Kumar and then in night we reached at venue and got the table. The staff specially Mr. Neeraj Kumar made are dinner all the more better with all the pempering. The food was really good mainly pasta ( my favourite dish). Covid protocols and masking religiously followed. The hospitality shown by Citrus cafe and Mr. Neeraj Kumar in particular along with the staff at restaurant made us want to come again.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Bhawana
Detailed Review: Awesome hotel with good welcoming.  We went at hotel on 24 July and we got great support from From desk team as we met with front office manager Vikas dhaiya who was very nice and  professional he helped us to provide the room which is on runway  face and my kid enjoyed a lot.  Also in night the resturent was closed as we were little late and my family was hungry then I went to reception then explain  the situation then Mr Vikas again helped us and served some food in our room. Thats my so nice.  IF Any customer get this kind of loveable support from hotel then i would say everyone to visit Lemon tree and get the great experience.  I LIKED ALL THE FOOD IN BUFFET. WILL COME AGAIN WITH MY FAMILY.  THANKS AGAIN TO ALL THE FRONT DESK Team and Mr Vikas dhaiya.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Prabhjeet singh
Review: Exceptional and world class services. Must visit
Detailed Review: As always quick fast and reliable services. Have been there multiple times, politeness of staff, quality of food, arrangements on demand are on your finger tips. Must visit to experience the exceptional services.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Jaykrishna Pareek
Review: Food quality and variety is seriously reduced.
Detailed Review: I’ve always loved to stay here but it was my first visit post pandemic and food quality and variety is really reduced. All staff are very friendly no doubt and they make all efforts with available resources. Lemontree was known for the quality of food they serve. It is not up to standard now and it’s a cause of concern for future visits

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Vijay
Detailed Review: Starting with The food and the service was excellent we enjoyed the ambience as well as the service provided by the staff and the chef  Regarding the room service we were happy to see the cleaning being done with efficiency by the staff and their lovely service with always good simile on their face  As regards the Lobby is concerned we received good receptions and again the staff was very cooperative We would.lieky ot hank the following Team members Mr Pankaj Mr Sartaj Chef Rajender Mr Ravi Mr Akash Ms Shweta Ms Deepa Mr Aatish Ràwat Mr Vijay Mr Dev Mr Amit Singh Mr Jasdeep Mr Lokesh Mr Manish  Mr Virender  Sincere thanks to everyone for taking care of us

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Atul K
Detailed Review: I have been going to Lemon tree for personal and business visitations for quite some time now. The visits were always arranged by Rohit Bhandari and I am very pleased with the support and assistance. Ambience is really good and food tastes perfect All in all I would recommend this hotel to all

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Swati
Detailed Review: Amazing services and professional attitude of F&B staff. Nice gesture by providing the breakfast in room before time. Special mention to the staff Mr. Ishwar. Thanks to Lemon tree hotel and would love to come back again.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Shekhar C
Review: Impressive visit at Lemon tree premiere ,Airport
Detailed Review: I was visited on last weekend with our office friends and once we entered then we received nice welcome from front office and the staff was very cooperative. Room was spacious,outside view was nice,  Liked the breakfast,lunch and dinner.   Would like to personally Thanks to Mr Vikas Dahiya who brief each details about our room stay, food,near good location to see and in the night time when  we needed some support and in a single call he was  there for help. I really like the way he interact and talked with the customer.its was very professional and polite.  So again thanks for extended support Mr Vikas Dahiya.  Regards, Shekhar

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Muvafaq S
Review: Good hotel but highly under staffed
Detailed Review: I stayed at Lemon Tree aerocity for 10 days. Though the stay was comfortable and staff were courteous, the hotel and it's restaurant (citrus cafe) is highly understaffed. There's always long queue at check in, checking out, accessing lift, getting breakfast etc etx. You can be assured to win a lottery elsewhere, if the in-room dining department attends your call.   Otherwise, everything is nice.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Hem Singh
Detailed Review: For me it's like my home for some time because i have stayed for almost 15 days. Services are absolutely up to the mark. And specially i am very much happy and satisfied with the housekeeping service by Mr. Vivek.  His nature and way of talking is very polite. I just can give you guys an advice please don't loose such people at any cost. And Keep it up 👍

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Nithyanand M
Detailed Review: Two days back I stayed in this hotel.. Really a bad experience in the front office. at front office STAFF MR HIMANSHU is not fit for front office.  I  tried to contact front office Manager..that also failed..I waited nearly 15 minutes..he is not there.    Restaurant is very nice.. Breakfast is excellent.   Rooms are good..

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: JM s
Review: Always excellent...must visit hotel in aerocity at delhi airport
Detailed Review: Always wonderful to be here ....years n years are passing and I always feel like home in this hotel. Hotel staff is very courteous and helpful in all aspects. Very well maintained in covid tough times and best part is warmth n hospitality is still the same. Special thanks to Mr. Rohit Bhandari...Excellent HOTEL MANAGER with great interpersonal skills.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Omshree
Detailed Review: Excellent food,  nice rooms  everything perfect.... thanks for making my stay so great expecially the buffet dinner organised by team of chefs Rajendra and Dhairybinations, the variations of daily menu the combination of item everything perfect

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: SHIVA CHARAN
Detailed Review: Chef dhairya and chef Rajendra  Team is good and very docile  Over all hotel facilities are top notch and surrounding environment is also good I suggest that it is a wonderful place to stay in Delhi with your and friends

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Dr Anuj Jain
Review: Hotel Hilton Garden Inn. Saket, New Delhi
Detailed Review: I stayed at the Hilton Garden Inn along with my wife and daughter. As always our stay was amazing. We love to get away from our routine and stay here. The hotels proximity to two grand malls is terrific and you can actually try out various restaurants and shopping at leisure which you wouldn't otherwise. Another reason why you would love it here is the friendly staff who go out of their way to make your stay comfortable and personally look after your needs. The breakfast is stupendous catering to all types of taste buds. I wish to specifically mention the following officers who are polite and keep the Hilton flag flying high...Pavan Khatri, Sahil Joshi of Front Office, Saurabh F&B, Ex Chef Vineet and Deepak at the Fiery Grill. The restaurant staff really take pains to get the…

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Abhishek S
Detailed Review: Excellent staff at the reception. Extremely warm and hospitable.  They went above and beyond.  Kunal and Karandeep were exceptional.   I would love to return to this property because of the staff working here and making this place a home away from home.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: laroiasanju
Review: Stinking rooms. Bad on Hilton Standards
Detailed Review: We just checked into Hilton Garden. The rooms given to us were stinking. Smoke smell. Rotten smell. Horrible. Even after informing front desk no solution. They tried to freshen it up but all in Vain. Highly avoidable.it’s really disappointing to see such rooms from Hilton.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: bishal
Detailed Review: We were in Delhi for a medical visit. We stayed at this hotel for 3 days. The biggest problem with this hotel is that you can smell cigarette smoke everywhere except the reception area. No matter which floor or room you choose , you can smell the same. The front office staff tried to help by giving us few choices in rooms, but that did not help to someone like me who is borderline allergic to cigarette smoke. We checked out and moved to Sheraton for the remaining 10 days and boy that hotel was haven compared to Hilton... much nicer overall, much updated and far better rooms for about the same price.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Rishikesh
Detailed Review: It's too good, with plush, comfy rooms, excellent service and cleanliness.. Maintaining proper social distancing norms, loved stay here and would recommend in future too.. Mr.Kunal at reception was very helpful, Mr. Shyambir was very kind and helpful and rest of the Hilton team too.. Kudos to the team.. Keep up ur good work

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Gurjot S
Detailed Review: The location and rooms are good. But a definate praise to the hotel staff who are very friendly and helpful , especially Ms Muri and main food manager Mr Chandna in-charge of restaurant and in room dining who are doing a great job in customer care and satisfaction. Also in these COVID times the place is kept neat and sanitized by Mr Ashish and mr raghuvendra who are in charge of housekeeping. And the boys giving room service for food are always taking care of covid precautions. Great job guys.👍

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Hina Kausar
Detailed Review: This hotel is great ...be it facilities be it staff service everything about this hotel makes it special ....this is my 4th stay in this hotel and every time i feel honoured to be here .... this time Ashish was there in my service and he really did a great job I would like to thank him and other staff as well everyone is perfect in what they do... I highly recommend this hotel

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: raghvendra b
Detailed Review: Pleasant stay and very spacious room. Excellent housekeeping done specially by Ashish and his supervisor Raghvendra. Fast room service and very good and humble behaviour of all the staff. No issues during entire stay.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Thivakar
Review: Consider this review to become good
Detailed Review: I will be feel great full to be here if you make more south Indian dishes. My kind request is please reduce the laundry charge. It seems more than purchasing the new cloth.  New things at Hilton is staff's reply and securities responses specialy Mr.deeshpal and receptionist Mr.faisan and Mr.Gunal.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Akanksha
Detailed Review: I had brilliant stay in Hilton all staff members are very polite and humble especially Mr Deshpal Mr Barlington and housekeeper,Mr Shyaamveer. All staff members are very punctual.they all go above and beyond to make your stay comfortable

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Sukanya Jana
Detailed Review: The environment was very overwhelming. Each and every staff was so welcoming. In security there were Mr Deshpal and Mr Ravi who had this friendly, professional nature then there were Mr Faizan in the front desk who helped us in the booking. Also, I came across Mr Berlington, Mr Tajamul and Mr Digambar who helped us to assist in our room which naturally showed their welcoming nature. Whenever there was any need in Food and Beverage entirely during our stay, Ms Muri helped us and provided the best service. Apart from this covid situation, the room was so clean and sanitized that you don't have to worry about anything there, so I'm thankful for such an amazing housekeeping department. Basically each and every employee was great in their work and I really enjoyed my stay there and…

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Mayank Khedia
Detailed Review: I had an amazing stay. The location of the hotel was very good. All the good restaurants were so close by and so were the shopping places. The guy at the reception Kunal was very professional , polite and very helpful.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Avishi S
Detailed Review: Had a great stay at the property. Especially during the time of Covid protocols were strictly followed which is remarkable for such a busy hotel. Special thanks  to Ms Meena for handling everything so efficiently. Thank you team Holiday Inn for giving us such beautiful memories .

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Seema Chhabra
Detailed Review: Located in Aerocity, gives you a vacation vibe when you visit this hotel.  Top Notch Cleanliness.  Supportive Staff. Rooms are big with all facilities.  Best Benifit - Close to Airport.  Covid protocols strictly followed by the staff.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: DR VINAY C
Detailed Review: Amazing property… clean and hygienic. Covid protocols were followed which made us feel safe.Food was awesome.. service is up to the mark.. very helpful and quick. Every request was promptly answered.. great experience will be back soon.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: DIL KHAN
Review: Short stay before keep on  flying
Detailed Review: Comfortable and helpful place  between flight. Good diner well served. Room was clean and relax and comfortable bed. Very good shower hot water after stressing day of travel.. restaurant team was good .. they serve good food. Only we were missing service they have before for dropping to the airport.  Thank you

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Vijender
Detailed Review: I travelled to Delhi in the last week of June and stayed at Holiday Inn for one week.Rooms are large with all the required amenities .All safety measures in place .Friendly and very professional staff.Hotel offers an lavish buffet spread with cuisine all over the globe. Overall an awesome experience.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Ashwani
Review: Excellent Hotel, great location and amazing services
Detailed Review: Really great location and amazing services, especially in covid era..... Clean rooms and good service.... staff was very helpful and even helped for early check in and airport drop.  Food was also great

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Pranav Sharma
Detailed Review: I am my family had a pleasant experience during our stay in holiday inn. I upgraded to a suite class upon advise as I my wife and our 2 kids were supposed to stay.  The suite was excellent and all services including in-dining experience was best. Breakfast however is not so great when compared with other hotel in similar category.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Amit kumar
Detailed Review: My booking information has been revealed to third person by hotel staff as he was a known to them. How can someone provide your booking details like room no, check in and check out timings and with whom i stayed . They have given my invoice to him.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Mohan
Review: Good Stay and Elaborate and Tasty Break Fast
Detailed Review: Good stay, Ambience   was excellent , Had awesome break fast , Room was very much specious . All good , only I had an issue of check in , it took much time , I think that day hotel was full, may the reason. Rest all I had a good stay. I fully recommend this hotel for others

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Akhil Manocha
Detailed Review: Good place to stay but Still need to improve on the behaviour of the staff and service like denial for a table at the restaurant, delay room service for basic necessities, not proper room ready (dental kit was not present) , on even calling gave after 2 hours of check in.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Unni
Detailed Review: Phone in room didnt worked. I changed room I was happy that phone worked so I can order food but nobody pick call at restaurant.I sleep hungry and in morning also I didn't got breakfast because nobody is picking up phone on other side.   Note: I didn't want to take breakfast at restaurant because of COvid policy  Unni sharma

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Dia
Detailed Review: Fabulous what else to expect from Holiday Inn, we had a wonderful experience enjoying both dinner and breakfast during our stay. It has that laid-back chill vibe which I love. From arrival to leaving the property our experience was amazing everything was as expected from this world famous hotel. This needs to be experienced by all and looking forward to our next stay

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Rony
Detailed Review: It was our best trip in delhi.. we spend 2 days only at the hotel not going outside because hotel room and location very good.. very clean.. staff is very educated and profesnal.. everthing is good feel 7 start hotel at very low price..

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Soul Traveller
Detailed Review: Overall the stay was good. But I faced issues on my 3rd day of stay. I had to make multiple calls for room cleaning service and they took 2.5 hours to finally send someone from housekeeping. At one point of time, a lady from housekeeping even told us that we need to vacate the room in order to get it cleaned, this was quite strange.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: suryaprakash t
Detailed Review: I stayed @ Holiday inn for 4 days ..the stay was fantabulous ...received great hospitality and felt home..entire thing was upto the mark...from security to housekeeping staff all were humble n soft spoken...mr.panjal specially was my pick for assisting me.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Dapinder
Detailed Review: Amazing stay - favorite place in Delhi to stay! Staff is highly cooperative and helpful . We have stayed here multiple times and there has never been a bad experience. The  Location of the hotel is also perfect!

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Priyanka biswas
Detailed Review: the services are very late specially with housekeeping. some how had a repeated again and again about the package details. Not with happy with reservation team. for package menu is very less. bed is not comfortable as i stayed in suite. washroom and lounge room is good . colors of room are shabby, so it may give you feel isolated.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Vikhyat V
Review: A good team makes the difference
Detailed Review: Conveniently located near the airport with a free one way Airport Transfer for IHG members.   Checking in was a delight with Ashish who not only ticked all the boxes by the book, not only was he courteous, warm and friendly, he was quite professional. An asset to the team.   I did not have very long to stay at the hotel as there was an early morning flight to catch,  asked reception asking for a wake up call, baggage transport and airport transfer. The call was taken by Simran , who later checked me out. Very professional and courteous.   Arup the manager at the Front office has been quite responsive with my requests.  I wish the hotel and the team well. Will definitely return and plan to stay here on my next visit.  Will strongly recommend the hotel for transit passengers and…

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Ankit Sharma
Detailed Review: Happy to  stay in holiday inn got a good deal of early chexk in 10 am package with free airport transfer  Rooms were neat and clean  Good for family friends and couples  Stayed two times  No problems  Would recommend this property near Delhi airport .

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Pawan Gandhi
Detailed Review: Pathetic experience we had as we booked holiday Inn near intl airport for two days in which we felt that was our mistake to stay there as staff was not cooperative as one day we bought food from outside and asked to microvave that and they did that but next day when we said to heatup our food nisha one of there staff and manager told us that it was impossible to microvave our food so they are not cleared of there policies and they are not sticking to there rules also when we asked for some medicine for headache they said we don't have this is a mandatory facility for emergency and also many things were there which were not good so don't stay here it's a waste of money

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Nemoleo69
Detailed Review: Great location , polite and efficient staff. I has a layover at delhi of 14 hrs and the hotel arranged it seamlessly and made it a pleasent experience.  Great rooms with good views   Will like to come back

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Ravi D
Detailed Review: My booking was through MakeMyTrip but though overall experience was ok the most annoying part is evey item we ordered for in room dining they insisted on payment instantly for as small amount as 500 rs.We paid 6000 rs upfront as deposit but ever since it was used they insisted on such payments then and there.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Monty
Detailed Review: I booked holiday inn New Delhi aerocity for one night through booking.com I reached property around 2:10 pm , while doing check in formalities the front office team asked for extra charges of Rs 500 for early check in nd refused to give me room before 3 pm though rooms were available   Worst experience  Book any hotel in aerocity all hotels are good apart holiday inn

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Amreen Arun
Detailed Review: Wonderful place to stay. Enjoyed their hospitality for a week.  Out of 5, I would give Guest service:4 Room cleaniness:5 Food:5 WiFi:5 Space:5 Price:5  Very affordable and justified as per price. Rooms are big. WiFi is complementary and good.  Amazing thing is being soundproof. It's near airport but not a single sound.  In room dining responsible Mr. Rohit is very polite and soft spoken person. Any special requests he will definately consider.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Dr Anuj Jain

Another reason why you would love it here is the friendly staff who go out of their way to make your stay comfortable and personally look after your needs. Detailed Review: We just checked into Hilton Garden. The rooms given to us were stinking. Smoke smell. Rotten smell. Horrible. Even after informing front desk no solution. They tried to freshen it up but all in Vain. Highly avoidable.it’s really disappointing to see such rooms from Hilton.

The front office staff tried to help by giving us few choices in rooms, but that did not help to someone like me who is borderline allergic to cigarette smoke. I highly recommend this hotel

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: raghvendra b
Detailed Review: Pleasant stay and very spacious room. Excellent housekeeping done specially by Ashish and his supervisor Raghvendra. Fast room service and very good and humble behaviour of all the staff. No issues during entire stay.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Thivakar
Review: Consider this review to become good
Detailed Review: I will be feel great full to be here if you make more south Indian dishes. My kind request is please reduce the laundry charge. It seems more than purchasing the new cloth.  New things at Hilton is staff's reply and securities responses specialy Mr.deeshpal and receptionist Mr.faisan and Mr.Gunal.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Akanksha
Detailed Review: I had brilliant stay in Hilton all staff members are very polite and humble especially Mr Deshpal Mr Barlington and housekeeper,Mr Shyaamveer. All staff members are very punctual.they all go above and beyond to make your stay comfortable

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Sukanya Jana
Detailed Review: The environment was very overwhelming. Each and every staff was so welcoming. In security there were Mr Deshpal and Mr Ravi who had this friendly, professional nature then there were Mr Faizan in the front desk who helped us in the booking. Also, I came across Mr Berlington, Mr Tajamul and Mr Digambar who helped us to assist in our room which naturally showed their welcoming nature. Whenever there was any need in Food and Beverage entirely during our stay, Ms Muri helped us and provided the best service. Apart from this covid situation, the room was so clean and sanitized that you don't have to worry about anything there, so I'm thankful for such an amazing housekeeping department. Basically each and every employee was great in their work and I really enjoyed my stay there and…

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Mayank Khedia
Detailed Review: I had an amazing stay. The location of the hotel was very good. All the good restaurants were so close by and so were the shopping places. The guy at the reception Kunal was very professional , polite and very helpful.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Ayushi Bhardwaj
Detailed Review: Lemon tree Hotel at aerocity made me feel completely at home. The rooms are beautiful and clean and spacious and the staff is super friendly. Team members were super quick and helpful. I had a wonderful time. I'll be sure to return .   Thankyou for the great stay

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Harresh chhabra
Detailed Review: I visited thrice Lemon tree Atrocity and it was a great experience to be there. Mr. Mandeep from management staff He is nice guy. He helped us lot. We feel privilege due to him. Food is awesome served by them also presentation of food 🍲is very very good.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Kamid M
Detailed Review: Awesome services, Good food and nice comfy rooms  Best job is they hired the deaf and dumb people in a five star ✨ chain and they were doing job best in class. And I'm highly obliged with hospitality of Mr. Mandeep, who is available everytime.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Akash
Detailed Review: This is also great hotel in Aero city even you can use for daily use room superb services this is a four-star property but they will provide you five-star services you don’t feel like you staying in four star you feel like you staying in five-star special Big thanks to Mr Rajesh Dagar 👌👌👌👌 m

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Chauhan03
Detailed Review: Our stay was absolutely amazing!  Ishwar ojha specially took very good care of us. Top most level of hospitality shown by lemon tree. I truly believe that hospitality is at its best when it's personalized and that's what Ishwar ojha portrayed.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: V.P.V.Yugka Murrthy
Detailed Review: Great Hospitality Great Service Enjoyed Royal Service from Whole Team  Pankaj Vijay Ishwar Chef Vipin Special Thanks to Dosa Maker even in the pandemic situation they are working hard and treating Every Guest Like Kings Hats off Team Lemon Tree

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Sukh
Detailed Review: Everything was very comfortable, i would specifically thank Ishwar,Chef Brijesh,Rabia,sumit,kapil,mandeep, they really helped a lot in everything, made my stay amazing. The room and restaurant ambience was beautiful.Good going keep it up.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: abbot v
Detailed Review: Would like to mention  Karthik and rajesh of hotel lemon tree were warm welcoming and helped for an easy checkin .  Appreciable services keep it up  The rooms were clean and well sanitised good Management

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Ankit Yadav
Review: Transport and food quality not up to the mark
Detailed Review: I was stay 2 times in last 15 days .Really very bad experience. Mr. vikas on transport desk doing very bad job .I already informed to travel desk before departure of my aircraft from Lko dispite this I waited around more than 1 hour . Really disgusting . I think their shef don’t know how to cook paneer sbji because they used same gravy in all the dish .  Please search better option in aerocity , DELHI .

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: A Traveller
Review: Amazing place to stay with supportive and polite staff
Detailed Review: Amazing place to stay and relax.    The good :  Very kind, polite and professional staff. I would like to mention Mr. Deepak and Ms. Mourrey in the dining area. Both of them tok so much care right from food selection and servings.   Prompt staff at reception door Mr. Barlington, Mr. Ram Shankar and Mr. Deshpad. They are so alert and vigilant that you don’t have to worry about entry n exit once they register you as their  guests.   I would also like to appreciate Mr. Tajammul for his quick and prompt check in assistance and stay related requests.   The property is situated on the right  side of Select citiwalk mall. I think it’s DLF avenue. It’s clean and properly managed. The bed sheets, cutlery, and other room facilities were found to be clean and sanitized.  The bad : Not…

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Dr. Sankalp
Detailed Review: I had a wonderful experience at the Hilton Garden Inn, Saket. Every staff member I encountered, from the valet to the check- in to the cleaning staff with special mention to Mr. Kuber and Mr. Dilip were delightful and eager to help! Thank you! Will definitely trecommend to my colleagues!

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Farhan
Detailed Review: Everything is great in hotel entrance is limited parking area is very good staff is very amazing poliet and punctual especially Deelip (Room cleaning staff) and Kuber(House keeping executive) and staff that is friendly and makes customers feel welcome

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Shalini
Detailed Review: Great experience,  staff is extremely helpful . Front desk staff is well efficient and pleasant. Mr Kunal  is among one of the staff members very helping and pleasant.  Rooms are clean and hygienic . Stay is very comfortable and staff members went over and beyond to make it exemplary. Breakfast lunch and dinner needs to update   Dr Shalini yadav

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Vinu P
Detailed Review: "I enjoyed my entire stay in this hotel , I waz quarantined for 10 days , I never felt the lacking of Home . I got my services on actual time My special thanx to Mr. Kuber, Mr Dilip,Mr kuldeep and Mr Deepak from galley department. All are very humble and very polite .whole team take good care of my entire stay very. Welll. My special thanx to all of you. Hope to see you all again."

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: BARINDER
Detailed Review: Very gud staff, punctual and prompt whenever asked for any services. Kuber executive asks everytime for any assistance and Dileep is very good at his work. Love the hospitality here.  Definitely will visit again if got chance in future.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Mayank Singh
Detailed Review: Very good quality, Staff is very helpful and cooperative. Rooms are very good, peaceful and also hotel is located in very good area. Room services and food is very nice too. View is also very good and it is very safe too specially in these vivid times.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Amreen Arun
Detailed Review: Room service is very good and , very cooperative , whatever was asked was been arranged and provided . Room cleaning was done by Kuldeep and kuber.  Room was cleaned and arranged very well by them .  As in the bathrooms no hand shower facilities , I mean to say I wasn't able to take shower from that properly so I asked them for the shower cap , still problem as shower hight is more and no proper spray according to me then I asked them 🪣 bucket , which was been also provided, so I woud say hotel staff very cooperative and overall I am having  a good and satisfactory stay here. Good quality Also good .

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Guide561887
Detailed Review: Very happy with the services  Staff and house keeping very co operative .House keeping staff  Mr. Shyam veer took good care of the room hygiene and other delivery services. Staffs are punctual in all aspects.highly recommend

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Karan
Detailed Review: Really happy with the services of kuber and kuldeep from the housekeeping staff. They have kept my room clean all the time despite me making it a mess all the time. I am really happy with their services.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Shrishti Gupta
Detailed Review: Mr shyam veer has been kind and excellent at his work. He took care of the basic necessities that i needed and made sure i to bring them all to the room. Great experience. Glad to have hosted by him in the hotel.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Dr Abuzar Basit
Detailed Review: I am staying in the hotel for my hospital duty . The stay in the hotel is good and the breakfast there is little needs to change but overall the housekeeping services and the cabs arranged by the reception are on time .. Mr. Kunal at the reception is very helpful. In sort of arranging cab and always responds to the queries and overall staff is good .  Hats off to there effort in Covid Situation.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Sana
Review: Hilton Garden inn Saket - fantastic stay
Detailed Review: Initially i was planning to stay CP which was near my workplace n i was a bit reluctant to stay here since my stay was for a long period of 21 days. But a huge wow to the hotel. Rooms are spacious, excellent room service, conveyance, dining service is punctual n very satisfactory and the staff to name a few Mr Ajeet n others are graciously attentive to requests. I’ d happily stay over here again n would highly recommend to my family n friends.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Pankaj C
Detailed Review: The hospitality rendered by the team of Hilton was extraordinary. They are very friendly, courteous and sincere. Cleanliness, good food and promptness in their services was the hallmark of our stay. Thanks

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Shashank sood
Detailed Review: Cooperative staff , always available  give no reason to complain 😉.  Good stay and best housekeeping and good balance diet food . In this pandemic situation still all norms and customer satisfaction motto strictly followed

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Bibrata saha
Detailed Review: I enjoyed my entire stay in this hotel , I waz querintin for 15 days ,  I never felt   the lacking  of Home . I got my services on actual  time  My special thanx to Mr. Ajeet , he. Was very  humble and very polite , he. Alwaz took care of my entire stay very. Welll.  My special thanx to all of you.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Ashwin joseph PJ
Detailed Review: I had good experience from this hotel and all its services were good. I'm happy to stay here. Food served were and timing was good. Rooms were kept clean and cleaning services were good and impressive.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Shamik
Review: Stayed at the Hilton garden inn, Select City walk, Saket
Detailed Review: Stayed at the above mentioned hotel for a period of 5 days. Good and prompt service especially from Kunal at the front desk. Clean rooms and punctual service and observant to the covid rules of the state.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Ahmad Kawoos
Detailed Review: The stay was very comfortable and food was very good   Especially Kunal at the reception helped us every time and Faizan helped us in Covid testing Both of them were very good and everyone in the staff was very polite

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Daljit Singh
Detailed Review: Had Been to the Hotel many times, Mr Vikas, Pranjal at Front office are good and Professional.  Then i met  Mr Arup Acharya there at front desk recently is the Cherry On Cake. A kind of gem to hospitality. He is best enthusiast  person i met in any hotel . He answered each and every question with a smile and cleared all of my doubts happily. Kudos to Mr. Arup . I hope this appreciation reaches him and should be awarded for the same.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Leesa
Detailed Review: Exceeded my expectations. Very clean and you get everything you need there when you are staying away from home. Followed COVID-19 safety measures. Staff are friendly and helpful. Overall great experience.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Bobna Gurung
Detailed Review: Even though the stay was for a night, it was amazing. Timely pick & drop facility, delicious in room dining & very well sanitised! Every staffs seemed professional. Loved the service. Hoping to visit soon

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Ashit Patel
Review: A good location next to airport
Detailed Review: The proximity of the hotel to the airport is a major plus point . The pickup was well organized and checkin was a breeze . The staff was courteous as per IHG standards and the room was also well maintained. The hotel only has inroom dining for all meals due to govt restrictions. I stayed for 3 nights and had all meals (indian food) which were above average. The staff was bit off when it came to tray setup and had to be reminded and run for extras like papads pickle etc.This can be overlooked as the food more than made up for it . The laundry service too is good .

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: ANUJ C
Detailed Review: Wonderful safe stay. The staff was extremely cooperative. The hygiene condition and hospitality  was wonderful. Though I faced some issues while chekin but was later resolved by the duty manager that time.Good Work. KEEP IT UP !

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Arbind Gupta
Detailed Review: I choose Holiday Inn because of its location and Room price and I was fully satisfied with my choice.  I stayed here to catch the next day flight. What I loved, during this tough pandemic Covid19 situation, Hotel staff's preparedness for the sanitization facility apart from other facilities.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Rishabh Soni
Detailed Review: Rooms were very nice ambience and environment was good. Hassle free check in and check out good customer service. Pool view rooms are amazing and interior was also good.   Must recommend to stay in holiday inn aerocity.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Ajaytripathi
Detailed Review: Just for holiday we have been there it was perfect stay . The suite and everything,  in india Taj and obrai are the top but they are very much Indian .  When I entered in the hotel  it was superb typical american culture and music plus the staff  evening were so perfect  . The gm has done really a good work 👍🏼

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Ahmad Kawoos
Detailed Review: The stay was very comfortable and food was very good   Especially Kunal at the reception helped us every time and Faizan helped us in Covid testing Both of them were very good and everyone in the staff was very polite

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: samir m
Detailed Review: It was a pleasure staying in Lemon Tree Premium. All is well taken care of. Thanks to the Lemon Tree Team   The location of the Property is very Good too . Shopping Mall,Food Court , Airport all are near

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: SANDEEP G
Detailed Review: uncomfortable bedding, hope less service, they even  charge for cutlery provided in room, charge 440.00 for 1.plate of onion, all staff are very rude from high to low. so i recommend never visit to this hotel.......

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Araaz S
Detailed Review: The best Hotel Manager Parul, very humble, helpful and a lovely person indeed... very hospitable staff in every area...great food... values the customer...super happy with the hotel will surely come back when in Delhi...

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Tsultrim Khampa
Detailed Review: As usual, I had a great stay at the Hilton Garden Inn, Saket.  Special mention to Ms. Rai & Barlington from the front desk, Dinesh & Changez at the door, who made my stay easier. I mostly stay here when in Delhi as it is close to the shopping malls and entertainment. It is also particularly close to Max Super Speciality Hospital, where I do my annual check up.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Rahul Ratra
Detailed Review: Hotel rooms are very neat and specious, staff is polite and friendly. The food is also very nice. Overall its a 5 star experience. Amazing hospitality with smile. My parents were also at ease during the stay. I will definitely recommend this place.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: kavita B
Detailed Review: Rooms are well cleaned sanataized and big. I love my stay of 2 days. Staff is very nice polite and clean..follow all covid protocols. Very safe in this time of covid. Room service was superb. Food is awesome. I will like to visit again.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Anand K
Review: A lovely stay with helpful staff.
Detailed Review: I stayed two nights at the Hilton and enjoyed the in room dining service and restaurant.  Kunal was especially helpful and polite.   Overall a great place to stay for a few nights. The food was good and clean and the ambience was nice as well.  I would recommend it to anyone who wants to stay for a couple nights there and has the time to really enjoy what they have the offer.   I'll definitely visit again if I am in Delhi.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: amresh s
Detailed Review: Nice Stay, and behavior of the staff was good. The security person named Pappu Rai is very helpful and kind and he helped for the guidance about the places to visit. The rooms are also nice Restaurant is beautiful and the hotel directly connects into the dlf avenue mall and the location of the hotel is prime as it is just beside select city walk mall.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Rathi
Detailed Review: The front desk receptionist was helpful.I would like to mention here about Mr Pappu Rai who was really helpful and a sincere and good hearted human being.Rare to find such people nowerdays .Cudos to him ,god bless.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Suresh mahala
Review: We had a lovely stay and an amazing event in Hilton Inn.
Detailed Review: We hosted out event of three days at Hilton and the hotel hosted us really well. Mr. Raj Sahu was throughout with us to support us. The hotel was clean, food was good and ambience was very nice with amazing hospitality. Really loved our stay.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Rajeshwari
Detailed Review: Visited india grill in hilton garden inn, saket. The Food we ordered was very delicious and the service was upto the mark. Thanks to Mr Raj and Mr Deepak for making our visit so special. Overall had a very great experience.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Yin K
Review: Satisfaction to Hilton Garden Inn Saket/New Delhi and Staff
Detailed Review: We stayed at Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi/Saket hotel during 01 ~08 April, 2021.  I am a silver member of Hilton Group and knows the excellent service of this hotel.  I want to highlight some points as below:  (1) Excellent location: Very close to city walk, Saket District Center.  It is only 50 meter away for 2 minutes walk. Very close to DLF Avenue Saket.  It is only 20 Meter away and 1 minute walk. (2) Facilities:  I was used to be familiar with all facilities as I am a silver member of Hilton group.  All the facilities are in very good condition, very clean and meet my expectations as other Hilton Hotels of other countries. (3) Excellent Staff - Ms. Sonia, Security:  She made us to feel comfortable and feel we are home.  She provide all information and services we needed. …

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Fauzan S
Review: Good place for a business lunch
Detailed Review: Had a visit with another colleague and was happy with the hospitality of the captain and the rest of the staff.  The menu has a good variety and the food was presented on time. Loved the flavors overall, Chef did a commendable job. Staff was friendly without being intrusive.  Thanks!

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: karan
Detailed Review: The stay was awesome. Thanks to the entire Front Office team for all there help during my stay specially Faizan, Nabina and Kunal Will come again definitely. The buffet breakfast was yummy and loved the chole batura

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Deepak
Review: Excellent stay in lockdown times,well located
Detailed Review: During lockdown no problem with food ,hospitality,room cleaning With less manpower system is still working.Could not see anyone complaining.Aditya the Directer sales was personally guiding the team The location is excellent near the airport and the best malls around with essentials available

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Gagandeep Singh
Detailed Review: I stayed here for a couple of nights in April 2021 and I had booked a superior room. The room was okay at best, a bit underwhelming considering its a Holiday Inn property. The room was had a good king sized bed, a flat tv and mini fridge, as well as a two seater couch and a work desk with a chair. The bathroom was too small. However, there were a few major issues I faced during my stay. The curtain rod broke down and curtains fell apart, which was something I've never seen at a hotel before. There were some loose wires under the cupboard, which needed fixing. The bedside telephone wasn't working either. Although the staff was quick to fix all of these problems. this sure was a big turnoff. Also, the bathroom had a weird foul smell.  The breakfast buffet was average, with limited…

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Jeetenderbhardwaj
Detailed Review: Hotel Holiday Inn is a safe and clean hotel to stay in. All the Covid-19 protocols are being strictly followed by them. Food though served in the room was good. The staff is polite and very cooperative. Thanks to their team, we had a very comfortable stay at the hotel.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Monica M
Detailed Review: Hotel room was as advertised - spacious, clean, comfortable, elegant, secure, quality bedding and blackout curtains, etc. . Everything was clean and orderly.  Everything I needed for a good night stay was in the room.  Very spacious.  The staff was kind, professional, and helpful. The check-in process was smooth.   An easy and great place to stay , especially as I was transiting in and headed back out the next morning - easy access to the airport.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: KJain
Detailed Review: I can only imagine how the hospitality industry is thriving to exist in this pandemic and still making it as comfortable as possible for the guests. The hotel is a convenient option from the Delhi airports.. had a quick 2 day stay. It’s basically has business hotel kinda feel. Rooms are well done up.  The room service is quick. The staff is courteous and helpful. The breakfast served in the room was perfectly done. Rohit (room service ext) needs a special mention for attending to the guests warmly every morning and helping with the breakfast options.  The front desk is quick with check in’s and check outs.  They live up to their brand name always.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Shivangi sharma
Detailed Review: Went to Viva restaurant for dinner as it wasy Anniversary I was so amazed by service extended by Mr Manish he provided  special complimentary cake  hotel was following covid rules every one was wearing mask and gloves , food was tasty . Would visit again very soon 👍👌

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: AMAN S
Detailed Review: We had an amazing time at the hotel ! Manish helped us during buffet and making us comfortable at the hotel,also the dessert offered by him was sumptuous and outstanding.   ! All covid precautions were taken care of at the hotel ! The food was fabulous !

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Araaz S
Detailed Review: The best Hotel Manager Parul, very humble, helpful and a lovely person indeed... very hospitable staff in every area...great food... values the customer...super happy with the hotel will surely come back when in Delhi...

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Tsultrim Khampa
Detailed Review: As usual, I had a great stay at the Hilton Garden Inn, Saket.  Special mention to Ms. Rai & Barlington from the front desk, Dinesh & Changez at the door, who made my stay easier. I mostly stay here when in Delhi as it is close to the shopping malls and entertainment. It is also particularly close to Max Super Speciality Hospital, where I do my annual check up.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Rahul Ratra
Detailed Review: Hotel rooms are very neat and specious, staff is polite and friendly. The food is also very nice. Overall its a 5 star experience. Amazing hospitality with smile. My parents were also at ease during the stay. I will definitely recommend this place.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: kavita B
Detailed Review: Rooms are well cleaned sanataized and big. I love my stay of 2 days. Staff is very nice polite and clean..follow all covid protocols. Very safe in this time of covid. Room service was superb. Food is awesome. I will like to visit again.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Anand K
Review: A lovely stay with helpful staff.
Detailed Review: I stayed two nights at the Hilton and enjoyed the in room dining service and restaurant.  Kunal was especially helpful and polite.   Overall a great place to stay for a few nights. The food was good and clean and the ambience was nice as well.  I would recommend it to anyone who wants to stay for a couple nights there and has the time to really enjoy what they have the offer.   I'll definitely visit again if I am in Delhi.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: amresh s
Detailed Review: Nice Stay, and behavior of the staff was good. The security person named Pappu Rai is very helpful and kind and he helped for the guidance about the places to visit. The rooms are also nice Restaurant is beautiful and the hotel directly connects into the dlf avenue mall and the location of the hotel is prime as it is just beside select city walk mall.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Rathi
Detailed Review: The front desk receptionist was helpful.I would like to mention here about Mr Pappu Rai who was really helpful and a sincere and good hearted human being.Rare to find such people nowerdays .Cudos to him ,god bless.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Suresh mahala
Review: We had a lovely stay and an amazing event in Hilton Inn.
Detailed Review: We hosted out event of three days at Hilton and the hotel hosted us really well. Mr. Raj Sahu was throughout with us to support us. The hotel was clean, food was good and ambience was very nice with amazing hospitality. Really loved our stay.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Rajeshwari
Detailed Review: Visited india grill in hilton garden inn, saket. The Food we ordered was very delicious and the service was upto the mark. Thanks to Mr Raj and Mr Deepak for making our visit so special. Overall had a very great experience.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Yin K
Review: Satisfaction to Hilton Garden Inn Saket/New Delhi and Staff
Detailed Review: We stayed at Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi/Saket hotel during 01 ~08 April, 2021.  I am a silver member of Hilton Group and knows the excellent service of this hotel.  I want to highlight some points as below:  (1) Excellent location: Very close to city walk, Saket District Center.  It is only 50 meter away for 2 minutes walk. Very close to DLF Avenue Saket.  It is only 20 Meter away and 1 minute walk. (2) Facilities:  I was used to be familiar with all facilities as I am a silver member of Hilton group.  All the facilities are in very good condition, very clean and meet my expectations as other Hilton Hotels of other countries. (3) Excellent Staff - Ms. Sonia, Security:  She made us to feel comfortable and feel we are home.  She provide all information and services we needed. …

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Fauzan S
Review: Good place for a business lunch
Detailed Review: Had a visit with another colleague and was happy with the hospitality of the captain and the rest of the staff.  The menu has a good variety and the food was presented on time. Loved the flavors overall, Chef did a commendable job. Staff was friendly without being intrusive.  Thanks!

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: karan
Detailed Review: The stay was awesome. Thanks to the entire Front Office team for all there help during my stay specially Faizan, Nabina and Kunal Will come again definitely. The buffet breakfast was yummy and loved the chole batura

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Tejasvi Singh
Detailed Review: One of the worst and slowest services I have seen even accounting for covid times. Housekeeping was denied and a change of bedsheet and pillow cover took around 45 minutes. Of all the hotels I have stayed during covid times this hotel had the worst service of them all.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Anmol sharma
Review: Worst hotel you ever plan to stay with
Detailed Review: One of the worst experience I ever had with star rated hotel . First of all got the room after waiting for 30 minutes at the front desk and during the midnight the ac stopped working and instead of changing the room they choose to repair air conditioning and made noises at 1:30 am and my friend who was sleeping in the room got up & didnt slept for the whole night .. this decision of repairing the ac in the midnight was awful and moreover even after the repair the ac didn’t worked properly. I wish I could have stayed at oyo hotels so I could have got the better experience. I would like to inform all the people who are looking for staying in this hotel that this hotel is Pathetic kindly look for other options nearby.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Neema yatil sagar
Detailed Review: I visited lemon tree hotel everything was perfect from checkin till checkout , staff was so helpful i stayed in 1225 suite food was amazing special thanks to Amit and baljeet for better experience thankyou everyone and keep it up

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Utkarsha
Detailed Review: Housekeeping staff was very courteous, polite and helpful, especially Avdesh Kumar, Alfia.They were very good and helpful.The staff was prompt and efficient. It was nice to have smiling and helpful people around.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Businesspp
Detailed Review: I stayed in the hotel for 3 nights and I must admits whilst it is extremely difficult time for hospitality industry but the staff at the hotel are doing a great job. Guests would be guest and demanding .. and it is the training of staff who whilst working with limited resources are trying to make things happen  The staff at restaurant, reception and housekeepibg are giving the same service as per COVID times inspire of resource crunch  Kudos to you all wait and watch you will be back with a bang  Good luck 🤞

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Rhea
Detailed Review: The staff, especially the ones at Citrus Cafe are very friendly and courteous and display great customer service skills. Special mention to Ishwar from Citrus cafe, who is very efficient and friendly.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Shivani R
Detailed Review: Well stay was good and comfortable..i like the room but bit upset with Housekeeping team anyways duty manager and housekeeping supervisor meet me makes me understand and promise they make my next stay experience good and happily.f and b staff is amazing i like the way they are communicating with guest.Nikhil he serve me coffe with nice gesture..so apart from that everything is good..will surely come and wanna see your hospitality again.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Shabir K
Detailed Review: It was really nice stay hotel  Hilton garden in saket new Delhi especially the hospitality of this hotel staff we really enjoy to stay on this hotel n we really like the hospitality of Mr faizan.  Once again thanks Mr faizan

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: SAVIO DSOUZA
Detailed Review: The rooms were nice and spacious overlooking a nice Garden.. the Decor was a little fuddy duddy in my opinion and could use a refurbishment. Ask for a room on the higher floor as on a good Delhi day you have a nice view of the city .. since we were regulars we were offered a complimentary drop to the airport and free laundry for duration of stay.  niceee..  The breakfast buffet was good and covers all cusines.  Kunal from the front desk was very helpful and organised a RTPCR test at the hotel as our onward destination needed a negative report .. I did loose an electric toothbrush which I had left behind in the loo which the hotel claimed it wasn't there .. My bad and carelessness I agree but it should have been found

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: 326Deepa
Detailed Review: We stayed in Hilton garden inn Saket for three nights from 22nd to 25th March.  It was truly home away from home!!  The check in was smooth, the room was clean and comfortable and the buffet breakfast had lot of variety . Interestingly the dishes were different every morning.  The highly efficient  housekeeping guy Shyam Veer made sure we came back to a clean and comfortable room every evening.   A big thank you to you  Owing to a lil miscommunication, our pick up to airport got delayed but  Mr Saurabh made sure we reached in time and even called us up to find out we have reached  home safely .  Thank you so much Saurabh. We really appreciate this gesture . Would  be our only choice in Delhi from now on...

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Alia Q
Review: The Best place to stay in New Delhi
Detailed Review: Looking for a good place? Your won’t find better than this hotel! The love of amazing staff and great service will give you feel like home. Front desk guys are helpful and professional communicators. Security staff are incredible and well organized. You will find diversity in foods as well.   With the long stay, they become a family member to me definitely. Thank you Kunal, Saurabh, Murry, Sonia, Faizan, Nabina, Changez and Ravi Sir for the excellent hospitality. Keep the great work up.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Shraman M
Detailed Review: Good ambience and food. Would love to try again sometime later. There is lack of variety amongst the dishes and the starters were really good. Would love to try again in the near future. That's all By farhan

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Abhishek Dalal
Detailed Review: Even post covid, the staff welcomes you with a smile and makes you feel at home. I have been at this hotel for a long time and they go out of their way to fulfil your wishes. This goes for everyone including Dinesh, the security person.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Karuna malhotra
Detailed Review: Good service with delicious food and desserts. It also have great ambiance. Everything is good and the manager Raj is very nice and polite. The location and parking is also nice. Everyone should visit

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Taanya K
Detailed Review: Had such an incredible buffet experience at India Grill hotel. Staff was super sweet and service was prompt. Special thanks to Deepak n Mohammad. Buffer variety was great too. Great for both vegetarians and non vegetarians.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Samwise65
Review: Good place to stay and very nice personnel
Detailed Review: Good place to stay. The staff is friendly. The guards (Dinesh & Changez) at the entry gate are extremely nice and will light up your mood. The rooms are clean and the room service is quick. Overall good experience.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Sara F
Detailed Review: We had wonderful staff cleaning our room. They were fast and helpful when we needed anything. They were also friendly. We had Baluir Mehta & Shyamuee from house keeping.  We ate every night and often  breakfast at the Indian Grill. It was delicious! We especially appreciated our kind server Farhaan who always made sure we were well taken care of.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Saptarshi Adil
Review: Brilliant location with the warmth of Hilton Hospitality
Detailed Review: The hotel is brilliantly located with direct access to the DLF mall which makes it super convenient to live and maneuver through the city, as transportation is always available.  We must mention we were overwhelmed with the hospitality from Shyam and Saurabh who made sure our stay was exceptional, three more individuals who touched us with their hospitality are Pearl, Ronak and Murry (I might have misspelled, so sorry !) … We miss the hotel already … Thank you all for making this trip of ours better than what it otherwise would have been.  Adil and Saptarshi

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Palsberry
Detailed Review: I booked day use room called the hotel directly and got a quick response very clean and beautiful property.... near to the airport and very convenient hotel staff are also very nice and helpful good luck

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Nikkhil Raai
Review: Viva Restaurant, Holiday Inn New Delhi
Detailed Review: This is my second visit to Holiday Inn Aerocity, New Delhi. Had a comfortable stay.  Very courteous staff at Viva Restaurant especially Mr Pravin, Mr. Sachin and Mr Amit Sharma.   Thanks for your hospitality.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Shambhavi
Review: Absolutely amazing service and polite staff
Detailed Review: I keep coming back to this place whenever in Delhi. The service, the staff everyone is great. The buffet breakfast is absolutely amazing. The whole staff is very helpful and takes extra precautions in the times of Covid

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Reshu Anila
Detailed Review: I have visited the restaurant with my family enjoyed the dinner alott and food was delicious could not remember the name of Chef. Also Manish from restaurant was too good and polite. Will recommend to all of my friends ☺️

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Ramesh Kumar S
Review: Excellent Stay, amazing staff and service
Detailed Review: This hotel provided the best service, I have nothing more but great things to say about the staff. Arup Acharya ji went well above his duties to ensure we have a pleasant and comfortable stay. Thank you for being so thoughtful and I’ll look forward to my next visit soon.  The rooms and property itself are beautifully done,  having said that professionalism and Kindness from the staff will go unmatched for the years to come.  Special thanks to Arup ji once again for making our stay a great one.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Savinder
Detailed Review: We had a pleasant stay with great food n ambience..it was sudden plan but worth it..Amit Sharma was grt help in dinning ..he did best of his efforts to make our dine comfortable and overall we enjoy our stay n food alot. Keep up the good work.all the best.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Paikshit
Detailed Review: I was looking for a hotel close to T3 in Delhi that i can stay overnight for a very early flight. This location has many hotels and i opted for Holiday Inn. My decision was not bad, it for sure made me feel very comfortable with all the measures during Covid. The room size is spacious and so is the Bed. I had Dinner in the Hotel and i should state that the hospitality service was above par. Vishal who was serving us took extra care to ensure we enjoy our Dinner. Thank you for make it a very comfortable Stay

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Raju
Review: Amazing guest handling by Amit sharma
Detailed Review: Breakfast Puri is nice. Variaus food available in restaurant. Room is big and clean.  Staff is very polite specialty thanks Mr. Amit sharma he is very kind nature. Viva restaurant clenninng is amazing I liked it keep it up guyz  Amzing guest handling by Amit sharma

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Hemanthi
Detailed Review: Enjoyed the food so as the service. My first breakfast after 1 and half year in UK and this hotel welcomed with a Brilliant Breakfast. Mr. Amit Sharma and Mr. Manish are doing really great ensuring good quality of service for everycustomer :)

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: babsNagpur
Review: THE Transit hotel in Delhi....Book without a thought for a  SmoothTransit stay.....they won't disappoint
Detailed Review: Superbly efficient hotel especially for transit or short stay visitors. Right from the airport pickup,which i must say is one of the best of any hotel i have experienced, everything is smooth and the entire team works like clockwork.special mention to Pradeep Rawat of the airport team checkins can be a wait sometimes as the hotel is always busy, but they still put efforts to reduce your wait. staff is very courteous, especially in the coffee shop during breakfast. The only Negative is that the infra in some rooms is getting a bit old, plugs dont work and in this visit, the toilet water, which they apparently reuse, had a foul smell and other guests complained too. But this was just during my recent trip and i am sure they will be careful. Overall one of the best transit hotels…

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Rahul A
Review: One of the best hotel in aerocity
Detailed Review: Our family stay at the hotel was excellent, we booked executive suite with breakfast and dinner, room was clean. Dinner was great with lot of variety, we were served very well by Vishal b, Dheeraj and Mr. Tiwary. Breakfast also had lot of variety with good taste.  #trip-advisor

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Suyogya Man T
Detailed Review: Awesome services by Amit Sharma , the gentleman  who attended to my breakfast table . Prompt and alert! Loved the overall experience!!  The tables were attended to very attentively.. i wonder how they recruit such fine hospitality people !

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Rakhi T
Detailed Review: Amit Sharma had assisted us with our meal option and he was quite helpful. Tried Mildstrone soup and Red Thai Curry and it's worth trying these options for Vegetarians. We are happy with Holiday Inn service overall... looking forward to visit them again!

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Amaia
Detailed Review: Fantastic hotel . Very good service and dedicated staff. Amit Sharma and the rest were all very customer oriented and hard working . They were all the time willing to accommodate all my needs. Well done !

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Abhinav Ebenezer Lyall
Detailed Review: The food is so very delicious that I kept wanting more! The chicken was the tastiest and cooked to perfection just how I liked it! The rooms are great! Took the superior deluxe room and it is spacious with a work desk, projection port with various inputs! The king size bed is so comfy and the firm pillows gives perfect rest! The hotel has everything just a call away! It could not get any better!

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Sukh123
Detailed Review: Hotel is good . Staff is super supportive.  Breakfast was yummy and people give super supportive there . I feel safe being a single female guest here . Rooms are ok too. Good people and place . Prarthna , Ashwinder and Ruchi was fabulous at their services .

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Jpm
Detailed Review: Beautiful hotel with nice location and great breakfast People are nice here. Local places to visit.  Mrs ruchi malik prarthna and harpal was on toes.  Food was tasty. All is well Location is good Rooms can be improved

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Rajesh7
Detailed Review: Five star hotel with five star hospitality and five star staff. Best staff i have ever mef .  Personally i wpuld say thanks to ruchi malik and prarthma for lovely services  and treatment.  They treated us so nicely and like family .

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Mondal
Detailed Review: A total homely comfort by the staff and services. Hotel has started operations in march only after covid but its very much sanitized . Breakfast was busy as less items but more people. But food is amazing super amazing and tha staff mare you tee like home by chai and food servcies . Manager Ms Ruchi malik and prarthna was super cheerful. They were even giving services like we are their house guests . Superb  happy . Good luck . Breakfast was the best part of the stay ' chef made a perfect dosa .  God bless them .

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Rajat
Review: Nice place to stay for bussines
Detailed Review: Nice place to stay while rooms have good lacation as well services are served well. Nice peple like ms ruchi malik, prarthna. Ashwinder and aman make sure your stay goes smooth like a home stay . Kudos and good luck to the female empowerment .

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Joshi m
Detailed Review: Met ms ruchi there and prarthna at breakfast .  My god they were on toes. Beautiful place . Locatiin is superior . Front office aman and ashwinder is nice too. Fekt like a home even after so less people

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Shikha chouhan
Detailed Review: It was overwhelming to be at The Royal Plaza today, i had a business meeting over there at their Tea Lounge. And it was amazing hospitality gesture by the staff over there from greet and meet till everything.. it was fabulous. Special thanks to Ruchi Malik and Prarthana for their warm smile which made me feel like home. And not forget to mention Ms. Ashvinder and Aman from front office to make it easy for me. The hotel just started the operations and the enthusiasm of the staff members is commendable. Best wishes to them for the new start.

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Mukund
Detailed Review: Sanitized and cleaning is on toes . Breakfast has lots of options for vegetarian people . I would like to thanks Ruchi Malik  for break6 and Aman and ashwinder . Locatkom is so nice and central.  Beautiful  hotel with antique and beautiful people to serve .

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Shabir K
Detailed Review: It was really nice stay hotel  Hilton garden in saket new Delhi especially the hospitality of this hotel staff we really enjoy to stay on this hotel n we really like the hospitality of Mr faizan.  Once again thanks Mr faizan

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv

Name: Sara F
Detailed Review: We had wonderful staff cleaning our room. They were fast and helpful when we needed anything. They were also friendly. We had Baluir Mehta & Shyamuee from house keeping. Review: Brilliant location with the warmth of Hilton Hospitality
