Adil and Saptarshi

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: BAHASINA
Detailed Review: Had gone to Citrus cafe for a buffet dinner. It was very very disappointing. Imagine being served Moong dal and methi aloo in 4* buffet.  Only 1 non veg item in main course and hardly any choice in dessert. It was really pathetic. It's limited buffet spread after covid as per the staff. Question is why when almost 70% of restaurant was full even on a week day.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Manas
Detailed Review: Stayed for a week after COVID lockdown days. Lot of changes observed in terms of facilities offered by hotel compared to pre-COVID era. Some are necessary and some are unnecessary. Front desk response needs improvement. However, courteous staff at F&B dept. made the stay enjoyable. Special thanks to Mr. Monu, Mr. Vijay, Mr. Pankaj and Ms. Rabia. Always love the tasty food prepared by chefs at this hotel.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Nitin kaushik
Detailed Review: Wow All the staff are too much cooperative & Superb  Mr Vinod ( Executive Sous chef) Mr Rajendra Singh Mehta (Sous chef) Mr Sanjay (Manager) Mr Vijay (Manager) Mr Hemant (House keeping) All including some other stewards in a restaurant they have done amazing services & good food  Thank all to you for this welcome 😃😊😊😊😊 Lemon tree Premier-Aerocity New Delhi (citrus cafe)  NITIN KAUSHIK Human Resource Consultant International Gamer

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Bharti Kalia
Review: The service from the staff is exceptionally good
Detailed Review: housekeeping staff is exceptionally good specially Rajeev, I would like to appreciate his quick response to our request and his willingness to help the customer to the extent, Extremely happy with his work.Looking forward to visit the place.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Majid Parvez Shah
Detailed Review: had a wonderful experience at the Lemontree Aerocity, Every staff member I encountered, from the valet to the check- in to the House keeping were delightful and eager to help! Thank you!  Hemmant from House keeping department was amazing. He not only properly and patiently clean the room but provide the room ameinties at the time.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Rajeev R
Detailed Review: Visited hotel Lemon tree aerocity for a business meeting and found the ambience very attractive and appealing along with a nice energetic team at Citrus cafe. I wish to management should take care of their gems like Chef manoj , Neeraj and Kunal for amazing food and service.  Got assisted by them and found courteous at every point of contact.Keep up the good work guys.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: DrSukritiKhokher
Detailed Review: All staff here was phenomenal including but not limited to the chef Rajender, Monu, Vivek, Harshit, and both managers (Vijay and Gautam). The food was great. The staff did more than required to ensure we were well fed and taken care of in every way.   Thank you so much for your service and wonderful hospitality. Would highly recommend the Citrus Cafe!  They evening and our dinner experience was absolutely phenomenal. We had a great time and thankful for all the special flavours you added to make it better and beautiful.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: AARTI S
Detailed Review: I do not comment often. But I was impressed with an excellent service By Monu ,vivek and Manager Gautam , vijay and felt that it should be recognised. They  were not only helpful and professional but they went beyond  and above to accommodate our needs. Would happily recommend the lemon tree hotel and their representatives.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Mavinderkaur G
Detailed Review: A good place to eat genuinely tasty food.Layout of buffet is limited.service is good.The manager ..Vijay Kumar,Virender,Monu and Brij took good care of us.We were happy to enjoy the wine served which was chilled to the right temperature.Would love to visit again.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Prateek S
Review: Comfortable stay at a good location
Detailed Review: Location of the hotel is perfect- perfect for shopping and calling friends to meet. The staff is friendly and the rooms are clean. They need to update their bathroom supplies but overall its worth the money for staying in a safe hygienic place during covid .

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Manan marwaha
Detailed Review: I am happy to inform that I had a comfortable stay in the hotel and the security guard mr. PAPPU RAI helped us in luggage and Is very kind and I pray to God that he gets promotion as he is very good. Thanks alot , will keep visiting

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: PANDEY JI
Detailed Review: If you are looking for a hotel in Saket, New Delhi, look no more. Located in the DLF Mall, it's probably the best location for someone who's here to shop. 1. Room decor and bathroom fittings are a little outdated. 2. Great Breakfast spread. 3. Bathroom supplies could be better. My go to hotel in the area is Country Inn by Radisson, but the location of Hilton is certainly better. The rooms in Country Inn are better but the breakfast at Hilton is way better. You can directly walk into the DLF Mall from the restaurant at the second floor. Great experience, could have been better.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Seema Gupta
Detailed Review: Stay was excellent we enjoyed the stay. Deepak Sourabh Chandna Barlington Pawan Khatri All were very helpful. Will definitely come back again. I feel like home at Hilton Garden Inn Saket. Keep it up. Thanks

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Suresh chetty
Detailed Review: If I say about my stay, it was extremely praised, and tha staff was amazing, salute to those guys, who's working continuously working hard, specifically thank you  Ajith, he's very humble and polite  guy, once more thnks a little  to  each  And evry staff  of  the Hotel. Thanx a lottt to every one

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Atulya Raj Sharma
Detailed Review: Holiday Inn Aerocity really exudes of warmth and care when it comes to guests. Right from the point of entry, guards and security, to the Front desk and right up to your room, you are so very well greeted that half of the tiredness of travel just vanishes away. The staff is ever so polite and accommodating. They take great pride in caring for the guests and it shows in every bit and the little attention to details.  The rooms, should go for the suites, they are relatively larger and have good and large bathrooms. A runway facing suite, adds to the charm. The food is delicious, and the in room service is impeccable and quick. Loved our dinners everynight, A special note thanks to the Chef for Amazing Chicken Lababdar, I'm already missing it my friend.  The Hotel is ideally…

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Sandeep G
Detailed Review: Nice business hotel near Airport. Rooms are good. Service is proper.  It was comfortable stay and travel here. Hygiene protocol was greatly provided, especially in this pandemic season.  Breakfast and dinner at VIVA has wide range of selection. Only desert needs to be taken care of as there was no much veg deserts selection available. Travel and roaming around the city was arranged by Travel Desk of the hotel. Lokesh and James made it sure smooth travel. Thank you, Mukesh, Bipasha, Sohin and Munna for making our visit to VIVA memorable

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Amit K
Detailed Review: I am having a great time staying in holiday inn. Food is awesome. Food delivery is also great. Thax to mr nitin for the great service and the chefs food are remarkable. Food varities are great. Would love to stay again with my family.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Prateek S
Review: Comfortable stay at a good location
Detailed Review: Location of the hotel is perfect- perfect for shopping and calling friends to meet. The staff is friendly and the rooms are clean. They need to update their bathroom supplies but overall its worth the money for staying in a safe hygienic place during covid .

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Manan marwaha
Detailed Review: I am happy to inform that I had a comfortable stay in the hotel and the security guard mr. PAPPU RAI helped us in luggage and Is very kind and I pray to God that he gets promotion as he is very good. Thanks alot , will keep visiting

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: PANDEY JI
Detailed Review: If you are looking for a hotel in Saket, New Delhi, look no more. Located in the DLF Mall, it's probably the best location for someone who's here to shop. 1. Room decor and bathroom fittings are a little outdated. 2. Great Breakfast spread. 3. Bathroom supplies could be better. My go to hotel in the area is Country Inn by Radisson, but the location of Hilton is certainly better. The rooms in Country Inn are better but the breakfast at Hilton is way better. You can directly walk into the DLF Mall from the restaurant at the second floor. Great experience, could have been better.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Seema Gupta
Detailed Review: Stay was excellent we enjoyed the stay. Deepak Sourabh Chandna Barlington Pawan Khatri All were very helpful. Will definitely come back again. I feel like home at Hilton Garden Inn Saket. Keep it up. Thanks

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Suresh chetty
Detailed Review: If I say about my stay, it was extremely praised, and tha staff was amazing, salute to those guys, who's working continuously working hard, specifically thank you  Ajith, he's very humble and polite  guy, once more thnks a little  to  each  And evry staff  of  the Hotel. Thanx a lottt to every one

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Varun S
Detailed Review: Food was very good, utmost care was taken of all covid guidelines, chefs were working with gloves and masks on live egg counter, buffet was small but was delicious. I don't prefer rich food hence I found food to be homely and that the reason I mentioned.  Met Chef brijesh he explained me about the hotel and all SOPs they are following during these times. As I am from indore he also suggested me to visit Indore lemon tree.   He advised me to taste beetroot burfi made by his master chef halwai Sukinta I never had it before but it was too good and healthy.   Manger chefs vinod, manuj, rajendir were nice and attentive to all guests.   Thank you lemon tree.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: sanjaysingla
Detailed Review: Very nice stay excellent Food staff was very helpful all the Covid 19 guidelines were followed rooms were neat and clean sanitation was up to the mark Special thanks to Mr Prasun for his hospitality he attend each and every guest personally

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: wanderlust_2012_82
Detailed Review: We had a wonderful stay at the hotel in feb 21. The highlight of the stay, as usual, was the warm hospitality and the fantastic support of the staff, whether it was the reception, restaurant or the housekeeping. Mr Awadhesh of the housekeeping department was exceptionally helpful and made sure that we were comfortable at all times. Keep it up Lemon Tree as the warmth and hospitality of your staff is your USP at all the places.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Rahul singh
Detailed Review: I have been come many times to this hotel for small get together , but this time they truly made it memorable by their wonderful service and amazing food. Especially i would like to mention Neeraj and Chef Vinod for good service and tasty food .Both were very generous and polite and took good care of our order. Will be coming back soon. Wish you all the best to all  staff member for make us special.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: AJIT G
Review: Excellent food with full of flavours
Detailed Review: One of my best trips to any hotel in India during these pandemic times and really feel secure by the standards followed by the hotel staff.  Really enjoyed the breakfast at the morning and good to see chefs are following hygiene procedure by wearing gloves,mask and special thanks to Chef Vinod and chef Lokesh for masala dosa  one of the best I had thanks much really appreciate it and other food was also delicious...

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: AD Singh
Detailed Review: Overall Great experience. Special thanx to Mr. Manish for best service. Great location, clean and hygienic room, all things r sentitised, good food quality nd taste.  Also thanks Ms Neha for amazing hotel stay

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Sourabh
Detailed Review: Excellent hotel near the Delhi  airport with great rooms and ambience.Buffet food was great with good choices. Staff was also helpful special mention to chef Brijesh and chef Rajendra they were helpful in choosing what to have from the buffet kudos to both of them and kitchen team.Definitely want to visit again for the lovely experience.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: SG
Detailed Review: Where should I start!!! Excellent ambience, great hospitality, clean/ santized rooms. Less but crisp and excellent foodYou should definitely visit here once to have a wonderful experience.  Special thanks to chef brijesh, vinod and team for being available to cater to our food request s.  Special thanks to the staff member Chandan!! such a sweet guy served us all with a smile. His service was exceptional. Beautiful stay. I am definitely going again..

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: dusejaashima
Detailed Review: It was good services chef dhairya and his team was so humble and nice served amazing meal .. must visit its a nice hotel and best part near to the airport and all around with good place to visit..thank you

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Manish Goel
Detailed Review: Fantastic amenities and very good staff. Very good hotel, room and hygiene is maintained. Chef Dhairya, Chef Rajendra and their team really cool very delicious food all the time. Serving staff and supporting staff at dining area really helpful. All the very best to the teal Lemon tree.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Jyoti
Detailed Review: Amidst all the corona scare we went out to stay at lemon tree. After speaking to manager over phone we thought to go. . It was our first outing in almost 10 months. As promised by manager the area was nice and well maintained and sanitized all the staff were wearing masks, gloves, ... very less crowd ...awesome food..though informed by executive chef brijesh sharma and manager that food variety is increased however if you anything from the kitchen we can offer. We were given a chili paratha.. It was crispy, chicken curry was far better than what I make at home. Loved the food and services.  Felt safe and had a good time... thanks and team!

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Shilpi K
Detailed Review: Lemon Tree was an amazing experience. We were a bit apprehensive because of the pandemic. However, once we reached the hotel all our doubts were put to rest. The hotel followed strict guidelines to maintain santized lobbies, reception and rooms.  The head chef was also great. We had delicious food. All the servers and staff were wearing masks and gloves. If you want a safe worry free hotel, this is the place to stay.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Sadique
Review: Love their hygienic, good quality breakfast and dinner
Detailed Review: Excellent food and great variety of food served by chef dhairya, chef Rajendra, chef Lokesh. Keep up the good work. Will highly recommend this place to have a stay. Kudos to the team for their excellent work

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Sqn.Ldr.Rahul Chauhan
Detailed Review: It was a memorable stay on the Valentines weak , Decent Ambience.  Front Desk was very cooperative. When i stayed previous time they have given me a compact room but this time Lokesh helped me to lookout the room first  and he helped me to arrange a Flower bucket for my wife on the occasion of Rose  day . That day was memorable for my wife and me. Rooms are hygenic as well. Good to see tourism is blooming up. Tx Lemon tree for making this day special for us.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Chef Rajeev
Review: with graciousness of love , knowledge , skill and taste one platter
Detailed Review: one of the most of wonderful and everlasting experience on heart and palate . A very kind and hospitable staff left no stone unturned to make the service comfortable , pleasant and enjoyable .  A very helpful and supportive nature of Mr.Monu and Mr. Kunal  F&B staff and by Mr. Amit, F&B manager was really very welcoming and attentive.Every staff member in particular Mr. monu delivered a very friendly service. A very decent ,yet exciting food was prepared and well presented by chef Vinod,chef Rajendra and chef gaurav. Executive chef brijesh was simply great and kind enough to let us experience the taste of knowledge along with the rich and wholesome food that was being offered by the great F&B staff. The ambience and the peaceful environment was just like sitting in a pleasant…

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: King@Singh
Detailed Review: The stay at Lemontree Aerocity was premier stay,as the food I had was excellent and special mention to the staff in Kitchen lead by Chef Brajesh Rajendra Chef And Vinod jee.In Early stay at this hotel the buffet served was limited due to Covid but yesterday the dinner was lavish Thanks to Mr Vijay Mr Atesh Mr Pankaj and Mr Kapil who always helped to have everything fresh and at good temperature to Eat.I can say this was the best dinner I had In my stay.Special Thanks to Kitchen team lead by Chef Brajesh and restaurant staff lead by Mr Vijay.Overall comfortable stay.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Shashank
Detailed Review: Regarding  my stay in lemon tree , I find it pretty good. The ambience was warm and the service was quick.  I loved the breakfast part and totally enjoyed the flavors in the morning  with good smiles. Thanks again.  Like to mention the chef's name Chef. Rajendra , Chef Dharma,  Chef lokesh and Chef Ashu.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Avinash Sharma
Detailed Review: Excellent food... Great live counter.. value for money.. Ambiance is good.. Worth. Specially maintaing the variety of food with the authenticity of the taste is pretty difficult but Chef Brijesh is maintaining it well.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: S.p singh
Detailed Review: Very good and variety of options... Chef Rajendra,Chef Bhavya, chef Brijesh and Chef Dhairya i would like to appreciate them for their efforts for the excellent buffet spread and would like to recommend this place.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: prasanth d
Detailed Review: Stay has been pleasant. Did not find issues with food service or room service. Suitable for a peaceful weekend with good food choices around and night life. Nice food by Chef Rajendra, chef Dhairya, chef Mehtha and manager Kapil.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Divya A
Detailed Review: The service provided is really good and food is tastyy too and they have live counters too Chef Rajendra,Chef Dhairya and Chef Mehta are chefs who are on live counters and serves the best food , must visit and give it a try.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Kashish S.
Review: Amazing hospitality and food by them.. especially breakfast🍳☕🍞
Detailed Review: Had a pleasant stay at the hotel, fully refreshing and relaxing working from the airport side rooms, the hotel staff is very lovely and takes good care of their guest, Things are limited due to covid but are best and now talking about the breakfast, that was the main reason i felt in love with their hospitality when i met chefs one at dosa counter and other in the breakfast area, they were both sweet and made me feel comfortable. I requested for some nuts  and oats which they provided.   Pancakes were good... Missed the whipped cream.   Young Head chef brajesh was actively listening to other guest's demands and was really genuine.   His other chef rajinder was actively making dosa.  I loved their gesture towards the guest.  Good thing is the in limitations they are trying their…

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Gautam G
Detailed Review: Very nice Hospitality & food was very nice special attention by Chef Vinod & Brijesh & nice service by manager Vijay & Dev  And whole staff very hospitable and was keeping proper hygiene and all were wearing masks all precautions with nice service Grt 👏👌👍

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: syed beenish
Detailed Review: i booked hotel using make my trip.com. Hotel is very nice and clean.  Staff very descent and cooperative. very happy with services. Price is reasonable and food is also good.  I would recommend this hotel.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Dhiraj
Review: Lemon Tree Aerocity stay n hospitalality review
Detailed Review: Had an excellent stay n staff was very generous especially Mr Man Singh who was our floor n room supervisor..Food was good..Rooms where well kept and clean.. Atmosphere in the hotel was good.. Will surely have my next stay planned in the same hotel n hopefully on the same floor.👍👍

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Aditya Mehra
Detailed Review: Wonderful experience dining at citrus cafe 😊.. All over it was a satisfactory stay. Front office staff was very courteous towards us. Mr Vikas Dhaiya, the service staff at citrus cafe Vivek and Kunal were very attentive, will recommend this to my friends and family.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: pavithra h
Detailed Review: Lemon tree has improved a lot,starting from reception person who did check in till inroom dining and house keeping. Special thanks to mr avadhesh in house keeping He was very dedicated towards his work and he was sincere too.. Only food quality could be improved especially breakfast.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: vishalpriyu
Detailed Review: Review- excellent experience; Mr Manish and the entire hotel staff is incredibly ensuring to make the stay wonderful and comfortable And Thankyou Mr Iswar for the Delicious food.  The ambience and the hospitality of the team is appreciated. Keep up the good work.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Almas Khatri
Detailed Review: I Almas stayed in DEL lemon tree hotel and would like to appreciate the services given by their staff Sartaj. Very friendly and made sure everything was made available to us. Thank you for giving us such an amazing experience.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Vikas Goyal
Detailed Review: Stay at Hilton Garden Inn was comfortable , relaxing. and very convenient because of the e perfect location. Staff at the hotel made it even better with their hospitality special mention for Ms. Murry who took really good care even during these though times.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Reyazwani
Detailed Review: Thanku you  We really like the place where we was staying Hotel Hilton Garden Inn 🏨 New Delhi Saket. And we really like the hospitality of hotel 🏨 staff especially Mr Faizan he is so nice and so gentle, during this covid conditions they had good services and precautions Housekeeping was so nice he was keeping everything nicely n so good.the rooms dining should be available at midnight.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Saradendu M
Detailed Review: It was a comfortable stay. Front staff was excellent. Pawan was very helpful . Will come back again and recommend to everyone.  Best location in the area with all the facilities.  Food was nice.  Keep it up

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Reho Khieya
Detailed Review: Superb location. Cleanliness, service and food ,first rate. Above all else, excellent staff. I would like to thank all of them and Ms Aroni Murry especially for making our stay at the Hilton a memorable one.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: kumar david
Detailed Review: This hotel is a true gem and is located in prime location of New Delhi. I asked for some small party arrangement at the last moment and hotel staffs made it possible for us. We enjoyed the party organized by the hotel. Food was awesome at reasonable cost. Gave us brilliant service also. They gave a very tasty birthday cake as compliment also. My guests were delighted to see the arrangements from the hotel. I also spent an overnight in the hotel. And rooms are quite large with all services. They do have HD tv connection as well which many 5 star hotels miss. Now onwards it will be my first priority for conducting any party if Done in New Delhi and will recommend to others as well. Hilton Inn Saket made our life memorable. Thanks to the team!

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Mr brian
Detailed Review: I would like to thank Faran .for special tacking care of us during  stay.We have had a wonderful dinner of mutton rogan josh and chicken makhani and garlic nan and rice served with patience and a smile

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Dan Arthur
Detailed Review: A lovely property in the middle of the Delhi N.C.R & Good part is only 10 min by car you can reach Delhi International airport .The reception folks are fantastic, specially Meena, She is wonderful & helped me alot # Cheers to her whereas, The other staff are very friendly and strict to follow covid19 measures (It's crucial to be) the rooms are nicely decorated and beds are comfortable.It was very clean and quiet.  No doubt that I will visit this beautiful, culturally rich and interesting property again.  Cheers to the Holiday Inn

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: a_k
Review: Helpful Staff, excellent rooms and breakfast
Detailed Review: Staff were very helpful, the thing you look for after an arduous journey. Nawab Khan was outstanding in going above and beyond in making sure the guest were taken care off. I forgot to get my luggage through custom after landing in Delhi and my next flight was after 11 hours. I got  a call from the airlines indicating I had to clear customs for my luggage but could not get to the terminal from the hotel due to immigration restrictions. Nawab khan helped me out in getting the job done, this despite his shift being over. The rooms were very good and clean. Breakfast was excellent.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Maneesh
Review: Good Hotel in a Central Location
Detailed Review: Stayed with family for a short weekend break in Jan 21. The hotel has a typical feel of a business hotel. The check-in took too much time and even after that,  though the check in time of the hotel is 1400 hrs, was given a room only at around 1500 hrs.  The room was spacious and comfortable but in need of a little maintenance. The staff was courteous enough but somehow I felt missing the warmth that some of the other neighbouring properties like Roseat House, Andaz and Marriott have. Similarly,  the fare at the buffet dinner and breakfast was average.... Not bad but nothing to write home about either. Again,  if u compare to the other properties nearby,  it left one a little disappointed.  Would I be returning.... I don't think so given the much better options available in the…

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Tanishq
Detailed Review: They did not allow me to take speaker inside the hotel even when it was in my luggage, and when I spoke to the duty manager, he became rude and the other staff too gave me taunting responses. The breakfast was also not so good, honestly speaking I had better breakfast than this in other less graded hotels.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Charu S
Detailed Review: Satisfactory covid-19 measures taken from measuring temperatures of everyone entering the property to every staff wearing masks and gloves at all times. Delicious breakfast. Waitstaff highly mindful of the guest needs. Would love to visit again!

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: PRAFULL G
Detailed Review: Dinner was good, Staff behavior was good, cleanness  I booked airport pick which did not go well as I have to wait for 20 min with my baby as a big brand this type of communication issue should not happen I believe.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Divyansh Bhanot
Detailed Review: Neat and clean room. Sanitized environment. Great location. Helpful and Courteous staff. Check In was smooth. We had a lot of luggage as my mother was travelling to USA, the hotel staff cooperated us in reshuffling the suitcases, weighing them and carrying those heavy bags.  Over all it was a great experience. We had a pleasant stay!!  GREAT JOB!! :)

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Sunil Goswami
Detailed Review: Overall my experience was ok, except for the fact that Aircon switch was not working so it became cold in the night. I had to take help of maintenance person in the middle of night to come and fix it for me

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Vivek
Review: Good hotel in a good location
Detailed Review: Good hospitality.. Got room at 12pm whereas check-in time is 3pm.. Checkout time was at 12 but on requesting they extended the time by 1 hr.. Hotel is located at a prime location with food court beside..

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Gazza G
Detailed Review: Excellent location for the airport. Hospitable staff, very efficient.  Food was a disappointment. Even by standards of a regular Delhi restaurant, the seekh kebabs were well below par.  The room was clean - but was surprised at the poor quality of toilet paper and also the fact that i only had 1/4 a roll! The management should discover what the drawers in the toilet are for - spare rolls!  The funky bathroom blind didn’t work - so not sure of the purpose...  Service - 5 stars Food - 3 stars Location - 5 stars [airport] Facility - 4 stars  Would i go there again? Yes, if catching an early AM flight. But - eat out. A host of places nearby.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: DineshkumarJain
Review: Great experience and Value for money
Detailed Review: It nice business hotel with absolutely professional approach. Staff at restaurants are cooperative and offer personal attention for our requirement of jain food. Transfers are well arranged . It’s a value for money proposition bear airport and good for transit.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Kiran lulla
Detailed Review: Even though we prebooked on Ihg app,the two rooms provided to us were not we asked for. Rooms being on the same floor were poles apart from each other and at reception it was told they are adjacent. Twin bed was given to a couple as they said no other room is available on the same floor

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Vikas B
Detailed Review: Stayed in Holiday Inn Aerocity Delhi for 2 days. First trip after the lock down period. We were a bit apprehensive of checking in Holiday Inn.   Our fears were allayed by the experience we had during the check-in. Pranjal Rai, Duty Manager took personal care during check in and check out.   Ketan and Risav in restaurant provided the best personalized service. Overall, fantastic experience. Keep it up!

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Astrologer Rrachita Gupta
Detailed Review: Very pleasant experience. Staff courtesy immaculate. Front office and F&B very efficient and following all precautions for COVID. food quality deserves special mention. Buffet breakfast has multiple choices and people eager to serve you. highly recommended.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Vijay K
Detailed Review: I was there for one night only but stay was perfectly smooth n comfortable. Food also very tasty. Rooms are spacious n well maintained. Staff well trained and maintaining good Hygiene practices. Full marks in everything from my side. Must stay if you there near by.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Sachin R
Detailed Review: Excellent Stay and Property. Great staff. Food was also great. Hygiene also was upto the mark with sanitiser sprays located at all critical location. House keeping was also great and 24x7 support was always there. Much appreciated.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: R. Otaguro
Review: One night stay for connection flights.
Detailed Review: From my experience of staying, the location, facilities, restaurants / bars, services, staff, airport transfers, and everything else I need, were great and I could relax to stay. In addition, as measures against COVID-19, security, body temperature scan, notice poster, call for wearing a mask, etc. were sufficiently carried out.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Aaria
Detailed Review: Jr Suite was very nice,  good housekeeping staff, we appreciate for them. 24×7 mask was on and sanitisation measures very strict! Though there was buffet breakfast, staff ensured that they served us without us having to touch anything!  The food was delicious which they serve with lot of love. We are very happy and extremely satisfied! Thorough professionals!

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Owais Baba
Detailed Review: This is the best hotel in Aerocity. Easily accessible from the airport, superb staff and close to supermarkets.  Moreover, the hotel is 5 star and not much expensive. Rooms are excellent as is their food.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: viresh
Detailed Review: Stayed there for one night only and overall it was pleasant & peaceful experience, will visit again. One can also experience worldmark mall adjacent to hotel property. Everything was fine be it front office or other staff.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Kanika
Detailed Review: I liked the stay and everything about the property but services could have been better and fast. Rest everything was excellent including the buffet :) Would surely recommend it further. Am planning to take my family along next time

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Gaurav Kumar
Detailed Review: I visited the hotel in January 2021 for one day and they took care of social distancing and sanitization exceedingly well. The reception counters, dining area, lifts and rooms all had adequate measures for sanitization.The staff was nice and friendly.The room was large and equipped with pretty much everything. In room dining experience was wonderful. I didn't use laundry but the iron and ironing board were available in the room. The water conservation measures were also commendable. Breakfast could be better but it was alright.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Shahvir Patell
Detailed Review: I stayed here for one night. Excellent service, staff, food and facilities.   I was more than impressed. They even provided me with complementary breakfast, pick up and drop to the airport. Everything was done in a timely manner.   10/10 😀

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: DR RAJESH BHATIA
Detailed Review: Staying at Holiday Inn is a wonderful experience. Being closer to Airport and Delhi Metro is really helpful. World Mark plazas and food courts nearby are great asset. Going to center of Delhi like Connaught Place or New Delhi Railway Station on Metro  is a breeze.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Rakesh
Detailed Review: Notwithstanding the fact that got a deal online and paid a 2 Star tariff for the stay, the hotel service is outstanding. It was a pleasant stay. The bed was comfy, room temperature was ideal and pleasant. Got enough packaged drinking water complimentary. The small things like instantly being addressed by your last name when you use the telephone for any assistance make a big difference really. I felt that first hand. The front desk is efficient. Holiday Inn is next to Worldmark 1 which has a nice food court with reasonable priced menu.  Wonderful stay.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Maha
Detailed Review: Really had a great stay. Beautiful spacious rooms with nice views. Happy with the location of the hotel too I.e., in Aerocity. Loved their gym and spa too. Great service and staff. Mr. Munna made sure that we had a nice and comfortable breakfast.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Adventure467369
Review: Dinner at Viva holiday inn Aerocity
Detailed Review: I visited VIva with my family for Dinner. Mr. Praveen offered fresh ginger and honey drink which was awesome. The veg munchow soup was excellent . The rest of the staff including Aman , Mukesh , Vishal baurai  served with lot of affection. The staff at the restaurant is an asset for the hotel. They take such good care that one desires to visit  again and again. The food is excellent

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Shivanibezbaruah
Detailed Review: The staff is so efficient. Especially Vineet who wAs very thoughtful and efficient in his service. The hotel was reasonably priced and extremely dilligent. Thanks to the IHG team for making the stay sustaining

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Veera Nigam
Detailed Review: We stayed at this hotel twice- at the start and end of the vacation. Every staff (Santosham, Mukesh, Amit, Sumit and countless others) proved to be warm and welcome throughout our short stays, from promised room service to the dining experiences. I haven’t ever been one to thoroughly enjoy Delhi over the years but as people say the stay is what matters and my stay was so much more better with the enthusiastic Mr Suraj who went more than out of his way to make sure that my family and I had a great time. I am definitely looking forward to stay at this hotel again and hope for the exact same experience if not better.  -Nigams

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Gagan5179
Detailed Review: Awesone , spontaneous , excellent staff , food & specially great people can't express in words .Must come & visit holiday inn & meet Praveen and Vineet are very helpful thanks to everyone and hotel location so beautiful

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Vikas Goyal
Detailed Review: Stay at Hilton Garden Inn was comfortable , relaxing. and very convenient because of the e perfect location. Staff at the hotel made it even better with their hospitality special mention for Ms. Murry who took really good care even during these though times.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Reyazwani
Detailed Review: Thanku you  We really like the place where we was staying Hotel Hilton Garden Inn 🏨 New Delhi Saket. And we really like the hospitality of hotel 🏨 staff especially Mr Faizan he is so nice and so gentle, during this covid conditions they had good services and precautions Housekeeping was so nice he was keeping everything nicely n so good.the rooms dining should be available at midnight.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Saradendu M
Detailed Review: It was a comfortable stay. Front staff was excellent. Pawan was very helpful . Will come back again and recommend to everyone.  Best location in the area with all the facilities.  Food was nice.  Keep it up

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Reho Khieya
Detailed Review: Superb location. Cleanliness, service and food ,first rate. Above all else, excellent staff. I would like to thank all of them and Ms Aroni Murry especially for making our stay at the Hilton a memorable one.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: kumar david
Detailed Review: This hotel is a true gem and is located in prime location of New Delhi. I asked for some small party arrangement at the last moment and hotel staffs made it possible for us. We enjoyed the party organized by the hotel. Food was awesome at reasonable cost. Gave us brilliant service also. They gave a very tasty birthday cake as compliment also. My guests were delighted to see the arrangements from the hotel. I also spent an overnight in the hotel. And rooms are quite large with all services. They do have HD tv connection as well which many 5 star hotels miss. Now onwards it will be my first priority for conducting any party if Done in New Delhi and will recommend to others as well. Hilton Inn Saket made our life memorable. Thanks to the team!

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Mr brian
Detailed Review: I would like to thank Faran .for special tacking care of us during  stay.We have had a wonderful dinner of mutton rogan josh and chicken makhani and garlic nan and rice served with patience and a smile

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: 42hunter
Detailed Review: Good hotel for short stays, as room was not that specious as thought so, but hotel is very good. Staff at night not sure the name but he helped us to reach one cafe at midnight.. This was an unplanned trip to Delhi..Hotel is well maintained.. tidy rooms.. bathroom is specious.. all over stay was perfect.. Breakfast was not included in our package.. but there manager offered us to have breakfast on complimentary.. but did not had as sort of time.. thanks to entire team to make short stay so comfortable..

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Rahul Sutariya
Detailed Review: Very Nice Location, Hotel Amenities and Over All Experience. We will stay again at Lemon Tree, Delhi for sure. I must say, Hotel Manager, Mr. Mandeep Sharma is the most genuine, kind and helpful person I've ever meet in my life. He treats customer as close friends not as customers. He makes us feel like home. My first reason to stay at Lemon Tree will be Mr. Mandeep Sharma. If anyone is staying there, Please meet him for any help. He is always up for helping. Thanks Mandeep for wonderful stay. I would like to thanks to all Lemon Tree staff too for all the hospitality.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Paraspavi
Detailed Review: It was very nice experience there. You all treated us very well.I hope I will visit again for more days with my family and friends. Plz try to improvise more things. Well maintained, highly skilled staff, house keeping department maintenance and services is too good. Thanks to each and every single person. Maan Singh thnx for your preferences.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Kuldeep v
Detailed Review: I'm visiting in lemon tree hotel 2nd floor floor and room cleaning properly housekeeping team helping me for hotel information I'm so happy to say Mansingh housekeep manager so helpful prsion thank you Mansingh and housekeeping team

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Mahesh Dulipati
Review: Stay with Lemon tree during pandemic
Detailed Review: Booking made through online portal was wrong and Mr.Manish from Lemon tree was very quick in resolving it connecting with the online aggregator  And helped me save not only money but also the trouble of looking out for another hotel.  Hotel employees never let you leave with an iota of unhappiness as demonstrated by Mr. Gautam from F&B department.  Great service overall

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Jay
Detailed Review: As I am here in quarantine NOt on a holiday so the least expected was good food but thanks to Mr Ajeet Singh Services helped to make my stay comfortable, being a Foodie I look forward to good food and Ajeet Singh incharge helped me in all ways and I recommend to come and stay at this hotel. I give the stay at this hotel 5star rating.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Arthak Sachdev
Detailed Review: It’s a very nice hotel and moreover staff is very friendly and cooperating, specially Sumit and Neeraj. The food is also very nice and they give importance to your choices too and help you out. The ambience of the hotel is amazing. Room service is also nice and helpful.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Sirisha
Detailed Review: I was at Lemon Tree Premier for institutional quarantine for a week after international travel from UK. The Customer service was exceptional and I am very impressed. All the staff members especially Sartaj, & Surinder (In Room Dining), Avdesh Kumar & Bharti (House Keeping), Babar (Waiter), the bell boy and many others have been so efficient and friendly, I couldn’t have asked for more. They made my stay very pleasant and enjoyable. The staff was ever ready to help irrespective to time, even throughout the night. The room was alright and had all the necessary elements including fridge, safe, ironing board, hairdryer etc. The bed was comfortable. Breakfast, Lunch, Dinner were complementary and they tried to incorporate a lot of variety.   Breakfast (included fresh fruits, juice,…

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Sunil Ahuja
Detailed Review: Me and my wife visited for Lunch. Food was very good. Specially paneer lababdar. Mr. Pankaj Kumar was friendly and helping and very supportive in taking care of us while we dined. I would like to thank him in making my day special.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Ramesh
Detailed Review: Hotel Lemon tree aerocity New Delhi prime location,close to airport, Excellent hotel and Brilliant staff especially Neeraj Kumar who always put his best to accommodate me n smooth stay. I was overwhelmed and delighted with the service by Mr Neeraj at Citrus cafe a very warm gesture. I was feeling awesome and delighted. I definately recommend coming back n thanx alot for a wonderfull tea in breakfast.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Praggamoy D
Detailed Review: I had chanced upon to be at their lovely Restuarant after a gruelling day long schedule , hungry and famished , only to hear that the Restuarant is closed for change of shift . As I was about to turn back and leave , I was asked if I need something immediately , to which i asked for a sandwich and a cuppa of tea . Even before i could blink my eyelids , did Mr Sanjay and his senior , Mr Vijay reassure me that under no circumstances will I leave dejected . Even while the kitchen was preparing for the long night ahead , they ensured that a plate of lip smacking Egg Chicken Club Sandwich and a cup full of Masala Tea ( prepared by chef Vinod and chef Brijesh ) was brought to me in a jiffy as I was a passenger in transit and had a flight to take .  Thanks for the hospitality and the…

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: vipin r
Detailed Review: We visited “ Lemon tree” on new year eve and stayed for one night .The stay was absolutely remarkable right from gala dinner to check out. We were greeted warmly by Manager Mr. Dev and Mr. Neeraj. The gala dinner at  Citrus cafe on the 31st was fabulous and Mr Neeraj add much more twist with his wonderful service n talking sence that he showed during our stay. We enjoyed every single moment at the hotel. The staff is very professional n friendly. I’m really happy and satisfied with the level of service that I enjoyed during stay. Would definitely visit again. Thanks

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Neha Guliani
Detailed Review: I just visited there....excellent service.....new year set-up, decor.... courteous staff....lovely food....maintenance is up to the mark cleanliness & hygiene is very good, staff are maintaining social distance and follow covid rule

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Manisha Singh
Detailed Review: Checked in on 31st of December.Located very near to the airport. Rooms are decent depends on how and what you choose. Food and hospitality is awesome. Perfect for transit guests. Hygiene, Restaurant,Room service, hospitality is upto the mark.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Shivam Gupta
Detailed Review: Avadhesh was outstanding, his service was amazing, told me about the whole place and also helped in visiting nearby places, he was just a call away..also room service he gave was amazing asked many times about of satisfaction

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Connector18136985845
Detailed Review: Amazing service especially the housekeeping was very cooperative and responsive. The guy Auvdesh Kumar from the housekeeping kept on fulfilling our demands and needs and helped us understand the hotel norms

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Monika Singh
Review: New Year's Eve at Lemon Tree Aerocity ❤️
Detailed Review: Stayed overnight at New Year's Eve with 6families at Lemon Tree Aerocity. Amazing buffet and superb job done by the Restaurant team. Would definitely recommend the hotel and particularly restaurant team's entire touch to make new year memorable. 👍

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Osheen
Detailed Review: Chef Akhilesh served us amazing food and he is so considerate. Took care of our needs. Thanks, Chef. We had an amazing time.  Rooms were clean and the staff was very good specially during this Covid time.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: mehtavinod
Detailed Review: Booked Hilton garden inn saket for 3 nights initially. But then extended for 3 more nights. The staff is very courteous and polite. Special mention  Mr Pushkar and Miss Navina at the reception and Mr Deepak and chef Vinit at the restaurant . Thank you for the wonderful experience. Will visit again.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Gurmeet Devgan
Review: Recommended Hilton Saket for Safe stay
Detailed Review: Nice place to visit / stay at Hilton and great meals at India Grills. Keet it up Team Hilton, Saket. I had comfortable stay and meals with my family. Pretty ambience. Enjoyed a lot. Keep going. Thanks.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Daydream23641577939
Detailed Review: I stayed in Hilton garden inn for couple of days and it was a great experience.. They have very courteous and well trained staff especially the Front entry staff Manager, Prashant, Pawan, Sandeep and Changez ji I would strongly recommend this hotel

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Manish Mowar
Review: Hilton garden inn experience A one
Detailed Review: Hilton garden inn having good food and dinner service is amazing. Over all experience is amazing.i recommend this and dinner and breakfast service staff too good and had good interaction with rohit from restaurant.amazing guy and very supportive

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Yadav
Detailed Review: I had a wonderful sty with hilton would like to appreciate mr Faran and raunak for their service nd special taking care of me would love to come again and food as usaual very tasty always and the ambiece of the hotel

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Bhaskar K
Review: Great experience and most of all staff very warm and considerate
Detailed Review: Very hospitable staff and courteous too. It’s close to the mall and very convenient not just for shopping but to easily access a variety of restaurants. The staff at breakfast Buffett was especially impressive ! Made me feel at home . Would like to point out one particular staff Anisha Sharma who was so kind and made me feel right at home during a difficult stay as my father was at a nearby hospital getting treatment . Would like to commend her as well as the rest of the staff during the breakfast shift . Thank you so much !

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Syed M
Detailed Review: India grill restaurant: Good food, and Rohit Roy is an exceptional host and makes one feel hugely welcome.  He goes beyond his mandate to serve dollops of greeting and acknowledgement during the time spent eating. I wish him all the best and success.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Gangotri V
Detailed Review: Hi guys..   Very happy to stay at Hilton Garden Saket. Special thanks to Mr. Prashant who is very very helpful and so sweet with us. i am happy to stay at this place. thanks again for wonderful hospitilaity

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Capt NitinBehal
Detailed Review: I stayed for a week and I must stay ot was an excellent one. Right from check in till check out the staff made sure I was comfortable.   The staff went extra lengths to make sure the arrangements were top notch.  There was constant follow up from the staff during the stay. The cleanliness  was top notch.  Mr Sujith (GM) is an involved person who believes in leading by example. Mr Sourabh( F&B manager) heads a wonderful team of kitchen staff and servers and is ably supported by Mr Devender, who will make sure that your food preferences are met.  I would personally like to thank all the front office staff, servers, chefs and the house keeping staff to make my stay memorable. All the staff was members were humble and professional.   The only area of improvement is the gymnasium,…

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Ishita
Detailed Review: Went to celebrate my birthday here during lockdown, it was as awesome as every year. Had this amazing lip smacking butter chicken at India grill. The staff was extremely courtesies, Rohit Rai served our table and we had the best meal. Superb quality and  quantity.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Karthi
Detailed Review: Had a nice stay in Hilton. Ambience and services were excellent. Staff members were so friendly. Mr.Risabh Srivastav, Ajith , deepak were so helpful and made the stay very comfortable. Thank you for your excellent services. ❤️

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Tsula
Detailed Review: Very pleasant stay and the fooding was amazing .The room was neat and clean 👍 and especially thanks to mharo Murry she was excellent and a wonderful staff.And also the hotel is right next to the dlf mall where you can shop and explore the places anytime .It was my first stay in this hotel but I’m fully satisfied and looking forward to stay in this hotel in coming days .Thabk you the staffs members 👍

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: mudit_agrawal
Detailed Review: I had stayed here for 2nt in December  the hotel is nice and food is good  near to airport thanks to hotel I had booked for deluxe room but hotel had upgrade me to the higher category  we had really enjoyed in the bar their coctails and snacks

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: manishmku
Detailed Review: Had a chance to stay at the hotel for the 1st time. This is hotel is located very near to the airport and is very convenient to take early morning flights. The hotel rooms are very nice and they maintain very good security and hygiene. Staff of the hotel is very courteous.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Kishalay Das
Detailed Review: Holiday inn always provides with the greatest experience. Amidst a situation like this hats off to the services provided. Looking forward for more stays! Food was brilliant the staff was very supporting as always.  Cheers! 🤙

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Swarna2010
Detailed Review: This hotel is only 10 mins from the airport, very conveniently located. Excellent for short stay, rooms are big enough, breakfast quality is is superb. Staffs are very nice and kind. Highly recommended!

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: MONAL J
Review: D best stay at Holiday Inn
Detailed Review: It was our first time going out post COVID situation and boy we were scared. But HolidayInn (Aerocity) made our stay so comfortable and safe. The staff was super courteous right from reception desk, bell boy, in house dine in or in the restro cafe. They took care of our every need in the best possible way with maintaining hygiene levels to the par. Highly recommended.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Aditya Chopra
Detailed Review: The hygiene and hospitality was beyond expectation and really commendable. Kudos to team holiday inn for all the comfort they provide to their valued customers. The in room dining staff Mayank, Suraj and Sachin turned out to be really warming.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: S Chakraborty
Detailed Review: This hotel sets that bar way high – a benchmark for hospitality, client orientation, friendliness and more. I was here for a long haul and every staff member I encountered, from the valet and security staff to the front office to the housekeeping staff, were delightful and consistently eager to make my stay enjoyable. Great yes can do attitude.   The staff take hygiene and COVID-19 protective measures seriously. The rooms were clean, comfortable and regularly serviced. Breakfast and dinner buffet at Viva, the restaurant, offered a variety of delectable food to choose from – kudos to the chefs! Finally, the entire team at Viva, I wouldn’t be doing justice by naming a few; there were many and all equally service oriented, from the manager to the waiters to the interns. So, here’s…

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Sakshi Kathuria
Detailed Review: We had an amazing staycation, beautiful property and real quick service. Many thanks to Anjlina for smooth checkin and Praveen for great service also Aprajita for getting the place booked easy and quick

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Abhishek
Detailed Review: Wonderful experience, staffs were courteous, covid protocols were religiously adhered to. Hygiene was good, rooms was neat and clean. Food was delicious. All in all very nice experience, strongly recommend to everyone

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Naushad Ahmed A
Detailed Review: A pleasant stay with all covid measures,  very professional approach and a special milk based viva mocktail been served by Sachin during my breakfast ., .which has added flavour to the day to come ,,,,

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Dr.Harpran Singh
Detailed Review: Always a comfortable stay ,  Mr.Mukesh at the buffet took care of the food greatly . The room was clean as always, staff is friendly an cooperative , but the salon is too costly and not worth , advice to cut rates by more than half .

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: mehtavinod
Detailed Review: Booked Hilton garden inn saket for 3 nights initially. But then extended for 3 more nights. The staff is very courteous and polite. Special mention  Mr Pushkar and Miss Navina at the reception and Mr Deepak and chef Vinit at the restaurant . Thank you for the wonderful experience. Will visit again.
