Detailed Review: Had a nice stay in Hilton. Ambience and services were excellent. Staff members were so friendly. Mr.Risabh Srivastav, Ajith , deepak were so helpful and made the stay very comfortable. Thank you for your excellent services. ❤️

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Tsula
Detailed Review: Very pleasant stay and the fooding was amazing .The room was neat and clean 👍 and especially thanks to mharo Murry she was excellent and a wonderful staff.And also the hotel is right next to the dlf mall where you can shop and explore the places anytime .It was my first stay in this hotel but I’m fully satisfied and looking forward to stay in this hotel in coming days .Thabk you the staffs members 👍

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Vipin45
Detailed Review: Sir/madam I am a very well known t.v and film personality of india..well traveled around the country and internationally.  I was destined to stay with the lemon try hotels at the aero city on the 23rd of December for one winter night. I must admit it was one of the best experience of my staying around the globe. The hotel was perfectly sanitized.the staff was absolutely masked.the reception counter was definitely enclosed..temperatures were checked..all precautions taken care of in all aspects of safety concerns.  On top of this was the lemon tree hospitality.surprise upgrade.added sumptous breakfast..great room service and greater client concerns. The manager mr rajesh dagar was the feather   in the hotels over crowded crown.he was instrumental in making my stay much more…

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: harryaggarwal
Detailed Review: I came to celebrate New year & my  birthday  here with my family. The place is awesome.  Hospitality is outstanding. The food is awesome.  I will definitely recommend this hotel.  The staff here is very courteous . They take good care of us. Special mention to Vijay the manager incharge on the floor. He's very helpful & courteous. Thanks to everyone we will cum again soon...

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Pankaj Sharma
Detailed Review: If you want to feel the jungle and hills, this resort is perfectly located... River, hills, jungle and monkeys (be cautious)... you would see them all..You can take your car (if it is sturdy enough) to the river side and enjoy..  Most importantly, the staff is always in their feet to help you.. The never say no attitude and the willingness to provide you more is what makes them an excellent team. The chef (Arun) is a great cook.. The team compromising of Sushil, Lalit, Surendra, Ajay, yogesh and Sandeep (these are the names I remember) are always eager to support.. If you go with babies, they would cook separate food for your baby as per your requirement.  The Sales Director Vishwadeep is a great guy to deal with. Awesome experience all together..

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: uttam singh
Detailed Review: Room was quite clean and all amenities  was available in room. And service was outstanding. Food was delicious. Great stay at this budget hotel. But mr. Prasun housekeeping head and Naresh specially  take care and made stay comfortable. Thanks to great hospitality. Will come back soon.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Vinu
Detailed Review: Great location, really pleasant and clean rooms, but the thing that makes this such a good place to stay are the staff.Reception staff was very nice,nice cafe.Specally would to mentoin the name Mr.Prasun and Naresh housekeeping,make our stay comfotabe.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Prija Ponnan
Detailed Review: Our stay in Lemon tree was too great especially food.the beetroot halwa and dry jalebi made of palak was standout.Would like to mention The chefs Bijesh,chef Vinod,chef Bedi,chef Dhairyan,chef Rajendra for the wonderful experience in dining.   Dr. Prija Ponnan, Delhi

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Mayank Singh
Detailed Review: Hotel lives up to the expectations by providing top notch room, food and service.  Special thanks to Avadhesh Kumar and Arvind Kumar from housekeeping team for being so proactive and respectful.   Wish to visit again to get this superb service.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: paraskapoor1996
Detailed Review: Just wanted to thank Mr.Ishwar Ojha who helped us a lot by taking care of everything.  From sanitization to service, the experience was awesome! Would love to come back to the hotel & will take Service from Mr.Ishwar only!  Thanks a lot

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Ravi M
Detailed Review: Kartik Sharma duty Manager of Lemon tree exemplifies such top notch service, rare warmth & courteous care beyond the extra mile that you as a customer feel at home at ease and relish each & every day's experience at the hotel with a smile on ur face. I recommend him highly as an asset to any property n establishment in this industry marred with mediocre n superficial service.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Dr. naman wahal
Detailed Review: Many restrictions in place due to COVID but these are for customers safety. Had a few problems with housekeeping but those were resolved quickly when I contacted the front desk.  Mr Ajay Shokeen on the front desk was extremely helpful and proactive in making our stay comfortable. He immediately sorted out our complaints and made sure we didn't face them again. I will be surely visiting this property again next time I am in Delhi.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Sagar Wadhwa
Detailed Review: First of all would like to thanks Mr. Prateek for such a smooth check-in and the way he interacted  really need to be appreciated and second would like to thanks Chef Rajendra the club sandwich was really amazing and one of the best I ever had. Thanks a lot guys for such a wonderful stay and looking forward to see you both for my next stay in March.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: arup s
Detailed Review: We had checked in on 26thDec, we had a very comfortable stay and were taken good care by the staff. I must say the staff was very responsive and helpful. Check in was quite fast and the front office staff was very friendly and cordial. Overall great experience. All COVID 19 precautions were in place.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Prayam
Detailed Review: Lemon Tree Premier, New Delhi never misses a chance to amaze us with perfect service.  Great hospitality. Staff(sanjay)was very attentive and friendly and hotel is nicely setup. i really like their services , i like the way attend us and i think they attend all their visitors the same way and  Overall nice and keeping in mind the vicinity to the airport .Highly recommended property.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: S.S
Detailed Review: The property is very nice,clean and saf during this covid pandemic. We have conducted a small event in the board room. The staff is very courteous, I was handling everything over a phone call,  Ms.Dristhi from operators was very courteous. Special mentions to Mr.Dev & Mr.Gautam for helping me out. It was a brilliant experience. Kitchen team thanks for tasty snacks

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Sandeep Kumar
Detailed Review: This hotel lived up to everything I had expected and more. From the moment we stepped out of the airport and was meet by Vijay singh from  hotel ,we were being treated as VIP's. On arrival at the hotel we was taken straight to our room .The service was outstanding by all the staff who always greeted you no matter where you was in the hotel and was willing to help you. Food was outstanding. Indian hospitality is one of the best we have enjoyed and the Lemon tree hotel  is at the top of the list for our return to India. From airport to Hotel we were VIP's..    Thank you Lemon tree👍

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Sunny
Detailed Review: I'm so grateful to Chef Hitesh and Chef Rajender who has made creatively delicious dosa for me. I loved the taste so much that I repeated the order twice!  Hats off to your amazing cooking skills guys!  Truly love it 🤩  Thanks,Sunny

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Kartikey Garg
Review: Safest roperty in town with astonishing food
Detailed Review: A one stop property for all it's patrons, providing them with a wholesome & safe experience  throughout their stay.  As the Covid-19 pandemic struck, hygiene & safety became utmost important and this property has lived up to the expectations. Proper sanitization and all covid rules were strictly followed by all,even in the restaurant Mr. Ishwar made sure social distancing, face shields, masks & gloves was worn by every food handler.   Special appreciation to Mr.Ishwar Ojha(F&B Manager) & his team , all of them are doing  amazing work. All the staff has a constant smile on their face and you can tell they enjoy their job ! Thanks a ton Mr.Ishwar & LTP, Aerocity !

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: RnG
Detailed Review: This place takes you through the real Indian culture where a guest is treated like a God. Our small stay at the hotel was proven to be a wonderful stay and we carried back a true picture of good hospitality in our memories of the place due to the curtesy  and comfort offered by each and every  hotel staff during our stay. A special thanks to the Hotel Manger who took a personal care in making our small stay really memorable.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Anup Singh
Detailed Review: I must say staff of lemon tree aero city know it well - to pamper their guests and make them feel special  Visited the property on 26th dec 2020, will rate them 10, in rating of 1-  10 Service , cleanliness, food , prompt reverts  Will visit them again in 2021

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Gayatri
Review: Delicious taste of dosa and omlette
Detailed Review: A good day start with a good meal and they proved this right.Thanks for lighten up my day. The counter of dosa and omlette was so good in taste. Wanted to thanks chef rajendar and chef hitesh for a wonderful and great meal prepared for us.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Vishal
Review: Nice rooms, great ambience & Lovely staff
Detailed Review: Stayed at lemon tree new delhi airport, after taking a break from my office. very good rooms,great ambience, lovely staff & amazing food as well. special thanks to Mr. Sachin was very helpful & cooperative at the desk.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Puja Ojha
Detailed Review: It was my first experience with lemon tree and it was an amazing one.Awed by the hospitality and well organised setup done by Mr. Prateek Shukla , I would definitely recommend it to people traveling with family and friends.Thank you Prateek and team for making our stay and incredible one.Looking forward for some more happy stays with you. Cheers 🥂.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Ritul Saini
Detailed Review: A short but lovely stay. All thanks to Himanshu from front office who  helped me with a quick check in and made sure I had a pleasant and comfortable stay at the hotel, also referred my friends who travels often.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Prashant
Review: Hotel Lemon tree premier New Delhi
Detailed Review: Excellent food and guest service provided by Subhash Kumar , Nice welcome and room service .I will visot again . Really a home like feeling , we enjoyed stay and all the time which we spent together .

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Tushita Verma
Detailed Review: I’m a frequent flyer to Delhi and I always stay in Lemon Tree. All thanks Srijan and Ishwar and their respective teams for always making my stay memorable. I always recommend this property to my family and friends. Looking forward to be back again.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Sumit drabu
Detailed Review: It was wonderful experience in the property...The staff was so good and corporating.Breakfast was very delicious 😋 Himanshu arya from reservation team was very good and i liked kind of service he provided

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Vishal
Detailed Review: I am hesitant in going out for the cafes during this Covid pandemic however when my friend  insisted to visit citrus Cafe of Lemon Tree I took chance. I must tell you that all those people who you feel that Covid protocols are not necessary they should not visit this restaurant because the hotel staff is very very particular about the covid protocols and ensure the safety of the visitors as well as the serving staff .Few of my my colleague got irritated when the manager insisted them on wearing the mask but frankly speaking I like that because I knew  that whatever the manager Mr Vijay was doing was for our own benefit. Must complement Vijay and his team for Daredevil work they r doing . I know in hospitality industry where u have to be polite, gentle  and humble ensuring law…

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Freedom822920
Detailed Review: First of all I would like to say about the staff as all of them were very helpful and positive. Especially Srijan & the Chef Bedi. Very impress with their service and approach.  Had a great experience.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Sarika
Detailed Review: I have stayed at this hotel multiple times but the stay this time during the Covid period was really nice. Right from temperature checks to our bags getting sanitized to the staff reducing the touch points at the restaurant. The staff is also extremely professional. Special mention to Srijan and Chef Bedi who made my stay comfortable during this crucial time.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: R. P singh
Review: It's very bad bad bad hotel in aero city.
Detailed Review: Hi We stayed in the hotel and hopefully will be the last too with this hotel.  You can call it to be the most "chindi" hotel in aero city. The staff here I found is most arrogant I ever found. I had to get the print out for air tickets first of all I was straight away denied that they are busy in check inns and won't be able to do it so go to mahipalpur (the adjacent town nearly 3km).  I didn't expected this as I never had to face such situation before that in 5star hotel I'll be denied to get print outs. I asked that instead of going out we would wait as it would be more troublesome as we had our international flight in few hours.  So We said we would wait for some time. After waiting for almost half and hour when we asked again we were again denied and now there was no rush…

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Neha Jain
Detailed Review: Lemon Tree is a good and safe place to have a stay during this pandemic , as I experienced it personally on 16th of Dec .  Even though I waited at the lobby for check-in as the hotel was busy , but then Mr.Lokesh at the front desk made it very easy for me to fulfill all the formalities during check-in and suggested me the best . They are following all the covid norms, the rooms are hygienic with all the necessary amenities being provided, the lobby was clean and most important the staff was well behaved. Lokesh was very polite and loyal towards the work , a good asset for the organization. Loved the stay , hope to visit again .

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: aditya k
Detailed Review: Lemon tree is nice cozy compact hotel in euro city ideal for transit passengers . Comfortable beds , TV , bathroom equipped with basic toiletries. Nice restaurant and in room dining , airport transfers ( chargeable) , free Wi Fi , warm welcome , good staff. Covid protection were followed. I booked the hotel with make my trip , they asked me my arrival details for airport pickup ,no where it was mentioned that whether my airport transfer is free or chargeable. Mostly all hotels of  Eurocity are providing free airport transfers. But unfortunately while checking out they charged me 1600 Rs for airport to and fro. at the time of checking out  you are in such rush that you have no time to argue. Any way lesson taken.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Mohit K
Review: 60th Birthday Celebration At Lemon Tree Premier Delhi Airport
Detailed Review: We Choosed Lemon Tree Premier Delhi Airport For My Moms 60th Birthday Celebrations  As It Was Perfect On Outskirts Frm Delhi With a Mesmerising View Of The Delhi Airport   And Planes Taking Off and Landing   Starting From The Check-In It Was Lengthy But Wait To Worth As COVID Protocols Need To Be Fulfilled and Safety Comes 1st  Coming To Room....As a Special Gesture Hotel Upgraded Us To Next Higher Category Which Was Very Heartwarming and Made Us Felt Special  The Rooms Were Mindblowing and Offered Us a Runway View Of The IGI Airport Runway 28  Coming To The Staff As Always They Were Very Frndly and Courteous Whenever Required  Lemon Tree Has Provided Opportunity To Specially Abled Staff Also Which I Liked It....They Too Were Supportive Whenever Required   Coming To The Food At…

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: vishnu prasad
Detailed Review: Best for overnight stay for catching next day flights from Delhi airport.  Rooms are ok but basic toiletries are not provided in rooms.  The menu for buffet is also limited and attributed to the COVID pandemic  The hotel does maintain good safety precautions against COVID 19.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Arun Garg
Detailed Review: Went for a holiday with pre purchased vouchers, lemon tree aerocity denied for room upgradation, wine, mocktails which were part of the deal. The buffe was also very limited, and food quality was also not good. Shall not rate Lemon Tree as 2 star even.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: LivewireAV
Detailed Review: excellent hospitality. excellent buffet. Homely staff. Hotel is awesome. great staff to lelp you throughout your stay.Mr. Monu and laxmi At the restauran is a superb host.will shurly visit again and again.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Sweden
Review: Sujit at lemon tree made the difference
Detailed Review: Stayed at the lemon tree premier delhi, well located right close to the airport.  I can't stop myself from acknowledging the work of this wonderful staff SUMIT KUMAR..he has gone the extra mile to make sure the guests are comfortable, even while he is wearing a mask you can see the happiness on his face while he greets his guest and does all that's possible to make you comfortable,I would like to compliment him and request the management to pass on my wishes to him for he has the zeal in him and is the reason u will have alot more guest happier at your hotel in delhi..staff like this will take your hotel to new heights...also would like to mention the other staff who are doing an excellent job under pressure..vivek mishra,sandeep and the other differently abled boys

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: DrSadanand Khatnawliya MD
Review: Worst experience ever and felt discriminated by hotel..I'm a gold member hilton honors and COVID-19 duty Doctor.
Detailed Review: Detailed rating From a *GOLD MEMBER OF HILTONHONORS and COVID DUTY DOCTOR from RML HOSPITAL*  *Bad things :* 1. They provide in room food service very late, some times after 45min to 1 hours and after calling 3-4 times. 2. They do room cleaning after request only. And refused to clean before 7 days. 3. Front office staffs are very disrespectful towards their clients. 4. I asked Front staff for Hilton Honours Registration,  they denied and told "DO YOURSELF or Contact Singapore Customer care services for this. 5. They Don't show the bills to those doctors (who are central Government funded covid duty doctors) and they forced to checkout ONE DAY BEFORE mentioned duration. 6. Front staff always argue with doctors and even General manager don't have time to talk reputated Doctors…

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Dr. Vaibhav
Detailed Review: Gratitude is the fairest blossom which springs from the soul. I would like to acknowledge all the beautiful souls around me for making my stay wonderful. I'm obliged and thankful to Tajamul,Rishabh, Devender, Faizan, Farhan,Ajeet, Rahul, Sahil,Meena,Raj,Kuldip,Anisha,Moori, Pawan,Nabina,Bidu,Rohit,Raunaq,Dhruv,Kuber, Abhishek and Deepak for your hospitality.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Chaitendra
Detailed Review: We stay at Hilton Garden Inn, saket and it was a perfect stay.  Our dining experience at India Grill restaurant was too good. Mr. Sourabh and his team members were courteous.  Staff were following all govt. guidelines about covid but guest were not willing to follow 😂

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Aakash Sehgal
Detailed Review: Overall very good experience. Good care taken by Mr rishabh srivastav. Profesaional staff , hygienic and safe apecially during this pandemic times.Thanks for the confortable experience. Hope to visit again

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Dr priyanka sharma
Detailed Review: Excellent service, very good ambience and ample spacious room, very good food as you wanted, whole team was taking care of every small thing. Very well behaving people with nice nature, thank you all:-) special thanks to abhishek(for taking care of me so nicely):-) would love to stay here again :-) best wishes everyone ❤

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Matt McMullen
Detailed Review: My wife and I travelled to India to finalize the adoption of our son. Our stay at the Hilton Garden Saket was great! The staff were very friendly and would do anything for us. They made our son feel comfortable. Ajeet from F&B service was very kind and would like to like to visit again!

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Dr. Jayanti Khura
Detailed Review: I had a wonderful stay. The service was excellent. Room was very beautiful. Food was great. Great location,  next to Select City walk mall. Staffs were very polite and helpful, especially Rishab. I would recommend the hotel to anyone visiting New Delhi.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Mr doctor
Detailed Review: Staff is very co operative.. Satisfactory services.. Mr rishabh is very helpful.. Clean rooms and everything just one call away.. Would Plan to visit again for sure.. Gym too is accessible...location is also good

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Dr Amit Antil
Detailed Review: Very helpfull and coprative staff speciall thankss to rishabh pushkar and faizan tthankss you.....The services ewere awesome wiuod love to stay again Thanks for all the help. Always felt like a family member

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: ashwini s
Detailed Review: Everything during the stay was fantastic. Very courteous staff, awesome food. Specially Mr Ajeet from Food & beverage was very kind, polite & attentive. The front office staff were also very helpful & made the stay even more comfortable & memorable.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Rupesh Raj
Detailed Review: Very nice location and excellent staff. Very good food and catering services.Rishabh from catering department takes great care of the guests. Good view and sunshine in the rooms.Warm and cosy environment.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Zee
Detailed Review: Advised my friend to stay there, but when I went to meet him from all the way from greater noida. The hotel staff refused me to go to the room by saying guests aren’t allowed after 23:00 pm. Which they usually don’t mention on their websites. It was such an awful experience.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Sunil Sharma
Detailed Review: Very good  overall experience. Catering is excellent specially Saurabh and Rishabh has done a great job during my stay thank you. Hilton garden in staff is very good,very cooperative and very humble. Love to stay in this hotel again. Wishing management all the best

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Ashraf m
Detailed Review: I stayed in hilton garden inn for 7 Days and it was a great experience.. They have very courteous and well trained staff especially the house keeping staff Shayam veer. I would strongly recommend this hotel.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Shoyaib hassan
Review: Very nice and comfortable hotel, had an excellent stay
Detailed Review: The hotel is nice and good, staff is caring, nice and friendly. They have maintained their standards even during the covid situation, where other hotels have failed. Will definitively love to stay here again.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: muthu a
Detailed Review: It was a good stay. Food was hygienic. They'll treat you really good no matter whoever is attending you from the hotel. House keeping was awesome. Shower of the single occupancy room was not good bcoz there is only one head shower and the water pressure was little low.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Anuj vishwakarma
Detailed Review: Excellent place to stay .Rooms are amazing, food is really nice ,and the room service is very quick. Pawan nabina and Prashant assisted me a lot during my stay. Thanks for assisting me during my stay .I would love to visit again.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Smarth
Detailed Review: It's really great hospitality and special thanks to Mr.Pawan for the courtesy and care as an family member. Staff was really good and the services provided are great . As we know pandemic is there,great services.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Pooja Sood
Detailed Review: The food is awesome with chicken starters being mind blowing. The ambience is very nice and the staff and service is very nice. Thoroughly enjoyed the time spent here and would recommend to all. Thanks to Abhishek Rahul and Dhruv for wonderful service.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Dilnoza Gaibullaeva
Detailed Review: I stay in hotel in room no 511 I always had food in restaurant  staff is very good and food is also tasty special taken care by all staff. Devinder, deepak and rahul all are good and chef shekar  also meet and give always special food

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Ryuk
Detailed Review: Had a great stay at hilton Staff is cooperative and understanding. One mention of rahul needs to be written who was professional and took care of kitchen needs . Food was excellentI stayed for 2 weeks and enjoyed the hotel's hospitality. Food was awesome, rooms were clean and staff was very helping and friendly Location of the hotel is at the heart of the city. Thank u.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: DR.RISHAB
Detailed Review: awesome and wonderfull staff and a pleasant stay.thanks to Rishab(staff),very polite and cooperative staff.Staff gave so much respect to the covid warriors. Very good ambience and at very good location.I enjoyed my stay here in hi

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Sahil
Detailed Review: Excellent service - Rishabh room service. Very good staff and hotel services . Good food . Overall stay is quite pleasant and nice. I think one of the best for your stay in covid-19 duty. I was quite satisfied

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Devendra mishra
Detailed Review: I stayed for 2 weeks and enjoyed the hotel's hospitality. Food was awesome, rooms were clean and staff was very helping and friendly. Mr Rishabh was very helpful. Location of the hotel is at the heart of the city. Thank u.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: pankaj p
Review: A wonder hotel with good services
Detailed Review: We are staying in a group from last 15 days staff been very wonderful we are 410,408,412 staff at front desk very professional specially Prashant at desk manager , F&b team very helpful they take care of each requests from us Deepak jogi, Sourav manager

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Anvesha Pandey
Detailed Review: Amazing experience.. staffs are very good.. facilities n everything is upto mark.. I had a pleasant experience while staying in the hotel.. the staff members genuinely take care for the needs of every visitors.. Mr.Rishabh Srivastava was my care taker during my stay in the hotel n he actually considers for all my needs,if ever I demand anything I don't have to wait at all,a very professional n dedicated staff he is,it was really good experience for me..!!   The location of the hotel is the best thing about it.. nearby malls are present,so we can easily do shopping n enjoy while staying there..❤️

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Devarshi D
Detailed Review: One of the best hotel I visited  Hotel staff is so friendly .  mr rishab is doing fantastic job always provide hot food .. recommend all to stay hear. Fantastic service 👏👏 near to major government office . Keep it up

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: gaurav
Detailed Review: professional and courteous staff, Rishabh helped me a lot during my stay. the place is good, can go for a morning job around, and the swimming pool is good too. especially loved the aesthetics of the room in this price range.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Vijay N
Detailed Review: Had a great experience staying here. Rooms were excellent and very comfortable. Staff are very friendly and professional.Thank u for the entire team who made my stay memorable. Special thanks to Mr Prashant and Mr Rishabh.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Bhushan
Review: Dr bhushan kumar staying in room 602 of hilton garden Inn saket New Delhi 110017
Detailed Review: Excellent hotel to stay  Excellent service  Excellent staff   Food is excellent and always deliver on promise said time   Quality of food is great  Highly recommend to accommodate there..  Special thanks to Mr Pawan khatri

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Karan12321
Detailed Review: I went there to celebrate my father's birthday and it was a truly memorable experience. Not only the food was yummy but the service was exceptionally good.  A special thanks to the staff and managers (Rahul, Deepak, Faran and Davinder).   Thank you guys 😊😊

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Nikhil Rai
Detailed Review: Had an amazing experience staying at Holiday Inn New Delhi.  Specially to mention Mr Praveen and his team especially Sachin & Vinod from Viva Restaurant were very polite, humble and courteous. I loved their hospitality.  Will surely stay at this property in near future. Highly Recommended and value for money... Thank you so much Mr Praveen :))

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Rahul
Detailed Review: Thank you very much for the wonderful hosting we all really enjoyed food was very good specially Paneer tikka and dry munchrion. Kudos to Mr. Vinod and team. We would love to visit again with the family.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Adventure60593116343
Detailed Review: Had a wonderful birthday dinner at the holiday inn viva dinning. Thx to Mr Parveen and Mr Vinod who's were awesome with service ... They also gave a surprise cake which was yummy.. Also thx to the shef Thx a lot guys

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Alisha F
Detailed Review: would really like to appreciate the staff of holiday Inn for their corporation and help. They went an extra mile to make us feel comfortable during covid 19 situation. Thanks a lot. Keep up the good work. Especially Vinod and Mr.  Proverbs providing very good service and safe hygienic also thankyou

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: divya299
Detailed Review: The breakfast was awesome and the service was exceptional especially by Vinod. He was welcoming and pleasant. The restaurant has changed according to covid times good to see the change. All the dishes were tasty we had aloo pyaaz and paneer parantha and omelette plus sunny side up idli everything was delicious. Thanks for a lovely breakfast!

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Imran k
Detailed Review: thanks vishal givin extra odinery  service by Vishal Baurai had great time having breakfast best of luck to him for future as well situated in aerocity located  in quite a best place in delhi nearby airport i personally recomand this perticullar hotel

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Anand R
Detailed Review: We are coming after a long time rooms are clean staff is very helpful  We are staying 5 days nd we had breakfast lunch nd dinner . Staff is very cooperative Specially mentioned Vishal nd sachin nd rishav they guys fantastic job  Thankew viva team

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Anjali
Detailed Review: Mr Ajay  great guy, much helpful to overcome me from worst situation. I had to done my COVID test and the person who had to conduct the test didn’t come to hotel. Moreover turned his mobile off. I was completely lost 😔didn’t know what to do. Fortunately I met him n explained him my situation. His assuring words were enough me to be brave. He used his contacts n made my test. He kept his words.Much appreciate 👏🏼 👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻his help. Cz of him am able to board My flight to Darwin😀

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Srishty
Detailed Review: Amazing experience. Very polite,humble and courteous staff, especially Mr. Praveen & Mr. Sachin. I love the way they dealt with me and my family.  Must visit place and value for me. Food is also very amazing and mouth watering. Thank you so much!!

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Smitha R
Detailed Review: Sumptuous breakfast spread! Stayed here at holiday inn and had breakfast at the viba today.Tasty South Indian variety with dosa idli and upma. Peas paratha in the North Indian fairway was our first and quite the new addition to this comfort food. Vinod our server attended to all our needs and made it an enjoyable one!

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: K Kashyap
Detailed Review: A very sumptuous breakfast with amazing hospitality by the staff, Mr. Sachin Jangra. A great place to visit! Had a great stay!!!!! Hygiene level - 5/5 Service 5/5 Food 5/5   Please visit and book your stay @HolidayInn

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Dhananjay K
Detailed Review: We are coming  for breakfast vishal is doing great job good hospitality   Amazing  breakfast  Nd specially  mention vishal nd meera We are coming  again for breakfast  Good hospitality  all staff is good everything  is fine

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: VAIBHAV R
Detailed Review: Thank you vishal for the hospitality provided at the time of breakfast. Service was exceptional. Food was great.  Had a great time during the weekend at hotel. Will soon come back again for the adventure.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Vikram M
Detailed Review: lovely food decent environment and helpful staff like vishal baurai and vishal they both were amazing want to see them in future as well and it was amazing being here as well aerocity is also a best place for travellers

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Fun H

Vinod at breakfast spoiled us with more than a dozen delicious menu options. World class protocols followed to keep the guests safe from Covid. I wish I could give more than 5-stars to this 11/10 experience!

Review: Great staff service,  love this hotel👍
Detailed Review: Love this hotel, great staff service specially @vinod, very friendly and helpful ! Great location and very close from the airport! Will be back in a near future! Great hotel in a perfect location........

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: pranay chowdhry
Review: Overnight stay at Holiday Inn - New Delhi International Airport
Detailed Review: I had opportunity to stay at Holiday Inn- New Delhi International Airport on 1 November, ahead of my early morning flight to London.  My experience at the place was pretty pleasant, to say the least. I found staff pretty courteous and hotel pretty exceptionally clean. Due to my stay being very short (just over 9 hours!), my overall experience there was pretty great, to say the least. However, unsure if it was due to overwhelming number of guests or due to reduced number of staff members, I felt that service was generally slow (e.g. during the all inclusive dinner buffet; Room service, especially when certain complimentary accessory was not received in time etc.) However, as mentioned earlier, since the stay was pretty short to form a holistic view, would like to rate on merits!

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Anju A
Detailed Review: Excellent dinner and good service  nice staff  good person mr  vinod . It was very  good experience  in viva all dinng  I really appreciate  his service  He provide my daughter  ice cream thanks once again vinod .@@@

I requested for some tea with jinger or black paper they made it so nicely I felt so good after it. 😊😊😊Thank you so  much vinod for making me feel good will come back soon 🚗

Thankyou

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: DrSadanand Khatnawliya MD
Review: Worst experience ever and felt discriminated by hotel..I'm a gold member hilton honors and COVID-19 duty Doctor.
Detailed Review: Detailed rating From a *GOLD MEMBER OF HILTONHONORS and COVID DUTY DOCTOR from RML HOSPITAL*  *Bad things :* 1. They provide in room food service very late, some times after 45min to 1 hours and after calling 3-4 times. 2. They do room cleaning after request only. And refused to clean before 7 days. 3. Front office staffs are very disrespectful towards their clients. 4. I asked Front staff for Hilton Honours Registration,  they denied and told "DO YOURSELF or Contact Singapore Customer care services for this. 5. They Don't show the bills to those doctors (who are central Government funded covid duty doctors) and they forced to checkout ONE DAY BEFORE mentioned duration. 6. Front staff always argue with doctors and even General manager don't have time to talk reputated Doctors…

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Dr. Vaibhav
Detailed Review: Gratitude is the fairest blossom which springs from the soul. I would like to acknowledge all the beautiful souls around me for making my stay wonderful. I'm obliged and thankful to Tajamul,Rishabh, Devender, Faizan, Farhan,Ajeet, Rahul, Sahil,Meena,Raj,Kuldip,Anisha,Moori, Pawan,Nabina,Bidu,Rohit,Raunaq,Dhruv,Kuber, Abhishek and Deepak for your hospitality.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Chaitendra
Detailed Review: We stay at Hilton Garden Inn, saket and it was a perfect stay.  Our dining experience at India Grill restaurant was too good. Mr. Sourabh and his team members were courteous.  Staff were following all govt. guidelines about covid but guest were not willing to follow 😂

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv

Detailed Review: Overall very good experience. Good care taken by Mr rishabh srivastav. Profesaional staff , hygienic and safe apecially during this pandemic times.Thanks for the confortable experience. Hope to visit again

Detailed Review: Very helpfull and coprative staff speciall thankss to rishabh pushkar and faizan tthankss you.....The services ewere awesome wiuod love to stay again Thanks for all the help. Always felt like a family member

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Kushal
Detailed Review: Located very close to the airport, lemon tree offers you a wonderful stay. The hotel is clean and it provides you with great hospitality. Would highly recommend this hotel to everyone especially frequent travellers, air crew for layovers, those on business trips, etc.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Tito
Detailed Review: Situated very close to the airport, lemon tree offers you a wonderful stay. The hotel is clean and it provides you with great hospitality. The staffs were very helpful and the service that I received was amazing. Loved the food there. Would highly recommend this hotel to everyone especially frequent travellers, air crew for layovers, those on business trips, etc.

Detailed Review: We had hosted our engagement function here and couldn't have asked for a better place. The staff was very courteous and extremely helpful.  Mr. Dahiya really coordinated the entire event perfectly and ensured that everything went smoothly without any hiccups.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: NK Yadav
Detailed Review: This is my second function at Lemontree premier. Going for second function itself speaks for the hard work, sincerety, quality of all people in service at Lemontree. During adverse conditions, conducting a conducive and safe enviourment to all of us is appriciated by heart. Your kind staff deserves a big Thank you from me.   Though space requirement was enough for my function, if possible do increase your capacity so that others with better strength may also utilize your superior and expertised staff services. I wish lemontree a huge succes in future and May God bless all.  I once again Tha k all of u fir the services rendered Regards NK Yadav and Family

Detailed Review: Nice hotel with a good staff ,tat Avdesh kumar was very cooperative and supportive and available any time . Service is on any time which is a showing that he was very promt for his duty  Food is good in taste ,

Detailed Review: I had a wondrful stay in Hilton. Special thanks to front offce team. Pawan helped me visa follw up with embassy. Prashant, Saurabh, Nabina every one was helpful. Restaurant team was also great. Thanks

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Sachin S
Detailed Review: Brilliant is the word for Staff Mr.Pawan khatri, he s flawless and at the same time caring. His product knowledge is very gut. And asset like him should be promoted so that he can shower his skills on the juniors as well.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Dr. Atharv Dawar
Review: Exceptional location, Courteous staff, Clean and well maintained rooms.
Detailed Review: I have been staying here since past 18 days. And I could say I had a mixed experience here but overall its a very good hotel if you want to stay in South Delhi and want to explore GK, South Ex, Hauz Khas and qutub and some of the niche cafes around  Things I like about the hotel 1. The number one pro would be its location. The hotel is just above the DLF select city mall, saket. So, shopping or grabbing a starbucks is not a hassle. And if you have a sweet tooth then Banoffee pie from Big Chill Cafe is just 10 metres away. 2. The view from the room is good, and you get to see the select city mall from your window. 3. I found the room to be very clean and well maintained. I have to admit that I have an OCD for cleanliness and  the room didn't let me down. 4. The staff were well…

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Dr.neerja suri
Detailed Review: I had a 22 days of stay due to my work and i was very satisfied with every aspect of the hotel... the staff is very friendly, helpful, and approachable. So dishes was excellent... sourav and his team ajit and rishab always try their best to serve me hot meal... shyamveer bhiya kept my room so clean and ventilated.... mr. pawan khatri and all the front desk manager’s are very helpful.... i must say that was an awesome stay...

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Johncy G
Detailed Review: It was a wonderful experience staying at hilton garden inn. The hospitality and services were unremarkable. The room was very clean and furnished with very comfy bed. The staffs were friendly , polite and caring . Special thanks to Ms . Marie who took care of my needs and made sure i had a comfortable stay. Ms. Marie always took the initiative to enquire about my requirements on daily basis. All in all the entire experience was awesome and delightful.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: sunita Kaul
Detailed Review: It's been amazing always when you with Hilton Thoroughly enjoyed everything & chef at the property are very helpful they prepare what you wants, it's nearby from my place and gives homely atmosphere💗...

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Nidhi
Detailed Review: One of the finest hotel stay . Services are great and the location is perfect. Room allocated was perfect. The staff there is also very humble. Special mention to mr. prashant who made everything so convenient .

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Aman g
Detailed Review: It was a great experience, lovely hospitality wonderful staffs especially Mr.Pawan with prompt response time. The room allocated was great. The service justifies the brand image.The Brownie during the lunch spread was amazing

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Sony0005
Detailed Review: Very pleasant stay. Place was very nice and clean. Service was excellent. Staff members were very polite, helpful and friendly. Location was excellent. It's adjacent to the very popular mall so all eateries you can find on the same place. Very near to metro stations and it's almost close to all good markets of New Delhi.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Jayashree Bhattacharyya
Review: Hilton truly lives upto it's brand value
Detailed Review: They say, "When you are ready to travel, we are ready to welcome you back to our Hilton family" and I must say that my stay in Hilton Garden Inn Delhi/ Saket has made me believe every word of it. Every single member of this hotel that I have come across is nothing but a true professional. Expect nothing but exceptional service with warmth and personal touch with all safety measures in place in this difficult time where even the mere thought of travel is nothing but a nightmare. Review: Most Horrific Experience Ever...Checked in and Checked out within an hour!!

Hopeless, is the only word closest to describing the place, experience and everything in between.  I had booked the Hotel from the Hilton Website for 2 nights as we were in town to celebrate my Wife's Birthday.  It was booked well in advance, a month or close in advance.  After the booking was confirmed, I called up the Hotel and informed that I would be needing a smoking room and a couple of things like a cake, as it was my wife's birthday, I wanted to be sure that all was in order before our arrival. It was duly noted and confirmed by the person at the lobby answering the call. The day of the arrival, after…

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Kanchan Bhattacharyya
Detailed Review: I stayed at the Hilton Garden Inn for 4 nights. The experience was great - right from check in to check out. All staff are wearing masks. Everything is kept clean and sanitized. The rooms are very clean. The housekeeping and service is prompt. The staff were very helpful and friendly. The breakfast was delivered to the room, well covered. All the food was fresh and tasty - not too oily and not too spicy. I really enjoyed my stay and will definitely be back! Special mention to Pappu Rai, the doorman, who always greets you enthusiastically but also makes sure everyone entering has a safe Arogya Setu status and has sanitized their hands. It's a brave job to undertake in these times. But kudos to the entire staff. Thank you for a lovely, comfortable and safe stay in these trying and…

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: alam.naush@gmail.com
Detailed Review: One of the finest stay in Delhi. Security personnel Mr Changiz and Security Incharge Ms Sonia Monga are through professional and amazing people. Working in Covid era is a tough job and they are the best 👍

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: srishtee g
Detailed Review: Room service and cleaning services are good especially Mr Shyaam veer ji and Mr Rishabh for the in room dining . In room dining is on time and they don't make u wait for long. As far as cleaning is concerned it's done very professionally by the staff , Mr Shyam Veer. Rishabh is the one who serves the food mostly and does it with great smile and wishes. The custodian of the room I stayed in listened and fixed the problem which arose during my stay.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Ruddhi
Detailed Review: We were quite hesitant to step out during pandemic but one of my friend assured on the safety at this hotel.   We visited this place and we were really happy and satisfied with their services.   They took utmost care of guests. Although there was lack of manpower the service dint seem to be affected. Food served was delectable.   Overall a very good experience.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv

Everything was just beautiful. The breakfast was yummy. We finished it within 20  mins..And I must mention over here the name of Mr. Vinod  Who went out of the way to arrange poori bhaji  for me even though it was not in the menu. This hospitality only holiday inn can  ofer

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv

The number one pro would be its location. The hotel is just above the DLF select city mall, saket. So, shopping or grabbing a starbucks is not a hassle. And if you have a sweet tooth then Banoffee pie from Big Chill Cafe is just 10 metres away. 2. The view from the room is good, and you get to see the select city mall from your window. 3. I found the room to be very clean and well maintained. I have to admit that I have an OCD for cleanliness and  the room didn't let me down. 4. The staff were well…

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Aku
Review: The worst hotel to stay for holiday
Detailed Review: There were so many problems at this hotel, I’d start with the check in. The queue for check in was very long and after being in the queue for 15-20 minutes, they handed us the declaration forms and asked us to fill them and then again stand in the queue, which is just so inappropriate and unprofessional, considering that everyone has to fill them in, hand them at the start so that the person stands in the queue once they’ve filled them in instead of being there two times.  Then coming to the room, it was stinking, the windows were full of dust, the linens were not ironed, in short id say it was worse than maybe any other 2-3 star hotels as well.  The part I was annoyed at the most was they didn’t keep two glasses in the room (if there are two guests staying, you should be…

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Pradeep SOOD
Detailed Review: Myself Pradeep Sood  checked in this property on 9th October 2020 for one Night stay for some co-works purpose. One of the best boutique  Hotel tagged within budget Hotel and among tourist very popular. Citrus Cafe is reasonable and have limited menu with a purpose to provide quality/ good / fresh and hygienic food.  Staff is very very  good n praisable.  Room service is fast and within couple of minutes u would get what u want.                           Pradeep Sood 9811440414

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Roxanne Karanjia
Detailed Review: I come to delhi often and I prefer staying in Lemon tree always. At dinner too, Ishwar was gaining our preferences and accordingly suggesting what we would prefer. Which was very nice. I really enjoyed the dining experience. while entering all the precautionary measures for covid were taken care of. Srijan and his team were very proactive and they made sure we have a comfortable stay. It is because of the staff that I always prefer to stay at Lemon Tree.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Sadaf K
Detailed Review: I was actually a very disappointed guest till last month.. I had several complains about the hotel room and services and I had given a very poor feedback for the same on social media.. My feedback was not taken lightly at all. The hotel manager Mr. Dev Dahiya called me to ask what went wrong and also apologized to me for the same and asked me give them another chance to prove themselves. As i keep travelling to Delhi frequently, i did decide to give them a chance as was promised to me by the manager. And I would like to appreciate the kind of hospitality that was provided to me by the hotel. Each amd everything was bang on upto the mark, my room was upgraded to executive suite room, food quality was amazing. They made sure i had my meals on time and i require anything or not. I…

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Solvigant nomadic
Detailed Review: The hospitality here is outstanding.. and Mr baljeet so ensured are stay of comfortable and check in was smooth .  we felt like home..i would like to thank him  for the service..the food in the restaurant was good , rooms were cleaned

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Satish Tampi
Review: A stay to work of quarantine
Detailed Review: A nice property trying to manage under trying times. The restaurant staff were very professional, courteous and helpful. They would very politely remind visitors to wear the mask and they themselves were masked and gloved all the time. Meals were buffet style with the staff ladling food onto your plate. No "self-service" Sufficiently filling without lavishness or qwastefull arrays of food. Definitely very tasty foo. Rooms were clean and well maintained. The front desk staff could do with a healthy dose of training while dealing with customers. Some of them do not know what it means to empathise and be polite. I must say that my irritation was picked up and the GM did meet with me to apologise. I hope they do look into training. Otherwise a pleasant enough stay.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: VIJAY NEHRA
Review: GREAT HOSPITALITY  TOWARDS PERSONEL LEVEL CONCERNS OF GUEST
Detailed Review: I visited  lemon tree hotel @ Aerocity Delhi during my isolation period before boarding flight to USA. I had some issue of personel intetest. At Help desk Mr. Manish kumar helped me to reslove the issue buy taking my request to GM of lemon tree hotels. I am very much impressed by the hospitality shown by the staff! And also i am looking forward to have services of LEMON tree group in my next vacations in INDIA.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Sargun kapoor
Detailed Review: Staying here was an amazing experience. They made me feel like home with there service. Mr. Vijay and Mr. Vivek Mishra and Mr. Vivek and Mr. Pankaj and Mr.Rajinder were very hospitable and i would love to come back again. I am so grateful thank you so much.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: shafali garg
Detailed Review: food and staff was good and civilized, worth visit for couples. but my AC experience was bad. there is cetral ac which gives no cooling at all even at 24°c room was not chilled and technical facilities was not build in room to take temperature less than 24.  there should be separate ac for separate rome

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Mr. Saxena
Review: Pleasant stay and excellent service by Lemon Tree
Detailed Review: We stayed at 1234 from 3rd  oct. and our stay was made very comfortable by Akash, the GSA of our floor from housekeeping.. Very nice and excellent service.  Overall, the buffet food is nice with some delicious offerings specially the south Indian cuisine. Keep up the good work. Mr.Saxena

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Tajinder Singh
Review: Luxury, value for money = Lemon Tree Aerocity
Detailed Review: As stated above Luxury stay,  Value for money, Comfortable stay is what a person gets in Lemon Tree Aerocity.   This is one of the best hotel in Aerocity, the staff, managers, management every one is so cooperative.  Makes everything possible beyond there limit as well to make a customer stay memorable.  Food is delicious,  rooms are neat and clean Everything was perfect.   I would suggest everyone planning to visit Delhi with a nice stay must visit this Hotel and experience the comfort.  My special thanks to Mr Sukhbeen Singh and Mr Rohit   Hope to visit again !

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: HIndustanTour
Review: Very Bad Experience with this hotel same on you Hotel staff and Reservation office
Detailed Review: मैने 2 ऑक्टबोर को 5 रूम बुक किए थे रवि के नाम से , जो कि होटल को 2 बजे का चेक इन देना था क्लायंट को मगर क्लायंट को 5 बजे रूम दिया गया वो भी बेकार ओर पहाड़गंज के oyo रूम जैसा ओर क्लायंट को लंच भी ऐसा दिया गया जैसे कि कोई भंडारे में खाना दिया जा रहा हो ओर होटल के स्टाफ ने क्लायंट को ओर मुझे यानी हिंदुस्तान टूर कपिल शर्मा को झूट बोल कि हम ने क्लायंट को खुश कर दिया हैं हम ने आप के क्लायंट को एक्स्ट्रा सर्विसेज देदी हैं जिस से आप का क्लायंट हैप्पी हैं मगर मेरा क्लायंट बार बार मुझे कॉल कर के बोल रहा था कि ये बहुत बेकार होटल हैं ये 4 स्टार होटल नहीं हैं इस से अच्छी तो धर्मशाला होती है, फिर मेरे क्लायंट ने पानी ओर ग्लास ऑर्डर किया वो भी 2घंटे बाद आया ये सर्विस हैं लेमन ट्री होटल की ना ही होटल का खाना ना ही रूम अच्छे हैं जिस से को मुझे अपने क्लायंट को पैसा रिफंड करना पड़ा ओर ये सारी गलती…

The breakfast was delicious and beyond the expectations. Thanks for the hospitality and I appreciate the Service of sanjay , pankaj kumar, vivek, chef anil and nishant in this restaurant. Keep it up ☺️

Name: Seaside311915
Detailed Review: I have been staying here for nearly a week now, and I cannot help by applaud the extremely courteous behaviour I've seen from the staff.  They ensure that you have a comfortable stay and go out of their way to ensure that.  I should mention about this fine gentleman, Rohit, who has been extremely perceptive and pay attention to any needs I may have had during the stay.  The room itself is clean and large, and the location just adds to the whole thing, since it is located right next to all major retail outlets.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Praveen Kumar Rai
Detailed Review: very gud service. neat and clean environment. FMB manager Sourav, chef Vineet and Houskeeping staff Balbir mehta were very helpful and professional. i wish there team all the bst. keep doing ur hard wrk with sincerity.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: ShReYYgUpTaa
Detailed Review: Staff was very cooperative. Nice and clean rooms. Service was excellent. Manager was damn good. Breakfast was good. And Will look for Hilton again..whenever I will visit saket for any purpose. Will recommend it to everyone.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Ramapati
Detailed Review: Had stay for aprox 7 days night,gud place to stay, comfort nd nice service. Hotel staff maintaining hygiene.All hotel staff,senior associate, specially Mr.Rohit catered very well. Will recommend for any kind of stay.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Alok Sharma
Detailed Review: Its good experience to 15 days stay in hotel Hilton garden Saket . I feel safe and hygiene at time of covid pandemic excellent housekeeping and service by mr Dhruv and other staff . All extra safety measures taken by hotel to protect from covid . I prefer to stay again

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Alok
Detailed Review: Excellent experience with 15 days stay in hotel Hilton garneren saket Delhi.  Good behaviour and house keeping service by mr Dhruv. I feel safer atmosphere at the time of COVID pandemic . That is good experience of life.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Aashay Parashar
Detailed Review: I stayed for 2 nights over the weekend. The room size is decent, amenities provided cover all your needs. The hotel was clean, rooms were clean & hygienic and had a welcoming approach to them. Check in check out was swift along with other services I used.   Overall a very good and balanced stay!  Thank You Karandeep, Sarabjeet!  Kudos to the entire hotel team!!

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Vatsaldalmia
Detailed Review: Good stay, good food, “pappu rai” security personnel does his job specially well.  hotel takes proper care of sanitisation. just the room services needs to be a little quicker (understand that the staff is little short owing to the lockdown)

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Komal K
Detailed Review: thanku hilton staff for making my stay wonderful, u guyz were always helpful. Mr. Deepak ( thanku for such good food ) Mr. Baluir and Mr. kuber and Miss Pearl. thanku😊 would definitely love to visit here again

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Pradeep SOOD
Review: Best Boutique Hotel in  Delhi Aerocity .
Detailed Review: We visited this property on Sunday 27 th September 2020 for one night stay to relax from    ours hectic office schedule . Perfect place for da perfect time. Small property with a big name in the hospitality world. Restro VIVA is all day dinning offering finger licking cuisine. All A to Z staff is the pillar  of this very special property.  Their devotion and dedication towards all guests made our stay comfortable.      Thanks                Pradeep Sood 9811440414

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: vishweshsingh
Detailed Review: Stayed for a night on 29th September, room was okay, maybe because of Covid, some maintenance was required, food average, breakfast was quite bland and no variation. Front office was slow to react. Anyway a place you can stay for a night if you are in transit and have got late arrivals or early morning departures.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Abhinishv
Review: Overnight Stay to Catch a Flight Next Day
Detailed Review: The property is located in Aerocity near the Delhi Airport. An uber or ola will cost you Rs. 100 to Rs. 200 for the 10 minutes drive from Airport. The room was comfortable & spacious. COVID-19 measures were very well in place and strictly adhered to. The complimentary breakfast was just average and coordination by the dining hall staff to serve the guests was chaotic. Due to the COVID-19 restrictions the guests were not able to pick up the buffet, which is fine. However an effort should have been made to serve the guests at the respective table. It was felt at one point that the hotel was understaffed to cater for such a strength and the guest had to wait for a long time sometimes waiting for their turn to place the order. The three star rating is only for the food & lack of…

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Suheel M
Detailed Review: Had a wonderful stay of warm hospitality. The staff was very courteous specially Faizan & Tajamul. The Hotel diligently follows Covid precautions. It was indeed a pleasure to spend time here. Will certainly like to stay again

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Seaside311915
Detailed Review: I have been staying here for nearly a week now, and I cannot help by applaud the extremely courteous behaviour I've seen from the staff.  They ensure that you have a comfortable stay and go out of their way to ensure that.  I should mention about this fine gentleman, Rohit, who has been extremely perceptive and pay attention to any needs I may have had during the stay.  The room itself is clean and large, and the location just adds to the whole thing, since it is located right next to all major retail outlets.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Praveen Kumar Rai
Detailed Review: very gud service. neat and clean environment. FMB manager Sourav, chef Vineet and Houskeeping staff Balbir mehta were very helpful and professional. i wish there team all the bst. keep doing ur hard wrk with sincerity.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: prateek a
Detailed Review: I was visiting Lemon Tree Premier hotel on a business trip and I am extremely impressed by the service they have extended to me in the current Pandemic. Their protocols are strict and match the required safety standards for travellers in such times. During check out we had some discrepancies with payments which were solved without any hassles. I would specially like to thank Mr. Srijan at the front office for going out of his way to ensure that I feel secure with the interactions we've had with the help of contactless payment methods. I highly recommend Lemon Tree for its safety and impeccable services. 👍

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: SandeepAAHOS
Review: Extremely comfortable stay at Lemon tree aerocity
Detailed Review: As after the pandemic started this was my 5th stay in a hotel and has been the best after the pandemic, I was amazed and delighted with the service and the personalized service of the team,Special thanks to Amit Fordell who made me feel more special and made all efforts to make the stay comfortable and memorable for me. I loved the trip though it was just for 02 nights but if my work would have allowed me i would have extended my stay just to relax at the hotel.Once again i would like to thank the entire team of Lemon Tree for making this business short trip so memorable.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: King@Singh
Detailed Review: I came to Lemon tree premiere Aerocity for official work where the stay included Breakfast and Dinner I came to have the breakfast in Morning where I met Mr Amit and his team for having breakfast they were nice and warmth in their hospitality and helping me to have a nice and lavish breakfast even in Covid time.Going further I even had some dishes according to my choice in which Mr Amit was to prompt to help me out with the same  I would extend my warm wishes to him and his expertise team

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Gaurav Gupta
Detailed Review: Self stayed in this hotel in September 2020, and found it exceptional in many ways, coming to comfort and amenities, this hotel never gives a reason to complain and  dose maintain highest level of standards, all staff including front desk and housekeeping are very helpful and sober, specially i would like to convey my thanks to the manager and Mr. Brijesh from logistics team who took the responsibility to transfer my baggage from Delhi to Kolkata and it was done with extreme care.., i am grateful for the support lemon tree has always provided... Looking forward to visit again.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: srinathp2015
Detailed Review: Lemon Tree Aerocity, is a very convenient place to stay which can be a suitable option nearby to the airport in Delhi. Rooms are comfortable with a good airport view and well spread breakfast buffet in the morning. World Mark mall is just a build away with a good court and also with lot of good restaurants. Overall a very good place recommend for all kinds of travellers.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Umamaheswari
Review: A must experience if you are in Delhi
Detailed Review: A very homely place to be. The staff very courteous and professional. The variety and taste of food is excellent. Appreciate the efforts of the hotel to train and employ differently abled people who were seen working with so much enthusiasm.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Rafat
Detailed Review: Dear team  the experiences were superb, I would like to bring to your attention, the hospitality offered by one of your young housekeeping staff mr avadesh kumar and mr ajit singh sidhu they showed utmost care and took a good care of me and my colleague . Being into hospitality industry from last 4 years we can make out real gem’s within our team & here you have avadesh and ajit.. Thank you for your wonderful service and comfortable stay.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Ridhimaa
Detailed Review: I came to lemon tree delhi aerocity for my transit flight the stay was comfortable and wonderful what to  tell about the reception staff they were tell so kind and sweet The check-in went so smooth Then I wanted assistance with some medicine so I called 0 to the desk the guy who picked up the calls was so humble that my querie resolved in minutes. I want to thank the lemon tree hotel staff who all assisted me at all times.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Deepak N
Detailed Review: The visit to the hotel was awesome. The front desk Ms. Neha was highly cooperative and helpful. A must visit during Delhi Airport stay.  Ambience and food is also excellent. Overall experience is excellent.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: aarti g
Review: Had an awesome experience staying at the Lemon Tree :)
Detailed Review: Was there to celebrate my birthday with family and friends, Rohit Bhandari from Front Office made sure we were comfortable since the beginning of the stay and well taken care of. He ensured seamless hospitality making it an extremely smooth and hassle free stay! The staff at the hotel was also very helpful and eager to assist. In room dining staff was also very considerate, prompt and helpful (sorry I don’t remember the name of the guy, please thank him on our behalf)   Thank you Lemon Tree and Rohit for a wonderful experience.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Rajesh R
Detailed Review: Mr Pankaj and Mr Vivek and Mr Gautam was of very help during my hotel stay and services at restaurant. Indeed, I enjoyed at lemon tree premier, aerocity delhi. Its a nice hotel at premier locations near by and good ambience as whole.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Adventurer778002
Detailed Review: Chef Deepak Making food Extraordinary... Neeraj kumar is a very kindest & honest & purest person his service is very nice ... I am really Greatful you both chef Deepak & Neeraj kumar .... This two is very best person in Your hotel

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: KD Goziya
Detailed Review: Excellent Morning Breakfast Service with all norms and hygiene process in coffee shop.Staff took care of all the needs in this pandemic also. Felt completely satisfied with their food and services.Special thanks to Coffee shop manager and his team for looking out for everyone. A wonderful job by Lemon tree. R

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Dr Nitin Sharma
Detailed Review: Stayed for a long time. Really nice and yet professional staff. Special thanks to Mr Sahil from reception. Mr Rohit and Mr Rishab from F&B. And Mr Raghu from house keeping. Thanks for making my stay nice and comfortable.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Dr Deepak
Detailed Review: The service provided by Hotel Hilton Garden inn was good. They are always ready to resolve our issues. Food was the the only issue i feel is not upto standard but overall it was good stay. Special thanks to Prashant Ji & Rishabh for taking care of me.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Tanzim M
Review: Quarantined before joining a merchant vessel
Detailed Review: The hotel staff is very polite especially Mr. Rishabh. Always smiled while serving food. Always been polite while talking. The hotel has a very good aura. I wish to visit this hotel again. Very happy with the services. Thank you for having me.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Megharaj P
Detailed Review: Hotel is very good.All staff were always ready for help. Rohit,Rishab,Rajan,Mukesh,Pannu, Sarbjit, Tejpal all people were good asset to hotel thry working very sincerely and politely.Hotel Ambiance is very good and at great location.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Abhay Nayal
Review: Review regarding stay at Hilton garden inn
Detailed Review: Mr Mukesh,mr balbir (chef),mr rishabh,Mr Raj,mr Raghvendra, mr digamber Singh,and miss meena have done their work sincerely and to the best of their abilities during my stay at Hilton. They were kind and helpful whenever I required them. Good team work. Thank you all

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Khurshid Alam
Review: Excellent Service by Mr Gaurav Raghuyadav
Detailed Review: We stayed Hilton Garden inn and we really enjoyed our stay. Mr. Gaurav Raghuyadav is an excellent in House Manager. He made sure our stay is extremely comfortable even in the time of Covid19 he made sure Hilton Garden Inn lives upto its reputation. Im really thankful to him for our comfortable Stay and hoping to visit Hilton again soon.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Sudhir
Detailed Review: Good hospitality and service provided even during this covid times. Rishab and Rohit were good at their job and service. House keeping also performed as normal and good. Swimming pool, health center is closed as per govt orders.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Anantika M
Review: Service provided by Hilton staff members.
Detailed Review: Hilton has an excellent guest service. From their manager to everyday staff, everyone is always happy to assist you. Special mention for Prashant, the manager and for Anil rana and Digamber singh from laundry, also for Rohit for their superb efforts and service.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Dr Satish
Review: Very nice Housekeeping and service staff
Detailed Review: Nice stay at the Hilton during this period, awesome view from the window, great experience in terms of cleanliness, very good service, special thanks to the staff members- Mr Rishabh, Mr Digambar, Mr Kuber, looking forward to visit again

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Sanjana
Detailed Review: Considering these covid times, the hotel takes a lot of precautions themselves and for their guests to social distance and sanitise regularly. The staff is also always ready to help. The food was also good  and

Detailed Review: Must try atleast once if ur in delhi u will jus lov their hospitality - team members are amazing Prashant from front office  gaurav from housekeeping, Rohit from service amazing people i have met during this pandemic will see u soon

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Sarika S
Detailed Review: It was a beautiful and pleasant stay in this hotel during this pandemic.The hospitality and service of the staffs are really very impressive which was more than my expectation....Thanks to all the staffs of hotel specially Rishav, Deepak, Ashish n Faizan...

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Deepak
Detailed Review: Pleasant Experience during stay in this hotel.Great response from all staffs.food provided is also good and hygienic. Well behaved and helpful.Thanks to Rishav, Raj and Balbir for excellent Hotel services.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Deepak y
Detailed Review: Hilton saket one of the best places in new delhi with great hospitality and heartwarming services from every staff.risabh Ashish and Faizan creates healthy environment even in times of pandemic.thanks

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: rajiv s
Detailed Review: I stayed in this hotel last year and again I staying in the same hotel.its very nice to stay here.Facilities are good & room services is excellent special thanks to Mr.FAIZAN,Mr.KUBER,Mr.ASHISH and Mr.RAJ.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Satya Mohapatra
Detailed Review: I Stayed at the place in August 2020. Pleasant Experience.Hotel ambience is heart warming. Great response from all staffs. Well behaved and helpful.Thanks to Ashis and Faizan for excellent Hotel services. Read more

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Abhinav Pathak
Detailed Review: It’s was nice to be in hotel during nice Hygine and proper sanitaization is followed by hotel staff. Nice food served. Nice ambiance. Friendly hotel staff ..... thanks Sameer for making my stay comfortable.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: DrBineshian
Detailed Review: I prefer Holiday Inn to any other hotels. It is clean and scented with lovely environment. The restaurant of this hotel is absolutely perfect. I would like to recommend it to people who wants a high quality stay.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: psnt
Detailed Review: Room was clean, all area well maintained and all covid 19 precautions followed by staff. Thanks everyone for making stay comfortable. Recommended this hotel to everyone...............🙏👌..... Again thanks everyone.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Shreya Kapoor
Detailed Review: I had reserved the hotel two weeks before 3rd August, I called & asked if the hotel is allowing reservations and stay for non travellers as well. They didn’t deny, holiday inn constantly sent me emails regarding my stay, how much they are looking forward to it. Where as the moment I reached there, the manager asked me only travellers are allowed to stay.  Not only did they waste my time but my efforts to come all the way to Aerocity, my two weeks long reservation, otherwise I would have booked a hotel on way less cheaper rates than I had to book right that moment, instantly.  I shame on the hospitality of Holiday Inn. I would never like to stay in it’s properly , would neither suggest anyone to go there as well. It was the most terrible experience I ever had.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Dr Nitin Sharma
Detailed Review: Stayed for a long time. Really nice and yet professional staff. Special thanks to Mr Sahil from reception. Mr Rohit and Mr Rishab from F&B. And Mr Raghu from house keeping. Thanks for making my stay nice and comfortable.
