Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Abhinav Pathak
Detailed Review: It’s was nice to be in hotel during nice Hygine and proper sanitaization is followed by hotel staff. Nice food served. Nice ambiance. Friendly hotel staff ..... thanks Sameer for making my stay comfortable.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Rahul Khantwal
Detailed Review: Lemon Tree Premier is a comfortable hotel to stay. During my frequent visits, I observed following things:  Location : 15-20 minutes drive from IGI Domestic Terminal.  Check-in : Is hassle free however sometimes takes longer due to queues, better to pay in advance to avoid queuing while checking out, esp if you want to catch early morning flight. Paid cab to airport is provided.  Rooms     : Rooms are clean with fresh linen, tea/coffee maker with variety of teas.  Bathrooms : Clean with clean towels / foot mats and packed toiletries.  Food  :   Restaurants are spacious with a variety of food in both À-la-carte and Buffet modes. Food is delicious and frequent cleaning is done by the service staff. High usage of oils or spices was not observed, few dishes can be ordered directly…

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Bharat G
Detailed Review: I was here for quarantine...talking about food all time it was good..thanks to chef vinod Singh...the food during the whole week was good...and the server neeraj was also very humble..overall it was a great experience...would like to recommend to stay here...nice hotel

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: surajdure111
Review: Security Guard Ishwar and Manoj Kumar were Special to remember
Detailed Review: I stayed here during a flight delay on August 18-20. I was welcomed with smile and greeted warmly. Security guard Ishwar was on duty and he was on point. Very humble and respectful he was. All the other team members were very professional. I have 4 star because of the smell of the room.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Arshhia Chawla
Detailed Review: This is my first solo experience and I have extended my stay here. There are some places which begin to feel like home because of the warmth and welcoming vibes of the people and this place has one of the best teams. I have developed some medical issue while I am on my stay here and the kitchen team is supportive and helpful. Chef Brijesh and his wonderful team go out of their way to make my stay comfortable here and cook things out of the menu due to the medical issue and voluntarily send soothing liquids. Never have I come across a team as this one. From reception to kitchen to housekeeping, the whole staff team is very helpful and full of love. I won't exaggerate if I say that hospitality means this team at Lemon Tree.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Ganesh Sharma
Detailed Review: I am writing this review after 9 days of stay.  Aprt for everything usual about the hotel, their staff are outstanding.  A staff name "Akash" was always taking care of things requaired he knew exactly when to do what and very well trained at his work. He is a credit to the hotel.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Reshmi C
Detailed Review: Staff named avdhesh was polite and helpful...hotel was fine and environment is good. Staffs are polite and well behaved. Need to take care about house keeping little more...food quality is fine...but options are less..

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Ashish Dubey
Detailed Review: States in LemonTree Aerocity, New Delhi with family for 2 days. Impress ed with their high level of service commitment in COVID times, specially the food and serving.Delicious food, comfortable stay and very courtious staff made the stay experience great.The Chef Mr Vinod too was always ready to make the food the way you want...Kudos to his approach.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: saravana
Detailed Review: Hotel housekeeping and hospitality have been well maintained and service is fantastic and in good and timely manner, proper social distance been maintained by staff and utmost care taken in room cleaning, appreciations to avdhesh, vivek, lokesh, rajat.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: thedocstar
Review: An overall pleasent stay. Could be better though
Detailed Review: I had booked a room in Red fox but they automatically upgraded it to lemon tree premier due to some reasons. The staff at the front desk was courteous and very helpful. They assigned us a room within 5 minutes. The Room was neat and clean though very small in size. All the basic amenities were provided on request.Coming to food, there are not many options to choose from the restaurant menu. Moreover, the food is very expensive for the quality provided. The people from housekeeping staff, specially AWADHESH and SUMIT are very courteous and hard working. A special mention for SARTAJ, the guy who delivered the food to our room. He is really an inspiration. His work spirit and jolly nature impressed me like anything. The overall stay was very good. Though it could be better in terms…

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Rajesh
Detailed Review: Excellent co operation in all side. Food also good. Room service also great. Room is very fresh. In city very better choice. The hotel and service are top notch with friendly staff and fast solution for every query specially thxs to Shruti for providing excellent service

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Dr.Bhushan 007
Detailed Review: We stayed here for our Covid duties at Hilton Saket , Service is far better than where we stayed earlier " The park-Worst service", Starting from front Entrance , Service staff and housekeeping all the staff are so cooperative and helpful at hilton.food is great thali with Special menu. Special mention to Mr. Prashant - Front manager , Sarabjeet  at reception, Digamber room cleaning and many other staff from room service not remember the names. Will come back soon if we get again covid duties.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Chandra
Detailed Review: Stayed at the place in July 2020. Excellent Experience. Thanks to Chef Vikas, Manjeet and Abhishek for the excellent food. Hotel services were top notch. Special thanks to Rishab, Ashish and Faizaan for the same.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Lakshay Beriwal
Detailed Review: One of finest hotels in Delhi. Wonderful staff starting from the main desk to room dine-in staff. Everyone is very cooperative. I want to name some of the staffs who were very helpful Mr Rishabh from Dine in Mr Sandeep from technical department Mr Rohit from room dine in Mr shyamveer

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Dr. Snkalp Sharma
Detailed Review: I stayed there for 20 days. Rishabh from room service and Shekhar from f&b really stood out for me in terms of service. Room was spacious and all amenities were world class. Cleanliness of this hotel must be appreciated as well.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: DrSadanand Khatnawliya MD
Review: Great experience and Helping staff specially Rishabh & Shekhar (Dining/Chef)
Detailed Review: Nice hotel,Good rooms,Helping staff,amazing view from hotel,Good foods and also serving staff. I visited hotel during my COVID-19 duty from Dr RML HOSPITAL. Rishabh and Shekhar (Dining/Chef) are very good ,well mannered, responsible, helpings, and best attitude having guys... I really appreciate their efforts and working style. Keep it up. DR SADANAND KHATNAWLIYA MD MEDICINE FROM ROOM 617 AND 704.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Surbhi B
Detailed Review: Excellent services and staff is so courteous and friendly. I stayed during my covid duty and never missed home. Mr. Rishabh Srivastav would get me complimentary milk without even me asking him to. He remebered the way I liked my coffee.  Sahil on the reception was also exceptionally good and helped me during the time i was up all night, serving me staff coffee since coffee outlets outside were closed and kitchen was closed. I am very grateful for the staff there.  Only thing I didnt like is desk managers are made to stand for 12 hours with no chairs, sitting is not allowed for them. I felt it is inhumane and as a doctor can precipitate varicose veins. I hope the higher staff can pay attention to it and help them. Similar for security guards.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Vatsala M
Review: Good food, great housekeeping  & cleanliness guaranteed!
Detailed Review: We were a little reluctant to check in to a hotel considering the covid situation. But we chose this hotel as Hilton is a trusted brand - and we didn’t regret our decision. Linen was clean, food was amazing & service top- notch.. planning another trip already :)

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Jitz
Detailed Review: Very good ambience and supportive stuffs,specially rishav from room service is very good... whenever I ask for service they just do it smoothly except cleaning things, it would be more better if they do in regular basis...

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Vivek Rawat
Detailed Review: good ambience !!! clean and comfortable rooms!!! helping, well mannered and polite staff especially rohit and rishabh !!!! 24 hours on call service !!! delicious and affordable food !!! close to dlf and select city malls.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Rabia
Detailed Review: It was a very good experience staying in the hotel.. The staff is very helpful, specially faizan, ashish and rohit.. They have made our stay peaceful. Thank u all Hilton staff.. .. Also the location is good..near select city walk mall. Good views, st aff, hospitality makes it stay like home.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Neeraj Verma
Review: Best in class Room cleaning service at Hilton, Saket.
Detailed Review: Aashish and Faizaan really provided best in class service eith their polite behaviour and dedication towards their work. Both worked very calmly and with patience and yet at very fast pace. Also provided minor details i was curious, telling how well versed the are with their job.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Suguna
Detailed Review: Definitely one of the best hotels i've stayed in.The ambience,furniture and services are all very good.View up here is breathtaking.Staff here are so efficient and polite.spl thanks to prashanth for making my stay comfortable.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Gowtham
Detailed Review: hotel is well located amidst saket mall.Very good furnishing,clean rooms and toilets.All the staff are well mannered and very polite. Only improvement I suggest is upgrade the television with modern ones

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Himanshu S
Detailed Review: I am writing this review to tell about the absolute lovely memorable stay that I had here in Hilton Garden Inn, Saket. This is one of the best stays i have had at a hotel, with every one being supportive from the reception to the housekeeping to the kitchen staff. Thank you all for your wonderful 👏 service and special thanks to Rishab Srivastava, Raj and kuldeep

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Dr. Rose
Detailed Review: The staff is very cooperative... Rishabh and Rohit were always keen to provide the required service.. very appreciable hospitality.. Enjoyed the stay.. would recommend for my family and friends.. and looking forward to stay again..

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Abhishek
Detailed Review: Stay was nice and service of Rishab srivastava is very good. Room size is sufficient Location is very reachable in south delhi area All amenities is present inside hotel primises  Walkable distance to saket mall

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Salony
Detailed Review: Excellent services and friendly staff..specially rishab..rooms are comfy and spacious..every complaints are being heard to the earliest..making the experience memorable..Would definitely like to come again

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: ashdoc88
Detailed Review: The room is big enough and nice. It has everything one may need. The mattress in my room had some issue which was partially resolved. The best thing is service of the staff. It is prompt and the staff is cordial. Special thanks to Rishabh for the restaurant service.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Pynroibor Mawblei
Detailed Review: Awsome stay, well maintained rooms, good view, 24*7 service,good wifi connectivity, courteous staff, special mention to Rohit, Rishab, reception staff and the main door guys with black uniforms..kudos

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Ravi123
Detailed Review: Nice stay, very cooperative staff specially by Rohit ana Rishav, well quality of food nice comfortable room well decorated.Good staff response in general, well decorated lunch on DOCTORs day, really touches our heart thank you for ur appreciation and all.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: doctorritu
Detailed Review: Wonderful stay at Hilton. Rooms are well maintained and spacious. Service is really good, courteous staff... Would like to specially mention Rishabh, Rohit and laundry guy. Food was good too.  Overall great stay. Would highly recommend Hilton for stay

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Alex
Detailed Review: The stay was very hygienic and safe..proper sops on sanitisation We’re followed. Food was delicious services offered by staff Mr Rohit ,Mr Rishabh were really good and commendable  would come again for sure

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: DR JATIN BANAL

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Dr. Nipuni
Detailed Review: The hotel is good!  Interior is very fascinating and comfortable!  Staff are very polite and listen to our problems, they solve the problem on time  Food is reasonable and yummy!  Laundry not an issue!  Overall it's very good and I recommend this hotel for your good stay!

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Asmita

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Avninder Singh
Review: During my stay all very good
Detailed Review: All crew very nice and clean. Specially Mukesh,Kuldeep,service from Rohit doing great job keep it up. Like to see again all crew again. Thanks to everyone on desk also for nice treated time to visit again in future.

Name: Rohit Saksena
Detailed Review: Hello there I was an international travelle. Thus on reaching India had to do a compulsory quarantine. The holiday inn staff were very nice and hygiene was maintained to the highest standards. Thank you.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: SurajNandan
Detailed Review: Traveled from Singapore to Delhi. Was held up for a compulsory 7 days quarantine at Delhi prior proceeding to my destination.  Stay at Holiday inn was comfortable. Front desk was hospitable as ever. Sanitation of baggage were done at entrance. Room service were great. Food was well packed and served. Any additional requirement were tended to by the housekeeping. Services like laundry was more than welcome, especially during this time of COVID. Temperature checks were done and on departure a quarantine certificate was given.  Though confined within a room; it was very comfortable and pleasant; courtesy the good staff and comforts the hotel offered.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Avninder Singh
Review: During my stay all very good
Detailed Review: All crew very nice and clean. Specially Mukesh,Kuldeep,service from Rohit doing great job keep it up. Like to see again all crew again. Thanks to everyone on desk also for nice treated time to visit again in future.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Pankaj
Review: Very bad experience during the COVID-19 quarantine period.
Detailed Review: I checked-in into this hotel on 10 July 2020 for quarantine period. The ordeal started right at the time of checking-in. We were a group of 12 guys. Despite booking in advance, the front desk was clearly not prepared at all for a swift checking-in. It took them almost an hour to assign the room. The room was in neat and clean condition. Since we were under quarantine period, the meals were served in the room. To start with, there is no menu to choose from and the meals that are served are far below acceptable level. The menu is almost the same everyday. White rice and yellow dal have been on the menu from day 1. Because of the low quality food, I and my colleague opted to order the food from outside. But since we are not allowed to step out of the room for genuine reasons, we…

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Purva P
Detailed Review: Stayed here for a day for work purpose. Safety of all the guest is well taken care of. I would like to thank the staff here who inspite of working for extra hours due to staff shortage are giving their best. The staff was very professional and knows well to provide the best services to the guest. Special mention of avadhesh from housekeeping and Vivek from IRD for making sure that our stay was comfortable and plesent even during times like this.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Quest346656
Detailed Review: The amazing experience stayed in the month of June 2020. The staff was very cooperative and friendly from security to housekeeping. The room was very clean and the food was really delicious, will definitely visit again.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Wilson_Ma
Detailed Review: I stayed at this Hilton location for 1 month and I almost did not want to go home! It is definitely one of the best Hilton locations that I have stayed in.  The view in my room is wonderful. The bed and linens are very comfortable. The air conditioning works well. There are plenty of table and storage spaces that works well for longer-term guests.  Devanda Sharma, Rohit Rai, Farhan Mohammed, Deepak and Dhruv from the restaurant made sure that I am happy with my meals every day. Rohit even offered to bring me ice cream after dinner!   Prashant, Frashan, Sarabjeet and Pushkar at the front desk were the most helpful, Sachin and Sandeep from maintenance made sure that the AC run well in the building, and the staff from laundry and housekeeping is amazing!    Thank you, ALL OF YOU,…

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Shaily dutt
Detailed Review: Thanx hilton garden inn saket for the amazing stay ,specially prashant seenu for cooperation, we were on covid duty dere and during that stressfull phase hilton staff was very supportive .. Thank u hilton

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Archana
Review: Review regarding hotel hilto saket, delhi
Detailed Review: I stayed in hotel hilton garden inn saket, new delhi for more than two weeks. Staff was very coperative and friendly especially mr prashant and pushkar. Services were good. I highly recommend it. 🙏🙏

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Avni
Detailed Review: I stayed at the hotel for 3 weeks and the staff ensured that I was comfortable all the way. Nabina and Pushkar at the front desk, who were all smiles and forever willing to help, made me feel at home, from getting me water at 2 am to running up to my room to provide me something as small as an eraser. Rishabh Srivastava always provided excellent room service, and served me food with a delightful greeting. Rohit and Farhan went out of their way to ensure that I got what I wanted to eat, as did Chef Deepak, to whom I am truly grateful. Sumit from housekeeping was very polite and diligently performed his duties. Mukesh and Kuldeep also deserve to be applauded for their swift work. It was a comfortable stay, and even though the facilities such as the restaurant and the pool were…

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Dasara N
Detailed Review: Not to mention, the location is set at a place where everything is available as the whole shopping complex is just right next to it.The rooms were neat,clean,tidy and equipped with the basic amenities required.The staff was very cordially and well behaved.A special mention to Mr Prashant and Mr Pushkar who were very helpful at the need of the hour-pandemic times.All in all had a pleasant experience and would highly recommend it.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Ashu
Detailed Review: A perfect Business stay at Hilton before travelling back to work ,Hotel services are up to the Mark especilly the inroom Dining packing box ( they are serving the food with full hygine) Special Mention to Prashant from front office,Rohit rai from inroom services. Please go and stay here as their staff follow all guidelines use masks,gloves...see you soon in my next visit

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Ekta
Review: Hospitality par excellence. Keep it up!!
Detailed Review: Great location, really pleasant and clean rooms as per standard. The hotel staffs are incredibly helpful and generous with their time and advice. Special thanks to Mr. Prashant Seegu-Front Desk for his excellent hospitality and service, He has been attentive to all our queries and rendered prompt service. Raunak from In-room service prompt to our all requests, Kuldeep from HK service  staff  is courteous and ensured timely room service. Surely will visit again.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Nikhil
Detailed Review: Had a great time during my stay ..  housekeeping services are really nice and polite  especially Rohit, Rishab and Raj were really helpful during my stay .. they were first to address any minor issues too  This stay was really pleasant.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: oiendrila sarkar
Review: A pleasant stay during COVID_19 duty
Detailed Review: It was an exceptional stay, with very efficient staff rendering to our service . They r trying to maintaining proper hygienic and sanitisation. Special mention to Rishabh , who comes to deliver our meals and always with a there with a smiling face . Good work team Hilton

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Drpankul M
Detailed Review: Really wonderful and quick service by all hotel  staff especially to mention Mr Rishabh Srivastav .staff made me very comfortable by their efficient service. The variety and quality of food is awesome. The rooms are equipped with all basic facilities which gives utmost comfort. Would like to come here again in future.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Astha sahu
Detailed Review: After having stressful covid duties,staying in Hilton was such a relief..whole staff was so cooperative,helpful and hospitality from staff specially Mr.prashant,Mr pushkar and housekeeping Mr mukesh were appreciable..the facilities provided including food were very good.so I would definitely recommend staying at Hilton and giving them a rating of 10/10.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Shreya
Detailed Review: Thank you for the amazing stay and the hospitality extended by your staff.  Rishabh was a wonderful host. After coming from hectic duties, the room was a relaxing abode and the ambience of the hotel, the food, the services extended by the hotel was a welcome relief. Would definitely recommend it to my friends and acquaintances.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Taruna Bhati
Detailed Review: Thanks Hilton for an amazing stay. The whole staff was really helpful and cooperative, Prashant, Mukesh and Rishabh to name a few. We, the doctors of RML hospital, were staying here for covid duties and our quarantine and this place always felt like home. Thanks again 🌸

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Dr nidhi
Detailed Review: Such an amazing staff and hospitality . I was staying here for over a month during the pandemic and i was so impressed with everything. Thankyou so much for an amazing stay . Prashant , rishabh , mukesh , pushkar were some of the amazing people here.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Dozakhup
Detailed Review: Good location of the hotel and friendly reception. Home like environment with all amenities. Excellent climate control and inhouse entertainment facilities. Fantastic and delicious food. Excellent room service by Mr.Rohit.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: lobojerome
Detailed Review: Well located - Excellent and modern amenities of top quality- very clean and well maintained - decent food, though not much variety - polite and courteous staff , especially Mr.Rohit. Stayed during COVID pandemic and good precautions taken by staff including maintaining social distance, using masks and frequent sanitation

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Parul S
Detailed Review: My stay here was extremely comfortable courtesy of very polite  staff here in Hilton. The rooms are sparkling clean and service is superb. Special thanks to Prashant for helping me out with every lil thing. Would definitely recommend your stay here as the location of property is accessible. Would definitely come back here!

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Dr Anmol
Detailed Review: Excellent room service by Rohit Good spacious room with clean washrooms, nice ambience, comfortable bed. Big screen TV for room entertainment. Food quality was good especially, breakfast although lunch and dinner could be better. Its everything you look for a pleasant stay.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Amit Jha
Detailed Review: Great people with great service...Very helpful staff... delicious food... excellent view from the rooms...Special thanks to Mr.Sameer for his excellent service and hospitality... you guys are the best..!! See you soon..!

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Sourav Chowdhury
Detailed Review: Very good service...during this pandemic.Very  Mr.Mukesh,Kuldeep & Raj were there during today's room-service...Very polite and gentle behaviour towards co-workers & customers too.. Bt the authority should be more careful & conscious about their(housekeeping dept's) personal safety FIRST...thank you👍

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Himanshulakhani
Detailed Review: Sumit Kumar from Housekeeping did a very good job in cleaning my room and providing me with essential supplies. He was really efficient and courteous. I will recommend this hotel to anyone who is travelling to Delhi.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: siddharth s
Detailed Review: The ambience is very friendly and very good services , the staff is very helpful including prashant (desk manager), and Ashish, and also very good services in the hotel, value for money. I am a doctor and was in this hotel for a month and never faced any problem .the net section is also there which helps you take online printout for any documents if required

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Manish Kumar
Detailed Review: Nice hotel and locality, supporting staff and management,clean rooms, if you come to Saket, you will love to stay in this hotel, nearby locations is sorrounded by mall, qutab Kumar is also very close to saket.pleasant stay.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Hooray H
Detailed Review: We had to stay over whilst trying to escape from India & were fortunate enough to get a room in this simple, clean, efficient Hotel not far from the Airport. The Airport taxi did scam us though! Room service only- the aloo parantas were not the best but they all use this awful highly processed flour & God knows when the potatoes were boiled! Not expensive- but clean & modern.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Arzoo B
Detailed Review: I travelled back to India on a relief flight from Toronto and quarantined for 7 days at Holiday Inn. The service, staff, food, room everything was top notch, clean and safe. Highly recommend it!  Thank you, Mr. Manish Sherawat and the team. They were super helpful through out my stay at the hotel.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Mr. Manish Sharma
Detailed Review: Stayed here for 7 days quarantine, super excellent service, very cooperative staff. Best experience. I would always wish to chose Holiday Inn for their service and support. Plz do opt in for this group of hotels only.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Yashika jain
Review: My quarantine experience in Holiday Inn,Aerocity
Detailed Review: Just wow. Amazing service, friendly staff memebers and above all They served really healthy and yummy food in whole period of quarantine. Big thank you to Mr.Manish as well as all other staff members for making it our easy and safe stay.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Quest346656
Detailed Review: The amazing experience stayed in the month of June 2020. The staff was very cooperative and friendly from security to housekeeping. The room was very clean and the food was really delicious, will definitely visit again.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Wilson_Ma
Detailed Review: I stayed at this Hilton location for 1 month and I almost did not want to go home! It is definitely one of the best Hilton locations that I have stayed in.  The view in my room is wonderful. The bed and linens are very comfortable. The air conditioning works well. There are plenty of table and storage spaces that works well for longer-term guests.  Devanda Sharma, Rohit Rai, Farhan Mohammed, Deepak and Dhruv from the restaurant made sure that I am happy with my meals every day. Rohit even offered to bring me ice cream after dinner!   Prashant, Frashan, Sarabjeet and Pushkar at the front desk were the most helpful, Sachin and Sandeep from maintenance made sure that the AC run well in the building, and the staff from laundry and housekeeping is amazing!    Thank you, ALL OF YOU,…

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Shaily dutt
Detailed Review: Thanx hilton garden inn saket for the amazing stay ,specially prashant seenu for cooperation, we were on covid duty dere and during that stressfull phase hilton staff was very supportive .. Thank u hilton

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Archana
Review: Review regarding hotel hilto saket, delhi
Detailed Review: I stayed in hotel hilton garden inn saket, new delhi for more than two weeks. Staff was very coperative and friendly especially mr prashant and pushkar. Services were good. I highly recommend it. 🙏🙏

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Avni
Detailed Review: I stayed at the hotel for 3 weeks and the staff ensured that I was comfortable all the way. Nabina and Pushkar at the front desk, who were all smiles and forever willing to help, made me feel at home, from getting me water at 2 am to running up to my room to provide me something as small as an eraser. Rishabh Srivastava always provided excellent room service, and served me food with a delightful greeting. Rohit and Farhan went out of their way to ensure that I got what I wanted to eat, as did Chef Deepak, to whom I am truly grateful. Sumit from housekeeping was very polite and diligently performed his duties. Mukesh and Kuldeep also deserve to be applauded for their swift work. It was a comfortable stay, and even though the facilities such as the restaurant and the pool were…

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Dasara N
Detailed Review: Not to mention, the location is set at a place where everything is available as the whole shopping complex is just right next to it.The rooms were neat,clean,tidy and equipped with the basic amenities required.The staff was very cordially and well behaved.A special mention to Mr Prashant and Mr Pushkar who were very helpful at the need of the hour-pandemic times.All in all had a pleasant experience and would highly recommend it.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Ashu
Detailed Review: A perfect Business stay at Hilton before travelling back to work ,Hotel services are up to the Mark especilly the inroom Dining packing box ( they are serving the food with full hygine) Special Mention to Prashant from front office,Rohit rai from inroom services. Please go and stay here as their staff follow all guidelines use masks,gloves...see you soon in my next visit

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Ekta
Review: Hospitality par excellence. Keep it up!!
Detailed Review: Great location, really pleasant and clean rooms as per standard. The hotel staffs are incredibly helpful and generous with their time and advice. Special thanks to Mr. Prashant Seegu-Front Desk for his excellent hospitality and service, He has been attentive to all our queries and rendered prompt service. Raunak from In-room service prompt to our all requests, Kuldeep from HK service  staff  is courteous and ensured timely room service. Surely will visit again.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Nikhil
Detailed Review: Had a great time during my stay ..  housekeeping services are really nice and polite  especially Rohit, Rishab and Raj were really helpful during my stay .. they were first to address any minor issues too  This stay was really pleasant.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: oiendrila sarkar
Review: A pleasant stay during COVID_19 duty
Detailed Review: It was an exceptional stay, with very efficient staff rendering to our service . They r trying to maintaining proper hygienic and sanitisation. Special mention to Rishabh , who comes to deliver our meals and always with a there with a smiling face . Good work team Hilton

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Drpankul M
Detailed Review: Really wonderful and quick service by all hotel  staff especially to mention Mr Rishabh Srivastav .staff made me very comfortable by their efficient service. The variety and quality of food is awesome. The rooms are equipped with all basic facilities which gives utmost comfort. Would like to come here again in future.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Astha sahu
Detailed Review: After having stressful covid duties,staying in Hilton was such a relief..whole staff was so cooperative,helpful and hospitality from staff specially Mr.prashant,Mr pushkar and housekeeping Mr mukesh were appreciable..the facilities provided including food were very good.so I would definitely recommend staying at Hilton and giving them a rating of 10/10.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Shreya
Detailed Review: Thank you for the amazing stay and the hospitality extended by your staff.  Rishabh was a wonderful host. After coming from hectic duties, the room was a relaxing abode and the ambience of the hotel, the food, the services extended by the hotel was a welcome relief. Would definitely recommend it to my friends and acquaintances.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Taruna Bhati
Detailed Review: Thanks Hilton for an amazing stay. The whole staff was really helpful and cooperative, Prashant, Mukesh and Rishabh to name a few. We, the doctors of RML hospital, were staying here for covid duties and our quarantine and this place always felt like home. Thanks again 🌸

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Dr nidhi
Detailed Review: Such an amazing staff and hospitality . I was staying here for over a month during the pandemic and i was so impressed with everything. Thankyou so much for an amazing stay . Prashant , rishabh , mukesh , pushkar were some of the amazing people here.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Dozakhup
Detailed Review: Good location of the hotel and friendly reception. Home like environment with all amenities. Excellent climate control and inhouse entertainment facilities. Fantastic and delicious food. Excellent room service by Mr.Rohit.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: lobojerome
Detailed Review: Well located - Excellent and modern amenities of top quality- very clean and well maintained - decent food, though not much variety - polite and courteous staff , especially Mr.Rohit. Stayed during COVID pandemic and good precautions taken by staff including maintaining social distance, using masks and frequent sanitation

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Parul S
Detailed Review: My stay here was extremely comfortable courtesy of very polite  staff here in Hilton. The rooms are sparkling clean and service is superb. Special thanks to Prashant for helping me out with every lil thing. Would definitely recommend your stay here as the location of property is accessible. Would definitely come back here!

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Dr Anmol
Detailed Review: Excellent room service by Rohit Good spacious room with clean washrooms, nice ambience, comfortable bed. Big screen TV for room entertainment. Food quality was good especially, breakfast although lunch and dinner could be better. Its everything you look for a pleasant stay.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Amit Jha
Detailed Review: Great people with great service...Very helpful staff... delicious food... excellent view from the rooms...Special thanks to Mr.Sameer for his excellent service and hospitality... you guys are the best..!! See you soon..!

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Sourav Chowdhury
Detailed Review: Very good service...during this pandemic.Very  Mr.Mukesh,Kuldeep & Raj were there during today's room-service...Very polite and gentle behaviour towards co-workers & customers too.. Bt the authority should be more careful & conscious about their(housekeeping dept's) personal safety FIRST...thank you👍

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Himanshulakhani
Detailed Review: Sumit Kumar from Housekeeping did a very good job in cleaning my room and providing me with essential supplies. He was really efficient and courteous. I will recommend this hotel to anyone who is travelling to Delhi.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: siddharth s
Detailed Review: The ambience is very friendly and very good services , the staff is very helpful including prashant (desk manager), and Ashish, and also very good services in the hotel, value for money. I am a doctor and was in this hotel for a month and never faced any problem .the net section is also there which helps you take online printout for any documents if required

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Manish Kumar
Detailed Review: Nice hotel and locality, supporting staff and management,clean rooms, if you come to Saket, you will love to stay in this hotel, nearby locations is sorrounded by mall, qutab Kumar is also very close to saket.pleasant stay.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Gaurav Naugain
Detailed Review: Spent my 7 day Institutional Quarantine here during June 2020 and found the services really impressive. They have proper arrangements and services for safety of their guests. Meals were great. Rooms are spacious.  Special Thanks to Manisha and Karthik for their kind gesture and hospitality.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: JSSudan
Detailed Review: I have stayed for a fortnight with my husband for work related requirements at the hotel. We felt well looked after in the premises. Extremely happy to see the enthusiasm and energy exuded by the staff, despite  the challenge of the pandemic and hence extra workload. A special mention about the interesting menu and service by the in room dining team.  The housekeeping staff were in top form always. I would like to mention Jyoti( the only lady in encountered in the team) who displayed good leadership and professionalism along with Banawath, who never let his handicap come in the way of his  service. Definitely going to come back again as earlier. Keep up the good work. Kudos and godbless.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Madan chetry
Detailed Review: Devender AND prince from.housekeeping floor.Incharge anuj is Very helpfull & MY Room no is 406.Its a Good Time Here is First Time for me alotf Hotel.Good experience execilents service Good food.over ALL was excelent keep it Up... As

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Saumya J
Detailed Review: I stayed at Hilton Garden during my covid duty ( I m a doc ) It was a great great experience.  The staff was so humble. Room was amazing, food was nice. There is some kind of positive vibe every staff member has. I stayed there for a month and I m glad to say that these people made my duty much easier by their services. Special thanks to Mr Prashant ( duty manager) for being so kind! Looking forward to have a pool party when everything gets fine!!

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Bidule05
Detailed Review: Good location of this hotel, close to the international airport. We spent one night in the Holiday Inn airport. The room was well equipped and beds were very comfortable. Food was good in the restaurant The staff was professional

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Pallak
Detailed Review: Great service. Comfortable and spacious rooms. Friendly, polite and efficient staff. Check-in and check out process  was also smooth. The hotel took all possible precautions during quarantine. Overall a good experience...

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Kudrat K
Detailed Review: Very spacious room, comfortable bed, big desk to work, friendly staff, great service and great location. Food was awesome though bit expensive but worth it. Close to the Indira Gandhi international airport. Love to stay again.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Saumya J
Detailed Review: I stayed at Hilton Garden during my covid duty ( I m a doc ) It was a great great experience.  The staff was so humble. Room was amazing, food was nice. There is some kind of positive vibe every staff member has. I stayed there for a month and I m glad to say that these people made my duty much easier by their services. Special thanks to Mr Prashant ( duty manager) for being so kind! Looking forward to have a pool party when everything gets fine!!

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Primal Survivor
Detailed Review: Third Stay In Lemon tree   Stayed in room 1441/ 1430 for one night . Due to flight rescheduling , the hotel was kind enough to accommodate my family of four .  ~ sanitized regularly . ~ minimal interaction with staff . Breakfast (pre designed) served in room so are other meals .  ~ minimalist furniture  ~ laundry done in systematically  Review 4/5 Recommendation Yes 👍

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: ATee
Review: Wonderful stay but the sneakily imposed service charge left a bitter taste.
Detailed Review: The room was great. It was clean, tidy and large enough.  No complains about that. Pickup from the railway station and drop at the airport was arranged as well, thankful about that. Room service menu was limited which is well, understandable given the times but still I found the service to be a bit slow. Food tasted good tho, so kudos for that. All in all, a nice stay until the checkout.  Well, the night before I had called reception to inquire about the service charge which let's be frank, isn't anything other than gratuity.  It's hidden among the taxes and in fact tax is calculated on the SC as well. So I ask reception about it and she says it's not mandatory. So I told her, I didn't want it added to the dinner bill because I didn't like it. Just dinner, not the other meals,…

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Shivam Gupta
Detailed Review: We had an amazing experience at lemon tree premier aerocity delhi during my stay(from ongc) .I was impressed by the hotel hygiene standards that they followed ( to avoid covid) . They also provided  high quality food ( with good taste ofcourse) and served so professionally.  They maintained  social distancing ( as restaurant was closed and they served in the room)...Met chef chambial during my checkout . He was so humble and courteous. He was concerned about our (me and my colleagues)stay and the food.Lovely meeting him and yes I believe that  this hotel is  safe and followed all safety procedures to avoid covid as I experienced

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: kabh
Detailed Review: nice stay good service and behaviour rooms are cosy and clean food delicious...tarun yadav good behaviour will soon visit the hotel looking forward for another stay....view of select City walk is nyc and posh market surrounding the hotel and area will make you feel like u r in a European city

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Damini
Detailed Review: Great service. Amazing staff. No less than covid warriors. Thanks to prashant, pushkar,tajamul,faisan,soniya, deshpal ji and all other staff. All of them were really welcoming and co-operative. 2 months done right 😀

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Priya singh
Review: Excellent services and friendly staff s
Detailed Review: Nice hotel, locality is convenient. Rooms are big.. Nicely decorated... Full of positive vibes... Neat nd clean.. Staffs of hotel r very responsive to our needs.... Especially... I admire d most Mr. PRASHANT... ☺..

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: kabh
Detailed Review: nice stay good service and behaviour rooms are cosy and clean food delicious...tarun yadav good behaviour will soon visit the hotel looking forward for another stay....view of select City walk is nyc and posh market surrounding the hotel and area will make you feel like u r in a European city

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Damini
Detailed Review: Great service. Amazing staff. No less than covid warriors. Thanks to prashant, pushkar,tajamul,faisan,soniya, deshpal ji and all other staff. All of them were really welcoming and co-operative. 2 months done right 😀

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Priya singh
Review: Excellent services and friendly staff s
Detailed Review: Nice hotel, locality is convenient. Rooms are big.. Nicely decorated... Full of positive vibes... Neat nd clean.. Staffs of hotel r very responsive to our needs.... Especially... I admire d most Mr. PRASHANT... ☺..

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: pares-2020
Detailed Review: When the lockdown started in the month I was in self quarantine at Holidayinn but I had a bad experience there so as soon my Self quarantine ended I immediately shifted to Lemon Tree and from 6th April to 8th May 2020 I stayed there during the middle of Lockdown. The hotel was so lovely and the staffs were very friendly. The foods are very good. The hotel was very much maintaining hygienic. Mr. Akash and Santosh from Housekeeping were very helpful and very customer centric staff. They always keep my room very much clean and hygienic so that I feel like home for that entire month. Mr. Laxmi from Room Dinning department was also very friendly and very much customer centric and always tried to sent me best food according to my taste and demand. Such kind of people will definitely…

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Alexander E
Review: Remarkable days in Lemon Tree Hotel during lockdown
Detailed Review: Hello. My name is Alexander, i'm from Russia, St. Petersburg and I would like to share my gratitude to Lemon Tree Hotel Staff. We stayed in this hotel during COVID-19 lockdown waiting for our flight to motherland. There were many uncertainties and tension in the atmosphere before we arrived to Lemon Tree Hotel. Within two days of staying there everything become much better. We had special meal requirements and it was decided immediately by management of hotel. Special dishes, dining hall, distribution area, all utensils... kitchen team organised everything with great humility and remarkable flexibility . Many thanks to the whole of kitchen team, especcialy to Amit who seemed to be the happiest person to serve and help us even in the minute things. Also I was pleasantly impressed…

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Alexander Malakhov
Review: Amazing hospitality at the time of lockdown
Detailed Review: Namaste! True efficiency of a hotel can be assessed at the time of crisis, rather than when everything goes on smoothly. This is very much true of Lemon Tree Premier - Delhi Airport (Asset No. 6, Aerocity Hospitality District, IGI Airport, New Delhi 110037). My name is Alexander, I come from Russia, St. Petersburg. I happened to stay at this hotel for about two weeks in April, 2020. It was not my choice. My group of 75 members and myself got stranded in Delhi. Our flight had been cancelled due to the coronavirus pandemic. In spite of the critical condition of lockdown in Delhi and the limited staff engaged in rendering the services at the hotel, we were surprised to find such a high level of management and administration. All my group members were students of the Brahma Kumaris…

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Virginia
Review: Нахожусь в отеле Lemon tree уже 4 дня
Detailed Review: Excellent service, professionals work in their field. Perform work on time, every day room cleaning. Everything is brought to the room on request very quickly. Are friend body staff. And Avadhesh, Santosh and bablu yadav did their job perfectly.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Rakesh
Detailed Review: I visited that place couple of months ago. The place was very clean with great ambience. Also the location is very good you can shop nearby or buy stuff for yourself. The staff was very nice and calm, always there to attend their guests with a nice gesture

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Bruce O
Detailed Review: This hotel is exceptional!! I chose the hotel for location, and enjoyed walking around the area and all the shopping options. But I was very happily surprised at the supreme quality of service and the stunningly delicious food!! I checked in just after noon and was hungry so I went to the restaurant and they had  a buffet setup with a huge variety of food, each dish absolutely delicious...I left stuffed and happy and could not wait for my next meal! Service in the restaurant was impeccable and each staff member I encountered throughout the hotel was friendly and helpful. I was treated like I was the only guest in the hotel by everyone I met. Next time I travel to Delhi I'm absolutely returning to the Hilton Garden Inn!!

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Shalaka P
Detailed Review: The staff was absolutely wonderful and genuinely cared so much about each and every guest! We were so pleased by our stay there, will definitely choose this place when we are here again. We also enjoyed the food, especially the breakfast buffet very much.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Ray K
Review: Wonderful Hilton stay and wonderful staff!
Detailed Review: I never leave reviews unless it is truly needed... This is one of those times I need to.   We stayed at the Hilton dehli Saket market. I would like to stay our stay, was wonderful. Great service and we loved everyone. I would especially like to shout out to front desk employee Prashant Seegu for his help with EVERYTHING. We had to cancel many plans and had international phones and a language barrier to overcome. This employee showed us apps to use, gave us very useful info regarding travel and even helped cancel our flights so we could get a refund. Not to mention help plan our NEW stuff to Goa as last min plans with Corona  virus. He did this while also doing his normal appointed job and assisting other customers as well. Well done Prashant!

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Asif F
Detailed Review: Services are absolutely great it starts with entering the hotel main door security Chandan & Deshpal are very good in attending and welcoming the guests. Then comes our reception part they are amazing people faizan and tajamul very professional in their behaviour customer handling is great hats off. IT has improved a lot and thanks for making my stay wonderful.  Love to visit again.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: SDSharma
Detailed Review: Very good food & service. The staff, Mr Dhruv  & Mr Rohit were very attentive & prompt. We got very good food which were as per our choice. The location is also very convenient to me. We enjoyed the food very much.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: jass_eat
Detailed Review: Cheesecake topped with raspberry @ Hiltongardeninn . . When you are looking for a fine dinning place don't think twice for this place.. Food Quality:💯 Service:💯 Ambience::💯 I love to go to india grill @hilton  again and again, and specially I would like to mention about their staff Tanya for taking care very well!!

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Karan12321
Detailed Review: Best services done . Location is very good Dhruv Sahil rahul and Devinder is very helpful they took our good care . Free WiFi available, rooms are very big thanks for serving us very well and will surely come back again

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Krishan chopera
Detailed Review: The hotel is at very goo location . Came here for dinner services was fantastic  and very quick Sahil devinder abhishek dhruv were great at there sevice bartender abhishek served us drinks fantabulously made very happy  with the service

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Kaurakiran
Review: Excellent service done by sahil and devinder
Detailed Review: Best hotel situated in best location service was fantastic sahil served us very well manager devinder is very helpful with the service rooms are big free wifi available in the room lot of varieties in dinner with plentiful desserts and starters thanku for the service

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Amar
Detailed Review: It’s always pleasure to stay with Hilton. I stay here very frequently and like their hospitality and service. Indy, Deshpal, Om Narayan, from security department are of special mention for their great service for every customer

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: PHG
Detailed Review: Throughout our stay we have been greeted by staff and asked how they can help.   They have all been very responsive to our needs.  Raj has done a wonderful job keeping our room clean and updated with all the amenities.   We would recommend this hotel.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Maninder Trewn
Detailed Review: The serving staff and mangers at the India Grill restaurant in the Hilton was very courteous and professional during my stay. I specially want to mention Mharoni Murry for her attention to detail and outstanding service. She is an asset to the establishment.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Manisha
Detailed Review: All food is fresh n tasty from Mr pradeep Kumar chef who helped us with  no onion no garlic food and thanks to our server mr faran who wowed us with his warm hospitality and his supporter tanya ..........

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Yuvraj
Detailed Review: Chandan’s and Sonia’s security alertness and friendliness is good. Nice in behaviour and my best experience at first in this hotel. Great time here and the staff is is well equipped and properly maintaining themselves.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Paresh K
Detailed Review: Just finished a short trip to Delhi, staying at the Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi / Saket.  While the rooms themselves are a little bit tired, the staff are warm and welcoming as always.  A special shout out to Maureen Murri for her great attention and service!

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: KURSTIN SCIBERRAS EDWARDS
Detailed Review: Chandan and komal dedhpal security service is good ,main doorsecurity is every day every time simling and very helpful .i fisrt time stay in hilton garden inn saket hotel,hotel staff is good .special thanks to security.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Jerinjohn
Detailed Review: Went out for a dinner at India Grill, and Dhruv who took care of our table was exceptional and very kind. The pizza was really great, starts (fish tikka and chicken kebab) was great. Also, methi gosh was the highlight of the dinner. Would definitely come back.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Prakash Khemani
Detailed Review: Great Time and service. Indu was very helpful at security. Thanks. All services were good. Location also excellent betwen 2 malls. Food was great and room was very clean and neat. Wish the stafff alll the best.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Lakhbir singh
Detailed Review: Very nice clean stay great staff especially Indu pappu and changes who had a great smiles and personality’s. Room was good sized the food was good also.Great location with shopping center right next door. Will have no problem in booking this hotel again.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Nareshpatwari
Review: Good location, good stay, rates little higher side
Detailed Review: Hi, It was a good stay for me when i was travelling via delhi. Very convenient location. only thing is rate could be a bit lower for budget business travellers. Otherwise recommend it for its location.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Ronald L
Detailed Review: Traveling with another couple. Took cab to the Holiday Inn Airport. Very spacious room with king bed and sofa. Large glass table with lamp and lots of electrical outlets for working. In-room safe, refrigerator and electric pot for making coffee. Lots of counter space. Large bathroom with walk-in shower. Comfortable bedding. Breakfast was very good as well with the servers and waiters attending to us. Could not have asked for better service. We stayed here on both ends of our six day visit to India.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Su/Sid
Detailed Review: Stayed at this hotel for 2 nights whilst in transit. The location was very close to the airport in a modern complex.We got complimentary pick up and drop off from the airport. The rooms were fine for our 2 nights stay.The hotel was busy as you would expect.The service was indifferent. No particular mention about our IHG status.The hotel boater a bar,buffet restaurant and a UK chain  italian restaurant .Good thing about this hotel was the location.Plenty of bars and restaurants. Worldmark 1 had an underground food court which was very good.If you want to indulge in a bit of specialty shopping try the DLF Emporio mall (International and Domestic designer brands) and next to that the DLF Promonade mall selling high street brands. Overall adequate stay at this hotel.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Colin
Detailed Review: Stayed three days (tow longer than we planned) due to the coronavirus restrictions on flights and movement. Difficult to comment other than the front dest were very professional and helpful though room service not quite up to scratch (possibly due to the fact the restaurants were closed).

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: VKhanna
Detailed Review: Friendly staff, clean facility, good food, easy access to airport with complimentary shuttle to and from airport. Vivek (housekeeping) Sachin and James (drivers) and concierge were all very professional and attentive. Made my trip to airport easy.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: karenW9105DJ
Review: best rest and stopover when travelling in India
Detailed Review: transport service from/to airport great - no worries. Efficient and professional staff, reception friendly and helpful, room and bath spacious and top class. Great food in the restauant, varied menu, 1st class breakfast buffet, Indian newspapers included. Your slightest wish is adhered to. Great start/end of my Indian journey.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Jac Atkinson
Review: The Hangar Bar at the Holiday Inn, New Delhi Airport
Detailed Review: My sister and I had to curtail our trip to India due to Covid19 and our travel agents booked us into the Holiday Inn for a couple of nights whilst waiting for our flight home.  We went to the Hangar Bar before dinner and were served by a lovely young man called Ashwin Shrestha.  He was absolutely charming, very friendly and chatty without being over-familiar.  He is doing an internship there as part of his degree course.  His English is excellent.  It was such fun chatting to him we had more than one aperitif!

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: AnthonyBurg
Detailed Review: I stayed here for a night while travelling to the Himalayas of Northern India.  The room and bed was perfect and the staff was very nice.  The breakfast bar was the best part.  They had a local Indian cuisine section and a typical continental breakfast section with more "American" food items.  Would stay again in a hearbeat.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: GFYVR
Review: Never paid for a hotel by the hour before....needed one during a layover
Detailed Review: Stayed here during our 18 hour layover.  Was VERY impressed to have a wheelchair accessible room in this hotel that was really nice!  Very well laid out and lots of room to manoeuvre.  Very quiet room too so that you can sleep not matter time of day or the night.  Breakfast included if you are there during breakfast hours in India.  It is in the terminal so you have to be transiting.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: kingvikramaditya
Review: Quality stay nearest to the airport
Detailed Review: Holiday Inn situated in Aerocity is perhaps the best stay one could ask for closest to the Indira Gandhi International Airport. The rooms here offer some much-needed quality sleep and their buffet breakfast is huge! In short, the perfect stay before or after using flight. We'll definitely stay with them the next time.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: anilpand2008
Detailed Review: We stayed for two nights. Shuttle service was very nice and useful. Breakfast was excellent. Service was impeccable.Restaurant had good menu. All in all, a very pleasant experience.Would definitely recommend this hotel.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: davemartin3
Detailed Review: Spent the night here before heading home and had a stay that ticked all the boxes. Speedy processes, nearby places to eat, lovely rooms, helpful staff and great breakfast. Would certainly use again and recommend to others.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Adam
Detailed Review: Entire staff went above and beyond during my short stay.  Great part of town near airport. Food -breakfast and lunch- was great. Pankaj and Amit were excellent! Highly recommend. The rooms were spacious and clean to boot!

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Andres L
Detailed Review: Very good service, clean and delicious place to eat. thanks to Vishal and Vineet for help me in breakfast! The hotel is well located and near to airport, good to relax and having a good time to stay in peace.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: sanjkarve
Detailed Review: Had a three night stay at Holiday Inn. The Staff during Check in was polite and helpfull.We were allotted avroom on 2nd floor.  The Room was well maintained with all basic needs being met. What I specially liked was the way Pillows were marked as Soft and Hard. The sleep quality was fairly Satisfactory.  The Bathroom is ergonomically designed with all requisite necessities.   The In Room Dining was Good and the Chef went out of his way to prepare items which were not on the menu. The Breakfast Buffet had a reasonable spread but VIVA was probably handicapped by shortage of staff.  The Gym facility is reasonable. Mr AJAY the trainer went out of his way to demonstrate the usage of equipment and the machines that we needed to use. He was also helpful in offering us a lot of insight…

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Minesh B
Review: Best service and close to Delhi airport
Detailed Review: Holiday Inn has an excellent staff and their taxi drivers were very courteous and eager to please. Pawan picked us up and took us to Agra for Taj Mahal sightseeing about 4 hours away. He drove fast but with caution and educated us about the area. Other drivers Mohan, Sachin and Rehaan also were just as quick and helpful. Hardev at the restaurant was able to provide us a discount on food as there was a change in room price and they wanted to be accommodating. If you want food choices, Worldmark complex is next door with many Indian and other restaurants

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: GeorgeExRN
Review: Stop over fron Kolkata to Amsterdam
Detailed Review: Situated in a complex of Aerocity with lots of other brand names - i.e JW Marriott etc. Plenty of shops and outlets around the hotel.  Pros Nice welcome as a regular customer (IHG rewards spire elite) - however no explanation of problems with the executive lounge. The executive lounge was closed due re- modelling. But alternatives were provided in Belle Italia which were more than satisfactory. Particularly Shavinar (apologies if the name is incorrect !) who was very helpful and attentive. Bella Italia food was of an acceptable level - pretty much in line with the European prices  Cons High bar and food prices to be expected to a captive audience, in an isolated area - £5 for a 330ml beer is high - even middle eastern prices (UAE) are lower. Strange musty smell on the room -…

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: sumita
Detailed Review: I had dinner few days ago food is OK but pasta not vp to tha mark and I complain to Satyendra   and after that no one served fresh pasta on my table even I call again that same manager on that time his way of talking very rude I did not accept such kind service and food in holiday inn  very pathetic food and my overall dinner experience very bad .

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: vikas v
Detailed Review: We had a family dinner in Viva and really enjoyed the buffet especially live counters and Gulab kheer.Food was really delicious  and service was outstanding. We loved the ambiance of the restaurant and attention provided by the kitchen and service staff. Overall a great place to dine.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: asheesh S
Detailed Review: Just spent a day at Holiday inn aerocity...i have stayed at their another property in chennai so was assured of the basics...this property is also as per expectations...Rooms are the big plus ..large spacious ...i liked them..staff is good ..may be the front desk need more training..they kept asking for my card after ordering room dining..either they should collect card details at the time of check in or allow visitors to settle comfortably...it looked cheap as if u r on  a street restaurant..5 star hotels need to be different the way they work..n in culture...u hv t believe ur customers ..no one is running away .. the front security are also using a thermometer to check against corona virus which i liked ..it gives a feeling of assurance..restaurant Viva is ok and descent…

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Karan behl
Review: Amazing hospitality by airport representatives and hotel staff
Detailed Review: So i booked the hotel for 1 night from 9march,20 . I really like that their was full arrangement at airport for pickup and really cooperative staff like Mr. Ajay at airport was really fantastic in his service, he was really interactive with us.  and Ms. Pooja at front desk she helped us in all possible way and she was really cooperative.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Rajit Pankaj
Detailed Review: It is always a pleasure visiting Holiday Inn Aerocity Vivo for dinner not only caz of the ambience and location but also for their excellent service and so courteous staff. The food is always delicacy but it is also the warm welcome you look for from the staff.   You guys were amazing and I would like to thank you for the amazing evening you delivered to all of us .   Would specially like to appreciate the Surd Guy name Hardeep from Ludhiana who was excellent and really took care of us . He is a gem of a person and I wish him luck ahead as he has a bright future with the trait he cater his his guests.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: KUNAL36
Detailed Review: I had arranged  my Dads' 74th birthday and close friends farewell at their Italian restaurant Bella.  Our event was a super success with not only the best authentic Italian food served but the the way the service was delivered in the most friendly and genuine service style making you one very comfortable.   The restaurant manager Ketan Singh and his colleagues Prateek and Deepak ensured that our whole experience was something  that we would not forget and also being asset to the hotel.  Kudos to the leadership led by Manik Visnoi and the General Manager - Mr Vikas Oswal whose presence made a difference.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Rupesh Kumar P
Detailed Review: One of the best place for meeting or conference ,very good food & service by banquet team.Nice ambience good meeting place all staff was friendly and helpful.I have come to attend corporate meeting in Holiday Inn  Aerocity.Thanks to Mr.Munna and team to wonderful meeting .I love this place and hotel.We ll surely come back for next meeting or stay .

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Su M
Detailed Review: The hotel is clean although rooms on the small side.  Service is excellent and staff friendly and helpful.   Breakfast and food in general really exceptional with a choice of both local and continental food. Would highly recommend

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Birend13
Detailed Review: This Hotel is Centrally located. The staff at this Hotel is Fantastic. We stayed at this Hotel for 3 nights from 1st March 2020. We had 4 rooms . The front Office staff including Ruchi Malik were amazing with there approach and assistance provided. The food was fantastic. One of family member had a birthday and Ruchi had organised a cake which was just amazing. The rooms are very clean and spacious.

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Marlene M
Detailed Review: A very nice hotel in New Delhi. Reception Area is very nice and welcoming. Rooms are nice and comfortable. The view from our room is very nice. Staff are all very friendly too. A nice place to keep you entertained.

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Jainankita
Detailed Review: Sometimes looks are not true specially when we are  entering in a hotel , however rooms are Ok not so great , late response for housekeeping as only few people are working there . I was wondering why so less. I could not see much staff at breakfast area too. However food was tasty and services were on time at restaurant area . Met managers Mrs Ruchi malik and lalit there , they have helped us in personalize services like Jain sabji and paratha . Over all a ok experience since rooms floors and bathrooms are so slippery I felt bad . Rest is ok.

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Jigar
Detailed Review: Rooms are nice , breakfast is the best thing here , one of my reason to stay here is great breakfast managed by perfection, taste of food is so nice , dinner I could not try due to I was busy in aahar, it’s all good nice people, managers like Ruchi and Shabnam makes things perfect . So nice and humorous.

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: amitmittal24
Detailed Review: I hv never come across a hotel as bad as this. The reception staff & front desk staff behave extremely rudely. Everything be it water supply in bathrooms, room size, room interiors, staff grooming, service, everything is horrible. If i get this Hotel for free then also its not worth stepping in this hotel. The check in staff at Reception when complained they say that “we have not asked u to stay in our hotel- U have chosen so U hv no rights to complain”. Hotel policy’s are also terrible.

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Murar
Detailed Review: The hotel is very nice and very Elegant . Person is very lovely and helping . Ms Aman I can recommendations to everybody from Europe America. Room is clean and very nice  beautiful garden spa is nice . Located in a quiet area in Delhi this is a great hotel all around  The staff is friendly and efficient the rooms comfortable and there are enough areas around lobby to sit and have a quiet conversation  The breakfast buffets are sumptuous and the other especially spicy food is excellent. Duty manager Rohit solanki extraordinarily helpful. We had a great day stay Royal plaza  Group LPTI

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Ajay P
Detailed Review: The ambience  and feel of this hotel is fantastic  from the moment  you Arrive  the staff are genuinely warm and welcoming Ashwinder kaur and Aman  The room was very nice and complimentary fruit basket was provided  they are immaculate clean as are adjacent corridors and walkways and there are some interesting  Staute of art on every floor. We had an nice breakfast  morning  with fresh delicious food and beverages . The bar was also great  as was the music and nice drink Rahul and Simran excellent. SIMRAN AT DESK SHE IS NICE . Otherwise highly recommend to everyone.  Duty manager Rohit solanki he is also kind and polite he helped a lot regarding wifi which is given by them it's very helpful for the stay we call to home out country.  You can see culture of the hotel Royal plaza…

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Arif
Detailed Review: Hotel The Royal Plaza is the best Hotel filled with unrivalled charm. From our Airport pick up right through to our check out the service we experienced was first class. We stayed in the Sweet Room in the Royal Plaza and wow we were mesmerized.The Royal plaza has an incredible atmosphere and you can feel and see the beautifully decorated and offer access to the Hotel. The dining experience at the Hotel was fantastic. Breakfast was also great views of the hotel was really amazing. We were celebrating my parents wedding anniversary and the hotel staff went above and beyond to make the experience unforgettable fir the family. Thank you to all the staff who made this so special for us! Guest Relation Puja was incredibly professional and friendly. She helped us alot . The pool was…

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Ashok kumar singh
Detailed Review: Enjoyable  stay with beautiful  and comfortable hotel. Lobby is very beautiful and breakfast  was also nice. Room view was really  attractive and good. Staffs are really good specially  Guest Relation Puja and Rohit. PUJA helped us alot she give us complimentary head massage voucher and also she told us about the Hotel. Great stay with great Hotel and caring staffs. Centrally  located Hotel and everything is near by the Hotel.

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: rajat b
Review: Royal stay at Royal plaza hotel Delhi
Detailed Review: The Royal plaza hotel is very nice and very good location  Hotel have good view room which is very nice. Staff is very good Osama and Ammmn  Very kind and professional check in was good. Good food room garden green pool is very nice green . manager Ashwinder kaur she is very nice.

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: liliana m
Detailed Review: I stay athotel . I enjoyed warm welcome. Food was nice especial for foreginers.  We enjoyed  Rochi malik is a perfecto mánager.   Ambiance is good too. Liked.  Roma Wer celan and confortable Menú is very expensive it souls be cheaper

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Harjit gill
Review: Very Friendly good atmosphere and centre place
Detailed Review: Very friendly staffs and atmosphere is really good and also I would like to say about the atmosphere which I like the most Hotel location is very good it’s in centre of Delhi also metro station Patel chowk is near by the Hotel. Breakfast was good and specially beautiful lobby. Staffs are very friendly and helpful Specially Puja and Ashwinder Kaur they helped me a lot and they are very attentive. Spa is also good I took 15 minute head massage which was complimentary. Few staffs like Rahul Aman and Devi they are very good. Pleasant stay with friendly hotel. Views from room was really good. Overall pleasant stay.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Rakesh
Detailed Review: I visited that place couple of months ago. The place was very clean with great ambience. Also the location is very good you can shop nearby or buy stuff for yourself. The staff was very nice and calm, always there to attend their guests with a nice gesture

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Bruce O
Detailed Review: This hotel is exceptional!! I chose the hotel for location, and enjoyed walking around the area and all the shopping options. But I was very happily surprised at the supreme quality of service and the stunningly delicious food!! I checked in just after noon and was hungry so I went to the restaurant and they had  a buffet setup with a huge variety of food, each dish absolutely delicious...I left stuffed and happy and could not wait for my next meal! Service in the restaurant was impeccable and each staff member I encountered throughout the hotel was friendly and helpful. I was treated like I was the only guest in the hotel by everyone I met. Next time I travel to Delhi I'm absolutely returning to the Hilton Garden Inn!!

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Shalaka P
Detailed Review: The staff was absolutely wonderful and genuinely cared so much about each and every guest! We were so pleased by our stay there, will definitely choose this place when we are here again. We also enjoyed the food, especially the breakfast buffet very much.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Ray K
Review: Wonderful Hilton stay and wonderful staff!
Detailed Review: I never leave reviews unless it is truly needed... This is one of those times I need to.   We stayed at the Hilton dehli Saket market. I would like to stay our stay, was wonderful. Great service and we loved everyone. I would especially like to shout out to front desk employee Prashant Seegu for his help with EVERYTHING. We had to cancel many plans and had international phones and a language barrier to overcome. This employee showed us apps to use, gave us very useful info regarding travel and even helped cancel our flights so we could get a refund. Not to mention help plan our NEW stuff to Goa as last min plans with Corona  virus. He did this while also doing his normal appointed job and assisting other customers as well. Well done Prashant!

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Asif F
Detailed Review: Services are absolutely great it starts with entering the hotel main door security Chandan & Deshpal are very good in attending and welcoming the guests. Then comes our reception part they are amazing people faizan and tajamul very professional in their behaviour customer handling is great hats off. IT has improved a lot and thanks for making my stay wonderful.  Love to visit again.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: SDSharma
