Detailed Review: Very good food & service. The staff, Mr Dhruv  & Mr Rohit were very attentive & prompt. We got very good food which were as per our choice. The location is also very convenient to me. We enjoyed the food very much.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: jass_eat
Detailed Review: Cheesecake topped with raspberry @ Hiltongardeninn . . When you are looking for a fine dinning place don't think twice for this place.. Food Quality:💯 Service:💯 Ambience::💯 I love to go to india grill @hilton  again and again, and specially I would like to mention about their staff Tanya for taking care very well!!

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Karan12321
Detailed Review: Best services done . Location is very good Dhruv Sahil rahul and Devinder is very helpful they took our good care . Free WiFi available, rooms are very big thanks for serving us very well and will surely come back again

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Krishan chopera
Detailed Review: The hotel is at very goo location . Came here for dinner services was fantastic  and very quick Sahil devinder abhishek dhruv were great at there sevice bartender abhishek served us drinks fantabulously made very happy  with the service

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Kaurakiran
Review: Excellent service done by sahil and devinder
Detailed Review: Best hotel situated in best location service was fantastic sahil served us very well manager devinder is very helpful with the service rooms are big free wifi available in the room lot of varieties in dinner with plentiful desserts and starters thanku for the service

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Amar
Detailed Review: It’s always pleasure to stay with Hilton. I stay here very frequently and like their hospitality and service. Indy, Deshpal, Om Narayan, from security department are of special mention for their great service for every customer

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: PHG
Detailed Review: Throughout our stay we have been greeted by staff and asked how they can help.   They have all been very responsive to our needs.  Raj has done a wonderful job keeping our room clean and updated with all the amenities.   We would recommend this hotel.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Maninder Trewn
Detailed Review: The serving staff and mangers at the India Grill restaurant in the Hilton was very courteous and professional during my stay. I specially want to mention Mharoni Murry for her attention to detail and outstanding service. She is an asset to the establishment.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Manisha
Detailed Review: All food is fresh n tasty from Mr pradeep Kumar chef who helped us with  no onion no garlic food and thanks to our server mr faran who wowed us with his warm hospitality and his supporter tanya ..........

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Yuvraj
Detailed Review: Chandan’s and Sonia’s security alertness and friendliness is good. Nice in behaviour and my best experience at first in this hotel. Great time here and the staff is is well equipped and properly maintaining themselves.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Paresh K
Detailed Review: Just finished a short trip to Delhi, staying at the Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi / Saket.  While the rooms themselves are a little bit tired, the staff are warm and welcoming as always.  A special shout out to Maureen Murri for her great attention and service!

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: KURSTIN SCIBERRAS EDWARDS
Detailed Review: Chandan and komal dedhpal security service is good ,main doorsecurity is every day every time simling and very helpful .i fisrt time stay in hilton garden inn saket hotel,hotel staff is good .special thanks to security.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Jerinjohn
Detailed Review: Went out for a dinner at India Grill, and Dhruv who took care of our table was exceptional and very kind. The pizza was really great, starts (fish tikka and chicken kebab) was great. Also, methi gosh was the highlight of the dinner. Would definitely come back.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Prakash Khemani
Detailed Review: Great Time and service. Indu was very helpful at security. Thanks. All services were good. Location also excellent betwen 2 malls. Food was great and room was very clean and neat. Wish the stafff alll the best.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Lakhbir singh
Detailed Review: Very nice clean stay great staff especially Indu pappu and changes who had a great smiles and personality’s. Room was good sized the food was good also.Great location with shopping center right next door. Will have no problem in booking this hotel again.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Andrew
Detailed Review: Nice ambiance and nice staff , very near to airport and convenient to travel to Delhi and other places and market. Love coming to India for warmth and lovely people. Very central place to travel to other parts of Delhi.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: christine bell
Detailed Review: Great hotel.. was placed here as our tour was stopped due to covid and had to get home Rooms are small side ..location is ideal everything is right outside of hotel.hotel took all precautions  hand sanitizer and temp checks. This hotel was perfect proximity if airport..good hotel for a stopover

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Sanna
Detailed Review: I would like to appreciate Mr  Pawan Sharma from housekeeping service of his service, a very good gesture of him,,, proactive ,helpful , a very good service by him god bless  Him,,Great hotel, clean rooms Very friendly and helpful staff, Specially Shweta Reception staff That girl explained well about tariff and all. Great location, close to shopping centre and cinemas Amazing l

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Sonam R
Detailed Review: Hotel and hotel staff is very nice.. In fact the room dining is very cooperative.. They are very kind, generous.   Special thanks to pawan who's from cleaning dept.. He was very kind and he made our stay very comfortable.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Oshin D
Detailed Review: Pavan Sharma n rajat from the housekeeping department is absolutely wonderful n helpful...lovely person who knows how to speak well n also comfort the guest.. keep up the good work..Pawan was very calm while handling the situation..😊

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Ji W
Detailed Review: Chef Chambial greeted us personally at our breakfast table and gave us a interesting history and philosophy of the Lemon tree chain. We were amazed about that.  At the end, he also offered us some traditional hot drinks.  The rooms have absolutely got the international standards. I had a very comfortable stay and I was super satisfied with all the nice services all over here.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Mohd Z
Detailed Review: Thank you lemon tree staff for great service at all ends.I love to stay here every time I stay in delhi for work.this could be my 7th visit and I stay for more then 10 days every time. Great hosptality by Sartaj,prompt service every time. Beautuful and well maintained clean Tables. Amit singh and sartaj take very good care of my stay and there team. Would love to come here soon.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: mohd saqibsaqib
Detailed Review: Excellent stay and staff was awesome especially Sartaj (guest services executive ) and Amit Singh,(Food and Beverage Manager ). Them hospitality was par excellence. Ambience,Decor,food and cleanliness was excellent.Restaurent Was so beautiful and very quiet ,I wish the management all the best and success in future improve where ever improvement is necessitated great.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: hitesh k
Detailed Review: At the moment when the world is all worried about themselves. Baljit the manager, went of the way and helped me in getting my stuff from airport. I am so thankful to him, will remember this stay. This was actually the genuine care we all crave for. Can't wait to stay here again.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Basant
Detailed Review: like the variety and the quality of the food chef chambial was very active and concern about the food and my needs...really like the dose and the south Indian food ...it was my first visit here but these people make me so comfortable that i feel like home away home..thanks to chef brijesh and vinod

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: RagP65
Detailed Review: Had to cancel my bookings for two rooms as I cannot fly to India due to Visa restrictions for UK citizens by the Indian government. Hotel duty manager has refused to offer any refunds, about Rs14k. Would advise people to consider seriously about booking with this hotel group in the future.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Mbosma
Detailed Review: Completely to my satisfaction. The consept of the lavish buffet where a person can get anything him self is very good. Thequality of the food  was again very good  like the indian dishes    ...met chefvinod and chef chambial.  Thankyou

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: K Katari
Detailed Review: Chambial the head pantry chef showed incredible hospitality. The buffet menu had good food options. Pastry was delicious. Staff were every courteous. Hospitality was at par with major 5 star hotel chains. Would recommend to friends and family.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Footprints813631
Detailed Review: I stay in this hotel very often in lemon tree because of good service.I stayed in bangalore and Hyderabad and Chandigarh as well, but the type of service and attention I get here is remarkable. All credit to Sartaj and very handsome guy Amit singh who take good care of me and my special requirements.  Thanks for great hospitality.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Saurabh Kumar
Detailed Review: Dear team, The hotel staff are polite and calm. They listen carefully our concern and try to help it out.met kapil Breakfast wowwwwww 🤗amazing.thanks to chef chambial Lunch and dinner are good.  I am upset 😞 about the hotel management because they don't think that water is necessity. They should think it in better manner. Thank you.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Ashish sharma
Detailed Review: Like the ambiance of this hotel and food was so finger licking ..had breakfast with my family and had an amazing  experience. Staff was very friendly and helpful especially chef adi.chambial. thank you for the lovely  experience

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Meenal
Detailed Review: Very nice hotel near airport. Room was very clean and comfortable, and the staff were extremely helpful especially Uma at front desk. The hospitality shown by her was second to none, I was treated wonderfully. Inspite of heavy rush my check in done by her was very smooth and quick. Thank you so much.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Himanshu
Review: “ OM-A-LETTE ME DO YOU A FAVOUR..."
Detailed Review: One of the best omelette I ever had.  Try their different omelettes, you won't be disapointed! Thank you ( chef Hitesh Chef Vinod and chef Ashu) for making my and my friends great breakfast. Thank you lemon tree team.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Kartikey
Detailed Review: Their South Indian menu is very good .The reason for the place to be crowded because its near to airport. Orders are delivered quickly to the table, staff is easily accessible and helpful with suggestions and menu recommendation. Thank you (chef Vinod ,chef Hitesh and chef Ashu) for yummy Dosa. Thank you team lemon tree.!!

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Mayank K
Detailed Review: I love this hotel service order taker Sartaj in the evening is very courteous and Mr Pankaj is excellent.They send us the food in 20 minutes and later check the feedback offered dessert.Mr Amit singh and Mr Amit  fordell are very courteous and very professional,Coffee shop breakfast spread was good, Would love to come here again. Beautiful view of airport

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Ted Weissman
Detailed Review: Hotel very nice. Everyone was extremely helpful in every way  Citrus Cafe served excellent breakfast and we'll spiced food   Rooms a little small yet very very clean. Aero City is a peaceful and upscale location

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Purti Sharma
Review: Thank you Prasun and Lemon Tree Team
Detailed Review: Dear Prasun and Lemon Tree Team, Thank you for all the help and making my stay comfortable, It felt like home away from home, Lemon tree is one of the best hotels for single lady travellers, Thank you so so much Prasun and Team

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: ACloud70
Detailed Review: A very impromptu celebration this morning the staff realised it was my birthday they gathered round sang to me and brought me a wonderful cake for my 50th birthday. The staff are wonderful and attentive @ The Lemon Tree Premier. Thank you so much x

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Supriya S
Detailed Review: It was a great service by Virendra and Kunal bhojwani and mandeep. The ambience was one of a kind.  The managers Mr. Pankaj and Mr.  Kapil were courteous and it was well overlooked by Mr fordell. Thanks guys. Keep it up

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Nita G
Review: Excellent Service By Virendra and kunal
Detailed Review: It was an amazing service by Virendra and kunal .  The managers Mr.  Pankhaj and Mr.  Kapil were very courteous.  All over had a gret experience at the citrus café. It was very well managed by Mr.  Fordell.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Jatinder M
Detailed Review: We are regular visitors in lemon tree Hotels particularly in Delhi branches.  The citrus cafe restaurant people are very nice, cooperative with great hospitality, thankful to Mr. Virendra, Restaurant Managers Mr. Vijay and Mr. Pankaj. Wish them a great rise and prosperity in there life.  Good Luck team Citrus Cafe.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Rahul
Detailed Review: It is a nice trip. Everyone is so amicable n supportive in hotel staff. Mr Neeraj n Mr Kunal was so proactive n caring in restaurant. Mr. Atesh also very helpful. They made our stay so enjoying n memorial.Sahil  Chef also very supportive   We will recommend this property to our friends also . We will be back soon

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Nishant M
Detailed Review: It was an amazing service by kunal and neeraj  . The managers Mr. vijay and Atish were very amicable and helpful ,also chef manoj was very courteous towards us .overall had a great experience .Had a great time dining at the citrus cafe .

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: airdisc
Review: Probably one of the best Airport Transfer Experiences (Ever)
Detailed Review: My son had a flight delay on his way home to Australia, which made for an impromptu decision to book a Hotel for the Night, close to T3 @ Delhi Airport. So glad we choose this Hotel, Kuldeep Nain the airport rep was the kindest gentleman I have met in a long time. He was polite, respectful and on the ball with the transfer. With a rep of this caliber we knew the Hotel could only be as good, for $100.00 we got round-trip transfers, a business room and breakfast. Wonderful experience and thanks to Kuldeep Nain for his amazing care.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Ashima S
Detailed Review: Had a pleasurable stay, Pawan was there to help us throughout.  The housekeeping staff is very cordial and the food is also very nice.  The place is near the airport and has different outlets nearby.  Thankyou Lemon Tree!

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Jyo
Review: Stay & food is fantastic, great experience
Detailed Review: Stayed in Lemon tree Premier - Fantastic experience.. Loved the Food, chefs were great and made me feel special... thanks again manoj, Hitesh & Rajat n team for a great experience after an exhaustive day!

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Zaodat
Detailed Review: Although a non-Veg, we truly enjoyed the Veg section. Hospitality by the hotel staffs were excellent as well.The Chef, Dhairya was nice, he walked down to our table and attended us very well. In fact, its for him I am writing this review. Location of the hotel is also great with a very neat and clean, well maintained property.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Shekhar J
Detailed Review: Great food, great service. Food is excellent and I was delighted to get such great taste and variety in vegetarian options. Highly recommended. A special shoutout to Chefs Dhairya, Manoj, Hitesh and Ankit. Also wonderful service by the housekeeping staff.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Alakh_ranjan
Detailed Review: I really liked the food at the lemon tree especially the matar pulao and palak paneer by Chefs dhairya chef hitesh chef manoj chef ankit chef yogesh chef rajat The sweet dishes were also very tasty. Especially the Halwa, Chumchum n Gzar barfi

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Sandeep
Detailed Review: I visited hotel for buisness trip..Hotel is excellent and amaizing varieties of delicaies..I would like to appreciate chef dhairya,chef rajendra,chef manoj,chef brijesh and chef yogesh for lovely and amaizing food..Thanks for personal treatment during my visit..!

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Vikal Lahrey
Detailed Review: We had meeting in this hotel and the services which was provided by the food and beverage team especially Abhinav, Kapil and Roop was really awesome and they helped us in our whole session of the meeting. Had a great day, thanks to everyone..

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Kunzang
Detailed Review: Outstanding service, well prepared continental and Indian cuisines, plus the ambience is wonderful. Chef Chambial , Brijesh and Hitesh has represented their dishes professionally which reflects their dedication and care for their customers. Amazing team work. Would like to visit again. Thank you 😊.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: seeker_here
Detailed Review: South Delhi does not have too many options of five star hotels and the Hilton Garden Inn stands out for its location. It is located very close to the malls in Saket and it is ideal for business or leisure travelers. The hotel is well-maintained.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Aayushn
Detailed Review: I visited with my friends and I was overwhelmed by the services that were provided. From clean rooms to amazing staff everything was exceptional. They have provided me the room that fulfils my requirements that I mentioned prior booking. One must visit this property once in their life time.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Abhishek
Detailed Review: Impressed with their customer centric approach. The staff is very helpful and professional. I had visited Hilton Garden for business purposes but now I intded to visit here with my family too. Enjoyed the visit,looking forward for more!

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Priyanka
Detailed Review: Liked the hotel very much. Easy to find  prime location  Great Ambience. Pleasing and helpful staff. Services was absolutely  impeccable.   Food was fabulous. Wide spread of buffet.  Will visit again. Best wishes  Thank you

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: jiggpuff
Detailed Review: Stayed here for 3 nights.  Service was great.  Breakfast buffet was excellent.  My 7 yr old son got sick with a high fever.  There was a great hospital across the street.  The adjacent mall, plaza, and flower garden park allowed us to still have fun while being stuck at the hotel.  And the service from welcome to departure was first class all around.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: danielpM8720B0
Detailed Review: The hotel himself is not exceptional considering the old rooms, the too old mode with carpets on the floor, and NO garden available. If you want to smoke or just stay outside, you have to stay on the noisy street. The menu at the restaurant offers different meals, very good and well served. The prices are correct except the price of the local rose wine (about 10 Euros for 1 Glas), probably the most expensive I have drunk over the world.My room was always really clean.The best point of this hotel is the human contact you can have with the personal.Thanks to Sonja, Chandn, Omnarayan,Divya,Chandan,Indi,Komal, and the personal working in the restaurant and cleaning the rooms, my stay was very pleasant filling at home.Thanks a lot to all, you are fantastic !

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: FarAway0437804
Review: Restful and Safe Sojourn in Delhi
Detailed Review: Great Hotel with a super friendly and helpful staff. Quality and large F&B Outlet which was so welcome after flying into Delhi. Near major shopping Centers offer many alternatives.. Liked our stay. Felt very safe.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: nikhiladwani
Detailed Review: Great service and very hospitable. Specially the Doormen and security personnel pappan sorry if i spelt it wrong were very welcoming and always ready for a short conversation. Overall had a wonderful time. Thank you all for the hospitality

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Sanchaita
Detailed Review: Excellent food and service.  Very well organised event. Staff was extremely helpful and courteous, especially Dhruv and Tanya. Must visit with friends and family. The place is super spacious. Will surely visit again.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Mahesh
Detailed Review: Hi team Hiton, I had a very pleasant stay here. Like the way ur security teams dedication towards their job (Indu,Divya,Chandan, Pappu and Changez). Like the restaurant, food quality and variety. All chefs,Devendra and team was fantastic in the overall hospitality.  Thank you for the service, would like to visit again !!!

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Ernest
Detailed Review: Gym trainner pawan tokas and Sandeep very nice person and very professional and very coprative. We trening every day A bout to hours Thank you for him. Fazan too helpful. Hotel is at good location and stad helpful. The świmming póol is well maintained and clean

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Sarah P
Detailed Review: Great staff, clean hotel room, and restaurant food was very good with nice variety.  Location is within walking distance to restaurants and shopping.   Room was similar to other Hilton Garden Inns in the USA.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Regency58
Detailed Review: Very efficient hotel , Great location , Friendly staff , Rooms are adequate and clean . Nice swimming pool , There was some restauration work being carried out that made the stay noisy , But the hotel did inform that this would be the case , Did not spoil the visit . The restaurant and bar were very quiet and lacked a bit . The hotel is situated within a mall so lots of choices to eat . overall a very nice hotel.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Hemant
Detailed Review: The hotel staff all housekeeping and security staff ( Bimal & Pappu & Indu) were extremely gracious and helpful. Great stay for the stay. India grill has great b fast and dinner menu. Service at restaurant

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Karan
Detailed Review: We have organised ring ceremony in India Grill at Hilton Garden Inn Saket . All things went as per the expectations . FOOD WAS Excellent and Service was Quick and Efficient . Staff was cooperative . Special Thanks goes to Rohit Paul as well as Other Team .He well organized our ceremony . At last we would like to Thanks Hilton for their Warmth Hospitality.😃😃

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: RAJEESH GHAI
Detailed Review: Good food. Good service. Farhan who attended us did his job with complete seriously and commitment. We have been regularly coming to Hilton and have never ever gone disappointed.love to visit again and again.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Kelvin tan
Detailed Review: Wonderful team of people. Chandran, Indu and Sonia from security department have provided me with a safe and comfortable experience here. Their hospitality has been TOP notch as well. The food is good as well.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Feras A
Review: Nice hotel in a nice location
Detailed Review: The location is very good, accessible to so many things. Hotel was clean, bed linens and towels were clean as well. Only problem is elevator scanner for key card was not working well I needed to reinsert card 6 or 7 times. The staff were so friendly and cooperative. Its advisable hotel for anyone who visits Delhi

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: 357rajdeepc
Detailed Review: Had a very comfortable stay at Hilton Garden Inn, New Delhi. Hotel staff and security were very courteous and helpful. Would specially mention Bimal, Divya and Ajay who took great care throughout my stay.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Tewo203
Detailed Review: We spent three night at Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi and had a wonderful time there.  It is conveniently located next to a nice shopping mall.  Rooms are clean and spacious.  The service is superb.    We had a hard time ordering Uber as the driver canceled our car twice.  The front desk ordered it for us and make sure that it will arrive to pick us up a few times.  The restaurant staff are exceptionally friendly.  When we asked the difference between various types of Indian breads, not only did they explain patiently to us.  Deepak, the manager, also provided us recipes and showed us how it is made.  It is truly a amazing experience of staying at Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi/Saket.  I will highly recommend this hotel to anyone.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: P H
Detailed Review: Great staff hotel and atmosphere and not forget as chandan ,om Narayan (security at the gate takes care the moment you enter the hotel ....they make you feel at home.must stay the Hilton garden inn Saket

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Johannes R
Detailed Review: Chandan  Indu Ömnarayan Security service is   exxcellent and man döör security is very good service i forst time stay on hilton garden inn saket delhi special tjanks to secirity Departments i like hotel security.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Arish
Detailed Review: Indu chandan omnarayan security service is very nice service and very helpful security staff .main door security is every time smileing special thanks to security department .i fisrt time stay in hilton hotel.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Nabeel
Detailed Review: Me. Deshpal Solanki in security was extra hospitable and helpful beyond his work. he took that extra effort and was very kind in helping me find my way aroud. very very sweet guy. he made my stay a very memorable one. after having stayed in a number of hotels today i felt this guy deserved an appreciation from me. this is the first time i am writing a review for any hotel. excellent Mr deshpal.  nabeel. room 406 18th to 22nd feb.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Siddhartha Chandoke
Detailed Review: At India Grill we had the opportunity to have a hearty breakfast a couple of days ago and it was wonderful.  Not overtly lavish but more than adequate , you have all that you need in a complete breakfast and I judge the quality of a place by its breads , it’s promptness , and the additional stuff which Baloni’s the spread (but is often just aesthetic appeal for largeness and has not much of taste).  The fresh waffles and blue berry compote was fabulous , the omelettes were perfect and I loved the quality of bacon. The crisp and hot vadas were my breads. The family loved the paranthas , bhature, and pavs for bhaji.  The most important issue for me is to have my child enjoy the spread else all is a waste , and he enjoyed the cakes and doughnuts very well (picture inset).  Deepak…

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Madhu S
Detailed Review: I always stay at this hotel when travelling alone to Delhi from Canada . The security people are slaws is so alert and good . There is a sense of safe all the time . I would specially mention Changez, Ankesh and Komal for their continued vigilant and also being friendly . Madhu

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Kavita J
Detailed Review: After staying a night in a disgusting hotel down the road from the Hilton, we decided to move here straight away.. The staff was very helpful and understanding. The breakfast and Dinner in the hotels restaurant was really nice. The rooms were also bigger than I thought they would be and price was decent for what was provided. I would defo recommend and stay here again!!

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Mahavir M
Detailed Review: Faran and rounak helped us with the dinner and the room isa also good the ambience they both are polite and the food was also awesome we had pizza and soup recommend by Mr Faran love to visit again.thankyou

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Anuradha K
Detailed Review: Ronak Outstanding and excellent, good service, he will be a good addition to your hotel, He can establish good support with the guests, He is caring and  friendly, and his manager deepak jogi is also very helpful

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Vishal V
Detailed Review: Very curteous staff and very efficient. Bimal Pappu & Indu at the reception were  very friendly and courteous. Definately recommend. Will come back again when in Delhi. Location is very comfotable for travellers, as its close to a lot of good restraunts.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Daniel
Detailed Review: Chandan hiralal security and amit front office is very nice service .i first time stay hilton garden inn saket my saty is veey comparable resturent india grill is very nice service and all staff is good.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Amit S
Review: A day stay at the lovely property.
Detailed Review: We stayed here for day time (6 hr package) to spend lovely valentine day with my wife. Location of property is superb with select city walk right next door. Reception area and approach do gives you some foreign vibes. Room was very spacious with a beautiful select city walk mall view. Package includes lunch as well at India grill restaurant. Variety was yummy in main course. They can improve a bit in dessert section but overall a great experience. Highly recommended place. 😍

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Zafar
Detailed Review: Indu Chandan Wonderful service. Location is super. Restaurant is perfect. Staff is very kind. Especially Mrs Indu and Mr s Chandan, Deschpal were very helpful for us. Totally I enjoyed all services here.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Jack Brook
Detailed Review: High spirit Bar very good ambience and the drinks also very delicious. Staff are very friendly and helpful Specially Rahul Dahiya ,Abhishek Kumar,Maneger Deepak tiwari. Nice music,Lovely take care. Memorable moments.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Suma C
Detailed Review: Great service! Indu is wonderful and was very friendly with me upon arrival. The other hotel services are also great. The location is also great because it is located next to a mall. Overall, the service is wonderful and I would return!

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Santosh
Review: Stay at Hilton Garden Inn Delhi
Detailed Review: Breakfast spread was good and had a variety of food to choose from  Service levels from the team was also good   Specific mention for Rahul Dhruv  Room was also good but internet connectivity on the phone was scratchy

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: AGrDelhi
Detailed Review: We came here for dinner to celebrate our anniversary.   Food at India grill is delicious.  It's a very elaborate spread. We had a seven course meal. Everything from the starters to dessert tasted good.   Service is great too. Dhruv and Rahul took good care of us.   We enjoyed. Highly recommended.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Vimal Kumar
Review: Excellent stay with very friendly staff
Detailed Review: Had a very pleasant stay at this hotel and the staff are extremely polite and friendly. Room is spacious and neat and tidy with room service available all day. The security staff at the entrance especially mr. Pappu Rai and Mr. Om Narayan very always interactive and open to any help I needed.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Tammu
Detailed Review: Very good hotel. Front office manager Mr Prasanth Seegu and Mr Saurab are very good. Total staff are very friendly. Food is also good. Rooms are also very good. Please do stay in Hilton Garden Inn Saket.New Delhi.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: linda295
Detailed Review: This is my home in Delhi.The sixth yr I am staying here.All staff very welcoming and caring.The restaurant is superb both food and staff.Thelocation is excellentThe frondesk and the lady and guys at the front door are fantastic

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Cinto
Detailed Review: Great service By smily Face Rahul Dahiya. I order Pizza  and Pasta and i got on time and hot.lovely room and lovely Staff. Rahul Dahiya helpfully, friendly ,smily face ,positive  attitude. Nice ambiance  hotel near the mall.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Tony carl wood
Detailed Review: Hotel location is good. Restaurant ambience is beautiful. peaceful place to hangout. Had drinks in bar enjoyed lot. Great choice of music and beautiful ambiences thankyou so much abhishek lovely service must visit highly recommend.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Sharad T
Detailed Review: I like service provide by Rahul Dahiya and Dhruv Sharma. I am the guest of 525 and i love the room. Location of hotel is also very good.Rahul Dahiya is provide my soecial taker care. Chef gandhi and manger Deepak jogi also very halp full

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Deepak Kumar121
Detailed Review: Great food And  Great service by dhruv and Rahul ,all starters are very good and amizing Tnkx for service good several.nice amiencne of the restaurant and Deepak jogi is taking good care of us.thanks to Abhinav for great food.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Devika
Detailed Review: Staff throughout the service were very attentive and the service was excellent. Faran, Ronak and Goldy represented the hotel to its finest. Great service. Everything was fine they are asset of hotel love to come agan

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Tariq's
Detailed Review: Execellent food and greatest service in India grill restaurant I come for our family function Deepak jogi and his team give us a great service and nice ambiance and helpful staff special thanks to Deepak jogi for his great support

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Meharban
Detailed Review: Awesome food. I liked personalized attention of Executive chef Manoj Rawat. Excellent sir. Food was good and gobi, milizuli sabji and deserts were awesome. Ambiance in banquet was  fine.......Thankss see u soon

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Sanjay
Detailed Review: We choose to celebrate our son birthday at Indian Grill Hilton Garden Inn Saket . I Think we  have made the right decision . Food which we ordered was really delicious and the service was quick and excellent .Ambience is also nice Thanks to our server Rohit Paul. He served us with his heart.   Thanks Hilton for making my son birthday memorable. We will be definitely Coming back Again.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Rajamani
Detailed Review: It was good trip with Hilton . I enjoyed breakfast lunch and dinner was very . Special thanks to Deepak tiwari who supports me . And I never forget my server Faran he has good communication skill .. I stayed in room 612.  Thanks  to Hilton team  they are assets of the hotel .

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Mukund
Detailed Review: Rahul Dahiya, one of the staff in the hotel,has shown exemplary service in the hotel. He is very couteous and helpful at the same time very professional. The hotel is very well located and just next to one of the biggest maals in New Delhi.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Rahul
Detailed Review: Its really amazing food in india grill restaurant in buffet lots of have option included live counter pizza pasta tandoor.I would like to tell Manager Niraj kumar he explained me entire buffet..will come again

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Paul123
Detailed Review: I visit  in India grill for breakfast with my family.  Excellent service  provide by Rahul Dahiya and Dhruv Sharma. EXCELLENT  Culture and food is excellent. I love Hilton  brand. Friendly  behavior  and professional.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: DWE
Detailed Review: Rahul Dahiya provided very good service in India grill. Manager Niraj kumar also . I would like to visit here again. Very good environment and good quality food . I would like to thank Rahul Dahiya which made our breakfast good and memorable.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Manmohan piplani
Detailed Review: We had dinner at India grill. We enjoyed dinner very munch our server faran and Rounak at manger on duty is very helpful. They are assets of the hotel. Good food and environment   We will come back soon. And love to come again.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Greg48
Detailed Review: The HI Delhi Airport is a definite 4 star property with good restaurant and all the amenities you would expect for an Airport area hotel. The problem I had was with their record keeping and reservations.I had booked via IHG website in the US, and when I arrived with my confirmation they couldn't find me in the system. The Front Desk staff was really nice, and spend close to half hour on the phone with reservations before he said they had the res. Problem is- when i went to check out the next morning they AGAIN said they didn't have my pre-paid information and it took an additional 15 minutes to resolve it.  Again I want to say that the frontline staff were great and the hotel and breakfast very good- hopeully the reservation issue was a one timer

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Flyer51
Detailed Review: A wonderful hotel, very friendly staff, efficient check in and everywhere spotless clean. I really enjoyed my two (short) stays and would come back, can recommend. Airport pick up service went smooth, from aircraft door to hotel reception in 46 minutes (mind you, it is the airport hotel). Also they have a good 'taxi' service into town. They also picked me up from town a few days later. Excellent.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Farooq B
Detailed Review: I am impressed with the courteous staff and impeccable service. Excellent business hotel with all necessary amenities. I strongly recommend this hotel for business and transit. My gratitude to Front office staff and duty manager for facilitating Airport drop.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Biswajit S
Review: Great place for transit and great location
Detailed Review: The hotel is located at a great place surrounded with wonderful shops and eateries. Their pick-up and drop-off was immaculate. The rooms were clean and comfortable. The people at reception were professional and welcoming.  I would recommend this place.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Sisibutch
Detailed Review: The hotel has a pool, spa, gym and 2 restaurants.  The food was great and the room was clean and had a desk, mini bar and iron too.  We had a great stay over.  The free shuttle to the airport was much appreciated too.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Jorene Z
Detailed Review: The hospitality given by Sachin in the lounge was exceptional during my stay. He was kind, friendly, professional and welcoming.  He definitely made my stay at the Holiday Inn worthy and relaxing.  Good food and service. Be sure to check out the lounge.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: sosoche
Detailed Review: When you arrive early in the night or leave late in the evening, this hotel is a perfect stop a few minutes drive from the airport, whether it is for a good sleep or great dining. The staff is very helpful, with special thanks to the Viva restaurant staff.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Rachna
Detailed Review: Being quite straightforward the hotel is sure to visit. It serves great hospitality no experience in the rooms but sure to say wonderful hospitality in the banquets. I visited there for a meeting and was very happy with the kind gesture of the staff there. Sanket from the staff was very kind to serve us with the tea, snacks, breads, thank you for providing whatever we asked for. Huge respect for the team working hard to serve us well. Your hardwork in such busy conditions surely deserve huge huge thanks. Thankyou everyone.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: K Bender
Detailed Review: I would recommend the Holiday Inn to anyone traveling through Delhi, if you don’t mind spending a bit of money.  Rooms were nice, clean and have AC (big plus for me).  There are two restaurants that we ate at.  Both are good, but pricy.  I prefer the Italian restaurant overall.  Very good breakfast in the main restaurant served every morning is probably my favorite thing!

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Rajat
Detailed Review: Excellent experience to stay in Holiday Inn hotel. Staffs behavior is very courteous, breakfast was excellent n presentation was so good. Thx. to Management n staff for memorable time spend there. Except this I can only say to maintain this standard. Therefore we can easily recommend to others.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Francois-Yves C
Detailed Review: We came in only for a night on January 29 while traveling between Canada and the Maldives and we had a major issue with our luggage as it was waiting for us at baggage claim (due to an error by Air Canada) but we had no Visa to enter India since we were there only for a few hours. Anand from the Holiday Inn took charge and handled everything — making sure our luggage was retrieved and sent to the Maldives on our Air India flight. We then enjoyed a few hours of sleep! Thanks Anand Kumar Chauhary for everything!

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Susheel
Detailed Review: Thank you to the breakfast team at Holiday Inn, especially Amit, Suraj, Neeraj & Abishek for keeping us equipped with lots of fresh chai and great, quick service! Started the holiday great. Thank you again.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Mary B
Detailed Review: A must visit if you have a long layover with no visiter visa. Rooms are clean; service agents are helpful (And speak English).  But the best part of the hotel service is Adnan who met us as we got off the plane and escorted us and expedited us through security and baggage transfer.  We could not have navigated through the transfer without him !!  We investigated the Lounge passes in T3 as well but so glad we went with Holiday Inn.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: ZenHealer7
Review: IHG Does Not Care For Spire Members
Detailed Review: IHG of all the major hotel chains is least interested in pampering its most loyal members, Spire. It was rare as a Platinum member to get an upgrade, it is equally rare as a Spire member. Breakfast is never included in the rate and never offered for Spire members. In this hotel, it is ridiculously priced. Walk around the corner to the food court or Fabcafe for a much better deal in more interesting surroundings. There is no separate check in for Spire members, something that is common in most hotels and airlines. This hotel is always very busy and no one has any time for any personal interaction. It is all business. This hotel has the gall to charge a supplemental fee for a second person (even if she happens to be your spouse) and even if you have booked on double occupancy. No…

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Tan
Detailed Review: We came here for a day stay on 10th February. The check in procedure was ok but the overall stay was pathetic. Me and my sister had stomach trouble so asked the front desk for lemonade as a complimentary gesture from the hotel and they said that the duty manager will connect with us regarding that  and we also asked for water bottles since we had to take a medicine but none of the staff came to give the water bottles. After waiting for good 30 minutes we had to call again to ask for water and lemonade but I guess they don’t know a single thing about hospitality and kept on lingering the topic until finally when they felt we were adamant they sent a single glass of lemonade while we asked for 2 glasses for two of us. Again a major disappointment. The whole thing left a very…

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Navneet P
Detailed Review: The hotel is conveniently located with easy access to the airport and metro. Well equipped rooms. The staff is courteous and the food delectable. The restaurant staff not only enquire about your order but take care to find out about your room and requirements as well. Would love to stay again.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: John M
Detailed Review: Excellent hotel,extremely clean & comfortable . Upon arrival we were warmly welcomed by the friendly reception staff, shops,restaurants bars are within walking distance. Would definetely recommend this hotel to everybody! It's a true sample of excellent hospitality. Great housekeeping by Chandan a perfectly clean room all 3 days.Thank you again.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: anandsrivastava
Detailed Review: Grand daughter got engaged. We had a dinner at Viva to celebrate the occasion. Good location, good service, good presentation of food, and the food also OK. I do not understand why, in such places, they do not serve  Indian whiskey, beer, wine etc. They definitely should. Why should one pay for the exorbitantly priced foreign brands?         Enjoyable.                                    AKSrivastava

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: kumarkp
Detailed Review: I had pasta last night at bella italia, restaurant  the pasta was amazing...excellent service provided by kailash..kailiash is a very friendly server he suggest me about this pasta ..... well trained staff  thanks buddy see u soon......

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Fregy
Review: Great Place next to Delhi Airport
Detailed Review: If you are traveling to Delhi and not interested to be the Delhi traffic, this is the ideal place to stay. Great Hotel and fabulous facilities. You will love this place.  The amazing staff both in the hotel and restaurant - Breakfast and all the meals are really good. All the staff in the Restaurant deserves special appreciation- so much care. I have been to this place with family and for business trips. I will come back again

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Detailed Review: We stayed for one night on the way home to UK. Check-in was very good and bags were brought to the room for us. We enjoyed using the sauna in the fitness centre. The bar was very nice with a good selection of beers and my wife enjoyed tasting two of  the signature cocktails. Service was excellent in particular Kamal who made sure we enjoyed our evening. Good value for money at £138 including breakfast and free airport transfers (the sauna was free).

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Monisha
Detailed Review: Had a great hospitality and service by the hotel staff. Really appreciate the quick and great efforts by Madhav and Mr.munna. Would recommend this place for corporate events. We had meeting in Mumbai as well but Delhi is far better I think in service.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: mariamurray441
Detailed Review: We stayed in holiday inn New Delhi international airport pickup is very good ambiance is sooooo lovely room dining service fantastic specially for Sachin is a good boy every requirement help helpful 😊😊😊😊😊😊😊

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Thesaurus_Jewellery
Review: Fantastic hotel with terible smell of fries
Detailed Review: This was my tird time I stayed in this hotel. I love it. The service, clenliness, food- everything is great, exept for the smell. There is a strong smell of fried food in the lobby and elevators. My partner went for coffee, he brought the smell with him.it is so strong that my undershirt smell of it after I spent couple of minutes in lobby. I don't understand that.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Suruchi R
Detailed Review: It was really wonderful experience staying for one night at Holiday Inn, Aerocity, Delhi.  Surprising part was the way staff took care of us right from check in, late in room lunch, personal wake up call early in the morning till our check out..  Will never forget this lovely experience.   Looking forward to more such stays in future, whenever we are in Delhi.  Simply Fantastic..

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: PANKAJ KUMAR S
Detailed Review: We stayed at Holiday Inn for an overnight visit to Delhi thanku specially for sachin good service  I'm soooooooooo happy holiday inn is a good property I'm will stay again soon required for service for sachin in room dining manager mr kapoor ☺️☺️☺️

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: sanatjariwala
Detailed Review: I visited very frequently delhi for curt matters and always stayed at royal plaza for last many years......... i have been looked after extremely well by guest relation manager viz ashwinder kaur...this small note to mark my appreciation for her who made me feel at home away from home....

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Grewalski
Detailed Review: Reasonable hotel. The luxury is all in the grand lobby / reception area which is quite magnificently decorated. However, the rooms are dated and need refurbishment. Wi-Fi is chargeable which is a bit cheeky in this day and age. The breakfast was very chaotic with queues so allow time for that. In general the staff were very helpful but the managers were swanning around (especially at breakfast) not actually managing what was a chaotic and unsatisfactory situation. Reception, waiting and concierge staff are superb though !!

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Milind P
Review: Very conveniently located ,in the centre of New Delhi
Detailed Review: Excellent location, close to the major tourist attractions of Delhi. Nice property, a bit heritage style lobby, good service, nice restaurants , good views of Delhi from the top floors, ample parking, value for money considering location

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Narendra36
Detailed Review: Good Breakfast and good supporting staff. Clean and decent size rooms. good service. parking available. Very well located In city center. close to all important government offices. good hotel for family stay also.

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Daya
Review: Lobby lounge pool garden green beautiful flowers.
Detailed Review: The hotel is very nice location hotel it's very good close to metro stop janpanth market very close  The hotel have pool garden which is very beautiful nice flower collection winter siting outside clean postive royal feeling  Front desk staff so much caring smiling Aman and Prashant Harish

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Nid
Detailed Review: An amazing service indeed! A warm Welcome from the front by Ashwinder and well handled luggage and professionalism at Concierge.The hotel is well located near to the heart of delhi(cp) and its staff is absolutely stupendous. Ashwinder,Aman and Shabnam, thank you for making my stay memorable. I look forward to staying again next time I am in Delhi. Well done!

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Sachin
Detailed Review: The hotel royal plaza is very nice.  The staff is professional Aman she is very helpful.  Breakfast is good nice and yummy . Room is good. Pool garden is green and clean . Bell deal Rajesh is extremely helpful.

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: DILIP P
Detailed Review: outstanding hotel well located in the centre close to attractions and shopping centre large room well equipped with all our needs very clean breakfast was rich with all kind of food local international  great smiling staff always waiting to help in any way Aman Shabnam Pooja guest relations very professional. Front desk Anil Kumar and Sabauddin excellent.

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Anand
Detailed Review: Awesome Hotel Best room Best Breakfast Staffs are really good and attentive specially puja who is working as Guest Relation. She was very attentive and with irritation she was helping me and others as well. She is pretty with good knowledge. My stay was good and comfortable

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Aaksh
Detailed Review: Good Room with ok views because I checked in earlier. Around 8:30 they given my chek in which was not possible but still they arranged and given me. I had a meeting around 12 so I went inside my room and then wanted to go for head massage. And for that I got appointment at 11 so after taking that massage I was feeling so energetic and good for my Meeting.. After completing my  meeting I came to Hotel. And I got Complimentary WIFi which was given by Puja and she also helped me for few things as she told me about the Hotel and she also given me one Map which was helpful for me. And also she celebrated my birthday and really got surprised because I could not imagine that they will celebrate my Birthday. Every thing was very good.. Breakfast beautiful lobby and Garden was good.…

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Himanshu
Review: I Love Delhi and specially If you will talk about Hotel I will say Hotel The Royal plaza is best hotel ever....
Detailed Review: I was staying in Hotel The Royal plaza for 5 days.. first I wasn't comfortable in my room so they shifted me in another room which was really good and awesome.. because in that room enough space was there and also views was really good.. they have given me and my friend one Complimentary head massage voucher. Also we got fruits cookies and chocolate in our room which was also complimentary. They don't use plastic bottles so they have given us water in glass bottle. Which I really like that.. and also I would like to tell about travel desk they recommended us a very good place for shopping. Also the guy who was giving us room his Name was Rahul he was very good and polite and he was really nice he has given us very good room after changing the old one. They have very Beautiful…

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Prince
Review: Wonderful Hotel with wonderful Staffs and service
Detailed Review: Best hotel and staffs are really good and kind.. I came here with my family and I got what exactly  I wanted to get.. having breakfast near the pool and was awesome and my family was really happy.. they have given us complimentary cake which was amazing.. they have very beautiful lobby where we can sit and have coffee cookies and chocolates.. I was little tired so I requested to give me room as soon as possible and also pool side view and Puja given me the same which I requested and she has also given me complimentary head massage voucher. Puja is really helpful girl she came to Scott us till our room even she helped me to carry my luggage.. really appreciated .. all staffs are amazing they give a service very frequently.. I will surely I come back again and I will stay with my…

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Daydream235916
Detailed Review: 1300.. Well the initial entrance is very Grand and inviting .. smooth check in and I arrived at my room. The shelves were dusty . Alongside the wooden floorings nail clippings and more dust. The bath / hand towels have seen better days. Completely worn out ,, ! NO BOTTLED WATER. They serve filter water in jugs for the rooms and the jug it self have finger prints all over. After calling housekeeping to resolve, unfortunately no improvement then spoke to management . Got moved to another room .. only to find drink stains on bed linens and used pillow cases , more dust ..after  further talks with management got moved to a Suite ,(3rd room )  by now its 23:30 I have a severe migraine I had dinner plans everything went down hill and I was hungry .i was meant to stay for 4 nights and…

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Gaurav sharma
Detailed Review: Excellent and knowledgable staff as moreover Ms. Aman is very helpfull all the time.Good job  Also find on good location and very near to janpath for shopping of handicrafts and souviners.  Piano Mr. Fabia is very good in playing piano

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Charudatta
Detailed Review: Rooms are small, wifi chargable never mentioned that wifi is chargable, they asked money for wifi package, poor reception desk, I asked for 1 printout they charged me 50 rs + taxes they are looting the clients. Be aware people while making a group booking for your guest. Breakfast is boaring

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Sohail
Detailed Review: We had a wonderful experience, the staff were courteous specially duty Manager Rohit and Guest reaction puja and  We got what we requested. Overall you did a good job. The food was good, but some dishes in The Living room can be improved.  But staff courtesy and overall comfort was amazing. Well done Royal Plaza  Cheers

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Shubham
Detailed Review: Two nights stay  Nice room  Large size room Comfortable bed   The staff was very friendly Speially Guest relation  Shabnam and Duty Manager Rohit.  Price wise expensive   Bathroom is very nice with full view this is what I liked very much   Enough space  Nice bed  Very clean  Fully equipped room  No time for breakfast  And other facilities very good Highly recommend this hotel

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Prinjalsubba
Review: Awesome Hotel I have ever stay
Detailed Review: Very beautiful Hotel, cute lobby and breakfast was really good, I will recommend this hotel to everyone.. staffs are very kind and attentive Specially I would like to say about Ms Puja she is very kind and helpful she helped me a lot.. she explained about the Hotel and also she recommended me for beautiful place where I can visit and do my shopping.. Really enjoyed here beautiful place with such a kind and beautiful people..

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Bhupendra Raman Neupane
Detailed Review: I am staying in room no 607... I am so happy .. this hotel's staffs are really good specially Ms Puja , Mr Prashant and Rahul they are very attentive and kind.. I really like there room and specially lobby.. breakfast was also awesome thank you so much for making my stay happy.. I will come again

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Kamlesh
Detailed Review: Royal plaza reputation of being reliable and delivering to perfection truly experienced during my 3 nights stay at the Hotel Royal Plaza in Delhi.  The staff were very courteous Sepecialy Puja at guest realtion, friendly and understanding. Unlike other hotels, service was delivered and tips not expected (demanded) which make a huge difference. Team was very engaging and courteous. I was there for a corporate metting and I had requested for a late check out and the person I met he gave me late check out with a smiling face without any hesitation and I didnt knew he was Duty Manager and his name Was Rohit and he had given me his business card for any future services. Hence glad to have stayed at Royal Plaza.

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Aditya
Detailed Review: Stayed with the hotel for a night but totally amazed with their hospitality. Room was beautiful and spacious. Food was heavenly and such a beautiful spread for breakfast. The most special point which I want to mention is that they went an extra mile to help us. We lost our IPad at the hotel and left for agra. Had no hopes of tracing it back. With a faint hop I contacted the hotel and the phone was received by Duty manager Rohit. He listened to me patiently ,took all the details and assured me that he will try his best to help us. The same evening after received a call that they were able to trace the Ipad and when we got the call our happiness had no bounds. Not only this , when my sister went to get the Ipad three days later, they not only handed it over to her but also dropped…

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Santosh
Detailed Review: Royal plaza is certainly one of the best hotel we have stayed in. Our first time as resident guests being NRI.The hotel exceeded our expectations and how. Obviously the location is super. The room gave us ample view of the beautiful sunrise! The housekeeping does a fantastic job of making the rooms look ultimate. The club / palace services make you feel royal. The f&b team ably led by the restaurant managers and chefs ensures that your gourmet fantasies are take. Care. The duty manager Rohit including the guest relation Shabnam and Puja and bell desk staff are extremely helpful. The welcome , the check in and out are most warm . You just don’t feel like leaving!! Well done team Royal Plaza.

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Francesca
Detailed Review: The only thing pleasant about this hotel was the lobby. When we first arrived we thought we had lucked out and picked a real gem of a hotel - especially as we’d been travelling for approx 20 hours and couldn’t wait to get our heads down.  We were shown to our room which was a disappointment, but given it was 10pm and we were knackered we thought we could look past it. There were exposed electrical wires, the bedside lamp wasn’t working, the shower wouldn’t drain, and generally the room was very tired and felt dirty. We got ourselves into bed around 11 and noticed that we could hear noise in the room next door. At first it was manageable, however two hours later it has escalated with people playing loud music and screeching that you could even hear through some heavy duty ear…

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: awesome304
Detailed Review: My stay was amazing in hotel the royal plaza. I got a room from front desk which was very nice and very clean with beautiful view. Buffet was amazing. Shabnam and Rohit Solanki was very helpful.  Roman garden was very colourful with lots of kind of flowers. I will definitely recommend this hotel to my friends family and colleagues.

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Sanjay Singh
Review: Breakfast buffet and Service from the hotel
Detailed Review: The breakfast buffet was the best I have had ever no other hotel offers so much variety so much for a morning buffet and the service from all servers especially Preety and Manish Parathna was outstanding kudos and thankyou  clean to  And thank you for the arrange Everything what I need Aman  she is humble . Duty manager Rohit Solanki he is so kind. I will come very soon

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: SONAL C
Detailed Review: A centrally locates property and a very enchanting stay . Complete with a pub and Heath centre , its a dream.  Very near the Connaught Place and palika bazar the Shopping hot spots of delhi, conveniently located by metro from airport

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Sk I
Review: One of the best hote the Royal  plaza
Detailed Review: This is one of the best hotel in Delhi and a excellent business hotel with excellent service and good facilities.  They have pool gym Restaurant and specially Lobby is really beautiful. My stay here is very pleasant and royal like the name is Royal Plaza.. I would also like to say specially about Staff Aman, Puja and shabnam they are very kind and attentive I really  like there service and the way they make us comfortable. . We will visit again

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Mohammad K
Detailed Review: Hotel is very good. Staff is very friendly and helpful. Special the hotel royal plaza guest relations very humble good communication. Check in was quick and fast on the higher floor 18th it’s amazing view feel wow wonderfully beautiful. Location is perfect. Food is good Rahul he is very nice good suggestions.

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Jeevan
Detailed Review: Great service and buffet spread of the one restaurant ROYAL BISTRO food starters were amazing and awesome service by Rahul And Pretty. Check was excellent and duty manager Rohit was quite helpful. Guest relations were very friendly Aman and Shabnam give us 15 mins which is good spa is good.

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Michelle M
Detailed Review: This was the worst hotel experience of my life. It might say 5 star but it’s far from it. I don’t even know where to start.  - the staff are extremely rude - the rooms are dated - our shower  kept leaking  all over the floor. Advised 3 times and nothing was done.  - TVs did not work - you have to pay for WiFi - they kept hanging up on me. - the breakfast staff are horrendous and don’t clean before the next sitting - rude rude rude - the brewery tables and dust all over them.” - they only ever gave us one towel, there was two of us - they wouldn’t stock our fridge even though there was a list of drinks - no bottled water  After numerous complaints all we got was some free biscuits!!  Do not waste your money!! I would never come back..

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Ragi
Detailed Review: Was with my colleagues for a conferences held at the hotel its a beautiful place paradise on earth confined, walking in is this amazing golden lobby i came during the day but by the evening this place is just gold in the evening there is a pianist Mr. Fabio ferns best pianist I've heard guest seem to be very amazed seeing him performing clicking videos and photos, the manager Mr. Pankaj and Aman were very helpful as they assist guest every time someone would stand at the front desk dedicated staff. Lovely hotel. Would recommend my guest to stay here it would give me a reason to visit again..

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: 85DEBU
Detailed Review: Worst hotel I have ever stayed. Starting from front office, staff are rude, don't respond properly. From room you call house keeping or front office no one attends call. You have to ask for Duty Manager. Food is atrocious and half cooked. They don't even provide pure drinking water. Stay in a lodge but skip this terrible place, even offered for free.

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Jitendra C
Detailed Review: Asked for a dental kit and they sent me a used dental kit, the brush was stinking. I understand recycling but reuse? Comon man :/   It’s the small things that make the biggest of the difference. I would never come back here.

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Bajrang
Detailed Review: The hotel locations is very nice. Front desk is very helpful Aman And Shabbnam both were very kind. Room is nice but small. The hotel have good pool garden . Good food royal bistro  Staff Ruchi she is kind or professional.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: seeker_here
Detailed Review: South Delhi does not have too many options of five star hotels and the Hilton Garden Inn stands out for its location. It is located very close to the malls in Saket and it is ideal for business or leisure travelers. The hotel is well-maintained.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Aayushn
Detailed Review: I visited with my friends and I was overwhelmed by the services that were provided. From clean rooms to amazing staff everything was exceptional. They have provided me the room that fulfils my requirements that I mentioned prior booking. One must visit this property once in their life time.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Abhishek
Detailed Review: Impressed with their customer centric approach. The staff is very helpful and professional. I had visited Hilton Garden for business purposes but now I intded to visit here with my family too. Enjoyed the visit,looking forward for more!

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Priyanka
Detailed Review: Liked the hotel very much. Easy to find  prime location  Great Ambience. Pleasing and helpful staff. Services was absolutely  impeccable.   Food was fabulous. Wide spread of buffet.  Will visit again. Best wishes  Thank you

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: jiggpuff
Detailed Review: Stayed here for 3 nights.  Service was great.  Breakfast buffet was excellent.  My 7 yr old son got sick with a high fever.  There was a great hospital across the street.  The adjacent mall, plaza, and flower garden park allowed us to still have fun while being stuck at the hotel.  And the service from welcome to departure was first class all around.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: danielpM8720B0
Detailed Review: The hotel himself is not exceptional considering the old rooms, the too old mode with carpets on the floor, and NO garden available. If you want to smoke or just stay outside, you have to stay on the noisy street. The menu at the restaurant offers different meals, very good and well served. The prices are correct except the price of the local rose wine (about 10 Euros for 1 Glas), probably the most expensive I have drunk over the world.My room was always really clean.The best point of this hotel is the human contact you can have with the personal.Thanks to Sonja, Chandn, Omnarayan,Divya,Chandan,Indi,Komal, and the personal working in the restaurant and cleaning the rooms, my stay was very pleasant filling at home.Thanks a lot to all, you are fantastic !

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: FarAway0437804
Review: Restful and Safe Sojourn in Delhi
Detailed Review: Great Hotel with a super friendly and helpful staff. Quality and large F&B Outlet which was so welcome after flying into Delhi. Near major shopping Centers offer many alternatives.. Liked our stay. Felt very safe.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: nikhiladwani
Detailed Review: Great service and very hospitable. Specially the Doormen and security personnel pappan sorry if i spelt it wrong were very welcoming and always ready for a short conversation. Overall had a wonderful time. Thank you all for the hospitality

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Sanchaita
Detailed Review: Excellent food and service.  Very well organised event. Staff was extremely helpful and courteous, especially Dhruv and Tanya. Must visit with friends and family. The place is super spacious. Will surely visit again.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Mahesh
Detailed Review: Hi team Hiton, I had a very pleasant stay here. Like the way ur security teams dedication towards their job (Indu,Divya,Chandan, Pappu and Changez). Like the restaurant, food quality and variety. All chefs,Devendra and team was fantastic in the overall hospitality.  Thank you for the service, would like to visit again !!!

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Ernest
Detailed Review: Gym trainner pawan tokas and Sandeep very nice person and very professional and very coprative. We trening every day A bout to hours Thank you for him. Fazan too helpful. Hotel is at good location and stad helpful. The świmming póol is well maintained and clean

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Sarah P
Detailed Review: Great staff, clean hotel room, and restaurant food was very good with nice variety.  Location is within walking distance to restaurants and shopping.   Room was similar to other Hilton Garden Inns in the USA.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Regency58
Detailed Review: Very efficient hotel , Great location , Friendly staff , Rooms are adequate and clean . Nice swimming pool , There was some restauration work being carried out that made the stay noisy , But the hotel did inform that this would be the case , Did not spoil the visit . The restaurant and bar were very quiet and lacked a bit . The hotel is situated within a mall so lots of choices to eat . overall a very nice hotel.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Hemant
Detailed Review: The hotel staff all housekeeping and security staff ( Bimal & Pappu & Indu) were extremely gracious and helpful. Great stay for the stay. India grill has great b fast and dinner menu. Service at restaurant

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Karan
Detailed Review: We have organised ring ceremony in India Grill at Hilton Garden Inn Saket . All things went as per the expectations . FOOD WAS Excellent and Service was Quick and Efficient . Staff was cooperative . Special Thanks goes to Rohit Paul as well as Other Team .He well organized our ceremony . At last we would like to Thanks Hilton for their Warmth Hospitality.😃😃

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: RAJEESH GHAI
Detailed Review: Good food. Good service. Farhan who attended us did his job with complete seriously and commitment. We have been regularly coming to Hilton and have never ever gone disappointed.love to visit again and again.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Kelvin tan
Detailed Review: Wonderful team of people. Chandran, Indu and Sonia from security department have provided me with a safe and comfortable experience here. Their hospitality has been TOP notch as well. The food is good as well.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Feras A
Review: Nice hotel in a nice location
Detailed Review: The location is very good, accessible to so many things. Hotel was clean, bed linens and towels were clean as well. Only problem is elevator scanner for key card was not working well I needed to reinsert card 6 or 7 times. The staff were so friendly and cooperative. Its advisable hotel for anyone who visits Delhi

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: 357rajdeepc
Detailed Review: Had a very comfortable stay at Hilton Garden Inn, New Delhi. Hotel staff and security were very courteous and helpful. Would specially mention Bimal, Divya and Ajay who took great care throughout my stay.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Tewo203
Detailed Review: We spent three night at Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi and had a wonderful time there.  It is conveniently located next to a nice shopping mall.  Rooms are clean and spacious.  The service is superb.    We had a hard time ordering Uber as the driver canceled our car twice.  The front desk ordered it for us and make sure that it will arrive to pick us up a few times.  The restaurant staff are exceptionally friendly.  When we asked the difference between various types of Indian breads, not only did they explain patiently to us.  Deepak, the manager, also provided us recipes and showed us how it is made.  It is truly a amazing experience of staying at Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi/Saket.  I will highly recommend this hotel to anyone.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv

Detailed Review: Indu chandan omnarayan security service is very nice service and very helpful security staff .main door security is every time smileing special thanks to security department .i fisrt time stay in hilton hotel.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Nabeel
Detailed Review: Me. Deshpal Solanki in security was extra hospitable and helpful beyond his work. he took that extra effort and was very kind in helping me find my way aroud. very very sweet guy. he made my stay a very memorable one. after having stayed in a number of hotels today i felt this guy deserved an appreciation from me. this is the first time i am writing a review for any hotel. excellent Mr deshpal.  nabeel. room 406 18th to 22nd feb.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Siddhartha Chandoke
Detailed Review: At India Grill we had the opportunity to have a hearty breakfast a couple of days ago and it was wonderful.  Not overtly lavish but more than adequate , you have all that you need in a complete breakfast and I judge the quality of a place by its breads , it’s promptness , and the additional stuff which Baloni’s the spread (but is often just aesthetic appeal for largeness and has not much of taste).  The fresh waffles and blue berry compote was fabulous , the omelettes were perfect and I loved the quality of bacon. The crisp and hot vadas were my breads. The family loved the paranthas , bhature, and pavs for bhaji.  The most important issue for me is to have my child enjoy the spread else all is a waste , and he enjoyed the cakes and doughnuts very well (picture inset).  Deepak…

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Madhu S
Detailed Review: I always stay at this hotel when travelling alone to Delhi from Canada . The security people are slaws is so alert and good . There is a sense of safe all the time . I would specially mention Changez, Ankesh and Komal for their continued vigilant and also being friendly . Madhu

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Kavita J
Detailed Review: After staying a night in a disgusting hotel down the road from the Hilton, we decided to move here straight away.. The staff was very helpful and understanding. The breakfast and Dinner in the hotels restaurant was really nice. The rooms were also bigger than I thought they would be and price was decent for what was provided. I would defo recommend and stay here again!!

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Mahavir M
Detailed Review: Faran and rounak helped us with the dinner and the room isa also good the ambience they both are polite and the food was also awesome we had pizza and soup recommend by Mr Faran love to visit again.thankyou

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv

Detailed Review: Very curteous staff and very efficient. Bimal Pappu & Indu at the reception were  very friendly and courteous. Definately recommend. Will come back again when in Delhi. Location is very comfotable for travellers, as its close to a lot of good restraunts.
