Reception area and approach do gives you some foreign vibes. Room was very spacious with a beautiful select city walk mall view. Package includes lunch as well at India grill restaurant. Variety was yummy in main course. They can improve a bit in dessert section but overall a great experience. Highly recommended place. 😍

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Zafar
Detailed Review: Indu Chandan Wonderful service. Location is super. Restaurant is perfect. Staff is very kind. Especially Mrs Indu and Mr s Chandan, Deschpal were very helpful for us. Totally I enjoyed all services here.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Jack Brook
Detailed Review: High spirit Bar very good ambience and the drinks also very delicious. Staff are very friendly and helpful Specially Rahul Dahiya ,Abhishek Kumar,Maneger Deepak tiwari. Nice music,Lovely take care. Memorable moments.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Suma C
Detailed Review: Great service! Indu is wonderful and was very friendly with me upon arrival. The other hotel services are also great. The location is also great because it is located next to a mall. Overall, the service is wonderful and I would return!

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv

Review: Stay at Hilton Garden Inn Delhi
Detailed Review: Breakfast spread was good and had a variety of food to choose from  Service levels from the team was also good   Specific mention for Rahul Dhruv  Room was also good but internet connectivity on the phone was scratchy

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv

Detailed Review: I stayed with you guys in February for sometime, before the lockdown. The service is absolutely amazing and very personalised. Thanks for personal treatment during my visit. I feel like everyone was well mannered and from the guest side I felt very satisfied and comfortable. Finally, I would recommend this place to everyone to experience the great hospitality.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv

The service at hotel restaurant was good with kind waiters.   When checking out they made the charge in Euros without asking anything (they get 4.5% markup ding this). In the receipt there is a text claiming the cardholder has been offered a choice of charging currency...

The restaurant was listed as a cafe, nothing could have been firther from the truth.  The food was excellent, plentiful, suberbly cooked and a huge variety. Rooms were spacious and airy and very clean and well equipped.  A most enjoyable stay

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv

I would definitely recommend this to my friends. Thanks to Ishwar, Sanjay, Monu and chef vipin for providing such a lovely experience with delicious meal.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv

I will definitely recommend Lemon Tree Hotel Tomy friends and colleagues. I am looking forward to my next visit. Well done and thank you for your kindness and hospitality.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv

Her behaviour was very professional, polite and helpful. One of the best experience I ever had in any of the hotel. Thank you for your service. We would definitely recommend this hotel for everyone.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv

Detailed Review: Very satisfied with the food and room The room is comfy and the standard of cleanniness is commendable.i had my three meals here...good was amazing with high quality of ingredients  Keep it up  Thanks to chef Aditya, chef brijesh and Salman khan housekeeping

Detailed Review: The stay experience was simply awesome as the staff was very helpful and mentioning a staff member, she was very caring and helpful as we met on the first day, thanks Ms. Kritika. Felt positive vibes from the place and its Ambiance was simply amazing. Had a very good experience and would love to visit again :)

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Kiyo
Detailed Review: The food served by chef dhairya chef rajender chef Manoj chef Bhaskar was very awesome and we enjoyed our every meal here and would highly recommend this place, Excellent service done by server neeraj rishit vivek Mishra And manager atish they are very prompt and are very polite. I enjoyed my 3 weeks staying here and will recommend this place to others as well.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Bingooooo
Detailed Review: Everything is good. I particularly liked the great service attitude. This is a luxurious hotel with wonderful attentive staff. I was here for a group and was very pleased with the high quality service. It is obvious that every member of the staff is working their hardest to make your experience great. a special thanks to Mr. Amit Fordell ,Pankaj and Chef Rajendra for coordinating.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Rishikapoor
Detailed Review: I came with my korean group at Republic of noodle and their i got a amazing service by the restaurant  staff.the food taste was excellent when i have taken feedback  with group they  were extremely  happy with service and food.i would  like to say thanks to Monu,sanjay, pankaj,and chef Rajendra, kapil, ishwar.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Savyy123
Detailed Review: I had visited lemon tree aerocity with a group, Few members were very kind and helpful, Ishwar, Kapil, pankaj, sanjay, Gautam, Monu, chef Rajendra,  abhinav provided amazing service and food. Would definitely visit this place and recommend to others.  Thanks a lot everyone:)))

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Edward Ojabo
Detailed Review: Excellent service with good sense of house keeping and wonderful hospitality by Lemon Tree house keeping staffs especially haseeb, hemant, satyendra and parhash, floor manager Mr Lokesh. I will recommend this hotel to anybody visiting India for its comfort and warm hospitality in addition to the friendly staffs. Keep up the good work.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Donna5648
Detailed Review: This place is overpriced, badly managed, and a rip-off.  We stay at hotels all over the world for about 2 months a year.  This place was a real disappointment.  Hotels.com listed rate to be $133 (down from over $300 2 months earlier). Then after booking the hotel added $38 in taxes.  Wi-fi in hotel was went out regularly or was inoperable, they locked us out of our room more than once.  No change at the front desk (you need small bills all the time in India).  A 10 min ride to the airport was way overpriced.  They kept asking our names when we called down to complain and named 4 other guests as our name (??!!).  Claimed they had a steam room but it was out-of-order.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: CarlandClaire_13
Detailed Review: The hotel has lots of choice for food with several dining options. The bedrooms are well equipped and very comfortable. There is a pool and relaxing area in the garden   We ran a conference here and the service was very good.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Dinesh S
Detailed Review: This Is One Of The Best Hotel I Have Ever  Visited. The Ambience Is Very Amazing Specially Citrus Cafe. special  Thanks To Sartaj And Food and Beverage Manager Mr Amit Singh For There Very Caring And Kind Behavior In Anticipating All The Needs. The Satisfaction Of Guest Is The First Priority Of The Employees In This Hotel. I Will Surely Recommend This Hotel To Everyone And Will Definitely Visit Here Again.  Thanks Sartaj,Amit And Everyone.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Tom
Review: Surprisingly great last minute addition to our trip
Detailed Review: We ended up at the Lemon Tree, as our flight was cancelled and Virgin arranged for us to stay here, but it was a welcome surprise. The staff bent over backwards to accommodate us at breakfast and swiftly gave us a room- special mention to the manager at breakfast who tried to make things as smooth as possible for us.   The rooms were fairly small, yet compact- everything is laid out fantastically so all the space is all used well.   Both breakfast and dinner were varied and delicious and the reception area is very welcoming. The lemon theme throughout the hotel is a nice touch with the toiletries and air fresheners.   One of the best parts of this hotel is the location in an upmarket part of Delhi Aerocity area- somewhere we wouldn’t have thought of visiting but it was great to…

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Mitali singh
Detailed Review: Lemon Tree Premier is a very good hotel near airport. The check in and check out was very quick. Front desk staff neha and uma were very helpful. Guest relations Kritika was excellent in guest handling. She gave me the information about the hotel facilities which were not included in my package. she was very polite and professional. My check out was done by ms uma who did very fast. Stay was fabulous and comfortable. Great service.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Udaysingh
Detailed Review: Scrumptious food along with personalized service at citrus cafe made our experience and expectations reach another level. Thank you Ishwar and amit for this incredible experience and service.Would love to visit the place again

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Sanjay Nichlani
Detailed Review: Awesome service provided us by Virender Andaz Managar Mr Amit Singh and Mr Pankaj’ excellent jobs guy keep it up.Great location and nice food but the best part is the outstanding service   Very good choice of food on the buffet and wonderful taste that one can relish .  Thanks gyu.....

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Vicky
Detailed Review: Visited Republic of noodles for  friends get together. Ambience of the restaurant is amazing. Staff over there were very friednly. Amit Singh manager of the restaurant was very helpful and he made our get together more memorable. I would recommemt this place to my friends. Kudos to you guys✌✌✌

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Kamal Verma
Detailed Review: I would like to thank the hotel for the excellent services provided to us. I was with my wife and it was really amazing stay there and truly the way kritika from guest relations attended us made it really happening, very nice of her to be really good and helpful. Thank you so much. Was a great stay in the beautiful hotel near airport and the attention given to us. Will surly visit again: much love

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Yogendrakasare
Detailed Review: We go this place quite regularly.My son loves to be here.The food is delicious with world class best services.Excellent people always smiling.Met with Amit Fordell and Pankaj Kumar who took good care of our family.Will be back again and again.Kudos to the whole team.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: GoPlaces354296
Detailed Review: The stay was excellent and the best part is the services.   I would like to thank Chef Sahil, Chef Vinod, Chef Ankit and salad made by Chef Pijush.  Meera, Seema and Ricky everyone is so energetic and supportive.   I am glad to be here.   Keep it up...

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Paridhe
Detailed Review: I visited the hotel to meet my friend and hospitality experience I got from the people and the desk was outstanding .smile and warm welcome made me welcomed and happy . The experience was short and sweet . Hope to see this hospitality everywhere and hope that everyone gets the same as I got .

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Ram
Detailed Review: Chef Manoj , Chef Dhairya ,chef Rajendra chef Mehta are amazing in the particular role and the are doing their job very well the food served to us is very fantastic and amazingand we are enjoying our stay a lot and we specially love the live counters which are setup on daily basis and from the service part Vivek Mishra , neeraj, Sunil Hostess Ankita, Shweta and kanchan are very good in the jobs and from housekeeping Akash is very attentive and has taken very good care of us

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: DeepRJ
Detailed Review: had a chance to visit to lemon tree for a evening get together and this decision was right.  the place is too good. the biggest asset is the food that they serve. Guys do try paneer tikka which is awesome and tasty. the place is rejuvenating and will feel you like home. do meet chef manoj he will assist you with best food options.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Amar singh
Detailed Review: This place is near airport , and I'm extremely satisfied by the food and beverage service they provide. We had lunch at citrus cafe and the food was great in taste. One can visit this place whenever they are near airport. Keep it up!!!

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Hari
Detailed Review: The ambience of the place is soothing.Had food at citrus cafe and it was great in taste. They have good variety of dishes in the menu to choose from with that they served us very well. Definitely will visit this hotel again.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Raaj
Detailed Review: I would like to thank Mr pawan Sharma(Housekeeping),A amazing guy With wonderful Attitude this person is very caring and all when he saw me in corridor he give pleasant smile. I love this boy Mr.pawan sharma housekeeping All the Best for your future.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Shreya bidhuri
Detailed Review: The hotel is located in areocity, so it's near airport which is a plus point.when coming from a tiring journey this place is best suited for relaxing, service is also good.had food in citrus cafe which was flavorful and soul staisfying.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: LyndaGarland
Detailed Review: Stayed 2 nights at Lemon Tree in February 2020. Comfortable stay - shower and bed excellent. Ate in Citrus Cafe for breakfast and evening meals - buffet menu extensive, food all very tasty and high quality. Thanks to chef Dairy and chef Manojkumar and chef Rajendra and all the waiting team especially Vivek Mishra and Neeraj

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Hang Nguyen
Detailed Review: The hotel is well located and has excellent service. I would like to convey my thank to all room service team, especially Mr. Rakesh for the dedicated and great service every day during my stay. A very good place to stay when visting India.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: arvind1000
Review: Nice hotel near Delhi airport, excellent customer service
Detailed Review: This hotel is located in AeroCity locality close to Delhi International Airport ( about 10-15 mins by car). We were using the hotel’s business centre for carrying out senior interviews and had lunch at its Citrus restaurant ( a buffet with an ample selection of dishes). The food was good, the conference facilities was adequate and customer service excellent. Recommended.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Raushan V
Review: Excellent stay nice Hotel Great Housekeeping
Detailed Review: I stayed here for 03 nights from 01st to 03rd feb .i enjoyed this hotel a lot. near to the airport and good malls near by.delicious food in all restaurants. Good room and maintained i would like to thanks Prasun kumar for meeting with me on daily basis in evening i feel like i am at my home he specially take care of my all. i will definitely be here again. also thanks to lemon tree hotel for doing great job to give the job to specially abled person.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Rahul
Detailed Review: Good morning,  Pawan Sharma...( Housekeeping)  I love to stay always in Lemon tree, I love the hospitality in all the way..whr it is concerned with food/ service/ cleanliness... and the important thing the staff cooperation..is ossam...  We love to stay always in Lemon tree And would like to give the message to all our business associates and family friends to come and stay in Lemon tree...  Tks for your service and your warm cooperation...  Sushila Parmar International Pvt Ltd  Rahul Parmar.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Rajesh Choudhary
Detailed Review: The Food Is Amazing! All Three Meals, Breakfast, Lunch, Dinner Are All Scrumptious! WOULD Definitely Come Back Here To Have More Meals Like This.  Thanks To Sartaj, And F&B Manager  Amit Singh. Would Love To Come Back Here.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Dr.P.K.Rai
Detailed Review: Nice cozy rooms yet little smaller, excellent housekeeping from Haseeb n Rakesh TOMAR n room service from Babar,good food.Nice ambience. Liked d concept of water saving as recycled water being used for flush n keeping disabled staff for room service.Really Hats off.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: DR. P
Detailed Review: Service is good  Ambience fine Room service is good Staff are courteous  Receiving is very good  Separate place for smoking is appreciable  Appreciated the food served by the chef Dhairya and chef Rajendra

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Aziz M
Detailed Review: It was our business trip had dinner with our guest at Citrus Cafe. A clean and hygienic place with courteous and friendly staff. Especially Sartaj and Vijay Sharma. I would recommend this restaurant to others.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Ansar Hussain
Review: A pleasant stay at Lemon Tree Premier Aerocity, Delhi.
Detailed Review: Booked a Room through Make My Trip from 25th to 28th January for 3 nights stay. It's my pleasure to meet Mr Prasun Kumar, Asstt Executive, House Keeping. Through him I managed to book my room directly from 7th to 9th February and again from 10th to 11th February 2020. The hotel is very nearest to the Airport. Very wel behaved staff with professionally trained. We definitely like to be there again and again.  Ansar Hussain  Seujipar  Bokakhat  Golaghat, Assam.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Austin
Detailed Review: Very good food and firendly. Mr Chef Dhairya And Chef Manoj Kumar were very helpful in assisting me. Fully recommend who visit in delhi as the distance of the hotel is near to airport. Accessible to metro station by walking distance.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Praveen
Detailed Review: Excellent house keeping service specially by salman khan. Everything is very good ans on time. Very generous staff is here. Breakfast and dinner also good. Mr. Bablu yadav attitude towards guest is very good and helpful.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Punjabi Queen
Detailed Review: Great location, great staff, great food.. need to say more?  Lemon tree is the right hotel in terms of all the above .. the location is perfect for accessing airport as well as gurgaon and all parts of Delhi.Thanks to the chefs(Brijesh,Vinod and Hitesh) for preparing delicious food for us  Would certainly stay here again .. and again.!!

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Shivbam
Detailed Review: Food is good. Cleaning services are also very good. I will mention Salman's name for his proactiveness at his duty. Amenities provided here are also better than other hotel of same category. Giving employment to differently abled people is best intiative taken by Lemon Tree Management.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Arshad Hussain
Detailed Review: My stay here was very comfortable. Food is great. Staff is very polite and helpful. Eapecially housekeeping services by Mr. Salman were excellent, he made sure in every way my stay was comfortable. Definitely will visit again, will recommend to others.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: NorthStar568467
Detailed Review: We were in this hotel with a group and had a great time.The staffs were extremely courteous and professional taking care of all your needs. I would like to thank Mr.Pankaj and Mr.Amit Fordell for managing his team brilliantly.We will like to see on 21feb again and will hope for the same lovely support and services.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Daydream304592
Detailed Review: Good experience all together at redfox Buffet was good with variety of dishes Food tasted good Friendly staff Behaviour and service of Housekeeping staff Mr Shiv and Miss Manchi was appreciable. Thank you

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Sachin Muddappa
Detailed Review: Hi it wasn’t a good experience from the time of checking in to this hotel.   We had booked for 02 single rooms. 01 Non Smoking and 01 smoking. - When we landed at the front desk at 1 AM, we were told all the smoking rooms have got full. Hence they can’t give the same. When requested telling we had asked specifically. He denied telling there were no request.  Later when showed the e-mail, the smoking room was born at 1:00 AM.   We didn’t have food in the flight, hence decided to order for dinner. Hence dialled the hot key at the room phone for room service. When asked what can we get at the earliest to eat. I was offered. Rice and Dhabha Chicken, I told fine. The order taker replied sir it will take 20 Minutes. The time was 01:18AM. I told fine.  I called up at 2:00 AM to check…

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Gkbs
Detailed Review: Excellent house keeping ..press provided at the rooms is an awesome facility.Breakfast and dinner buffet is perfect. Prime location. Pool and ambience is wonderful.rooms are well maintained and staff is cordial

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: RAJESH KUMAR
Review: Wedding Reception dinner party on 4th February, 2020
Detailed Review: We had hosted our Wedding reception dinner party at the Lemon Tree Premier, Aerocity, New Delhi on 4th February, 2020 and I would highly recommend this venue if you are looking for something unique atmosphere, scenery and overall experience.                                                  From the day I went and met Mr. Devi Lal and Banquet Manager Ms. Neha Khandelwal to discuss about the banquet hall booking and other related matters, everything went very smooth till the function was over. The Banquet hall and Pool Side was made ready as per our liking and the food was delicious which was made by Chefs as per our selected menu. Mr. Gautam, Manager look after the function very sincerely and with dedication.                                                   Here, I would like to…

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Pankaj
Detailed Review: Came to the hotel for lunch and really enjoyed the food. The service was nice. Absolutely loved the desserts and it was a great experience meeting chef aditya. He guided us through the buffet and he was very friendly.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Rishabh
Detailed Review: Excellent hotel with very humble staff. Citrus cafe was very comfortable with delicious food. Really love the dessert especially chocolate cake. Met bakery chef aditya,he explained me the dessert (parfait) made by chef jasmita, he has great knowledge of sweets.  thanks to chef brijesh and vinod for arranging such buffet full of variety.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Susan S
Detailed Review: The Lemon Tree has good, small, basic rooms and pleasant staff.  Bathrooms were very clean, nice hot shower, beds a bit soft.  Rooms were quiet - no road or plane noise.  We were on the fifth floor.  Just right for an overnight between flights.  We booked with Agoda and had no problems.    The breakfast buffet was good.  We took the metro from the airport in the evening.  It’s one stop on the Orange Line, and only 20 rupees.  Also a ten minute walk at the end along the road and difficult with large bags.  Airport shuttle is 800 rupees with tax.  Uber would have been 125 Rs, but refused to stop at 7:30 the next morning.  After waiting 20 mins, we took the hotel shuttle.  We stayed at the Lemon Tree Aurangabad a few years ago, and it is a different class of hotel.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Mimie
Detailed Review: Ive visited several times here and it always been the best experience. Staff are all friendly and helpful. The food also amazing and i couldnt remember when it is not disappointing. Cheff Aditya serve us magnificent food and very friendly person. Keep it up!!

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Ankur Balana
Detailed Review: Stayed in this hotel for 5 days... Great Housekeeping services, Good Food... staff is very courteous... In housekeeping Salman & in in room dining Sailendra they both have done very well... would like to come back for the services

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Kabir
Detailed Review: Lemon tree Aerocity is a extremely nice place to stay, near by the airport ,just 10 min way to airport. Good food with great staff always ready to help with great efforts.Room is neet and clean all amenities is perfect Specially thanks to housekeeping person Mr.Salman Khan.He helped us a lot. Thanks to lemon tree delhi for Nice hotel with great staff our stay memorable

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Kasia’s Travel
Review: Pleasant, clean hotel with decent food
Detailed Review: While near airport, I would not classify it as an airport hotel.  It’s surrounded by restaurants, other hotels, a shopping mall and even a bit of a recreational outdoor space. The restaurant serves decent quality Indian food. Omelets and more basic foods are available for breakfast.  I found the restaurant staff to be very accommodating.  They were willing to serve me after closing when I arrived late. The pool area is beautiful but February weather did not make it possible for me to swim. I used the laundry service and my expensive silk blouse got ruined.  The manager was very apologetic and an hour before my departure run to the nearby mall to buy me a beautiful pashmina scarf as a compensation.  I appreciated the gesture.  The rooms are spacious and clean. It’s a nice…

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Alex Jir.
Detailed Review: Cleaning: the housekeeping of this hotel is superb. Mr Avdesh and Salman are very good at thrir job, well supervised by Mr Lokesh, Asst manager, housekeeping. Restaurant, reception and location all excellent.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Sarvjeet1122
Detailed Review: Good food. The ambience of the restaurant was beautiful Combo of Indian and continental is lovely to palette. Service in iris/oryo can be improved. Would visit again once everything gets normal and we can start our CME's once again

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: jasmeen k
Detailed Review: The hotel is in the heart of malls and thus is conveniently located. I have been there many times for a sip after visiting the mall or after a movie. The food is good and has a decent bar to have a peaceful evening.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Mittal
Detailed Review: We were only supposed to stay at this hotel for 3 nights but we ended up staying for 4 WEEKS! My mom ended up in Hospital and the location of our stay here was amazing. We could easily walk to Max Hospital, the nearby Mall, the nearby village of Malviya Nagar. The chef and Manager treated us like family after knowing our circumstances and made our stay easy and comforting. I would return and recommend staying here.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Qayumvirani
Detailed Review: Had my baggage mishandled by Air India. But the Hotel made me feel like home, even helped arrange for me to go back to the airport for my bagage the very last minute. The staff and service was very professional.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: ChandanKumar1975
Review: Great location, excellent service and value for money
Detailed Review: Hilton Garden Inn Saket has a very nice location- right in the Center or high end shopping malls & restaurants. Even close to one of the best hospitals if you need. Staff is good. Very cooperative. Service is good. Breakfast spread is fantastic. Lunch and dinner options can be improved. Room service is great. Good for both business and family stays.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: FrequentFlier713389
Review: Great place to stay for business travellers to New Delhi
Detailed Review: I am in the middle of a four-night stay here after a four-night stay here a week ago as part of a two-week business trip to India.  All of the personnel have been very helpful from security to the bell staff to the front desk, and especially the restaurant.  They have all been very friendly and welcoming, and offering recommendations and other advice.   The accommodations are good and the fitness center is more complete than is typical for hotels of this type.  I have had many meals so far in the restaurant, each of which have been very good.  While they do have western dishes, why come all of the way to India and eat what I can have at home.  I was able to sample one delicious dish after another.  I had one meal with a colleague from India who also thought that the food was…

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Peter D
Detailed Review: Had a great time at the bar. Rahul the BT was super helpful and knowledgeable. He took great care of us. Very professional. Ask for him for great svc. He was also helpful with telling us what was in the neighborhood.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Amit D
Review: Good property could do with some revamping
Detailed Review: Everything works just fine. The furnishings are a tad old and could very well do with some re-furbishing. The hotel is showing it's age. Staff is cordial. In room dining charges are pretty high. However, you have the select city walk mall just next door and a couple more restaurants just opposite. Taxis are easy to get. The shower area in the rooms lack any handshower which is a let down. Also the water pressure is not that great. Overall a decent stay.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Deep
Detailed Review: Do not think twice before booking this hotel as long as you can afford it. Staff is very helpful. They won't even let you take your bags by yourself. Kudos to all the employees at the hotel. Amazing food. Thanks to the chef. Thank you Bimal, Indu and Pappu for keeping the hotel premises safe for the visitors. Last but not least, special thanks to Pradeep. I haven't met anyone who's as dedicated at their job as Pradeep.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Jil K
Detailed Review: We were taken care of by the welcoming staff indu, bimal and pappu. The breakfast was amazing and the restaurant managers took great care of us. We would definitely choose this hotel again. Great room as well.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Abhijit Z
Detailed Review: Indu, chandan deshpal are very good  staff at the main entrance..always smiling and welcoming guests. We have been staying here since many years now and the entrance staff is very important for making the stay comfortable...I like their smiling faces.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Ssimsss
Detailed Review: Have kind and nice staffs. Good Thanks for help me.  Here resturant is really good. Very delisious. Even i am foreioner.  Some times heater doesnt work. But the call the maintain office they fix it promptly.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Veera
Detailed Review: We had great service by Rahul Dahiya and Sahil tonight and would recommend visiting the bar!! Rocking bartender  Rahul Dahiya best of luck of  Bright future and good luck. I will come back to visit again..

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Brad J
Detailed Review: Rooms are a bet worn out but staff is excellent. Would recommend compared to other hotels in the area. Plus being near the mall is nice. And love having a Starbucks. Makes all the difference in the world when you’re traveling from international.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Adil Zafar
Detailed Review: Chandan, Indu and Ajay and Deshpal are nice personalities. They will welcome guest with smile and do the security check the way guest feel more comfortable and the Willingly accept for going through security procedures. Restaurant and other services are best.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Kamaal
Detailed Review: Outstanding services and starting from main entrance to the reception to all staff including INDU prem chand  Chandan Ajay Tajamul Gocher  Food is the best  Breakfast is mind blowing  King size bed  Visiting twice. A year

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: M.P. Verma
Detailed Review: Hotel is in saket mall area and its a good location for business people. House keeping is good and neat & clean. Prompt service Brake fast spread is good. Hospitality is good staff is always smiling & cooperative. its a good experience.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Rino
Detailed Review: Very nice hotel and really good restaurant. Service high quality of serve and quik. Very Kind people. Special thank to Tanya, Devender, Faran, Kumar, Goldy, Shail. The room are big and wifi is available.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: KJ292
Detailed Review: The swimming fool is out of several days all the kids were very unhappy. The brake fast staff didn’t seem to care about Guest. Staff were gathered in a corner talking and ignoring the guests. Breakfast was very disorganized. Tables were left dirty. Management seem to be very understanding  on the issues.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Nikkhil
Detailed Review: Excellent stay. Very pleasant staff. Excellent hospitality. Security staff, Bimal, AnKesh, Aditya and Indu were very pleasant with greetings. Enjoyed the stay at the hotel.. Will definitely visit again.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Jared W
Detailed Review: The staff at the Hilton Garden Inn Saket were very helpful. They helped organize tours and even the delivery of food. A couple of the staff including Om Naryan was very helpful in giving my father and I travel tips throughout the city

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Nekuri
Detailed Review: From the registration to check out me and my family had an excellent experience. Very efficient, courteous and helpful. I used the hotel cars for airport transfers and city tours service was excellent. They had WiFi in the car very convenient for looking up things on road. I highly recommend the hotel

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Bill
Review: Hilton at Saket, great place to stay
Detailed Review: One of the best Hotel in Delhi, the team working there, is very professional,from the reception , the service, the kitchen, the cleaning & the security. For example people like Omnaraya, Balmiki, Divya, Aditya, Komal and all of the security team, they are doing ecxallent job, nothing gets inside without inspection everybody was safe inside the hotel because of this people. Thank you

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Update
Detailed Review: Chandan & Ajay were good at their security job. The restaurant was good the meal was good we’ll. The administration was good. The reception was warm. However, the fridge lacked the commodities I required.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Harsh v Kalro
Detailed Review: Had a good time during my stay Specially the security staff at the hotel was courteous (Khushbu, Ajay, Chandan) Must try place Restaurant is good Clean rooms, helpful staff Swimming pool on the terrace

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Satwinder
Detailed Review: Indu chandan and Ajay security is very nice service , restaurant India grill restaurant service is nice I stay in Hilton garden inn saket Delhi stay was very compartable near mall select city walk is so nice.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Justin
Detailed Review: Had a wonderful stay at the Hilton Garden Inn.  Location couldn’t be better for New Delhi. Quick access to Uber’s, Metro, and a short walk to the Select City Walk Mall and lots of restaurants.  Great for international and domestic travelers alike.  Hotel security and check in staff made our trip fun and enjoyable each morning!

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Kunaljjain30
Detailed Review: Amazing Hotel, Nice rooms, Location wise its very convenient. Friendly staff ... Indu, Chandan and deshpal were very cooperative. Room Service was good. My first time, but experience was amazing. Awesome

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: AratricaGuha007
Detailed Review: I stayed for 10 days with Hilton Inn.Though a small one having 100 rooms and only one restaurant and one bar but the service of the staffs are very much appreciated.  Mrs Khusboo Singh from Security helped a lot in knowing about the place . Also Mr.Muhammed gave me a brief idea about Delhi as it was my first time . Housekeeping executive and associate Mr.Singh was also helpful but one backdrop is that they didn't enroll my name in Hilton Honors even after staying for so many days .

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Phurbasamten
Detailed Review: Chandan security service is good, man door security is so good, India grill resturent is very nice and front office staff is good near mall select city walk is 2minute walking distence mall is very nice.

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: mayank1787
Detailed Review: It was a really pleasurable and awesome stay and the security team consisting of Indu, Chandan and Ajay. Really appreciate the service provided and look forward to coming back again. It was a good stay

Source.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi4.csv
Name: Rachit Thukral
Detailed Review: It was a really nice stay. The staff was super good. Specially indu, desh pal and ajay (security team) were so kind and helpful. The food was amazing too. The crowd was also nicd outside the hotel. I will definitely recommend this.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Dove P
Detailed Review: I stay at holiday inn for one night with my friend and it was incredible experience for me.  Had Dinner at Bella restaurant was so special. their hospitality and the staff so jolly and good especially mercy.  she  deed a wonderful  service and the food was delicious . Wish to come again in the future...

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Ashok Bhamla
Detailed Review: The Holiday Inn hotel at New Delhi international airport is the best place to stay who search for hotels near to the airport. Its fabulous hotel as compared to budget and luxury. I always stay here when catching up early or late night flight.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Clement D
Review: Perfect before or after a plane
Detailed Review: The receptionist helped me find a room on a night we couldn't find our hotel (it had been closed down...). They were so helpful that we decided to come and stay for a night there before leaving to Jaipur. They helped us find a car and a driver to go to Rajasthan. We came back on our way back to Europe as we wanted to rest for a couple of nights near the airport. The staff here is incredibly helpful. Abhishek and his team take care of you with a royal sense of service at the Buffet restaurant, where all meals included breakfast are by far the best we had during our trip. Lot of choice for western cuisine, a good alternative when you're a bit tired of spicy food. The Hangar Bar is a good place to hang out too, with a good choice of wines and cocktails. The house wine is not good…

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: chinmay sharma
Detailed Review: The day was very nice and the ambience was extremely pleasing. We got a good room with a big window view of Delhi and Mr Sachin really helped us with all the requirements we had for the service.  Overall stay was pleasant.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: John
Detailed Review: It was 2nd visit to this hotel it was worst experience because of poor coffee and not attentive service... I ordered cappuccino and I got just coffee with milk which was cold... And it was supposed to be full cup unfortunately it was half cup...... Look into this not to give half cup coffee and wrong coffee too...  Viva..... 👎👎👎

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: JTut
Detailed Review: We stayed here for 5 nights during our visit to Delhi.  We utilized the hotel's airport shuttle upon arrival at the airport.  We were a little confused and not sure what to do.  When I called the hotel, they immediately transferred me to someone who was onsite at the airport.  This person found us promptly and got us to a vehicle.  The hotel was only a 5 minute drive away.  The rooms were very clean.  Free water bottles are provided with the room which was a game changer for us.  It was slightly odd having a window between the shower and the bedroom, but you can close the blinds for privacy.  The breakfast buffet at the hotel was amazing because of the huge selection of food.  Hotel staff were friendly and helpful and, for the most part, there was no language barrier.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Richard Belho
Detailed Review: The place is plesant to stay but the interior furnishing in the corridor is cheap. Sometimes when you host a guest, they immediately assume it's a low end hotel. The staffs are polite and Breakfast has a good spread. The staffs manning the dining zone are extremely polite and the food is good too. The most unpleasant experience came from the staffs that manages the intercom and those managing the in dining. The short cut buttons in the phone in one suite wrongly dialled a different section. Then we were asked to dial zero. On dialling zero, we were asked to dial inroom-dining. Regardless of which number is dialled, they could have forwarded to the right section. Inroom dining also took orders and failed to deliver a fish curry. Apart from that, Food is good and the experience…

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Garima
Detailed Review: We had a dinner in Viva all day dinning it was a great night spent here and also the good is really amazing. Ambience was really good. I would really like to come again 😊. And service was very professional by Amit and kanika. Big thanks to the team

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Robert W
Detailed Review: The Holiday Inn Aerocity is a very professional and well run hotel. The rooms are lovely, the service is great and the food is delicious.  Special thanks to Kanika in the restaurant for the friendly stories of the magic of India shared.  🌟 Fun and sweet 🌟  Thanks to the sweet and wonderful staff at this lovely  hotel 🌟

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Meghan
Detailed Review: One of the best place for meeting conference.I came for awards ceremony attend in Holiday Inn Hotel,Nice hotel ambience was very good.All staff was supportive and helpful.Mr munna was amazing who taking care of banquets.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Varsha
Detailed Review: I have visited for conference meeting attend in holiday inn aerocity . Hotel was very good all staff was helpful and caring to guest. Food and service was amazing . Special thanks to Mr Munna and vishal and banquet team

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Shristi kapoor
Detailed Review: I have visited for conference meeting at Holiday Inn Aerocity for two days .It was realy awsome place for meeting and conference .All staff was helpful and supportive,Ambience was nice entire set up was fantastic.Thanks to Munna and Banquets team.We ll come back again .

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Saumik
Detailed Review: We had an awesome conference. It has a perfect venue for conference and meetings with PFA perfect for networking and meals.  Good food.  Munna, Vishal,Daswant and Rajpal gave in their best to make our event a great success

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Neil C
Detailed Review: We had a two day conference here and it was organised in the smoothest way possible! I wouldn't have any complains with this banquet and the team is outstanding! Special thanks to Munna, Vishal, Shivam and Rajpal for their brilliant service and their brilliant team!

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: rahul
Detailed Review: I have visited for conference meeting in holiday Inn Aerocity .Amazing ambiance , all staff was supportive and caring .Easy to connectivity with metro station and airport.We love this place for meeting , we ll come back soon this place .Special thanks to Mr.Munna Vishal and Yogesh for support.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: gkegan
Detailed Review: We stayed here twice , once when arrived and the night before we left. What a great hotel !!!!. The staff were so friendly and happy - all of them. They were genuinely please that you were there and went out of their way all the time. The rooms are great very very clean , modern with everything perfect . Great buffet breakfast , one of our best while we were in India. We had room service for dinner and the food was outstanding ,on time and not that expensive. So glad we chose this hotel- what a winner !!!!

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: sudhanshu prabhakar
Detailed Review: I came in viva I really enjoyed the dine it was  wonderfull experience specially thanks to viva team Kanika, anuradha, vishal i would like to appreciate the services and food is also really good. Thank you guys😁

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: CrockettSurrey
Detailed Review: Arrived at Delhi at around 7.30pm and easily found the Holiday Inn transfers representative displaying our names just outside the terminal exit. The car arrived in just a few minutes and after the 10 minute transfer we were welcomed and quickly checked in by the excellent Monka at reception and off to our rooms.  Rooms are modern and a good size with a large comfortable bed. There is also an AV console that you can plug your HDMI cable into and stream content to the TV. Sockets in the room are multi region, so no problem with UK plugs. Bathroom has single sink and large shower with a hand set outlet.   We dined in the Bella Italia restaurant, which is a bit rustic and noisy but the food was pretty good. Breakfast was very busy and had a good selection, though the orange juice…

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Vijay M
Detailed Review: We came for the Breakfast in viva I really appreciate the services given by Kanika, anuradha, Amit and Pankaj and special thanks to Thomas chef and Narender Katoch 😊and also the food is really good I will come back soon.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Narinder K
Detailed Review: It was awaome feeling all together.. Santosh at viva qas really awsome. It was a very good feeling all together. I can say saurav at vica was realky awsome. He is true asset towards. The company . He works with full loyality and support

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: joecool1973
Review: Nice hotel at the airport terminal
Detailed Review: I stayed at the New Delhi International Airport Terminal Holiday Inn hotel on 7th January 2020. The staff were friendly and professional. The room was of acceptable size, clean and contemporary. You can also hire the room per hour if necessary. The breakfast was limited but ok. They do offer omelettes if you like some hot breakfast. The shower was ok not really a power shower though. Saying all this, I would recommend it if you need to stay in the airport terminal for any length of time.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: AC2T
Detailed Review: Great and friendly service from Rohit from in room service  Friendly and effective service from staff from reception to cleaners  Pleasant and clean room  great location , airport shuttle and greeting at airport

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Swapan
Detailed Review: One of the best place for meeting or conference Holiday Inn Aerocity. I have attended one day meeting at Holiday day inn ambience was nice, All staff was helpful and supportive. Special thanks to banquets team Mr. VISHAL Munna Om and Rajpal.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: anthonykJ4031YP
Detailed Review: We stayed one night prior to our flight out, but excellent gym to use up time, and pool weather permitting, great bar and restaurants, if your over the Indian cuisine and need a break Italian restaurant was great, good choice. As it is quite a busy hotel the bar has a good vibe unlike most other hotel bars. Staff attentive and professional, we would probably only stay here, if we are ever in this city again. Thank you.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Pawoo
Detailed Review: One of the best Meeting and conference  place Holiday Day Inn Aerocity New Delhi.Nice ambience all staff of service was helpful and supporting .I was being their for 2days meeting in Mars  Special thanks to Mr.Munna Vishal And Rajpal and banquet team.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Rochelle R
Detailed Review: Very friendly and helpful staff- from the airport shuttle bus driver, check in desk, concierge, servers and managers in the restaurant  Rooms very modern in design and comfortable Located close to the airport, shuttle bus was easy to use Complimentary breakfast that was included was fresh with a variety of multicultural and tasty options

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: nomadsachin
Review: One of the Best service ever!!Wow!!
Detailed Review: This is my 4th stay in this property. Believe me guy this hotel give one of the best service in the country. From valet to front desk, guards to waiters everyone welcomes you with a smile. Any problem u have us sorted in minutes. Everyone basically tries to give there best in whatever u ask. I m a travel enthusiast n also I write a small blog about travelling I have stayed and experience many properties across the world. This is unexpectedly one of the best experience. There are few small issues like AC sometime makes too much of noise and they don’t have a centralised heating only cooling. Music watch don’t work properly. So the room temp in winters stay at around 20-21 degrees. But I can conveniently ignore all that for the warmth and caring service. Way to go guys pls…

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Ritik
Detailed Review: We came for meeting attend in Holiday Inn Aerocity New Delhi .All staff was supportive and helpful .Food was amazing and service was perfect,Ambience was nice near to International airport and metro connectivity.Mr.Munna the banquet special thanks to him for taking care. ,@@@

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Ash
Detailed Review: Holiday Inn is a great hotel with good services! The ambience is beautiful. Customer service is great. Clean and peaceful. You should try the lounge, great food! Sachin helped us with food and coffee! ☕🍰😄

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Anil Kumar N
Detailed Review: We came for business conference at Holiday Inn aerocity New Delhi. Service was amazing from holiday Inn banquets  team and food was as per our expectations it's really good.Specially thanks to Mr. Munna for taking care for during conference.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Bernice B. R
Detailed Review: Excellent service from Sachin!!! The ginger tea with lemon and the food was excellent. Thank you Sachin for the wonderful service. The room is nice and I like the proximity to the airport. Thank you thank you thank you.

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Rohit K
Detailed Review: We recently visited and were greeted incredibly warmly. We had great rooms and fantastic food. The front desk staff and airport team are incredible. Special thanks to Ajay and all duty managers on staff during our stay!

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Cindy
Detailed Review: It was a great welcome at the desk by Mr Manan at the reception.Very humble and with a great friendly nature.A guest was just yelling at him but he was patient and calm and had a smiling face. It was a smooth check in by him and quick service  Mr Vishu also helped us out by providing the information for the tour  I would recommend this to my friends as well and families too .

Source.Name: Holiday Inn New Delhi 4_Delhi.csv
Name: Jasvinder S
Detailed Review: We stayed at Holiday Inn for an overnight visit to Delhi, airport transfer was very handy check in was fast.  We had an excellent in room dining service from Sachin, food was delicious including deserts!!!!😊😊😊😊

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Gurprabhjit S
Detailed Review: I came here for business trip.looks Royal !! Marbles and statues are fabulous. Hotel located at prime location. Views are very nice .front office staff very helpful. Superb service and lovely hotel. Will recommend as first priority

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: AnujDalal
Detailed Review: 2nd visit at the Royal Plaza,CP. Good amenities..  Rooms are little small. No study table and chair which was a little unusual for a business stay.  Decent breakfast spread which was almost the same for 2 days expect for 1-2 items.  Overall a comfortable stay!!

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: manishvaibhav
Review: Thanks Royal Plaza and Ms Ruchi
Detailed Review: I have already mentioned twice for Royal Plaza..I’m doing it again as it rightly deserves so.. Special Thanks to Ms Ruchi Malik for her hospitality and help.Must appreciate Ms Ruchi Malik for kind help during Breakfast as I was short of time and had a flight to take...Her help is beyond Appreciation..

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Corvid Namaste
Detailed Review: Very deceiving, when we arrived the entrance was beautiful, we got attitude from front desk, the Dinning area, although beautiful with pool view...every staff worker was being domonated by strict management and no one was happy. Lots of EGO by management...we felt sorry for the staff working! We paid $8.00 Canadian for EACH cup of masala chai. We do not recommend as we felt uncomfortable. Room was basic, no toiletries, no bottled water, no internet.

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Shabere
Detailed Review: The hotel is very nice good locations Staff is great check in was good room is nice   Especially Aman and prashant both were very polite and Helpful. Food is good hotel lobby is very nice look great like royal.

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Sightseer40042679293
Detailed Review: A great Hotel at a great location, staff were Top Class very polite and accommodating. Although we were here for only two nights we did have a great stay, rooms were very comfortable and the breakfast was plentiful and caters for everyone. Nothing negative to report about this Hotel.

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: John
Detailed Review: The hotel is great service . The tea lounge is very nice  Great service by Timmy and Sachin  Best tea ever with some biscuits. The room was good staff is great room nice view  Aman is very much appreciated provide best possible help.

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Jimmy
Detailed Review: We stayed here for 2 nights. The stay was v comfortable. Check in was quick and smooth. The room given was also compact and good. Beds too were comfortable for sleeping. At the time of check in they inquired if we were going to use the mini bar and we said no, so as soon as we entered the room the persons came to lock. Had to call the technician to switch off the heater and let the ac work. He did the same very swiftly. The shower in the bathroom was very nice and strong. Good hot water. TV was a bit confusing to start and then it was good. The breakfast spread was good and nearly quick service with eggs, etc. Watermelon juice was fresh, though cold,but was yummy.  The only thing we didn't like was that no mineral water was kept in the room, instead water bottles covered with…

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: prasana s
Detailed Review: The place is located in the heart of the city.. the property is generally good.. the rooms and toilets were clean and all was generally functional although one got a feel of things being a little old.. the rooms however are very tiny in comparison to the rooms in a similar hotel .. over all worth your money if you get a good rate..

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: rahuuljethi
Detailed Review: I visited the hotel with my family and they couldn't provide us clean rooms. Firstly my sister just got her surgery done and she's allergic to dust. The room was filled with dust. Then the other room which was provided had a used condom lying there. Horrible, pathetic experience in this property. Even the service is really slow. The entire property has a depressing feel to it.

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: charu s
Detailed Review: Awsome experience great food really liked the services of the staff at the resturant special thanx to Mr rahul sharma for making my ... birthday so special great experience thank u so much will recommend everyone to vist once to enjoy the beautiful experience p

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Arun
Detailed Review: The hotel is good . location is good . Check in was good and smooth Anil is there he is nice give us good room with view . There also guest relations Aman was superb.  Royal plaza is awesome   Near to many market janpath or Connaught place . excellent.

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: sakshi
Detailed Review: Few days back i visited to this hotel and i found it very beautiful. Lobby area was so beautiful and the staff was very good and polite The most excellent thing was the food which i had in the restaurant royal bistro the food was excellent  The staff was very goodd especially Rahul Sharma he treated me and my family so nicely and offered us the best food in the menu and his service was excellent and yes the pool side was really very beautiful

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Mahi
Detailed Review: I arrived in the middle of the midnight but the staff were so nice and polite even then. the lobby was veeeery beautiful and shiny! the breakfast was consist of various options with a pleasant hall bedroom was comfortable but a little small which I had no problem with as everuthing was there

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Singh
Detailed Review: The check in and check out was very quick front desk staff were very helpful. Manager  from guest relations Shabnam was excellent in guest handling. She gave me the information about the hotel facilities which is included in my package. My check out was done by ms Kaur who did very fast. My room was very nice from my room woowww view. Spa services and room service was very good.

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Ravi
Detailed Review: I would appreciate the staff work special ms Shabnam  who was very attentive and polite. I have stayed here for one day which was amazing with lots of complimentary services. Room was very beautiful and clean. The hotel is gods. Centrally located easy to come. I will recommend this hotel to my every friend and family members.

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: mudasir nazir
Detailed Review: Upon checking in first thing they will do is to lock the mini bar (small fridge in the room), as if people staying in these hotels are thieves. For that they send a staff immediately to your room to lock it in front of you, which is just disgusting. For accessories in room including tooth kits, slippers, bathrobes etc you have to call them every time. Overall room hygiene is poor, staff is discourteous. It is disheartening to learn that such a huge hotel with such an amazing location is trying to earn from its customers through such petty cost cuts. That perhaps is the reason why the bookings there are always non-refundable. Once you have booked a room for any number of days, you cant leave unless you are ready to give up money. However, the breakfast is good, with a wide…

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Venkatesh
Detailed Review: Came here for cricket tournament and lived for almost more then weeks time.had a stay as much comfortable as it could be.  Wishing good luck to team   Special thanks to guest relations team  Royal plaza is rock

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Yash J
Review: Grace and elegance with wonderful services
Detailed Review: The hotel is nicely made and staff is extra ordinary courteous and hospitable.My room was good and breakfast food was tasty with lots of variety.  Aman & Ashwinder were wonderful host and made sure that every guest is looked after and personalised service is given to all.  I truly recommend this place to all travelling with family or business purposes.  Thank you all

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: basid
Detailed Review: my stay was good. only stayed here for one day which was amazing shabnam was helped me during my checkout. check in by osama was amazon. beautiful hotel with clean lobby. beautiful garden and spa.  i will definitely recommend this hotel to my frie and family and colleagues.

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: prasad
Review: God stay because of good service
Detailed Review: I have stayed here first time in this hotel my stay was nice . From now I will come here again also. Front desk was very helpful.  Shabnam and aman was very attentive.  My check in by Osama who did very well. Buffett breakfast was amazing. I was in 1009 beautiful room and the view . I will reccomend this hotel again. Spa was amazing and the garden also Lobby was amazing.

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Venkat
Detailed Review: My stay got full of beautiful surprise with so lovely people at breakfast,  kamal,  mohit are great at service and no doubt when you got great managers like ruchi amd ravi,  beautiful people with warm gesture amd ettiequets.  God bless all fpr great service.

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Gurpreet S
Detailed Review: I stayed in royal plaza from 8th to 11th January.  Hospitality right from arrival to departure was awesome. Room was neat and clean.breakfast spread was very good. I met Mr.pankaj madan front office manager and I am very much impressed with his warm hospitable attitude. Overall my experience is very good .I wish them all the best.

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Марина Ш
Detailed Review: Royal plaza Delhi india first time. Hotel is good. Staff is kind and saurav professional perfect stay.  Room is good Guest relationship amaan and shabbna Location is good   Main lobby is very beautiful Bell desk Rajesh good

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Soniya
Detailed Review: Had come here with friends so many times the hotel was amazing and the room are very beautiful with lot of amenities the pool was very beautiful its on the Roman theme . Check in was amazing by Saurav and the smooth. Guest relations Aman and Shabanm both were very friendly. Great service worth it

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: rchandra0027
Review: Everything that glitters is not Gold
Detailed Review: The title of review itself describes the status of this hotel. I have stayed in this hotel for 03 nights  however for none of the day I could convince myself that my decision to stay here was correct.   The hotel is located at prime location and that was the only reason which compelled me to stay here. Of course, the location advantage is known to hotel officials also, hence they are, even though in hospitality industry, lacks the basic courtesy and manners. Hotel duty manager and staff's are "rude".   The hotel's interior decoration looks fabulous when you enter this hotel and believe me this is the real trap to change your initial perception. I stayed here in standard room and the time when I first entered this hotel I was feeling overwhelmed due to its appearance,  however…

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Poori
Detailed Review: Thank you for very happy with service .the staff is good. The stay was amazing and comfortable  Guest relations is very helpful. Check in was good anil is kind . Room is good.food is good. Location is nice.

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Rohan
Detailed Review: The royal plazA hotel is nice and best location staff is good Anil kumar is very good very professional.  Room is nice clean bed and comfortable.  Room garden is very clean and green  Food is good very much variety of Indian food good Rahul He is extremely good  Guest relationships Amannn she give us spa 15 mins which is very good and spa is proper way is extremely good  Spa staff Aman deep recpation good communication good suggestion of aroma massage.

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Treesha
Review: 3rd time visit at The Royal Plaza Hotel Delhi
Detailed Review: This is my 3rd time experience at The Royal Plaza Hotel and I'm happy to be back 🙂. We were staying in suite room and had a nice and relax stay. Food was excellent and we enjoyed !   About staff, friendly and helpful and specially should thanks to Puja (GRO) for her support given during our stay. Thank you 👍🏻

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Jeewa
Detailed Review: Very convenient location. Hotel has unique interior and painting. I really enjoyed the stay with my friends. Staff are helpful and breakfast is very nice. Guest Relation Ms puja had been very much attentive and provided a better service. I recommend this hotel for anyone.

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: PoojaPyne
Detailed Review: Service is very good and the staffs specially Ms Puja was very friendly and enquired about our stay and how we liked it. 1st night we stayed at a suite room, which we felt is a bit small, bathrooms need a bit of modernisation.  Breakfast was very good with Indian options mainly.  Overall good hotel in a nice location.

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Satyendra k
Detailed Review: This hotel is really amazing. Staffs are kind and welcoming. Guest relations Puja Aman and Shabnam they are very helpful and amazing Manager Kushal is also helpful and kind heart,best stay ever... Amazing staffs and team workers Best location.

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Suman B
Review: Great staff great evening music location
Detailed Review: The Royal plaza is very good hotel centrality location  Staff is very helpful check in was good .specially Saurav he is very friendly and helpful. Guest relations is very kind and helpful give us 15 min head massage which is very good spa is excellent

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Harshita
Detailed Review: Fantastic lobby, beautiful spa and garden, I have just came here for check in. In lobby shabnam was help me. Owsama taken my check in who did very fast. Room was very specious and beautiful with all amenities. Clean room and linen I will recommend this hotel to my friends.

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Sujeet
Detailed Review: This is my first visit in this hotel. I really like this hotel i was stayed in 1217 front facing room . My check in done very smoothly by shabnam khan after my check in she gave me the information about hotel service. Buffet brekfast was very testy. Lobby was very beautiful and the garden also.about my check out the same lady meet me on check out counter. She did my check out very smartly and quick thanks ms. Shabnam . I will recommend this hotel to my relative s also.

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Shivani
Detailed Review: The room was clean and comfy, i like the room view was very beautiful from the window.food was awesome and the staff was very nice the receptionist osama are nice. and the room service are greatand responsive.i am very regular guest in this hotel . aman and shabnam was very helpful. duty manager anil he was helped me a lot.

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: CHITHRANIRMALA PALANISWAMY
Review: Supreme court hearing for State Bank of India
Detailed Review: Thank you for a very pleasant stay and really excellent food. The range of food is good. I especially thank Ms.Ruchi at the Buffet center for taking care of us with her efficiency, customer  service and pleasant outlook.  As to rooms, separate cupboards are to be provided in every rooms for placing clothes. It is not comfortable to lay them on tables. So also toiletries kit which includes paste brush comb is not provided. It is expected of a 4star hotel. Thanks once again.

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Camper784748
Detailed Review: Royal plaza hotel is very good.staff is very friendly courteous. Aman and Shabnam both were very good nice with us. At reception Anirudh and Saurav they are always happy to welcome. Spa is very nice and aroma is very good. Pool is clean and Centralized we enjoy a lot there water is clean if people want to do swimming they can .

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Vijay
Detailed Review: I have stayed with royal plaza which was amazing in central delhi. I am very frequent guest in this hotel as alway everything is good starting from check in . My check in was amazing and from the room view was beautiful my room no is 923. Buffett was very delicious as always. This time check out was done by shabnam with smiling face she is very attentive. Lobby was beautiful with lots of lights and statues. I will recommend this hotel to my colleagues also.

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Mushafiz M
Detailed Review: Check in was smooth.  Basically, room was cosy. Breakfast was fantastic. Bring back memories of my childhood back in Malaysia. Plenty of selections. Staffs very attentive and kind. Keep up the good work.

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Rajiv Kumar
Detailed Review: I have been coming to this property since last 10 years and have always found the services excellent  Special mention about Mam Ruchi who always is on toes to ensure the best services are provided to ALl Guests  Great...Keep it up

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Ravi S
Review: Good Food. Good Staff = Good Life
Detailed Review: Pretty central and close to all monuments and business zones. Special mention for the F&B part. Sumptous brekfast with live piano. Coming here again. Thank you Ruchi from F&B for special assistance. Look forward to visiting again

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Sarah
Detailed Review: Puja was great and very welcoming and Pankaj helped with a few problems with the room (not working air conditioning and leaking taps). The rooms were clean and comfortable. Breakfast had a large choice with very friendly and helpful staff.

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Ammul
Detailed Review: Hotel is very nice and central located . Check in staff ( Aman ) was quick and friendly,  Good food. Staff is very much appreciated would recommend  Harish is very helpful  Lobby evening music is awesome   Thanks

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Komi
Detailed Review: Hotel the royal plaza is so good, breakfast is so yummy, bakery  items are so good, their manager RUCHI MALIK has been become a friend, she is so kind and nice always even in so busy days at her restaurant. Rooms are clean , location of this hotel is very nice . God bless this property.

Source.Name: Hotel The Royal Plaza_4Delhi.csv
Name: Reddy
Detailed Review: Check in was prompt give us good room room was clean house clean Vikesh  he is extremely helpful. ANKIT and Harish both were professional and polite . Guest relations during stay very much appreciated. Give us spa coupon 15 it’s good.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Sarvjeet1122
Detailed Review: Good food. The ambience of the restaurant was beautiful Combo of Indian and continental is lovely to palette. Service in iris/oryo can be improved. Would visit again once everything gets normal and we can start our CME's once again

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: jasmeen k
Detailed Review: The hotel is in the heart of malls and thus is conveniently located. I have been there many times for a sip after visiting the mall or after a movie. The food is good and has a decent bar to have a peaceful evening.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Mittal
Detailed Review: We were only supposed to stay at this hotel for 3 nights but we ended up staying for 4 WEEKS! My mom ended up in Hospital and the location of our stay here was amazing. We could easily walk to Max Hospital, the nearby Mall, the nearby village of Malviya Nagar. The chef and Manager treated us like family after knowing our circumstances and made our stay easy and comforting. I would return and recommend staying here.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Qayumvirani
Detailed Review: Had my baggage mishandled by Air India. But the Hotel made me feel like home, even helped arrange for me to go back to the airport for my bagage the very last minute. The staff and service was very professional.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: ChandanKumar1975
Review: Great location, excellent service and value for money
Detailed Review: Hilton Garden Inn Saket has a very nice location- right in the Center or high end shopping malls & restaurants. Even close to one of the best hospitals if you need. Staff is good. Very cooperative. Service is good. Breakfast spread is fantastic. Lunch and dinner options can be improved. Room service is great. Good for both business and family stays.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: FrequentFlier713389
Review: Great place to stay for business travellers to New Delhi
Detailed Review: I am in the middle of a four-night stay here after a four-night stay here a week ago as part of a two-week business trip to India.  All of the personnel have been very helpful from security to the bell staff to the front desk, and especially the restaurant.  They have all been very friendly and welcoming, and offering recommendations and other advice.   The accommodations are good and the fitness center is more complete than is typical for hotels of this type.  I have had many meals so far in the restaurant, each of which have been very good.  While they do have western dishes, why come all of the way to India and eat what I can have at home.  I was able to sample one delicious dish after another.  I had one meal with a colleague from India who also thought that the food was…

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Peter D
Detailed Review: Had a great time at the bar. Rahul the BT was super helpful and knowledgeable. He took great care of us. Very professional. Ask for him for great svc. He was also helpful with telling us what was in the neighborhood.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Amit D
Review: Good property could do with some revamping
Detailed Review: Everything works just fine. The furnishings are a tad old and could very well do with some re-furbishing. The hotel is showing it's age. Staff is cordial. In room dining charges are pretty high. However, you have the select city walk mall just next door and a couple more restaurants just opposite. Taxis are easy to get. The shower area in the rooms lack any handshower which is a let down. Also the water pressure is not that great. Overall a decent stay.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Deep
Detailed Review: Do not think twice before booking this hotel as long as you can afford it. Staff is very helpful. They won't even let you take your bags by yourself. Kudos to all the employees at the hotel. Amazing food. Thanks to the chef. Thank you Bimal, Indu and Pappu for keeping the hotel premises safe for the visitors. Last but not least, special thanks to Pradeep. I haven't met anyone who's as dedicated at their job as Pradeep.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Jil K
Detailed Review: We were taken care of by the welcoming staff indu, bimal and pappu. The breakfast was amazing and the restaurant managers took great care of us. We would definitely choose this hotel again. Great room as well.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Abhijit Z
Detailed Review: Indu, chandan deshpal are very good  staff at the main entrance..always smiling and welcoming guests. We have been staying here since many years now and the entrance staff is very important for making the stay comfortable...I like their smiling faces.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Ssimsss
Detailed Review: Have kind and nice staffs. Good Thanks for help me.  Here resturant is really good. Very delisious. Even i am foreioner.  Some times heater doesnt work. But the call the maintain office they fix it promptly.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Veera
Detailed Review: We had great service by Rahul Dahiya and Sahil tonight and would recommend visiting the bar!! Rocking bartender  Rahul Dahiya best of luck of  Bright future and good luck. I will come back to visit again..

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Brad J
Detailed Review: Rooms are a bet worn out but staff is excellent. Would recommend compared to other hotels in the area. Plus being near the mall is nice. And love having a Starbucks. Makes all the difference in the world when you’re traveling from international.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Adil Zafar
Detailed Review: Chandan, Indu and Ajay and Deshpal are nice personalities. They will welcome guest with smile and do the security check the way guest feel more comfortable and the Willingly accept for going through security procedures. Restaurant and other services are best.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Kamaal
Detailed Review: Outstanding services and starting from main entrance to the reception to all staff including INDU prem chand  Chandan Ajay Tajamul Gocher  Food is the best  Breakfast is mind blowing  King size bed  Visiting twice. A year

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: M.P. Verma
Detailed Review: Hotel is in saket mall area and its a good location for business people. House keeping is good and neat & clean. Prompt service Brake fast spread is good. Hospitality is good staff is always smiling & cooperative. its a good experience.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Rino
Detailed Review: Very nice hotel and really good restaurant. Service high quality of serve and quik. Very Kind people. Special thank to Tanya, Devender, Faran, Kumar, Goldy, Shail. The room are big and wifi is available.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: KJ292
Detailed Review: The swimming fool is out of several days all the kids were very unhappy. The brake fast staff didn’t seem to care about Guest. Staff were gathered in a corner talking and ignoring the guests. Breakfast was very disorganized. Tables were left dirty. Management seem to be very understanding  on the issues.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Nikkhil
