Detailed Review: Excellent stay. Very pleasant staff. Excellent hospitality. Security staff, Bimal, AnKesh, Aditya and Indu were very pleasant with greetings. Enjoyed the stay at the hotel.. Will definitely visit again.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Jared W
Detailed Review: The staff at the Hilton Garden Inn Saket were very helpful. They helped organize tours and even the delivery of food. A couple of the staff including Om Naryan was very helpful in giving my father and I travel tips throughout the city

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Nekuri
Detailed Review: From the registration to check out me and my family had an excellent experience. Very efficient, courteous and helpful. I used the hotel cars for airport transfers and city tours service was excellent. They had WiFi in the car very convenient for looking up things on road. I highly recommend the hotel

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Bill
Review: Hilton at Saket, great place to stay
Detailed Review: One of the best Hotel in Delhi, the team working there, is very professional,from the reception , the service, the kitchen, the cleaning & the security. For example people like Omnaraya, Balmiki, Divya, Aditya, Komal and all of the security team, they are doing ecxallent job, nothing gets inside without inspection everybody was safe inside the hotel because of this people. Thank you

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Update
Detailed Review: Chandan & Ajay were good at their security job. The restaurant was good the meal was good we’ll. The administration was good. The reception was warm. However, the fridge lacked the commodities I required.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Harsh v Kalro
Detailed Review: Had a good time during my stay Specially the security staff at the hotel was courteous (Khushbu, Ajay, Chandan) Must try place Restaurant is good Clean rooms, helpful staff Swimming pool on the terrace

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Satwinder
Detailed Review: Indu chandan and Ajay security is very nice service , restaurant India grill restaurant service is nice I stay in Hilton garden inn saket Delhi stay was very compartable near mall select city walk is so nice.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Justin
Detailed Review: Had a wonderful stay at the Hilton Garden Inn.  Location couldn’t be better for New Delhi. Quick access to Uber’s, Metro, and a short walk to the Select City Walk Mall and lots of restaurants.  Great for international and domestic travelers alike.  Hotel security and check in staff made our trip fun and enjoyable each morning!

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Kunaljjain30
Detailed Review: Amazing Hotel, Nice rooms, Location wise its very convenient. Friendly staff ... Indu, Chandan and deshpal were very cooperative. Room Service was good. My first time, but experience was amazing. Awesome

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: AratricaGuha007
Detailed Review: I stayed for 10 days with Hilton Inn.Though a small one having 100 rooms and only one restaurant and one bar but the service of the staffs are very much appreciated.  Mrs Khusboo Singh from Security helped a lot in knowing about the place . Also Mr.Muhammed gave me a brief idea about Delhi as it was my first time . Housekeeping executive and associate Mr.Singh was also helpful but one backdrop is that they didn't enroll my name in Hilton Honors even after staying for so many days .

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Phurbasamten
Detailed Review: Chandan security service is good, man door security is so good, India grill resturent is very nice and front office staff is good near mall select city walk is 2minute walking distence mall is very nice.

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: mayank1787
Detailed Review: It was a really pleasurable and awesome stay and the security team consisting of Indu, Chandan and Ajay. Really appreciate the service provided and look forward to coming back again. It was a good stay

Source.Name: Jaypee Siddharth Delhi4.csv
Name: Rachit Thukral
Detailed Review: It was a really nice stay. The staff was super good. Specially indu, desh pal and ajay (security team) were so kind and helpful. The food was amazing too. The crowd was also nicd outside the hotel. I will definitely recommend this.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: AB96
Detailed Review: My first preference is Lemon Tree Premiere Delhi Airport, whenever I am traveling to Delhi. It has always been like a home away from home.   And not only the facilities and guest service but team at hotel. Is also amazing. Here I would also like to recognize mad appreciate Amit Fordell, who is always there at anytime. Of the day to provide best experienced to the guests at restaurant or manage guest's requests.   I miss my stay there, waiting for my travel to Delhi start...

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Abhay
Detailed Review: Pleasing atmosphere,  pleasing service . Food is delicious.  Aroma of Lemon was soothing.  Front was quite talkative  Tx to Lokesh for making my staycation memorable. I really enjoyed your hospitality. Thanks.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: 950kannanr
Review: One of the best hotel with Amazing hospitality.
Detailed Review: I would like to thank Mr Prasun kumar (HK),A amazing guy very time I have visited this person as always made our stay comfortable took care of needs what hospitality thank you sir ..Un short Mr Prasun Kumar and his team knows what guest want and delivered a great attention to make saty comfortable ..the HK team as provided us many excellent room and amenities of very stays..I have stayed at this hotels for over 15 times in 6 months and very visit as some new thought the pool side area is a very quit and charming place ..the citrus cafe as some amazing food and very nice morning breakfast to offer,A very decent gym better then some of hotels around,A very efficient in-room Dining service..who understand my taste buds all in all very good hotel good location v.good hospitality..in…

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Gopal S
Review: Amazing ambiance and amazing staff and efforts.
Detailed Review: This is one of the best hotel I have ever visited. The ambiance is very amazing specially Republic of Noodles. Special thanks to Chef Rajendra, Chef Manoj Chef Vinod & Chef Bhavya for there very caring and kind behaviour in anticipating all the needs.  The satisfaction of the customer is the first priority of the employees in this hotel. I will surely recommend this hotel to everyone and will definitely visit here again.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Gopal S
Detailed Review: It was an amazing experience in this hotel. Staff is extremely polite and cooperative. Ambiance was amazing and the best part is that it is near to the airport.  I would specially like thank Chef Brijesh, Chef Rajendra, Chef Bhavya, Chef Vipin, Chef Praveen and service personal Sanjay, Rahul for there extremely fabulous hospitality and service.  I appreciate RON team (kitchen and service) for there extremely fantastic behaviour who provided us with fabulous food.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Asia Mundo Tours
Review: Best pan asian food ever had.
Detailed Review: Glad to be here in lemon tree premier in RON and had food of excellent quality prepared by Chef Brijesh &Chef Rajendra's team:- ( Bhavya,Lepcha,Keshav,Vipin). And excellent service by Mr Pankaj and Sanjay, Excellent food  perfection of everything was there ( aroma, flavour of spices, flavour of garlic) was excellent. Good team work and best coordination was there. Will visiting again for sure in Lemon tree premier.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Dave V
Detailed Review: Kuldeep was excellent at communicating and making sure we got safely from the airport to the hotel. The hotel is modern, clean and staff are very friendly and helpful. Breakfast is well stacked, although I personally feel the Hotel Ibis down the street has a slightly bigger selection. Overall - definitely recommend!

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: amarbir s
Detailed Review: It was an Amazing experience staying at, LEMON TREE AEROCITY .Would like to put a word of thanks for the amazing and flawless experience at Republic of Noodles.We have dined at Republic of Noodles with a special chinese menu.The Burmese Chicken curry was awesome with an authentic taste.These people give value to the brand.Would definitely like to visit again whenever we come to delhi.Special thanks Amit Fordell,Pankaj,Chef Rajender

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Jimmy
Detailed Review: Stayed for 15 days.. Comfortable stay, location and connectivity amazing..good support from staff...especially Mr pawan needs a special mention..food served was also amazing..overall a good experience..

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: atif
Detailed Review: lobby was great and very bright. like the pool area. citrus cafe was also very bright and they serve very delicious food . met chef Aditya and he explained us few places around delhi ..he was very friendly . thanks to him for providing us great food

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Rabiya
Detailed Review: Best effort by chef aditya and nice food  It was wonderful stay here...had lovely lunch at citrus with my friend ...I love the buffet presentation and the variety of deserts and salad....big thumbs up to all chefs..also they have a great concept for saving water

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Shubham Joshi
Detailed Review: Its my good experience to stay here i like it very much ..food was amazing with thesunday brunch  ..... chef aditya helped me out in choosing the dishes from the buffet and I personally like the quality of the food b

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Claudia
Detailed Review: The food is amazing! All three meals, breakfast, lunch and dinner are all scrumptious! Would definitely come back here to have more meals like this.... Thanks to chef Aditya and chef Brijesh for the food!

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Tvyah
Detailed Review: The food served at the hotel is amazing  And the service was super good. There's variety of foods and desserts  The staffs over here is so humble and never fail to attend us. I appreciate the chef Aditya who cook marvelous  dishes.   I wish to visit them again very  soon.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: sunil
Detailed Review: We came to celebrate bday of our family friend at citrus cafe. Food was excellent, the service very courteous and ambiance good.  Pan Seared River Sole is must for fish lover. 👍🏽Chef Deepak and Chef Dhairya

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: D Bhangale
Detailed Review: Non veg dishes prepared by chef dhairya chef hadiya chef bhavya and chef brijesh and chef rajendran are delicious. It's worth having food here,ambiance is good and will highly recommend this place to visit with family and friends.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Kunga
Detailed Review: Although my stay was quite short but it was very comfortable all thanks to the staff of lemon tree from the gate to the reception and at the restaurant too. Everyone was so humble and helpful. I also would like to thank Pawan from house keeping for his dedication and helpfulness. I had a lovely stay here!

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Ashish B
Detailed Review: I would like to share my stay with other travellers .Its a economically excellent hotel to stay with courteous staff at restaurants coffee shop. Amit fordell has provided us great service by his staff. We have taken his number for our future bookings .  Lemontree has a nice pool . With a big mall near next door . Clean and good service boys at House keeping. Front office is good . Managers are very attentive at coffee shop . there is very nice bar with Asian food .

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Saniket S
Detailed Review: Room service was excellent and staff was very helpful.Pawan was the house keeping staff who is ready to go out of his to make stay of costumers comfortable. Food of the restaurant is good and staff is helpful.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Vikesh
Detailed Review: Good variety of food and snacks. The staff is good and helpful. Aditya and Bhavya were great chefs and their hospitality was commendable. They even prepared an eggless pastry desert upon my special request. Kudos to the entire team of Lemontree and best wishes.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Sanjeev M
Detailed Review: 🙏 I came here for lunch yesterday with my partner's and love to mention that the food presentation and taste was outstanding.. love the food as it's not only tasty as well as will full fill your hungerness😊 Thanks a ton to Chef Manoj and Chef Brijesh who presented us the crispness & recipe of the food which we had choosen ✌️Also, for the food which you had recommended. I am very much happy that I had selected lemontree for lunch😊Chef Manoj kumar you a are 🌟 thanks for the hospitality Will come soon!!

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Trail580393
Detailed Review: Pan Asian food very tasty here. Come and eat in Republic of noodle s every time is full people in aerocity are lucky to have such restaurant. I personally visit and come here with my Asian group s to have food they also organise breakfast exclusively . Dinners for departure flights group s . Amit Fordell meets me every time because of him we come here his team of chef n service give awesome services.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Tej singh
Detailed Review: We visit Republicof noodles very often with pan asian group. LOVE TO have food here. Excellent thanks to all staff FOOD WAS  outstanding thanks to chef. We all want to visit this Hotel AMIT FORDELL HELP us arrange our pre departure  meals

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Munirah
Detailed Review: The food is really good and worth it. Chef Aditya rajender and brijesh is very friendly and made a good job 👍🏻 Had murgh saag in the buffet completely make myself full and the taste is suit me very well. Keep up the good work.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Aidila
Detailed Review: I love the food taste here!! Everything so delicious. Thank you chef aditya for warm service. ❤️❤️❤️ Had some dessert which are super delicious and amazing! The service also nice and warm. So satisfied

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Heera
Detailed Review: Mr pavan Kumar from house keeping department he is so calm and professional while talking and the service is also good . The customer service from all the team members is absolutely good ....Thank you

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Sandeep
Review: Excellent food and Service By Virendra and  chef Manoj.
Detailed Review: Food was excellent and specially the chicken wings made by chef Manoj chef Aditya chef Rajendra chef Yogesh and chef Dhairya they are very helpful and I am extremely happy to stay here and will highly recommend this place

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Arunav S
Detailed Review: Lemontree Hotel proved quite a nice hotwl with all amenities and services 24X7 for the guests The water conservation policy and its employment of the specially abled people speaks a lot about their work philosophy  The rooms are good, clean, washrooms and all things well maintained I would specially like to mention housekeeper Pawan as he took quite good care of us during our stay with a pleasant smile and a can-do attitude Great Stay 👍🏼

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Ram Mulekar
Detailed Review: Housekeeping is very good room clean is excellent  Mr Akash .salman.prakash. supervisor sudip is osm  food is very good location is nice launday is good Mr. Sanjeev Kumar lemon tree hotel is very good. Next time I will come to lemon tree...

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Rohan
Detailed Review: Had breakfast with my friends, great spread with a lot of variety in food and beverages . They have everything either it’s from healthy or tasty , you will get everything here. We saw a great variety of indian as well as international delicacies. They have very professional and talented chefs as i saw on live counters. Met chef brijesh and Aditya. Thanks to you and your team for such an amazing experience

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Ramesh P
Review: Great Hotel in Aerocity Excellent Service By Virendra And Restaurant Manajor Atish .
Detailed Review: We Stayed here Last few days at the start our tour . The restaurant and breakfast is amezing ,there is just so much chice.lucation is also good  .he is a very good guy.he doing his job very fastlya .i am so happy for all of him. Speasial thanks mr. Mandeep,vivek,mohit,ishwar,viru,

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Mansi
Detailed Review: The hotel is decent,I like the service of House keeping staff named Pavan Sharma.I think he is the most sensible and polite person in the entire hotel.I found him very helpful too.Keep up the good work.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Ashish C
Detailed Review: I Have been in lemon tree hotel  Delhi  for past two months and have always  found  the service  excellent. Special mention about Viru who always is On his toes to ensure that best service is provided to all Lemon tree customers.  Great keep it up. Thank you

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Darren
Detailed Review: We stayed here after air India tried to put us up in a hovel, lovely hotel nice ,clean £50 ish a room , absolutely brilliant, staff so helpful would recommend 100 percent, marble floors, consignee,pool , lovely room and beds , great food , drinks bit expensive , but who cares

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: RKVERMA60
Detailed Review: Good hotel ambience, stay is comfortable, food is excellent..............  .    . Chef brijesh,aditya,hitesh and   sukanta...............Halwa was great.... Efforts of staff is evident in making stay comfortable. Thank you lemon tree .

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: sandeep k
Detailed Review: Come here to meet my friend in the breakfast and spread was really amazing and taste was really awesome and nice to see chef's taking feedback special mention to Chef Sahil,chef Aditya and chef manoj they were really good in their job.....

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Leelakar
Detailed Review: Iam a vegetarian except for fish. 6 varieties of non veg is present. 6 items of veg is present. Food is prepared in view of guests from all over world. So people with knowledge of wide tastes will enjoy. An Indian might feel average.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: sg6965095
Detailed Review: Breakfast is very good and visit hotel for food very often get to meet Chef Sahil who knows very well about the buffet and thanks to his team for the tasty food also...and surely want to be back here.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Rahulcreading
Detailed Review: I had a wonderful time with lemon tree.  Especially Mr Hitesh Sundriyal ET, did a splendid job. He was courteous and attentive . Thumbs up for his generous attitude and a big fat thank you for his service. Thank you team lemon tree 😊😊😬😬😬😊😊😊

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Mahendra Godara
Detailed Review: Its so yammy and very simple, a perfect balance of spices...very different from the regular paneer dishes.. this was simply delicious.  PS- I am staying in Hotel lemon premier from last one week..i want to thank all chef  (Chef Hitesh,Chef Brijesh,Chef Manoj, Chef Rajat, and Chef Mehta)   for cooking delicious and awesome food for me.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Eternity11
Detailed Review: Premises super clean. Hats off to the quality of staff they have. Amazing! They go above and beyond to accommodate your plans and requests. Good quality food in the citrus lounge. I would highly recommend this place.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Subash
Detailed Review: we like the hotel location close to airport and a shopping mall with lots of food joints around the  place. It has a beautiful poolside good for summers. Very helpful staff in coffee shop and they also have a very good  pan Asian restaurant which serves very tasty food. Amit Fordell met us during the stay and helped  us for booking  in kolkata  hotel.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Pratik Dhar
Detailed Review: I visit this hotel very often coz of work and love this hotel staff very much .Excellent hospitality provided by Amit Fordell every time I visit . Managers at the restaurant and other staff as well including chefs very nice and courteous.i have visited other  hotels as well of Lemontree but this is the best as far as cleanliness and hospitality is concerned. Amit Fordell meets me every time and teaches good healthy tips for maintaining good health.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Go456350
Detailed Review: This restaurant serve amazing food to our groups and service staff is also prompt in service. Lots of Variety of dishes are there to enjoy your meal thanks to chef and manager Amit fordell who make our groups comfortable and fulfill our requests as far as meals are concerned. We our glad to visit this hotel again and again . Washroom are very clean and poolside is beautiful to click picture s. Great food with me and excellent service.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Kritika
Detailed Review: It was an amazing experience to stay at this neat and well maintained hotel. We were served with delicious food. Especially South Indian food was mouth watering...one must try ❤️ Thankyou chef Nitin and chef Hitesh for such amazing food ...kuddos to the chefs for offering such lip smacking curries 😇

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: ANJU
Detailed Review: It was our immense pleasure to stay in this hotel with supportive staff. I was amazed  to see the specially abled staff members. The food served was delicious. We enjoyed continental food. Special thanks to chef Nitin and Rajender for serving us with lip smacking food. We really enjoyed our stay.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Swati 0708
Detailed Review: Food quality is very good.. continental , south Indian food quality is nice..chef Nitin, hitesh and Manoj great job done by them... Good service by the staff !! Cheers!! Great hospitality and friendly housekeeping staff.. very cooperative staff..

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Sakshi
Detailed Review: Amazing stay at this beautiful hotel with superb hospitality. The food served was delicious and i had a great time with my friends. The south indian food was quite tasty.Kudos to chef Brijesh and chef Rajinder.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Mania
Detailed Review: Amazing food.... Chef hitesh and chef Aditya are very sweet, humble and polite😉 very nyc ambience... Had lovely food after such hectic flights.... Wonderful tym.... ❤️Hope to see you all again....... delicious desserts

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Leheri
Detailed Review: Had food at the lunch buffet of Citrus. The food was really delicious. Baingan aur makai ka bharta was really yummy. Courteous staff Chef Aditya, Chef Hitesh, Chef Brijesh were very humble Hats off to the whole team !

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Sidra
Detailed Review: Starting with the food-Taste the best.Especially liked  the pistachio pastry...The staff here are very professional, Especial thanks to Chef Aditya ,Chef Hitesh..🙂🙂.It was a lovely stay over here....

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Riddhi p
Detailed Review: the food was amazing . especially desert was fantastic . staff was very polite and approachable . Really loved the service . 🤍😇😇😇😇😇😇😇😇😇😇😇😇😇😇😇😇😇😇😇😇😇😇😇😇😇😇😇😇😇😇😇😇😇😇😇😇😇😇😇 amazing interaction done by chef Aditya and chef hitesh , chef rajender

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Devendra k
Detailed Review: Lovely people their...lunch was so yummy ..me and my wife love the food quality...so much to eat...not a big fan of dessert but loved the dessert here too.....met chef Aditya,Hitesh ,brijesh, rajender, narender, ashu, vinod Amardeep,sukantaand arvind...will vist soon

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Manish M
Detailed Review: It's been a wonderful visit to lemon tree...the rooms are nice and clean. staff has been helpful and courteous. The breakfast buffet was lavish and wholesome and the attention paid by staff is praise Worthy. Special mention of Mr. Pankaj for being a nice host in the restaurant. Keep it up. Thanks

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Siddharth Surana
Detailed Review: Food was really good, had a lot of variety. I personally don't have egg so the restaurant provided me with egg less options but overall the experience was nice. Chef Aditya was very courteous and helpful. Would definitely recommend.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Shahira Yusof
Detailed Review: The hospitality is as sweet as the desserts. Great food and a great experience. I always look forward to what they serve because the food is not too spicy. Great recommendations from Chef Aditya , brijesh,rajendra, narender, vinod ...thanks to all

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Harender S
Detailed Review: Lemon tree has organized New year decorations  very nicely. This is the only hotel in city who really cares about children's they had a kid's room to play and 4 girls were in there to take care of kids very nicely with kids food . My kids love the place and hotel was very clean and decorations was awesome. Good food and service with lots of fun on new year my family group stayed also next day breakfast was very busy but we organized by staff all staff was courteous. Amit fordell was very helpful who provide us .table in the busy hour thanks to lemon tree courtesy and caring attitude for customers. Balloon was one of the best 😍 thing.

Source.Name: Lemon Tree Premier_4_Delhi.csv
Name: Deepak
Review: Amazing hotel.. Amazing staff..Amazing Planning and Party
Detailed Review: It was wonderful experience no doubt. We booked our new year stay with gala dinner. It was no doubt amazing. Beyond expectations is the word. Specially they arranged a cake which was a surprise to both of us. Hotel is well maintained. Staff is very professional and always standing with you beyond their limits. It was a unforgettable experience. Thank you Dev Dahiya and team. Unforgettable experience... kudos...
